TEXT: Although this is likely a day away from work, there might be so much to do at home that you wish you were on the job. Nevertheless, you can see past the present moment as you anticipate the waves of relief heading your way. In the meantime, focusing on the present moment keeps your mind occupied. Don't let your responsibilities lag; taking care of the most pressing tasks right away eases the intensity so you can find time to relax.

A cautious approach to having fun today might sound restrictive at first, but you should be able to make this strategy work with ease. There is no need to go overboard with any type of indulgence; you can thoroughly enjoy yourself now by sharing simple pleasures with your friends or family. Instead of scheming for more gratification in the future, find contentment with what you have in the present.

You may feel conflicted today because you're currently motivated by needs that are different from your natural tendencies. Normally, you would choose communication over silence and activity over passivity. However, you can recharge your emotional batteries now by passing up a tempting party invitation or skipping a distracting trip to the bookstore. But even if you wisely choose to retreat, a part of you still longs for the action. Rest now; play later.

You are unsure about how involved you want to get with the emotional dramas that are unfolding around you. You might decide that acting cautiously is smarter than jumping into a conflict, only to discover that you are already playing a role in the scene anyhow. You may as well offer your assistance today, for your resistance will only delay a workable resolution. Showing your support by listening to your friends is the first step to establishing common ground.

You may doubt yourself if you are putting too much effort into containing your energy. You're happiest when your love can be expressed naturally and everyone fully appreciates the magic you bring to their world. Now, however, it's tricky finding a healthy balance between your inner and outer worlds. Too much exuberance makes others uncomfortable. Too much self-restraint prompts them to worry about you. Don't be overly concerned; ultimately, all you can do is be yourself.

Even if there are unresolved issues floating around a current relationship, you can still latch onto a sense of well-being today. Once you decide to take everything in stride, communication becomes more straightforward and you're apt to just say what's on your mind. You're smart enough to know that some things are beyond fixing, and worrying about them won't make it easier to let go. Forget about the big picture for a while and revel in what you can do in the present moment.

Retreating from the hectic world is a smart idea today and if you take care of your responsibilities early on, you can actually manifest a very relaxing day. However, you must scale back your social obligations or things probably won't unfold according to your ideal plan. Be ready for a few unexpected twists and turns; engage them willingly instead of resisting the inevitable. Your adaptability is the secret to your success.

Although you might believe that being alone with your thoughts is the best way to spend the day, you will probably be better off hanging out with others today. But don't squander your time by celebrating with just anyone; you can be as selective as you want when it comes to the company you keep. Choose a few special friends and carve out enough space to share something meaningful. An unexpected gift of appreciation or a warm gesture of affection is a wonderful way to demonstrate your love.

You have recently experienced a phase of expansionism and it's time to re-establish balance in your life. Actually, your tendency to overstep limits may be a central theme for months to come, but it's still not healthy to lose yourself in unrealistic visions for next year. Instead, focus your attention on something you can change right now -- in the present moment. Today, thinking small is your smartest strategy.

Having a concrete plan can help you feel better, but it still may be difficult to turn your thoughts into actions today. Don't be too self-judgmental if you can't yet get the traction you desire. You wisely realize that the best ideas take time to develop. Nevertheless, remember that you are currently caught between optimism and realism. Be patient; the pace will accelerate in the months ahead and a solid foundation prepares you for the changes of the future.

It's awesome that you can still be comfortable even when life gets strange and weird. It's not that anything in particular is going wrong now; it's just that there are lots of loose ends that defy tying up. Instead of attempting to finish last year's business today, accepting circumstances as they are may be your most intelligent approach. Your irreverent sense of humor might just save the day, capturing the attention of admirers of a quick wit.

Your friends might try to bring you back down to earth today, but it's not easy to spend time with them if they're raining on your dreams and draining your enthusiasm. It's not that they have bad intentions where you're concerned; it's just that they don't understand the intense relationship you have with your imagination. You can be more tolerant of others once you understand that they sincerely have your happiness in mind.

You are enthused about putting in a day of hard work today, but the details may require too much time and energy for your liking. However, if you become bogged down by a minor matter, consider that this isn't where your attention is most needed. Take a long, hard look before fruitlessly pouring your heart into a situation of questionable importance. You know you're doing the right thing when your energy flows without resistance.

While others seem uptight or nervous today, you may appear quite confident and calm. Your optimistic attitude and polished appearance make a great impression on your peers. You have a relaxed competence that puts people at ease, so take advantage of this creative phase by talking with those whose approval you seek. There's no need to hold back now so let your natural talents shine.

You feel extra clever today and are up for the challenge of getting your life back in order. But a problem may start at home with something relatively unimportant; unfortunately, even the smallest loose thread can unravel the largest fabric. Handling the situation successfully requires you to find the right balance between concern and detachment. Show how much you care without trying to control the outcome or expecting anything in return.

Using your sharp wit as a weapon today is less admirable than simply telling the truth. Don't just settle into a defensive posture if it feels like someone is attacking you. Emotions hiding beneath the surface might be the result of deeper motivations that are't being discussed openly. Rely on your analytical powers to discern whether anyone is trying to manipulate you, and then react accordingly. Taking the high road is almost always the best route to maintaining your integrity.

You will accomplish a lot more today if you can focus on just one thing at a time. Of course, it's easy to be pleasantly lured off track when pets or children are in the picture. You have a wide range of talents and interests, but cashing in requires concentrating on what you value most. Mastering a single skill means that you really don't have time to waste. Remember, precision counts more now than anything else.

You typically like your world to be clean and polished, but you might get a little dirty today. Don't worry or become too self-critical about the mess because getting the job done is more important than looking good. Take a chance and dive into the challenges you face now. Put all your intensity into whatever you encounter and then move on, knowing that you gave it everything you could.

Creating balance is what you Libras do best since you prefer staying cool and reasonable under all circumstances. However, if someone gets under your skin and agitates your feelings today, you might not keep your reaction to yourself. Pay attention to your emotions and notice where they take you. You have an excellent chance to talk through whatever comes up as long as you don't get stuck in one spot. Exploring uncharted emotional territory expands your heart, allowing more love to flow in and out.

Your friends may attempt to convince you to do something that doesn't sound like the smartest move now. It's very important that you trust your instincts over someone else's argument -- even if you have to stand up for your beliefs. Nevertheless, be careful not to create more conflict than necessary, for others might be quick to take your disagreement as a direct challenge. Negotiation is certainly better than confrontation if you want to keep the peace.

Your laissez-faire approach might get you into big trouble at work today, especially if you try to avoid the most logical solution. Your best strategy now is the simplest one, so don't turn a molehill into a mountain or you'll eventually have to climb it. Listen to the cool voice of reason, even if it comes from your boss. Practicing self-discipline in the first place is a successful proactive strategy.

Life feels a bit calmer today as the Moon moves through earthy Virgo. Try to make choices that stabilize a current situation while simultaneously planning for your future. Unfortunately, it may be challenging to balance your immediate needs with your long-term goals. Be careful not to let your ambitions dictate all your decisions or you'll end up wasting precious time and energy. Step back and ground yourself so you can operate from a practical perspective.

It's difficult to slow down enough today to give your feelings time to fully express in the way you need. You tend to be uncomfortable when you are feeling vulnerable, yet emotional intimacy may be the key to your growth. Don't try to intellectualize everything you experience now. Instead, push through your awkwardness by freely opening your mind and heart to the world around you. Start slowly by sharing one of your deepest fears with someone you trust; you might be pleasantly surprised with where that conversation leads.

You may want to avoid tackling a difficult family issue today, but it's still probably a good idea to face an existing conflict head on. Instead of following your intuition, let the hard facts be your guide for a change. Analyze the situation from several points of view and then make an objective decision that benefits all involved. No one can find fault in your actions if you stick with clear logic.

Although you may feel like changing the course of events today, others might not be willing to follow your lead. You could be too impulsive, since you're inclined to jump to conclusions without having the necessary facts to support your fantastic ideas. Go ahead and be as inventive as possible now, but don't expect anyone else to join in your parade. March to the sound of your own drum instead of waiting for something to happen.

You like knowing what's real, yet a whole new set of data may come to your attention today that gives rise to self-doubt. You might even question whether or not you're on the right track. Your resistance to change could harden into rigidity but this isn't a sensible strategy, especially if your previous assumptions were wrong. Remaining open to other options doesn't fix the underlying problem, but it can make your day easier to manage along the way.

You're on top of your mental game today and can amaze people with your wit and wisdom. However, extra care is required or you might become so enthralled with your own cleverness that you take an argument too far. Too much eagerness on your part could cause you to lose ground in a conflict. Go ahead and take a risk, but think twice before pushing your luck.

You may step on someone's toes unintentionally because you're uncharacteristically insensitive today. Normally, you're acutely aware of people's feelings, but you might get so excited now that compassion falls to the wayside. Your temporary lack of concern doesn't mean you are unkind; it's just that your enthusiasm makes you a bit inconsiderate. The simple solution is to stop and think about the impact of your words before you speak them.

You are eager to enjoy yourself today, but previous commitments might present time management problems. Unfortunately, your nervous energy could grow distracting unless you consciously channel it into a creative activity. It's a good day to work in partnership with someone whose approach is much different from yours. A collaborative effort can be highly productive and may even bring the personal satisfaction you were originally seeking.

An unconventional plan helps to break you out of a familiar rut today. A job-related issue that's been eluding resolution may suddenly be put to rest, with the answer coming to you like a bolt of lightning. But don't take yourself too seriously, even if your solution is brilliant; acting in a self-righteous manner puts others on the defensive. Simply make your decision and then move on without the need to prove your superiority.

Your day won't likely run as smoothly as you wish because unexpected circumstances can have a dramatic impact on your schedule. Unfortunately, you might become quite frustrated if you cling to your original agenda. The smartest way to handle irresolvable tension now is to simply let it go. Acknowledging that fate is temporarily in charge of your life makes embracing the surprises more pleasant than resisting them to no avail.

Worrying about an unlikely outcome only creates additional stress as you become enthused about a radical approach to a sticky problem at work. There are many possible solutions now, but you have reservations about moving into uncharted territory by taking charge. Your ideas are probably better than you think, so go ahead and initiate action. You can always make necessary adjustments and try again later if you don't hit the nail directly on the head.

The notion of doing something completely different from everyone's expectations is rather thrilling now. Unplanned activities may supersede your previous commitments. You could even stir up a bit of mischief just to see what kind of reaction you get. Have fun; there's no need to go out of your way to conform since your current unconventional ideas will likely lead to a sensible plan by tomorrow.

You are usually cautious in your conversations about business, but your thoughts may be so loud today that it's hard to keep quiet. You might even say contradictory things now, which lowers your overall credibility. Instead of rambling on and on, continue to develop your ideas on your own and wait until tomorrow before sharing them. You'll have a much better chance of impressing others if your plan is well conceived.

Your nervous system is wired tightly today while chatty Mercury is getting buzzed by electric Uranus, your key planet. Be careful, since you could easily commit your time and energy to a creative project that isn't really in your best interest. Consider the consequences before agreeing to an endeavor that can drain your resources. There's no reason to add more activity to your already busy schedule unless it's something you really want to pursue.

You want to show everyone how independent you are today, making you less accommodating than usual. Your patience may be tested, tempting you to say something that could be disruptive. Nevertheless, you don't have to put up with childish games as long as you're prepared to deal with the ramifications of your current rebelliousness. Thankfully, the results will be worth the temporary turmoil if you clearly express your honorable intentions to others.

Your ruling planet Mars is supported by buoyant Jupiter today, motivating you to act on your feelings. You feel secure enough to express emotions that would normally make you feel uncomfortably vulnerable. Although your current zest for life may be contagious, you might grow more circumspect toward the evening. Respecting established boundaries now prevents you from having to reconsider your radical approach later on.

Your key planet Venus forms a stressful aspect to somber Saturn tonight, reminding you that common sense will ultimately overcome your enthusiasm. However, don't let your self-restraint kick into action too early in the day or you may miss the other planetary excitement bubbling around you. Starting a new project is a good idea as long as you're willing to follow through with sincere effort after the initial buzz wears off.

At first everyone seems to be having a fine time, but you can see beneath the surface and the atmosphere isn't as copacetic as it appears. It isn't your style to rain on someone else's parade, yet the responsibility may fall on you to be the one to issue a reality check. Nevertheless, there's no reason to approach the situation with negativity. Express your thoughts as kindly as possible and then let go of your attachment to what happens next.

You feel the power of love today but you may not reveal your true passion, especially if the thought of expressing your desires makes you uncomfortable. Although you don't like being emotionally vulnerable on a regular basis, there's no need to let your irrational fears stand in the way of a potentially lovely experience. Instead of trying to control the process, just share what's in your heart without expecting anything in return.

Although there are many excellent reasons to work in partnership now, be certain you have all the facts at your disposal before you make faulty assumptions. It's tempting to overlook something you don't want to know, but it's better to be rational and have a solid handle on reality today. Ironically, acknowledging the weight of responsibility opens the doors for more pleasurable times. Do the right thing when it comes to matters of the heart and the rewards will follow.

You feel like you have an inexhaustible supply of energy today, prompting you to reach for the stars. Fortunately, harmonious trines to auspicious Jupiter in your 10th House of Status suggest that you could make a lot of progress toward your career objectives now. There's nothing wrong with setting ambitious goals as long as you're willing to earn your success gradually by working harder than everyone else.

Your exuberance is apparent in everything you do today as long as you're being creative. Luckily, you can maintain your sense of optimism if you focus your attention on the future. However, lingering doubts about your ability to follow through with what you start can raise old fears. Talk things over with a trusted friend instead of denying your concerns. Once your issues are out in the open, you'll be able to move forward without carrying the weight of the past on your shoulders.

Sink into your own feelings today as energetic Mars activates your 4th House of Emotional Security. Your current optimism might inspire others; however a slight case of self-doubt could gnaw away at your confidence. This negativity may just be a passing thought if you are flexible in your thinking. Once you realize the source of your anxiety, you can easily move past it and refocus on the opportunities at hand.

Your ruling planet Jupiter is a key player in today's expressive cosmic configuration, pulling you head-first into the realm of relationships. Be careful about going overboard with your enthusiasm, especially if you are using it to cover a deeper concern. Finding a healthy balance between the adrenaline rush of reckless abandon and the dutiful routine of emotional responsibility isn't easy, but well worth the trouble.

Demonstrating your competence at work is effortless today because everything seems to be going your way. Unfortunately, you may be so sure of yourself now that you take the path of least resistance rather than doing a job in your typically thorough manner. However, you could find yourself in trouble quickly unless you pay attention to all the little details. You can let your hair down and relax once you've fulfilled your current obligations, but not a moment sooner.

Jovial Jupiter is harmonizing with irrepressible Mars in your 1st House of Personality today, pushing your exuberance to the surface. Everyone can see that you're putting your best foot forward, but you may not feel quite as optimistic as you appear. You have legitimate concerns about the actions of others; but instead of wasting your energy making judgments about someone else, change your own thinking. No one else's behavior needs to negatively impact your day, unless you let it.

Your imagination is often a path for escape, yet today you can dream your way to success as long as you're willing to cooperate with others on the job. Even if you're tempted to withdraw from social interaction, push past your resistance and reach out to your co-workers now. Instead of worrying about what anyone else thinks about your contribution, just show up and be yourself. You may be happily surprised with the positive reinforcement you receive in return.

Your partner or friend may tell you something about yourself today that you prefer not to hear. But you're so busy communicating about your current projects or creating career plans that you might forget about your own feelings. Take advantage of this chance to put your world back together by refocusing your reactions to others. Instead of sidestepping the shadows that appear in front of you, shine the light of your awareness and transform your fear into love.

Discovering simple pleasures within your normal weekend routine is your best path to happiness now that the lovely Libra Moon is visiting your 6th House of Habits. You are usually most comfortable when everything goes according to your plan and today it just might, as long as you don't lose sight of the promises you made. Remember, enjoying a healthy balance between work and play makes more sense than extremes.

You receive a creative buzz from the artistic Libra Moon as she floats through your 5th House of Self-Expression. Your enthusiasm is amped even higher by mischievous Mercury today. You're in a rather playful mood, but you are also eager to do something productive with all of your ideas. However, there's no need to be overly concerned about the end result yet; just take enough time to express yourself as boldly as you can.

Logic isn't often your most important consideration because you watery crustaceans are primarily emotional beings. However, you may grow anxious today as your thoughts lead to one conclusion while your heart chooses not to go along for the analytical ride. For now, just stick to the facts. You'll be feeling more like your old self within a couple of days.

You are in a rather noisy phase now that the people-pleasing Libra Moon is moving through your 3rd House of Information. There is a lot happening in your environment and it's hard to keep up with it all. Perhaps you have simply tried to pack too much into your schedule. Or maybe you have details to settle that you thought were already completed. Either way, don't get lazy and let your responsibilities slide, even if you wish you could take the day off. Take pride in your accomplishments.

Try to decipher the hidden meaning behind the information coming your way now, for there can be a chance for healing, especially around issues of love and romance. Your key planet Mercury is visiting your 5th House of Fun, yet it's tricky to know how deep you need to dig in order to overcome whatever's blocking your creativity. Take your time processing your feelings; things don't have to change overnight.

You are painting your day with a very wide palette of feelings. Unfortunately, others may see you as moodier than usual, but you feel that your emotions are well justified by the current circumstances. Silently build your case for taking action, but don't say too much about your plans yet. Instead of overplaying your hand, wait a few days before sharing your ideas.

You might try to find solace within your own inner world today since the evocative Moon is traveling through your 12th House of Secrets. Thankfully, you realize your ability to create peace in your life begins with accepting your own feelings. But don't overdo the all-is-good philosophy or you won't be motivated to make the changes necessary to be happy. Combining self-forgiveness with responsible action creates a strategy that gets positive results.

It may feel as if the good times won't last, but you actually have nothing to fear. Everything must wax and wane in its own time, as does the light of the Moon. If you have been riding a high recently, you might feel a bit down today. Don't be afraid to talk about your concerns; if you lean on your friends for support they will help you regain a healthy perspective.

You want everyone to be happy, yet you're not prepared to sacrifice your integrity for any reason. You may be facing a dilemma now that creates stress from these two conflicting points of view. Ultimately, you are the judge that decides how it unfolds. Even if you're not the final authority, you are still responsible for your own actions -- and whatever you do today has a strong impact on the future.

Even if you are feeling a bit sluggish today, something significant is developing that will require you to take action in the days ahead. Although you start out optimistic, your confidence might wane throughout the weekend. Nevertheless, you're in better shape to succeed than you think. Just keep everything running as smoothly as you can for now, but be ready to react accordingly when the pace speeds up.

You are intuitively picking up subtle messages that involve the needs of others, yet it's difficult to get a clear read on the situation. Someone's behavior may appear to be out of control, and you're concerned enough to step in and help. You're ready to swing into action, but might restrain yourself due to a lack of confidence. However, there's no reason to hold back; you're stronger than you realize. Let your friends lean on you while you are up for the challenge.

There are distinct differences between your long-term ambitions and your present responsibilities. Even if you can see a clear path to your destination, initiating action may have to be temporarily delayed. However, once you accept that you cannot have everything go your way now, you'll be able to get on with your day and make the best of the current situation.

The noise level of personal drama today may be a bit too loud for your tastes. Although you would normally be uncomfortable with the tension, you recognize the potential of this moment won't last, empowering you to stick with the issues. Others will be disappointed if you simply try to satisfy their expectations without pursuing your heart's desires, too. Make sure that your actions are aligned with your feelings and your mind is open to change.

You may feel as if you're mired in quicksand today, and the more you struggle with relationship issues the deeper and more complex they become. You might even experience a moment of panic as you try unsuccessfully to remove yourself from a difficult situation. Fast talking and witty repartee won't help you now, so find a way to be comfortable in the present moment. You could be pleasantly surprised with what you learn about yourself once you settle into your feelings.

Intense demands on your time and energy make it difficult for you to follow your own agenda today. Even if you feel resentment rising, there's no easy way to express your annoyance; others may judge you as overly negative if you try. Your best strategy now is to apply yourself diligently to get as much done as possible and save your resistance for another day. A simple attitude adjustment on your part can make all the difference in the world.

You have specific ideas about how to do your chores today and may disagree with someone about your chosen methods. Unfortunately, there won't be a winner in a conflict if push comes to shove, even if you really do know what's best. Sharing your perspective isn't enough now; avoid an escalation of emotions by being willing to compromise. Act in the spirit of collaboration for the most harmonious outcome.

Your sharp analysis can be so precise that you don't leave very much room for negotiation today. There's no question about it; you are a formidable opponent now because your perceptions are irrefutable. Unfortunately, being right doesn't give you permission to ignore someone else's perspective. Soliciting alternative points of view is a positive way to demonstrate your willingness to cooperate prior to finalizing your plans.

Your honest participation in a discussion with close friends or family members is crucial today, even if you would rather avoid a messy confrontation. Although you have your own biases, it's easy for you to rationalize either point of view, enabling the opposing parties to trust you as an objective mediator. Do what you can to help, but be aware that you might not be able to fix the problem now. The final solution may have to wait until everyone else settles down.

Loquacious Mercury connects with passionate Pluto today, giving you the ability to see through the veneer and quickly uncover a hidden truth. Your sixth sense is fully operational, but be careful how you use your intuitive knowledge. You have the power to upset the stability of the situation, making your life more complicated in the process. Your best bet now is to work cooperatively as part of a team and not strike out on your own.

You are eager to take on any authority figure that stands in your way today. You know you're right and you can inspire others to join your cause with the powerful weight your words carry now. However, caution is advised, because it's easier to get in over your head than it is to pull back and retreat. Be sure you know what your objectives are before you open your mouth.

You may be worried that your long-term goals are not very realistic today, but your perspective could be warped by old fears. Messenger Mercury's current hook-up with shadowy Pluto in your sign might make everything seem darker than it actually is. Don't panic and impulsively take an unnecessary risk. You know what to do; your calm determination in the midst of a storm improves your chances for reaching your destination.

It's your turn to step up to the plate and show everyone what you can do today. Friends and family may be relying on you and you don't want to let them down. Meeting your responsibilities and setting a positive example for others to follow demonstrates your best intentions. Fortunately, fulfilling your obligations enables you to come through with flying colors.

You want to participate in a group activity today, but may find it challenging to let go of your own agenda in order to interact socially. It's difficult to join in because you might feel restrained by the very same people you want to engage. It's useful to discuss your concerns to clarify the differences, but there's no need to dwell on the matter. Ultimately, connecting with others feels much better than isolating yourself from the fun.

It's hard to get much started today, especially if you're worried about the disapproval you might receive from your peers. You may think that you waited too long, but there isn't anything to be gained by self-criticism now. Be satisfied with whatever you accomplish, even if it's less than you expected. Thankfully, you should be able to pick up the pace in a day or two once your key planet Mars is free from restrictive Saturn. In the meantime, work off your excess energy with a bit of strenuous physical activity.

Relationship responsibilities continue to slow you down and can consume a lot of your resources today. You want to live up to your obligations, but not necessarily at the expense of your own personal fulfillment. Don't be overly concerned, even if you can't see any progress in your current situation. Patience is required now because your goals may seem elusive for a few more days. Nevertheless, positive results are more likely if you channel your restless anxiety into hard work.

You may need to re-evaluate your current objectives at work because your previous assumptions might prove to be wrong. Instead of being in a hurry to reach your goals, slow down and make sure that all loose ends are tied up before going on to the next step. It's more important to strengthen your foundation now than it is to expand your reach. A cautious and methodical approach today will prevent unnecessary trouble down the road.

You might feel a bit disheartened today by complications in a relationship, yet you're hesitant to share what's really on your mind. Even if someone is trying to exert control over your actions, they cannot change your emotions. Unfortunately, doing what's expected of you while hiding your feelings could create an undertow of resentment. Honor your own heart now by facing your resistance and telling the truth.

Your efforts on the job may be thwarted now, no matter how hard you work. It's as if you're attempting to roll boulders up a steep hill and you wonder if it's worth all the effort. However, regardless of your lack of results, it's important that you keep trying since you are setting the stage for greater opportunities to come to fruition in the year ahead.

If your time is stretched too thin, you may have to cut back on your schedule. But don't waste energy complaining about how much you have to do or your co-workers might grow annoyed with you. Ironically, it seems like the more effort you put into making things happen now, the more work that's in front of you. Your best strategy is to shift your focus to another task for a while. You can return to your previous endeavors in a day or two with a fresh perspective.

Your friends and family may not be as supportive now as you wish. Nevertheless, it's important to realize they are on your side -- even if it doesn't feel that way in the present moment. Instead of trying to convince anyone to help you today, release him or her from your expectations. Then, if someone lends a hand, it will be a generous act of free will instead of originating from of a sense of obligation.

You might feel as if your best intentions are being stymied, and nothing you do fixes the situation today. The current circumstances are a test of your willpower; although you may be angry, losing your temper only makes matters worse. Even if you want to initiate more drastic action, kindly letting others know how you feel without blaming them is a more positive approach. Continue to take the high road instead of trying to even the score. You'll have a chance to get everything out in the open sooner than you think.

Pay extra careful attention to the clock today or your schedule could fall apart. It may be tempting to walk away from it all, but avoidance is not in your best interest. Plan ahead by first acknowledging that everything could take longer to finish than you expect. Adding extra time between activities allows you to work at a consistent pace without worrying that you'll lose control of your day. Your determination to stay on point earns the respect you seek.

You might feel a bit lost today as reaching your goals slips out of your grasp. However, don't write off anything too quickly because the game isn't over yet. There's no time to wallow in discouragement now, even if your efforts until now haven't manifested the desired results. Prematurely admitting failure could stand between you and success. Be persistent and continue to work for what you want; monetary rewards and peer recognition may be just around the next corner.

You may feel as if you must set your needs aside to fulfill responsibilities at work now that expressive Mars in your individualistic sign squares taskmaster Saturn. But instead of reacting by shutting down emotionally, set priorities that honor both your personal and professional goals. Succeeding at work is not an all-or-nothing proposition today, so make a plan that includes some quality time for yourself.

Your dreams may have grown so outrageous that achieving your goals seems unrealistic today. Something has to give because you might not be able to keep up with your own ambitious plans. Remember, if you are reaching too far, it's smarter to scale back your hopes now than waiting until it's too late. Establishing priorities based on reality, not fantasy, will help you create a healthy balance in your life.

Attempting to convince others to follow your plan today seems as impossible as herding cats. It may not matter how amazing your idea is or how articulate you are at selling it. Even your best friends seem too concerned with their own agendas to join in your efforts. Don't let anyone dampen your pioneering spirit; sometimes you're better off striking out on your own.

You could spend too much time seeking a hidden meaning that actually isn't to be found today. Meanwhile, a problem may arise because of your lack of concern over a financial matter. Trying to untangle a buried mystery might just be your way of avoiding an unpleasant issue. Instead of escaping into a world of conjecture, deal with the reality in front of you and save the metaphysical explorations for another day.

Think twice about the positive effect you could have on someone very close to you before responding to his or her emotional disclosure today. Your first reaction might be to step back from an intense conversation that's making you uncomfortable, instead of staying present with your feelings and discussing them openly. However, demonstrating your sense of autonomy is not as important now as being there for a friend in need.

You have some fantastic ideas about what you can accomplish today, but your expectations may be too unrealistic to meet. Thankfully, you could correct the situation before you get in over your head by recognizing your current tendency to bite off more than you can chew. Scaling back your plans before you begin might be enough to prevent disappointing others later on.

You're experiencing alternating waves of optimism and pessimism today as you are caught between expansive Jupiter and restrictive Saturn. You probably think you're on the right track, but might still anticipate a rough road ahead, making it tricky to maintain an even pace. Even if you're eager to reach for the stars now, it's wise to proceed cautiously for the next few days until you see where your current path is leading.

You could be the biggest obstacle to your own happiness today if you expect too much from a close friend or family member. You're not necessarily inclined to make specific demands, yet you believe that everyone should do their part. Instead of projecting your high standards on to others, just continue to lead by setting a stellar example. Maintaining harmony is more important now than high productivity.

Your best-laid plans may quickly unravel today, especially if you're holding the reins of control too tightly. Making many minor adjustments throughout the day is a more practical approach than trying to stick to a strategy that just isn't working. Keep in mind that modifying your methods or correcting your direction isn't the same as accepting defeat. Your willingness to adapt to changing circumstances is an essential key to your success.

You might be feeling smug about your financial condition today, whether or not your confidence is actually based on reality. Be cautious about buying anything you don't really need because in your present state of denial, you could be tempted now to spend more money than you should. Take time to balance your books and reassess your needs before making any discretionary purchases.

You grow moodier with the reactive Moon back in your sign, yet you're not particularly interested in pursuing self-reflection now. You don't need to make any excuses; there really could be too much happening in your outer world to journey inward. Nevertheless, you might not be eager to socialize with your friends or family if a social activity was previously scheduled. Keep in mind that you'll have time tomorrow to ponder life's mysteries if you take a lighthearted approach today.

It's difficult to keep your mind from going around in circles as you think about all the loose ends that you need to tie up. Fortunately, you can accomplish a lot if you get out of your head and into the real world now, even if philosophical theory is more interesting than practical application. Be as methodical as possible in your work, tackling the most important projects first. You'll feel a sense of true satisfaction after you cross a few things off your to-do list.

You have great expectations for the workweek, especially if there are opportunities for social networking. However, it's crucial to take all the variables into account today because others might not share your idea of what constitutes a productive time. Don't make too big of a deal about any differences of opinions. Just keep the conversations between you and your peers on topics that pertain to business. For now, it's not wise to mix work and pleasure until you know the intentions of all the players involved.

Stand up tall and demonstrate your special style of leadership today. But rather than telling your friends, family or coworkers what to do, you can truly inspire and motivate others if you lead by example now. Even if someone doesn't respond to your liking, keep your eyes on the destination as you push ahead with unwavering belief in your dreams.

Someone at work might ask for your help today, but there could be more trouble here than meets the eye. Be careful about what you do, for your behavior may create big expectations that you cannot fulfill. Don't respond to the situation with clever rationalizations or outrageous ideas. Instead, do whatever needs to be done, but not more. There are times when limited actions can accomplish the most.

It may be easier to make plans now than to actually execute them. Your key planet Venus lures you to envision the future as she joins three other planets in your 9th House of Big Ideas. Although thoughts come quickly to you today, your progress is impeded by circumstances beyond your control. Don't waste time worrying about something that goes awry; just reconsider your options and try again when the timing is right.

You may be inclined to set aside your responsibilities today and do things that bring you momentary pleasure. Unfortunately, it might not be that simple to find people to join your party because others may be more serious than you now. Don't complain about your social situation; if necessary, you can still have a delightful time all by yourself.

Your emotional sensitivity means that you don't miss much, so it's challenging for someone with mixed motives to get past your radar. However, your acute awareness can also make life more complicated as you analyze your feelings. Your early warning system may not detect the simple twists of fate that the universe now has in store for you. Don't try too hard to figure it all out in advance; simply let go and enjoy the ride.

Just when you thought you were done processing all the emotions that were lurking in your subconscious, you realize that there are more hidden feelings buried out of sight. Although these pockets of intensity start to bubble to the surface today, they are not dangerous. In fact, delving into the depths of your heart will uncover rich treasure if you are brave enough to take the dive.

You might feel as if time is running out, but the faster you attempt to complete what's on your plate, the slower everything appears to move now. If you panic, time may even seem to stop for a while. This current lack of productivity places you in a difficult position because you can become very self-critical when you're not being efficient. Cut yourself some slack and just finish your work with as little drama as possible.

Your life is at a critical junction now that new information is being thrown your way, bringing complex issues out into the open. Thankfully, your growing knowledge base enables you to make better decisions. In the meantime, integrate the events of the past couple of days, even if you don't have the full picture yet. Accept circumstances that you cannot change while working toward improving everything else. Redefining your ambitions can send you off in an entirely new direction.

You transform into a private investigator today when unexpected things happen for no apparent reason. However, your current dilemma might even stump Sherlock Holmes, himself. Relax; there are some mysteries in the universe that must remain outside your logical analysis. It's time to smile in grateful acknowledgment and accept reality's gift with grace and without question.

You feel as if you're completely in charge today, but this sense of authority is probably more illusion than truth. It's not that your life is running amok; it's just that circumstances can unfold without your expressed permission. Unfortunately, you don't get to approve everything before it happens. Differentiating between what you can and cannot change allows you to focus your efforts where they have the greatest positive impact.

You're not happy that your to-do list seems longer than ever now. Perhaps you need to rethink your workload and consider why you try to do so much. Are your goals in sync with your passions, or is it the recognition and rewards that you seek? Don't try to avoid your responsibilities; however postponing a few tasks could give you time to reconsider all your options.

You may be acting as if life is fine today, but you're probably worried that something isn't going your way. Although feisty Mars occupies your 1st House of Personality, others can see your concerns lurking just behind your enthusiasm. Instead of denying that you want more stability in your life, acknowledge that your desire for security is as important as your need for freedom. You might not be able to resolve these opposite forces now, but talking about them reduces your stress.

As if your relationships with friends and associates haven't been complicated enough, a whole new dimension of depth and intrigue can emerge now. You are less apt to go off to have a good time today if it means letting your responsibilities suffer. Although others might think you're taking your work too seriously, you are quite clear about your current ambitions and the results you seek. Cutting back on your social activities helps you deliver on your professional promises.

Focusing on your career may require all the energy you have now as the goal-oriented Capricorn Moon enters your 10th House of Status. You are more concerned with your own plans today than with the opinions of anyone else. However, you might not be able to reach your objectives without the help of others. Don't be so narrow-minded that you exclude your co-workers from sharing in your success.

Although you may have a concrete idea about how to complete your work, it might be smarter to finalize your plans today than actually execute them. Your intuition tells you to move beyond your normal routines and to try new things, but it's more important now to rely on your unwavering common sense. Blending your current vision with your practicality and patience creates an unbeatable combination.

It's irritating when something comes along in your life that's significant enough to anchor you to one spot for a while, especially if your attention is drawn elsewhere. But reality has an important lesson to teach you now, so don't let your attention wander. Stay focused on your feelings, even if it's challenging to integrate them into your life. The emotional dust will begin to settle by the weekend and you'll be able to move on.

Your current commitments to others may interfere with the fulfillment of your own emotional needs today. It might be wise to just set aside your desires for a few days while you do whatever is expected of you. Your efforts to stabilize personal and business relationships can bring you more happiness in the weeks ahead than anything you try to do for yourself now, anyway. Nurturing those you love does your own heart good.

Put away your playthings and get out your tools and determination because you have chores to do and you might as well take your work seriously. Although you may be annoyed by the arduous tasks in front of you, tackle each job willingly with a can-do attitude. A couple of days of hard work should be enough to free you up to enjoy a weekend of relaxation and recreation.

The simplest pleasures are the most memorable ones now, yet you can still fulfill your need for fun while you are working. Unfortunately, you don't take too kindly to anyone telling you how to do your job. Of course, your idea of the best way to approach a task will work just fine. However, you could easily miss the chance to enjoy a special connection with someone today if you're not willing to receive constructive feedback. Listening to the advice of others offers you more options and demonstrates your willingness to be a team player.

You might feel the stress today as you try balancing your work with the emotional needs of friends and family. Although you cannot walk away from your job, responsibilities may be calling you back home. Schedule your time in advance so you can divide your efforts between your personal and professional commitments. In the meantime, let others know that you're simply doing the best you can.

Everyone seems to be paying extra close attention to what you say today with so many planets traveling through your 3rd House of Communication. However, it's crucial to focus on the integrity of your actions at all times, making certain they are consistent with your thoughts or you may end up in a rather difficult position. However, the current emphasis is on production now, so you must buckle down and do what must be done. Save the speech for another day.

Low self-esteem could get in your way today as you struggle against the limitations of your current job. This frustration might not be a new one, but it continues to surface again when outside pressures build. If you are financially stressed, consider how your feelings of self-worth might be impacting your bank account now. This is an opportune time to establish realistic goals and then develop an ambitious plan to achieve them.

You may be approaching what appears to be the end of a road and you're trying to determine where to go next. Even if you're ready to charge ahead, unfinished business needs to be completed before you can see around the next bend. Try not to look too far ahead until after tomorrow's New Moon; instead, do everything you can to make this day as positive and productive as possible.

Your dreams may be so vivid now that it's difficult to distinguish them from reality. One inner voice reminds you of the beauty inherent in the spiritual and metaphysical approach to life. Another voice confronts you with the hard facts of your present situation. You shouldn't ignore your responsibilities, even if you prefer to be alone with your thoughts now. Shift back and forth between these two worlds as needed until you find the right balance.

A team of co-workers or a group of friends places so many demands on you now that it could be hard to find any time away from the noise of social interactions. It's crucial to show up and let your feelings be known today, even if they differ from everyone else's. However, once you've stated your position, be prepared to go along with the pack. Ironically, demonstrating your cooperative spirit gives you the opportunity for personal expression later on.

You may be growing tired of putting out so much energy, especially if you are busy at work. This is an ideal time to re-evaluate your career path as today's goal-oriented Capricorn New Moon activates your 10th House of Public Status. Pretend that there is nothing holding you back while envisioning what you want your future to look like. Then, return to the present moment and assess the obstacles that you need to overcome so you can change your life for the better.

Follow the path that is opened by new opportunities now as the ambitious Capricorn New Moon lands in your inspirational 9th House of Adventure. You know that exciting changes are just around the corner, but you might want to wait a bit longer before committing yourself to a new project. Trust your inner voice and move at a pace that feels comfortable. The current transformations will bring positive results if you are consistent and patient in your efforts.

You might as well go along with the plans of the day while the rational Capricorn New Moon energizes your 8th House of Deep Sharing. However, it's not wise to become too entangled with other people's long-term goals today. You stand to gain support in your future endeavors if you can respect the beliefs of those around you. Nevertheless, you need to channel your restlessness into your own pursuit of happiness.

You may need to grit your teeth and do what's expected of you since today's serious Capricorn New Moon emphasizes your 7th House of Relationships. Others might make unreasonable demands on you now, but you have your own agenda and don't want to waste time on everyone else's projects. Still, you prefer to put on a friendly outward appearance since you know that being a good team player can help create the emotional security that you seek. You don't have to give up what you want in the process; you just have to wait a little longer.

Even if being practical isn't normally your strength, your friends and family may rely on you now to hold things together with the stabilizing Capricorn New Moon occurring in your 6th House of Self-Improvement. However, you are steadily moving your life into a new direction that is more consistent with your personal ambitions. Remember, the more open you are to life's possibilities, the more likely this journey will be a healthy transition for you. Fortunately, you can be there for those you love while also honoring your own needs.

You might have a tough time talking yourself into a lighthearted mood today, unless you have already completed your work. Ironically, you're comfortable with your somber demeanor now because the self-restrained Capricorn New Moon intensifies your 5th House of Creativity, enabling you to get a lot accomplished. Being efficient ensures that you will have something special to show for your day.

Today's Capricorn New Moon falls in your 4th House of Emotional Security, raising stressful issues on the home front. You may feel that no matter what you do, someone in your family is going to be on your case for not having done something else. Ultimately, maintaining your integrity is more important than justifying your actions. If you're honest about your feelings, others will eventually come around to understanding your position.

It may feel as if the resistance you are encountering originates from the current circumstances in your external world. However, the Capricorn New Moon occurs in your 3rd House of Communication, indicating that your immediate environment is a reflection of you. The good news is that your destiny is in your own hands; whatever conflict you have created, you can remedy with a real commitment on your part. Be brave and start talking about tough issues to get the ball rolling.

The calculating Capricorn New Moon stimulates your 2nd House of Possessions, encouraging you to be practical in your approach to managing personal resources. Instead of just buying things to make you happy, consider what you truly value beyond the material world. Setting new priorities based on your core beliefs can lead to lasting satisfaction rather than the fleeting thrill of acquiring something shiny and new.

Today's New Moon in your sign starts a new emotional cycle that allows you to leave the past behind. Accept your current feelings, even if they aren't consistent with last year's plans. But this doesn't mean you should just drop whatever you've been doing in favor of a passing fancy. Find a workable balance between handling the logistics of life and cultivating your desires for personal fulfillment.

Fantasy plays a significant role in your life now as the Capricorn New Moon falls in your 12th House of Dreams. You might feel as if reality is dissolving into the mists of illusion, but don't get so caught up in your ethereal visions that re-entry to your world is difficult. It's magical to travel into your imagination as long as you keep one foot on the ground to maintain your balance at all times.

You take your relationships very seriously now because the responsible Capricorn New Moon emphasizes your 11th House of Groups and Friends. Although you have your own needs, you may choose to temporarily set them aside to stabilize your position at work or in the community. But don't just give up your agenda in the name of team spirit. Being honest enables you to be active in your social network without sacrificing your personal goals.

You are wired with the anticipation of doing something daring today, even if others think you're the epitome of stability. You may feel wild and crazy since your impulsive reactions are even stronger than usual. Nevertheless, you cannot act on every whim. Maintain a sense of responsibility to compensate for your current unconventional desires. Holding an outer posture of reliability enables you to continue chasing your dreams.

You might begin the day with simple goals, but complications mount as you head in one particular direction because of an irrepressible craving. You don't want your satisfaction to be delayed as your key planet, Venus, is excited by unpredictable Uranus. Just be careful not to destabilize anything that has enduring importance on your rush toward temporary gratification.

It seems as if everyone wants to have a good time today and you certainly don't want to be left out of the fun. You might think you can get away with a clever scheme in your quest for the next thrill, but you may be surprised how fast your mistakes can catch up with you now. Attend to your responsibilities early in the day so you can be free to explore your options for play later on.

Your obligations may feel overwhelming today, but you could still find a way to avoid too much drudgery. Your evasive behavior isn't necessarily an act of irresponsibility, especially if you are just setting your own personal boundaries. Remember, you don't always have to take on other people's worries just because they expect you to do so. Sometimes saying no to someone else is the healthiest expression of self-love.

You may grow frustrated by thinking about how much fun you could have if you ditched your current obligations, jumped bail and declared yourself free. However, nearly anything you do today has immediate repercussions. Remember that it's easier to contemplate the consequences of your actions before having to deal with a crisis of your own creation.

If there are issues in your love life that need to be brought out into the open, today may be your lucky day. Just be considerate and express your desires in a rational way that demonstrates your compassionate spirit rather than a selfish attitude. Sparks might fly, but everything should work out as long as you speak from the heart, maintain integrity and act in a kindly matter. The outcome could be more pleasing than you expect.

Unconventional desires can land you in trouble today, but a bit of self-awareness helps you get through the day without too much drama. However, sidestepping an emotional scene proves difficult because unexpected circumstances might sneak up on you. Your attractions may fluctuate wildly before you understand what's going on. Thankfully, it's healthy to experience extreme feelings now as long as you avoid acting on any one of them as if it was the ultimate truth.

It's hard to maintain your concentration on chores today because enticing social circumstances are very distracting. You don't need to lose out on all the fun, but previous commitments prevent you from cutting loose as much as you wish. There's no need to stress about the good times you might be missing since there will be chances for more frivolity soon enough. Instead, be happy wherever you are and with whatever you are doing while secretly planning your escape.

You look like you have both feet planted on the ground, but your creative imagination may be soaring with the birds. Ironically, focusing on what's happening in the present moment empowers you to let go and follow a stream of consciousness while still maintaining a solid connection with reality. Even if your work is a bit sloppy now, strive to be as original as possible. Thankfully, you will be able to tidy up the details later on.

You may not be able to resist your heart's desire today. Although logical analysis leads you to the right answers, it might not be sufficient to keep you on the straight and narrow path now. It's admirable to take the high road by transforming your physical needs into compassionate action. Perhaps self-restraint does lead to the most spiritual path, but keep in mind that you are human. Honoring your eccentricity is also an important part of your current path toward satisfaction.

Amorous Venus squares edgy Uranus today, encouraging you to risk more in your quest for emotional fulfillment and physical satisfaction. You might believe that pursuing a sudden attraction will bring you lasting happiness. However, reckless behavior, at best, only leads to temporary pleasure. Sacrifice a little excitement now for the security of long-term stability.

Your mind is free to go anywhere today as your thoughts play out one possible scenario after another. But it may not be socially acceptable to express every whim. Nevertheless, it's up to you to find the courage to bring your dreams into full consciousness. Fortunately, you don't have to tell anyone about your fantasies, nor do you need to act them out now. Simply enjoy the movie in which you are the writer, the director and the star.

You may feel the electricity of the high-frequency Aquarius Moon that insists you move into the future. But you're also listening to the beat of a not-so-distant drummer with a more traditional rhythm. Oddly enough, you might attempt to hold on to the past now, preventing you from freely running ahead. Thankfully, your stress dissipates if you share your dilemma with someone you trust; talking about your mixed feelings helps bring clarity to the situation.

Interactions with others may lure you into uncomfortable places today, yet you don't want anyone to know what's going on behind your stoic appearance. You have good reason to maintain the status quo, even if you're currently receiving information that tempts you to make immediate changes. Acting in a restrained manner is your most sensible strategy now. Acknowledging your emotional reactions is healthy, but you don't need to share everything you feel.

This isn't an easy time because the planets continue to hold your feet to the fire and your words to the law. Although you might prefer a more lighthearted approach to life, you are being constrained in ways that may make you doubt your methods. Thankfully, the freethinking Aquarius Moon offers relief today, but the deepest issues won't be blown away by a fresh breeze. If you stop and face the music, it won't be nearly as difficult to handle as you think.

Intimate communications with significant others are emphasized today. You may think that you have to be very precise in what you say because people are hanging on your every word. However, your message isn't as important now as how you deliver it. You can do your part by simply sharing what is most real for you. Just don't try to package all your emotions into a pretty box. Showing up with an open heart is your best gift.

An encounter with a close friend or family member can leave you confused, especially if others are relying on feelings more than intellect. It's challenging because you might not have the words you need at your disposal today. Part of the problem comes from the inadequacy of language, making it tough to translate your ideas into coherent speech. Watch for non-verbal signals that tell you how you're being received. Being subtle in your approach now may be more effective than making grand gestures.

This is the start of a productive cycle of communication for you. Your thoughts are lighter and more speculative now. Fortunately, you're given time to think about integrating more creativity into your daily routine. Begin now by making time to write in your journal -- and then do it on a regular basis. You may be happily surprised by where this cathartic process leads you.

Your memories could drift back to your childhood today as you seek the original source of your current feelings. You may be certain that your emotional habits were formed at an earlier time in your life and now you want to dig up the root cause. Go ahead and begin this important research, but don't expect fast and easy answers to your questions. Be thorough in your analysis yet allow the process to reveal the truth in good time.

Although you are being required to be more actively engaged in various forms of communication, you're not inclined to simply fill the empty spaces with noise. You want serious interactions that have purpose and meaning. Without the reality factor fully involved, you might try to check out before the conversation is over. However, don't judge too quickly; give things time to develop depth on their own.

This is an odd day energetically because on one hand you're growing excited about the future. You might even feel that your dreams are on the verge of becoming real. On the other hand, the clouds of illusion fall away as fast as you can create the lovely dreamscapes. Ultimately, you want to see things as they are now, not as you would like them to be. Keeping one foot on the ground helps you make the best of both worlds.

Your biggest dilemma now is how to stay positive while you are exploring deep in the well of pragmatic thought. But endless analysis doesn't lead you anywhere productive; it just takes you around in circles. One strategy is to keep your calendar peppered with fun activities with friends because they will make sure you don't slip into a state of terminal seriousness. Cautious optimism creates the best chances for progress.

You're probably quite moody now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign. However, this monthly lunar visit isn't just about your rapidly changing feelings; it's about making contact with your soul's purpose. Explore your imagination as four planets settle into your 12th House of Spirituality. Don't be afraid to let go and fall into your own dreams. You'll wake up stronger and happier if you take this metaphysical journey with an adventurous attitude.

Although your energy is just beginning to settle back down, your imagination is still stirring up exciting new recipes for life. What is usually just a touch of escapism or an idle fantasy can now take you on a very real ride. In fact, it may be difficult for you to separate the fruits of your labors from the fruit loops of your irrational fears and longings. Rely on your most sensible friends to give you the reality check that you need.

You might not be willing to trust your feelings today, since you can't follow your thoughts to their logical conclusion. You are all for telling the truth, but there's so much on your mind now that every nuance cannot be communicated. Hidden realities widen your perspective and teach you a lot about the real world. The more open you are to the realms of fantasy, the more you can imagine new vistas ahead.

You may be quite relaxed today for a back-to-work Monday since you have already given yourself permission to chill out with your friends. Although responsibilities still require your attention today, make time to restore your energy. Don't be overly concerned if you leave a job unfinished for a while; treating yourself to a bit of pleasure now shifts your attitude in a positive direction.

Although you might not be eager to meet your obligations today, others may be relying on you more than you realize. Temporarily putting aside your long-term dreams enables you to interact fully in the present moment, but could also contribute to your angst now. No matter how uncertain you are about your future, your heartfelt efforts to communicate with your friends are greatly appreciated and will lift your spirits, too.

You may start the day feeling like an unhappy Crab that has been taken from its watery cave. However, as waves of familiar emotions wash through your life today, you're reminded of how important it is to stay in touch with those you love. Don't worry if you can't explain your newly found confidence to anyone else; just continue about your business without trying to rationalize your behavior. Nevertheless, connecting with others is what matters most.

Your current dissatisfaction with a relationship may increase today, for you might realize what you are missing. But the real problem goes even deeper than what someone else has to offer; it's about your need for total engagement. Focus on what you can give to others instead of simply thinking about what you're not receiving in return. Everyone wins if no one is keeping score.

Someone who puts you in closer touch with your feelings may enter your life today, even if you don't know what to do about your reaction. Until now, you were in a very analytical frame of mind, leaving little room for the confusion of irrational emotions. However, you might need to accept that logic won't always bring you the satisfaction you seek. Your stress will dissipate if you can get out of your head and into your heart.

You're unsure of how to go about accomplishing your goals today, but don't make excuses or procrastinate any longer. Instead of trying to create a plan, rely on your intuition to tell you what to do next. Although you may feel uncomfortable with this strategy, it just might produce the best results. However, don't overreact; taking an extreme position won't help you reach your destination any sooner.

You may create more stress by trying to resolve the conflict between your current desires and a more logical approach to your needs. Thankfully, the tension should begin to settle down today without any specific action on your part. There are subtle shifts in the present circumstances now that can give you a glimpse of the smoother sailing ahead. But don't needlessly rock the boat; just stay on course until the discord dissipates.

Your lack of commitment might present a problem for a family member or your partner today. It's not that you're avoiding an uncomfortable issue; it's just that your priorities are different from everyone else's and not based on their expectations. If you don't want to be pinned down now, let others know how you're feeling as soon as possible. A difficult situation can simply be avoided if you speak up right away.

You're trying to do the responsible thing today, but one distraction after another may prevent you from fulfilling your current obligations. Ultimately, it's less about what others think than it is about your own self-judgment. Be easy on yourself now, for there will be time later to return to unfinished business or to reconsider where to go from here.

Instead of rushing into a new task, stop long enough to clarify your goals, assess your resources and make sure that traveling a different path is truly worth the effort. Even if you decide to build on what you have already started, don't move ahead too fast. Fortunately, it will be much easier to succeed if you take the time to develop your strategy first.

Although you might not feel fully prepared for what's around the next corner, the Moon's return to your sign indicates the beginning of a new emotional cycle. If you have left chores unfinished, unexpected events may force you to do what you should have already done. However, if your old business is completed, then opportunities may open up for you now. Just be sure that you honor your dreams when starting something new.

A stroke of genius is right up your alley today and you love it when you're able to figure out totally new solutions to problems that have you and your associates stuck. But just because you suddenly see the light, don't assume you can make everyone else see things from your point of view. Patience is not your strongest suit, but it's still a sensible practice for now.

You may get so lost in your own dreams today that you can't find your way around in the real world. Nevertheless, you have very important tasks to complete and if you don't meet these obligations now, life will quickly grow more complicated. Get your chores out of the way as fast as possible, and don't forget to let others know that you need some time alone. After you are accountable for your actions, you can return to exploring your wild imagination with guilt-free abandon.

You're not nearly as scattered as others think because you have a plan in place, even if no one knows about it yet. Actually, you may have several options that you're juggling now, but this complexity is not beyond your natural capability. You can perform with the best of them, but remember that your goal isn't keeping lots of balls in the air; instead, it's about being happy. Fortunately, walking away from the distractions might be easier than you realize if you simply make a commitment to do it.

Favorable opportunities arise from the most unusual places now, but this doesn't make them any less reliable. Emotional interactions with friends or a romantic partner could lead to a conceptual breakthrough in how you reach your goals. Remain open to new possibilities, since your path is about to widen if you just let it happen without worrying so much about the outcome.

Emotions that have you tied in knots may be suddenly released today, as if a magician planned your escape in advance. You could be breathing a sigh of relief from being set free, but you can't avoid the long-term issues you still face. Instead of running away, accept your current circumstances graciously as you work with determination to transform your life.

A shady character may let you down today by not following through on promises made, but don't waste your energy getting too upset about it. You might not have as much control over the actions of others as you prefer and you'll only make yourself unhappy if you allow your emotions to get the best of you. Manage your time effectively and concentrate on improving your own work instead of trying to change anyone else.

You may be unsure why your day is overtaken by tasks that don't help you move any closer to your goals. You might be feeling less than ambitious now, so it's advantageous to just do whatever is expected of you. Even if you have lots of transformational ideas, applying them at work could take more effort than you're willing to invest. Entertaining fantasies about the future is enough to bring you satisfaction today.

An unexpected emotional encounter can shock your nervous system today and wake you up from a deep sleep. You may be in a bit of denial about where your life is heading and now you can begin to see things more clearly. Don't make the big changes yet; just playfully consider each possibility as it floats into your awareness.

If you are stressed out about making a financial decision, don't just take the easy way out today. There is more going on now than meets the eye; you'll be better off if you let the current situation take its course for a while longer, giving you additional time to discern what's best. Rest assured that your thoughts will grow clearer in the days ahead. Once your confidence returns, you will feel empowered to make the right choice.

You may have to let go of control over your schedule today. One thing after another comes up and you might have to accept that you cannot handle so much chaos at once. Don't judge yourself too harshly while responding to the demands of the day. Do the best you can and let some of the loose ends stay unraveled until tomorrow when you have sufficient time to handle them all.

Responsibilities at work may conflict with your personal goals, but try not to let that concern you too much at this time. You might not have as much clarity as you want now, so avoid making a decision based upon inaccurate facts or incomplete data. Use this time to explore all of your options, without eliminating any of them. Most of all, be patient with yourself; you'll figure out what you want within a few days.

You are living in two distinct worlds today. On one hand, you're quite comfortable floating around in the dreamy fuzziness of your own imagination. On the other hand, you are uncovering more factual information than you know how to manage. Find ways to integrate your feelings with your rational thoughts. When they magically merge, it's time to swing into heroic action.

Reconnecting with your ambitions can be rewarding today, especially if you are willing to make some hard choices. Personal desires might need to be set aside in order to accomplish your career objectives. Or, you may have to pay a professional price if you resurrect an old flame. Either way, something is lost and something is gained. Don't get too distracted by the temptation of immediate gratification; concentrate your attention on the long-term goals, instead.

You're not content to talk with friends about safe topics like sports or the weather today. You need to get right to the magic filling that is hidden at the center of the piece of hard candy. Thankfully, you're able to move mountains to get to the juice of your emotional and sensual life. However, you needn't worry about reaching satisfaction now; just commit to a path that inspires you to get the most you can out of life.

You might not be able to sidestep your partner's intensity today. Uncomfortable issues keep popping up in different places and in different forms, no matter what you do. Paradoxically, the messenger changes while the primary message stays the same. Keep in mind that you have much to learn from anyone who can put you in touch with your passion. Staying open to your feelings may be the first step to freeing yourself from limiting thoughts.

You could become a bit obsessive about someone close to you today. Often, there are things that are better left unsaid, yet now these same unacceptable feelings might have a grand moment in the light. There's no reason to share your deep secrets casually, but remember that focusing on the truth may initiate a dramatic change. Every negative situation can be transformed by love and acceptance.

Perhaps you have lost your temper in the past, followed by regrets. Ironically, you can throw a tantrum today and actually end up stabilizing a relationship in the process. Nevertheless, it's wise to tread carefully because fear of rejection may not be enough to prevent you from sharing your heart's deepest desires. Consider the consequences or you might end up disclosing something better off kept to yourself.

Expressing a strong opinion in a relationship might bring you face to face with a challenging emotional issue today; however, it isn't as dangerous as it appears.
