Your concern about unimportant details could make the situation more problematic than necessary. Be flexible and you can overcome the blockages that prevent you from experiencing the intimacy you seek.

You are in your element when playing the role of the diplomat, looking for the sweetest possible way to deliver a difficult message. Although you want to be liked, you might have to be the bearer of bad news now. It doesn't matter; take off your velvet gloves and tell it straight, even if you offend someone. Just don't push an issue too far once you get started. Knowing when to stop is your ultimate saving grace.

You may be redefining who you are now and what's most significant to you as attractive Venus aligns with your key planet, Pluto. Even if you feel more like a caterpillar on a leaf, you're in the process of magically morphing into a magnificent butterfly. Once you start stretching your wings, you will be well on your way to flying. Remember, anything is possible once you believe in yourself.

The conjunction of beautiful Venus and dramatic Pluto emphasizes the cluster of four planets in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Although you're uncharacteristically self-critical now, others are willing to forgive your shortcomings quicker than you are. However, they may magnify your negative feelings as their perceptions reflect back to you, forcing you to acknowledge your shadow. Shining the light of your awareness wherever conversations lead you can help put things back into proper perspective.

You experience emotional turmoil today as vulnerable Venus aligns with potent Pluto in your sign. However, others might not even realize that you're upset. There is always a danger in keeping things to yourself because if you don't vent some of your anger or passion, it can leak out in other ways. Your reactions may upset someone now, especially if you respond to something that hasn't even been said. Laying your cards on the table stops the drama before it gets out of hand.

A colorful vision or a vivid dream may seem so real today that you look for ways to make it come true. There is an unusual intensity to your desires, drawing you into unfamiliar landscapes. Luckily, you can receive help from your higher self if your mind is open. Don't be afraid to entertain an unrealized fantasy because others might just join your party and support you along the way.

Your social life may be a source of a significant power struggle now, even if you don't understand why the dynamics are so tense. You still might find yourself in the middle of an intense melodrama. Thankfully, self-control isn't required for you to succeed. Find ways to express your most passionate and honest feelings, since releasing the emotional pressure allows everyone to move on.

Your emotions are strong but inconsistent now that the Moon is back in your excitable sign. You may think you're receiving conflicting signals from a friend or partner today, but it's probably your interpretation that is mixed, rather than what is actually said. Be careful if you're making plans that impact someone else; checking out your assumptions by asking questions is more considerate than waiting until after the fact.

Although you are feeling quite grounded today, your imagination is taking off as if it has a life of its own. You are usually quite sensible, but now you could flip between being anchored in reality and having your head in the clouds. Nevertheless, be daring! Let your enthusiasm lead you forward, but don't lose sight of the practical matters that still concern you.

You might try to avoid a deep discussion about your feelings with someone at work today. You prefer to keep conversations lighthearted, but you're less interested in clever repartee now than getting to the truth. There will be time for casual banter another day. Instead of sharing idealistic dreams, just stick to the facts. Strengthening the foundation of a relationship can have lasting value.

A memorable vision may come to you in a daydream or in your sleep, and you have a chance to touch a deep spiritual truth now if you surrender to your intuition. However, trouble stems from your unsettled feelings that add confusion to your current perspective. Don't get sidetracked by the apparent inconsistencies. Just let the day unfold naturally as you continue to explore the hidden meaning behind the events.

You try to stay on a straight and narrow path today, but you may end up misleading others or they could mislead you. The confusion might be intentional or simply the result of someone jumping to an inaccurate conclusion. No matter what happens now, try to clarify facts you don't understand. If you attempt to steer someone in a wrong direction on purpose, be prepared to deal with the fallout sooner than you think.

If something is bothering you physically today, the cause of your symptoms may be elusive. Even if you are feeling great, there is potential for fuzzy thinking when it comes to a relationship. You often excel at linking a cause to an effect, but now everything seems more nebulous than usual, no matter how hard you try to find clarity. Don't get yourself overly frustrated by forcing a solution. Let the uncertainty ride for a day or two before digging for the truth once again.

A friend or associate may seem overly pushy today, yet you're able to hold your ground without exerting too much effort. Your key planet Venus receives solid support from stabilizing Saturn, empowering you to take a realistic approach to relationships. You know what you want and don't need anyone else's approval now. Let others do what they must without trying to change their behavior. The only actions you can control are your own.

The magic of love feels nearby today, along with the frustration of realizing that your current attractions are based more on illusion than reality. You can use the excitement of infatuation to spark the romantic fires, but any attempt to create a lasting basis for your feelings may be futile. Enjoy the beauty of the moment instead of attempting to bottle it for some future date.

You might be dealing with a struggle between connection and separation today. On one hand, your vision of having a perfect home and family life may be idyllic -- and you're eager to do whatever is required to achieve this goal. On the other hand, you can't allow yourself to grow too attached to a relationship that has the possibility of failure. Don't sabotage your chance for happiness based upon your past experiences; focus your attention on manifesting your dreams in the present moment.

It's wise to reread something that you write today since you may not be as clear and straightforward as you think. Your words can flow off your tongue or through your keyboard in a magical manner that makes you sound more poetic than usual. This is good news if you are writing a novel, composing a song or courting a new love. But don't back down once you have expressed your truth; let your conscience be your guide.

Your dreams seem so real now that it's difficult to know exactly what's going on. Although you may want to take a quick escape into your fantasy world, too much activity in your daily life prevents you from retreating. Nevertheless, your desire for success will likely outweigh any lack of concentration you might be experiencing. Thankfully, setting specific goals for the day can help you stay on track. If your mind wanders, gently refocus your attention on what's most important.

You have stepped into the carnival fun house and are standing in the Hall of Mirrors, where everything is distorted. Nothing is exactly as it appears now -- especially you. Your self-image is about as far from reality as it can get. Don't wear a mask -- physically or emotionally -- to cover up your own inadequacies. You are in much better shape than you think today.

The spontaneous Aries Moon tempts you with the delicious possibility of immediate gratification if you have the courage to express your needs. But several planets traveling through calculating Capricorn tell you to wait for a better moment to move forward with your plans. Address your realistic concerns before taking a major risk. Combine the conflicting strategies to make your dreams come true.

You're inclined to take sides in a conflict at work today, but you can be more effective if you maintain neutrality. Look ahead by visualizing the various options and use your practical outlook to convey the good in both points of view. Be smart and let truth be your guide instead of your own desires. Speak your piece and then remain quiet, letting the chips fall as they may.

Even if you're not trying to lead the pack today, you still may feel as if you are a reluctant trendsetter. You could be worried about being the first one to run into opposition because you can see obstacles ahead that others cannot. Instead of wasting energy on situations that might not manifest, just do your best and deal with the resistance if and when it arises. Your positive attitude sets a fine example for everyone else.

You feel happy when you nurture those you love, but you might do it so passionately today that you run the risk of being overprotective. Fighting another person's battles now could be more about your own issues of self-worth than being of real assistance. Unfortunately, others may ultimately resent you for smothering them, so don't attempt to control any situation that isn't your direct concern. Channel your excess energy toward taking care of your own needs first.

There's no need to be overly intent on attaining satisfaction today because forcing results can leave you feeling unfulfilled and frustrated. Fortunately, rewards may come as early as next week if you just control your impulsive tendencies now. Think about others before attending to your needs. Instead of seeking the adrenaline rush from a short-lived pleasure, work toward sustaining valuable relationships at work and play.

You're motivated to give one hundred and ten percent toward your job to ensure a smoothly functioning work environment. Unfortunately, you cannot do it entirely by yourself now, even with a superhuman effort. Thankfully, you have a healthy perspective on the current situation and are quite effective in collaborating with others as long as you don't gloss over any potential problems. An ounce of prevention today really is worth a pound of cure.

Although your energy level is high today, feeling so good could get you into trouble. You may attempt to suppress a strong opinion that might be offensive, only to find that someone else says exactly what you are thinking. Ultimately, your inner conflicts can mysteriously work their way out into the open even if you keep them to yourself. You might as well express yourself honestly, kindly, and with a receptive heart.

The ardent Aries Moon stimulates the heat of passion, but your sense of propriety prevents you from casually sharing your desires. Although you want to do the right thing, your feelings might not dissipate today until you acknowledge them by shining the light of awareness on to your emotions. Thankfully, you're able to defuse an uncomfortable situation by confiding in a trustworthy companion who can help you sort yourself out.

There is an obvious relationship between how much of your feelings you get out into the open today and the amount of resistance you encounter over the next few weeks. Even if it's difficult, slow down and deal with your emotions. Avoiding them by quickly moving to what's next won't help you in the long run. Explore your heart to discover what you truly want.

You can accomplish more than you think by concentrating on what's directly in front of your nose today. Avoid distractions; even if something sounds like a great idea, let it pass for now. You don't have to go out to conquer the world or lead a parade; instead, staying close to home could bring you all the acknowledgment you currently need.

It's tempting to wag your tongue without even considering the consequences today, for whatever you think now slips through your lips without much resistance. Handling the ramifications of your words can raise serious concerns, but ultimately, you'll be better off speaking up than if you keep your feelings private. Don't worry about a worst-case scenario; getting the issues out into the open works to your advantage.

You aren't completely sure what you want to do yet, but your plan is growing clearer day by day. At least you understand what's most important now, and can start making choices based upon your priorities, instead of just flying by the seat of your pants. Be certain to consider your finances in your current decision-making process. Covering all your bases improves your chances for success.

The lights seem to glow brighter today, and something you couldn't see previously is growing more visible. You're moving into a more active social cycle and yet, at the same time, you are being cautious about what you actually put on your calendar. Don't lose track of your commitments, but do something for yourself that makes you feel free as a bird. Ultimately, you will be more productive now if your choices are your own.

Although you may be looking farther into your future now, this visionary tendency doesn't mean you are less sensible than before. In fact, your back-to-basics approach is a significant part of your current healing process. Thankfully, you can have it both ways. In other words, look forward to the possibilities while fixing whatever is within your reach in the present moment.

You are open to receiving the messages that the universe sends you today. However, you might not know how to use your heightened sense of anticipation. You may vacillate back and forth, feeling open and chatty at first. One minute everyone is your friend, but then you want to withdraw when you realize that you should be more cautious about what you say. Instead of wondering what to do next, stay quiet long enough to hear the wisdom of your inner voice.

This is a weird time of year because you're inclined to dig yourself into your cave, hibernating the winter away. However, a glint of awareness sparks your soul now and sets your thoughts on the upcoming spring -- even if it's still far away. Hold on to your images of warmer emotional weather ahead. But in the meantime, give yourself permission to hide safely behind your protective walls as you work out the details of your next adventure.

You may be a little overwhelmed now as friends and associates confront you with facts that you need to integrate into your plans over the next several weeks. Communication in relationships is emphasized as talkative Mercury and the willful Sun join expressive Mars in your 7th House of Companions. Although you feel confident in your ability to say what you mean, it's still difficult to put your emotions into words today. Deliberate first and then speak later.

You are entering a new phase when your behavior may be quirkier than normal -- not that anyone else necessarily knows the details about your private life. Your fantasies are growing stronger and you're eager to show everyone what you are capable of doing. But instead of taking time to offer long explanations and rationalizations, just demonstrate your competence through direct action. Don't worry about what others think today; take a risk and do something that's wonderfully weird.

This can be a very positive time of year for you with both the Sun and Mercury traveling through idealistic Aquarius, a fellow Air sign. Ironically, the rational emphasis supports your natural creativity now, helping you to express yourself more spontaneously. Your current ingenuity enables you to solve problems that seemed insurmountable in the past. Don't hold back; a more playful attitude toward work could bring success if you trust in the process.

You may start the day feeling a bit on edge because it seems as if there aren't any easy solutions for your current scheduling dilemma. But things start to fall into place and by afternoon some of the earlier stress begins to settle down. However, this can still be a tense time when your feelings don't always match what you are showing others. Pay attention to the differences between your inner and outer worlds so you can navigate your way back to a place of emotional balance.

Your phone is ringing and your inbox is full as all forms of interaction and communication intensify. You may travel more -- even if only locally -- because of your work or your role in the community. No matter how complicated your life becomes in the weeks ahead, don't lose sight of your own personal goals. Think as big as you want, but take small steps instead of changing everything all at once.

You might feel as if the spotlight isn't following your every move any longer -- and this newly found anonymity is just fine with you. You can get back to your real work now, instead of being required to perform for an audience. Rediscover your natural pace during the weeks ahead while taking care of business on a very mundane level. Set priorities, stick with what's most important and you can accomplish a lot.

The radiant Sun and trickster Mercury enter your friendly sign today, encouraging you to connect with others and express what's on your mind. You've been waiting for the right time to take action and, finally, there's no need to practice self-restraint any longer. If you're prepared to work hard for your dreams you will be pleasantly surprised by what happens in the upcoming weeks.

Unfortunately, you may find yourself tangled up in the nets of your own imagination now. But even if you thrive on the excitement of temporary chaos, amazing opportunities to smooth out the waves are on the way. Tie up as many loose ends of your life as possible while you still have time. If you take care of all the little things today, you'll be ready for the big changes ahead.

Your friends probably mean well by encouraging you to spend money on yourself today, but your current financial condition might not warrant an unplanned outlay of cash. This is especially true if everyone else is more excited than you are about the potential purchase. However, jeopardizing your stability isn't an acceptable price to pay for something you don't really want anyhow. Trusting your own intuition makes more sense now than listening to the advice of others.

Members of your family or community may expect you to participate in social events now, but you have your own ideas about what's important. However, you might upset someone's delicate feelings when you share your real intentions, even though you are simply just trying to be honest. Ultimately, you need to do what works best for you. Nevertheless, a little extra kindness on your part will smooth out feathers even before they start to ruffle.

Withholding any feelings of anger may backfire today, for your unspoken negativity might still leak out. Self-restraint sounds like an intelligent strategy, but could actually make things worse now. Instead of avoiding your emotions, express them in a straightforward manner, without blaming anyone in the process. Taking full responsibility for your opinions minimizes the need for others to get defensive and opens the door to an honest exchange.

You might not want to tell your friends what you are feeling today because you are afraid of rejection. But if they are true friends, they'll hear you out regardless of what you have to say. The only relationships you can jeopardize are the ones built on false loyalty. Nevertheless, trust your intuition and don't volunteer more than is comfortable at any given moment throughout the day.

Eccentric friends and family members might place unreasonable demands on you today. However, some of the problem could stem from your misinterpretation of their requests. Others may actually be unclear in their communication with you as they allow unresolved emotions to cloud their words. No matter what, a cautious response on your part is wise. It's better to avoid an argument now than to further stir up unnecessary conflict.

Don't stress out if you can't decide what you should be doing or where you should be going today. Instead of having to change directions midday because you impulsively started too soon, relax until you really know what should be next. Ironically, inaction is better now than wrong action. You'll still have sufficient time to finish the projects on your plate. Work smarter, not harder to achieve the results you seek.

You may have already overcome the biggest obstacles that were holding you back, but this doesn't mean that it's all clear sailing yet. Your sense of urgency could prompt premature action now, yet it's wise to figure out what to do with your emotions before acting on them. As is often the case, creative endeavors can unlock the gates for you, thereby letting your energy flow more smoothly.

You might think that someone is being stubborn today just to annoy you. It feels as if everyone knows which buttons to push in order to agitate you. However, keep in mind that it's not about anyone else; the only thing that's important now is how you react. You can be more in control of your own fate as long as you practice a little self-control. Turn the tables by demonstrating your willingness to establish common ground.

A bit of hard work doesn't scare you off today because you're eager to tackle some chores that you have been avoiding for a while. Just keep in mind that there's a slight need for caution now, since you can easily underestimate the size of the job. Having a positive attitude is a real asset, but it's not a panacea. Don't bite off more than you can chew; promise less and deliver more.

You may overreact to your temporary lack of ambition today by relentlessly pushing even harder toward your goals. Although this overcompensation can lead to heightened productivity, you might take things too far. Even if you're pursuing a relationship, find out what the other person is feeling before climbing way out on a limb. Applying common sense to your plans prevents unneeded embarrassment. Relaxing the reins of control is a healthy alternative for now.

Your emotional attachment to the past may motivate you to express a deeply rooted fear to someone you can trust. Just make certain your subject matter is appropriate to share before you dredge up more than you intend. Be careful not to just ride an adrenaline rush, since a bit of excitement won't make you happier in the long run, nor will it help you reach your goals. Letting go of your fantasies of the future empowers you to succeed in the present moment.

You want to have time today to explore your vivid imagination, but previous commitments require you to act in a practical manner. Let common sense dictate your choices throughout the day, even if making decisions is challenging now. Balancing work and play enables you to concentrate on the real world and still get lost in your fantasies for a while.

Your mind is free to explore new ideas today, and your words are in the spotlight. Although you can jump to brilliant conclusions very quickly now, think before you speak and carefully read your email through one more time before you hit the send button. However, there's no reason to hold back once you're sure of your message. Since you have a greater impact on others than you realize, it's wise to get it right the first time. Give your waiting audience a show they won't forget.

Your thoughts may run amok today, as if they're not under the jurisdiction of your logic. But temporarily setting aside common sense can actually lead to an unconventional solution to a tricky problem. Unfortunately, your co-workers might not be willing to give your ideas a fair hearing unless you have the facts to back up your position. Do your homework and be sure to have your information in order before sharing your plans with anyone else.

The Moon's return to restless Gemini inspires your thoughts to fly around in circles, as if they are eagles spiraling on the thermals. Your performance seems easy and graceful to others, but you might need to work hard to keep up the appearance. Meanwhile, you could feel stuck as the prevailing winds won't allow you to break free. Don't waste energy struggling against the breezes now; enjoy floating around until the wind changes and gives you an opportunity to escape.

Sharing your emotions can be a challenge now, even if you're clear about how you feel. However, you sense a change coming and you aren't yet sure as to which way your mood will swing next. Thankfully, this uncertainty isn't upsetting or worrisome today as long as you are content to just wait it out before making any important decisions. In the meantime, discuss your options objectively and be open to the feedback you receive.

Someone might come to you with an unusual plan today, but you aren't so quick to endorse what you consider to be a risky solution to a simple problem. You can envision alternate strategies that seem more straightforward, and you would rather exhaust these direct approaches first. Even if you're certain that your answer is the most logical one, remain open to the surprises you encounter along the way.

Your friends need you today in ways that require you to express more emotions than you prefer. Even if you're resistant to revealing your inner thoughts now, try softening enough to give others what they want. You may feel like you're just going through the motions at first, but sharing your heart is a perfect prescription to brighten your day. You might receive something beautiful in exchange for stepping outside of your comfort zone.

You could find yourself in a jam today, and you're uncertain if you should ask for help or just let it ride. Imagine what you would do if you had absolutely nothing standing in your way. Then, return your focus back to your current situation. If sharing your needs can bring you any closer to your goals, then don't hesitate to say what's on your mind and just deal with the consequences as they arise.

You may intellectualize complex emotions that normally elude description. But your intuition is operating in overdrive now, so don't be afraid to rely on it. Nevertheless, you still have to prioritize your needs or you will be pulled in so many directions that you'll just end up annoyed. However, having a clear destination in mind gives you just enough stability that you can be creative without losing your way.

You can talk your way out of nearly anything today, relying on your social graces to avoid conflict. Your charm and wit are working for you now in ways that surprise even you. You know what you want and are willing to ask for it. Still, you could miss a significant opportunity when it appears in your life if you aren't receptive. Being more sensitive to others helps you recognize your own path to happiness.

It may be challenging to stay motivated today because you can discover so many fun ways to keep your mind occupied that you end up avoiding your chores. Leaving a job undone is contrary to your basic nature, since you like to take care of business before you play. However, it's time to try something different now by making pleasurable distractions your top priority for a change. The work will patiently wait for your return.

You could be very happy today, even if there's too much happening in your life. For example, you might agree to one too many tasks and now you must find a way out of your extra commitments. Nevertheless, mischievous Mercury tempts you into thinking there's a viable shortcut you can take. However, the flirty Gemini Moon's presence in your 5th House of Fun and Games indicates that you should be able to enjoy the company of others even if you still have a job to finish.

Your thoughts are moving so rapidly now that you may not be able to keep up with your own fantasies as they overflow into your reality. But even the most original ideas don't bring you any closer to a viable solution, so it might be wise to keep the unfinished schemes to yourself for now. Even if it takes another week or so, allow plenty of time for your plans to solidify before sharing them with anyone else. Start by writing everything down that crosses your mind, and then you can make sense of it all later.

You can feel quite sure of yourself, even if your energy is spread too thin. Although your current confidence may be refreshing, it might seem out of place. You know that you should take your commitments more seriously, but you have an irrepressible sense that everything is going to work out for the best. Thankfully, your intuition is probably right; letting events take their own course today could magically lead to success.

Your tendency to exaggerate today can turn every little thing you hear into an unnecessary drama. If others push you too hard, you might just let them know what you think whether it makes sense or not. Thankfully, even if your temper flares, the outcome could be better than you expect. At least, everyone will know exactly where you stand -- even if you weren't planning on sharing your thoughts. For the best results, put your opinions out into the open as gently as you can.

You're talking a mile a minute now that gregarious Mercury is receiving encouraging signals from jolly Jupiter. Even if you try to avoid the intense amount of thoughts, you cannot shut off the flow of information. You're excited and may even be in a euphoric state of high alert today. Although you don't want to miss anything, it's OK to say when you've had enough. A peaceful meditation might be just what the doctor orders to regain your balance.

A secret admirer or a spiritual adviser may be the source of good news today. You could learn something that opens your mind to an entirely different way of looking at your current circumstances. Even if you are feeling the need to stick to your original agenda, allow yourself to move beyond your present point of view and think about what's best for all involved. Adopting a more spiritual perspective creates an unconventional path to success.

It's nearly impossible to keep your thoughts wrapped up inside, even if you know that it's smarter to remain quiet today. You feel as if it's your personal responsibility to bring the information you have out into the open. Although you may wonder if you are being appropriate, a friend can encourage you to talk -- and once you start, you won't want to hold anything back. Just remember that discretion has its place; there are some things better left unsaid.

Normally, you're an analytical thinker, but today your thoughts carry you far beyond your usual limitations when your key planet Mercury harmonizes with lucky Jupiter. Much to your chagrin, you might be less practical now and more philosophical in your perspective. However, it's really not necessary to apply your ideas at this time. Write down your expanded visions while they last so you can make good use of them in a few days.

You want to be understood by your friends, but it's difficult to explain yourself clearly enough so others will know why you are so passionate now. You're eager to share your views on relationships, politics and global issues because talking about conceptual ideas is safer than actually revealing your feelings. Although you may be a captivating conversationalist today, be careful not to speak in such vague generalities that you lose touch with your heart.

Meaningful relationships with friends and family offer you the encouragement you need these days. Someone special may be the harbinger of good news, which can take some pressure off more tense circumstances at home. However, opportunities might come to you that increase the complexity of your life, prompting you to wonder if it's all worth the extra effort. Don't respond too quickly; decide what to say only after thinking it through and ultimately trusting your intuition.

Your current circumstances may be quite intense, yet you can still rise above the difficulties now. Even if you are unsure about what to do next, you are fortunate to receive helpful direction from someone you trust. Changing your attitude may be enough to bring you closer to the goals you've set for yourself. Instead of worrying about what could go wrong today, use the power of positive thinking to progress toward your desired destination.

It's tempting to swing into action today, assuming that if you work efficiently everything will fall into place. Luckily, your attention to details adds to your productivity. However, your eagerness to demonstrate your competence may actually be your way to cover your emotional vulnerability. Choose a trustworthy friend and share a part of yourself you don't normally let others see. Confiding in someone else could be the catalyst you need to open your heart.

Opportunity knocks today, bringing you a chance to show off your colorful creativity. If someone comes to you with an innovative idea, it just may look good enough to pursue. Remember, joyful Jupiter is increasing the shine on the cloud's silver linings today, so everything appears better than it actually is. Nevertheless, saying yes makes sense if you have a concrete plan to reach your goal. Blending reality with the fruits of your imagination is a combination that leads to success.

Nostalgic memories may be stimulated today as a friend shares a recent dream with you. But what starts as a sweet connection can actually reopen an old emotional wound that you thought was buried long ago. Fortunately, you are being given a chance to heal, but you might be the one who has to offer forgiveness. Remember, honest dialogue is the key to a healthier relationship.

Your thoughts are running ahead of your emotions today and you're eager to share your conclusions. However, it gets more difficult to speak your piece as the day wears on. It might even feel as if you have missed your chance, and expressing your pent-up anger could make things even worse. Your best option is to chill out now and patiently wait for your heart to catch up with your head. It will be easier to say what you feel rather than what you think.

You may be annoyed if reality gives you negative feedback today, but you respect what you hear from a trustworthy friend. However, you might run into a snag that would deter someone with less determination than you. Dig in your heels and don't take no for an answer now. Turn this setback into an opportunity to make your good idea even better. Your dedication to your cause is your secret weapon.

It's very frustrating if you can imagine where you want to go, but are not allowed to go there yet. You might not even feel secure enough to share your plans with anyone else now. There are many details that must be addressed before you set out on your journey, whether you're starting a relationship, a project or a vacation. Don't be in such a hurry; you are not ready to depart yet. Finalize your plans before taking the next step.

You may be limited by your own lack of confidence today rather than by any specific situation. You can be quite self-critical, but negative judgments are not the current problem. Repressed fears could be keeping you from the journey of your lifetime. Nevertheless, use this time wisely to process your insecurities without blaming anyone else. The real solutions now come from within.

You might not be ready to jump into the fray yet, even if everyone else appears to be having fun. You don't like feeling separate from all the action, but you can't join in until you've met your previous obligations. You accepted the extra responsibility and now you must honor your promises before you can take on anything new. Reward yourself with something special as soon as your work is done.

You are distracted by someone's unexpected shenanigans at work today, but you may not want to become too involved. You can see right through the surface noise and understand why an unimportant issue has become a big deal. However, keep your thoughts to yourself now, even if you want to straighten everyone out by telling them what you believe they need to know. Rethink your strategy and find a route to get to where you are going without stirring up more unnecessary drama.

You may run into walls today as you put yourself out there, even if your plan is a good one. Perhaps you could avoid additional opposition if you take time to prepare yourself for any possible objections in advance. Instead of rejecting the feedback you receive, accept it as an opportunity to take your idea back to the drawing board. If you don't succeed at first, dust yourself off and try again.

Sometimes it's your job as a Scorpio to delve beneath the surface, but it may not be easy today to get the information you seek. Your probing mind has gone as far as it can, yet you still don't believe you have all the answers. If you feel stuck, slow down. Pull your thoughts back into your own private world for a while and wait until the resistance passes. There's no need to waste energy fighting an uphill battle when practicing patience is the simplest solution.

You may try to explain your position as clearly as you can, only to have someone negate your best ideas today. Don't doubt yourself, for a minor setback is reality's way of inspiring you toward greater excellence. Put in extra time firming up your plans and doing the research that's necessary to make your goals more concrete. Oddly enough, being in less of a hurry now might just help you arrive at your destination sooner.

You might be more concerned with the limitations of the real world than you are with your feelings today as the reflective Moon aligns with your key planet, Saturn. Instead of blindly pushing ahead, retreat and consider what makes the most sense in the long run. Achieving success may take more time than you think. Integrity, not progress, is your best friend now.

Your boss may be the source of trouble today, or, perhaps, you experience a setback on a current project. Don't take whatever obstacles you encounter now as signs of defeat. Instead of giving up, hold your ground. Facing the roadblocks with determination should prove whether or not your plan is a good one. The struggle might last for a few days, but you will prevail if your efforts are worthy.

It may be better to wait for others to catch up to your way of thinking today before acting on your brilliant ideas. Even if you're on a roll, something could occur now that makes you feel vulnerable, giving you a reason to re-evaluate your current direction. Don't share your plans too soon. A few days can bring a lot of changes, so see what happens before revealing too much.

Your motivation to explore new territory is countered by feelings of emotional self-restraint today. Your inner voice reminds you to be sensitive to other people's needs over your own. However, all the cautionary advice in the world may not prevent you from acting on a brilliant breakthrough now if you have the chance. Just remember to temper your actions with kindness so you don't inadvertently hurt someone you love.

You may save the day by creating the ultimate plan that everyone has been waiting for from someone else. Ironically, your contribution might come at the very last minute. Nevertheless, your thinking is sound even if it's unexpected and unconventional. Expressing your ideas with clarity encourages others to support your solution. Don't be afraid to take charge; assume the role of leader until you are sure that everything is running smoothly.

You are flying at top speed yet you still feel something pulling you down today. The experience of dragging an anchor might be connected with an unpleasant memory that raises issues of self-doubt. You won't be able to go far as long as you are in denial. Luckily, you could change everything by simply being more aware of your feelings. The dead weight can be dropped instantly once you accept your past and move on.

You want to express your needs in no uncertain terms today, and you expect others to sit up and take notice. There might even be a special someone you hope to impress, prompting you to do something impulsive that is completely out of character. This spontaneous behavior could attract the attention you seek now, but perhaps not in the way you prefer. Don't try too hard; just be yourself and don't worry so much about the outcome.

You want to help others now, but you prefer to do it sight unseen with the Moon visiting your 12th House of Secrets. Thankfully, you can accomplish something today that will mean a great deal to someone else without a whole lot of effort on your part. It may not seem like much to you, but your actions might bring deep healing to a loved one. Fortunately, grand gestures are not necessary; it's your attention to the details that matters most.

There's no reason to take responsibility for anyone else's crazy behavior. If someone at work does something that catches you off guard today, just try to take it all in stride. Actually, a surprise could shock you just enough to reveal a new way of doing a routine task that you hadn't previously considered. It may seem like a reach, but, ultimately, you're the only one standing in the way of your success.

Your focus is being redirected toward others now while the Sun sextiles unpredictable Uranus in your 7th House of Relationships. You probably don't mind a bit of anonymity, but it may be time to examine your insecurities if you're having trouble with a lack of attention. Luckily, you could be more successful by using your talents to help someone else. There's no need to be concerned if you don't get the credit you deserve today; the spotlight will return to you soon enough.

You might feel stuck by your previous commitments and there isn't an easy way out now. You are willing to resign yourself to do what you said you would, even if you're uncomfortable with the situation that has developed. Thankfully, everything can flip in an instant as an ingenious idea lights up your brain like a bolt of lightning. Prepare for positive change with cheerful optimism since your attitude can really make a big difference.

It may be difficult to fit into the standard box of a traditional relationship now as you're pulled into your own world of unique feelings. Don't be too self-judgmental because you have something very special to offer, and anyone close to you probably already knows this. If others can appreciate you for who you are, it should all work out -- but first, you must learn to love yourself.

The moody Cancer Moon in your 7th House of Partners places you in direct touch with your feelings by attracting highly emotional people into your orbit today. You often avoid revealing your vulnerability, but you might feel destabilized enough now to open up to someone you trust. Be willing to learn more about your own inner workings by tackling a tough issue. Thankfully, a difficult situation can rapidly change into a more pleasant one if you roll with the incoming waves.

You might be afraid that you're headed for a major conflict now, when everything suddenly improves. Don't try to control anyone's behavior because your fear of a negative outcome could actually bring it into manifestation. Thankfully, you can sidestep an unnecessary dispute today if you remember that arguing won't help you get any closer to your goals. Solve your current problem within your brilliant imagination before trying to affect positive change on the outside. The solution is within your mind's grasp.

You may be entirely safe jumping into the unknown today as long as you believe that everything will work out fine. Fortunately, you will likely have all the support you need now if you don't lose sight of what's most critical. However, your creative visualizations can only get you so far. The power of positive thought still needs to be reinforced with a concrete plan and solid effort.

You already made your choice to ride the incoming waves by maintaining a positive attitude, yet you might have underestimated the power of the tides now. Don't be afraid to retreat and re-evaluate your plans before pushing against the currents. A steadier pace improves your chances of reaching your destination. Regardless of the actions of others, you have the capability to transform your love into something greater than it already is.

Your common sense reminds you to think before you speak, because it's better to get your message right the first time rather than having to start all over. Although you're not greedy, you might have trouble acknowledging your limits today. More is not necessarily better; if you have set a goal, be prepared to stop when you reach it.

Although your key planet Mercury is impeded by austere Saturn today, communication will improve later in the day. Your good idea is close to paying off if you remain persistent in your efforts. However, too much stress at work can make you less effective, so be flexible and coast for a while if you run into trouble. Resist the temptation to dig in and make a stand. Adaptability is your not-so-secret weapon, so don't be afraid to use it.

Your emotional reactions are strong today, yet you won't gain any advantage by giving up at the first sign of conflict. Neither do you need to battle against an immoveable stone wall. Your most sensible strategy is based upon consistent behavior without aggression. It may even be helpful to consciously let go of control so you can float with the flow. Calm your nerves by surrounding yourself with nature, soothing music or just good old-fashioned silence.

This is a significant day for relationships and you may end up quite pleased with the outcome. However, you might need to demonstrate a bit of self-restraint or someone else could rain on your parade. The dynamics of the current situation have long-lasting ramifications; even if you feel as if you're being bent out of shape, express the love that is already in your heart. A simple act of kindness can shift the energy and make everything brighter.

A flood of brilliant ideas opens many possibilities at work today, yet you may grow frustrated because you cannot turn this magic moment into something more. If you meet resistance now, pushing harder won't bring success. Instead, ride the intellectual currents and wait for the energy to settle down before finalizing your career plans. Exploring your options enables you to make the most of the amazing opportunities knocking at your door.

You have a lot of work you hope to accomplish today and you really don't want to modify your schedule. Unfortunately, too much rigidity only stirs up more conflict. You stand to gain the most by meeting others halfway and being as spontaneous as possible. Paradoxically, compromising may be the easiest way for you to get what you want now. Just make sure you don't go to the opposite extreme and become so enthusiastic about every idea that nothing gets done at all.

Some of your current conflict stems from how you reacted to recent events. If you pursued an opportunity without overplaying your hand, you won't likely run into any problems at all. But if you made a poor decision, today's consequences might be a bit tougher to accept. Nevertheless, letting go of your old expectations clears the energy and frees you to achieve your goal.

Although you may be worried that your best-kept secret isn't safe now, you still could enjoy yourself while managing the situation. Today's high level of action is what you wanted, so don't waste your energy wishing that everything was less hectic. The Sun's sweet trine to auspicious Jupiter indicates that there's really a pot of gold at the rainbow's end. However, you must meet your current responsibilities before you can magically transform a tricky moment into an awesome day.

If you have been handling the details of a project and living up to your end of the bargain, then rewards may be just around the next corner. But the clouds might not clear until later in the day, just in time for a great weekend. Meanwhile, don't fall behind in your work. Part of your current lesson is learning to live with more uncertainty. Find meaning in the present moment while also honoring your dreams for the future.

It's hard to keep your thoughts in line today, but you're up for the challenge. Although you might not have much fun at first, don't waste energy berating yourself if something isn't working out as desired. Your maps have brought you this far but you must set them aside now to explore the uncharted territories ahead. Transform any remaining fear into courage and trust your intuition. Be optimistic about the possibilities, even if everything continues to change.

If your fantasies have hijacked your attention, someone may shock you with their criticism today, refocusing your attention back on reality. Instead of rejecting the advice you receive from others, embrace it. Just make sure you establish healthy boundaries to maintain your emotional sanity. Nurturing your confidence, not your skepticism, will guide you toward fulfillment.

Love is on your mind today as the bighearted Leo Full Moon highlights your 5th House of Romance. However, you may get lost in thinking about what others want, leaving you unable to balance their needs with yours. Do whatever you can to keep your energy from bottling up. A walk outside, for instance, can shift your thoughts to nature and bring you a healthier outlook on your current situation. Widening your perspective eases your anxiety and fuels your creativity.

Today's Leo Full Moon activates your 4th House of Security, inviting you to retreat into the emotional safety of your home and family. However, the community-minded Aquarius Sun encourages you to shine your light in the real world. You might try to avoid choosing one approach over the other, but acting like a stubborn Bull doesn't get you any closer to finding a creative solution. Instead of backing yourself into a corner, just make a decision and move on.

It might feel as if you are under attack for your beliefs today, but you could be reacting to the intensity of the situation with a lack of understanding. Establishing well-defined boundaries makes it easier for everyone to know what to do. The Leo Full Moon lights up your 3rd House of Communication, indicating the value of talking about the issues now. Maintaining your position without going on the offensive is your smartest strategy.

You may be clinging to unexpressed feelings today as if they are irreplaceable treasures. However, today's Leo Full Moon brightens your 2nd House of Values, suggesting you might need to share what's bothering you in order to raise your self-esteem. When emotional intensity pressurizes your subconscious, it will release one way or another. Instead of waiting for something scary to happen, taking a proactive approach alleviates the tension and disperses unnecessary doubt.

Today's Full Moon in your expressive sign adds a sense of urgency to your life that could be tough to manage. You may think that you won't have to share what's in your heart as long as your intentions are good. Unfortunately, your certainty might not be enough to overcome other people's doubts. Acting with kindness is crucial because whatever you do now has long-term consequences you cannot yet imagine.

It's a waste of time to blame yourself or anyone else today for a minor setback because nothing positive will come of your criticism at this time. Today's Leo Full Moon falls in your 12th House of Destiny, indicating that whatever has already happened cannot be undone. Instead of trying to rewrite the past, face your fear of not being in control. Although there are some things you can't change, a positive shift in your attitude can turn your day around quickly.

You are an expert at making everyone else comfortable, especially with the playful Leo Full Moon shining in your 11th House of Friends. You're naturally gracious, but if you're provoked today, you may find it difficult to gloss over your anger. If you try to suppress your feelings, they will find a way to slip out, anyhow. At least if you share your concerns consciously you can package them with kindness, making the results more constructive than disruptive.

Your tendency is to constrain the waves of emotional intensity today because you fear what might happen if you tell the whole truth. You may be overly concerned about losing face as the dramatic Leo Full Moon lights up your 10th House of Status. Unfortunately, practicing too much self-control can lead to frustration. Keep the pressures of your life in perspective by replacing negative blame with positive solutions. Be as honest as possible and you'll be fine.

You may want the security of a personal relationship, yet you could be unwilling to give up your freedom today with the bodacious Leo Full Moon stimulating your 9th House of Adventure. You're quick to encourage others if it helps you get what you want, but forgiving them now is tougher. Your emotions are very close to the surface, but you can still give yourself time to settle down before you say anything. State your truth clearly, but save the intensity for another day.

You can slip into denial when your emotions grow too strong unless you have the safety net of a stable relationship. Today's Leo Full Moon in your 8th House of Deep Sharing prevents a quick escape from an uncomfortable situation. However, avoiding the heat of confrontation won't solve the problem anyway. Face your greatest fears now, especially around issues of sexuality, power and control. Meeting this emotional challenge brings the rewards of self-confidence and admiration from others.

It feels as if your life is reaching a crescendo, yet you're afraid that an important relationship is going to fall apart. A melodrama might be unfolding as today's colorful Leo Full Moon lands in your 7th House of Partnerships. However, an intense emotional outburst may be a symptom of the profound changes occurring within your psyche. Find an acceptable way to vent your feelings while still respecting those you love.

You might be tempted to make a big deal out of doing your chores, especially if you're feeling insecure now that the showy Leo Full Moon is rattling your 6th House of Daily Routine. However, you can also inspire others to greater heights by sharing your dreams of the future. By cleverly shifting the focus you can avoid the spotlight today yet still receive the recognition you deserve.

Your social life is taking off and you're ready to go for a ride. However, a voice of caution may arise from your subconscious. The attraction toward new experiences is so strong now that it will likely win, but don't just ignore your inner guidance. Respect your common sense that is reminding you to save some time to accomplish your real world objectives before returning to pursuits of pleasure.

There has been a noticeable shift in the atmosphere, moving you out of your imagination and into reality. Although you may be rightly concerned with your role in the community and your career, you still aren't ready to give up your more personal vision of the future. Allow yourself the luxury of holding on to your dreams, but make sure that you also take care of your responsibilities along the way.

You may be dreaming of far-off lands and distant galaxies today, even if there isn't a realistic way to reach these fantastic destinations. Thankfully, you don't have to go anywhere special to be happy. You can even be satisfied with a voyage of the mind, so consider reading a novel that carries you beyond your current reality or enrolling in a class that expands your worldview. You are in a growth phase now, so choose your path wisely and embark on a journey worthy of your time.

If you're involved in a deeply meaningful relationship, you still must balance your need for intimacy with an unusual amount of emotional distance. In final analysis, this uncharacteristic behavior is a secret relief now, for you often become more entangled in a relationship than you intend. Make every attempt to simply enjoy your experiences today without worrying too much about what it all means.

The relationship axis of your chart continues to be in the spotlight, making it difficult to avoid romantic cues from others now. However, it's also very easy to misread the signals, setting you up for an unwanted surprise. Don't make assumptions today or you could find yourself in an emotional mess. Ask for a reality check before things go too far. Keeping the communication channels clear will help everyone to be on the same page.

You may be having unusual desires now that amorous Venus in your 5th House of Romance is aligning with eccentric Uranus. Normally, your friends don't perceive you as weird, but you do have your idiosyncrasies. You're tempted to show these hidden facets more readily now, without worrying about what anyone else thinks. Ironically, others might actually be relieved when they discover that you're not as perfect as you appear.

You're at the leading edge of a creative wave now, enabling you to express ideas that have been developing in your fertile imagination. Even if you recently faced restrictions that prevented you from having fun, the landscape is shifting today and the party is arriving at your doorstep. Make the most of this playful time by simply giving yourself permission to be spontaneous and free-spirited in everything you do.

Your emotions and logic might be engaged in an internal struggle now, yet this dance between the heart and the head can be quite constructive. It is very simple; you need to practice holding two positions simultaneously. Take the leap by acknowledging that there's absolutely nothing wrong with you and that there's no immediate solution to your divergent needs. Once you reframe your world, the pressure to act one way or the other is alleviated. Your current confusion is a spiritual gift as long as you don't try to make sense of it yet.

Your rational mind creates a safety net that allows you to bury your attractions so other people don't know what you are feeling. However, this won't prevent you from telling them anyway. You can turn on the charm to get whatever you desire, assuming you have the common sense to ask for it nicely. Unfortunately, the problem is that you might not even know what you want. If you're not sure, there's no reason to say anything at all. Wait until you are clear about your needs before involving anyone else.

Re-evaluate everything you think you know because you may be overly confident about all the wrong things today. If your friends have been trying to get you to see something from their point of view, it's time to stop and listen. Don't hold on to your past assumptions and desires, since your values are changing at a rapid pace. Embrace the future and let the new you emerge.

You feel the excitement in the air as sexy Venus connects with wild Uranus, your key planet. Although you might not actually fall in love, your senses are more receptive than usual. Don't be afraid of receiving pleasure during the weeks ahead, for you can easily invite the Goddess of Beauty into your world with simple acts of acceptance. Be nice to yourself and others will follow.

It could be very challenging to separate your real life from fantasies, now that your imagination is inspiring you so intensely. You have a special opportunity these days to express the secrets you have been hiding. Proceed with caution, for the boundary between the inner and outer worlds is quite thin, making you even more alluring and vulnerable to others. Your intuitive powers often encourage you to be more susceptible to the magic of love.

You receive a blast of energy from today's fiery Leo Moon, inspiring you to do something special with your creativity. However, you may get fired up over an unimportant issue and even lose your temper if someone rubs you the wrong way. The effects of the combative Moon-Mars opposition only last a few hours, but they prompt you to stand up for your emotions. Negotiating with others will get you farther than making a unilateral decision and trying to achieve your goals all by yourself.

You may be feeling a bit out of sorts today as you try to integrate your emotions with the complex realities of the day. Thankfully, you have an unusually clear sense of how you want your day to flow. However, you might have to temporarily change your direction because of on-the-job demands. Let go of your long-term goals while you respond to more immediate obligations. You can return to your original agenda once the pressure eases and things settle down.

It's a busier-than-normal Monday, even for you whimsical Twins who do so well with a variety of options. In fact, your dilemma now is whether to engage in several unrelated fun activities for a short amount of time each, or to pick just one special project that could fill most of your day. Fortunately, either way works equally fine if your heart is in it. It's not crucial to be productive today as long as you're doing what you love.

Your friends and co-workers enjoy your company when you choose to come out of your shell. Fortunately, you feel upbeat today and are ready to indulge yourself and your loved ones. However, you may become so involved with the day's events that you temporarily forget about more pressing issues. Counting your blessings is a sweet idea, as long as you don't neglect the promises you made along the way.

The reflective Moon is back in your sign today, placing you directly in touch with your own cycle of renewal and rejuvenation. Listen to your co-workers who seem to have your best interests at heart because they are like spirit whisperers, quietly guiding you toward your next move. Fortunately, having the support of trusted allies further improves your chances for happiness.

You may have some old business to finish before you can start with this week's work. You might feel out of sync, but this uneasiness will dissipate if you stop analyzing the current situation and just tie up loose ends the best you can. Thankfully, the Moon's shift into your practical sign later in the day helps you get back in touch with your center and offers a comfortable sense of belonging.

Your friends can revitalize you now and may even bring a bit of fun or romance into your life. But you might become so tempted by the idea of escaping your responsibilities that you actually try to ignore them. Unfortunately, previously made commitments won't go away, causing you to feel guilty about your attitude. The sooner you meet your obligations, the sooner you'll be able to kick up your heels.

Something you want to say could be stuck in your throat today and your goal is to spit it out. Normally, after a period of reticence, you would put on your hard hat, dig in to do the work and express what you need to get off your chest. However, the problem might not be resolved by direct intervention now. It doesn't matter how others see you; it's about how you feel. Happily, speaking the truth is all you need to do; you may not have to fix anything at all.

This past weekend's experiences may have given you good reason to be spiritually uplifted. Perhaps you feel like you are doing better now, after an uncomfortable visit into the watery world of emotions. Today, you're finally ready to fly. There's no time to waste, so get ready for the action. The pace picks up, the audience arrives, and you are the star of the show.

Digging into the mysteries of a relationship may dredge up a difficult issue now that the reflective Moon is in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You might try to sidestep emotional conflict, especially at work, but sticking with the conversation can lead to a major breakthrough. Living with integrity in your feelings empowers your efforts and increases your productivity.

Something odd is happening today and you might not be able to grasp its meaning. The feeling is too important to ignore, but as of yet, it's still somewhat unformed. The Moon, now visiting your 7th House of Partners, reflects light on the issue as you listen to your spouse, lover or close friend. Don't push for complete resolution since it may take another few days for everything to come together. The other shoe will fall in time if you just let it.

You stand to gain clarity by putting your daily chores in order today and making yourself a list of things to do. You might be tempted to perform a major production to show off your work, yet it's really nobody's business but yours. Instead, be as efficient as possible and get as much done as you can without making a fuss. By the end of the day you can feel proud of a job well done.

Even the unimportant things can be annoying today, especially if they are the result of careless thinking. Unfortunately, you may be in a hurry and judge others harshly if they can't keep up with your pace. However, practicing patience helps your day flow smoothly and makes everything run more efficiently in the long run. Remember, not everyone is as fast as you.

There isn't a lot of room for frivolous activities today; however, a bit of fun isn't out of the question. You are eager to temporarily set aside your responsibilities, especially if you believe that you can learn something from an extracurricular experience. Find out in advance how much time you need to allow for play so you can finish up your chores later. It will be easier to escape for a while if you already know that you have your bases covered.

You might not be the most meticulous worker in the world, yet you can move very quickly once you start a job. However, you may put extra attention toward the details today if you are trying to impress someone, especially your boss. But your work could still fall short of other people's expectations, even if your intentions are honorable. Nevertheless, don't be too self-critical; just do the best you can and move on to what's next.

You may do better today if you schedule your activities in advance, rather than flying by the seat of your pants. Attend to your commitments early on so you can also make time to get in touch with your inner self through prayer, meditation, or meaningful conversations with friends. Meeting your obligations is important, but don't be so focused on the clock that you miss a truly wonderful opportunity to connect with your heart.

Make time to catch up on financial matters today since your mental acuity is even sharper than usual. However, the best application of your skills isn't just to pay bills or balance your accounts. The issues are currently bigger, so sit back and reassess what's of most value to you. If you must make a choice about allocating funds now, use your resources in the most practical way possible.

You might feel somewhat uncomfortable with your irrational mood swings today as the emotional Moon visits your analytical sign. Avoid any tasks that require high levels of concentration, for you may not be able to prevent your mind from wandering now. Even if you want to take the day off, you're unwilling to disappoint those who depend on you. However, scheduling short breaks throughout the day improves your ability to focus on the work at hand.

It's becoming harder every day to contain yourself, but you're probably not quite ready to let others know your feelings yet. Ironically, keeping your emotions to yourself now can heighten your spiritual awareness -- as long as you don't slip into denial about what's occurring. Try not to succumb to external pressures; you'll know exactly when to act if you trust your own intuition more than anyone else's advice.

Spending time with your friends and associates today offers the change of pace you seek, but don't try to micromanage your social activities. Instead of wasting time by attempting to create a memorable event, stay flexible without assuming control of the situation. Ultimately, you have more fun and are more effective today when you are acting spontaneously, instead of working from a script.

Attempts to accomplish too many things all at once today could lead to doing a poor job at all of them. Tread lightly in all of your interactions because understating your responses is the most efficient use of your energy now. Just take care of each problem as it pops up in a calm and collected manner. Your enthusiasm suddenly returns when others recognize how well you are handling a complicated situation.

There are powerful forces at work today, yet they may be hiding behind the scenes so you can't see them directly. Your personal proverb du jour might be "out of sight, out of mind," but, ultimately, this isn't the smartest strategy. Your tendency is to overlook minor details now, but a small thing could be the catalyst that turns your day around. Instead of jumping from one task to another, stick with each one until you are sure that the energy has run its course.

Consider the potential benefits of working in close collaboration with a partner now, whether you're starting a new endeavor or simply doing a project around the house. Another person can bring important information or an interesting perspective to your work. However, you may be so quick to criticize the contributions of others today that you shut them up before you hear what they have to say. Don't be judgmental or you might miss out on a really great idea.

You may feel as if everything you do today falls short of other people's expectations. But if someone is highly critical of your actions, he or she might not understand you or your behavior. Rather than responding as an unappreciated victim, take time to carefully explain your intentions. Even if you're going over familiar territory, it's healthier to share your hurt feelings instead of hiding them. Starting an honest dialogue provides an opportunity to clear the air once and for all.

You are confronted with the realization that your long-term goals may not be supported by the current circumstances. Nevertheless, you're tempted to set your throttle at warp speed and ram your way through the restraints. However, this type of impulsive strategy is foolhardy now. Don't push; instead, try to understand what reality is showing you. Once you learn that lesson, the stress will begin to dissipate and the path ahead will clear.

Your emotions can get in the way today if someone blocks your progress, but the reasons for your intense feelings might not be apparent to you yet. Resist making any judgments now because it may take a few days to fully comprehend what's going on. Life is somewhat unstable at the moment and it makes sense to wait until the turmoil settles. Take your time and get it right instead of blindly pushing forward.

You may feel uncharacteristically pessimistic today, but nothing is as impossible as it seems. Thankfully, the emotions that are holding you back can also contain the seeds for your future progress. Don't accept defeat under any circumstances, even if your confidence is waning. Remember, your current actions set the stage for the transformations ahead.

It feels like you don't have enough of what you need today. Although your problem could be a lack of resources, it might also be your self-esteem that's in short supply now. Whatever is troubling you, don't allow yourself to grow discouraged; the current difficulties are not about failure. This is an excellent chance to prove yourself by gathering your strength and making the best of what you have.

Even if significant issues are already developing at home, your current actions still have major consequences over the weeks ahead. Consider the work that you must do; if you're trying accomplish too much, you may be forced to let some things go. Make the necessary adjustments now by taking cues from reality before it's too late. The sooner you act, the easier it will be to lighten your load.

Your reliable common sense helps you to remember what is most important now. Even if something at work isn't going as well as you wish, you can still make a smart decision today that enables you to stay on your chosen path. Be clear about your intentions and focus on your goals. Your confidence in your own abilities is currently your most valuable asset.

Most areas of your life seem to be moving along quite well, but you could face conflicts now between what you want to do and the amount of money you make. Someone close to you may act impulsively and irresponsibly, adding to your emotional stress. Your innate ability to roll with the uncertain circumstances is your best defense. Stay flexible, hold on to your sense of humor and you'll move through this time with grace.

Your temptation now is to follow the vision of your most idealistic future, even if it's totally unrealistic. However, you must make some changes in your plans as your needs evolve with the shifting tides. But it doesn't make sense to alter too much at once since you cannot afford to destabilize your life. Start making small yet meaningful adjustments so that you can reach your dreams.

You manage to keep a smile on your face, even when you encounter difficult situations. Although you have several supportive allies, it's easy to doubt yourself now. But this is not a smart time to quit; if life seems overwhelming, remember that Saturn the Tester is only giving you a wake-up call. Taking a spiritual retreat may be all that you need to regain your footing. Do whatever is necessary to ground yourself for the changes ahead.

It's all too easy to acknowledge your own weaknesses today while the radiant Sun squares your key planet, sobering Saturn. Unfortunately, you might judge yourself harshly; it's frustrating if you don't match up to your ideal. However, this period of testing isn't happening because you're not good enough; it's because you are being so hard on yourself. For now, just take note of where reality doesn't meet your expectations. Wait a few days before reassessing your goals and then make whatever improvements you can to step up your game.

Paradoxically, it's easier to feel free if you can accept the limitations being placed on you now. Instead of trying to eliminate all boundaries, learn to work within the safety net they provide. Don't attempt to push the edges of the envelope today. Restrain yourself just enough to maintain the status quo. Even if you're facing a difficult challenge, rise to the occasion and show what you can do.

A highly restrictive situation may prevent you from stepping over your limits, even if you aren't conscious of what's holding you back now. Stop worrying about what could fall apart or what might not work. Instead, focus singularly on your responsibilities. Today won't be the most relaxing day, but you can turn it into one that is quite productive with just a bit of serious intention and sincere follow-through.

You are drawn into stressful relationship dynamics, both at home and at work, as the Moon visits your 7th House of Companions. However, your emotions may not be on the same page as those of your partner or coworker. Unfortunately, you might place roadblocks between yourself and intimacy because you're afraid of losing your independence. Instead of resisting your fears, get them out into the open where their power dissipates once and for all.

The Moon's presence in your 6th House of Work reflects your need to know you are doing a valuable service. Nevertheless, there is a part of you that would prefer to skip out on your responsibilities and indulge in pleasurable activities instead. However, as a stubborn Bull, it takes a lot to pull you off course; even if you want to relax, your unwavering determination can help keep you on track to reach your destination on time.

You may be motivated to express your creativity in original ways today, but it's still hard to set practicality aside in the name of spontaneity. Nevertheless, your sense of responsibility won't likely be strong enough to shut down your free-spirited behavior. It might be helpful to eliminate extraneous noise by minimizing your time online and postponing unnecessary meetings. You have a better chance of accomplishing your goals if you can hear yourself think.

You might not feel very adventurous today as the Moon moves through your 4th House of Home and Family. But seclusion can be problematic, especially if you need to play a leadership role at work or in the community. Don't waste time dreaming about your escape because you probably won't go through with it, anyhow. Instead, demonstrate your maturity by doing the right thing now and fulfilling your obligations.

It's all about diplomatic communication today as five planets move through relationship-oriented Air signs, making what you say less important than how you say it. However, you have the capability to turn your dreams into reality now, so you must be careful when sharing your fantasies with anyone else. Take time to consider your audience and fine tune your delivery; concentrate on your goal and stay true to your heart.

You may seem very determined to get whatever you want today, but you must first overcome your timidity and ask properly. The emotional Moon in your 2nd House of Self-Worth can give you a sense of firm resolve, but your actions might not back up your intentions. If you find your mind wandering throughout the day, just gently bring your focus back on point and try again.

Tender feelings rise up to the surface as the gracious Libra Moon travels through your 1st House of Personality today. You are highly sensitized to the subtle emotional energy spreading through your environment, and you're aware of the impact that your reactions have on others. As helpful as you are, don't forget to take care of yourself, too. You won't be any good to anyone if you don't pay attention to your needs first.

You might feel somewhat discouraged today as the Moon visits your 12th House of Escapism. It's hard to get much done if you're not motivated to interact with anyone else. You don't want to be fully involved with the outer world and are tempted to withdraw into the hidden recesses of your imagination. Do what you must to get by, but don't shut off your dreams now just because they don't easily fit into reality. Remember, indulging your fantasies is a wonderful way to explore all the possibilities ahead.

Everything seems to run smoothly today, helping to soothe any lingering tensions. Don't worry about trying to resolve all the differences of opinion; just remember that being kind and considerate relieves the building pressure. Your current strength is reinforced by the fair-minded way in which you deal with others, even when you don't agree with them. It's more important to be a part of the community now than being on the winning side.

It's challenging to shake off the stress these days, especially if someone is pushing your emotional buttons. Still, you appear to continue acting gracefully even in a difficult situation. Thankfully, you're able to hide your tension for a while longer, enabling others to feel more at ease. Fortunately, your own anxiety is ameliorated when everyone else finally settles down.

Even if serious responsibilities continue to multiply, today's peaceful Libra Moon lightens things up. Although the source of your concerns won't likely disappear, taking a more spiritual approach to very real problems certainly helps. There's no reason to upset the applecart; for now, just try to go with the flow. Be smart and save your energy for when you really need to take a stand.

There are complex emotional waves washing through your mind now, challenging you to balance them with more practical issues.
