Leading by example is more effective than by intimidation. Luckily, you have a deep reserve of physical and mental energy now, and if you apply it carefully you can make these days really count. Remember, it's better to have people around you who can stand up to your authority than to get silent compliance from those who have no respect. The power to change other people's minds may be yours today if you use it wisely.

Although your business and personal relationships may introduce instability into your life now, you still have someone you can lean on. However, your main source of support today is you. If you want to get something done, you might have to rely on your own practical skills and efficient manner. Ironically, others are likely to come around quickly and hold up their end of the deal once you take your power back.

Your simple goal today is to turn an unpleasant chore into an enjoyable activity. Your best chance of achieving satisfaction is by doing what you do best -- diplomatically smoothing over the rough spots so others can get along. Just remember, you don't have to downplay your importance while shifting the focus on to someone else. Take responsibility for your crucial role in the process by acting with conviction as you stand on common ground.

Control issues may come to the forefront of your life today. You might feel as if your willpower is functioning at a high level, but your singular concentration on a specific task can actually contribute to a ruthless attitude. Others could feel as if they're obstructing progress unless they commit to following your instructions exactly as you give them. But nothing is gained when you're too set in your ways to learn something new. Luckily, there's always room for compromise.

You are willing to set aside your sense of urgency and work toward a long-term goal now. Although you have more patience than usual, you're still uncertain about how long you can wait before setting out on a new course. But don't turn your life upside down yet because getting everything ready will require more hard work. Use the stabilizing energy at hand to tighten your plans; follow your moral compass and you'll know when it's time to jump.

You are exceptionally conscious of your goals now and know how you can achieve them. The danger is that you could talk yourself into the over-inflated importance of your objectives, tempting you to bend the rules of the game in your favor. However, the ends do not justify the means. You'll be proud of your accomplishments if you stick to the spirit and the letter of the law.

You have your work in front of you and you won't let anything prevent you from finishing what you set out to do today. Although you might think you need to confront an authority figure on your way to success, you may actually receive more support than you expect. Don't make your path harder than it needs to be by turning a potential ally into an enemy. Live by the Golden Rule; if you give others the respect that you want, that's how they will treat you in return.

You feel as if you're working selflessly for some higher cause today, but it might be more obvious to you than to anyone else. Others may question your motives or try to convince you to shift directions, pulling the rug of certainty out from under your feet. Instead of doubting yourself, make a conscious decision to rise above the irrational confusion and to simply focus on accomplishing your goals.

There are too many things to do today and not enough time to finish all of them. Although it might not be a very relaxing day, chances are you will still thoroughly enjoy it. You can feel the excitement swell as you swing into action. Just make sure you have a plan before you wander too far in the wrong direction. Doing a little research in advance saves you time and money and increases your chances for success.

Money problems may be highlighted today, yet focusing on your fiscal obligations gives you a better sense of where you actually stand. The greatest danger to your economic well-being comes from your uncharacteristic lack of concentration now. Fortunately, by consciously slowing down your thoughts you can regain control and follow through on what is most important. It's currently smarter to do one thing right than to do lots of things halfheartedly.

The subjective Moon's return to your sign is a bit confusing today, for her square to nebulous Neptune makes it tough to share your needs without becoming overly emotional. If you find yourself in a stressful discussion, clearly let the other person know that you're having difficulty expressing your innermost feelings. Ultimately, speaking the truth can be a catalyst that helps the conversation flow more easily.

You are a walking paradox today because as hard as you try to be logical, your thoughts are colored by idealistic emotional considerations. On the surface it appears that you're willing to let go of an old resentment; unfortunately, it remains more of a struggle than anyone else realizes. Whether or not you share your internal process now, don't slip into denial. Life will continue to improve over the days ahead as long as you acknowledge your heart.

It's challenging to get much finished today because everyone seems to have a different notion of what you should be doing. Additionally, matters are made worse if each person tries to convince you that his or her plan is better than yours. Meanwhile, you would rather continue unencumbered on your current path. Be firm but kind while asking others to let you figure out the day for yourself. Follow your instincts when deciding what to do next.

You may have to play different roles for different people today, which could leave you feeling uncertain about your true identity. It's not like you to be unsure of your place in family relationships, but now a lack of clarity might increase your anxiety throughout the weekend. Your best strategy involves putting extra effort into unfinished chores instead of trying to please everyone else. Nevertheless, your real friends love you for who you are and not for what you do.

You may be very productive today, but your current accomplishments are more creative than practical. Everything you touch now has the potential of turning into an artistic masterpiece. Although this could be lots of fun, you must be careful not to spread your energy too thin or you will end up more frustrated than fulfilled. Each potential project has an advantage and a disadvantage. Make sure you explore both before jumping in with both feet.

You're extremely rational today when it comes to your feelings, leading you to remain rather restrained. Ironically, you have the ability to objectively analyze your emotions now without necessarily being overwhelmed by them. A healthy dose of conscious detachment empowers you to tackle a serious issue in a positive manner. Don't waste the day with one distraction after another. Just figure out where you can make the most progress and dig in.

Without being overly judgmental, consider how a long-termn ally might actually be preventing you from doing what you wish today. However, this annoying situation is less about running into an obstacle than it is about others encouraging you to head off in a new direction now. Thankfully, there's no need to shut out your supporters, but don't let anyone pull you too far off track. Never forget you are the master of your own destiny.

There are plenty of things you want to accomplish today, but you may not know where to begin. You might even bite off more than you can chew, only to realize how little you actually get done. The best remedy for this potential problem is to make a list early in the day and then stick to your agenda, no matter what happens. Ironically, temporarily narrowing your options now can lead you to other opportunities in the near future.

Your stress level might escalate if you choose work over fun. The lighthearted Gemini Moon is visiting your 5th House of Spontaneity, making this a great day to let your inner child out to play. You deserve some time off now, and there is nothing wrong with letting loose as long as you're willing to make up tomorrow for what you skip out on today.

Complex circumstances unfolding at home could draw your attention away from your previous plans. You may be seduced into a complicated web of relationship dynamics that are entangling other members of your family. Although your natural tendency is to help anyone you in need, it will be healthier for all involved if you're extremely clear about your boundaries. Sometimes knowing when to walk away is the kindest thing you can do.

The Sun's entry into your 12th House of Endings requires you to get ready for the upcoming action, and there's no time to waste. If you have recently overextended yourself by taking on too many projects, make an effort to clean up after your energy binge, but don't be too self-judgmental in the process. Just start now by paring back your commitments and doing whatever it takes over the next few weeks to prepare for what's around the corner.

It may feel as if your world is about to open up, so take this chance to think about your future. Unfortunately, the uncertainty makes you anxious, especially if your goals are out of sync with your current life circumstances. You might convince yourself that drastic action is needed to get back onto the proper path, but don't push so hard for change today. Adopting a methodical approach to your long-term goals is better than trying to do everything all at once. Life is a marathon, not a sprint.

You may consider re-evaluating your career path and making big changes as the Sun journeys through your 10th House of Status during the next four weeks. You have an opportunity to become more aware of your place in the world now. However, you might quickly regret letting this chance slip by, so make up your mind to take action while there's still time. Thankfully, you could see positive results sooner than you think if you can visualize your way to success.

These next few weeks are likely to bring a much-needed emotional boost. It's not that you're jumping up and down with excitement; it's just that you feel comfortable in your own skin and are willing to stand up for your beliefs in order to maintain your integrity. Don't worry about the details now; concentrate on your highest ideals. Your current vision is comprehensive, so be serious about making positive change while you can still see the big picture.

You may attempt to gloss over criticism that you receive today from someone you consider to be family. However, acting in a cavalier manner could lead to more problems than you realize. Listen carefully to what others are saying and don't try to dodge the truth. Take feedback as constructive guidance, even if it doesn't feel as good as denial in the present moment. Your willingness to work on self-improvement now can fundamentally change the dynamics of a relationship for the better.

You have a lot to gain in the next month by taking time to look back before moving ahead as the Sun travels through your 7th House of Others. Review all that you have accomplished since your last birthday and acknowledge everyone who has helped you along the way. Creating new goals for the balance of your year is critical to your happiness. Luckily, you can make nearly anything happen if you focus your intentions and then work hard to reach your dreams.

If your thoughts have been aimed at creative endeavors, you may feel as if something is beginning to shift today. Instead of fostering an artistic approach to your work, seek ways to apply what you already started in a more practical manner. But be careful not to overdo it; it's not healthy to take all the fun out of your life. To counteract the possibility of boredom now, initiate a new activity that has regularity to it, like taking a class or joining a club. Balancing work and play will put a smile back on your face.

You may feel revitalized as the Sun occupies your 5th House of Fun and Games for the next several weeks. However, your surge of energy might not be apparent to others. Inspiration is returning to your imagination; you are beginning to feel more emotionally in touch with others around you. But don't worry if you still feel the weight of responsibility on your shoulders. Making time to express what's in your heart will help to lighten your load.

Not only are you maintaining your busy pace today, you're also having fun doing it. Although the party doesn't need to come crashing to an end, you realize that you have some serious thinking to do, and this pressure tempts you to withdraw from social activity. But don't just hit the escape button yet; you'll be happier in the long run if you deal with what's making you feel uncomfortable rather than avoiding it. Taking care of business promptly gives you a sense of satisfaction and a valid reason to reward yourself.

Confusing times may be upon you as logical analysis fails to explain why your day seems to be running out of control. Even if you have spent considerable time making certain that you're ready for what happens next, there are still variables that you just cannot manage. Don't be too surprised by the twists and turns on the path of life now. Sometimes the journey is more important than the destination.

You might actually breathe a sigh of relief as the willful Sun leaves your sign today and heads for the open seas of irrational Pisces. However, it still could take time to see where your new route will take you. Happily, the uncertainty will begin to settle down as you travel along. Problems won't likely be solved overnight, yet it's reassuring to know that there is plenty of time to plot your new course once you're already on your way.

The warm rays of the Sun shine on you now, illuminating your imagination as it visits your sign for the next month. Your fantasies are especially active now, but you might be unable to effectively communicate your visions to anyone else. Powerful emotions can muddy the waters or even block your self-expression. But don't waste energy trying to overcome your inertia, for it won't last long. In the meantime, write down your dreams, but wait a few days before revealing them to others.

Your day may be full of distracting noise with the chatty Gemini Moon occupying your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Fortunately, you're capable of pulling brilliant solutions out of thin air now. Your acquaintances are amazed at what you can do because you don't seem to be limited by the same rules as everyone else. Even if you are bold enough to bend reality to your liking, don't push your luck too far or you could unexpectedly lose your advantage.

A combination of fact and fiction keeps you on edge today, even if you try to keep these two worlds distinct. Your judgment isn't impaired; it's just that the current circumstances can be quite complicated now, making it nearly impossible to wrap your mind around the truth. Trusting your intuition is a smart idea as long as you are ready to change your position as you learn more relevant information throughout the day.

Your feelings change rapidly now that the emotional Moon is in your sign. However, wide mood swings may be more frustrating for everyone else than for you. It seems as if others want you to make up your mind, even if you can't commit to any single path. You still have plenty to think about, so don't let anyone force you to choose yet. The longer you can postpone your final answer, the happier you will be with your decision.

Your careful choice of words can hide deep feelings that you want to keep private today. However, you may be convinced to reveal your inner secrets if you are fortunate enough to connect with someone you respect. An emotionally safe relationship could be exactly what you need to encourage you to divulge your dreams. Whatever path you choose, don't try to rationalize your behavior to anyone else. Trust your instincts now rather than logic.

You could have trouble assuming authority if you haven't earned your respect the old-fashioned way, yet you might try to play the role of a superhero, anyhow. Pulling off this amazing feat today may actually be possible if you don't become arrogant, but it will require a bit of finesse. It's up to you to find the simple solution that eludes everyone else. Your best bet is to be as direct as possible without steamrolling over anyone in the process.

You're not likely to be satisfied by resting on past accomplishments now, because the Gemini Moon's presence in your 10th House of Status prompts you to demonstrate your cleverness at work. You may need to step outside your comfort zone and, fortunately, you can do it now without a lot of hard work. Don't worry if nothing is falling into place yet; it will all make sense at the last minute. Meanwhile, jump in without hesitating and enjoy figuring out your way as you go.

You may become obsessed with a brilliant new idea that comes to you today. Although you might believe that you stumbled on to something quite ingenious, you won't really know until you attempt to put your plan into action. Nevertheless, it's wise to assume that your strategy is a good one until reality tells you otherwise. Retreat if you must to tweak the details and then try again in a few days.

You appear to have the support of others today, but it's difficult to tell how loyal your new followers might be in a crisis. You would like to get a handle on a situation that is eluding your control because of everyone else's tenuous involvement. Nevertheless, you don't need to hold back; show the world what you can do. Thankfully, others will appreciate your initiative and integrity; they might even show their approval and come through with a commitment at the last minute.

Interactions with friends may be very beneficial today, especially if you are precise about expressing exactly what you need. Unfortunately, you can really mess things up if you are too selfish in your behavior. Don't abuse your power; just focus on your role in each active relationship. Stepping into your future feels safer when others are by your side.

You continue to develop your work skills now as you strive for self-determination. The good news is that even the simplest of thoughts can be utilized as the basis of your new foundation. Although it's crucial to conserve energy and be methodical about your forward movement, don't take your eyes off the distant horizon. Remaining practical while visualizing the future is a difficult balance to achieve, yet it's exactly what's required to build a bridge to your dreams.

It's challenging to hold your current position between past memories and future goals. Nevertheless, it's a crucial part of your strategy now. Don't try to reinvent the wheel as you start from the beginning. Instead, rework an existing plan that just lacks one critical element. Figure out what you need to add by enlisting assistance from someone who supports your effort. Knowing when to ask for help is your secret ingredient to creating success.

You may feel anxious as you try to keep your emotions in check. It's tough to make progress today because you're so curious that you are distracted by one thing after another. Thankfully, your concentrated intentions overcome nearly any obstacle, but the final outcome will be determined by your attitude. Instead of worrying that you could miss the fun, be serious now so you can play later.

It may be time to honor your need for privacy, even if you are accustomed to spending a lot of your energy engaged in activities with your friends and associates. You independent Rams often like to work alone, for your patience grows thin when others cannot keep up with you. But now your penchant for solitude might be more about recharging your emotional batteries so you can head back out revitalized, ready to conquer the world.

You're more tentative about sharing your feelings now because you don't want to risk your security. Unfortunately, keeping secrets can exhaust you because you have to focus attention on monitoring what you say. But your unexpressed emotions give you away today, so face your fears and resist the temptation to go quiet. Act proactively; engage in deep and meaningful conversations by choice. There's no need to wait for anyone else to drag you into a conversation if you go there first.

The pace of life slows down today, bringing you more time to integrate a recent change of heart. You may need to reconsider your goals or even change your position on a professional matter. If something totally unexpected is tossed at you, do your best to catch it in stride. But mind your own business now; any extra concern that you put toward someone else's problems might only make matters worse. Realigning your priorities makes sense because you have plenty to do on your own.

It's difficult to know exactly what you feel today since your moods can radically shift from moment to moment now that the Moon's back in your sign. You may go from wanting to pour your heart out to a friend or lover to withdrawing to the safety of your hidden cave. Try not to make any long-lasting decisions until your feelings settle back down. In the meantime, let your emotions flow naturally without trying to change them.

Although others seem to be looking right at you, you still may feel as if you aren't being seen. You don't understand how they can miss the point as you hold your head high and carry out your assigned tasks, even if your heart is hurting. Remember, if you are having an overly emotional day, a humble disclosure to a trusted friend might bring the recognition you so desperately seek. Take the time you need to process your feelings before you step back into the spotlight.

You vacillate between accepting the support your colleagues offer today and fearfully pushing them away. Although you appreciate the camaraderie, you also need to know you can be self-sufficient. Try to soften your attitude, even if think you're being overly dependent on others now. It's a sign of intelligence and strength to openly embrace help when it is offered. There's no need to let pride stand in the way when someone wants to see you shine.

You might be swimming in tumultuous emotional waters now, unless you can let go of the control you believe you need. However, you're not in charge of anyone's feelings but your own. Instead of trying to fix the situation by making someone more comfortable, concentrate on yourself. Once you've adjusted your attitude, then others may have the freedom to do the same. Turn down the noise and listen to your heart.

You're content exploring your feelings in the privacy of your own space today. Your emotional security is extremely important now and you may not be satisfied until you feel completely safe and sound in your environment. Thankfully, you can journey nearly anywhere you desire within the wilds of your imagination. Just don't forget to demonstrate your colorful creativity while you have the chance.

There may be an expansion-contraction dilemma developing now as your normally cavalier attitude assumes a more cautious stance today. But don't succumb to the pressures of social expectations. You can't please others if you don't acknowledge your own desires first. Chill out and give yourself permission to withdraw from the party if you really want some time alone. A little peace and quiet might be just what you need to reinvigorate your spirit.

You may not believe you have sufficient patience to hold someone's hand while they go through an emotional meltdown; however, it could be exactly what's required today. Alternatively, it might be you that's the needy one at this time -- making you even less patient with yourself than with another person. Either way, acknowledge that the expression of feelings doesn't always fit neatly into a schedule. Being extra flexible enables you to stick with the process without being in such a hurry.

You may be challenged by relationships at work now because your lack of clarity makes it hard to confront your needs and recognize how they differ from those of your peers. Your extra efforts might even seem to be a waste of time today. Although retreating into your own world isn't the answer, gently creating extra space between you and others gives you room to honor your own feelings. Once you re-establish your center of gravity, you will be ready to reengage with a more positive attitude.

Although your current tendency might be toward isolation today, you still may indulge in romantic play. Ironically, your ability to enjoy yourself makes you more productive now that the evocative Moon is moving through your 5th House of Spontaneity. Try channeling this energy into creative expressions, whether for work or for your own amusement. Your dreams are the source of your greatest inspiration.

Although the shortest distance between two points is your preferred route, your path might not be so direct today. Your boundaries are fuzzy and it's difficult to discern what's real from what's imagined. Be careful about openly expressing your feelings now because you may be more attracted to your dreams than to a particular person or idea. Even if you find yourself professing love, postpone any commitment until your logic returns.

Idealism motivates you more than practicality today, but you could benefit by joining forces with a work group, social club, or political organization rather than going it alone. However, putting your thoughts in order might require you to spend some quality time by yourself. Although setting your goals high inspires you to reach for the stars, exercising caution improves your chances of success.

You are dreaming about your potential success in the outer world, and your fantasies can inspire you to do great things now regardless of your current work situation. However, problems could arise quickly if your aspirations are out of touch with reality. Let your mind roam today as you visualize all the possibilities ahead. But then zero in on a reachable goal and create a concrete plan to attain it.

It's nearly impossible to keep your feet on the ground today because your head is floating up in the clouds of illusion. You might wish you could escape into a sci-fi movie or a romance novel. Fortunately, your optimism about the future motivates you to make big plans. Indulge your fantasies, but remember that you may actually get the opportunity to live the adventure you are now imagining if you're willing to work hard to make your dreams come true.

You might have weird feelings that are difficult to understand because your heightened sensitivity has you treading on unfamiliar ground today. On one hand, it's quite exciting that you're so empathic now; it's fascinating to know what others are feeling. But on the other hand, it's tricky to separate your emotions from what you pick up from everyone else. You could be easily swayed, so try not to make important decisions until you know which voice is your own.

You want to be seen by your peers and appreciated by those you love, but the image that you are projecting now might not be the true you. You can do an amazing job of bending reality to meet your needs today, but this is a dangerous game to play. Others may not see through your illusions immediately, but the drama will play out and eventually the truth will be revealed. To avoid complications, use each interaction as if it is a mirror that reflects your soul.

You are motivated to discuss subjects that are normally difficult to pin down, but you may not be as clear as you think today. Sharing your visions by putting them into words doesn't make them real. Unfortunately, you can deceive yourself now because of how well you describe the indescribable. Remember, this is a fantastic day to tell a story or write a poem. It's more of a challenge to state the truth exactly like it is, so use your skills to work on a creative project rather than attempting to be overly practical.

Exquisitely beautiful visions can be the source of inspiration today, prompting you to spread joy or create a work of art. You are particularly enchanted by a romantic or artistic attraction, and might fall deeper into a fantasy than you ever intended. You have a tendency to look for an escape route now, especially if you are falling in love or if you are avoiding it. Either way, keep the facts in perspective so you won't have to deal with disillusionment later on.

You can slip into the role of a shape-shifter today because your feelings impact your physical presence. Others may see you as larger-than-life if you are feeling good. But if you have self-doubt, then you actually might seem smaller and less powerful to those around you. You are currently aware of more than what you logically know, so remember to consciously use your intuition in positive ways.

You may be drawn into a philosophical discussion today or enticed into taking a journey of spiritual exploration. Metaphysical subjects carry you away from the outer world of work and put you in touch with the inner dimensions of dreams and imagination. Be careful about idealizing the future because you can gloss over a critical piece of information on your search to create a more perfect life for yourself. Blend the magical with the practical to actualize your ambitions.

Your ability to quickly discern what's most important pays off since you're currently more likely to receive intuitive flashes when you least expect them. These messages from your subconscious can be confusing if they don't fit in with what's happening in your life. But don't ignore your inner voice today, for it's telling you something that you really need to hear. Save your judgment for later. For now, just pay attention to the subtleties of your imagination and enjoy the ride.

Your key planet Neptune hooks up with the Sun today, revealing unseen mysteries in broad daylight. You could have a momentary glimpse of a wider universe as the crack in in the cosmic egg breaks the shell that normally contains your rational world, giving you a whole new way of looking at things. Don't be hard on yourself if you don't know what to do next. Allow yourself a few more days to float around before returning to earth.

You are facing a conflict between needing to work and wanting to play, yet you might not receive enough support to ease your current concerns. Even if you have been burning the midnight oil to get everything finished, it's not yet time to slow down. Pace yourself and tie up as many loose ends as possible. Your enjoyment will be sweeter if you have something tangible to celebrate.

The more resistant you are to change today, the greater your dilemma. If you put too much energy into holding on to an indefensible position, your problems may grow worse -- no matter how convincing your arguments are now. However, everything can fall into place if you remain flexible without sacrificing your integrity. Meeting others halfway allows everyone to happily move on.

You might keep your feelings quiet most of the day, but find yourself wanting to talk to everyone about everything later in the afternoon. Unfortunately, you may not know when to stop your endless chatter once you get started. Your co-workers and friends probably don't need to know all the gory details of your story at this time. Just convey the main idea as accurately as you can and hope for the best.

You know exactly what you're feeling today and it's unlikely that anyone will be able to talk you out of your experience. Your intense emotions are running extra deep now, and things get complicated when others don't understand the subtleties of your heart. For you, anything short of the full story misses the very essence of what you're trying to communicate. However, be open to taking a path between the extremes of disclosing too much personal information and saying nothing at all.

Even if you are trying to settle down your emotional drama, it's still a hectic time now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign. It may seem appropriate to share your feelings if you have a strong attraction to someone today. Nevertheless, your behavior might raise complications at work. Take a few moments and think about the possible consequences of your actions. And remember, there's no undo button to push once you express yourself.

You are uncomfortable with your feelings today if they don't support the circumstances of a current relationship. Although your concerns may not be evident to anyone else, an overbearing person might pressure you to say what's on your mind. Nevertheless, you are wise to hold out and keep your mouth shut. Time is on your side; the less you say until after Monday's Full Moon, the more you'll be in control.

You may take bold action today to make your point about an important friendship. You might even be struggling with a romantic issue, but others won't likely comprehend the depth of your feelings now. Although you want to make them understand, the harder you try, the less they get it. Behaving in ways that are true to your heart is more productive than struggling to convince anyone to believe you. Actions speak louder than words.

Seek ways to be more flexible because today won't likely conform to the schedule you already have in place. Allow extra time for all activities since you may not have as much control now as you might like. Fortunately, your passionate approach to life is your secret weapon, as long as you remember to let go of your attachment to any specific outcome. The journey is more important than the destination.

You can feel the exhilaration from riding waves of extreme optimism today. However, you might attempt to settle down the energy because you have too much to do and very little time to waste. An important project requires your full attention while the limitations of your calendar are impacting your exciting plans. You have a very small margin for error now, so concentrate on your goals and get to work. If you stay focused, you may be pleasantly surprised by how much you accomplish by the end of the day.

Even if you prefer to stay on your chosen course, there's a good reason to deviate from your plans now. Although others may think that you are inflexible, nothing could be further from the truth. Since you need stability in your life that you can count on, you're quite proficient at changing your tune when pressured by reality. Responding to the current changes without delay enables you to hold your life steady in spite of the challenges ahead.

You may be frustrated if you have been trying to make improvements at work. Luckily, someone might ride into your life on a white horse and rescue you from your dilemma. Although today's events won't likely be a total solution, they still can reduce the pressure for a while. Remember, the answers to your current prayers are not logical; real solutions are intuitive now and come from within.

You can be quite productive at work today, even if you're anxious about your inability to perform up to everyone's expectations. But don't waste your energy worrying about anyone else's judgment. Instead, just take your job seriously and give it your very best effort. Ultimately, no one will blame you if your intentions are pure and your work ethic is strong. Perfection is one illusion you don't have to chase.

Even if you aren't the jealous type, you may be ready to swing into action today so you can demonstrate just how much you care about someone special. Be careful because your behavior might inadvertently set the stage for someone else to be possessive of you. Honor your need for independence by processing your emotions in a healthy manner rather than delivering ultimatums.

You may be treated as royalty by your family, only to find that your good intentions don't go as far once you're out in the real world. You are more likely to gain the respect of others if your actions are aligned with your life purpose. Set priorities but pay particular attention to your role in the community. It's time to give back to society, even if it's more comfortable to stay at home.

Today seems busy with the lively Leo Moon moving through your 3rd House of Distractions. Although you may prefer to kick back and relax, the universe has different plans for you now. You are being drawn into someone else's drama and you might not be able to escape it. Nevertheless, you could minimize your involvement by doing what you can to help, but keeping your opinions to yourself on matters that are not your business.

If you have been putting off money-related chores, it's a perfect day to catch up on paperwork with the Moon visiting your 2nd House of Personal Resources today. Luckily, you have a healthy attitude about handling your finances now, so you might as well get to work. However, avoid buying something extravagant on a whim, since it's currently wiser to save for a rainy day.

You might be facing your own fears of being vulnerable, but hiding them doesn't help matters in the realm of love and romance. Your desires are quite strong today while the Moon is in your sign, and, thankfully, you're able to project yourself in a favorable light. However, you might discover that your interpersonal relationships are reflecting a new level of intensity. What you want could be changing now, so rethink your personal goals instead of losing yourself in the details.

Be gentle with yourself today, even if you realize that you made a mistake. No matter how much you currently have to do, make time for your own needs. Being alone for a while can accelerate your healing process. And, even if you don't believe that you deserve forgiveness, act as if you do until you get the hang of it. Others will learn to treat you with love and respect if that's how you treat yourself.

Fulfilling responsibilities by delivering on your promises may be the highlight of your day, even if you have more exciting plans in mind. Creative play is an important part of your life and it may be extra frustrating if you don't have the time for it now. However, don't set aside all your personal needs just so you can live up to someone else's expectations. Balance your service to others with nurturing yourself to get the best from both worlds.

You may receive recognition today for a job well done, but you can be so tightly wrapped up in your emotional world that you don't realize how much others value you. It's difficult for the positive vibes to get through to you if you doubt yourself. Don't climb so deep into your own well that you can't see the bright lights that are shining from above.

Your natural enthusiasm keeps your head above water now, even if the seas are very stormy. However, it's difficult to know whether your optimism is based on real potential or on unrealistic fantasy. Either way, use your current willpower to overcome any fears that might creep into your thinking, especially if an emotional issue is brewing on the home front. It's healthier to sink into the truth and face the facts now than having to deal with the situation after it grows out of control.

The Moon's current visit to your 8th House of Joint Finances indicates that someone could come to your rescue today, even if you aren't looking for help. If a current project is incomplete, there are people who can play a significant role by bringing encouragement, connections and resources. Don't try to do everything just to prove your self-sufficiency. Graciously accept the gifts the universe offers now even if you would rather do it on your own.

You are at a major crossroads today and your current choices will have important repercussions down the road. Although you may be satisfied with clinging to an old dream and continuing along on your present path, reviewing your goals could lead to a positive change of direction. Don't be afraid to imagine the most idealistic outcome. However, anchoring your vivid imagination with a concrete plan greatly improves your chances of reaching your destination.

Your imagination continues to run away from reality as the Sun aligns with otherworldly Neptune in your sign. You are seeing your world through rose-colored glasses, placing practical decisions out of sight now. Share your dreams with those you trust while your visions are unrestrained by reality. But don't fall into the trap of thinking you must make a critical choice today about the direction of your life. There will be time for that once your clarity returns.

Your hard work and strategic planning seem to be on the edge of paying off now, but you still might worry that you missed your chance. Your progress may slow down or even stop today but don't be concerned; everything is actually on track. It's just going to take longer than you originally expected. Instead of thinking that something's gone wrong, use your extra time to review your plans and improve them however you can. Ultimately, the more prepared you are the more productive you will be when the pace picks up.

If you have big plans for your future, you might become overwhelmed thinking about how much time it will take to reach your goals. You're committed to succeeding, but you may need to apply yourself harder than you imagined. But even if the upcoming week looks like a busy one, kick back and chill today while you still have the chance. A little rest and relaxation improves your attitude and your energy, revitalizing you for your next adventure.

Your key planet Mercury is currently retrograde in your 10th House of Career, possibly stirring up anxiety about not being able to complete your work in a timely manner. However, an obstacle might actually turn into a blessing that gives you more time to prepare for the new responsibilities that are coming your way. Take the changes in stride; amazing opportunities are closer than you think.

You may doubt the wisdom of recently made plans, even if they were still sounding good to your ears as late as yesterday. Rational Mercury's retrograde turn in your 9th House of Big Ideas prompts you to question your assumptions as you review your schedule for the next week or so. Oddly enough, it's hard to commit to anything now, so use this time to analyze the alternative paths without making any major decisions yet. Stretch your horizons and explore all your options.

Life may seem like an uphill battle today, even with the Leo Moon reflecting the heartfelt energy of your sign. You might feel as if you're meeting resistance, but you can't directly confront your opponent. The shadows hold mysterious secrets and it's not clear what's holding you back. If you are running into problems dealing with an authority figure, there is a reason for the delay. Don't try to outmaneuver reality; instead, lay low and learn what you can do to be more effective.

Your key planet Mercury normally enables you to discern which facts are most significant. However, clever Mercury is back-stepping in nebulous Pisces now, making it impossible to know what's real. The more you strive for concrete answers, the more difficult it is to find them. Don't worry about solving problems today; cut yourself some slack and take some time off, no matter what anyone else says. Your clarity will return after the intensity of tomorrow's Full Moon is over.

You may be unnecessarily hard on yourself now because you really want to do what is right. You are willing to put in extra effort and you hope your actions demonstrate what you can do. But don't let authority be taken from you before you make your case. Losing your temper won't help either, so treat the current situation like a chess game and plan your next move strategically.

Although everything looks good on paper now, executing your plan may be more difficult than you anticipated. Fortunately, you're not as concerned with current events as you are with your long-term objectives. Apply your wisdom to whatever is going on today, but be aware that you might have to make some adjustments in your approach. Even the best theories need to be tested and refined along the way.

You may be in a difficult situation at home today because interpersonal dynamics are complicated and you might read a situation wrong. You could even believe that someone else holds the key to your current happiness. You don't like it when you lose control over your life, especially when you're standing on shaky ground. Regaining your center of gravity is easier than you think; just concentrate on being truthful and the resistances you face will begin to melt away.

You are not comfortable today because your thoughts drift into fantasies without warning. Even if you attempt to concentrate on the work at hand, it's difficult to maintain a steady focus. Paradoxically, you might need to let go of your tight grip on reality and float into dreamland for a bit. Scheduling some time for relaxation, meditation, or contemplation is a useful strategy. You'll be able to return to your responsibilities with a fresh perspective, empowering you to get things back under control.

You can rely on powerful allies to lead you in the right direction today. However, don't expect others to sugarcoat what they tell you. If you have to swallow a bitter pill of reality, then do it as gracefully as possible. There's no need to make anything look better than it actually is now, since whatever isn't working should just be set aside. Instead of wasting energy on an outdated plan, consider creating a brilliant new one, altogether.

You can only see those things that you want to see now, but unexpected events bring hidden problems clearly into view. You won't be able to bury your head in the sand for too much longer. Although you may be prepared to do the hard mental work required to overcome the obstacles in your path, you still have to eliminate your negative thinking. Share your concerns with someone you respect; meaningful conversations could help you to figure out what to do next.

Your emotional IQ isn't as high as you think today, so don't rely solely on your instincts. Chances are that you're blowing a fantasy out of proportion and confusing the results with reality. But getting to the truth enables you to make important changes in your daily regimen now that the Virgo Full Moon brightens your 6th House of Health and Diet. However, it's not necessary to take on too much; it's better to make one small improvement that lasts rather than many that don't.

Your resources may be spread too thin now as your exuberance makes it tough for you to say no to another commitment. Although you're not usually one to take on more than you can deliver, your judgment is off kilter now. Even if you want to do it all, the meticulous Virgo Full Moon illuminates your 5th House of Self-Expression, reminding you to pay attention to the details when it comes to matters of the heart. Paring back your social calendar for a while helps you stay on track with the ones you love.

Today's Virgo Full Moon occupies your 4th House of Domestic Issues, stirring up tension at home that you can't seem to avoid. However, you can put this stress to good use if you're clever. If you are being overwhelmed with too many facts, you might try to escape into your vivid imagination. Fortunately, a little conscious visualization may have a positive impact. Sift through the noise in your environment so you have the mind space to make an intelligent decision about where you go from here.

You have a deep affinity with the Moon, so you can't help but feel the earthy Virgo Full Moon's presence in your 3rd House of Communication today. However, your emotions may be floating off into the boundless blue sky because it seems like there are no walls to constrain you. Forget about justifying your feelings now; instead, just let them flow. You can always pull back into your comfort zone later on when you're ready to retreat.

You can make your contribution to a project look good on the surface with the productive Virgo Full Moon shining in your resourceful 2nd house today. But behind the scenes, something isn't quite as perfect it seems. It feels as if the simple truth keeps slipping out of your hands, just as you get close to finding it. Unfortunately, you could make things worse now by believing that you already know what's going on. But don't think that your way is the only way; time will tell which path is the best.

Today's Full Moon shines her light in your sign, flooding you with a variety of emotions. Your feelings have been building in intensity for the past few days, but now it's time to acknowledge what's in your heart, even if it runs counter to rational thought. Although you can't just ignore the facts, everything will start to make sense when you surrender your need for logic.

Your emotions are stretched as far as they can go now with the Virgo Full Moon falling in your 12th House of Destiny. Although your thoughts may be running helter-skelter, it's important to remain enthusiastic, especially if you haven't reached your destination yet. There's no payoff in being overly self-critical today. Instead of dwelling on past performances, set your sites on a new round of goals and give it your very best.

The Virgo Full Moon lights up your 11th House of Friends and Associates today, making this a great time to reassess your social position and reconsider what you want out of your relationships. You have a high level of awareness about your current situation now and realize that you're not on the trajectory you prefer. Somehow you've been sidetracked, but your new perspective about a creative project can also help you understand how to make things work more efficiently in every aspect of your life.

Today's Virgo Full Moon highlights your 10th House of Career, adding stress to your life as you review your goals for the next couple of weeks. Thankfully, your key planet Jupiter is in the mix, lifting your spirits so high that you can also see the potential of nearly anything. Don't attempt to make big changes yet; your best strategy now is to make many tiny adjustments until the current turbulence settles down.

You could reap the rewards of your work sooner than you expect because today's Virgo Full Moon in your 9th House of Future Vision demands that you quit holding on to your fears and actually go for it. But even if you fail to reach your goal now, the real news is about the doors of opportunity that continue to open. Don't get too lost in the details of a bargain; just focus on the big picture and keep inching forward on the path of least resistance.

You may be struggling with the intense energy from the Virgo Full Moon that rattles your 8th House of Intimacy today. You might even feel as if you're emotionally in over your head. Thankfully, your cleverness and resourcefulness help you maintain enough balance to keep your ship afloat, even in an imbalanced situation. Relationships will become more manageable as the reflective Moon wanes over the next few days. Soon you'll be looking back at an amazing experience from the calmer waters ahead.

This Virgo Full Moon lights up your 7th House of Partners, and with exuberant Jupiter involved, you have no shortage of great ideas. You're in communication mode, even if you have trouble finding an audience. Try not to overcompensate by talking up a storm once you get someone's attention. Tread carefully because others may need more emotional support than you can offer. Establishing clear boundaries now enables you to have healthy relationships in the future.

Be wise and tone down the delivery of your message because you probably seem more belligerent today than you intend. You might not realize how much energy you're putting into everything you say now that your ruling planet Mars is agitating communicator Mercury. You will be much more successful at telling your story if you communicate it without such a hard edge. Softening your words accomplishes more than coming on too strong.

It's challenging to keep your cool in a social situation today because you may have reached the end of your rope. You believe that you have been waiting long enough. Fortunately, you realize what has to happen next in order to restore balance to your life, but knowing what to do isn't the same thing as doing it. Turning your ideas into action can be challenging. Nevertheless, acting with firm and consistent pressure is more effective than just pushing harder and harder until something gives.

Communication at work may be strained now that your ruling planet Mercury is moving retrograde in your 10th House of Career. Your frustration could prompt you to lose your tempter if you believe your choices are thwarted. But don't bite the bait if someone tries to lure you into an open disagreement. It's smarter to avoid an unnecessary argument because it won't likely bring you closer to reaching your goals. Taking the high road demonstrates your flexibility and helps to make everyone feel better.

Postpone signing an important document or making a final agreement today, because you won't likely be satisfied with any deal that comes to a conclusion now. It may appear as if you are procrastinating, but there's a purpose to your delaying tactics. Moving quickly isn't in your best interest, so if someone is pushing you, gently push back. Don't be in a hurry; the energy will shift over the next few weeks, improving your chances of getting what you want.

You may think that you're being direct in what you say, but you have so much going on now that you probably appear more scattered than you realize. You might even begin sentences without completing them, which can drive others crazy. Eliminating a few extraneous activities from your daily schedule eases the tension for you and everyone else. You'll be able to follow through with greater efficiency with less on your mind.

You may be engaged in a battle of wits today as your key planet Mercury backs into warrior Mars. Unfortunately, there might not be a clear winner or loser no matter how intent you are on coming out on top. No one benefits if anyone feels depleted or demoralized from unnecessary fighting. Rather than aiming for victory, set your sights on cooperation so everyone involved can win.

Your co-workers may look to you for guidance today, even if you don't know what to tell them. But don't try to be profound; simply speak your truth as a compassionate observer. Your unique perspective gives you a much wider range of options than you realize. Listen to your gut instincts now; when your choice is the right one, you'll know without even thinking about it.

Be careful about what you say today because your current words inspire others to action -- even if that isn't your original intention. Ironically, you don't know how to convince anyone to join in your cause, mostly because you are so emotionally involved with the outcome that it's tough to be objective. Step back and give everyone a bit of breathing room. Then reassess your tactics before climbing back onto your soapbox and starting in on the same message again.

Your career objectives are more important than ever, but you could become so enthusiastic about your vision that you lose touch with being practical today. However, it's not wise to just improve your current plan so you can accomplish everything on your list. Instead, be creative and envision what motivates you to reach beyond the ordinary. There's a world of potential waiting right in front of you if you're ready to take the first steps on your next journey.

You may be better at formulating a winning strategy today than you are at executing it. Even if your plan is a good one, it's probably not concrete enough to make real. Fortunately, you could receive more support than you expect, but you might have to ask for help first. Remember, requesting assistance is not a sign of weakness; only the most intelligent people know when to share the burden of work and the joy of the rewards.

Although you may see the world through a very practical lens now, you might run into trouble getting your feet to stay on the ground. You analyze each situation by comparing the financial and energetic cost with the possible return. However, you don't necessarily have all the facts at your disposal today. Continue to gather information while leaving your biggest decisions for later. A rush to judgment won't help you reach your goals any sooner.

You might behave in an uncharacteristic manner today by initiating a discussion about a subject that you normally avoid like the plague. Whether you start up a politically motivated discussion or one about your needs in a relationship, you're ready to go to the mat to justify your position. But there's no need to act in a belligerent manner; you can disagree without being mean. Nevertheless, don't back down if things heat up; continue to hold your ground with a smile.

Pay close attention to the little things today, for they might unravel your day if left untended. However, once you are faced with a crisis -- no matter how small -- you would be wise to let other matters slide until the brush fire is contained. Accomplishing as much as you can early in the day ensures that you are able to focus on more important issues as they arise. Your natural inclination to take charge works to your advantage now.

Acting with common sense might not guarantee the desired outcome today, for there are social forces at work that you don't completely understand. For example, a recent conflict may be revisited for no apparent reason. Or maybe a playful or romantic interaction turns temporarily sour. Whatever happens now, don't attempt to micromanage the situation. The sooner you relinquish control, the easier it will be for you to reclaim it.

A domestic problem could overflow into your workday, yet it's crucial not to spend too much energy trying to suppress it. The more you resist revealing your feelings today, the more relentlessly they will persist. The unpleasant circumstances are a sign that something isn't working right. But don't try to fix it; instead, initiate a dialogue to get to the core of the matter. Remember there are at least two perspectives, so make sure you are an active listener now as well as an amazing storyteller.

You may feel as if you walked into the middle of an awkward situation today. It's not a good idea to take sides in a pre-existing conflict now, but you might not be able to avoid it. It seems as if anything you do could have some negative consequences, so just pick the lesser of the evils and then get on with your day. Even if uncomfortable vibes linger, their intensity will settle down quicker than you think.

You may be uncharacteristically less than confident as you worry about how your actions might negatively influence others today. However, the current circumstances have already been set into motion and you are simply acting as a catalyst. Even though others might be annoyed with you now, keep in mind that they could be thanking you by tomorrow. There's no need to prove anything to anyone, everything will fall into place on its own.

Your mental acuity may stir up ill will today as your feelings break through the awkward silence. If you have something to say, you might not be able to keep it quiet any longer. Unfortunately, you could have more impact on the situation than you realize, arousing ire in others. There is only so long the truth can stay hidden; thankfully, everyone will feel somewhat relieved later, once the storm has cleared the air.

A low-level panic could motivate you into action early in the day once you realize how much there is to do. Perhaps you haven't managed your time well, yet you still must complete the tasks on your plate. Be careful and don't drag any innocent bystanders into your scheduling drama, since that will only make everyone's life more difficult. Even if the outcome isn't looking pretty, just stay as focused as possible now. You may be pleasantly surprised with what you accomplish by the end of the day.

Your current vision of the future may be quite different from someone else's dream, and this incompatibility can agitate deeper issues of uncertainty. Although a misunderstanding could make matters worse, the real concern isn't about lack of clarity; it's about who is in control. Hold steady to your convictions at first so you are taken seriously; you can always choose to negotiate later on after you've made your point.

Even your most substantial plans can be turned inside out without warning today. You might try to flex your managerial muscles by holding fast to the current strategy, but this isn't necessarily the most effective idea. It may be in your best interest to let everything shift on its own, without exercising too much control. Luckily, life will be more stable once the dust settles and you can see more clearly.

An intense situation could become quite distracting today, so practice maintaining your concentration before anything goes awry. Make use of your organizational skills in the morning while your schedule is still clear enough and you have time to follow through on anything you start. If your objectives are well-defined, you should be able to hold on to them all day. Good time management gives you the extra edge you need.

Although it's not likely that you'll be visited by aliens today, you still might feel as if you're on the set of a sci-fi movie as strange things seep into your world. Luckily, you are more open to these kinds of phenomena now than at other times, so you can take nearly anything strange in stride. Keep your antennae tuned to the metaphysical dimensions of the universe as they contain significant information that will help you make a big decision with confidence.

Someone may disappoint you today by ignoring responsibilities or falling short of delivering on a promise. If you are counting on others, it's a smart strategy to temporarily lower your expectations now so you don't end up discouraged. Even if you're upset, don't fall into the trap of playing the blame game. It's much easier to motivate others through encouragement than guilt.

Although you may have a lot going on with other people today, make time to retreat from all the noise so you can contemplate the beautiful mysteries of the universe. Sit back and imagine the most idyllic setting for your life, and then put yourself right in the middle of this fantasy. But don't stop dreaming about your future; take the next step and share your vision with a friend. Talking about your goals helps you reach your desired destination faster.

You may be feeling unsure of your role at work today, even if you recently believed everything was rock solid. It is as if someone took away your map and guiding compass when you weren't looking. But don't be overly concerned if you are lost because this is not a long-lasting situation. In fact, your current uncertainty can lead you to exciting possibilities as you search for your new direction.

If you have sudden urges now to help others at work, remember that you're not the only one who has something special to offer. Although you can see things from your point of view, it's useful to expand your vision and move beyond your narrow perspective. Ironically, you might be receiving assistance from your friends in a way that can lighten up your feelings, too. If so, be open and graciously accept what is coming your way, even if you're not sure where the current circumstances will take you.

You need to rise above your feelings today, even if you're being pulled into the depths of your subconscious. Although you may want to uncover the source of your current confusion, you can be distracted along the way. Fortunately, you have the ability to make it up as you go along now, and too much advanced planning could even hold you back. But be careful what you conjure up in your imagination --your fantasy might just come true whether you want it to or not.

You may grow anxious if you believe that someone is trying to control you in some way. But your fear might be based on the realization that you don't have all the answers today. Instead of acting with false bravado or using smooth words to impress others, be honest and show your vulnerability. Oddly enough, admitting what you don't know opens the door to real intimacy and stronger relationships.

You might experience disillusionment if you set an acquaintance or friend up on a pedestal. Although you may have been lost in admiration, negative personality traits cannot be swept under the rug forever. Denial only prolongs the inevitable now. It is better to be prepared by accepting the truth about someone you like than to be surprised and hurt later on. Being realistic about your expectations prevents experiencing disappointment down the road.

Perhaps you should be concerned about your own job and the pressing issues at work, but your mind is on helping everyone else now. You are tempted to go out of your way today to rescue those less fortunate than you. Remember, your compassion is a sign of your emotional strength, but don't let it overtake everything else in your life. Establishing healthy boundaries so you can attend to your own needs enables you to continue your service to others.

You are imagining various ways to enjoy yourself today with the sweet Venus-Neptune conjunction playing out in your 5th House of Fun and Games. You are either in love or dreaming about it. Both ways, your daydreams feel so close you may not be able to tell if they're fantasies or real events. The problem with conjuring perfect love is that the reality never quite matches up to the vision. Don't set a romance up for failure before giving it a proper chance to unfold organically without any expectations.

A complex emotional issue at home probably isn't as complicated as it currently seems. It's just that you are even more of a visionary now than usual, but your perspective is missing the depth and detail that's needed to make an intelligent decision. Continue to mull everything all over for a while, without trying to come up with a final answer. You'll have better luck being objective tomorrow when your perceptions are clear and the channels of communication are open.

Lighthearted conversations with close friends might give rise to misunderstandings today, unless you pay careful attention to everything that is said -- both by you and them. If you keep your thoughts straight, this can be a very significant day. If you can't, even a simple business transaction may get all messed up. Say exactly what you mean and nothing more for the least confusion and the best results.

You feel extra confident today as you set new goals at work, giving you a chance to demonstrate your real worth to yourself and others. Although social interactions can be a real ego-booster, they could also reflect your current lack of clarity. Maintaining your integrity in all that you do will help you achieve the success you are seeking.

You can use your sweet demeanor to help you get what you want today with the dreamy Venus-Neptune conjunction falling in your 1st House of Personality. You are being given an opportunity to lift your own spirits with your imagination, but you also have a chance to be a shining example to others now. Demonstrate what is possible by successfully balancing your creative and spiritual practices with the work you must complete in the mundane world.

You're not so impulsive today and you may withhold your feelings to strengthen the emotional foundations upon which you are building your life. The current relationship conflicts are real, yet you know what you must do to make things right. You can try to wait for the perfect time to act, but if you are walking your talk, there is no better time than right now. Don't put off telling the truth, even if it hurts.

You're concerned with making a relationship last; there's no flash-in-the-pan show for you today. No colorful fireworks or temporary fixes will do the trick. Instead, you are concerned with getting back to the basics, so say what you mean and mean what you say. Don't beat around the bush. Just write the email and send it. However, be sure to deliver your message kindly, clearly and succinctly for the best results.

You may be particularly hard on yourself as you strive for perfection today, while others only see your well-rehearsed rituals. You appear to be a true magician, fascinating everyone with your hands waving wildly in the air. However, you have a very practical agenda now, and your stories and sleight-of-mind tricks are distractions that prevent people from seeing through your veneer. Don't waste energy criticizing yourself; take action and fix the problem, instead.

Your intuition continues to lead you in the right direction as you make big plans for the future. Somehow, you are downloading data directly from the cosmos today, so don't spend too much time questioning how you are learning what you know. Even if others don't trust what you are doing now, rest assured that your efforts will prove effective in the long run. Time is on your side and so are your instincts.

Take action while you have the chance, for what you start today will likely stand the test of time. You have an air of confidence about you that allows you to explore emotional realms that don't often feel as safe as they do now. Stabilize your life by acting on your feelings without delay. Avoid dramatic gestures; doing whatever you can to add substance to your life has a positive influence on those around you.

Relationships continue to be a challenge, but now you have authoritative Saturn acting as your guardian angel, ensuring that you don't lose touch with reality. This is an excellent time to reel yourself in and to tow the party line. Even if you don't feel particularly creative, your ideas can have significant impact today. But don't relinquish your power; instead, find a way to cooperate with others without sacrificing your heart.

You have the authority to alter the course of events at your workplace now. If you can focus on the tasks right in front of you, then you are able to have positive impact on the larger issues, too. Now more than ever, your newfound discipline and solid work ethic could lead to a significant payoff. But don't think about cashing in your chips just yet. Rewards will follow if you keep plodding along until you reach your goal.

You now have the necessary tools to create enough stability in your life that you can balance your need for fun with your desire to go the distance and reach your destination. It's as if you're preparing for a marathon because you're in it for the long haul and not just a sprint. But don't give anyone the power to talk you out of your view of reality. Ultimately, you're running your own race; it's your choice and no one else's. Trust your feelings and act on them with confidence.

It may be bothersome to have to deal with mundane issues like running errands and cleaning the house. Even if you're bored with your domestic duties now, this is a great day to do your chores because it frees your mind to reflect on your past and think about your future. Let your mind travel through time while you finish your work. Sticking to familiar routines today brings you the best chances for success in the long run.

You are determined to climb the ladder of success now and are committed to working extremely hard to prove that nothing can stand in your way. Your ambitious attitude is commendable, but your I-can-do-it mindset might lead you into trouble. If you're involved in a challenging project, stand back to reassess the situation, put the pieces together into a new strategy, and then push ahead to reach your goal.

You are in touch with your own values today and understand the impact they have on your career objectives. If you have recently been uncertain about your goals, your perspective grows sharper now. But your success won't come from doing more; your income potential goes up when you do one thing better than anyone else, instead of many things poorly. Eliminate items from your current to-do list unless they directly support your lofty ambitions.

Your life may not feel very exciting now, but you have worked long and hard to create the stability you're experiencing. Instead of trying to turn things upside down, chill out long enough to enjoy the tranquility you've earned. Letting your true feelings out of the bag today can stir up more static than intended, so it's wise to be patient for a while longer. Although self-restraint is important, don't hit that brake pedal too hard or things won't move forward at all.

Your normal weekend schedule is disrupted by the need to take care of pressing emotional issues today. You might feel that someone is imposing his or her will on you, since you prefer to stick with your usual routine. But the more you attempt to return to your regular programming, the more reality pressures you to deal with things that could grow out of control if not handled propitiously. Fortunately, behaving responsibly leads to healthier relationships and less stress all the way around.

It doesn't really matter how practical you think you are being today; your actions still may be harshly judged by a friend or partner. You might feel like someone with authority is on your case now and won't let you have your fun, even if you believe your plans are completely within reason. Negotiate with passion, but choose your battles wisely. Knowing when to let go of control makes all the difference in the world.

There may be a clash of wills today as someone attempts to pull you away from your previously scheduled activity and into a drama that is too intense for your taste. Although you might try to resist, you could cheat yourself out of an amazing experience now if you don't go along with the emotional flow. Even if the current situation unleashes deep feelings, being honest and putting everything out on the table will bring relief for everyone involved.

It doesn't matter if you were planning on rest and relaxation for the day, it may not happen. There are unavoidable emotional forces seeping into your life now. You can get as angry as you want today, but losing your temper won't resolve the complex dilemmas preventing you from taking it easy. Scrapping your original agenda in the name of cooperation makes more sense than fighting for something unimportant.

It's difficult to feel positive about your day when someone appears to be undermining your best efforts. You may have trouble with an authority figure in your life today as he or she covertly manipulates you into changing your mind about what you want. Don't take it personally; this isn't the best time to put your foot down. For now, flexibility works better than resistance.

You may think that you are being pretty open with your agenda now. Although you're not intentionally hiding anything, something strange is happening that can still be frustrating. It's awkward to deal with others today because the source of the current stress isn't obvious and you might feel like you are shadowboxing. Keep your sense of humor intact; try dancing with the unknown instead of avoiding it out of fear.

You really don't want to talk about anything uncomfortable today. You prefer to walk an emotional tightrope and hope that everyone will be sensible enough to keep quiet, too. However, this diplomatic approach won't work now if others are taking advantage of your sense of fair play. Instead, you might have to take a stand that is based on your emotions rather than on logical analysis. But don't wait until it's too late; make your feelings known and deal with the consequences as needed.

It's an intense day, filled with unspoken emotional responsibilities. Fortunately, you know what you need to do and are prepared to do it. The difficult part is that shifting conditions can temporarily put you at odds with someone close to you. Even if you are concerned about a possible conflict now, remember that you're both on the same side. Be patient; the anxiety and turmoil will settle down as the day progresses.

You may be unpleasantly surprised today when you realize that you can't escape from an uncomfortable feeling that you've been trying to avoid. Fortunately, you can finally stop running now, even if facing the truth might not be fun at first. Nevertheless, this is a real opportunity to turn a liability into an asset. Anything is possible when you stop and listen to your heart.

You sure-footed Goats usually build relationships on the solid ground of practicality and logic. However, emotional issues are shaking the mountain that you have been climbing so cautiously. Don't panic; there's no reason to run away from your feelings. Step beyond your doubt and trust the integrity of your foundations. People may let you down, but your strength and tenacity will not.

Your fear of losing what you have already gained may be cause for concern now. However, the more you try to keep your worries buried, the louder they become. Instead of pretending that everything is fine, give yourself permission to feel the stress that comes along with uncertainty. Riding the emotional waves is preferable to fighting the currents. Stay positive by working toward your goals rather than resisting what you don't want.

A conflict with a friend or family member may motivate you to attempt to fix a situation that is actually beyond your control. The real issue now is about how you hold on to patterns of behavior because of your fear of change. Old habits are being tested by new circumstances. You can struggle with an ally for the wrong reasons or you can let go of your stubborn attitude and make room for new dreams to flourish.

It might be hard to motivate yourself today, even if you have a lot on your plate. You want some downtime at first and may delay getting started on what you have to do. But later, boredom sets in and if someone invites you to play, you could be tempted to leave your chores unfinished. Do your best to remain focused until you fulfill your responsibilities and then you can reward yourself with pleasurable activities later this evening or tomorrow.

Pleasure awaits you and it may not require a lot of extra effort on your part. Going out into the world might be necessary in order to meet previous commitments, but once your obligations are met, it's time to kick back and relax. Perhaps you could plan a small social gathering at your place later in the day or you might choose to spend the day alone. Enjoy your own company ... no matter what you end up doing.

You are right on target today with your charm and wit, expressing the most likeable part of your personality. Fortunately, you can still accomplish a lot of little projects if you concentrate, but it might take a lot of effort to get going. Even if the first steps feel awkward, just start walking confidently toward your goals. Fun times are right in front of you, but don't lose track of the more mundane responsibilities on your way.

Your romantic inclinations may be all you can think about now, but you might not have an easy path to reach satisfaction. Your relationships are still a bit unstable and expressing your immediate needs could tip the balance. Of course it's important to dream, but this doesn't mean you should share every desire, especially if it's inappropriate or embarrassing. Some secrets are best kept to yourself.

You have great potential to heal an old wound today, especially if you're willing to face an issue that has been troubling you for a while.
