You are better equipped now to project your needs so that others can clearly understand your motives. Don't be intimidated or retreat from your purpose. Although you may feel magnanimous and try to be extra generous now, it's more critical to remain true to yourself and deal with any fallout later.

You may be hesitant today to talk about something that's important to you because you're afraid of the response you might receive. But your motivation becomes stronger throughout the day, urging you to take a risk and share what's on your mind. There's no need to push too hard; the slow and determined approach works in your favor. Fortunately, once the conversation is started, things will proceed with much greater ease than you ever imagined.

Your health is improving along with the rest of your life. Nevertheless, remember that too much of something good can still turn problematic. Unfortunately, at this time you are tempted to avoid negativity, whatever the cost. Graciously accept the opportunities that now come your way, but don't fool yourself with inflationary thinking. Balancing the possibilities with realism is your safest path to success.

Although love has recently been on your mind, the fierce Scorpio Moon encourages you to hold strong to your convictions, even if they differ from someone else's. Your integrity pays off as the Moon dances into happy-go-lucky Sagittarius this afternoon, freeing you up to enjoy the fruits of your beliefs. Although you're fully capable of running the whole show, it's time to let others share the responsibility so you can join the party.

It feels as if you have been in planning mode long enough; it's now time to step into your future and put your intentions to work. Do whatever you can to increase your self-worth or to stash a little extra cash in the bank. Don't be lazy; fill your upcoming week with productive activities while the planets are smiling favorably upon you.

Trying to make sense out of recent changes has required a lot of thought in the past few days. However, today you're feeling ready to jump into the next phase of your life. Thankfully, your harsh self-judgments are softening and others will shower you with the love and respect you deserve. Opportunities for growth are on the way, but you must take the initiative and open the door to let them in.

You may be overwhelmed with the depth of your emotions today, yet it's challenging to put your feelings into words. You feel more connected with your friends or family now, but you might not understand why everyone is being so nice to you. Don't fight the positive vibrations; there is nothing to fear. Be courageous and open your heart to accept the love that's all around you, even if you aren't sure that you fully deserve it.

You intuitively sense the positive energy building throughout the day. You're more than willing to do whatever it takes to demonstrate the depth of your feelings. Nevertheless, there's no reason to over-dramatize your heartfelt intentions. Don't transform a minor problem into a federal case. Instead, just respond to each situation in a straightforward manner with encouragement and compassion. You don't need a big show of affection; just let your heart shine for everyone to see.

Delicious dreams of possible pleasures make it easy to let go of the past. Previous obligations are less of a restriction today, and you're eager to start your new journey. Thankfully, you have the capability to juggle your future goals with your responsibilities in the here and now. Your satisfaction increases when you focus on both the present moment and what's ahead.

Cheerful thoughts lift your spirits today as jolly Jupiter influences your key planet Venus. A dear friend or lover can help you gain confidence about your long-term plans, making it difficult to hide your smile. There might not be a good reason to bury your positive feelings, but don't assume that success has arrived even if everything seems idyllic. You still have a lot of ground to cover before you reach your destination, so enjoy every step of the journey along the way.

Others can't help but notice you now that clever Mercury hooks up with the Sun shining in your 10th House of Career. Although it feels great to be acknowledged and appreciated, you may face a dilemma as you're torn between your desire to be effective at work and your need to be understood. Giving your emotional issues a rest for a few days enables you to catch a much-needed wave of productivity, earning you the professional respect you deserve.

Your current ideas for self-improvement might include taking a class or enrolling in an entirely new course of study. Unfortunately, these plans may need modification when you run into a logistical barrier. But this isn't time to quit, since apparent obstacles are not as overwhelming as they seem today. Strive relentlessly for your dreams; your persistence will be rewarded one way or another.

It's tricky to follow through on your best ideas now because you are easily distracted by other people. Unfortunately, their projects sound even better than yours, tempting you to set your plans aside today. Don't forget that you have your own valuable skills to bring to the table. However, it may be more beneficial in the long run to scale back a grandiose scheme so you can relax and enjoy your current situation instead of pinning all your dreams on the future.

Your hopes are high for career success now, but you must also realize how much pleasure you can derive from the safety and security of your familiar surroundings with the reflective Moon visiting your 4th House of Roots. Nevertheless, your desire for adventure clashes with your more conservative work ethic. The potential for happiness is great if you don't set your expectations so high that you court disappointment. Ultimately, a healthy dose of realism is beneficial to your pursuit of happiness.

Your common sense won't lead you astray today as long as you keep your emotional needs in check. If you overextend by agreeing to give more than you can, reality will quickly grab your attention. There won't be any free lunches now, so don't try to get something for nothing. Your best strategy is to work for what you want without expecting anyone else to carry your load or you to carry theirs. Simply changing your attitude makes room for pleasant surprises to happen.

Pleasure arrives in small increments today, even if it seems as if you should be receiving more recognition for your work. You're tempted to pack your schedule with lots of activity, but this isn't the most reliable path to happiness. Working hard won't get you there any faster, so you might as well slow down now and enjoy the ride while you can.

You may be overly optimistic now about what you have to offer others. Although self-confidence is better than self-doubt, it can still trick you into saying yes today when you should be conserving your energy. However, it's not about doing anything special to gain approval from anyone else; it's about focusing on the most positive aspects of your everyday life while deriving satisfaction from life's simple pleasures.

It's challenging to know exactly what you're feeling now because everything appears better than it actually is. Unfortunately, you might not be able to get a healthy perspective on reality as the buoyant Sagittarius Moon floats through your 12th House of Fantasy. Delay your most crucial decisions for a day or two until the magnifying lens of Jupiter passes and everything returns to its normal size.

You might not feel very compassionate now if you're too obsessed with your own sense of purpose. Your current emotional sensitivity may be lacking, yet a short window of opportunity could open that offers you great spiritual rewards if you can respond kindly. Step out from behind your fears; shower the shadows with the light of awareness. Consider what you can do to help others today because community work is also good for the soul.

You may find it difficult to accept the love that is being offered today as your personal world is peppered with complex dilemmas. On the surface, pleasure seems so straightforward, yet now there's a price to pay if you set aside your professional goals in favor of immediate satisfaction. Experiencing the spiritual dimensions of your feelings and letting go of your preconceived agenda make things easier to manage. Ironically, when you stop grasping for the correct answer, your path will finally become clear.

Your day may start with a rush, but quickly relaxes into a manageable pace, allowing you to methodically plow through your chores. You lean toward the more serious side of life now as you reevaluate what you must do to keep your dreams alive. You've had your fun; now it's time to get back to work and take care of business.

You nostalgically long for the old routine, as it makes you feel emotionally secure. Today marks a change for the better as your workload increases, motivating you to stay on track until you're certain everything is in order. Luckily, there is less time to wander off into your own insecurities with so much to do. Don't waste a moment; get busy and create a schedule that allows you to step up to the challenge and shine.

You are being offered temporary relief from the excess noise that has recently infiltrated your world. Although it's still wise to pay attention to people's motives, you don't need to get involved in every conversation you hear. Hidden agendas may be motivating others, but the intensity begins to wane and you get to quietly reclaim your life.

Use your ability to react swiftly to an advantage as someone presents you with a personal dilemma today. Normally, you can cover your feelings and hide your secret thoughts. However, now it's time to channel your emotions into external communications -- either verbal or written -- so that others are able to acknowledge and appreciate your ideas.

This is an action-packed week, yet you may feel weary from everything you have done -- and all there is still left to do. You might be quite overwhelmed because at your current pace you won't ever reach your destination. Don't base your assessment of your progress on your present exhaustion. Avoid the temptation to walk away from your responsibilities to do something more enjoyable and less stressful. Instead, find quiet satisfaction along the way to a job well done.

You sense a return to normalcy in your daily routine as the Moon moves into earthy Capricorn today, even if life will never be quite as orderly as you might prefer. You may be tempted to apply your efforts toward finding a new direction. But it's not about running away from your obligations and starting over right now. Change your attitude before proceeding further. Try doing the same old task with a renewed sense of excitement and see what happens.

You are feeling more secure in your inner world than you have in recent days, but your emotions still don't fully match the circumstances around you. It's like your friends or co-workers are talking to you, but you cannot understand what they are saying. Even so, you are still pretty certain about how you feel. Don't let anyone pressure you into a decision before you are ready to share what's on your mind.

You are better equipped to present your ideas to your peers today, even if your dreams are more serious than others prefer. In fact, intensity is a language that everyone understands now -- even if it stirs up difficult issues. Keep in mind that someone's compassion might help you feel better, but won't necessarily solve your dilemma. You have some deep thinking to do. Even if you're on this ride alone for a while, rest assured that you are on the right track.

This may be a fateful day as something happens out of the blue -- yet there is also an odd sense of familiarity about everything. This can test your understanding of life, for it seems like whatever is unfolding now has actually been planned out in some other space-time continuum. Whether or not you believe in parallel universes, today is sure to have some surprises in store for you. Remain flexible no matter how your path twists or turns along the way.

Your mood swings back and forth today, like a gigantic pendulum -- and that's exactly what the Moon is as she returns to your sign. It's challenging to trust your feelings because they are in flux, but it's vitally important to tune in to your emotions. Your heart has something crucial to tell your head, so as long as you are attempting to rationalize the incoming information, you won't pick up on the signals being sent your way. Take time for mediation now so you can receive the messages meant just for you.

Although you might concentrate on your professional responsibilities today, there is more going on than meets the eye. Your dreams are being stirred and you want to change the way you interact with others so you can be more productive. However, exerting too much control doesn't work. If you truly want to take a quantum leap now, temporarily let go of your own agenda and surrender to the unknown.

The activities that you schedule with your friends and co-workers today may end up having more than a casual impact on your life. You need the support of your social network now, so be willing to do whatever is required to earn it. Make time to kick back with your peers and share what's on your mind. The warm camaraderie can have a very healing effect on your heart.

Too much emotional attachment in a personal relationship can make you feel antsy, since you value your independence. However, you may be eager to make a commitment today without any fear of being tied down. Perhaps your current relationship is different; or, maybe it's you that has changed. Then again, you could be misleading yourself. Act with integrity and time will reveal what you need to know.

Your instincts may tell you to slow down today and you would be wise to listen to them. Although you are in tune with the emotional buzz as Venus hums happily, you might also be tempted to overplay your hand. Don't withhold affection out of fear; there's no need to keep your guard up because you are afraid that the good feelings will pass. Rest assured that what you are experiencing now can have lasting positive impact, but only if you focus on the present moment rather than your expectations for the future.

You attempt to focus on your work, but an emotional attraction may be too strong to ignore now. You cannot help yourself because there are many intriguing social opportunities tempting you to abandon your obligations. You could miss the most wonderful experience if you spread yourself too thin. You cannot do everything, so pick and choose among your options carefully today so you won't have any regrets tomorrow.

You may feel on edge today with an unsettled sensation in your belly that won't go away. Even though you want to believe your perceptions, you still need to protect yourself from possible rejection. Don't waste your time seeking additional support; your moment for expression is here. If you cultivate love instead of trying to control it, happiness can be yours.

Today you just know things that others cannot perceive. Perhaps you believe that someone is trying to control you and it doesn't sit well with you. Whatever has you concerned now, the most important thing is to stay calm. Observe what is happening and act in accordance to the external circumstances, rather than what is brought up by your own fears. You can choose to bring more stability into your life by basing your current decisions on love, and then trusting the process.

Although it seems as if you know what your partner or friend is thinking today, your intuition might raise unnecessary concerns over unimportant details. It can be tricky trying to separate the real worries from the imagined, but the solution may ultimately be in the hands of sweet Venus. Trust what's in your heart and move sensibly toward your passion. In the end, love wins out over fear.

The cosmic love-buzz is aimed at you today since your key planet, Venus, is in the spotlight; luckily, your feet are planted firmly on the ground. Even your sweetest schemes are practical now, making this an excellent time to channel your desires into stable manifestations. Go ahead and take a risk by showing your vulnerability. Revealing what's in your heart can be exactly what's needed to move a relationship to the next level.

It's all about revealing your presence in the outer world today, rather than emphasizing your normal focus on the inner dimensions of life. It's not that your subconscious is any less important; it's just that reality is offering you a chance to engage in something real that should not be ignored. Don't waste time worrying about the wrong things. Just get busy and take care of business, even if it's the business of your heart.

Whether you're playing on the field of love or friendship, you're often ready to jump in without considering what comes next. Fortunately, there's no need to spend time in endless strategizing today, because your long-term goals are in full harmony with what you are doing right now. Nevertheless, you can help yourself move along the path by sharing your feelings with someone you trust.

The possibility of love and affection is so real today that you can feel it in your bones. Your key planet, karmic Saturn, receives a lovely trine from sweet Venus. Since Venus symbolizes anything of value, including money, this alignment also brings the possibility of finalizing a deal that can bring you great rewards. Whether it's finances or matters of the heart, don't let your limited expectations get in the way of unlimited potential. Dream big; anything can happen.

Your ambitions are within reach today and you might not need to make too much of a sacrifice to get what you want. Nevertheless, reconsider your priorities and concentrate on your ambitions because valuable Venus harmonizes with responsible Saturn in your 10th House of Career. Don't over-intellectualize what's happening now. Just be thankful for what you have while continuing to work hard to make your dreams come true.

Your compassion is overflowing and you may be eager to attend to the needs of the masses today, but it's not healthy to ignore your own desires. Setting yourself up in the role of a martyr or victim doesn't help anyone in the long run. Seek ways to express your love without giving away your power. Nurturing others doesn't relieve you of the responsibility to also take care of yourself; one doesn't preclude the other.

You want to race ahead, but something is telling you to retreat. Although you might display a veneer of pessimism today, you secretly believe that it will all work out fine. Trust your instincts and rise above your tendency to doubt yourself. You don't have time for negative thinking when there's so much work to be done. Instead of worrying about what anyone else thinks, find your inner superhero and take charge of your day.

You have important issues on your mind, but circumstances may not give you the time you need to develop your ideas into useful ones. You are hesitant to cut corners because you fear that something will be lost in the translation. Push past your own resistance, since saying anything today is better than saying nothing at all.

Everywhere you look you see signs that advise you to stop and think things through before opening your mouth. Most of the time, you prefer jumping in and figuring out where you are going as you are talking, but this isn't such a great strategy today. Write down what's on your mind first; this little step can help you organize your thoughts so you're more effective in your interactions with others.

Although your conversations at work may become emotional today, you still feel comfortable with the topic of discussion. You're revitalized with the prospects of getting to the core of the matter. Your perspective is intense now, so take it easy on others. They may not have the same ability or desire to dredge up the water from the bottom of the well. Adopting a gentle approach helps you make your point without upsetting anyone in the process.

Your thoughts appear to be out in the open now, even if you are still withholding something personal. There may be another layer of your emotions lurking just beneath the surface, and unless you feel completely safe, no one will ever know. Don't try to force any issues. Trust your own judgment if you believe that keeping something to yourself for the present moment is a good strategy.

Logical analysis comes naturally to you Virgos, and today you can use your mental sharpness to be at the top of your game. Even if you aren't usually willing to delve into emotional realms, you may become engulfed by a complex interpersonal issue involving others. However, this might be a way to avoid a serious subject that needs your attention. Make the most of the day by not allowing yourself to become too distracted by someone else's drama.

It's hard to accept that things are getting better, yet they truly are improving now. You just need to get through the next couple of days of intense planning and realistic thinking. Rewards won't just show up out of the blue, but they will come if you apply yourself to the work at hand. The more you do today, the greater the recognition to follow.

You are looking at your long-term personal goals through a very practical filter now. It isn't that you have lost your ability to imagine an idyllic future; it's just that your dreams are more likely than ever to manifest as reality. Don't waste this opportunity on fantasies, for the visions will still need an anchor in the real world. Take control of your life by managing your thoughts and visualizing your future just the way you want it.

Your current path in life is moving you into deeper places and you're along for the ride. There are many lessons to learn now as you turn your attention toward deciphering what's motivating you in your search for meaning. Even if you are engaged in joyful activities today, don't be afraid to dig way down beneath the surface. Your natural buoyancy will bring you back up before you know it.

You want to spend more time with others now, but not just for lighthearted play. There are critical subjects on your mind and you need feedback from the people that you trust the most. Go ahead and share what you are thinking, since your ability to manage many complex thoughts is greater than usual today. Don't let self-doubt get in your way; just believe your friends when they say that you are on the right track.

Discomfort arises if others don't take you as seriously as you want. You're in a productive phase and you want to be recognized for your hard work. Don't worry if your coworkers aren't even aware of your efforts today. They will acknowledge your contribution in a few days if you just keep working at the best pace you can. The only thing that really matters now is getting positive results.

It's not easy to relax and enjoy yourself today because there are too many practical issues weighing on your mind. You might prefer to postpone the fun and games until you have taken care of business. This may be the best tactic for you now, but don't completely forget about enjoying yourself. Finding a healthy balance between work and play ensures the highest levels of productivity.

You may feel as if people are against you today because they might tell you something you don't want to hear. Naturally, your real allies are the ones willing to give you the honest feedback that others tend to withhold. Remember, your friends are on your side and could have important information that you need to know, so remain open to what they have to say now. Accept the support in the spirit that it was given and express your appreciation for the concern.

You might grow discouraged today as your best intentions run into a lack of support from others on the job. Understandably, you may be hesitant to share your frustration for fear of making things worse. Your best bet now is to keep your feelings to yourself, even if you believe that your associates are being negative. The proof is in the pudding; instead of complaining, put your angst to work and let your productivity speak in place of your words.

It's time to consider postponing or even canceling an upcoming trip due to responsibilities you cannot avoid. The hardest part about this change in circumstances is not altering your plans. The real problem now is that your disappointment brings up memories of a similar event from the past. Letting go of your feelings attached to the previous experience can help you focus your attention and manage the current situation more gracefully.

Deeply rooted feelings of failure may bubble up to the surface now, prompted by a difficult interaction with a loved one. A specific memory of not being able to help someone in your family can influence your actions today. However, the current events are vastly different from the past, so don't talk yourself out of trying to reach across the chasm that separates you and others. Your brave attempts to make connections will be rewarded, even if not right away.

It may be challenging to express your feelings today because it seems as if people aren't listening to you. However, chances are they actually hear every word you say; it's your fear of not being heard that makes you think you're being neglected. Go ahead and share what's in your heart now without letting your expectations get in the way. You might be pleasantly surprised with the response you receive once you give others the time to process their emotions.

If you're not feeling in tiptop shape today your body is trying to tell you something. Instead of concentrating on the possible negative side of what's going on now, make plans to revamp your exercise program and improve your diet. But don't grasp at any quick fixes; instead make small healthy changes that will have positive long-lasting effects. Rather than trying to do it alone, lean on someone you trust to support your efforts.

You might feel blocked today if you are working on a creative project. Or, if you recently made a romantic gesture toward someone special, you may be unsure that your advances were taken in the right way. In either case, discouragement will not serve you well. Try to overcome any feelings of inferiority or insecurity by doing the best you can until the path clears and you are able to express yourself with confidence. Switching up the scenery could be enough to improve your mood.

You have nowhere to share your most intense emotions today since others may not be interested in engaging the intensity of your passions. Nevertheless, you still have to interact with people at work or at home, so it might be a smart idea to temporarily keep your emotions to yourself. Instead, practicing discretion makes your day a whole lot easier to manage. However, denial is not an acceptable strategy. Channel your energy into some type of exercise for a healthy release and find a true friend who is willing to listen.

It's too late to go back and cancel your commitments if you over-scheduled yourself today. The biggest problem is that you feel you're letting someone down if you aren't on time or if you don't finish everything as promised. Instead of wasting your energy trying to reshuffle your calendar, stay focused and be as efficient as possible without worrying about what others think. Ultimately, your good intentions and unflappable determination will win out in the end.

It's time for you to build on what you recently started, even if you are questioning the practicality of your recent decisions. However, this uncertainty is natural since you may be required to put a significant amount of effort into your plan now, and you really want to be sure it's the right one. Go ahead and reconsider your strategy; but rest assured that your current work will pay off, even if it takes a while to see the results.

You may be so impatient that you are unwilling to wait for others to catch up to you. Your annoyance might even reach a critical mass today, prompting you to lose your temper. If you let your emotions get the best of you, remember that the real issue could be your own unexpressed feelings about a totally different topic. Look for the true origin of your irritation and deal with it, instead of taking it out on the wrong person for the wrong reason.

You may be thinking about something that you have kept to yourself and are now trying to decide the best time to share it with someone else. You would like to be alone so you can work out your dilemma without any interruptions, but responsibilities prevent you from retreating. Instead of getting annoyed about your current situation, try to remain flexible today because you'll have time for your inner work soon enough. You've waited this long to spill your secret, another day or two won't hurt.

You are ready to go and it seems as if nothing can stop you when you are in your impulsive phase -- not even logic. In fact, you can be self-destructive if you go ahead with your plans in spite of what you now know. Fortunately, you're able to accomplish a great deal today, but only if you are aimed in the right direction. Before you set out on your path, cool your heels while you do another round of information gathering; being fully prepared helps to ensure your success.

There may be a conflict between your needs and what others want from you now. This stress can surface anywhere that you are supposed to be in charge, whether at home, in school or at the office. Instead of concentrating on your inner dilemma, listen carefully to what others have to say to you at this time. If you are open to what you hear, resolving your uncertainty could be easier than you expect.

Your unrestrained optimism might get you into trouble if you move too quickly today. Luckily, you can see your current situation from several different angles -- as if you were an eagle flying far above the field. Simultaneously, you are entrenched with the minute details. This combination makes you extremely effective for there is power in the knowledge of what a fresh perspective brings, especially if you choose to work hard for what you want.

You might get by without experiencing any turmoil if you act directly from your gut feelings, but unfortunately, this tactic isn't a possibility now. There is too much data coming at you to ignore. The problem is in knowing which information is valid since there are so many conflicting stories swirling around. Don't get caught up in someone else's artificial timetable. You are all but assured of success if you allow yourself enough time to discern the facts from the fiction.

It's as if someone added a few extra ingredients to the mix today, and there isn't much you can do to change that. However, you're not in a weakened position, unless you try too hard to convince others of your point of view. Make sure that you're not hiding your feelings because they can get in the way of your progress if they're not out on the table for all to see. A collaborative approach leads to a win-win situation for everyone involved.

You typically react to new information with a cool, analytical head and a rational outlook. However,  you may get tangled up in the details today, so you might choose to ignore them instead. Unfortunately, this strategy is dangerous since it could be the lack of good data that motivates you to jump off the wrong cliff. Remember, facts are your friends -- even if they don't support your current scheme. Do your research and adjust your plans accordingly.

You may be unsure of yourself today, even if everything is looking positive. There might be a potential love interest that is tickling your fancy, and it feels good to play the possibilities through in your mind. Just be aware that you don't have all the facts at your disposal yet. Don't inflate your thoughts into more than the fantasies that they are now. If they continue to linger on your mind, act on them next week.

Your faith may be tested as a situation on the home front prevents you from expressing how you feel. You want to get to the bottom of the resistance today as you try to remain optimistic about something that isn't quite as positive as it appears. But don't steer away from any unpleasant details because you can create an unstable house of cards if you do. Instead, let your intellect overrule your emotions now, so you can maintain a healthy perspective while continuing to figure out your next move.

Your ruling planet, Jupiter, is in charge of bigger things, better ideas and more of everything. This cosmic magnifying lens cranks up your mental powers today, so everything seems more important than it is in reality. Be wary of blind optimism in all your dealings now, because inflated goals will settle back down to their normal proportion in just a couple of days. In the meantime, kick up your heels and have fun.

You are often the one who others seek out when they require a reality check. But now you are being tempted by circumstances to take radical action because everything looks great. Be careful and dig for the facts; it's very easy to miss an important piece of information today. Don't do anything until you have a complete picture, and then act in a responsible manner. Avoid shortcuts and gift horses; there is no free lunch at the cosmic cafe.

Your feelings are close to the surface and your emotional sensitivity is heightened now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign. Unfortunately, this moodiness might not add to your comfort level since you often prefer to remain in the logical world of thought. The problem is that your analytical abilities are not as rational today as you think. You can overcome some of your subjectivity by slowing down and listening to what others have to say first.

You are on an energetic upswing and you feel inexplicably cheerful about things in general, even if you're facing some difficult issues. Ultimately, this is a lucky time for you because you can turn your optimism into reality. However, you must perform a hard-to-do reality check so you don't drift too far off course. Put your facts in place and go for it. You are riding a powerful wave, so hold on tightly to your surfboard and enjoy the ride.

Although you may be distracted by noisy circumstances, complicated social dilemmas won't be enough to take your mind off your inner life. Your dreams won't end this morning when you get out of bed; instead, they are woven into your thoughts and are part of your day. It might be challenging to stay in the present moment, since a free-floating nostalgia seems to follow you around. Rather than trying to shake it off today, embrace the subtle energy and turn your fantasies into your friends.

You are excited about the possibilities for the upcoming week, but you may be asked to partake in more social activities than you can manage. You have a lot to do and you wish you could just get on with it -- but life is not that simple today. You're not sure why your friends and family members are making unnecessary demands of your time, but don't resist; just joyfully do what is expected of you now and sort things out later.

You feel as if you have lost the optimistic edge you had last week, yet you're still ready to move forward with your plans. Ultimately, you think your ideas will work; it's just that you're unsure about your role in the world now. This uncertainty weighs heavily on your mind, so don't waste energy.

You are receiving intuitive hunches about your future, but they might not be perfectly aligned with your present actions. Although this dilemma can be a source of worry, there are forces at work that are beyond your comprehension now, and logical analysis won't bring you the final answer you seek. Practice living with the uncertainty; you'll feel a welcome sense of relief when you stop trying to figure everything out.

Establishing clear boundaries may be problematic today. You're in a position to better understand how others see you and it isn't quite what you expect. You can settle into an emotional place now, affording you the ability to absorb the feelings of those close to you. On one hand, this empathy widens your perspective on relationships. On the other hand, you need to practice distinguishing other people's feelings from yours. Decisions will become easier to make once you gain more clarity about your own emotions.

You may be your own worst enemy today if you waver between spacing out and concentrating on your chores. You have a sense of instability as the day progresses, and you wish you could just stay on track until you fulfill your responsibilities. But your thinking is fuzzier than usual now so just let your thoughts drift for a while. Be gentle and don't judge yourself too harshly; finish tomorrow what you don't accomplish today.

You are still riding a creative wave, but you may develop a sense of urgency today. You might believe that you'll lose your chance if you don't complete an unfinished task. However, your deadline is only an illusion; just because your excitement is waning, your inspiration doesn't need to die. Keep your eyes on the destination; your determination and patience will bring you the rewards you seek.

It's been pretty quiet on the emotional front lately, but you can feel your passions flowing again now that the Moon is back in a water sign. Although it probably is refreshing at first, the intensity might distract you from the simple chores you want to finish. Don't try to suppress your powerful mood changes; your extreme reactions are a clear indication of the zest you have for life.

You might be in the midst of a dilemma that pits your head against your heart now. You are moving one way while your emotions flow in a different direction. Unfortunately, you can't serve two masters, especially if they are in strong disagreement. You may grow frustrated because there's no quick and easy way to resolve this situation. Inaction could be your best move today since the conflict will likely settle down after tomorrow's New Moon.

You may be feeling an awkward sense of anticipation as you imagine easier times ahead. However, there are still a few obstacles that need to be conquered first. Although you're a natural planner, it's smarter to fly by the seat of your pants now. Circumstances are shifting so rapidly that you're better off being flexible in your approach rather than committing to a predetermined path.

Financial matters may be troubling you now, and it's about time you get to the bottom of it. Perhaps an accounting error has just come to your attention today and it is unsettling. Thankfully, this fiscal crisis might not be a big deal at all, but the elusiveness of an immediate solution bugs you. Keep your money on your mind but don't panic; you'll find resolution, but maybe not for a couple more days.

The reflective Moon is back in your watery sign now, giving you the opportunity to tune into your own body and fully experience your feelings. Sometimes, your emotions get pushed off to the side while you focus on external events and circumstances. Exploring the shadows today will ultimately recharge your emotional batteries.

You aren't as concerned with what anyone thinks now that the Pisces New Moon falls in your 12th House of Privacy. However, keeping secrets can get you into trouble today, especially if you don't tell others what you want while still expecting them to know. Your desires will probably slip out into the open anyhow, so don't waste energy trying to hide them from those you trust. Give yourself a few days to get your whole story out; you have more time than you think to make your point.

Today's Pisces New Moon occurs in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, encouraging you to transform your fantasies into reality. Nevertheless, you're still re-evaluating where you want to go now, so invite a friend or an associate into your dream-world and share your imaginative wanderings. Talking about your future helps you to gain the clarity you need to take your plans to the next level.

It's challenging to just be yourself today because the Pisces New Moon is in your 10th House of Responsibility. This indicates there is a particular role you need to play in the outer world. Naturally, you're a willing participant, but it means that you'll have to keep your personal life out of the picture. Protecting your emotional privacy shouldn't be too much of a problem now; it's a small price to pay for the success you see coming just around the next corner.

The Pisces New Moon in your 9th House of Inspiration fills you with a quiet sense of wonder and beauty today. It's been a tough few days and you realize that the tides are now ready to change again. Your thoughts are focused on the future instead of the past, so it's time let go of your baggage. Your security is dependent on what you feel in the present moment and not tied to what you once had. Dreaming about your next big adventure is the first step to making it happen.

It's tricky to shift into full gear today because the watery Pisces New Moon in your 8th House of Deep Sharing makes it difficult to take care of your own needs. Everything seems to be slightly out of focus and you might not be able to get a handle on the relationship dynamics you are experiencing. Thankfully, a bit of discomfort doesn't indicate a bad day. Nonetheless, if you loosen up and let others take control, interpersonal communication should flow along quite nicely.

You might feel as if your vitality is low since the diffusive Pisces New Moon is opposite your sign. Interactions may take on an adversarial tone today, even if there's no real issue pulling the sides apart. In fact, it's important that you realize whatever conflict comes your way now is likely to be more about your own internal dilemma -- even if it seems to be originating from someone else. You can learn a valuable lesson about your own resistance to change from your current experience.

You may feel a subtle annoyance as something beyond your control keeps recycling back into your life. Even if you attempt to fix the problem, it resurfaces in new forms -- however, continue working on a solution. If you just throw your hands up in frustration, things could get worse. Thankfully, the Pisces New Moon in your 6th House of Details means a tiny adjustment to your attitude could be all that's needed to set your world in order.

Happily, you're able to lighten up and enjoy hanging out with friends today. However, you're also aware that the bigger issues haven't gone away. Today's Pisces New Moon activates your 5th House of Love and Play, which could put the spotlight on romance. An innocence that slipped away has a chance to return now, but you must make an effort to invite it into your life. Open the door and let the good times in.

The imaginative Pisces Moon rattles your 4th House of Foundations today, creating a personal dilemma. Even if you have amazing fantasies about mountain climbing, downhill skiing or sky diving, you must take care of things closer to home before you can embark on your next big adventure. Your head is telling you one thing -- and if you are rational, you would listen. However, your heart is telling you something else -- and you must fearlessly follow your dreams.

You are entering a new phase of your journey now as you try to relax the restrictions that have held you back from fully expressing your thoughts. Even if the potential ramifications of your message are scary, you must trust your intuition today. The surreal Pisces New Moon falls in your 3rd House of Information, and you're moving through deeper waters now. Your old compass and maps won't be much help in navigating your way out; relax and let your imagination be your guide.

You may be thinking about how you can increase your income now that the Pisces New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Self-Worth. But your ideas could be based on unrealistic fantasies because seven planets are lurking in imaginative Pisces. Fortunately, your dreams can come true if you take the time to separate out the practical ones and focus on them. Setting reachable goals can make all the difference between failure and success.

Let yourself dream about the possibilities of the year ahead, because today's New Moon in your sign marks a new beginning for you, Fish. Allow your fantasies to carry your thoughts far and wide. Make your wish based upon what's in your heart rather than what other people expect of you. There will be plenty of time later on to create a more realistic plan; for now, your imagination can be your greatest source of inspiration.

No one is certain about what you're going to do next because you are ready to take back control of your life. Although your fantasy world has been overactive for the past few weeks, it's time to move your dreams out into the real world. Fortunately, now that your key planet, Mars, is back in your sign, you can call on that famous Aries courage to overcome any fear. Just don't expect too much too fast, since it could be a few weeks before your plans begin to take shape.

You're shifting gears to move into a phase where your imagination becomes just as important as reality. Daydreaming can be a creative process today, but there are problems with losing yourself in fantasy. Your beliefs could limit your success if you are holding on to unconscious patterns. Look within and clear your mind of the fears that prevent you from accomplishing the things you want to do.

Hang on tightly ... because you're about to get a jolt of energy in the form of eager Mars entering your 11th House of Friends. You'll find yourself more involved in social activities, but you could have so much fun that you exhaust yourself. Balance your own individual needs with the needs of your companions and associates. You can have a blast this month if you don't take your revelry too far.

If you are thinking about a career move, it's time to put your plans into action. Luckily, you'll have more energy to apply to your job over the next few weeks, but you still must be cautious with your time. You can inadvertently threaten others -- even your boss -- if you push too hard. This may lead to wasting energy on arguments that could have been easily avoided. Clarify your goals as soon as possible, then start working steadily to meet your objectives.

Red-hot Mars enters a fellow fire sign today, prompting you to take a risk to make the most of this time in your life. You have a renewed sense of enthusiasm for the next several weeks and are eager to plan your future, to travel or to begin a new course of study -- anything that helps you expand your horizons. However, you may find that you are defending indefensible positions if you overly identify with your beliefs. It's better to quietly lead by example than to try to convince anyone that your views are the right ones.

The need to redefine a current relationship may begin to subside, but new experiences deepen these issues ... even if they become more subtle. You want to push ahead with your own agenda now, but you're reluctant to offend anyone close to you. Inevitably, your mixed feelings can muddy the waters and make solutions more difficult to find. One thing is for certain: you need to rely on others to get to where you want to go. The temptation to go off alone only complicates matters more. The choice is still yours to make.

Now that warrior Mars has entered feisty Aries and your 7th House of Partners, you could become more assertive in all types of relationships. You are motivated to initiate decisive action now -- something that's often a struggle for you. Don't wait until the other person brings up an issue; think about what you want to do and then do it. As long as you act within a context of cooperation -- which is usually easy for you -- things will work out for the best.

Your current spunky attitude may bring some tricky issues to the surface now. External circumstances require you to work hard and to perform at a high level of expertise while doing your job. But you want to do certain things your own way, only to find your path is being blocked. Try not to internalize your frustration because you might court illness if you do. The solution is to act with integrity and take pride in your work, regardless of everything else.

You are now entering a particularly playful and creative period as irrepressible Mars skips into your 5th House of Spontaneity. You can experience excitement through activities with children, or you may set aside your responsibilities and seek new ways to enjoy yourself by connecting with your inner child. Either way you choose today, jump in and walk your talk. There's no room to do anything halfway now, so don't hold back.

You may not be able to avoid the big changes in your personal life, yet you're secretly excited about the prospects. There is a lot to do around the home and, thankfully, you have the ambition to start projects now and actually complete them. If possible, maintain a low profile today, especially in the workplace. It may be difficult to withhold your emotions, but your discretion is worth it. You can avoid some of the drama that otherwise may arise due to differences of feelings.

Interactions with close friends and co-workers begin to raise the noise level of your daily routine. You are more direct and expressive than usual, and your eagerness to converse might unintentionally initiate more conflict. You tend to take things more personally now, so avoid pointless arguments if at all possible. Dramatic showdowns are just a waste of everyone's energies and won't make anyone happier ... no matter who wins the fight.

Be wary of making impulsive decisions today, especially relating to how you spend your money. You're inclined to purchase something you don't really need, or you might buy it for the wrong reasons. Problems arise when you over-identify with material things; happiness must come from within and not from what you own. Take stock of all the blessings in your life, and you may discover you have everything you need.

Your natural ability to pump more adrenaline into a situation might hit a speed bump now as you struggle to maintain the hectic pace. Thankfully, you won't need to worry so much if you just tone down your energy level a little bit. Do it voluntarily, or reality might just have to slow you down without your permission. It's a smarter strategy to build momentum throughout next week, rather than trying to hit maximum speed today.

The Moon and Mars are visiting your 12th House of Dreams today, stimulating your imagination. Unfortunately, you may try to resist the feelings that are emerging. It's not that you don't appreciate the beauty of a lovely fantasy, but you have a lot to do and might be fearful of falling behind on your responsibilities. Establishing healthy boundaries helps to keep you tethered to the real world until you have time to make your escape.

Although you may be in the middle of your workweek, you're not eager to surrender your social life. Needless to say, your desire to hang out with your friends could cause problems. But it's not just about being around your peers; you are also concerned with your role in the community. Unfortunately, others might not be willing to give you the latitude you want. Don't stir up any unnecessary conflicts today. Go ahead and stand up for your convictions, but don't flaunt your strong opinions unless it's absolutely necessary.

The spontaneous Aries Moon is moving through your 10th House of Public Behavior, drawing you out of your comfort zone. Still, it's crucial to find time to retreat back into physical or metaphysical places where you feel emotionally safe. Although your world may be infiltrated by unfriendly people today, don't get caught up in their superficial games. For the next few days, your real growth continues to occur on a deeper and more internal level. Nevertheless, you must find a way to balance your personal needs with your professional ambitions to maximize your potential.

You are doing your best to live in the present moment today, and you may do it with so much gusto that you upset others. They might think your blind optimism is glossing over negative factors that also need to be taken into consideration. Pay attention to your motives just to make sure you don't take initiative for the wrong reason. A little sensitivity and forethought can assure that your actions are well-received.

You must make decisions that involve the complex needs of others, distracting you from your regular routine and disrupting your day. However, burying your head in the sand isn't a viable strategy -- you have plenty to learn by facing a messy situation now. You can gain experience navigating through the seas of change today, even before you have all the facts. Thankfully, using your intuition frees you from the restraints of too much analysis.

It's challenging to find enough time to take care of the personal chores that continue to pile up. Instead of trying to do everything, decide which tasks are the most important and let the others slide for a few more days. If you work too hard, you could start to feel resentful of those folks who don't seem to be struggling as much. Taking a few short breaks throughout the day enables you to return to your unfinished business with a lighter heart.

Your world would be a better place today if you can just resolve a pesky problem that is bugging you. You are craving something new in your life, a memorable addition to feed your soul and revitalize your daily regimen. But, simultaneously, you need the regularity of habit and the structure of routine. Find a way to mix the two and you'll be on your way to achieving greater satisfaction. Dare to think outside of the box and you will find your solution.

Your unrestrained optimism may have you making promises you cannot keep, but you will be able to overcome nearly any odds if you have a practical plan. Your positive attitude can increase the anger of someone who challenges your efforts today. Instead of wasting time waging battle now, channel your enthusiasm and energy directly into your work to keep your day on the right track.

The most significant changes might not be happening in your outer world where everyone can see. Although some people may respond to you with unbridled enthusiasm and encouragement, there could be some quiet resentment developing beneath the surface. Your uncharacteristic eagerness now could be a bit unnerving for your friends, but you don't have to let their anxiety rub off on you. Shine your light brightly for all to see.

You're all over the map today because there's so much happening in your world -- making it challenging to keep up with everything and everyone. Tread lightly because your interactions with others might be negatively affected by your unspoken fear of being overwhelmed. Paying close attention to how your friends and associates react can help you to avert conflict, helping you reach your destination on time.

You're overly concerned with maintaining your material security today, especially if you believe that the power base at work is subtly shifting. Don't try to hold on to the status quo because your world isn't static now ... and your rigidity only increases the tension. Take a fresh look at your finances, but don't make any long-lasting decisions yet. A little change will do you good.

You may get so excited that it's difficult to contain yourself. However, it may be obvious to you later in the day that you overreacted, which, in turn, makes the situation even more awkward. Thankfully, smoothing the ruffled feathers is easier than you expect if you put your mind to it. Enjoy the calm after the storm. Take a few deep breaths; after all, you've earned the right to relax.

You have arrived at the Last Chance Cafe once again, although you are sure that this time it's really your final opportunity to get it right. However, you are wrong once more. It may be true that you need to tie up as many loose ends as possible before the Moon enters your sign this afternoon, but whatever isn't completed will still be there later. In the meantime, give yourself permission to settle into the evening and reflect on the blessings in your life.

Concentrating on your work may seem nearly impossible now because there are so many interesting diversions that catch your attention. Often, your insatiable curiosity leads you down fantastic avenues of exploration. However, today it just makes you feel annoyingly scattered. Ultimately, you can reach your destination by reminding yourself to return to your original goal each time you lose focus.

You might grow tired of being responsible for the happiness of everyone else because it may seem as if that's all you have been doing lately. Although you aren't likely to walk out on your obligations, it could be time to restore some healthy balance to your life. Begin by acknowledging what would make you feel happy. Then, slowly start to move in that direction ... even if it means taking some emotional risks. Occasionally, there's nothing wrong with others taking care of themselves.

If you feel like you're riding positive waves of change, it's wise to wear a life jacket as you head into rougher waters. A local storm isn't necessarily an indication of a serious issue, it might simply be a sign that you need to slow down enough to review your plans. Don't worry about solving every problem that surfaces; just navigate your way around the obstacles until you find a safe place to land.

You have delved deep enough into psychological intrigue and drama, and now you're ready for a simpler approach to life. Even if sweet pleasures are elusive earlier in the day, you can rest easy knowing that some fun is on the way later on. Making the right choices today sets the stage for peace and harmony to follow.

An intense emotional engagement with someone special may have taken a lot of energy recently, but now it's time to turn this positive interaction into something more meaningful. It's as if a gentle waltz is bridging into a powerful tango right in front of your eyes. And, as the passion increases, so does your pleasure. Don't resist it; accept the current positive changes as a reward for your recent efforts. Lead with your heart and happiness will follow.

You feel as if you have a secret weapon today, but you can't tell anyone about it because your power comes from what you don't say. Some may think that your charisma is a by-product of your sexual energy, but it actually goes beyond that and into spiritual realms. Your magnetism remains strong as long as the mystery continues. Keep your motives camouflaged for now and, in general, don't say more than you must.

You may have recently spent a lot of time and energy pursuing pleasure instead of getting your work done. Now it's time to pay the piper by catching up on your chores, even if it means saying no to a leisurely lunch or an evening out with your friends. However, attempting to do everything at once only creates more complications. The simplest route to success is reached by prioritizing your tasks and then doing them in order, one after another, until you are finished.

The first part of the day may be frustrating because it feels like you're running around in circles. Even your most reliable practices don't seem to contribute to your progress today. A smart strategy is to relax without giving up. Luckily, you should be able to find your rhythm later in the afternoon and can quickly make up for lost time.

A wave of exhaustion may wash over your body today, requiring you to stop and reconsider how much you have already done this week. Unfortunately, you still have a lot to do, yet your heart might not be in your work right now. Accepting your fatigue can be a crucial first step in overcoming it. Take some time out in order to recuperate; you'll be much more efficient once you return to your work fully rested.

This is a tortoise and hare kind of day -- and you are now playing the role of both of these characters. You're off to a fast start as the hare and you are ready to run your paces. But you grow smarter as you consider how you can sustain your efforts. Slowing down like the tortoise makes a lot of sense to you, and the sooner you do it, the longer you'll be able to last.

It's nearly impossible now to separate your fundamental beliefs from what you need to do on a practical level. Breaking down a complicated job into the simplest steps helps to align your life with your core values. There's no room today for fuzzy thinking or actions that are inconsistent with your inner purpose. Starting small enables you to act with integrity throughout the day.

Thankfully, no one will be able to distract you from your agenda today, or talk you into doing any kind of trivial task. Others are quick to realize that you know what you're doing and your determination won't be swayed. However, don't be afraid to join forces if you meet someone who shares your practical perspective. Forging a partnership now could create an unbeatable team that is greater than the sum of its parts.

You are inclined to let others know about your vision for success now, but just be aware that they may not want to hear about your next grand scheme. You might feel as if your parade is under a dark cloud ... and you certainly don't want to march in the rain. Rather than pretending that everything is fine, a temporary retreat could be in order while you wait for the weather to clear. Luckily, you can use the extra time to improve your plan and increase your chances for a sunny outcome.

You're often able to talk your way out of a funk, especially if you have a trusted friend who will listen to you as you wander around in your imagination. Unfortunately, something just won't stop bothering you today, even if you share all of your secrets. An unresolved feeling may be lurking in the deep waters off the foggy coast of your consciousness. But don't worry, it's not as scary as it seems at first. Trust your intuition as you develop a creative plan; it might not be logical, but it could just work.

You may feel rather inflexible today, resisting even casual social commitments. You don't like the idea of being tied down to someone else's schedule at all. You want to follow your own agenda and you won't likely surrender without a struggle. Unfortunately, this kind of stubbornness can create more problems than it solves. Consider taking a less severe stance in your dealings with others now. Friendly cooperation is your secret weapon for success.

Responsibility is calling, but you don't feel like answering the phone today. You might wish that your voicemail could just take a message, but you realize that you must get involved. As you are pulled into the conversation, it may bother you that the dialogue is so visionary, without practical application. Don't push your beliefs onto others now; a creative approach can still be useful if you let the discussions take a natural course. Wait a few more days before making any final decisions.

Even your best ideas can get hung up today, especially if too much information comes at you from all directions. Paying attention to the details helps, but you might be sidetracked by other people's issues. Unlike some days, there's no need to judge the validity of the data now. Your determination will keep you moving forward as you bounce back and forth between the general and the specific.

You are no stranger to power plays and control issues, so you're quickly annoyed if an inflexible person is limiting your ability. You may feel the tentacles creeping toward you and attempting to tie up your free will. Thankfully, this type of resistance won't stop you because you can retain parts of your life that others cannot reach. Hold on to your destiny by keeping your desires to yourself today. Just remember to open up when the time is right or you will be playing alone.

You might take a risk today by sharing something meaningful at work. Unfortunately, in the context of your disclosure, the other person may not understand what you are really saying. It seems to you as if it's their problem, for you are being as clear as possible. Maybe it's not about what you are expressing; it's more about your audience. If you aren't getting your message across, consider retreating until you find someone more receptive.

Gentle waves of positive energy flow through your life today, but you still must be careful about your attitude. The devil may be lurking in the details that you miss. Usually, being realistic is your most successful approach, but an extra touch of optimism goes a long way now. Nevertheless, keep your feet on the ground if you want to succeed.

You might not be in a social mood today, even if others expect you to lighten up. Having fun on command isn't your idea of a good time. You would rather talk about your latest plans for financial independence or the brightest business idea that's running through your brain. It's healthier to be true to your own needs than to pretend happiness just for the sake of someone else.

You have something on your mind and you want to share your thoughts now that the Moon is occupying your 3rd House of Communication. Unfortunately, you might feel as if you should have said it a couple of days ago. It may be more difficult to open the door to a tough subject now, but it will only get harder as the days progress. Thankfully, you can make steady progress in discussions if your heart is genuinely invested. Don't let anyone dissuade you from expressing your truth.

Reconsidering your own motives now may bring a critical realization to the surface, yet greater awareness also presents additional choices. Circumstances might require you to decide between taking care of yourself and assisting another person through a rough spot. It could be useful to know why you are so eager to fix someone else's problems before you attend to your own. Establishing sensible priorities is easier once you're certain that your intentions are in the right place.

You may feel a sense of resignation sweep through your thoughts today as you see things from a new point of view. Although you believe you know the truth, you don't have to rush in and solve the problem. But your acceptance of a difficult situation shouldn't be an excuse for laziness. There's still plenty of work to do and even if it takes time to build the necessary momentum, it's wiser to start sooner than later.

Even your most casual actions can give others exactly the inspiration they need today. Imagine what you could do if you consciously commit to go the extra mile. Don't be afraid to push past your justifications for doing less. Your hard work is rewarded, but not in the way you might expect. Instead of increasing your income, you will be acknowledged for your contribution which, oddly enough, could make you happier in the moment than earning more money.

Thinking about the future now reminds you of the past. In particular, you might remember an old emotional or physical wound, but you really don't have the time to reminisce. You have too much to do in your life today, so indulge your flashback and then return to the current situation. Although you can't change your history, you can use the memory to positively impact the present.

You're tempted to rescue every lost animal and hug every needy child today. Your compassion is real, but it may be fueled by your own feelings of insecurity. You won't fix your emotional wounds by helping others, but you might feel better for a while. More importantly, you can bring sunshine into the life of someone else who really needs it.

Your hard work may be enough to get you through a difficult time today, although you probably realize that solving the underlying issue is more complicated. Tensions have been brewing for a while and could take additional time to fully address. In the meantime, don't procrastinate. There are specific things that need to be done now and you are the one to do them. Take it slowly; you won't be able to plow your way through the entire list in one day.

A feeling of competence helps to put you at ease today, but the situation probably isn't quite as manageable as it seems at first. One way to be of service now is by acting as a cheerleader because you can encourage people to perform beyond their normal levels. Dig deeply into your own psychological arsenal and use whatever tools you have to inspire others to fulfill their potential.

Dealing with a stubborn person today might make you realize how rigid you can be, too. Although single-mindedness is an admirable trait, it may also be a recipe for disaster if two bull-headed people remain inflexible for too long. Consciously look at the issue from a different point of view. It's not about being right or wrong; it's just about finding a middle ground and proceeding from there in good faith.

Giving voice to self-doubt can make everything seem more difficult today. Thankfully, your recent tendency toward scattering your energy may temporarily become less of a problem now, but you could retreat so hard and fast that you don't make any progress at all. Acknowledge your apprehension, while consciously using logic to find a way to overcome it. Maintaining a rational approach is the fastest route to regaining your confidence.

You are more relaxed now that your common sense is back in the driver's seat. Although there's still a lot of background noise in your life, the energy seems to be settling down a bit. You can help your cause by cutting back on unnecessary activities. The more you focus your attention today, the easier it will be to regain control over your daily routines.

A conflict between what you currently want to do and what you have already promised can distract you from being productive. You could waste precious time today arguing with a friend or family member. However, you still might not be able to convince others that you're right, no matter what you say. Don't try to force resolution now; let unresolved matters remain that way until the energy shifts in a day or two.

A powerful wave of compassion might motivate you to sacrifice something important today so you can help another person -- maybe even a member of your own family. Naturally, it's commendable to come to the aid of someone you love, but it isn't as praiseworthy if you then choose to play the role of a martyr. Consider the consequences of what you're doing before you do it. Although it's not beneficial to anyone if you're setting yourself up to be a saint, true love can be a powerful healing force.

You may be tired of relying on your intuition and look forward to basing decisions on more reliable information once again. The waters that have passed under your bridge are already heading out to open sea, so let go of whatever has happened in the recent past. You're ready to reclaim your strength as the enterprising Aries that you truly are. It's time to apply your sense of purpose and fearlessly embrace the future.

You're able to speak directly from your heart now, even if you are still unsure how you plan to fulfill your personal needs. Luckily, your sensitive words touch the hearts of others and they won't be able to resist your charm. But don't push anyone to provoke an immediate reaction; it could take several days to see any results. Initiate communication today and then let the conversation unfold organically.

You're particularly sensitive to change now as your key planet Mercury turns direct on the same day the Moon returns to your sign. The mental winds are shifting quickly, but the game you have been playing is not over. You are simply being placed on notice that the integration cycle of the last three weeks has reached completion. Stop the endless analysis and just reach for new experiences before the opportunity passes.

You may feel a special connection to your past as dreams and fantasies capture your imagination. Ultimately, you're not very interested in looking back; you have your mind set on an upcoming adventure. But something that was said weeks ago might resurface and continue to grow more important over the next few weeks. Even if you don't get a mercurial reminder notice, prioritize the unfinished business that is piling up on your plate. Start now, before it is too late.

Your need to communicate is accentuated today, but it may not yet be apparent to anyone else. You might not say everything you are thinking, even if you know what's going on. Give yourself permission to be cautious because it's crucial to establish trust during this transitional time. Don't let anyone cajole you into premature action. Make your move only when you are truly ready.

You feel very excited as your key planet, Mercury, turns direct today. However, it may be challenging to express what's on your mind, since sharing what you're thinking could alter things in ways you would rather not change. Keep controversial thoughts to yourself for a few more days, even if you're bursting at the seams with anticipation. On the other hand, be prepared to get your best ideas out into the open as circumstances permit.

Your thoughts are quite original today, but it could be difficult to bring them to their logical conclusions. Even if you feel as if you're on top of your intellectual game, there is an emotional uncertainty that prevents you from pushing to your final mental destination. Take a deep breath and rest assured that you'll arrive just in time. You won't fall behind schedule if you simply follow your heart.

A methodical approach enables you to get to the source of your own intense emotions today. Fortunately, you can find calm in the center of any storm. Intellectually, you may already realize there's nothing to fear, and that you derive strength from the stillness. However, as clever Mercury starts to move forward again, be ready to move into new intellectual territory without giving up the sense of peace you have found.

Imagine how much you could accomplish if you were able to hold time, itself, motionless, even for just a little while. Ironically, you might get flashes of this feeling now that Mercury hangs still in the sky, giving you the illusion of speeding up as everything else seems to slow down. But don't fritter away your ability to focus your thoughts today. Use your newly found mental powers to express your real self.

Something feels amiss as you receive signals that tell you not to trust your emotions today. Although your reliance on facts over feelings may work to your advantage, this isn't a good time to shut down your heart. There are powerful transformations unfolding in your life, and staying in touch with your inner world gives you a better chance to make intelligent decisions now.

Don't waste your precious time and energy spinning wheels that take you round and round in endless circles today. It's pointless to obsess over goals that are out of reach. A better strategy is to simply let go of a plan that hasn't come to fruition. Carefully review the past few weeks and make a conscious decision to eliminate something that continues to hold you back. It's amazing how great you can feel when your load is lighter.

You have been given plenty of time to solve a problem that has bothered you for the last few weeks. Now, with Mercury turning direct in your sign, be ready to make a decision even if you thought you already chose your final answer. But don't sacrifice your own integrity. Consider what is most important to you and then make your move accordingly.

Although unexpected events may bring confusion into your life, you're able to shift gears and accept what's happening by looking beyond your personal needs. An overactive imagination can impact your relationships for better or worse. But it's not easy to distinguish fact from fiction now, so don't bother trying to figure everything out today. Instead, allow your dreams to lead you for a while longer, but don't wander so far that you can't find your way home.

Although your feelings are aroused today, it may seem like the storm will soon be over and there's nothing you need to do to speed it along. However, it helps if you can get past your fear of change because what you learn now could be quite exciting, especially as it impacts your social goals. Don't let other people's judgments influence your thoughts or behavior. Just maintain your own integrity and you will continue to grow.

Listen carefully to your inner voice now that the reflective Moon is in your sign, encouraging you to forget logic and step into more intuitive spaces. There's no need for flowery explanations; you already know the truth. Sometimes precognition can make you feel uncomfortable as you struggle with the reliability of your thoughts. Thankfully, a small dose of emotional detachment is enough to help you be a more objective observer of your own life.

You may be more confident of your feelings today if you let them drift into more spiritual realms. Take a chance and step beyond your personal limitations or you might be tempted to withdraw behind your castle walls. Remember that security comes from withstanding change, not avoiding it. Fortunately, you are stronger than you think.

A romantic attraction is confusing if you are grappling with whether or not your feelings are real. But knowing that you're temporarily lost in a fantasy isn't enough to deter your escape from reality. Your dreams can make it difficult to reconcile your current trajectory with your plans. Thankfully, you have a better chance to succeed if you throw away your driving instructions and trust the signs from your intuition.

You might find it challenging to believe something that you previously thought was real. You aren't sure what changed, but your need for clarity is still being thwarted. Let go of your illusions about being in control now. Relaxing the death grip you have on the rational world today enables you to more easily tap into the depth of your imagination.

Don't give up now, even if you're unsure of what you should do next. Your emotions are a bit out of control and it's difficult to know who to trust. But this temporary confusion isn't necessarily problematic, for it also presents plenty of opportunities for growth. You don't have to pretend that you have it all together today if you're not feeling it. Ultimately, following your intuition  reveals the best path to your destination and your faith will light the way.

You may feel as if something has returned from the past, and your irrepressible desires are sparking an emotional renewal. Your concentration may drift today, but you are still certain about what feels good. During this time of heightened awareness, focus on your heart's desire and do everything you can to make your dreams come true.

An unfulfilled desire from your childhood may take you for a trip down Memory Lane today. You could remember something that you haven't thought about for a long time as pictures from the past rush into consciousness. Feelings of love are accentuated, even if your common sense is not. Don't worry about the wrong things; allowing your heart to open can also help it to heal.

You want everything to move along faster now that Mercury is turning direct in your 3rd House of Communications. You may be struggling to balance your busy schedule with your emotional needs.
