Make the best of what you have because your time for major decisions has temporarily passed. Fortunately, there isn't any reason for major concern because a lost opportunity will come knocking on your door again.

There's no need to withdraw into isolation to recharge your emotional batteries today. You are eager to enjoy the casual companionship of your peers and associates at work now, and this kind of social activity can rejuvenate your soul. Thankfully, your creative juices flow easily in a friendly environment, so don't hold back from playing with others and letting your light shine.

Your current blend of charm and flexibility enables you to convince others that your point of view is a valuable one. However, you may be annoyed, or even offended, by someone who is shallow or insensitive. You might be tempted to hide your feelings if expressing them destabilizes your day. However, don't take the easy way out by acting cool; overcoming your fears and saying what's on your mind ultimately brings you closer to your goals.

You may try to escape an inevitable clash with your own emotions today, but this evasive tactic won't likely work. A conflict with someone close to you throws your feelings right back in your face, even if you attempt to turn away. Denial is just not an option now. Deal directly with your fears in the moment or getting a handle on the situation will be more difficult once the Moon slips into sensitive Cancer this afternoon. Staying present and talking things out could bring the peaceful resolution you need.

Incisive thoughts prompt sound decisions that may be very beneficial to you financially today, but it's doubly important that you pay close attention to the details. Consider all possible solutions by keeping your mind open to what others say. Adopting a flexible attitude and being more adaptable in your approach improves your chances for success ... there are more ways to achieve your goals than you think.

You have direct access to valuable information today that is usually out of your reach. Fortunately, you can learn whatever you need to know if you are willing to put in the extra effort. Although you may be inclined to do more research, honoring your intuition could reveal important insights that offer you both inspiration and guidance. Spending some time in meditation or prayer might be the way to uncover the answers you seek.

Typically, you prefer to observe and contemplate before taking action, but you might feel the urgency to dive right into a critical situation today. Slow down and think twice before acting on an impulse, because you might inadvertently pour fuel on to a fire that you're attempting to extinguish. Self-reflection offers a fresh perspective once the Moon returns to your sign, providing you with a workable solution. But remember, you don't have to wait for an emergency to be innovative in your approach.

Group-related issues are liable to eat up your time and attention today as you confront matters you thought were long behind you. Unfinished business with friends or coworkers may seem like a disturbance at first, but it's really an indication of something more significant that needs your attention. Cleaning up the past is a logical way to make room for a brighter future.

Constant changes at work may be your biggest challenge now as you attempt to stabilize your professional life. Your unconventional ideas could be quite useful, but you might not be willing to alter your approach to fulfilling your responsibilities. Remain confident and show everyone that you are a capable leader by cultivating a flexible attitude. Adapting quickly to new circumstances will be seen as a strength rather than as a weakness.

An intense conversation with an independent person may take you in an entirely unexpected direction today. However, if you're receptive to having meaningful discussions, the rich dialogue can stimulate you to reexamine your life and lead you to useful insights. Don't worry about other people's judgments; ignore anyone on a power trip who is just putting you down. Instead, interact with those who are sincerely willing to join you in mutual exploration with open minds and hearts.

Taking a risk is probably a smart thing to do now because you could benefit by pushing beyond your normal limits. You won't ever reach your greatest potential unless you're willing to push the envelope and go past your safe boundaries. Naturally, there's no need to change if you are content with your current life. But if you're itching for something more, ask some hard questions and explore new options while you have the chance.

There is movement in the air today, but it's up to you to initiate action. Seize the day by setting goals and then going after them. A little competition may be invigorating for you now, so pick your challenges wisely instead of waiting for them to find you. Passive behavior could lead to endless discussions that go around in circles and lead nowhere productive. However, being assertive can set a positive tone leading to a sweet feeling of accomplishment.

You might not have the option to plan cautiously now as circumstances pressure you into action. There are many factors prodding you into motion, even if it feels somewhat premature. Although spontaneity may not be your preferred way of doing things, be ready to react at a moment's notice today. A quick response will buy you additional time to consider your next move.

Attempting to focus could give you a real headache today because there are so many delightful diversions all around you. Unfortunately, seeing a job through to the end may not be as easy as you wish. Although you can still be quite clever and amusing, spontaneous behavior won't bring you any closer to your goals. Channel your need for pleasure into creative activities and then get back to the routine tasks at hand.

It's tricky managing all the facts now and even paying special attention to your words won't necessarily be clear. You might not hear exactly what's being said and the psychic interference could turn even the most straightforward conversation into a nonsensical passage. Nevertheless, aim for accuracy by taking as much time as necessary to confirm the messages that you send and receive.

Although your awareness is breaking through new ground like a germinated seed sprouting towards the sunlight, you might experience momentary pangs of self-doubt. Your life is pregnant with positive possibilities and you want to pursue all of them. However, the important work today is to delve beneath the surface because it's the hidden things that hold the real power. Push your fears aside and dig in.

You are quite fascinated with the symbolism that's bubbling up from your own imagination today. Your current fantasies seem so real, so meaningful, so dangerous and so not you. You may wonder why you're attracted to the beauty of what lies beneath the surface, when normally you are more concerned with things of material substance. Don't waste time questioning what's happening; just sink into the experience and learn what you can from your colorful inner world.

Serious feelings come and go in waves today. Although you want to lighten up and be socially involved, worries about money are tough to shake. Even if you choose to enjoy the company of friends or coworkers, you must set limits on your discretionary spending. Thankfully, you can get away from your mundane concerns for a while if you adopt a sensible approach to balancing work and play. Creating priceless memories doesn't have to cost a thing.

On one side of the equation, actions speak louder than words and you're eager to make things happen at work today. However, on the other side, the Moon is visiting your sign and feelings are all that really matter. Even if you successfully lead by example for a while, you can still bounce back and forth between these two worlds. Nevertheless, don't resist diving into the watery realm of your emotions. Just keep your subjectivity under wraps for now when dealing with others.

You Lions are like a field of eager dandelions today, ready to spring into full glory at the slightest hint of warm sunshine. You feel so creative now that you want others to stop and admire your work. However, there are many flowers laden with pollen, so you can't expect all the bees to favor you. Remember, you're not the only show in town, so don't try to take all the sunlight for yourself. You'll shine even brighter when others shine, too.

You might be slightly annoyed today because you want less noise in your surroundings so you can concentrate on your work. But the distractions come knocking at your door like too many bad jokes at a cocktail party. Of course, witty performances provide a clever sort of amusement, but you still wish you could turn the volume down now. Unfortunately, you may not have as much control over your environment as you prefer. Be smart and accept what you cannot change, and keep a sense of humor about the rest.

Your key planet, Venus, forms a magical connection with boundless Jupiter today, leading you off course and promoting a fun day. But you can't keep everything light and fluffy. Your impulses may be wild and uncontrollable now, but you are also obsessed with deeper feelings that need to be expressed. Don't sit around talking about your great ideas; you already know what to do. So seize the opportunity while it's still knocking at your door.

You wish that you had more time to weigh your current options before being pressed into action. Although you may have to sacrifice your personal timetable, you're not eager to just let someone else rearrange your agenda. You have a solid idea of something big and amazing in your future; don't let fear sneak into the picture. Concentrate on the best possible outcome and be willing to compromise a bit to get your way in the long run.

Sweet Venus highlights your key planet, Jupiter, today in your 7th House of Partners, bringing optimistic people into your life. As enthusiastic as you are about working with someone special, you might also be worried that your secret insecurities could unravel a new relationship. But you don't learn anything by pretending you know everything. Instead of showing off your ability to make decisions, share the responsibility by letting others take charge for a while.

Although the Moon may reflect your fear of rejection today, her opposition to potent Pluto gives you strength to stand up for your beliefs. You have a very realistic view of your possible future, but it might feel as if a friend or coworker is standing in your way. Thankfully, you have a specific mission now and you are not inclined to let others run your private affairs. Remember you can still care about someone, even if you won't back down. State what you feel is non-negotiable, but be kind in your delivery.

Springtime places an emphasis on communication for you non-conformist Aquarians, but you prefer to keep everything light and lively. You may be invited on a magical mystery tour of subterranean emotional mysteries. Although you might say you're busy and can't make it, reality has already accepted the invitation on your behalf. Show up with a smile on your face and the willingness to be surprised by a journey to the unknown.

You are being bombarded by deep feelings of attraction or repulsion that won't go away. The waters of life are humming with complex patterns of emotional charges today. While much of the world is being distracted by the arrival of spring, you are still swimming in the dark depths of meaning. Trust your intuition and follow the timing of your own heart.

You're feeling a bit battle-weary today as you grow tired of your old familiar games. Your current discomfort might prevent you from laying low as you step onto the front lines. Although you may have obligations now, you are being presented with an opportunity to start a process of emotional rejuvenation. Don't distract yourself from the real work at hand; paying attention to your heart leads you in the right direction.

Unexpressed emotions may increase your vulnerability today, but you probably can see a way through the situation. You are eager to share your perspective even if you aren't yet sure exactly what you will say. Give yourself permission to float without a solution for a while longer. If you're feeling isolated now, it might be of your own creation. Thankfully, you don't have to reveal anything until you are ready. In the meantime, writing down your thoughts helps move the process along in a healthy way.

Your silence enables you to hear your important thoughts today, even if you are slightly afraid of them. However, finding a way to express your fears may bring you closer to your goals, so don't use clever words to talk your way out of your funk. Instead, take your time and speak carefully to reveal an aspect of yourself that you normally keep hidden. This intentional disclosure can create intimacy, along with much-needed healing.

On the surface, everything seems copacetic today, but you're tuned into more subtle signals that suggest otherwise. Your energy is moving outward, toward the other people in your life, leaving little left over for you. It may be challenging to stay in contact with your emotions now that rowdy Mars has taken up residence in your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Luckily, you can consciously focus on your inner world long enough to evaluate what needs to be done and to fix what's broken.

Although there are no parental authority figures or bosses to tell you what to do now, you might not be able to enjoy yourself until you finish planning your getaway. It's best to take your time and make sure all the details are in place, rather than assuming all the pieces will somehow fit together on their own. Keep your ideas to yourself while you're still developing them. There will be plenty of time later on to share the upcoming adventure once you're ready.

You might not follow through and execute all your plans today, yet you still can feel good about what you accomplish. Your peers may not appreciate the logic of your methods now, but you should be able to convince them to give you the room you need to get your work done. If you do fall behind, don't expect anyone to get on your case. Being your own critic motivates you to improve your work without waiting for someone else's judgment.

Although emotional wounds received in the past may come back to haunt you today, it's finally time to let them go. Unfortunately, cutting the ties that bind you to your memories is easier said than done. Your best path to healing is through clear communication. However, everything won't be fixed with one quick conversation; you are undertaking a long-term project. Nevertheless, start it today now to maximize your chances to heal.

You might be holding on to an old conversation yet, thankfully, you have an opportunity to move past this emotional blockage now. Whether it was last week or thirty years ago, this is the time to revisit the initial cause of your current pain. No action is required today; just bring your awareness to the origin of the problem while accepting that you are OK just the way you are. Being gentle with yourself is more important than turning your life upside down in the present moment.

You may be more serious than usual today as you seek to understand your emotional limitations. It could be challenging to be as optimistic as others expect of you, but don't waste energy worrying about it. Look back over the past few years to see how the obstacles you overcame made you stronger. Although you're appreciative of your support network, forget about what anyone else thinks now and do what you know must be done.

You are deeply pensive today because you cannot understand why you are struggling so hard for something just out of reach. Family and friends may think that you're wearing an old scar like a medal of honor, but it's not healthy to glorify an old wound. Use what you know in the present moment to reframe the past so you can finally heal and move on.

You may be feeling blue today for no apparent reason. Stern Saturn's trine to healer Chiron brings the failures of humanity into your life in such a way that you feel personally responsible. Consider that your eagerness to take on global issues might just be a way to avoid more personal ones. You have the potential to break through old patterns, and you can jumpstart the process by remembering an unpleasant aspect of your past with a compassionate heart.

You are immersed in deep waters now and your fantasies might be locked in a battle with your personal demons and ghosts of the past. The root of the problem is that you can unconsciously project your imagination on to your friends and family; but even if it appears otherwise, this is ultimately about you and not them. Don't be afraid to heal yourself, even if this seems more complicated than trying to heal others.

Things are looking good, but conflicts hidden beneath the surface may suddenly explode today. The fireworks begin as your key planet Mars aligns with shocking Uranus to clear the bank of fog that recently moved in. Above all, remember that there is no danger from what you may feel. Real problems only arise now from trying to sidestep the issues instead of proactively facing them with courage.

Memories that you thought were long gone may now resurface with a sense of immediacy that shocks you into a momentary awakening. Passions express from the deepest recesses of your subconscious mind today. Don't try to keep this stuff down. Learn from what you are feeling in order to make the most positive impact on your future.

You are figure skating on very thin sheets of ice today. As graceful as you may appear now, beneath the cool veneer is a pool of hot molten lava. You're afraid the ice will crack if you stop moving and down you'll go. It is the opposite, however, that is true. If you stay in motion, you won't get the chance to overcome that which scares you the most. Stop and explore your feelings; your irrational fears are more easily managed when you face them directly.

An ongoing dilemma is very stressful now and seems to require immediate resolution. You know what you want, but anxiety comes from your uncertainty about how hard to push the river of feelings. Even if you remember that the river always arrives at the sea exactly on time, you still wish you could actively participate. Work to clear the channel so the emotional waters move freely, but don't expect them to follow your timetable. Happiness is possible when you accept what you cannot change.

Power plays may define your current circumstances, yet there is more going on than meets the eye. Your motivations, too, are more complicated than they seem. Self-control aids in your success, but that's not the same as denial. Express yourself, but do so in a way that has lasting value rather than just an immediate impact. It's easy to be dramatic when talking about the future; however, it requires more finesse to make the most of the excitement now.

Your usual cool, calm and collected demeanor is nowhere to be found today. Your mind is caught in a powerful whirlpool of intense feelings, needs and circumstances. There doesn't seem to be a graceful way out of the situation now. It feels like something is going to break. But don't wait for the earthquake to strike. Take a deep breath and move immediately and deliberately toward your next goal. Decisive action actually helps to clear the air and free you from the tension.

Sometimes you need to step outside of people's expectations and do what you believe must be done. Being the peacemaking diplomat is not what the planets have in mind for you today. It's time to get down and dirty; jump into your feelings and don't be afraid to get messy. There's no need to say every single thing you feel, but you can benefit from fully experiencing each and every emotion. Moving beyond your comfort zone allows you to grow in ways you didn't expect.

You get a fleeting glimpse of a bigger truth now, which can help you find your way through self-imposed restrictions. Don't avert your eyes when the lightning strikes today. Its power is yours to see, no matter how brilliant the flash. Just remember that, above all else, awareness is your friend. Breathe deeply and allow the transformation to begin.

Unusual events on the home front may put you in touch with a new perspective on old memories. It's as if the lights are turned on and you can see what you've been missing all along. Don't turn away in denial even if it's difficult to integrate what you learn. Your future freedom depends upon your willingness to embrace the truth now. Taking an honest look at your past enables you to choose the best path into the future.

Although you may be rewarded for your role in the community or your family, there's a part of you that just wants to cash it all in today and be free from the restraints of obligations. Be careful; if you come on too strong, you could cut yourself off from the same connections that normally help to support you. Bring up your frustrations gently without biting the hand that feeds you. Sharing your heart may be easier than you think.

You are totally hyped up now and it's hard to control the thrilling feelings that are running through your body. However, if you don't pay attention to your intellectual reactions today, you will just have to deal with the ramifications of your own erratic behavior. Your grievances are real so work with the issues on a deeper level. This current dilemma won't be solved by a quick emotional outburst, so take your time and dig down to the source of the problem.

Your self-confidence is operating at a high level today and you believe that others should take more notice of your valuable contributions. Fortunately, the rocket has been rolled out onto the launch pad and ignition will follow shortly. And lift-off occurs none too soon because you have run out of patience. Go ahead and use your energy to express your unique personality and to display your true colors.

Everything may appear to be in order as you head into a busy weekend, but something significant is lurking in the shadows. Instead of attempting to avoid an unpleasant encounter, simply ask questions and be prepared to hear the brutal truth. You'll probably feel better once you know what's going on, but the energy still could be quite intense. Count to ten before reacting; finding healthy ways to channel your feelings is your best strategy for now.

A little misunderstanding with a friend or partner today may escalate into a significant disagreement. The conflict might be as simple as whether or not to make a particular purchase. Unfortunately, you could argue about this forever without reaching a resolution. Push beyond your legendary Taurus stubbornness and demonstrate your willingness to negotiate a fair solution. Having it your way is not as important as you think.

It's nearly impossible not to maintain your joviality now that hopeful Jupiter is visiting your carefree sign. However, stern Saturn can rain on your parade today by requiring you to finish all the chores you have put off. You might feel as if someone is holding your feet to the fire, but don't try to escape. As the intensity increases, your conflicting emotions will blend together and then fuse into a new, stronger emotional alloy. Transforming the negative into a positive turns the gray skies to blue.

When confronted with unpleasant situations, you often pull into your shell where you are safely out of harm's way. Unfortunately, the danger of this evasive strategy is that your unexpressed anger may create more problems now than a short-lived conflict. You have a chance to positively impact your weekend, but you must be willing to take a risk and let others know why you aren't happy. Getting your feelings out into the open can be the game-changer you need to shake up your life.

You might become stuck in an emotional cul-de-sac today unless you pay extra careful attention to where you are going. Sometimes -- especially when you think you are right -- you find it nearly impossible to take directions from anyone else. Even if you win the argument you might end up in the wrong place. Victory is admirable, but cooperation brings you closer to your destination.

A minor flap at home could turn into a larger problem today, especially if you can't let go of your attachment to expectations. When you want one thing while your friends or family want something else, there's no choice but to compromise. However, you may unconsciously misplace your resentment if you're not happy with the outcome. Monitor your feelings closely so you can process them before getting angry at the wrong person or upset for the wrong reason.

It's challenging to live up to your reputation of being a gracious host today, especially if someone arouses your temper. Instead of engaging in an unnecessary conflict, examine your motives to learn why you are so upset. Don't talk about your feelings until you cool down ... or your emotions could lead you into trouble. However, keeping your annoyance in perspective enables you to get through a sticky interaction without a lot of extra effort.

Your two key planets, Mars and Pluto, might have trouble getting along until the end of the week. In the meantime, you might try to bury your negativity, but suppressing your feelings is difficult. Even if you could conceal your emotions, they might only intensify until they explode. Therefore, your best course of action is practicing controlled release. Make sure the energy doesn't get stuck, or you may have a meltdown on your hands later on. Be smart and consciously reveal your vulnerability only when you feel safe.

Your life would be great if things were a little quieter now, but Jupiter continues to distract you as it travels through your 7th House of Relationships. It may seem as if others are encouraging you to waste energy on unnecessary tasks. Although this frivolity makes for some good times, you still need to put everything in order. Take responsibility for your own feelings and let others know what you want. Setting clear boundaries enables you to stay on track.

It may feel like too many people are heaping too many tasks on you now. Or maybe you are so ambitious lately that you take on a variety of extra jobs because they sound like fun challenges. Either way, you're at a turning point. You can't keep doing more and more. Even if you might make someone angry with your decisions, it's time to resist the temptation to say yes. Today is your day to simply say no thank you with a smile.

Your need for affection is strong today, but you may not be able to find the best route to satisfaction. Your current confusion isn't just about a romantic inclination; your powerful feelings can easily express through parental love or artistic creation. But one way or another, you must find a strategy that utilizes your emotions to bring you closer to others. Luckily, you don't have to try as hard as you think. A simple I love you might be enough to do the trick.

You are a powerhouse of bottled-up energy today and others may have to contend with your uncharacteristically forceful style. You might feel as if you are in survival mode as everything seems more intense and larger than life now. Be kind to your coworkers as you push for what you want. As long as you're operating from a place of love, there's no need to be ashamed of your drive for success.

Your love antennae are particularly receptive now that sweet Venus is back in your sign until mid-April. Nevertheless, you may grow worried about all the things that could go wrong in a relationship. Fortunately, you can recharge through interactions with others by adopting a beginner's mind approach. Imagine that you don't have all the answers and that you must start from scratch. Taking things from the beginning allows you to refresh the energy and add a dose of excitement into your life.

Your key planet, Venus, is dressed up in a new outfit today for her thrilling trip through Aries. She's hot and ready to go for it. But you steady Bulls might not want to show all your stuff right away. You tend to keep your desires under wraps. Even if you feel a sense of urgency, open the closet door slowly as you let your needs see the light of day. You could be pleasantly surprised.

Your big ideas can get you into trouble of a pleasant nature as you tell someone exactly what you want today. It may not be a smart idea to over-personalize what you say. Keep your conversations on the light side. Otherwise, you can get so overly expressive to the point that others may not understand you. It's not that you are being unclear; it's just that your volume gets too loud when you aren't paying attention.

Your life may be running smoother these days, even if you have a lot on your mind. People are seeing in you a new light. Even things in your family and the community are changing for the better. You're more open to show more of yourself because you are attracted to others. This new behavior can create a bit of worry, because sometimes you like to remain safely hidden from the outer world. Don't create unnecessary problems as you come out of your shell.

Love is a grand journey for you Lions now that Venus is skipping through your 9th House of Travel. You may be drawn toward new adventures and might even get to take that trip you've been dreaming of. Thankfully, your common sense is at work also. Talk as if you are ready to hop on a plane right now, but take care of practical matters before you actually go away.

A subtle shift pulls you into the fantasy of having to get what you want, yet this might not be as innocent as it appears. If you want love, you want it now. But, as always, look for the real thing that serves you best. Or, if you are already in a relationship, seek ways to deepen it. As the Moon returns to your sign today, do your best to fulfill desires, even if you don't fully understand your them.

You Libras tend to be people-oriented, but your expression of love and affection is strongly emphasized through April 15. Your key planet, Venus, is traveling through your 7th House of Partnerships, inviting you to smooth over whatever problems that have developed with others. Most interactions during this time will bring you the pleasure that you seek.

You are usually attracted to experiences that enrich and deepen your life. Now, however, Venus is encouraging you to act on your impulsive desires. This can bring about conflicting situations and might even put you in a position where you'll need to quickly work out the details of an unfolding relationship. Focus on other people, but make certain to also pay attention to your own physical and mental health too.

It is said that you Archers are always ready for a good time, but this isn't totally true. For example, you are moving into a phase when creative self-expression does lead to fun and games. Although love relationships are also favored, you may get so caught up in your own analysis today that you can't see the forest through the trees. Do some intense thinking, but don't talk yourself out of being spontaneous.

It's difficult for you to escape your sense of duty. Even your need for love can be tied to certain practical considerations. Over these next few weeks, you might want one thing but find yourself doing something else. However, your actions are more important than your desires today. Be patient; there will be plenty of time to follow your heart in the days ahead.

You may be caught between your need to be responsible and your desire to cut loose and do something exciting. In an ideal world, you would figure out how to do both ... especially since your mind is buzzing with wild ideas. Nevertheless, your patience is wearing thin and you want immediate fulfillment. Don't fight with yourself. Let common sense prevail while you take it slowly and do what is required.

Your senses are more highly tuned today, attracting you to do something very specific rather than idly dream about possibilities. The time for action is now, but you may be more concerned with financial matters, which could cause some doubt. Money matters can either be quite excellent or quite difficult; it's one extreme or the other. Either way, budget some resources to have fun, even if you have to be creative to pull it off.

There is no need to make a long-term commitment today, unless you spend time carefully planning what you have to do first. If you say yes too quickly, it may mean additional trouble for you down the road. You are coming down from an optimistic period where opportunities seemed better than they really are. Now that reality is creeping back into your life, monitor your energy level. If it feels like you are trying to do too much, eliminate something before it is too late.

You are entering a more practical phase now and it feels great to dig in and get some work done. Fortunately, your current responsibilities don't prevent you from having fun. You are aware of your need to relax and are prepared to carve out time for playful activities. Luckily, the stress continues to lighten up during the next several days, so don't forget to add some enjoyable activities to your calendar while you can.

People can't easily see through your witty mask today, so they won't know what's going on behind your clever facade. You may be hiding your negativity so others won't see your vulnerability. However, it's best not to have too many secrets or you could inadvertently invite a minor emotional meltdown. Talking about your ailments with someone you trust is much healthier than keeping them to yourself.

Although you may be more talkative than usual, you still might not say what someone wants to hear. Others can tell that your incessant talking hides your insecurities. Luckily, you are on the edge of making an important breakthrough, so don't waste energy burying your emotions. Nevertheless, it's futile to force them up to the surface too quickly. Relax; there's no need for concern. Your feelings will bubble up at their own rate, allowing you to express them with ease.

Your moodiness is settling back down to a manageable level now that the emotional Moon has left your sign. Although you might be more rational today, don't fall into the illusion of thinking that everything is fine. Whatever was disturbing you can suddenly erupt unless you closely observe your feelings. Don't wait for something to happen; talk about your emotions before they get blown out of proportion.

You may feel less emotionally balanced now because the moody Moon is traveling through Virgo again. But cool logic won't help you anyways, so don't try to rationalize your way through the day. Instead, let your heart's desires guide your actions. You'll know exactly what you need to do when the time is right. Trusting your intuition over the facts may sound scary, but it's exactly what you need to do today.

This may be a tricky day to navigate, especially if you feel alienated from those you love. But don't worry if you prefer keeping things to yourself for now. Remember, you might have strong reactions when you're caught off balance by something unexpected today. Fate is working her magic on you and even the littlest event can turn into a major catalyst. Tune into the world around you so you can stay in touch with what's important.

You are looking forward to connecting with others now that the Moon is traveling through your 11th House of Friends. But you may grow disinterested in social distractions when you realize that some of the planned activities are distractions from the real meaning of your life. Don't overreact and avoid a fun opportunity just because you are feeling serious. Instead, join the crowd for a while; you might be happily surprised by the fascinating people and the relevance of the conversations anyway.

Although you are doing your best to demonstrate your positive attitude, people still may expect you to give more than you have today. You are feeling performance pressure and there's not much you can do about it now. It's difficult if you believe that others are working against you. However, there's no need to fight back; just continue to gather the facts and be ready to tell your side of the story when asked. The only one you truly have to please is yourself.

You may be working on significant long-term changes in your life with a singular focus. Nevertheless, there aren't sufficient reasons to make any big decisions today. Instead, it's more important to live your day in a practical manner. Even if you appear carefree and spontaneous, anyone who pays careful attention won't be fooled. Fortunately, there's nothing to be gained by hiding the real issues now, so do what you must and let others deal with their feelings accordingly.

If you have invested too much time and energy attempting to be popular, you might finally realize that you can't fit into the shape required for your current situation. Others may see you as uncooperative now, but that is not your intent. You know how you feel and want to make your point as succinctly as you can. Remember, once you have made your case, you really don't have to try so hard to prove that you're a great friend.

All kinds of relationships are potentially the sources of conflict now as someone inadvertently brings up a hurtful issue. You might be doubly hurt if you think that another person's mean comments were said on purpose. Even so, be generous and give others the benefit of the doubt. Avoid a needless fight by allowing the energies to settle down for a day or two before you make your stand.

You aren't in the mood to be messed with today and might act defensively, even if you are not personally attacked. An issue that has been on your mind now pushes you dangerously close to a meltdown. You can feel heat rising from the bottom of the volcano and are challenged to express your unresolved conflicts in a constructive manner. Be aware of the feelings of others and think twice before you speak.

Your need to maintain the status quo might land you in trouble now, even if you believe your actions are for the best. Don't hide behind your stubbornness or your unexpressed feelings can turn to resentment. The current emotional waves may be strong, but riding them is healthier than attempting to hold them back. If a conflict remains unresolved, let the energies settle down before trying the same dance with your heart again.

Everything feels very intense today, but don't let this prevent you from doing what is right. You may be apprehensive about what's happening at work because you are being transformed by events you cannot completely control. You might be tempted to sidestep the incoming pressures, but it's wiser to face them now while you still can. Hang in there; the easy way out is not necessarily your best strategy.

You breeze through the day with flying colors as long as you maintain your integrity and treat others kindly. However, if you are holding on to a secret or harboring resentment now, any interaction might suddenly turn into an emotional conflict. If you are afraid of losing control, you could get dragged into a melodramatic standoff. Don't get hooked by someone else's issues today. Taking the high road will help you avoid additional complications.

Although something or someone might have looked good in the past, there are things coming to light today that you hadn't noticed before. Conflicts arise -- perhaps because you are so driven at this time in your life. Your ambition is tied to fulfilling your dreams and may be running rampant. Consider moderating your goals. Exercising flexibility could make your life much easier now.

Someone may be undermining your efforts today and the situation is complicated enough that you don't know what to do about it. One tactic is to analyze what you have done to arouse opposition. Even if you have to confront an authority figure about what's going on, it's to your advantage to alter your own course, too. If you don't handle your internal issues now, the outer resistance will just pop up again later. Stepping up to the challenge only makes you stronger.

A close friend or associate may be on your case today. You realize that your response is required, but you're not quite sure how best to proceed. Talking about your options won't help you get what you want now, but it could be what's needed as long as you don't stop there. Be ready to fight for your convictions. Don't wait for something to happen. Take initiative while you can and run with it.

Your two planetary rulers, Mars and Pluto, are dynamically squaring off in a tense showdown, ramping up your energy level to a near all-time high. Unfortunately, you may be so supercharged with feelings that they can be more than you want to handle. But they are your emotions, so you must deal with them. Even if you are at odds with someone, don't push the conflict too far. If you do, no one will come out a winner. Get busy and do something wildly constructive, instead.

You can get a lot of work done today if you have your mind set on a specific goal. However, you could encounter unexpected encouragement from a close friend or family member and strong resistance from someone else. You may be ready to try anything to be successful, so be careful not to exhaust yourself now as you attempt to accomplish the impossible. Even if others are impressed by your can-do attitude, you may be better off saving some energy for tomorrow.

You have an exciting opportunity to confront your fears now, especially if you're willing to feel the pain of a past emotional wound. Your tendency is to avoid your feelings by placing your attention on outer accomplishments, instead. Don't just go out and make something happen today; it's equally important to focus on the internal transformations that can help you improve your life.

It may seem as if you're doing battle with your friends and family today, rather than working or playing with them. Even if the circumstances feel extreme, it's not really that black or white. However, the middle ground is particularly difficult to find now because you can clearly see the problem without being able to solve it. Hold on to your perspective, but demonstrate plenty of flexibility when dealing with others.

You might be involved in a difficult emotional struggle today that adds turmoil to your life, and you need to take some of the responsibility for the current unstable situation. It may seem as if there's a problem with others, but half of this conflict originates within the confines of your own mind. Look for ways to change yourself before you try to change anyone else.

Today's Libra Full Moon opposite your Sun sign might make your life more problematic because of the strong ambivalence it brings. You're ready to jump in with both feet, but the voice of restraint reminds you of the price you often pay when you dive in before testing the water. Something doesn't feel quite right and you're correct to trust your instincts. It's wise to pull back a bit to find a healthy balance before you say yes without thinking first.

Your key planet, Venus, joins the Sun during today's lovely Libra Full Moon, offering you the likelihood of a pleasurable experience. Unfortunately, you might have so much on your plate now that you have a valid excuse to avoid intimacy. Although you may not feel very playful, the Full Moon brightens your 6th House of Habits, reminding you to have fun as you do your work instead of putting it off for another day.

You may be running around in circles today, yet you don't feel particularly hurried. Perhaps you are busy having fun with the Libra Full Moon activating your 5th House of Spontaneity. However, you still might be distracted by something that's bothering you. Handle your problems while maintaining a light-hearted attitude. But don't bother trying to fake it; others will appreciate you more if you show your true self.

The Libra Full Moon shines in your 4th House of Emotional Security, tempting you to withdraw from a drama at work, which may leave you wondering what you missed. You might attempt to ignore your intense feelings, but avoidance isn't a useful strategy. There's no need to put up artificial walls just to protect yourself from non-existent childhood fears. Instead, start a dialogue with your subconscious, for that's where you will find answers to your current problem.

The winds of change are blowing in like fresh breezes now as the Libra Full Moon illuminates your 3rd House of Communication. Expressing your unresolved feelings causes you to confront your shortcomings, rather than just your success stories. You may feel like you're not exactly where you want to be, but don't stress about it too much. Handling issues as they surface today can set you back on the right path.

Although today's rational Libra Full Moon highlights your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, it also reminds you to be practical when expressing your feelings. Nevertheless, the whole day has an emotional intensity to it. Others may think that you're backpedaling, but you probably aren't the one who is putting on the brakes. Don't let yourself get discouraged. Display the warmth you want to receive by keeping your heart open and your feelings close to the surface.

The Full Moon's presence in your sign makes it challenging to hide your feelings, even if you wish you could retreat today. On the other hand, don't make a fuss even if you are unjustly criticized about your production or performance. Remember that the actions of other people are beyond your control, so nothing is gained by worrying about what they do. Instead, concentrate on your own emotional process, even if it happens to involve others for a while. Expressing your heart is key to your happiness now.

Your emotions are on edge today as the Libra Full Moon in your 12th House of Destiny runs into a series of stressful aspects. You may try to conceal your feelings, and even those close to you might not be privy to your inner workings. Instead of withholding some of your love while you reevaluate your relationships, use logic to overcome your fear. Ultimately, expressing your emotions in a cool and collected manner helps to transform your negativity into a positive experience.

The lovely Libra Full Moon lights up your 11th House of Groups and Friends, activating the fun-loving, social axis of your chart. Unfortunately, you may be seeking romance while only finding platonic companions. There's nothing wrong with a wonderful friendship, but it doesn't have the same excitement as a love story. Don't let discouragement throw you into a tailspin of low self-esteem. Allowing others to see your real feelings creates an environment where your relationships can continue to grow.

Everyone seems to be making demands on you at work now that the Libra Full Moon falls in your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Don't try to cover up your insecurities about not being able to meet all of your commitments. Although you might not finish everything, you still could end up exhausted. Find a sustainable pace and just do what you can. Be as direct as possible when letting others know exactly what you can and can't do; your honesty and work ethic won't go unappreciated.

All aspects of communication are strained today as the Libra Full Moon opposes the Sun in your 3rd House of Information. Your schedule may grow so complicated and unwieldy that you feel like you can't even manage it. Unfortunately, there isn't an easy way out of this tricky situation. Be practical as you face the current circumstances. If there isn't enough time or resources, figure out how to do more with less. Try something different; the solution might not be what you think.

You may be afraid to let go of control today as the Libra Full Moon floods your 8th House of Intimacy. Thankfully, you are very well-equipped to handle the disintegration of boundaries during this Full Moon. One of the benefits of having such a rich fantasy life is that you are prepared for nearly anything. Don't waste energy trying to fight against the currents because intense emotional interactions could drain you. If you go with the flow; you'll emerge on the other side with your sense of humor still intact.

Your emotional landscape changes abruptly as the Sun and Venus receive a jolt from electric Uranus in your sign. This unexpected surprise can mark the start of something new as cracks suddenly appear in a brittle shell that has kept you safe. It's time to emerge, so don't waste energy trying to repair the breach. Instead, dream about the new life ahead for the baby chick once it has broken free from the restraints of the eggshell.

You're buzzing today as original ideas and beautiful images cascade into consciousness. But you must be careful because your thoughts may not be as brilliant as you believe. Your unconventional desires could even border on craziness now, so listen to what a trusted friend says before doing something outrageous you'll later regret. Everything doesn't have to follow your plan; you can improve nearly any activity by letting go of total control and sharing responsibility with those around you.

Your friends and associates may seem unreliable today, disrupting previous plans that require their participation. This unpredictability can be challenging, since you must make choices based upon your ability to deliver on your promises. Nevertheless, you can't rely on the support of others at this time. Don't expect any extra assistance; if someone comes through for you, take it as a pleasant surprise and graciously accept their support.

Your reputation at work might shift abruptly today. If you suffer a minor setback, it's only to point out that something needs your immediate attention. On the other hand, others may think that you're a real genius if your radical idea actually works. Either way, the status quo is about to change, so don't try to hold on to the past. Reassess your direction and put your new plan into action as quickly as possible.

You can close your door in an attempt to keep out the extraneous noise today. But everything is moving so fast now that you have to deal with the speed of change, even if you're overwhelmed by it. Attempts to stick to your current position won't work; the more you try to resist the future the quicker it will arrive. Let go and embrace the uncertainty of what comes next. Allow exhilaration to replace your fear and embrace the unknown.

You are fascinated by alternative explanations of complex mysteries today as you seek answers to the unsolvable questions of life. Whether it's a sudden interest in ancient philosophies, quantum physics or Astrology, your mind is quick to grasp new concepts now. But don't be too eager to close your heart as you open your mind. Your emotions must play an integral role in your current breakthrough in order for it to have lasting value.

You may be tempted to step outside the box and surprise someone with your willingness to take a risk today. However, something unexpected could occur even if you act in an overly cautious manner. The hidden tensions that are suddenly released will either be initiated by you or happen to you. Ultimately, it's better if the catalytic action starts from within.

It may be challenging to find a happy medium today as your reactions to trivial events seem to be either too much or too little. You might grow annoyed because others assume you want everything while you feel as if you're not asking for much at all. Instead of expressing your needs impulsively, let them simmer a while before sharing them. Thankfully, the extremes will begin to settle down in the next couple of days, allowing you to say exactly how you feel.

You might not be feeling very practical today, especially if you are in the throes of a new romantic attraction. Or, perhaps you are consumed by a captivating hobby or a competitive sport. Whatever the reason, you're ready to be pulled off course now. Just keep in mind that your approach doesn't need to be all-or-nothing as you seek exciting avenues of expression. Play with the edge and don't be afraid to move the boundaries, but be careful not to step on anyone's toes in the process.

If circumstances at home are too complicated, you may be ready to try a more diplomatic approach today. However, emotions grow intense very fast once you start the discussion. Oddly enough, you might actually enjoy the fireworks, since a sudden outbreak could catalyze stagnant issues and provoke radical change. No matter how disruptive the situation becomes, the air will clear once the tensions are released.

Your focus is on your career these days and, thankfully, your sense of duty holds you in good stead on the job now. But you're not willing to do the same old thing in the same old way. Be daring in your communication today, whether via email, phone or in person. Don't miss any opportunities to make new connections. You just might meet someone who could open doors to places you've never been.

Your emotions may be at odds with your logic today, especially if you want to do something that conflicts with your core values. It's challenging to embrace a desire that pulls you off balance, but suppressing an attraction won't make it go away. You are being gifted with a unique opportunity to heal something that you have carried around inside you for a long time. Soften your hard edges, forgive yourself and move on.

You may be confused by your desires and would be smart to use some discretion when communicating with others. You feel as if you're in power since your emotions are so intense today, and you just want to express what's in your heart. Unfortunately, you might be a bit too much for people to handle now. Seal your lips even if you believe you know the truth; keep some things to yourself unless you want to scare everyone away. Wait until the energy settles down and then speak your piece to someone who will listen with a supportive ear.

You demand respect today and will likely receive it. However, you can unintentionally mislead yourself by inflating your importance. Accordingly, it's crucial to work toward your goals with careful consideration. If you expect too much, you could be setting yourself up for disappointment. Fortunately, there's no need to hold back if you run your ideas past someone you trust before acting on your assumptions. Adjust your sails if necessary, and then take off.

You are eager to be with friends or hang out with your family today, leaving your chores behind. It's not that you're irresponsible; it's just that you may believe you can catch up on your obligations later. However, your rational mind might be twisting your perspective of reality so you see everything in an optimistic light. Unfortunately, you can't make up for lost time with just good intentions and hard work. Stay on task and only head out to play once you are finished with work.

You are quite energized today and feel as if you have a million things to say before the day slips away. However, your drive to share what's on your mind clashes with your sensitivity to what others need. You're motivated to ask for what you want, but are uncomfortable being pushy enough to do it. Take a risk and get your thoughts out into the open; you'll be disappointed with yourself tomorrow if you don't.

You're performing the lead role in your own personal drama now and are ready to play it for all it's worth. You are a hit, but it would be wise to end the show before it turns stale. Rather than starring in a make-believe role, try showing up as the real you. Step out from behind your mask and be vulnerable for a change. Give others the chance to like you for who you are, and not just for what you do. Open your heart and receive the validation you seek.

You can convince nearly anyone that you are right today, but you can't do it with words alone. Language is too shallow and won't convey your deeper intent. Your actions are ultimately the best sales tools now, as they truly speak louder than anything else. Ironically, you must also be willing to clearly explain what you are doing to have the greatest impact. Quietly go about your business until you have made enough progress to share with others.

Relationships are often on your mind and today is no exception. But there is something else going on now because you're not interested in simply pleasing others. You are being motivated by a deep need to accomplish something that is of substance. You have a wonderful opportunity to create something positive, and you should be able to make it happen as long as you aren't overly selfish in your motives. You really can't go wrong if you follow your heart.

You are receiving support from intense Pluto today, giving you the resources needed to complete a major project. Although everything seems to be going your way, there is more happening than meets the eye. The Moon's visit to your sign sets the tone for a transformational day. Even the most complicated tasks seem more straightforward now. Push relentlessly toward your goals but allow room for a miscalculation. If you run into trouble, take what you learn into consideration before trying again.

You have the determination today to manifest your vision. Although you realize that your long-term goals won't be achieved all at once, your current actions have a major impact on your future. But it's crucial to avoid acting for personal reasons alone. With relentless Pluto working on your behalf now, your progress will be steadier if you consider the needs of others in your current plans. In fact, consulting those around you inspires you to even greater heights.

You hear two internal voices of guidance today and they both make convincing arguments. You know that you are in it for the long haul, so you're willing to play your cards strategically. However, you may believe you're holding a winning hand and cannot wait for the game to end. But unfortunately, if you come out on top, then others will lose. Before you show your cards, secretly change the rules so everyone can be a winner.

There's no one to blame but yourself if your day is way too busy; you simply tried to pack too much into your schedule. Even if it seems logistically impossible to complete everything today, you can still make all the separate pieces work together if you rely on a bit of team magic. Let the group decide what's next. Ironically, giving up some of your control now enables you to accomplish more than you expect.

Normally, you don't like direct confrontation and may try to avoid conflict at any cost. You might even become anxious when you have to exert your will with any sense of authority. However, you can confidently push toward with whatever it is that you want today. Fortunately, you won't offend anyone with your bossy manner now. Just make certain that you know where you are going before you start giving orders.

Investing the necessary time and energy in getting your message across ensures that your words are clearly understood. Conversations require careful listening to avoid confusion in matters of finances, especially involving joint property. But you can miss the point and throw a negotiation into reverse if you are too impatient. Set aside your defensive tendencies; open your heart and your mind in order to make the best connection.

You might want more than you're receiving from a friend or partner today, but don't assume that he or she knows your heart's desires. Being shy isn't going to help you fulfill your wishes, so describe what you want in as much detail as possible. You may have already stated your needs more than once already, but the past is past. If you crave satisfaction, it's appropriate to put in the extra effort now.

Today you don't know whether to look ahead to what's next in your life or to review what just happened. Circumstances might require you to take one more review of your recent past so you don't have to redo a task that you thought was finished. If you start a new project, make sure you double-check everything to avoid any complications. Paying extra attention now can save you time and energy later.

It seems as if other people want to play when you want to be serious today; however, they become contemplative when you are ready for fun. Your mental flexibility is necessary to adapt to the current frustrating conditions. Fortunately, you stand to learn more than you can imagine if you're able to make attitude adjustments on the fly. Knowing when to hold and when to fold is a useful skill that comes in handy now.

The fallout from recent overindulgent behavior may create conflict at home today. It's tempting to let your pride get the better of you and make this a personal issue. Push past your initial response and listen carefully before angrily defending yourself. Sensitivity, rather than hostility, can turn the situation around and bring you and your family even closer together than before.

Your logic is very accurate now, but you could do more harm than good if others aren't ready to hear what you have to say. Luckily, your self-restraint helps you to find the right words at the right time. It takes more than mere facts to make your point, for people naturally want to feel understood and won't budge until you let them know that you care about their opinions. Taking the time to listen ultimately improves your chances of sharing your message.

This is an excellent time for you peacemakers to exercise the diplomatic arts by building bridges between opposing sides of a conflict without getting run over in the process. Rather than saving the entire world, you may need to back out to save your own skin if the stress becomes too much. It's admirable that you want to be of service, but don't lose perspective or there won't be any energy left over for yourself when you really need it most.

The most intense feelings are bubbling just beneath the surface and they can flood over the top without much warning today. Putting yourself in an emotionally pressurized situation increases the likelihood of an explosion. Thankfully, you can reduce stress by focusing on what is right in front of you and staying away from needless drama. Keeping things simple is a smart strategy now.

Your attention is pulled in several directions today, providing more stimulation than you truly need. Avoid the temptation to jump at all the  offers that come your way just because they sound like fun. Small distractions can lead to big complications that throw your entire day off track. You don't have the time to follow every interesting idea to its conclusion; choose only those that are of highest priority to your heart.

A supportive friend may be encouraging you today while another person is being negative. But it's your life, so it's ultimately you who decides to pursue your dream or not. Either way, it's not worth the effort to debate a critic since the idea either works for you or it doesn't. The advice you attract now could be more confusing than practical, so listen to your own heart as your primary source of guidance.

A small dose of optimism is constructive as you attempt to overcome someone's resistance, but navigating the energy is tricky now because others may not come out in the open with their thoughts. You normally aren't one to be drawn into someone else's drama, but you might be more than willing today, especially if you think you can help. Still, it's smarter to play it cool, rather than potentially complicating the situation by pushing your way into unknown emotional territory.

You are naturally sensitive to subtleties that others cannot perceive. Trusting these intuitive feelings is highly advised, since your radar is so keenly attuned now. However, you might not want to tell people what you're actually picking up today because they may not be open to your perspective, especially if they haven't asked for your opinion. Be careful to handle the situation delicately so that you don't needlessly ruffle anyone's feathers.

There are complicated issues tugging at your psyche today. On one hand, the daily routine may be working just fine. But on the other hand, you believe that you must make a stand for what you feel. Consider the possibility of backing down from your original position -- not because you're wrong, but because you want to avoid instigating a meltdown. Thankfully, you can still talk about your desires as long as you don't assume that you have all the answers.

You thought you were going to express your ultimate truth today, but it's challenging to get to the bottom of your current emotional discomfort. You could be drawn into an intense disagreement that's motivated by a possible misunderstanding. If you aren't willing to share your deepest feelings, others might not be able to accept your words as sincere. Even if you don't have a specific outcome in mind, don't hold back. You will end up just where you're supposed to be if you follow your heart.

You have a wide spectrum of feelings that may be difficult to talk about today. Unfortunately, these emotions have a hold on what's happening in your outer world, even if they are unconscious. For example, if someone is trying to control you, your response might be to just let it slide. Keep in mind that whatever you don't deal with now will just surface again in a different context. Bring unresolved issues out into the open sooner than later for the best results.

You may not be able to stop yourself from acting out your feelings today, even if you previously decided to keep your insecurities or criticisms to yourself. It's not that you are particularly pushy now; it's just that you are following your intuition. Don't worry if a secret slips out. You'll feel a great sense of relief once everyone knows the truth.

Your insecurity in a relationship could lead you to act more intensely and passionately today. It's not that you're faking anything; it's just that you might be experiencing uncharacteristic self-doubt now. Take a risk and start a conversation about your lack of certainty. The outcome may be worth the temporary discomfort, even if you don't know what's lurking in the shadows of your mind. Holding a candle to the darkness casts an entirely new light on the situation.

You may believe that you're successfully hiding your feelings today, but those close to you can read you like an open book. Nevertheless, you aren't sure that anyone truly understands your current needs. Pay extra attention to where your thoughts are leading or you might end up misleading others in a way that will be problematic for you. Fortunately, honest self-disclosure initiates a long-overdue conversation that could resolve a lingering conflict.

It's crucial to concentrate on being practical today or you may end up obsessing about something you can't have. Your goal is a familiar one -- to find that elusive and inclusive middle ground that everyone can share. However, someone might not be willing to partake in your diplomatic process now. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to establish a playing field for negotiation because others will eventually join in once you set the parameters.

Sensual Venus crosses paths with your key planet Pluto today, and you're not willing to play games, unless you believe they are leading to something more substantial. Lighthearted talk is only okay if it's the way into the shadowy world of Pluto, for that is really where you want to hang out now. Be clear when explaining your intentions; you can seductively entice someone to join you on your journey, only to discover later they have a completely different idea about the destination.

You're not following rules of logic today as you seek to fulfill your desires. The moody Moon in your philosophical sign encourages you to communicate with others, but your words may be just a smoke screen. You're in touch with needs that you cannot talk about now. A Zen master might suggest that you do nothing, but this tactic probably won't help your cause. Bring your feelings out into the open, thus avoiding unnecessary additional conflict later on.

Sometimes people don't realize how deeply you feel. Just because you don't always wear your heart on your sleeve doesn't mean you are without passion. However, today your emotions may be overflowing, intensifying your interactions with others. You're aware that something deep is cooking but it seems too soon to take it out of the oven. Allow your process to develop before trying to explain yourself to anyone else, but remember there's nothing wrong with being vulnerable with someone you trust.

Your emotional needs may differ from those of your friends and family, but it might feel overwhelming to stand up to anyone else at this time. You could be afraid of creating too much ill will by bucking the tide. However, resentment builds if you keep your feelings to yourself. An open and honest policy is your safest route to peace of mind, even if you must transverse some bumpy territory first.

You may be very accomplished at managing multidimensional living, but complex dynamics can put a strain on you today. You are being called to reevaluate your long-term goals and might need to do some powerful work within your dreams and fantasies. Take time to meander through your thoughts until your desires begin to settle down. However, sooner or later you must face your feelings through direct interactions with others. Wait for the right moment to act, but don't wait too long or you'll miss your chance to connect.

You are riding an uplifting flow of energy today, yet your overconfidence can set the stage for a letdown tomorrow. Don't waste energy dreaming about unrealistic adventures. Instead, apply your creativity to the power of the present moment, and  new opportunities may reveal themselves. Concentrate on what you need to do now instead of what you want to do in the future.

You're intrigued by the possibility of withdrawing from the social scene today. You're inspired to retreat so you can recharge your emotional and spiritual batteries. However, responsibilities at home may make it difficult to relax. Plan your day in advance by scheduling your chores first and leaving enough time to reconnect with yourself later.

The evocative Moon's current presence in your 7th House of Partnerships raises the stakes by way of an emotional confrontation. Nevertheless, you are still able to maintain an upbeat attitude and can turn a difficult situation into a positive one. Don't be afraid to share your optimism since the Sun supports generous Jupiter in your sign, making you a natural at switching on the charm and getting what you want.

You may be in the mood to do something special today that applies your creative energy toward a crafty project. But don't put your desire to get things done between you and emotional intimacy. Instead of keeping busy to distract attention from the real issues, be brave and talk about your feelings. The first step is the hardest; the conversation will go easier once you break the ice.

You don't want to express your true feelings today, even if they are very close to the surface. The good news is that others are more likely to listen to you and actually hear what you are saying. The bad news is that you are so eager to put your best foot forward now that your friends could be satisfied with only half the picture. If you have something to say don't withhold the difficult part, since it's the tough stuff that brings the biggest rewards.

Today would ideally be a day of rest, even if you have a number of obligations to fulfill. You may feel world-weary and need some downtime to relax. Unfortunately, people continue to expect you to show up and do your part. You might be tempted to break the routine and establish your autonomy by declining involvement. However, your moral compass probably won't let you off the hook that easily. Budget your resources wisely and you will be able to deliver on your promises and have some personal time, too.

It's tricky to keep a healthy perspective today as the brilliant Sun sextiles buoyant Jupiter, making everything sparkle with potential. Even the most casual interaction can feel like a life-changing event. Although you're tempted to inflate the possibilities of an encounter with someone you like, a meeting could still turn out to be quite propitious. Just be certain to maintain a shred of objectivity so you're able to keep your expectations from getting out of hand.

You may be dealing with an emotional attachment to your property today as the reflective Moon moves through your 2nd House of Personal Resources. But remember that your self-esteem can be one of your most prized possessions. If anyone questions your motives or your values now, don't be afraid to defend them vigorously. When you know what's most important to you, it won't matter as much what others think.

Often it can be challenging when the Moon visits your sign because you aren't necessarily comfortable with your feelings being so transparent. Now, however, your subjectivity overrides reality. Managing your emotions is more comforting than usual because the Sun is harmonizing with your key planet, Jupiter. Just enjoy yourself today; you might be pleasantly surprised when others are nurtured by your good intentions.

Although you're certain to be an inspiration to others, you may wish that you could avoid the noisy crowds today. You might prefer hiding in your room rather than going out with friends while the emotional Moon is traveling through your 12th House of Secrets. Don't let your current penchant for seclusion override your need to communicate your deep feelings to someone you love.

You may feel supported by your peers and emotionally nurtured by your friends now that the Moon is moving through your 11th House of Social Networking. You're motivated by your need to connect with your community and are willing to take a short detour to make something memorable happen. This healthy connection with others is heartwarming, but don't use it as a way to avoid your feelings, especially if an unresolved issue has been simmering on the back burner for a while. An honest dialogue might be the best thing on the agenda today.

Although you may have a lot of chores to do today, you're likely reconsidering your position at work and re-envisioning your long-term career goals. Be bold in your thinking now, for your current ideas will  blend your desire for success with your willingness to work hard to manifest your dreams. If nothing else, map out an ambitious strategy for the weeks ahead. A bit of advanced planning goes farther than you think.

You are growing tired of your current responsibilities and are ready for a change of pace. You feel as if you have been working hard enough and now you are eager to take a break. Unfortunately, you may have to put off the fun and games a while longer while you fulfill the promises you already made to yourself and others. Thankfully, you'll really be able to let loose once you don't have unfulfilled obligations still hanging over your head.

You are deeply satisfied when your actions lead to tangible results. Although some projects are taking longer to complete than expected, at least you're starting to see progress instead of just pie-in-the-sky possibilities. Trust your intuition now when it comes to issues of timing. But don't be discouraged by unexpected delays; the rewards will surely be worth any frustration encountered along the way.

It's challenging to focus your mind on your immediate tasks today, but this is exactly what you must do. Temporarily set aside your desire for fun and pleasure so you can meet a deadline or make practical plans for what's ahead. Take full advantage of the present moment to accomplish as much as possible to pave the way for your future success.

Someone may step in to play the role of your boss today, possibly even making unreasonable demands on your time. You might resent their authority, whether or not they deserve your respect. But don't let your annoyance get in the way of your reactions. If you're better off doing what's being asked of you, then it obviously makes sense to go ahead and give it your best effort, regardless of your internal resistance. Open your mind and accept the reality check with a smile.

There are so many things on your to-do list today you may not have time for any extracurricular activities. You are quite wise to focus on whatever is most practical now with the earthy Capricorn Moon's presence in your 6th House of Details. Remember that your positive attitude allows you to accomplish more than you expect, and might even permit you to escape for some fun later on. Taking a methodical approach to your work should do the trick.

Unfortunately, it may be your job to rain on someone's parade today, especially if your life will be negatively impacted by the other person's failure to produce as expected. Your standards are naturally high, often setting you up for disappointment. Thankfully, your day unfolds smoother if you're able to recognize potential instead of criticizing performance. Your ability to be flexible is being tested now; adopting a positive attitude enables you to turn a difficult situation into a valuable learning experience.

Domestic responsibilities follow you around throughout the day, but you may not be able to attend to them until later in the evening. Perhaps memories of a painful childhood event distract you from your current work. If so, it may be time to forgive and forget so you can deal with more pressing issues in the present moment. Releasing yourself from your history frees you to create your future unencumbered by your past.

It may be quite a challenge to keep up with your busy schedule today, especially if a previous commitment turns into a much larger job than you originally expected. Be as realistic as possible and clearly let others know what you can and cannot do. They will appreciate your direct approach and accurate assessment more than an unrealistic promise that can't be kept. Take a deep breath and smile; even superheros can't be everywhere at once.

Financial pressures may constrain social activities today, yet a lack of cash won't necessarily dampen your overall enthusiasm. But it's not as if you're overly excited, since you have a practical outlook these days. Don't let discouragement seep into your life as the day progresses or it might get in the way of your success. Thankfully, your efforts to stabilize your resources now can have long-lasting positive effects.

You may be feeling quite emotional today, but it doesn't do much good to try to hold back the flow of your feelings. In fact, it only makes you more irritated when you can't express yourself clearly. Nevertheless, you still might try to leave your personal needs out of the equation now when interacting with others. In the long run, being yourself is always the best strategy.

Even if you must perform your everyday job duties today, your real work dwells in the spiritual dimensions now. You may feel like a bit of a loner, but that is about to change. Use the first part of the day to explore the inner world of your imagination before sharing your experiences with someone special in the evening. Giving voice to your feelings inspires a spiritual or romantic connection.

You might be offered generous support from your friends today, but you may not be willing to pay the price.
