You will have to overcome your own resistance and expose your vulnerability, even if you don't want others to see your weakness. Move past your fears and just ask for the help you need. It's OK to lean on someone else for a change.

It may feel as if the whole world is standing in your way now, but it's only a cosmic reminder to change your attitude and take the problems you face in stride. Fortunately, you can overcome most obstacles, but you need to get a bit more serious than you've been for the past few days. Your unwavering determination makes room for the fun to return by the weekend.

You are fully committed to your beliefs, but there are differences that may be worthy of discussion with your friends today. Don't take questions from others as personal attacks now, even if that's how they feel in the moment. You just might be a tad too sensitive and they might be overly zealous. If you think about what you're going to say before responding, you should be able to handle criticism gracefully and maybe even benefit from it in the process.

An initial offer may be placed on the table today, starting a serious round of negotiations. Don't try to make up your story as you go along or the other person might end up dictating the terms of the relationship. You have a better chance of getting what you want if you consider all the options and develop a sound strategy in advance. Practicing the art of compromise allows everyone to come out feeling like a winner.

You gain strength as the day progresses now that the Moon is visiting earthy Capricorn. But uncertain feelings may be upsetting at first as you seek the solid ground of clarity. Don't be afraid to take the initiative in any kind of relationship today. You can express what you want without sounding bossy. Remember, partnerships work best when all the cards are on the table and there are no tricks up your sleeves.

It's time to channel your creativity into something constructive today. Imagination dissipates into the air unless it's grounded with direct action. Fortunately, your dedication and focus transform lofty possibilities into concrete realities. This creative process requires discipline and determination, but the final result is well worth putting in the extra effort.

Although you like exercising your authority, you may not feel like you have to be everyone's parent today. Paradoxically, you might even be more serious now, but others feel safe enough around you to let their inner children come out and play. There's a new level of creative confidence that can turn drudgery into fun -- and expressing a little joy along the way helps to get the job done even more efficiently.

Your brilliant ideas and big promises are being put to the test today. Honesty and optimism are admirable, but require commitment in order to transform them into something tangible. Be a planner now; use your resources to make the difference between success and failure. Don't waste time thinking that no one values your efforts. You will receive recognition for your hard work when you stop waiting to be noticed.

The work that you recently invested in yourself is almost ready to be presented to the world. Although it's not wise to stand on the sidelines and watch silently, you aren't quite ready for prime time yet. Demonstrate enough confidence to lead those around you, but don't attempt to take over. You don't have to assume all the responsibilities; just show everyone the right direction by example and let them respond accordingly.

Waves of heavy feelings may wash over you now that the Moon is visiting sobering Capricorn. It isn't the end of the fun, but important issues that require your attention are coming back into focus. Manage your time and money with the utmost care today. Aiming your intentions with awareness increases your chances of hitting the target. Your current journey can teach you a lot about yourself, but reaching your destination brings real satisfaction.

You may feel as if people have been showing off recently and receiving unwarranted attention for their unprecedented actions. Finally, everyone seems to be ready to get back down to earth and talk to someone like you who really knows what to do. Don't overplay your authority card; a little modesty goes a long way now. It's great to be acknowledged for your expertise as long as you don't make others feel inferior in the process. It's better to be a valuable team member than to isolate yourself by being in charge.

You and your buddies have hatched some brilliant ideas, but today you may run into a more conservative thinker who isn't ready to let you have your way. You could try to sidestep the resistance, but doing a runaround isn't likely to work at this time. You'll be better off to play by the rules now, even if you choose to change them later on. Cooperation cultivates trust.

The load of responsibility that you are carrying on your shoulders may become a bit lighter today as coworkers or friends jump in to share the burden. Don't be afraid to ask for help if you have grown tired. The martyr act really doesn't pay off now and no one wants you to suffer needlessly. Plus there's more joy to be discovered by collaborating with others instead of struggling on your own.

It's usually challenging to maintain your focus for a long period of time, yet it may be even trickier today. Don't pretend that you are concentrating on what's happening now if your mind keeps wandering off into future possibilities. Others may be annoyed that you're not paying attention to them, but they're even less forgiving if they think you are pretending to listen. Be truthful and admit your dilemma; you might be pleasantly surprised by the support you receive.

You are willing to do what is expected of you, even if you don't want to be seen by too many people. But instead of making waves about your irrational desire for privacy, stay present in the real world and act in a responsible manner. Your sense of satisfaction from a job well done outweighs the benefits of a temporary reprieve. Save the imaginative excursion into your fantasies for some other day when you really need to escape.

An exciting adventure may be awaiting you, but you must place yourself back into the picture before your dreams can manifest. However, you have a problem if you recently lost touch with reality because your fantasies seemed so close. You must reestablish an immediate connection with your current circumstances before you proceed. Fortunately, once you have your feet safely on the ground, you'll be able to imagine your future and move into it with grace.

The paradox of your day is that your emotions sink to a deeper place within your subconscious, while simultaneously disconnecting from your body. Unfortunately, if you're detached from your feelings, you won't be able to express your truth with the necessary power. Remembering an awkward family situation from the past may stir up unresolved feelings, but can be exactly the emotional catalyst you need to resolve your current dilemma.

It's not easy if a friend or coworker claims to know just about everything. However, you must be careful not to alienate others by dismissing them prematurely. Remaining open to someone who is acting in an immature manner can bring surprising benefits today, especially if you have previously been emotionally unavailable to him or her. Move past your negative judgments and learn something useful about yourself in the process.

Seeking new ways to do your job might start off as an amusing pastime, yet it could pay off quickly if you make an improvement that others can use as well. However, don't fritter your creativity away by looking for pie-in-the-sky solutions to imaginary problems. It's much better to take a small positive step now and build a strong foundation than to make a leap of faith and fall short of your destination.

You may think you need to clean up a situation from a recent disagreement, but you still haven't received the stable, long-term answer that you seek. If you are frustrated because you feel misunderstood today, avoid expressing your anger at a wrong target -- that won't make anyone feel any better. However, finding a healthy outlet for your pent-up physical energy can shift the focus and save the day.

Today's high-frequency Aquarius Moon activates your nervous system, amplifies your anxiety and makes you more intellectually astute. Although you may be emotionally on edge, you're quite comfortable relying on your rational mind now. Reestablishing a solid mental connection with your past is the key that unlocks a door to your contentment in the present moment.

The Moon is traveling through your 3rd House of Data Collection today, turning up the volume on all forms of communication. Although the noise can be distracting, you might enjoy it as a welcome relief to your recent boredom. But don't fritter away your energy seeking the elusive truth. Instead of looking for a single concept to use as your foundation, motivate yourself with as many ideas as possible. Keeping your options open is your best strategy for success.

The nonconformist Aquarius Moon insists that you get to the core of your thinking and figure out a solution to overcome the obstacles in your path. Whatever project you began over the past few days when the Moon was in your sign must now be taken to the next level in order to ensure its success. All the fantastic ideas in the world are not as good as a simple one that endures.

It's time to tear down any artificial walls you previously built using fear as the primary ingredient now that the Moon is in your sign again. Revealing your vulnerability in a socially appropriate manner can raise the level of intimacy in nearly any type of relationship. Instead of unconsciously using today's intellectual Aquarius Moon to increase your isolation, construct mental bridges with kindness and awareness to cross the gulfs everywhere you go.

The separation between objective reality and subjective perception continues to narrow now that the Moon is visiting your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. You have entered a phase when your rational thoughts and irrational feelings can float around together in your dreams, detached from the specifics of what they mean. But don't stuff them back into the rows and columns of linear logic as soon as you awake. Give them permission to wander through the forgotten corners of your mind and wait to see what treasures pop up.

You are often enthusiastic in the pursuit of love and may be eager to push the envelope today. There is a high level of excitement in your life now as new ideas, experiences, and people tempt you to explore uncharted territory. But avoid putting all your eggs in one basket. Instead, keep your options open by spreading your interests around. There will be time to focus your attention on a specific goal later on.

Although you're thinking about your role at work, there may be some confusion as to the best way to proceed in light of changing circumstances. You wish you could tell someone what you are feeling, but disclosure might seem inappropriate at this time. If something does hook you emotionally, don't be afraid to share your desires. You're more psychically sensitive now and your intuition can work in your favor, if you choose to listen.

You can teach someone a thing or two about charm today, but you must be careful not to use your ability to influence others for your personal gain. You're anxious to say what's on your mind, even if it isn't the normal lighthearted stuff that people expect from you. Although you have serious issues pressing now, you can appear innocent enough to rope others into your agenda. Don't misuse your powers of persuasion by being selfish; instead, work for the common good.

You might be uncertain as to your next move because you cannot tell how others will react to your emotions now ... and the possible fallout seems a bit scary. Remember, your inner world impacts your outer circumstances, so don't bury your heart deep away where no one can find it. Wear your heart on your sleeve like a badge of courage. Follow your intuition while remaining detached from the final outcome.

This might be the day you were waiting for, but everything depends on how honest you are with what's going on inside your heart. You can successfully make your move in the department of love because you have the power that derives from your belief that you're doing the right thing. However, nothing you do today is casual, so initiate action only if you really mean it.

You are often misunderstood in the realm of romance because your actions can be easily misinterpreted by others. But you're not necessarily aloof and cool just because you're willing to wait until everything is perfect. A developing situation may ignite your passions now. Don't be afraid to slip right past the practical words and into the emotional world of desires in order to make the most of the current connection.

This is a high-energy day of conflicting messages that can force you to seek harmony in the midst of confusion. You crave romance, but your attraction isn't necessarily rational. The intensity of your fantasies has been turned up loud. Don't be afraid of sharing your heart. Although your illusions might get shattered, the potential positive outcome outweighs the emotional risk.

Your feelings are already intense, and they may continue to deepen over the next week or so. However, emotions that are often dark or obsessive become more pleasant and easier to experience for a while. A melodrama can be played out with the help of an intimate partner now, or you can even do it by yourself. Just be careful not to inadvertently transfer your fears and desires onto an unsuspecting victim. Staying aware of your motives  positively inspires all of your interactions.

Relationships may grow quite passionate this weekend. In fact, everything could become more colorful for the next couple of weeks as you express needs that have been kept secret until now. Don't worry about scaring your partner away. If they cannot take you in this form, they won't be able to engage your energy down the road either. Whatever you've been hiding must be brought out into the open or it will only become more problematic later on. Trust in the truth and let the chips fall as they may.

Normally, you are uncomfortable with the possibilities of what might happen if your emotions sink into dark places. However, you're more equipped to control your feelings now so you can shine the light of your awareness into the darkness. A healthy sense of detachment makes this journey perfectly safe -- even enchanting. Let go of your fears, close your eyes and surrender into the unknown.

You may feel uneasy when situations pull you into places of intense feelings now that the evocative Moon is meandering through your sign. However, your desire to express your needs is enough to push you outside of your normal comfort zone and into unfamiliar realms. Move past the restraints of language in order to successfully sidestep a needless verbal confrontation. Take the high road and others will follow your lead.

The practical side of your life is in the spotlight now that several planets are visiting your sensible 2nd House of Resources. However, you're also spending more time exploring your own private dreamland. The deeper you travel inside, the more power you will display outside as your confidence radiates from within. Fortunately, you can engage the real world directly from your imagination by taking a chance and sharing your vision.

Thinking before speaking is always a good idea, and today it's even more important if you don't want to spend your time cleaning up the messes you created. There's no need to be dishonest. The truth is absolutely required; however, it's less about what you say than how you say it. Don't upset any apple carts now -- unless you want to waste precious time picking up apples throughout the week.

You need to be cautious in your interactions because your emotions are a bit elusive today. You might not be able to escape from the fog, making it nearly impossible to understand what you are feeling. This, in turn, can create situations where you mislead others because of your own lack of clarity. Don't waste energy being dramatic; getting upset only blows things out of proportion. Be safe and zero in on real events for now.

Today is a perfect day to meditate, but this isn't something you'll be able to learn on the spot if you haven't already practiced. You may feel too restless to sit still for long enough to gain the benefits of this kind of metaphysical pursuit. In any event, keep reminding yourself to slow down. The less you do now, the more can enjoy yourself in the present moment.

Your feelings will come out into the open sooner or later, so you might as well bring them up yourself. You tend to avoid discussing an uncomfortable subject if you're afraid of how others will react. However, it doesn't really matter now. All that's important is for you to get busy and find a way to let some of your pent-up emotions flow through your protective shell. You must be willing to take a risk in order to reap the rewards of a supportive relationship.

You may need to release some steam, but it's wise to do it gently even if you are feeling angry. One strategy is to keep the larger issues in check so that you don't blow your top. But stay open to your dreams because they help you maintain a healthy perspective on those things that seem so out of whack. Let your imagination run wild while keeping your words to a minimum. You can share your fantasies once their intensity begins to settle down.

You might believe that your concepts are brilliant today -- and perhaps they are -- but there's also plenty of room now for self-delusion. It may be challenging to ride your own ideas to their conclusions, because new ones float into awareness before the previous ones fully develop. Lay off the caffeine and focus your attention on what's right in front of you instead of letting your thoughts buzz around all over the place.

It may take too much energy and concentration to keep up with your fantasies now, so don't bother to explain them to others. Instead, concentrate on creative activities. You might be able to burn off some of your excess energy by doing something that is spontaneous and fun. Let go of your plans for the day; you can return to your regular routine tomorrow with a satisfied smile.

It may seem as if you're on a roller coaster of emotions today, but you'll be able to enjoy the fluidity of your feelings if you view the day as a wild ride. Don't try to push the energy up into your brain -- the current process requires you to stay in touch with your intuition rather than relying on analysis. Trust the images that are bubbling into awareness, for they hold the keys to your future.

You may be feeling as if you're on the edge of something big today, but you can't yet figure out what will happen. The past and the future have merged and it seems like the present moment should be clearer than it is now. You want excitement and adventure, but you're left dissatisfied with just a series of unrealizable daydreams. Accept them for what they are and move on when you are ready.

The rock-solid ground you thought was underfoot has temporarily disintegrated. Something that is supposed to be stable has disappeared right before your eyes. However, this can be a magical and creative time for those of you who have faith. Use your imagination to sail past the very same obstacles that were previously in your path. The opportunity to rebuild your foundation will give you a better place to stand in the future.

Your nervous system may be in a state of gentle rebellion as thoughts come quickly now, whether you ask for them or not. But you're not entirely in control of your own mind today. Don't try to stop the far-out ideas from popping into awareness; don't even attempt to understand them. Just be philosophical in your approach and let the images entertain you for a while.

It may still be challenging to narrow your vision today as the Moon in your sign contacts nebulous Neptune. You might feel as if there aren't any walls or boundaries now, making it tricky to know when to stop. You're on edge as little things can set off cascading reactions within your mind. Even if you aren't sure of where you are going, don't let the uncertainty slow you down too much. For now, just stay in motion. You'll learn more about your destination shortly.

Your world is abuzz with excitement today, yet you may not notice if there's trouble on the way. It's not that you are in denial; it's just that your attention is fully dedicated to the present moment. You're so focused on what you need to do now that you might forget about the bigger problems and do nothing to solve them. Expanding your vision can prevent a major headache later on.

You still may have a secret that you're keeping to yourself, yet you also could get an opportunity to use some of what you know to gain the confidence of others. You are able to project a magical and charming image, enabling you to attract what you want. However, don't misuse your power of persuasion or things can backfire. Gain the trust of others by showing your vulnerability instead of smooth talking them into seeing things your way.

Be careful what you say today because others may take your words at face value. This is complicated by your current tendency to embellish the facts with added little pieces of your own information, which aren't necessarily factual. Your fantasies can inspire others, but you are better off telling the truth, instead of getting lost in the wonderful stories that you share.

Although your relationships are important to you, today they must take a temporary back seat to something that's happening in your professional life. Even if you are confused about what is most important, try to keep your focus on the outer circumstances now, rather than your feelings. You'll be able to return to your personal concerns once your responsibilities don't require as much attention.

Although it's a high-energy day, you still might have to go back over some territory you already covered. If you bump into resistance, don't just push it out of the way. Instead, try to understand the lesson you are receiving. Look at everything as symptoms of deeper meaning. Once you get the message, obstacles will fall to the wayside.

Running willy-nilly into the day by doing one thing after another may not be the best use of your vivid imagination today. You are in the midst of a busy time, and the more structure you give to your calendar, the more time you have for fun and relaxation. You won't have to sidestep any of your responsibilities, but you need to cultivate your creativity if you want to do it all.

Today you may face a recurring dilemma in your life as you struggle to find room for your own needs within the context of making your partner happy. Ultimately, it's about taking care of yourself versus taking care of others, even if you're not involved in an intimate relationship. Don't avoid the uncomfortable issues. Think about what you really want now, and then ask for it.

It could be nearly impossible to keep your needs quiet now, but expressing them won't get you what you want, either. Unfortunately, attempts to keep your feelings tightly wrapped while you wait for a more opportune moment probably won't work. As much as you might like the advantage of right timing, circumstances may unwrap things just enough to get the ball rolling. However, you are better off to say what's on your mind and in your heart without harboring too many expectations.

Although you may be quite confident now, don't try to push too hard yet. You might not even realize how much energy you have behind your actions. Without any ill intent, you could inadvertently offend someone you want on your side. Think about what you need today, but extend your plans over the next week or so. This tactical delay allows you to make optimal use of the rising tide without upsetting anyone in the process.

Although the universe is reminding you to loosen up, this is no simple task for you. You have too much at stake to just go along with the flow now, especially since you don't even know where it's taking you. You wish you were controlling the direction of the currents, but don't delude yourself into false feelings of grandiose power. Don't resist; instead, relax and float downstream for a while.

You are not bored today; in fact, you're probably much busier than you prefer. Fortunately, you have enough energy to handle nearly anything that is thrown at you now. You also have the motivation to start a project that you've been dreaming about. Although you feel as if you're being called to action, remain as practical as possible. You need to have your plans in hand before you can begin construction on something new.

This is a very interesting day, for you are able to be in the world and not in it at the same time. You Fish often swim within a context of a rich imaginative life. Your dreams are vivid and your spiritual pursuit gives your life meaning. Thankfully, your inner life is in harmony with your outer world, so make the most of this equilibrium while it lasts.

The Moon's return to your sign adds an emotional charge to the next couple of days. Although your life is already in high gear, this intensity just turns the volume up even louder. It's all too easy for you to act with conviction before you even think about how you might come across to others. Remember, everyone isn't as amped up as you are, so be gentle and patient while continuing to express your feelings with passion.

Something is brewing out of sight now as the evocative Moon visits your 12th House of Secrets. It's crucial to discover what you're missing or it could have a negative impact. An event may be set into motion that will require more from you than you can give. Remember, it's always best to catch any potential problems before they manifest and not after.

You want to participate in more social activities now, yet you must be careful not to be too aggressive in the process. You can easily exhaust others since they aren't built to travel at the same pace as you. Rather than charging ahead, try visualizing yellow warning lights at every interaction; proceed with extra caution, but don't come to a full stop. You have the potential to upset the apple cart today, so it would be wise to slow down before you have to clean up a mess.

A recurring dilemma about whether to push ahead or to retreat can demand your attention now. Unfortunately, today's mixed cosmic signals don't help you decide. On one hand, you are ready to take your idea to the next level. On the other hand, you're fearful of the changing tides and don't want to be left high and dry. Although you prefer to make a decision and be done with it, it's more advantageous to take your time and consider all your options carefully before choosing your path.

Although you might try to avoid your inner voice that tells you to take life more seriously, you have probably already decided that it's not worth fighting the inevitable. If you could just let go, everything would likely take its course and you won't have to work so hard. But you cannot change your own somber disposition overnight. Be patient when honoring your feelings; your fun-loving spirit will return sooner than you think.

You may need to step beyond your comfort zone and be emotionally expressive now in a way that is uncomfortable for you. You are often eager to apply your logical analysis to the task at hand, but staying in your head today won't get you where you want to go. Thankfully, exploring your feelings allows you to enter a magical space where time slows down and you can run circles around everyone else. Don't hold back; it's your day to go for the gold.

You can't get in a final word on a variety of topics today, and the more you try to make yourself heard, the less likely anyone will listen. Circumstances require you to initiate action, but nothing you do seems to alter the overall nature of the day. However, you can modify your attitude and that, in turn, changes everything. Take the events in stride and enjoy yourself in spite of the work you still need to do.

You may quickly get yourself into trouble today as you start one thing after another, and finish the day without having much to show for all your running around. You must do a tricky dance now but, fortunately, you can turn this to your advantage. Visualize yourself wearing blinders to remind you to narrow your field of perception. And don't start the next big project until you're finished with your current tasks and ready to move on.

Although you're rather restless today, you still may feel like an eternal optimist. It's hard to turn off your brain even if you have scheduled a wonderful play day for you and friends. Thankfully, you have an overabundance of charm these days which can help you get what you want. Just be careful about what you ask for because you might actually receive it.

You may be dealing with a complicated problem and you are right in the thick of things trying to discover a solution. What makes today even more difficult is that you are clearly missing a piece of the puzzle and are hesitant to take sides until you have a clear picture with all the facts. Be gentle with yourself and recognize that it's hard to come up with useful answers now. However, continuing your research will lead to success as long as you don't give up.

As much as the idea of breaking out of a restraining situation is exciting, it may be wiser to wait a while longer. If you do turn your life upside down now, it might take a while for everything to settle back down. Even if you are committed to finding an effective way to work within the current limitations, you are still free to apply your rational skills and spiritual training to your work.

Taking a hard look at your finances is a high priority today and unfortunately, this isn't just about balancing your checkbook. You need to decide how you are going to optimize what you have and move into the future. It's time to be practical about your life. Don't try to make anything more important than it is; just put your energy toward getting your fiscal world in order.

You may think your perceptions are so precise today that you don't need to consult anyone else. Unfortunately, you might understand exactly what's happening and take foolhardy action anyhow. Instead of acting in an overly confident manner and making grandiose gestures based on incorrect assumptions,  ask others what they want first and then take their ideas seriously. Feedback from someone you trust can help you make a positive breakthrough in your own behavior.

You may head into work with a secret today, not that you'll be able to keep it to yourself for long. Even if you promised someone else that you wouldn't talk, you could always try to justify your actions if you believe that telling the truth outweighs everything else. However, there are other factors to consider and playing your cards close to your vest is an admirable goal for now. Exercising discretion cultivates trust.

Hanging out with friends sounds like a fine idea now, but you can't run out on your work commitments just to have a good time. The good news is that you should be able to enjoy yourself today as long as you get your work done first. Taking the easy way out will not be as rewarding as you might expect. You'll like what you see in the mirror more if you deliver on your promises with a smile.

It's a challenge to rein in your impulses now, but telling others what they need isn't such a smart move. You can easily talk about your life, career goals and plans for the future, yet your message might not align with what's in your heart. It isn't that you are misleading anyone on purpose; it's just that you may currently be filled with ambivalence. Let your emotions continue to settle naturally without trying to push your agenda on to anyone else.

Your Leo roar might be quite ferocious today as the expressive Aries Moon bumps into difficult aspects with stern Saturn and relentless Pluto. You are willing to stand up for your beliefs, even if it means engaging in an open conflict. Nevertheless, don't worry about what may happen down the road, because you don't have all the information at your disposal yet. Ironically, the whole story will come out if you don't dig too hard for the answers now.

This is the perfect day to discuss the larger issues that are often set aside in the name of getting things done in the present moment. Even if you can't find the answers you seek, just talking about your goals may be of a great help now. Open communication is not only the way into a deeper and more personalized relationship; it's also the way out of a dilemma.

You are the partnership people of the zodiac and you tend to be even more engaged with those around you. Fortunately, you can easily accommodate the needs of others. However, your perceptions are so sharp that it's difficult to separate out your own feelings. Don't minimize your desires; taking good care of yourself enables you to be emotionally available to nurture those who need it.

If you recently failed at an attempt to make changes in a diet or exercise program, now is a perfect time to try again because of all the planetary pressure on your 6th House of Routine. Although you may be tempted to do something in a radically new way, don't lose sight of your goals. Stay focused on your destination to minimize your boredom and keep on track. Making small healthy adjustments leads to lasting positive change.

This is a very productive day if you can find the maturity to capture your creativity instead of squelching it. But even if your spontaneous expression is not practical, don't let that stop you now. Ultimately, your unrestrained emotional disclosure may simply be a catalyst that gets you just where you wanted to go all along.

If you have been wrestling with problems on the home front, things may appear to improve today, especially if going to work takes the pressure off your more personal concerns. However, keep in mind that the family dynamics will likely be waiting for you whenever you choose to return. Set your caution aside and delve into the issues at hand. Thankfully, your good intentions and sincere efforts won't go unnoticed.

Your life can be quite exciting now, filled with a variety of things to do and people to see. But all this noise might also increase your anxiety, making it difficult for you to think about the real work at hand. It really doesn't matter if you are sure of the outcome. Just jump in and do your best. Good fortune may be delayed but, luckily, it's still on the horizon.

Others may think that you have a great deal of confidence at this time, but, ironically, you might feel as if you aren't standing on very solid ground. Unfortunately, it only makes matters worse when you project an air of false optimism. Instead, just be honest. It's best to let others know if you are experiencing uncertainty beneath your sunny veneer. Ultimately, everyone involved will breathe a sigh of relief once the truth is out in the open.

Today's exciting New Moon in your sign is a great time to start a project, so clear out the old and bring in the new. Your self-confidence may be running strong, but don't get so wound up in what you can do that you let the morning slip away without actually putting an idea into motion. Once you begin, it's crucial to find a pace that you can sustain to maximize the potential; otherwise, your best efforts might be wasted.

You're standing on the edge of something big, but the Aries New Moon lands in your 12th House of Escapism today, making it crucial to move out of your fantasies and into the real world. Don't let your fear of change come between you and your goals. Your ideas are neither reckless nor impulsive, for you have been thinking about them long enough. Move forward with determination one step at a time and your confidence will grow.

The Aries New Moon falls in your 11th House of the Future, prompting you to take a risk to make your dreams come true. You feel as if you must act quickly or lose the potential of the moment. Don't waste time making more plans; flying by the seat of your pants actually allows you to react to the changing dynamics with greater flexibility. It will be better to make adjustments later on than letting an amazing opportunity slip through your fingers now.

Today's spontaneous Aries New Moon in your 10th House of Public Status triggers personal conflict about your professional role in the world. People may be making demands that pull you out of your comfort zone. You might not want to go the distance until you realize that revealing your vulnerabilities is a better option than not showing up at all. Take a chance and open your heart.

Your life is busy now that the enterprising Aries New Moon activates your 9th House of Big Ideas, tempting you to reach even farther. However, success may feel hollow if you are always yearning for something else. It's great to crave the attraction to someplace, something or someone new as long as it doesn't prevent you from experiencing the magic of the present moment.

Anyone who thinks you can't go the distance now just doesn't know very much about you. You are wired to a power source that keeps you strong, even if you don't express it all the time. Today's forceful Aries New Moon occurs in your 8th House of Intimacy, making you a likely candidate for an emotional breakthrough. However, you must apply both your logic and your intuition to the situation; learning to work in both worlds increases your chances for success.

Your objective sense of social balance is called into action today by the Aries New Moon landing in your 7th House of Relationships. You won't fall victim to anyone's biases even if others are in disagreement with your perspective, allowing you to facilitate a workable compromise. Lean on your interactive skills by mediating a solution as you co-create common ground for everyone to stand on.

The Aries New Moon's emphasis on your 6th House of Efficiency can be challenging if you feel like you aren't being allowed to do your chores your own way. You want to apply your intensity and focus on something you already started, but unexpected circumstances may require you to suddenly change direction. Although this instability can be annoying, don't fight it; you're better off just working your magic on whatever is right in front of you.

Your previously hidden motives may be revealed now, yet you don't necessarily feel more vulnerable. Actually, you want others to know who you are and what you are doing since the Aries New Moon falls in your 5th House of Self-Expression. You believe that you can make your position more acceptable by demonstrating your openness. Even if you don't convince anyone of the merit of your ideas, at least they will know exactly where you stand.

Today's Aries New Moon's presence in your 4th House of Foundations reminds you there is much to be gained by withdrawing to take stock of your feelings. It may be stressful as you come to grips with what's actually happening within your own psyche, but it's crucial that you do the inner work. Thankfully, you're able to act with integrity once you understand yourself better, inspiring others to give you their enthusiastic support.

It's a busy day with the Aries New Moon occupying your 3rd House of Communication. This lunation can initiate a cycle with unexpected news that widens your perspective and presents a path that you had not previously considered. There may be so much information coming at you now that it's nearly impossible to know which messages are the important ones. Take time to prioritize the incoming data before wasting your energy on the wrong goal.

This is a great day to make decisions, for the Aries New Moon lands in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem and your values seem perfectly clear to you. You are certain of your intentions and you have a good sense of what needs to be done to accomplish your goals. If it seems as if you should take action right away, then listen to your intuition. But don't jump in unless it truly feels right. Now is only better than later if it is consistent with your core beliefs.

You're driven to express yourself in a straightforward manner and there isn't much that will stand in your way. Although you enjoy the pursuit of romantic love, you might be overly aggressive without even realizing it. Check out the other person's feelings before you reveal too much, or you could find yourself in an embarrassing position. Exercising common sense as you move through the day is better than cleaning up an emotional mess after the fact.

Personal loyalties may come to the forefront now that the Moon is back in your sign, motivating you to make a tough choice. Unexpected circumstances might require you to be an anchor for someone else today. Basing your actions on your deepest convictions produces the most significant consequences in your relationships. You truly can't go wrong if you simply follow your heart.

You may be ready for some excitement today, but a quiet little voice reminds you that frivolous diversions are not what you need at this time. Unfortunately, you might not listen to this cautionary voice of reason because since you have your own ideas about how to deal with the current circumstances. Although you can be quite determined to have a good time, consider changing your plans and playing later when your work is done.

A relationship conflict may intensify now, which puts a damper on your day. However, it probably won't be serious enough to derail the train of success. You could be making steady progress in your career, but change and growth happen slowly. Even if you're uncharacteristically impatient today, keep your intentions out in front of you like a carrot on a stick. By positively motivating yourself, you'll be able to stay on track.

You are eager to display your big heart in a way that shows everyone how much you have to give. However, this grand gesture can act like a double-edged sword because others also see how much you need. Your desires are very strong today and it helps to pay extra attention so that you don't inadvertently hurt someone's feelings. Generosity doesn't have to come with a price tag.

You may appear cool on the surface because you're tempted to downplay your feelings so others don't get caught up in your emotional drama. Unfortunately, the problem with this strategy is that your true passions might be blocked in the process. It's easier to pursue your needs if those closest to you know your real feelings. Coming clean can raise concerns because you don't want to sound inappropriate; nevertheless, it's time to act on your desires now without worrying about what others think.

When things grow too intense, you often like to lighten the conversation and put others at ease. But you can still find meaning today from the magical spaces created in a close friendship or romance, even if you are more comfortable balancing out the energies. If you allow yourself to be pulled into powerful currents of complex feelings now, you might just emerge with a totally fresh perspective.

You may feel as if you're riding a roller coaster today as you get bounced around by your changing moods. A stubborn friend or workmate might try to slow down your progress when the Moon opposes austere Saturn, but you are empowered to show up as your authentic self when the Moon harmonizes with passionate Pluto later in the day. Speak from the heart; relationships are more meaningful when you're living in integrity and expressing your truth.

You have a powerful inner resolve that you can rely on now, no matter what is happening in your outer world. Your life is changing quickly these days, but you may not fully understand how it affects your future. Don't worry about being left out; just let go of anything that stands between you and your success. There's no need to interfere with the process because room is being made for new opportunities which will enter your life soon.

You are blessed with the extra endurance you need to hold your position today on the stormy seas of change. Meanwhile, your current situation is forcing everything around you to shift. You can feel something special in the air -- and, luckily, it seems benevolent. Get ready to dance with the unknown because if you try to ignore the music, it will just play louder and louder until you cannot shut it out.

Although your day-to-day world is filled with busyness and excitement, you are growing weary of having to be so responsible. You long for a simpler existence where you have time to relax without running off to the next activity. But don't let the difference between what you have and what you want bring you down. Fulfill your current obligations while maintaining a grateful attitude. Thankfully, you'll get the chance to rest and recuperate over the weekend.

Your best application of today's powerful energy might be to spend it in silent contemplation, but you won't likely have the luxury to take a personal retreat. Instead of planning your escape, cultivate a spiritually conducive atmosphere in all that you do. Don't get discouraged; just make some time for quiet meditation or get outside in a natural setting that is good for your soul.

You may be so excited about what's ahead that you can't get much work done today, but your feelings have to take a back seat to practicality. You still must do whatever it takes to meet your current obligations, even if it means cutting back on pleasurable activities. However, it doesn't make sense to go overboard and cancel everything on your schedule. If you settle down and concentrate on your work now, you might even have time left over for play later on.

Your friends and coworkers may look to you for guidance today, since you seem to possess a clear mind and sound judgment. Unfortunately, your current advice might not be so helpful because you have a tough time saying exactly what you mean. Instead of relying on words, let your actions speak for you. It's best to lead by example now and not by command.

You may feel like you're being unfairly restricted if you have too many commitments on your calendar today. Your imagination is on overdrive and you don't want to waste all your creativity on your job. You prefer to complete your work tasks quickly and then drift on mental currents, letting them sweep you along for a whimsical ride. Although this fantasy sounds sweet, it's smarter to harness your cleverness for something more productive and leave the dreaming for the weekend.

Concrete plans can drive you toward making conservative decisions at work today, but you won't likely be satisfied now unless you add a bit of risk to the picture. Relying on your common sense is a very practical strategy, but real progress happens if you take a chance on something other than the tried and true. Be daring and break out of a rut without worrying about jeopardizing your current security.

Exhilarating adrenaline rushes motivate you to do something beyond the ordinary today. Your creativity is running wild, yet you can't shake a very practical perspective that inspires you to be productive ... even while you're having fun. If you have to make a decision about your future, erring on the side of caution now is better than reaching too far and falling short of your goal.

Having a good time while also doing the right thing often requires more effort, but today all the pieces fall into place. The greatest danger comes from taking yourself too seriously as you attempt to eliminate old patterns that no longer support your journey. Unfortunately, established habits can return even when you think you've seen the last of them. Small modifications are not enough to create the desired effect now. Don't be afraid to really shake things up with radical action to free yourself from the past.

Your indecision may be challenging today as you figure out how to seek pleasure while also fulfilling someone else's expectations. However, it's difficult to second-guess your friends and associates now because they are not conforming to your plans. The current lesson for everyone is to live and let live instead of trying to balance your personal needs with those of the larger group. Focus on enjoying the present moment rather than worrying about the future.

Relentless Pluto reminds you to let go of control as it begins its retrograde period today. Fortunately, you can turn your key planet into your best ally as long as you step up to tackle an emotional issue that you were previously trying to ignore. You could be rewarded with more appreciation than you expect if you're willing to follow someone else's lead. But don't assume that change will be immediate since it may take a few days to see any results from your current shift of perspective.

The cost of pleasure may actually be higher than you think now, but you might not realize it until after you say yes. You are enthusiastic about the possibilities, making it likely for you to be swept up in the excitement of the present moment. Your day can quickly become entangled in emotional drama, especially if there's a romantic attraction involved. Think about the consequences of your actions before doing something impulsive that will need fixing later.

You are often the champion of responsibility, yet today your key planet, Saturn, receives an electric jab from spontaneous Uranus, prompting you to make a quick escape. But this exciting cosmic zap also sends mixed signals to your brain because you are nervous about running out on a promise. Even if you decide to play the energy conservatively, don't deny your feelings. Acknowledging your desire to shake things up may be enough to keep things together for now.

You crave the excitement of variety in your daily routine, but today everything could become too chaotic to manage. However, don't just shut down and withdraw, for the lack of distractions may be even worse than too many of them. Blazing a moderate path between the two extremes can be challenging, yet it's the smartest option available at this time. Give yourself the chance to follow your heart.

Your plans for a vacation might run into an unexpected obstacle today, especially if your dreams are too big for your budget. Financial restraints could deter you from finalizing travel arrangements. Or, perhaps a lack of resources prevents you from enrolling in an educational course. Either way, don't just cave in and give up. Readjust the scope of your vision and try again in a few days once the energy improves.

You may be busy all day, but it probably feels good to be in perpetual motion. Thankfully, you can accomplish a lot, but unless you concentrate on what you're doing today, you could stir up a commotion without completing anything. Don't jump into the next project just to escape the drudgery of the current one. Rather than ending up frustrated because you spread yourself too thin, applying a bit of self-control enables you to finish your work.

Your best plan is to continue working on a recently started project instead of throwing yourself into a new one that might lead to nowhere. Your mind may be running through a variety of possible alternatives now, but every time you think of another idea, you can turn it into something bigger and better. Unfortunately, if you let your thought-bubbles become too inflated, they will surely pop. Wait until tomorrow before initiating action, even if you're raring to go today.

Your thoughts and feelings rise to the surface once the evocative Moon returns to your sign this morning, and everyone can read you like an open book. However, you could react to others so fast that you might find yourself making promises you can't keep. Don't take on a large commitment before you consider how much time and energy you have to put into it. Taking a few deep breaths before saying yes enables you to step back and evaluate your options.

You are eager to follow your emotions all over the map ... but leading with your feelings won't make you any happier today. Actually, it may even have a negative effect if you get caught up in unnecessary drama. Practice detachment by imagining yourself to be more unattached than you really are now. If you can let go of your disappointment over  unmet expectations, joy might knock on your door sooner than you think.

Your friends may be the source of more information than you need to know today. However, once you learn something, you are quick to integrate it with your evolving perspective. Don't try to hold on to whatever you thought was the truth. Be open to change and the day will roll along with greater ease. A flexible attitude is your key to living in harmony with others.

Your current dilemma stems from simply being too busy. You know what you must do, but you cannot find the time to focus your attention as one thing after another distracts you from your routine. Even if you try to stay on track, reality comes tugging at your sleeve. There isn't an easy way out of this predicament. You might just have to put up with the noise now while continuing to do the best you can. Thankfully, exerting extra effort today may bring unexpected rewards during the week.

Visions of exotic places drift in and out of your imagination today. Perhaps you are overdue for some vacation time, or maybe you just long for a quick getaway to recharge your batteries. But don't let these fantasies end at idle daydreaming. Use your desire for adventure to motivate you to manifest the trip you want to take. Asking someone to join you adds to the fun and makes the expedition more likely to happen.

Although your thoughts start to brighten today, you aren't ready to give up on uncovering the hidden meaning of life. Anything that stirs up your curiosity can quickly become the subject of a more intense investigation. Don't get lost in an endless search for Atlantis when your current environment also holds important truths for you to discover. Explore your world with an open mind and a compassionate heart.

The evocative Moon opposes your Sun sign now, reflecting your feelings on a variety of relationships in your life. This introspective awareness impacts both personal and professional associations as you integrate the events of the past few days. You aren't completely through this unstable period, but the situation may appear to settle down to give you a cooling off period. Don't become complacent ... you still have plenty of work to do next week.

A jittery feeling washes over you in waves today and you aren't quite sure what to do with this sensation. You can't easily shake it off now, although your anxiety might motivate you into action. Working toward a goal can distract you from the annoyance, but it probably won't cure your underlying restlessness. Make positive changes in your daily routine to help ease your mind. Taking small steps is more efficient than trying to do everything at once.

Your life takes a turn for the better today as the intense transits of the past week begin to wane. Meanwhile, the Moon is visiting airy Gemini, helping you reclaim your old familiar bounce. There is no reason to hide your light since your confidence is returning in full force. Sharing your dreams is the first step to making them come true.

The chatter of your own mind can make you feel a bit on edge today, but don't let your attempts at rationalization pull you off your creative course. Logic oftentimes steers you in the right direction, but now it only undermines your potential. Listen to your thoughts, but don't put too much credence in them at the moment. Trust your intuition and it will continue to work in your favor.

You're tempted to act like a wise guy today, speaking before you think about the consequences of your sharp words. But don't be so quick to use laughter to mask your feelings. If you are responding via email, read each message twice before sending it. Although you might think that your first shot is your best shot, taking your time allows you to deal with the real situation rather than just covering it up.

You may need to update your budget at home or review recent expenditures at work. You might even be required to justify certain expenses. Or, perhaps you have to spend time on the phone managing a financial matter that demands your undivided attention. Whatever crisis surfaces now, your communication is likely about money. Deal with anything that affects your bottom line. Take care of business today so bigger problems do not surface later.

It seems as if you're being flooded with information now that the Moon is back in your sign. Although you might sense an approaching data gridlock, there's a part of you that actually thrives on the chaotic pace of life. Don't try to turn the volume down. Life will settle back to normal in a few days, so enjoy the ride while it lasts.

You might feel somewhat detached from your immediate surroundings today. It's as if you are hidden in a murky swamp looking up at the world. But everything seems warped out of shape by the ripples on the surface of the water. However, in this case it's not reality that is bent out of shape; it's you. Maintain a low profile until later in the day when your clarity returns along with your confidence. Playing the observer for a while teaches you a valuable lesson.

A healthy sense of certainty is usually a positive trait, but not if you believe that you're the only one who truly understands what's going on today. Unfortunately, you might have to accept that you don't have a monopoly on the truth. Even if your sense of the situation is based on the facts, there are many ways to frame reality. Allow for multiple points of view because you're not the only person involved. Weaving everyone's perspective together creates a rich tapestry of meaning.

Some aspect of your spiritual vision is feeding your current success and inspiring the recognition you are receiving from your peers. However, there could be problems if you are motivated by power or by the need for control. Take a long hard look at your motives and make sure that your efforts are for the good of all. If everyone wins, so do you.

If you're obsessing over unimportant details today, set aside the rational thoughts that arise from your overloaded nervous system. Instead of wasting energy defending your beliefs, create a coherent spiritual vision from your experiences. This forward thinking requires more imagination than facts, figures and references can supply. Faith has more impact on your future than logic now.

Aim high when setting goals this week because you are entering an energetic period where you can accomplish more than you expect. You are given a chance to practice the art of transformation as you gear up for serious work. This is not just a rehearsal, but it is not quite the main event either. Don't cling to outdated assumptions. Instead, embrace the idea of change and dance with the unknown.

Be careful what you say today and how you say it. You're moving faster than anyone around you and there is a possibility for a misunderstanding if you leave something important out of your communication. Soon it may be too late to just apologize and think everything will be okay. Don't wait until a crisis occurs. Make sure you build your case before jumping to a conclusion. Repeat the really important facts if you think you weren't heard the first time.

There could be so many loose ends to tie up today that finishing your work may seem like a hopeless cause. Everything is taking longer than you expect and your regular approach doesn't seem to be working so well now. Normally, you make your ambitious plan and then get busy executing it, but this list of chores appears to have a life of its own. Do your best to maintain a positive attitude and rest assured that the unfinished tasks will wait for your return.

Your attention may be focused on everything except work today because you are enjoying the variety of diversions that find their way to your door. Creative pursuits of all kinds are emphasized, as are spontaneous activities with children. Perhaps a trip to the playground or some other spring-like outing would be fun for all. Be flexible enough with your schedule to allow room for a surprise. You can still have a great time, even if the day doesn't end as it began.

You may be more interested in sharing your current feelings or reminiscing about old memories with your family than you are in doing your chores. Your nostalgia might follow you around all day and make you very sensitive to your immediate surroundings. Retreat back into the safety of your home to find comfort today. Giving yourself permission to enjoy the sweet company of those who love you ultimately makes this day a memorable one.

You've recently had your ups and downs, as if you've been riding an emotional rollercoaster. Thankfully, the erratic energy begins to settle now that romantic Venus is leaving your sign. Relationships may no longer be as thrilling as you like, but you're rewarded by the solid foundation they can provide at this time. Use the next few weeks to stabilize your resources and take determined steps toward building more value and meaning in your life.

Pleasure may start knocking loudly at your door once your key planet Venus moves into your sign today. However, excessively indulging in all kinds of sensory delights is one potential downside of this otherwise positive transit. Go ahead and enjoy yourself, but respect your limits. Remember, exercising moderation is the key to healthy living.

Relationship issues may grow more complicated  because subconscious forces are driving your actions now. Exploring your imagination helps you get in touch with repressed issues, enabling you to better enjoy the weeks ahead. Pay special attention to your dreams, practice meditation or prayer and spend time soaking in the beauty of nature. Doing anything that puts you back in touch with your spirit is a wise idea.

Your career goals may be shifting this week to include more social activities now that resourceful Venus is occupying your 11th House of Community. You're still concerned with meeting previous obligations, but you're ready to delegate some of your work to others today so you have room on your schedule to enjoy the camaraderie of those you admire. It's critical to make time to be with your friends so you can dream about the future instead of just working in the present.

Opportunities to get ahead may come your way now, but these potential rewards can create a whole new set of problems. Your career could be taking off, but you might be required to commit more time to your job than you're willing. Don't jeopardize caring for your own personal needs. Discuss the possible consequences of your choices with someone you trust before making any final decisions.

Your thoughts are floating off into realms of possible travel or adventure today, but they might just be flights of fantasy. You may be quite determined to begin an activity that widens your current perspective. Even if you don't hop a jet to an exotic destination in the coming weeks, you can still journey to fabulous places in your mind without even leaving your neighborhood.

Your ruling planet Venus is moseying through comfortable Taurus for the next few weeks, prompting you to dream about getting back to basics. Unfortunately, downsizing isn't all that easy now, since eliminating extraneous activities could be a primary source of anxiety as Venus moves through your complicated 8th House of Intimacy. Don't retreat from confronting your fears; engaging deep processes can ultimately add more beauty to your life.

You may not be interested in an easy way out of a complex situation -- even as lovely Venus visits sensible Taurus. In fact, you might choose to take on emotional entanglements just to get the fullest possible impact from an intimate encounter. Your current dilemma is about balancing meaning and pleasure. Even simple joys have their place in your life ... and this is a smart time to explore them without complicating the dynamics.

Aspiring to escape on your next adventure is challenging if you have daily responsibilities that affect someone else. You may grow frustrated during the next few weeks as facets of these divergent desires clash. You want to explore somewhere new and do something different, but are limited because of your current circumstances. Don't stress needlessly; you will have another chance to pursue something exciting soon enough. In the meantime, complete any unfinished business so you are ready to take off when given the green light.

You may have an easier time letting go of your responsibilities so you can enjoy yourself now that Venus begins her visit to your 5th House of Love and Creativity. This is a wonderful time to schedule special activities for children of all ages. In general, you will find more pleasure being playfully spontaneous during the next few weeks. Whatever you do, don't criticize yourself for having some well-deserved fun. Even hardworking goats need to kick up their heels now and then.

You might want to stay home and enjoy a bit of peace and quiet today, especially if you have a creative project that you would like to push along. However, it may be difficult to get the alone time you want because of all the demands being made on you by others. Don't be overly concerned if satisfaction seems just out of reach. Bide your time by pursuing your interests in between meeting your obligations. Thankfully, within a few weeks you will be in a much better position to enjoy yourself as you wish.

Simple pleasures may be more available now, especially if you can talk about what you want. Don't waste energy spinning long yarns or sharing complicated fantasies. Words work in your favor only if you consciously stick with the basics. Think carefully about your desires and then state them as clearly as possible. You just might be pleasantly surprised with the results.

You want to make everyone around you feel comfortable today, even if you aren't having a great day. However, you must understand that you can only control so much. Everyone has his or her own inner work to do and until you face your psychological and spiritual issues, balance in relationships will continue to remain out of reach. Thankfully, improving your attitude is a positive catalyst for those closest to you.

You're inclined to keep your life as simple as possible, but sometimes you don't say enough because you believe that everyone shares your forthright approach and therefore knows exactly what you mean. However, today you have a chance to clear up previous assumptions that may have created bad feelings between you and a friend. The deeper you dig, the more uncomfortable the dialogue becomes, but the more joy you will feel once it's all been said.

It may be challenging to tell if you were misled or if you actually contributed to setting up the misunderstanding that now needs to be ironed out. Others might take action based upon misguided information if they don't know your point of view. Don't be overly dramatic as you confront the situation. Your integrity is at stake, so be as clear as possible in all forms of communication. Speaking your truth succinctly is your best strategy.

You may be thinking about past events in your life when your feelings were hurt, and these memories bring you all the way back to your early childhood. Now, as you remember these thoughts, you might see things in your mind's eye. Although this emotional process could be difficult, your own healing can begin once you forgive those involved ... including yourself.

You're feeling more secure as you settle into a reflective emotional posture today. Watch the current drama unfold because it's better now to be a spectator than a player. Nevertheless, your position is still tricky. You know there are things that you should say, but you don't want to hurt anyone in the process. Honesty is the best policy as long as you remember to be kind in your delivery.

It's no simple task to keep boundaries between reality and your fantasies today -- and you might take a while to sort it all out. One way to get your mind off your inner dilemma is to be more involved with other people now. Your best bet is to seek out activities with good friends who you share a common interest with to help you focus your attention on something new. Widening your social circles not only brings more joy to your life, but ultimately helps you gain clarity on your dreams.

You might decide that it's not in your best interest to express every emotion today, but don't use this train of thought as an excuse to avoid your feelings. If you close off your heart, you could end up being controlled by your fears instead of by love. Even in the workplace, you can be torn between the safety of rational thought and the vulnerability of sharing your needs. Logic may create security, but it won't bring complete satisfaction.

You have more stability now than you realize, even if you feel as if you are lost in a deep fog. The thicker the mists, the more you must rely on your intuition to figure out what is hidden in the clouds. Surround yourself with caring friends because they can give you the support that you need. Maintain your direction by using others as your inspiration today. Incorporating someone else's vision into your own helps you find the way to clarity.

Today you might recall the sacrifices others made for you at various times in your life. Or, maybe you're currently feeling vulnerable because someone isn't giving you what you need emotionally. Don't sweep your pain under the rug -- you can choose to explore how your feelings get hurt in relationships with family members, spouses or lovers. But then make certain to share your process with a trusted ally so that the healing transformation can take root. Opening your heart makes room for love.

If a close friend or business associate rains on your parade today, look at it as a test rather than a setback. Ask yourself if you're willing to continue on your course regardless of the bad weather. If you believe in yourself, a storm -- or someone's negative attitude -- won't slow you down from reaching your destination. Express your truth, even if it requires additional effort on your part to wear raingear and carry an umbrella.

You might actively seek ways to avoid a confrontation at work ... especially if a particular issue has really been bothering you lately. Perhaps someone said something that put you off and you didn't tell him or her how it made you feel. The details don't matter as much as you think; and it's wise to talk about subjects that raise complications. Solving the relationship puzzle ultimately can reestablish a deeper connection.

It may be time to start thinking about an escape plan if you can't fit yourself neatly into the relationship that you've created. However, a worthy partner will surely be able to stretch and grow in order to allow for your needs, and ideally, would be happy to encourage your individuality. And although today isn't necessarily a significant day for making decisions, it offers important clues as to how you are doing and which direction you are leaning. Initiating an honest dialogue can stabilize your life and put you back on track faster than you expect.

Crash! Bam! Kapow! You are feeling empowered now that your planet, Mars the Warrior, is lined up with the brilliant Sun. However, you may try to impose your will on everyone around you due to your exuberance. Be aware that your energy level is exceedingly high today and others might not be as engaged as you are in life. Petty ego disputes can lead to unnecessary conflict which would be a total waste of this planetary boost; use this powerful momentum to push toward greater accomplishments, instead.

Unexpressed emotions are currently being stirred and confronting them may bring up old unresolved feelings of anger. You are usually down to earth and have a common-sense attitude toward life. But today you might be mixing up memories from your childhood with current circumstances, making it more difficult to manage the situation. Being aware of the differences between then and now can free you from repeating old patterns once again.

You are likely to share your thoughts on a regular basis -- either verbally or in writing. Usually, you can say what you want and be done with it. But it may be more difficult now to separate your ideas and opinions from your identity. Unfortunately, you might end up being too aggressive in your own defense if you're overly attached to your position. Moderate your extreme emotions by acknowledging that others also have valid thoughts to bring to the table. Listen more than you talk and everything will work out fine.

Sometimes it's easier to express your annoyance by not saying anything at all. Crabs can retreat so far into their shell that no one on the outside can establish communication with them. This passive-aggressive tendency tempts you to withdraw from interpersonal interactions today. The problem with this strategy is that your anger doesn't go away -- in fact, it continues to hurt and eventually turns to resentment. Seek ways to gently express your feelings without going silent.

The hyperactive Sun-Mars conjunction highlights your 9th House of Big Ideas. A little spark can start a fire in your belly that grows hotter throughout the day, driving you to pursue your adventurous dreams. However, you might grow restless if you're unable to break free from previous commitments. Nevertheless, it's critical to find healthy ways to burn off your excess energy today or you may get drawn into a needless fight. Exploring all your options now increases your chances for success.

You might feel irritable today and yet you can't put your finger on the source of your malaise. There may be hidden issues cooking in the minds of your friends now, and it's to your advantage to get them to talk about their secrets. However, others could misread your intent if you ask too many pointed questions. Ultimately, it's your insecurity that could exacerbate the problem. Setting your ego aside and expressing your willingness to listen makes all the difference in the world.

There's some powerful energy coming your way today. However, the question is whether or not you can acknowledge it and put it to good use. If you are unable to ride the creative waves, you may take your frustration out on a friend by overstating your anger. However, if you find a way to integrate the intensity, you could come alive with amazing ideas. Be open to the potential of new ideas as your originality runs strong now. Draw your inspiration from the deepest wells in the most unexpected places.

Your professional ambitions are riding high today. You are driven to accomplish more than normal now, yet this excessive behavior poses some danger. You may inadvertently create conflict with others in your quest to achieve your objectives. Remember that your happiness doesn't have to come at the expense of anyone else. Even if your ego is telling you otherwise, there is plenty of room for multiple winners. The more the merrier when it comes to success.

Today's planetary patterns bring a mixture of messages. The good news is that your high energy level is off the charts now. You're feeling invincible and think that you can do whatever needs to be done. Although you are outwardly optimistic, the bad news is that you might realize there's something you forgot. Keep revisiting recent events to uncover the missing clue. Don't give up ... you can find it if you just believe.

One of your ongoing concerns is how to drive yourself along toward your goals without pushing others too hard. If you act too forceful, you'll feel the negative consequences as someone backs away from you. Your passion is hot right now -- maybe even too hot. Use your moral compass to keep yourself in line. You don't have to put out your internal fire ... you just have to find a constructive outlet for your irrepressible energy.

The unique situation that is unfolding now may take various paths, depending on your current relationship status. If you have functional partners, you can work together to make something special happen. But if there is discord present, tensions could rise to the surface. Some conflicts are resolved immediately, while others take longer to fix. However, some topics just create a reason to argue or fight. Practicing compromise can be tricky, but it is exactly what's called for at this time.

If you are experiencing any health problems these days, this is a smart time to think about what you can do to improve your physicality. Take responsibility for your own body, but don't just rush off to another doctor looking for the latest amazing cure. Instead of trying to discover a magical fix, make changes in your diet and lifestyle that positively impact your well-being. Set yourself up for success by starting with small but significant improvements and build from there as you begin to see results.

The excitement begins to smooth out today, but this isn't a permanent shift of energy. Although calmer sailing may be part of your immediate forecast, the fiery Leo Moon still energizes you because she harmonizes with assertive Aries. Even if you're eager for more action, catch your breath while you can. Making the time to recharge your batteries now enables you to be ready for the adventure around the next corner.

You wish you could reveal your innermost desires today as Venus in your sensual sign aligns with idealistic Neptune. However, you might have a tough time putting your feelings into words. Don't give up ... your determination empowers you to disclose something you normally would keep to yourself. You've been worrying about one particular secret long enough. Sharing it with a close friend may be the catalyst to allowing you to let go and move on.

It's not your thoughts that matter the most today ... but what's in your heart. Nevertheless, you still might need to hear those magical words of acknowledgment from someone special. A simple act of kindness can mean a lot to you now, especially if your insecurity has recently developed a life of its own. Ironically, expressing your affection helps you to get through this uncertain time. Remember, love is like music that soothes the savage beast inside you.

You continue to be highly motivated in your career and are driven to figure out your life purpose. You're easier to get along with if you are in touch with your imagination today because it's an important source of your happiness. However, it's challenging to keep your dreams alive when you're so distracted by all the events at work. Creating balance between your inner and outer worlds makes it easier to thrive in both of them.

You may not understand what others are trying to tell you today. And, if they are judging you harshly, you probably won't even hear a word they say. You might turn the volume of your expression up so high that you're not conscious of any incoming information at all. Concentrate on cultivating greater self-awareness and you'll naturally grow more considerate of others. Your willingness to examine tough issues now is the key to becoming a better friend.
