Someone might be working against you, but it's difficult to get to the source of the apparent negativity. Thankfully, this isn't a long-lasting situation and you should be able to resolve the problem without turning it into a major crisis. Instead of succumbing to fear and trying to uncover the facts, change the game by focusing on your best-case scenario. Your idealism now goes further toward dissipating the resistance than a more combative strategy.

You may be pleasantly surprised by how a close friend or partner responds when you express your feelings now. This isn't about accommodating others by saying what you think they want to hear; just share exactly what's in your heart. Even if you're worried about the uncertainties ahead, let someone you trust know what's going on for you. This personal disclosure can initiate a discussion that paves the way for increased intimacy.

You may focus your intense feelings on a single person or one particular situation if you obsess about a specific goal. You might want to employ your creative imagination to propel your life in a new direction, but everything seems to unfold too slowly. Even if you're still unsure of your next move, fix what's broken before rushing into your future.

By midday you're ready to trot, even if you're still stuck in the starting gate. You may try to make the most of your precious time, but you really don't want to wait much longer. You are eager to be living your adventure and creating your future right now, but you must be gentle with yourself. Your unresolved feelings need a bit more time to process before you can push them forward. Taking the scenic route still allows you to reach your destination in plenty of time.

You can overcome your sense of self-limitation by ignoring the facts for a while today, especially since your current resistance stems from childhood fears. Eventually, you may have to look at these old hurts with a brand new perspective that motivates you to keep moving forward with less self-restraint. Nevertheless, don't go charging ahead just yet. For now, be methodical and take it one step at a time until you know where you want to go.

It's difficult to contain your enthusiasm these days since it feels like anything is possible. In fact, you're so excitable now that it's nearly impossible to focus on the work in front of you. Others may demand that you move quickly, and although you don't need extra time to decide what you want to do, you don't particularly enjoy the pressure. Instead of overreacting, take a deep breath before you unconsciously push back too hard. Channeling your enthusiasm into a positive cause is the best revenge and sets a good example at the same time.

It's tricky to find the right starting point today ... making your day somewhat complicated to manage. It feels as if the whimsical breezes of your imagination are blowing you around and you cannot stabilize your thinking. You might believe that the current solution is to talk about your feelings. Unfortunately, the more you say now, the less clear everything becomes. Instead, practice being quiet in your mind. Your mental stillness opens the door for positive change.

Although you may be feeling quite optimistic today, you probably won't want to play by the rules of the game. You have a preferred outcome in your mind's eye and can justify nearly any behavior that brings you closer to your goal. Unfortunately, karma isn't as forgiving as you wish and could teach you a harsh lesson if you step too far out of line. Play it safe -- there's no reason to court unnecessary trouble now.

You may be acting as if you know exactly what you're doing today, yet you're probably less certain than others as you try to smooth out a domestic relationship. Although you might wish you could ignore the problems and let them sort themselves out, it's wiser to share your opinion anyhow. But don't pretend that your solution is the only one. Being flexible is a smarter strategy than being right.

You could find yourself deeply involved in a conversation about global issues with a coworker today. Unfortunately, you might become angry if someone tries to shut you up because of your unpopular position on climate change, the world economy or international politics. It's not worth trying to win an argument; more talking now only increases a misunderstanding. Agree to disagree and come back to the debate another time after everyone's cooled off.

Although you might have a wonderful time sharing your feelings with someone special, his or her response could be less enthusiastic than you expect. Everything might seem pleasant enough at first, but be on the lookout for suppressed issues lurking just beneath the surface. Instead of shutting down emotionally because you're afraid of rejection, speak from your heart without worrying about the reaction you receive. Remain open to what others say without trying to read between the lines.

The Moon returns to your sign for her monthly visit today, urging you to let your feelings flow without rational restraint. The situation becomes doubly difficult if you don't realize that there's a problem before it's too late. It's wise to deal with the situation before others become involved. Remember that you don't need the chaos and confusion. But it's even more intelligent to consistently communicate carefully so there's no break from reality in the first place.

Although you normally require clean facts and clear communications, surrealistic Neptune in your 7th House of Partners is activated now by impulsive Mars to compromise the precision of your words and lure others into your dreams. It becomes highly challenging to control where your reality ends and the illusion begins. Don't jump to any quick conclusions today and make certain that you don't lose anyone along the way.

You might feel less emotional now that the moody Moon has entered your 2nd House of Self-Worth, shifting the focus from who you are to what you have. Nevertheless, you still have unresolved stress to handle. Thankfully, everything should take a turn for the better today and you can daydream your way through the afternoon. Keep in mind that the beauty you perceive "out there" is actually a reflection of what you have within your own heart.

You're probably relieved by the lifting of the heavy energy now that the Moon is freed from yesterday's chains of Saturn. Fortunately, whatever was impeding your progress begins to fade away, but don't assume that you can reach your goals overnight. Deceptive Neptune could trick you into believing that your destination is much closer than it actually is in reality. Nevertheless, holding a vision in your mind's eye enables you to successfully stay on track until your journey's done.

Everything at work continues to improve, yet you're still unable to turn an opportunity into something that can make a real difference in your life. Although a number of significant pieces are falling into place now, they don't quite fit together as easily as they should. Relax your approach and allow the events to unfold as they will, rather than forcing them to adhere to your schedule. Magically, you'll make real progress when you become one with the larger flow.

It may be challenging to see any real purpose to idle daydreams, yet you can't turn off the switch to your fantasies as easily as you wish. You might attempt to overcompensate for your active imagination by acting in an overly practical manner. However, giving yourself permission to drift away from reality for a while could lead you to discover some very worthwhile ideas.

Acknowledging everyone's needs grows tiring now, so it's wise to conserve your energy by establishing clear boundaries. Unfortunately, your strategy may grow problematic when you realize that you might want to change your mind along the way. Remember, arbitrary rules have the potential to limit your interactions. Don't attempt to blame your inconsistencies on others ... simply accept your contradictions and get on with whatever is next.

You may feel as if you have reached a point of balance between concrete career objectives and your spiritual life path. These two divergent roads intersect now, creating a magical moment when your hopes and dreams have a more lasting impact on your world. Make the most of your current metaphysical connections by trusting your intuition to steer you in the right direction.

Your positive attitude overcomes a persistent obstacle that was in your way. Unfortunately, this wave of optimism may not bring the specific results quickly enough for you, so be patient if you're not making much progress today. Even if you're ready for something different, stay with what you've started for a while longer to give yourself the best chance for success.

You may be feeling uneasy now, and even a bit restless. Although you can usually make the best of any situation, you might lose interest in the dreams of your future if your fantasies aren't supported by the present circumstances. Give yourself permission to explore all possibilities, but don't confuse your thoughts with reality. Luckily, you should have more clarity about your long-term direction within a couple of days.

Your perspective on a personal issue might be very different from someone close to you today. Paradoxically, you're both probably working with identical sets of information. But don't get discouraged about this disagreement ... honest discussion may prove fruitful now. Thankfully, your flexible attitude enables you to get what you want, as long as you don't give up too soon.

You may have big ideas about routine work today, so it's crucial to maintain a realistic perspective on life. Open your heart and widen your vision to ease the tension on a specific situation. If you are caught up in a web of emotions, remember that your life is not as extreme as it seems. Taking little steps can create enough positive movement to give you the hope you need.

Today can be an ideal day to fall in love with a helpful person or you may be attracted to an optimistic spiritual teaching. Either way, your fantasies could transform into reality now, but you need to give your dreams a creative nudge forward. Be daring and take a risk. If you don't make your move quickly, you'll never know what you might have missed.

Today's confident Sagittarius Moon encourages you to think in a holistic manner without having to take extreme measures. Still, this is unlike your normal tendency to focus on the details and create a concrete plan. You might work yourself into an anxious state as your mind jumps back and forth from the very big to the very little. If you are pulled off course, take a deep breath and get yourself back on track for the week ahead.

You might feel a bit scattered today with the changeable Moon visiting your 3rd House of Communications. There's so much happening everywhere you turn that interactions may be distracting. Fortunately, they can also be fun. Don't waste energy attempting to quiet the day down to a comfortable level. Instead, go along for the ride and enjoy yourself while it lasts.

You can use today's optimistic Sagittarius Moon to better your personal finances as she visits your 2nd House of Money. Fortunately, you have the necessary courage now to face issues that you have previously put off. However, too much confidence also makes serious problems seem less troublesome. Don't just avoid bad news by glossing over details. Instead, fire up a bit of your famous Scorpio intensity and jump directly into your chores before it's too late.

Your shifting moods could get the best of you now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign. However, you can also learn a very important lesson today if you are willing to stop running around and simply delve into your heart. Oftentimes it's more natural to philosophize or intellectualize your emotions. Nevertheless, it's time to explore your feelings without being overwhelmed by them.

You are often the most sensible person around because you keep your feet planted on the ground while planning how to reach the top of the mountain. However, today you may be looking for an escape route as the intensity of your fantasies increases. Don't be overly concerned, for you won't lose your sense of reality. Give yourself permission to sink into your irrational dreams. You just might return with valuable wisdom that you can put to good use.

Your positive attitude prevents you from losing perspective as you gracefully handle nearly all problems that surface now. Optimism may abound, but it isn't only about you. Everywhere you turn, people seem to be more encouraging and supportive. Do whatever you can to feel the love, since your current actions set the stage for the days ahead.

You may be approached by a co-worker for your advice or help today, yet your plan might not go as you imagine even if you have the best of intentions. Listen carefully to what others expect from you. Don't promise more than you can deliver just to avoid conflict. Establish your boundaries and everything could work out better than you expect. The sooner you get the discussion started, the better off you'll be.

Time may appear to be running slowly today as everything seems to take longer than expected. You adopt a serious attitude this morning, especially if you must overcome an obstacle that catches you off guard. There's no time to complain about your bad luck or try to shift the blame to anyone else. You are being taught an important lesson now and the sooner you learn it, the quicker you can move on.

Your attempts to restore balance in a relationship may be thwarted today, especially if you think you can take the easy way out. Seriously consider what others say before rejecting a new perspective just because it's inconvenient. Rather than demonstrating how stubborn you are, graciously accept whatever situations arise now. Temporarily responding to the changing circumstances without resistance could turn a challenging moment into a pleasure-packed day.

Serving others today can bring you more contentment than you expect, even if your own needs remain unfulfilled. Someone's selfish behavior may upset you now, prompting you to resist doing anything nice. Nevertheless, overcoming petty annoyances is your best strategy because you won't be happy with yourself unless you take the high road. Giving someone the benefit of the doubt enables them to return the favor.

It's challenging to control your cravings for pleasure today, especially if you have worked hard and believe you now deserve some time off to replenish your energy. There is nothing wrong with pursuing happiness as long as you don't overdo it. Set aside a specific time to nurture your soul as well as your physical senses. Working your own needs into your schedule is the first step toward balancing your responsibilities with your desire to have fun.

Maintaining an even keel on the home front can be an annoying struggle today, especially if someone is tempting you with the potential of a great party or some other fun-filled distraction. You might see everything through a very expansive filter now, but don't jump too quickly just because something sounds good. These are serious times and you could court unnecessary problems if you don't keep your balance.

You might kick your day off with the best of intentions by aiming to be methodical about accomplishing your goals. But as the day wears on, you could become increasingly lackadaisical and fall farther behind until you just give up. Don't be overly self-judgmental if you find yourself on the short end of the stick. Give yourself the gift of some additional time off without comparing your actual production to your high ideals.

It's not helpful if you're indecisive about spending money today. Stick to your budget or you could find yourself in a difficult cash position sooner than you might expect. Conserving resources is the smartest thing you can do now ... since it's very easy to talk yourself into buying something you don't really need. If you have any uncertainty at all about a purchase, delay it for a few days and see how you feel about it then.

Interactions with others may be strained today as the stubborn Taurus Sun opposes cautious Saturn from the 7th House of Partners. You might think the smartest solution is to withdraw from social activities ... yet keep in mind that retreat doesn't have to be an all-or-nothing decision. Don't pretend that everything is okay if it's not, since your evasive tactics will be more apparent than you suspect. Be truthful when discussing subjects of significance but don't say more than is necessary.

A religious or spiritual retreat can offer you much-needed peace today, but you must be committed to follow through with your practices if they are to have a long-lasting positive impact. You have a strong need for self-expression now that the Moon is moving through your sign, and rationalizing what you do might be difficult. Remember, it's not important to follow tradition or to explain why you are not doing so. Instead, seek your own path to enlightenment and stick to it.

Determine what you should be doing today by concentrating on where you want to end up. Unfortunately, you might be drawn toward different activities. No matter what, it's crucial to achieve some balance between your immediate need for variety in your daily life and your long-term goals. Just be sure your dreams are truly yours and not the wishes of a parent, spouse or boss. The only person who can live your life is you.

Your current sense of social responsibility is strong, yet you may be looking for a loophole in an agreement you previously made. It's not that you're ready to default on your commitments now ... it's just that if there's an honorable way out, you might take it. For all the time and energy this tactic could waste, you're better off meeting your previous obligations without trying to renegotiate the deal.

The Sun's opposition to stern Saturn in your 9th House of Philosophy encourages you to rationalize your actions with authoritarian ideas. But instead of wasting time justifying old patterns, you're better off using your mind to explore new metaphysical territory. The negative consequences of your current propensity toward over-intellectualization can be minimized by emphasizing practical solutions over idle theory.

You are tempted to take a chance today, even if the odds of winning are not in your favor. It feels as if the wheel is still spinning, yet you're ready to play the game as long as there is even a remote possibility of a positive outcome. Nevertheless, your logic can raise doubts, making you less eager to blindly trust your intuition. Watch the signs carefully ... if you encounter resistance, don't be so eager to take a risk.

You may settle into a stubborn frame of mind and others won't easily convince you that your course of action isn't the smartest choice. Nevertheless, you feel as if you are coming to your senses now and are quite comfortable with your decision. Although your no-nonsense attitude will likely get you through the day, you could land in trouble if you don't pay attention to the more subtle influences at play. Just make sure to keep an open mind today when listening to someone you trust.

It's a long and winding road, but you can sense a payoff just around the next corner. Still, you must hold it together and keep moving until your well-earned recognition arrives. Be aware that everything may not turn out quite as sweet as you prefer, but you should begin to see positive results soon enough if you have done your work. Ultimately, the real reward is in the journey itself.

You wish you could run away from your busy schedule, but today may not be a great day for relaxation. Even if you want to take some time off for yourself, you might feel too responsible to kick back and do nothing. Unfortunately, the result is that you speed up when you should be slowing down. Instead of reacting unconsciously, explore creative strategies to add more balance to your life.

Others can see your growing optimism now, but you don't necessarily feel as positive as you appear. You might be afraid that you can't sustain the momentum needed to get you over the next hump. You may be growing tired, but there is still so much to be done. Nevertheless, today is like halftime at a ballgame ... it's fun as long as you don't take things too seriously. Step off the playing field and take time to refuel before jumping back into the game.

Taking things one step at a time motivates you to get a lot accomplished. Even if what you produce today isn't crucial, you can still see what's left to do. Your glass may seem half empty rather than half full now. But don't get too discouraged, for the tides will turn if you can focus on what's right in front of you while maintaining a positive attitude about the big picture.

Life can be quite stressful if too many demands are made of you today. Naturally, you want everyone to be happy, but reality doesn't always measure up to your ideals. You may be struggling to find a path through an obstacle course of confusion now, and it's hard to maintain the right pace. Make adjustments often until you discover one that works. But be ready to change your direction again without judging yourself. Finding a healthy balance between honoring your needs and fulfilling the desires of others is your real challenge.

Your clear communication skills enable you to make quite a favorable impression on others. But you might find that an emotional drama is difficult to handle today because your words can increase your vulnerability. However, the solution is not to remain silent. Stand up to your own fears and share what's in your heart without any expectations. Let the conversation unfold without forcing it to go anywhere in particular.

Your unshakable confidence can pull you out of a difficult situation today, causing others to be motivated by your words and deeds. However, you may be hard-pressed these days to find the right thing to say. Don't hide your uncertainty by overcompensating and pretending that you have all the answers. Instead, just be your authentic self and you will be appreciated for being who you are rather than for what you do.

Don't avoid current events by retreating into your own little world today since it's not an effective strategy. However, with the Moon's presence in your sign you need to get back in touch with your feelings ... and the best way to do this is to find time to be alone. Walk away from the computer and turn off the TV while you meditate, pray or write in your journal. Taking a short break to make contact with your inner authority allows you to be fully present in the moment.

You might feel as if you need a break today because your emotional tension continues to build. However, you may be physically restless and it's fine to be active as long as you know when to stop. Giving yourself permission to drop into the fantasy realms for a while can help you relax, but don't linger there too long. You have plenty to do and you'll feel better once you return to your chores and channel your energy effectively.

It's challenging to get a realistic handle on your day because unforeseen changes seem to come in waves of positive and negative energy. You continue to be pulled between two extremes and may not be able to distinguish which direction you want to go. Fortunately, you don't really need to know yet. For now, just let your emotions carry you back and forth and observe your reactions. Once the turbulence settles, your heart will know which way to go.

You don't want to wait any longer for your creative project to take off. Although it might feel as if you're going to explode, it could help to ease the pressure if you express some of your bottled-up energy. Unfortunately, talking it out may not help. Physical activity is your best bet now; if you don't go to the gym, at least take a good walk today. You can be more productive at work once you've let off some steam.

There's no need to let your anger get the best of you today, even if you feel stuck in a relationship with a tough boss or controlling partner. Instead of fighting to hold your position, practice compassion by trying to understand someone else's plight. Don't over-personalize the resistance you face. Shifting your focus from your individual desires to the needs of others enables you to walk away with your integrity intact.

Your drive to express your true inner nature is stronger today than your need to be clever. Still, you may feel thwarted by your own fear. You might be too quick to defer to someone else's authority now. However, your best strategy is persistence ... so don't give up even if you believe that accepting it is the easy way out. Look at your resistance as an opportunity to strengthen your overall plan. Holding your ground improves your chances of reaching your goal.

You might feel as if you have been tested long enough, but unfortunately the challenge is not yet over. Quitting prematurely is not advised because you stand to gain a lot if you can stick to your current position without retreating. Don't allow your self-confidence to waver or you could get sidetracked by your lack of certainty. Continue to lean steadily into the winds of change to fill your sails and obtain the smoothest forward motion.

You may be so busy at work today that you are pulled away from handling an important family issue. Although you need to fulfill your professional commitments, don't use your job to avoid a difficult situation at home. If something from the past surfaces at this time, make time to deal with it once and for all. Anything you ignore now will only come back at a later date to haunt you.

It's possible that you have bitten off more than you can chew and reality is demanding that you meet all of your responsibilities. The frustration is that your energy is stretched too thin and you cannot complete everything in a timely manner. Thankfully, you have plenty of physical stamina and won't be easily discouraged. Adopting a positive attitude alone won't accomplish your work, but it sure helps to motivate you along the way.

Your boss or some other authority figure could prevent you from making real progress today. You might not understand why your forward motion is being thwarted. Oddly enough, it could even feel like you have been set up by someone pulling you into a battle you cannot win. Your secret weapons are your imagination and determination. Taking charge and changing the rules of the game just may be your best way out.

You have recently been riding a positive wave of energy, but today it might seem as if you don't have anything left to give. Unfortunately, it may not be that easy to walk away from your current obligations because you don't want to let anyone down. Instead of trying to impress someone who has authority over you, just work quietly and do your best. You'll be recognized for your hard work and dedication when it matters most.

Other people's demands on your time can make you weary now because you don't feel like your actions are enough to satisfy anyone ... no matter how much you do. This energetic dilemma could leave you feeling empty and frustrated unless you consciously shift your focus. Instead of trying to please someone else, set realistic goals for yourself and then do whatever is needed to achieve them.

If one more person asks you to do something else today, you might just toss in the towel and quit. It's not that you're irresponsible ... it's just that you've had enough heaped upon you already. Instead of getting angry, channel your annoyance and negativity into a productive venture. There's really no time for complaining now because you have so much work to do. Thankfully, you can experience a wonderful sense of relief once it's all finished.

The weight of your judgments is heavy enough now to motivate you to alter your daily routine. You're in a good position to evaluate your recent decisions, as long as you're flexible enough to leave additional room for change. Don't fence yourself in before you have had a chance to remember what it's like to breathe deeply in the wide open spaces.

You may feel very strongly about what you want to do with your time today, but it's smarter to rein in your personal desires and do what's expected of you. If you attempt to deviate from the plan, an awkward situation could quickly develop, teaching you a karmic lesson the hard way. Be careful because making progress isn't quite as simple as it seems. For now, it's better to be safe than sorry.

You feel invincible now, believing you can overcome nearly anything that stands in your way. However, it's important to use the current emotional wave of power in an unselfish manner. Your ambition could backfire on you if you try to acquire too much personal gain out of the situation. Nevertheless, you're still able to reach your initial goals if you respect other people's needs, too.

It's more important than ever to embrace your energy, both physically and emotionally. If you feel stuck today, do whatever you can to propel yourself into motion. You may feel quite motivated, yet unsure about how to put yourself on the right track. Although this strategy might seem backward, don't wait until you've figured it out. Get started first; once you're making progress, things will fall into place faster than you expect.

Even those people who are usually admirers of your light and easy style will want more depth and intensity from you now. This penchant for a deeper experience comes at the perfect time, since you aren't in the mood to entertain others with your clever repartee. Instead, you're also looking for spiritual meaning, and others can come to your aid with the insightful perspective that you seek.

An emotional drama in your life reaches a turning point today as the evocative Moon forms a dynamic square to the Sun. It appears as if a major crisis is brewing, but behind the obvious dilemma presented by your expectations, you're certain about what you need to do. Even if you keep some of your feelings to yourself, exert your will while you have the opportunity to be the most effective. You don't have to play all your cards in order to make something positive happen.

It may not be that easy to reach a decision today because one solution won't likely address all the needs that are now being expressed. Although someone might ask you for emotional support, you are tempted to pull back in an effort to handle your own affairs. However, make certain that you are acting for the greater good of everyone involved when setting your priorities. It might take some extra effort on your part, but you have the ingenuity and determination to come up with the answers.

You have an unrelenting desire to make deeply-rooted changes now. However, your current interest isn't about anything to do with your regular daily routine. Instead, you may feel passionate about transforming your entire life, including your personal needs and those of others in your immediate environment. Remember, taking everyone's feelings into consideration today will produce the most profound changes.

Like an intense bolt of lightning out of the clear blue sky, something can happen that alters the direction of the path you're on. Your epiphany may not be a total life-changer, but it does open the possibility to make a shift that you've been putting off for too long. Downplaying your experience invites unwanted surprises. You'll run into less resistance if you act authentically with the same level of intensity that you're feeling.

Your key planet, Pluto, is harmonizing with the Sun today, showing you an easier path to expressing your innermost thoughts and feelings. At some other time, you might encounter obstacles created by other people's fears or your own secretive nature. But for now the way is clear of negativity. Focus your attention on the truth while keeping your heart as wide open as you can. You may be pleasantly surprised where this emotional journey takes you.

You dream of flying through the galaxy at warp speed, except there's a more cautious part of you still worrying about what you might need to leave behind now. This current sentimentality isn't your typical reaction, but it's a good idea to give full power to whatever feelings of uncertainty you may be experiencing. The sooner you face your fear, the faster you can resume your cosmic adventure. Believing in yourself is the first big step.

An inner battle overflows into the outer world today ... whether or not you're ready for the extra drama. You're confronted by the feelings of others and how they might alter the direction you thought you were taking. Think about your plans again, and this time include the feedback you receive in your new strategy. Not only will you gain the respect of those who matter, you'll also be able to make fundamental changes that move you closer to your goals.

Your current dilemma involves the pull between wanting to be spontaneous and the need to withhold your feelings. You want to say exactly what's on your mind today, but might worry that you could offend someone if you speak the truth. Ultimately, you're driven toward expression, but not without experiencing some stress first. Remember, your true friends want the real you, not some watered-down version that is diluted to maintain social acceptance. Follow your heart and don't look back.

You are swimming in deep waters now -- so deep that sunlight doesn't easily reach you and the bright colors have faded into darker shades of gray. Don't get distracted by the otherworldly nature; it comes along with the territory. You have powerful work to do, so face your fears and shine your inner light into the darkness. Slowly return to the surface only when you are ready to reengage. Happily, your friends will be waiting for you with open arms.

Getting together with friends or working as part of a team sounds like a good idea today with the Moon occupying your 11th House of Social Networking. However, you don't like it so much when others boss you around you without even asking for your input. You're not excited about living up to someone else's expectations and you might go overboard when telling them off now. Don't waste your energy being angry. Be smart and spend your time with those who support you the most.

You might feel obligated to nurture your coworkers now that the Moon is visiting your 10th House of Career. But you're not interested in babying someone who should be able to hold up his or her part of the bargain. You believe your opinion is correct and you're not likely to change your mind even if someone asks you to reconsider. Be open to discussing differing perspectives instead of going silent and resisting change. Remember, there is more than one way to interpret reality.

Normally, adaptability is one of your strengths, but today the notion of changing your plans for someone else's benefit rubs you the wrong way. It's difficult to get into the flow of the day because you have a particular idea about how things should go, yet they keep deviating from your agenda and pulling you off course. Even if you must modify your approach now, don't lose sight of your final destination. It's possible to have a singular goal with a variety of roads that will land you there, no matter which you choose.

The idea of exploring your emotions today with someone you trust sounds good at first. But differences of style or substance may have you questioning the wisdom of sharing what's in your heart. Even if you feel vulnerable, keep an open mind about where the process will ultimately take you. Don't get your hopes so high that you'll be disappointed no matter how well things turn out. However, your willingness to interact honestly can deepen a relationship in a surprising way.

Unconscious motivations drive your ambitions to new heights today with four planets moving through your 10th House of Status. However, someone close to you may not be willing to play your game, and this wild card threatens your success. Attempts to control an independent person could be a study in frustration now, so go ahead with your plans on your own, if necessary. Believing in yourself empowers you to reach your goal even without the support of others.

You may approach your job in a totally unique manner today. Although you're quite certain your method will work, others might not share your confidence. In fact, they will resist your efforts if their goals are different than yours. Thankfully, your coworkers are likely to change their minds and join your team if they see that you're making progress on your own. Doing it your way is fine as long as you remain open to accepting assistance when it arrives.

You may be feeling a creative buzz today from the eccentric Aquarius Moon activating your 5th House of Self-Expression. But your mind isn't focused on the work at hand; instead you're busy imagining the distant future or visualizing a far-off land. Don't be too hard on yourself if you're unable to accomplish your goals on a practical level now. Sometimes exploring your dreams is just what the doctor ordered.

You have plenty of data to substantiate your conclusions today, but not everyone buys your story. Someone may rub you the wrong way because of his or her refusal to acknowledge the truth. Unfortunately, logic won't convince anyone that you're right. Your actions will ultimately speak louder than all your facts and figures combined. Just make sure you don't fall victim to the same fate as your opponent by refusing to listen to a different perspective. The healthiest position is attained by keeping your mind open.

Although you might wake up on the wrong side of the bed today, a conversation with the right person quickly improves your attitude. You may be skeptical at first, but people can inspire you with their stories and excite you with their plans for the future. You're willing to work hard if you can see the potential rewards, but you're more likely to put your money on a sure thing now, rather than a risky venture. Don't be afraid to jump into someone else's game if you're invited.

You may be weary of the recent emotionally stormy weather, but the sky begins to clear today and your life seems to be looking up. However, you can't just declare that everything is getting better and then hope it does because your rational mind isn't running the show now. Instead, imagine your ideal future and then start walking toward it. Manifesting your best-case scenario is possible if you have faith in yourself and still believe in magic.

It's challenging to maintain your normally cool demeanor today because irrational emotions keep bubbling up into awareness. Even if your feelings grow more positive throughout the day, you naturally prefer a more intellectual approach. However, the evocative Moon is traveling through your sign now, and applying logic isn't useful when managing your changing moods. Instead of trying to explain what you need, wait and see where you end up when you let your desires carry you along for a little while.

The non-conformist Aquarius Moon stimulates your 12th House of Spirituality, highlighting your comfort with the metaphysical realms. Meanwhile, an otherworldly connection between philosophical Jupiter and surreal Neptune calls in the mists of illusion, preventing you from seeing things as they truly are. Don't push your dreams away now because you stand to gain new inspiration from your imagination as long as you don't confuse it with reality.

Unrealistic hopes about the weekend could bring disappointment today when you realize that you waited too long to make something special happen. But instead of moping around if your plans fall through, find a way to enjoy your own company instead. Using the quiet time to recharge your batteries enables you to accomplish more in the days ahead.

The Moon's shift into your 11th House of Long-Term Goals inspires you to fantasize about your future. However, planning ahead may not be as useful as it sounds, especially if there are situations that require your attention in the present moment. Thankfully, you can be responsive to what's happening right now while also envisioning what's next if you keep your dreams to yourself until your chores are finished. You can let your imagination out to play over the weekend.

Although your workweek might be coming to an end, your current concerns about your career will continue to linger through the weekend. However, it's challenging to turn your worries into a concrete plan today because trickster Mercury is confused by surreal Neptune. Don't be too hard on yourself if you can't logically figure out your best move. Dream about your changing role at work without taking any action yet. The first steps toward transformation occur in your imagination.

You might think that today is a good day to make plans for a getaway -- perhaps even for this weekend. Unfortunately, there may not be enough time to get everything together for such a quick trip. But don't waste energy on being disappointed ... consider your current efforts to be a reconnaissance mission instead. Use your imagination to conjure up a variety of options without focusing on the details yet. Give it a few days and then begin to make your dreams come true.

Although it appears that you are determined to succeed in your career, there are other issues beginning to distract you from your work. Fortunately, you have the weekend to pursue less material ambitions, including the exploration of your dreams, the expression of your feelings and the pursuit of happiness. This new emphasis on your inner journey can bring spiritual meaning to your life. Just remember to honor your previous commitments along the way.

You may be growing tired of your daily work routine and are already looking forward to spending more time with your family, friends or partner. But don't forget to let others know your desires as soon as possible or they might make other plans. It's better to iron out the details in advance so you don't run into disappointment later on. Sharing your hopes starts the ball rolling and paves the way to a memorable weekend.

Demonstrating your originality is more important to you earlier in the day while the Moon is still visiting non-conformist Aquarius. But her shift into your 6th House of Service this afternoon reminds you that your compassionate behavior can positively impact others. Thankfully, putting someone at ease with your actions or your words also has a calming effect on you. Shine your light by performing random acts of kindness. Practicing this kind of enlightened selfishness benefits everyone involved.

You might need to work hard this morning, leaving little room for you to retreat into your inner world.
