This is a test, but thankfully, you don't even need to give the right answer to pass it. Believe it or not, your best path to success today could involve a little procrastination at the right time. Avoid the negative consequences of a hasty decision by putting it off for a few days. Timing is everything.

You were fairly certain about your point of view yesterday, but your confidence may wane today. Part of your current dilemma is that there appears to be even more choices than you initially realized. Although you thoroughly like having more options now, too much variety complicates the issues and makes it harder to pick one over all the others. It will be easier to choose your selection once you realize that it doesn't have to be your final answer.

The stubbornness of a friend may have tested your patience over the past couple of days. You might even have reached a point where you felt as if you were negotiating with an obstinate mule. Thankfully, your annoyance might be diminishing now that others aren't so stuck in their ways. You can make a good situation even better by meeting someone else's new-found flexibility with some adaptability of your own. Establishing shared goals is ultimately better for everyone involved.

If you are struggling to break out of a rut or eliminate an old habit, it may be time to find someone to help you out today. It's surprising how much a bit of support boosts your confidence and enables you to push along toward a goal. But others might not be there exactly how or when you need them, so don't put all your faith in anyone else's advice. Trust your own wise counsel to guide you in the right direction.

You may be out of step with your environment today because you don't have the same intense level of focus that you had yesterday. You might even start a task, only to leave it unfinished as you move on to something else. Too many loose ends increase your anxiety, so remember to "just say no" to the next distraction that comes along. Even if circumstances feel restrictive now, complete one job before beginning another.

The electric light bulbs in your brain begin to flash with brilliant creativity today. You feel alive and refreshed, ready to make good use of all the ideas that are coming your way. But turning an inspiration into a concrete plan is tricky business, so you're inclined now to handle it slowly and deliberately. Nevertheless, don't be overly cautious ... respond to each opportunity with a willingness to take a calculated risk.

There's plenty of chit-chat at home or on the job now, and you may have difficulty keeping up with it all. It's not that you lack interest ... it's just that you don't have the energy to follow up on each idea or feeling that is expressed. However, dropping out of the conversation isn't a viable solution, either. Establishing limits to the amount of time you spend communicating with others today is the smartest way to manage your resources without burning yourself out.

You are eager to express your core beliefs in a direct manner today, without withholding anything that's of significance. Unfortunately, other people won't necessarily agree with your perspective even if you're willing to discuss the differences. However, you may be so in tune with your intentions now that once you announce your position, there's no need to talk about it any further. Remember, your disclosure is like planting a seed ... it needs time to germinate without additional interference. Step back and watch it grow.

You may oversimplify things today which can create problems, especially if others take what you say at face value. However, what you see doesn't begin to touch the complex dynamics impacting your life now. Be careful, since a small misunderstanding about a missing fact might turn a simple discussion upside down. It's much easier to prevent the conflict beforehand than to untangle it once it's begun. A stitch in time saves nine.

Conversations grow complicated now because your message may be garbled as interactive Mercury is lost in the intense brightness of the Sun's rays. You might be thinking quite clearly today, but even the most straightforward thoughts can become overly subjective with the Moon back in your sign. It's okay to have faith in your convictions but don't try too hard to use logic to convince anyone else of the validity of your point of view. Let others draw their own conclusions when they're ready.

Your social life might seem very simplistic today as the plodding Taurus Mercury-Sun alignment grinds your thoughts to a temporary standstill. Instead of relying on your brain to figure things out, gather your courage and acknowledge the power of your heart. Don't be concerned if your friends want you to get more involved with complex group dynamics. However, only join in if it feels right to you.

Mental Mercury's conjunction with the Sun fires up your mind and makes you eager to talk about your aspirations. However, you can also broaden your perspective by listening to people describe their professional goals. Your brain is overflowing with sensible ideas today, prompting you to initiate action immediately. Trusting your logic is smarter than waiting to receive approval from anyone else.

You may be fantasizing today about doing something that will take you far from your mundane world. Consider pulling out all the stops and dream about your future without holding back. Visualize splurging on an airline ticket and heading off on your great adventure. It might be difficult to transform your thoughts into reality now, but it's possible as long as you have faith and take it one step at a time.

You truly want to do what's right, but you might be challenged to figure out exactly what that means today. Although it's easy to discuss your plans with someone you trust, saying too much now could disperse the energy prematurely. Avoid going overboard ... share your ideas but only on a need-to-know basis. Less turns out to be better than more this time around.

The verbally adept Mercury-Sun conjunction lands in your 7th House of Partnerships, smoothing ruffled feathers in most of your interactions throughout the day. Nevertheless, you still may become annoyed if you discover that someone has already made a decision about who you can talk with now. Stand up for your rights, but don't back yourself into a corner in the process. Start from the assumption that others have your best interests at heart and go from there.

You might feel the stress today as you attempt to complete unfinished chores from last week. It isn't that there's so much left over to do... it's just that you want to manage your responsibilities methodically now. However, this approach prevents you from broadening your perspective enough to move past your immediate obligations. Don't just jump in and start working if you're not ready ... instead, step outside and get some fresh air if you need to clear your head first.

You naturally feel comfortable if you have enough safety and security so that you don't need to worry about the basics. This peace of mind can free you up to enjoy magical connections with others, since you won't need to constantly focus on those things you must have for survival. Go ahead and take a chance by doing something that you've never done before. And don't bother looking for instructions ... just trust your intuition, instead.

It's difficult to move through your own rigidity today as your need for family connections conflict with your desire to creatively express yourself. The problem is that if you don't listen to the needs of others, you could be left high and dry with unfulfilled emotional desires. Exploring both the personal and humanitarian aspects of your world helps to restore a healthy balance to your life.

You want to believe that all is well, yet you aren't surprised if you run into a serious obstacle today. You're unwilling to take no for an answer and could work extra hard to overcome any problems that surface now. Unfortunately, your desire to reach your destination may not be enough to guarantee success. Consider relaxing your timetable or changing your agenda. Being flexible is your secret weapon ... don't be afraid to use it.

You have a bounce to your step and a mischievous twinkle in your eye today because you believe that you can put one over on reality. Unfortunately, you may be so clever now that you fool everyone, including yourself. Be careful ... everything might appear to be light and easy but there are still potent forces at work just beyond the limits of what you're able to sense. Nevertheless, your goals are attainable if you're willing to dig beneath the surface.

Your current mental agility has you fox-trotting around facts and tap-dancing to tall tales today. Unfortunately, you could be so hypnotized by your own smooth style that you don't even notice when the music stops. You might be a lot more productive now if you concentrate on the tasks at hand rather than demonstrating how skillfully you can maneuver around the truth. Don't forget that actions speak louder than words.

Your thoughts are racing a mile a minute and there's no simple way to slow them down. Normally, you might consider this adrenaline rush to be exhilarating, but now it's more of an irritation than anything else. It's one thing to think quickly, but it's unfortunate if your current mental process is leading you around in circles. Nevertheless, don't resist the repetition, for it could bring an unexpected breakthrough when you least expect it.

You are preoccupied with your fantasies today, but thankfully, no one needs to know what's going on within your brain. You can easily keep up normal appearances now, enabling you to come and go as you please. Just don't get so overconfident that you stop paying attention to your immediate surroundings or you could miss out on something in the real world which is even more delicious than your colorful daydreams.

You want to relax with a small group of friends or family, but you still have to fulfill your responsibilities in the real world. Luckily, you may not have to choose one over the other now if you do a little planning in advance. Instead of frittering away your day, make a list of things to do and then focus on each item until it's done. If you concentrate your efforts, you'll be surprised at how much time you have left over to enjoy the camaraderie you seek.

People may look to you for acknowledgment today, but you don't believe that you should have to put your stamp of approval on everything that happens. Luckily, you have enough common sense to remain uninvolved if a situation doesn't concern you directly. However, this detachment could annoy a friend or family member because your attitude might be misinterpreted as displeasure. Take whatever time you need to make sure that everyone knows exactly how you feel. Negative feelings can be minimized by engaging in clear communication right from the start.

You may feel distant from the real nitty-gritty of today's events, but it isn't because you have consciously withdrawn. In fact, your exuberance could be running at a fever pitch now, yet your words sound so philosophical that others might not  understand what you're saying. Visualizing your ideal world can be useful, but it doesn't change anything unless you bring your ideas back down to Earth. Think globally, act locally, and speak practically.

Your special gift today is being able to discuss a challenging personal experience in a manner that doesn't make others feel awkward. You can feel the intensity while describing it in a straightforward style that carries no blame. Thankfully, your openness acts as a catalyst now, triggering a totally unexpected conversation. Even if you have a specific agenda, be open and talk about it with those you trust. When the topic shifts, simply adapt to the new landscape with a smile.

A close friend might talk your ear off today but you can't seem to find a graceful way to stop them. You are known to speak your mind without realizing that your direct approach may offend those with thinner skin than yours. But now you would be wise to bite your tongue and listen to what's being said. Surprisingly, your practice of discretion could even lead to learning something important about yourself. Keep in mind that your unselfish support has a deeper impact than you will ever know.

You might secretly freak out for a moment when you realize you have a wild tiger by the tail today. However, your calm demeanor and steady persistence will soon have even the most vicious cat purring. Unfortunately, there's no step-by-step diagram to show you how to manage the situation successfully. Luckily, your survival skills won't let you down if you just do what comes naturally. Follow your primal instincts and you'll have things under control faster than anyone expects.

You believe that you are due a real day off as a reward for your recent hard work. You're ready to schedule a bit of rest and relaxation today, but unexpected complications may get in the way. Don't make it worse by falling prey to the trap of complaining, since your negativity only annoys everyone around you. Instead, be responsible and handle whatever pops up with a can-do attitude and a smile. Laughter is contagious so utilizing your sense of humor now is a must.

Rather than running around in circles trying to accomplish something, retreat behind the walls of your home today. Pick up a book that you recently set aside and sink into it. Listen to some special music that inspires you to meditate and dream. Talk on the phone, chat online with a friend or put your feet up and escape into TV-land. It doesn't really matter which distractions you choose. However, don't let others make you feel guilty for taking some personal time ... you deserve it just as much as anyone else.

It's difficult to be certain about your plans today, especially if your friends send you mixed messages. It seems as if others set clear limits and then, once you respectfully acknowledge them, they wonder why you have withdrawn. Confusion grows when either party makes hasty assumptions. Although the truth appears to fluctuate, always be ready to fall back on honest communication. If in doubt, check it out.

Your key planet Venus is the goddess of love, yet you're befuddled when it comes to romance as she squares delusional Neptune today. However, this irrational aspect can also activate your highest ideals. Although your personal relationships could be affected, the current emphasis on your 2nd House of Finances is likely to trigger a lack of clarity around money issues. Don't make any unnecessary expenditures since your desires may change dramatically over the next several days. Pay attention to your dreams without acting on them just yet.

It's difficult to concentrate on the present moment because Venus, the planet of personal attraction, is doing battle with nebulous Neptune today. Venus is dancing through your dualistic sign, tempting you to head out in two entirely different directions. Even if the consequences of your choices aren't very clear, don't give in to temptation now. Listen to the cool voice of reason instead of letting your imagination run wild.

You are dreaming in bright colors today, however, the vivid beauty of the images is less important than the serious message that the symbols convey. But it's not helpful to be overly analytical in your interpretations because your rigid logic could limit your creativity. Instead, do something to capture the magical energy that is flowing through you now. Ultimately, you can learn what you need to know by taking the scenic route.

You're not ready to reveal too much about what's on your mind today because your words can't convey the subtlety of what's happening. Taking time for things to settle down enables you to make smarter choices about how much to verbalize. Until you know for sure, it's wiser to err on the side of discretion. You can always say more later. However, once you start to open up, you won't be able to take back what has been said.

You might appear more wishy-washy today because affectionate Venus squares fuzzy Neptune in your 7th House of Relationships. It doesn't matter what you say, your words still won't be specific enough to please anyone else. Instead of angering someone with your incorrect assumptions or faulty logic, wait a few days and then start your search for the truth again when you have more information at your disposal. In the meantime, stop thinking and just float in the realms of your imagination for a while.

You're busy planning the next big adventure with your planetary ruler Venus visiting your 9th House of Big Ideas, yet her anxious square to diffusive Neptune muddies your thinking. You may be overwhelmed by your dreams of a perfect holiday or a great escape. But as you move closer to your ideal future, it could disappear right in front of your eyes. Don't accept defeat when life is offering you an opportunity to shine. Instead, create a more realistic set of goals and try again.

You are wary today as you tiptoe around a delicate relationship situation. However, your feelings are real, even if your desires are colored by your well-hidden vulnerability. Nevertheless, it's okay to trust the higher wisdom of the universe ... you probably don't need to keep to yourself as much as you think. Others may not understand your actions now, so take time and explain yourself as clearly as possible so no unspoken words get in the way.

You attempt to keep your feelings in check today, but your desire to be heard will likely win out over your need to play it safe. However, your message may be muddled because you don't actually know what you want and the more you talk, the worse it gets. Don't bother trying to justify your motives yet. Thankfully, you should do better when your clarity begins to return tomorrow. In the meantime, keep your communication on the simple side to avoid misunderstandings.

You're in for a bit of melodrama today if your plans fall apart because of lack of proper execution. Although you usually have a knack for making your dreams come true, your ideas are less practical than you think now. Taking another run at achieving your goals is a smart idea because you can gain better traction later in the day. But don't give up ... inching forward slowly is still much better than turning around and quitting too soon.

You may be required to field an unexpected curve ball today that impacts your financial condition. Although you like to believe that you're always on your toes, you could overlook an apparently unimportant detail that suddenly becomes problematic. Thankfully, you still can react quickly by coming up with an ingenious solution as long as you don't assume that you are in complete control. Exercising flexibility works in your favor now.

You want to wear your heart on your sleeve while Venus squares Neptune in your sensitive sign today. Nevertheless, you may be confused because you aren't certain if others understand your feelings. Actually, those closest to you will be able to sense your emotions before you say anything at all. Avoid overcompensating by talking too much and diluting your message. The best magic is created now without uttering a word.

You might start the day off feeling invincible, but your plans may crumble if overconfidence makes you careless in your execution. Being prepared for what's ahead is crucial today and rewards are possible if you don't try to skip over the necessary details. Be realistic while setting your goals now, because aiming at the right destination is the first step to being successful.

You were recently tempted to surge forward in a burst of enthusiasm, but now you're less certain about your best course of action. Slowing down so you can sustain a steady pace today is essential to reach your goals. Others may blast ahead while you rely on your common sense and build foundations that stabilize your growth. Thankfully, a more cautious approach will likely prove to be your smartest strategy in the long run.

The ease with which you interact with your world often makes you appear like a magician, but you are so charming that your cleverness could ultimately get in your way today. You may be so distracted by unrealistic possibilities that you actually head off in the wrong direction. Take time and deepen your current relationships, rather than running off to meet someone new. There's no need to go exploring faraway lands when there's uncharted emotional territory closer to home.

You may grow anxious now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign, stimulating intense feelings that you have recently avoided. However, staying aware of your emotions helps you to calm down, but it doesn't mean you must express them. Fortunately, you're able to reconnect with your center and feel more grounded as the day wears on. Take enough time to balance your internal state before you become annoyed. Focusing on the present moment inspires your friends and associates to respond positively.

You may feel a bit of an emotional letdown today, but this is only a temporary dip in the intensity level. However, it's a challenge to balance your desire for success with your current responsibilities now. What you want probably isn't as wonderful as you imagine and the current circumstances aren't as bad as you think. Being in the middle is actually a pretty good place to be, at least for a little while.

Sometimes direct action is a challenge when it comes to telling others what you want. However, today you could go overboard with an authoritarian approach as stern Saturn forms an awkward aspect with resourceful Venus. Instead of trying to control everything, allow yourself to be guided by your intuition now, even if it doesn't make logical sense. Rather than following a detailed plan, you'll be surprised at how well it works when you just make it up as you go along.

You're quite skillful when it comes to handling others, but you might give up your own power today as you strive to make those around you feel comfortable. It's nearly impossible to know how far to go in your efforts to be gracious as your key planet Venus is overshadowed by hard-nosed Saturn. You may even end up exhausted if you focus all your energy on everyone else. Instead, set an example by acknowledging that your personal goals are important, too, and remain true to yourself no matter what.

Your stamina is increasing and you have ample energy to come through for others now. However, you must be cautious about using your new-found power for your own personal gain. Fortunately, you may be receiving help from unseen dimensions. Unfortunately, it's hard to know what's real and what's not. There's no need to back down from your position, but it's a good idea to play it just a little bit cooler than you actually feel in order to leave room for adjustments, if necessary.

You might be feeling less confident today with the Moon's presence in reflective Cancer, but a little self-doubt won't be enough to keep you down for long. It's usually your preference to independently charge ahead with your plans, but now it's wiser to include others on this part of your journey. Sharing nearly any experience with someone you like will only make it more enjoyable than doing it on your own.

Even if you're feeling healthy, this is still a great time to upgrade your diet and exercise program and make whatever modifications are desirable. This doesn't mean that you are doing anything wrong in particular now, but there is always room for improvement. Set a realistic goal that can have an enduring positive impact on your life and then get to work.

You may be tired of all the intense people in your life, even if they are offering you exciting alternatives to your current routine. You might even become uncharacteristically nostalgic and long for the relaxed pace of the good old days. But there's no returning to your past. Take whatever downtime you can find today because you'll need your vitality over the days ahead when the rhythm picks up even more. Thankfully, staying current with everything now means you can coast later in the week.

If complex issues on the home front have grown even more complicated lately, this is your chance to concentrate on the current situation. Your sensitivity is high and your determination is strong now, so don't wait for a better time to dig into the hidden dynamics of your relationships with family or close friends. As long as you don't set up unrealistic expectations for a miracle solution, your ability to listen compassionately allows you to be much more effective at finding answers and restoring equilibrium to your life.

You might be a bit sleep-deprived from all the energy that you have been expending lately. Nevertheless, you're probably still raring to go today. Quicksilver Mercury enters airy Gemini, fanning your fires and fueling your enthusiasm. You could push yourself too hard now, so remember not to overdo it by piling more distractions on your busy schedule. Set priorities and focus your attention on one thing at a time so you have something positive to show for your efforts.

You have been waiting for the right time to express something that's been on your mind for a while. Although today may not be better than any other day, your current frustration might provoke you to start a difficult conversation. However, your friends will lose interest if your words wander aimlessly. Be direct and keep your message short and sweet. Reassure everyone that you're not looking for a quick answer ... you simply want to be heard and appreciated for your contribution.

Your sense of starting anew is confirmed today when rational Mercury enters your sign. However, there may be so many choices in front of you that it's nearly impossible to pick only one. Make time to think about something in your life that has already served its purpose and then consider what you want to replace it. Focusing on your immediate needs now can have a positive impact on your future.

Your thoughts may be running off in many directions today, but communicator Mercury's move into your 12th House of Privacy hides your inner process from everyone else. You are quite self-contained now and even those closest to you might not realize the magnitude of your unsettled emotions. But avoiding your truth isn't healthy in the long run. If you choose not to express your feelings, at least stay conscious of them.

A family member might place unspoken demands on you today and you're not sure how to respond. You believe you're clever enough to dance around the unknown, but you quickly realize that logic cannot help you regain control of your day. You may attempt to guess the motives of those around you, but this strategy only brings frustration. Practice emotional detachment to alleviate the current pressure now, instead of failing the impossible task of pleasing everyone. Be courageous and initiate an honest dialogue if you want to know the truth.

You're uncertain how to establish new objectives at work today because you are pulled in two directions at once. Furthermore, it's challenging to separate the useful information from everything you learn as your ruling planet Mercury enters noisy Gemini and your 10th House of Career. Evaluating all your choices is a daunting task if you feel like you must make a long-term decision now. Thankfully, you have more time than you realize to figure out your next move.

You might have more of a bounce to your step today, as a wave of lightness washes over your body and activates your cells from the top of your head to the tips of your toes. Thankfully, Mercury shifts into your 9th House of Future Vision, inspiring you to stretch beyond your old limits. Give yourself permission to dream about what's ahead without worrying about whether or not it's actually possible. Today's fantasies can grow into tomorrow's reality.

Mercury's move into curious Gemini today brings intellectual acuity to your 8th House of Intimate Sharing, reinforcing your drive to intensify your emotional interactions. Nevertheless, you still must be careful, since you could become overwhelmed by unconscious desires if you don't monitor what you feel as you go along. Naturally, digging deep is a significant part of being a passionate Scorpio. Thankfully, exploring the shadows from a more lighthearted and logical perspective now produces positive results.

Interactive Mercury enters your 7th House of Others today, shifting the emphasis to how you respond in a relationship, rather than what you might do on your own. Unfortunately, if you attempt to take the lead now, things could quickly grow more complicated. Keep in mind that you can have more fun if you're willing to step out of the spotlight for a while and play a supporting role, instead.

It's challenging to stay serious all day today, even if you have important obligations to fulfill. Mercury's move into flighty Gemini scatters your thoughts to the wind as fast as you refocus them on practical matters. Every time you concentrate, something more exciting comes along to pull you off track and down a curiously fascinating path. Stop resisting the inevitable ... instead of trying to be productive now, just let go for a while and see where the intellectual detours take you.

Pleasing planetary positions pull you away from meeting your commitments today. You might aspire to high goals at first, but the opportunity for play outweighs the potential rewards for hard work as the day progresses. Mercury's shift into your 5th House of Fun indicates that it's smarter now to set aside your previous plans and simply make up new ones along the way. Spontaneous bursts of creativity can bring more joy into your life.

Even if today is a work day, you may consider staying home anyway. Your friends and associates might assume that your current desire for solitude is a sure sign that something is wrong, but they couldn't be more off target. Making some time for personal matters is an excellent way to get in tune with logical Mercury's move into your 4th House of Roots. Don't be overly concerned about what others say; your inner security counts more than anything else now.

This isn't a day for staying out of the spotlight. You might think that you will quietly play a supportive role for a loved one today, yet you won't likely be able to contain your excitement long enough to complete your mission. There's no need to apologize for being yourself ... just be as kind as possible while still expressing your enthusiasm. Showing sensitivity to others makes it difficult for anyone to stay mad at you for very long.

Someone close to you may expect you to set aside your needs today so you can assist your family or friends. Unfortunately, other people's expectations are annoying because you can't really see what you have to contribute and don't want to be burdened with the extra responsibilities. Taking care of yourself is crucial, but try not to let anyone down more than necessary. Coming through for a loved one now could prove to be more rewarding than you expect.

A minor move on your part today could be very significant to someone else. Others may misinterpret your behavior because of their own expectations and assumptions. Or, perhaps, your actions are actually misleading because you don't want anyone to know what you're really up to now. It's wise to be honest about your boundaries up front so you don't unintentionally alienate your allies. A simple explanation might be all that's needed to clear the air.

You might believe that clarity is returning because you're ready to take initiative today, especially if you have been waiting for the right time. Unfortunately, something is lurking just beyond your perceptions and you can't bring it into awareness. Nevertheless, following your heart makes much more sense than analyzing your next move. Don't try to explain yourself -- your actions will be enough to tell your story.

Today may be an extremely social day, yet paradoxically you won't likely be the center of attention. You are more interested in loving others now, rather than wanting to be loved. However, if you try to get recognition today, your scheme could backfire, causing you to regret a hastily executed plan. Nevertheless, being generous in spirit lets others shine and ultimately casts you in a favorable light.

You are more effective working behind the scenes, but you might say something today that stirs the pot and puts you in the middle of a controversy. The problem is that you could accidentally reveal feelings that you meant to keep secret. There's no need to be overly self-protective now because hiding your intentions only draws the spotlight closer to you. Find a way to express what's on your mind without crossing any lines.

Life may become more exciting today, especially if others choose not to follow your script. Surprisingly, when someone acts in an unexpected manner, it frees you up and gives you room to be more creative. Instead of planning your day based on preconceived outcomes, make up scenarios where anything can happen. Your out-of-the-box approach could bring pleasing results if you just give it a chance.

You cannot escape from your life today, even if you just want to relax in solitude. You must get out and socialize with others, either for work or play. However, you won't be satisfied with simple distractions ... you want interactions with depth and meaning. Real happiness is within your reach now if you participate in activities that allow you to passionately engage life in a creative manner.

Visiting an old familiar haunt with a friend may sound like a good time today, but you'll probably wander into uncharted territory pretty quickly. Discovering new places is particularly enticing now if you can share an adventure with a special companion. Pushing boundaries and stretching outside of your ordinary routine brings out your highest potential even if you're on your own.

You might attempt to withdraw from the noisy distractions at work today to focus on improving your health. Pay extra attention to your personal routine because whatever you do now has more consequences than you realize. If you have been considering a new exercise program, don't wait a moment longer. Start immediately so you can feel better about yourself sooner than later.

Being physically active rejuvenates your body and mind. But it's not enough just to think about doing something today ... you have to actually get up and do it. Your anxiety could increase in the coming days as you face additional stress, so it's wise to find playful ways to work off your excess energy now, before it reaches a tipping point. Having fun isn't just an escape -- it's a proactive way to improve your health.

There is a lot more happening in your life than anyone can see, but this is, in part, a result of how well you hide the truth today. Your current scheming isn't about lying or even attempting to misrepresent the facts ... it's simply that you want more privacy now. There is nothing wrong with redefining boundaries if that is what you must do in order to feel secure at this time. Establishing a solid foundation is more important than worrying about how others might react.

Although your life appears to be moving forward at first today, your progress becomes less certain as the day wears on. You are ready for action, even if you don't know where you are going now. Nevertheless, trust your instincts if they're telling you to cool your jets. However, your frustration won't likely dissipate until you get your bearings again. Thankfully, it will be easier to head off in a new direction tomorrow once the fog begins to clear.

You might lose patience with someone who turns a small problem into a major crisis. But even if you understand that some damage control is necessary today, you may not be in a position to do what's required. You'll be more effective if you wait until next week to assume a leadership role. Instead of pretending that you have a plan, ease up on the reins and allow events to unfold on their own.

You think that you are clever enough to manage others successfully. You're so good at spinning stories now that you could even convince yourself that whatever you say is true. However, it's as if you are walking through a fun house of mirrors and your perceptions are out of whack. Step back and allow someone else to assume control today so you can avoid additional complications next week. In the meantime, plug your colorful imagination into a creative outlet and see what happens.

Although you're highly sympathetic to other people's feelings, you may try to hide behind a protective shell because the energy is so intense now. The Moon's visit to your sign complicates your life because there are so many crosscurrents that you cannot tell which way to go. Don't let anyone intimidate you into making a decision prematurely. It's much easier to change your mind before you commit rather than after you sign on the dotted line.

You may be a bit befuddled today because you want to push forward, yet the flow of energy is predominately inward. The Moon in your sign reflects your current need to escape from the hustle and bustle of the outer world so you can get in touch with your changing moods. But a difficult situation pressures you to take a stand now. If it seems like you're riding an emotional roller-coaster, just hold on tightly and wait until your feelings smooth out before letting others know what's on your mind.

Others frequently come to you for advice when they need your sharp analytical mind to assess their predicaments. However, you're the one that's now seeking a reality check. Remember that caring for yourself first enables you to better nurture others in the long run.

You may want to help rescue an underdog today, but this altruism clashes with your admiration of a real winner. Nevertheless, your idea of a top dog isn't necessarily a traditional one, since you intrinsically understand that success goes way beyond fame and fortune. Although you can easily admire a kind and creative person who is willing to take a risk, there are others that might also appreciate your generous assistance now.  Everyone benefits when you shine your love light.

The boundless Pisces Moon's presence in your 7th House of Others can make everyone seem confused, but you're probably just projecting your own feelings today. It's as if your friends and associates don't know what to do next and are looking to you for guidance. You could become frustrated and get annoyed if someone can't clearly express his or her intentions in a simple dialogue. Be gentle; remember that when you're judging anyone else now, you're also judging yourself.

You must focus your physical and mental energy in order to take care of today's business, but you're not likely in the mood to concentrate. This resistance isn't about laziness; you have plenty of stamina to fulfill everyone's expectations. Instead, you're bored doing the same old routine and are eager to use your creative talents elsewhere. Shake up your workday by doing something totally out of the ordinary without asking for  anyone's approval first.

You may feel more like a Fish than a Scorpion today with the dreamy Pisces Moon visiting your 5th House of Self-Expression. But you're not necessarily interested in playing anyone else's game now; you want to make up your own rules that move you closer to your goals. Compromise and meet someone halfway; it will be much less stressful than you think and much more rewarding than going it alone.

You could be under your own magic spell today that makes you believe everything is copasetic on the home front. Nevertheless, it's more important to be realistic than optimistic now since the haze of your ideals can cloud your sound judgment. It's wise to delay a big decision for a while longer. Fortunately, clarity should begin to return later in the day if you're willing to ask someone you trust for advice.

Normally, you can be quite methodical when communicating your ideas, so be patient today if your closest confidants tell you that they don't understand you. Ironically, you could probably repeat what you said and they will still miss your point. However, don't give up; continue to recycle back to the basics and you'll soon see the light bulbs of awareness turn on one by one over their heads.

Watch your spending today because you may be lost in a fantasy about purchasing something special to change your image. Unfortunately, money won't buy happiness, even if you're hooked by the idea of acquiring a piece of artwork, furniture or jewelry. Looking at material possessions as the source of satisfaction will ultimately leave you feeling frustrated. It's time to turn your thoughts inward and consider what you can do to improve your life, rather than dreaming about what you could own.

Don't worry if your moods get the best of you now because the Moon is in your sign and aligned with irrational Neptune. Acknowledge your feelings while remembering that you don't have to express every reaction. You can't control all of the circumstances in your life, but you can manage how you respond. Taking a few deep breaths when you feel emotionally overwhelmed may be sufficient to shift your attitude in a positive direction.

Hiding out sounds like a great plan for the day, especially if you've been burning the candle at both ends. Fortunately, you won't have to worry about being alone for long because you are never too far from the action. Nevertheless, it's time to rest and coast for a bit while you can. Once the Moon returns to your fiery sign tomorrow, you'll be champing at the bit and no one will be able to stop you in your pursuit of happiness.

You aren't interested in agreeing to everything that's asked of you today, especially since you don't like to waste energy jumping from one project to another. Actually, it makes sense to schedule some time when you can just chill out and dream about your future, rather than running around trying to please everyone. However, keep in mind that you can't avoid being part of the group for too long, so take advantage of the time you have now to relax and take care of yourself.

Paying extra attention to career matters is a smart plan now that the Moon is visiting your 10th House of Public Responsibility. However, your dreams can overtake reality when you're thinking about your professional objectives. Instead of assuming that anything is possible, temper your vision with a bit of pragmatism. You can't just believe your way to success; you also need a sound strategy and the determination to follow through with it.

Your emotional involvement in setting long-term goals makes it challenging today to separate your desires from reality. You might believe that your perception of a current situation is valid, yet it's colored by your opinions more than you realize. Instead of being overly judgmental now, simply describe an event the best you can, without showing your bias. There will be plenty of time later to express your feelings when it really counts.

Your intuitive sense is functioning very well today, enabling you to know what's going on beneath the surface. You don't need anyone to tell you the details, but you should be careful because your perspective may be warped by an old fear that now comes back to haunt you. It's healthy to remember what happened as long as you understand the difference between the present and the past. Trust your instincts and follow your heart.

You may be concerned that you're too busy today, but you don't see any way to cut back on your activities. You're known for your reliability and typically do as others expect, but your dreams can be more pressing now than your current responsibilities. There's no reason to frustrate yourself by trying to bridge the gap between reality and your imagination. Give yourself permission to explore all the amazing possibilities without having to make any of them come true.

You can't seem to make much progress today because your idealism is fueling your strategy and your plans may not be concrete enough. Unfortunately, your grand ideas won't fit into the narrow confines of a calendar or a spread sheet. You'll be happier now if you take action when you feel like it, rather than forcing your creativity to conform to someone else's clock. Don't worry ... ultimately, your big dreams will lead you to success.

A creative stream of images flood into your awareness now, but you might have a tricky time expressing your ideas. Although you may have a very clear picture established in your mind, it fades as your day unfolds. If you want to start a project that truly captures your imagination, do it today. Don't wait for anyone's approval because your excitement could begin to dissipate unless you act soon.

Today's Pisces Moon may feel like the beginning of an end because you think you're ready to call it quits. You want to start something new, but you could be jumping the gun. Stick to what you're doing for another day or two, even if you're already bored. You'll gain more now by sinking into your feelings about your past than distracting yourself by prematurely changing your direction. Exploring your personal history lays a strong foundation for relationships in the present.

It's challenging to manage your time effectively today as the diffusive Pisces Moon moves through your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. You might even miss an important appointment. But reining in control by paying attention to details won't work either, for someone else may be the source of trouble now. Practice detachment and let your plans unravel a bit if they must. Don't worry; you'll be able to put the pieces back together in a way that will work better than your original agenda anyhow.

A full-on effort to demonstrate how important your values are won't stop others from ignoring you if they disagree with your ideas. You still might try your hand at making an impassioned plea to muster support for your point of view. Fortunately, your words may have more of a impact than you realize at first. Say what's on your mind and then let it go. Don't judge your progress right away because it could take a while before you notice any tangible results.

The Moon's monthly visit to your sign usually intensifies the colors of your dreams. However, the edges of reality are softened now, luring you into believing something that may be quite irrational. Don't try to distinguish the differences between fact and fiction today as you flip back and forth without much concern for logic. See what changes the next few days bring before you make up your mind about what is really true.

A heightened sense of urgency today provokes you to express yourself, no matter what you are feeling. Your self-confidence enables you to try several different strategies as you search for the most efficient one to complete your work. However, caution is advised because a wild and unpremeditated approach might cause more problems than it's worth. Although you can think quickly on your feet, acting more slowly now is the way of the wise.

An obsession with your wish for a longer weekend could spoil an otherwise fine time. Nothing is to be gained from complaining, so change your attitude and transform your frustration into action. Don't waste energy imagining how you can improve your life today; instead, just do it. By turning your discontent into a positive force now, you should be able to enjoy the day more than you expect.

You are ready for nearly anything that sounds like fun today, but your impulsive reactions could over-complicate your life. Your lighthearted style can quickly turn an uneventful family function into a thoroughly enjoyable party. Be adventurous and take a risk if everything looks good, but before you do anything be sure to establish sensible limits -- and then set a good example by following them.

Your self-esteem may be soaring today, but it could also lead you into trouble. One of your greatest strengths is your patience; normally, you are able to wait until the right moment before taking action. Although watching for traps can prevent foolish behavior, it might also cause you to miss a great opportunity now. Even if you're ready to jump quickly into something new, a little extra forethought never hurts.

It's tough to settle down today because you're distracted by imagining your travels to a mountain retreat or a desert isle. However, there's no restraining your dreams now. Nevertheless, turning a fantasy into reality may be more challenging than you think. Remember, anything is possible, so don't give up on your grand adventure until you have exhausted all your options.

You may be intrigued by something you don't know now. You realize that you're missing a part of the picture and this uncertainty motivates you to delve deep beneath the surface to uncover what's hidden. You might even strike it rich by discovering a fantastic treasure trove of information that leads you into a new discipline. But don't struggle too much if you can't find all the facts, since you might already have all the answers you need.

A friend might appear very assertive or even aggressive now, suddenly taking charge of a difficult conversation with a less meaningful train of thought. You don't want to expose your vulnerability in light of someone else's negativity. Instead of being defensive and putting up protective walls if others are on your case, just watch where the discussion goes until you understand the source of the current emotional charge. Biding your time prevents you from overreacting in the moment and then regretting it later.

Shake up your weekend routine and go have some fun today. Of course, you may need to schedule your little escape for later in the day because you can't simply walk away from your current commitments. You should be able to finish your chores in a hurry because you can produce a prodigious amount of work in a very short amount of time by focusing your attention. All you need to do is find your voice, state your intentions, and concentrate on what's left to finish.

A creative breakthrough prompts you to take immediate action today. Although it's often smarter to wait a while before charging ahead, this time you don't need to be afraid to shoot from the hip. Taking careful aim is advised when you have the time. However, don't hold back now; the fastest response contains your purest of intentions and produces the strongest impact.

It seems as if social rules have been rewritten, allowing you to say what you mean today without having to worry about what other people think. Hiding your feelings won't bring you what you want. Nevertheless, it's hard to know what to do when discussing topics that make you uncomfortable. Contemplating your actions ahead of time doesn't help now; it only makes you more nervous. Be brave and start talking; he who hesitates is lost.

Your words pack quite a punch today and the power of your convictions could scare someone close to you. Although you may not feel angry, you're still willing to fight for what you want. Others might be confused by the uncharacteristic emotionality of your intentions now; assure them that you mean no harm and that you're just very passionate about your position. Then take a more straightforward approach and tell your story as objectively as possible.

Something is about to change, but you can't quite put your finger on what it is. You might believe that good news awaits you around the next corner, even if your emotions are raw and you're completely exhausted. You're on edge today because it's difficult to express your feelings. Rather than trying to describe your point of view, just act on your gut instincts. Actions speak louder than words, and you can always explain yourself later on, if necessary.

You're not inclined to start a project today unless you already have a concrete plan in place. Fortunately, you're able to think through several contingencies and map out a sound strategy. But don't let logic limit your options; it's smarter to combine your rational approach with visionary ideas. Don't give up too soon; your unwavering commitment to reach your goals is the best way to ensure your success.

It's crucial to practice self-discipline today because you might struggle if you try to accomplish too much now. Nevertheless, you have an excellent opportunity to finish what you start if you establish attainable goals and then concentrate only on the most essential tasks. Positive thinking is a definite plus as long as you don't assume that your attitude is the only thing that matters.

Your ruling planet Mercury is working overtime today to smooth over the rough spots in your life. Unfortunately, your ability to rationalize is so natural that you could be the victim of your own cleverness. Be careful not to sidestep an unpleasant discussion now because denial can come back and make things difficult later on. Believe it or not, facing the truth isn't as tough as running from it.

You excel at communicating your feelings now that chatty Mercury is in your sign; unfortunately, even a close friend might not fully understand your perspective. The problem is that some complex emotions do not fit into language; something can be lost in translation unless others understand the intentions behind your words. Remember that your actions also speak loudly, so make sure your behavior is consistent with the message you're trying to get across.

Although you might not seem insecure, you still may be concerned with a coworker's emotional response today. Your strategy could backfire if you try to hide your anxiety by being purposefully vague. Ultimately, it's wiser to disclose as much information as possible, even if you do it gradually. Your supporters can help you even more if they are fully informed. Thankfully, there's no reason to carry your burden alone.

Today you might be able to get away with some sloppy thinking or even fall for a bit of trickery as long as you don't take things too far. Your planetary ruler Mercury receives positive vibes from authoritative Saturn and compassionate Neptune, enabling you to turn on the charm while maintaining a sense of control. Thankfully, others will probably cut you some slack if your logic falters as long as you remain true to your spirit and let your imagination run free.

You often minimize your needs to make a situation more pleasant for someone else. However, you could go overboard today, trying to fix an emotional melodrama that really isn't your responsibility. Nosing around in other people's affairs rarely helps anyone, but you can still be a true friend by listening and showing your support. Caring for those you love is wonderful as long as you remember to take care of yourself, too.

Your emotional needs are often complex, prompting you to keep them to yourself. However, your dreams are wildly vivid now and you may be even less interested in having others involved with your inner process. But you don't have to close yourself off completely; confiding in another person can help you process your feelings and deepen your relationship. Give yourself permission to wait until you're ready to share your fantasies with someone you trust.

You're lost in a sea of deep thinking now, but you might not want to go public with your thoughts. Nevertheless, you could come across as if your emotions aren't very important, especially if you talk about them in an offhand manner. Ironically, you may believe that changes are occurring, even if nothing is happening yet. Be courageous and seek your voice. Take a risk and express what's really in your heart.

Although fulfilling your obligations quickly fills up your schedule, you still might believe that you can fit more activities into your day. Unfortunately, even the time you set aside for relaxation is rapidly disappearing now. Thankfully, you're able to keep your schedule from falling apart by making smart choices before anything gets out of hand. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.

You may feel uncomfortable if a conversation at work becomes too personal today. Perhaps you have an emotional moment, provoking you to say more than you normally might share and inspiring a real heart-to-heart connection. Although it could feel great at first, the mood likely grows awkward as the discussion continues. Don't withdraw completely or you might undo the potentially positive consequences of breaking down an unspoken and unnecessary boundary.

It's tempting to slip into a caretaker role today because you are so empathic when it comes to the feelings of your friends. It may be a real challenge to avoid playing the role of a martyr now, but giving away too much of yourself too quickly might turn compassion into resentment in the blink of an eye. On the other hand, you can truly help those you love in the long run if you remember to maintain healthy boundaries when opening your heart.

You might inadvertently step on someone's toes as warrior Mars aspects independent Uranus. But you may not even notice how reckless your behavior is today because the self-directed Aries Moon urges you to act first and think later. However, a knee-jerk response can get you into trouble because your immediate reaction could be off the mark. Take the time to play out all the alternatives in your mind before picking the best one.

You're anticipating the Moon's return to sensible Taurus today and you want to make the most of it. Opening your heart to your desires is the healthiest strategy now, but you may find it difficult to distinguish your fickle attractions from what's absolutely critical. Make separate lists for your needs and your wishes to help you prioritize what's in front of you. Knowing what's real empowers you to make better decisions in the long run.

You cannot prevent the noise from reaching your ears today, even if the words don't offer the hint of a solution. Irrepressible Mars in your sign spurs you to initiate conversations by firing your thoughts into a stream of consciousness. However, the wild emotional waters morph into a gently meandering river later in the day. Your sense of urgency might dissipate, but your conviction won't. Don't put off making a big decision if you already know what you want.

You might show your strong and silent side today so others don't realize how lost you are feeling. Your thoughts race around in circles like a hamster on a wheel, making it difficult to reach a logical conclusion about what's happening. Your current strategy is to keep your insecurities quiet rather than acknowledging any confusion. Although you're correct to believe you should only share business matters on a need-to-know basis, discussing your fears with a trusted friend can help you feel much better about the situation.

Although you may be pushing to finish a significant project, it appears that it might take longer than you first expected. You're tempted to blame someone else for your delay, but the current obstacles are most likely in your way because of you. Pay attention to both the wise encouragement and the fearful restraint of the universe; slow down your pace now while you still can solve the problems in front of you.

Finish your big tasks early in the day since you might become more lackadaisical once the Moon enters stable Taurus. Instead of worrying about everything you want to accomplish now, you're more interested in avoiding stress. Even if you think you're being practical by maintaining the status quo, you could be rationalizing your current resistance to change. Adopting a more flexible attitude may lead to a sweet surprise as the day unfolds.

You don't like being put on the spot, especially if it's on your own territory. However, you might choose not to express your annoyance today because you can also see things from other points of view. Following the course of least resistance is the smartest response for now. Luckily, you can make any performance a successful one. Keep your personal opinions private until you are absolutely sure of your final answer.

You can easily exhaust yourself today as you run through a mental obstacle course over and over again. However, each time you attempt to manage the resistance in the same manner you believe that your strategy will work. Unfortunately, you could end up wasting valuable resources by relying on old tactics. You may be pleasantly surprised by the outcome if you take a radically different approach now.

It feels as if you're running out of time, so stop procrastinating ... sort things out and initiate a new plan of action. Don't fret if there are still miscellaneous details to uncover now. You should be able to fill in more missing pieces as the day unfolds. Grab the opportunity while it lasts; take advantage of the enterprising Aries Moon's presence in your 5th House of Expression before the energy mellows later this afternoon.

You can't rush anything now; although you want to create something constructive for your future. You will intuitively know the right moment to make your move. Keep in mind that your mental preparation is the key ingredient in realizing success for your current enterprise. You are being tested today, so narrow your vision and concentrate solely on accomplishing your goals. Monitor your progress and nudge yourself back on track if you're lured off course for any reason.

You're willing to connect with nearly anyone today and, more importantly, you have a great time doing it. Unfortunately, you might also waste precious energy doing something that is not critical to your goal. It's wise to rein yourself in early on or you could lose control of your schedule before you know it. Fewer distractions now make it easier to find the satisfaction and success that you seek.

You're ready to move forward with a collaborative project today. However, you're so eager, you might try to create something special on your own. Thankfully, you receive kudos for your current efforts and gain enough recognition to make your new venture worthwhile. But exercise caution, nonetheless, for you could become so enamored with your ideas that you forget others can make an important contribution, too. The synergy of working together is a winning formula for success.

The frenzied pace of life slows down a bit now that the Moon is in grounded Taurus. It's as if something shifted and you awake to a quieter and gentler world today. You don't have to charge ahead to prove yourself; instead, consider taking a bit of time away from work to do absolutely nothing at all. At first this retreat might sound boring, but think of it as nurturing food for your soul.

Contentment is your key word today with the Moon returning to your sensual sign. Thankfully, you're able to relax while remaining in touch with your feelings. Although staying open to the idea of pleasure could be enough to attract a memorable experience now, you can't take it easy all day. Scheduling your downtime in advance ensures that you'll get your work done and enjoy yourself, too.

Your mind might be racing a mile a minute now, but it seems as if everyone else is shifting to a slower pace. Needless to say, this disconnect can be quite annoying. It's not that you are stuck doing something that you don't enjoy; on the contrary, you may be riding an exciting wave of creativity and wish there were more like-minded people to share your thoughts with today. Don't be afraid of stirring up some mischief if you need the mental stimulation. You'll accomplish more if you're having fun.

You might suddenly feel like canceling your upcoming party. Or, maybe you want to bow out of a social engagement and just stay home. Either way, you'll probably regret changing your mind so close to a planned event; instead, follow through with your commitments. Once you get into the groove, you'll remember why you were excited about the activity in the first place. Life is precious; the memories you make now will last forever.

You're expected to take care of someone today and you might not have much of a choice in the matter. Others are relying on you and you must deliver on your promises. Even if you have misgivings about a prior obligation, everything will likely turn out better than you think. Remember, maintaining a positive attitude gives you the head start that you need to fulfill your responsibilities.

You're quite comfortable today because you like it when your feet are rooted so firmly on the ground. Although tension may arise later, you're still able to make the most of the current situation by comparing what you want with what you already have. Nevertheless, you'll be better off if you work diligently now, even if you're not worried about the outcome. Fortunately, your persistence won't go unnoticed.

Relationship dynamics seem off-kilter today and it's difficult to put your finger directly on the problem. Thankfully, you have a good chance to enjoy yourself anyhow, but you might need to sidestep some of your current responsibilities now. Instead of trying to make everyone else happy, allow others to go out of their way to do something nice for you. Contentment is found somewhere in between the extremes of work and play.

You might have to confront a stubborn person who doesn't want to meet you halfway today. But instead of increasing your frustration level by attempting to convince someone of what they are doing wrong, solve this dilemma from the opposite direction. Re-evaluate the issue until you can clearly see both points of view at the same time. Even if you don't get your way, you'll be left with more compassion for an opposing position. Others will appreciate your efforts to be fair-minded and that may be enough.

Unfortunately, the Taurus Moon plodding through your 6th House of Routine can saddle you with boring chores, so you might as well begin early today and finish them as soon as you can. It's not a smart idea to further fuel your irritation with unsuccessful attempts to escape from your commitments. Instead, use your creativity now to accomplish your goals in the most sensible way. Once you meet your obligations, you will be in a better position to let down your hair and fully enjoy yourself.

You receive a beneficial boost of energy from the earthy Taurus Moon today, but don't attempt to complete everything in a quick burst of adrenaline or you'll just wear yourself out. Unfortunately, you could work hard all day and still have more to do. Instead, it's smarter to slow down and move through the day with less speed and more determination. Taking a more deliberate approach enables you to accomplish more than you expected, leaving you satisfied at the end of the day.

Free-floating anxiety may plague you throughout the day for no specific reason at all. Although you might be able to rationalize each of your emotions, it's crucial to get past your nervous energy rather than wasting time justifying your position. Being right should not be a higher priority than being happy. Remember, the power to turn your negative attitude into a positive one resides within you.

You might be in for a major disappointment today if you think you can fantasize your way around a difficult issue. But facing a problem directly will ultimately give you a much-needed sense of security because you won't need to waste energy trying to figure out what to do next. Don't fight against an inevitable tide. For now, simply showing up and being real is sufficient to keep your day on track.

You have a lot to do today, yet you may suddenly realize how tired you are from running around in circles. Don't avoid the signs; rather than pushing yourself harder now when you really feel like resting, listen to the wisdom of your body. Fortunately, you can relax even more once you acknowledge that productivity isn't the only thing that's important. Your health is a priceless asset that can't be taken for granted.

Although the Moon's current visit to determined Taurus amplifies your desires, you might not be motivated to fight for what you want now. Although you know how hard you've been working, you don't necessarily have much progress to show for your efforts. Nevertheless, it's not time to give up. Don't let negative emotions stand between you and success. Focus on your future and don't look back.

You might owe a co-worker an apology now, or perhaps you still have some professional commitments to fulfill. Unfortunately, your good intentions may have slid off the tracks due to unexpected circumstances. Thankfully, a hectic phase appears to be coming to an end. Retreat and regroup; spend whatever time is necessary to review your current direction and reassess your capabilities before making any more promises you can't keep. Demonstrating your sincerity by making amends is a good first step to turning things around.

Your empathy doesn't have to impede your success as long as you're able to control your emotions. Although you pretend you're not interested in sharing your feelings today, you still may be wearing them on your sleeve for all to see. Sometimes you can be moody even if you're in denial. Hiding from yourself is not a viable path to happiness. Stay in tune with what's happening and keep the communication channels open.

Your daydreams may be subtle today, yet they grow more colorful and vibrant if you share them with someone else. Unfortunately, you may give up too easily now because your idealistic goals seem just beyond your grasp, leading to frustration. Remember, you feed your own anxieties by creating unrealistic expectations. Focusing on your vision rather than your progress empowers you to avoid self-doubt.

You might lose motivation today, especially if your work has become too routine. The problem is exacerbated by your overactive imagination, making it nearly impossible to concentrate on the necessary details. Revealing your vulnerability to someone you trust will make a difference. If you pretend everything is perfect now, then no one is able to step in and lend a helping hand. Accepting assistance from your friends doesn't make you look weak; it makes you more human.

You want others at work to lean on you today because you are confident that you can provide the necessary support. However, it may be quite useful to establish clear boundaries so you don't lose yourself in the service of someone else. Your compassion is truly admirable, but make sure to take enough time to nurture yourself as well. Fostering your independence inspires those close to you to develop their own self-reliance, too.

The Moon in your 7th House of Relationships may create an awkward situation that quickly reflects your feelings back to you. It's natural to identify with others, yet you might forget that their emotions are ultimately yours -- even if they seem as if they are external. Instead of seeing encounters as you-versus-them, imagine yourself on both sides of the playing field. It's much easier to find common ground once you realize that everyone's on the same team.

It's time to take a fresh look at your work priorities while the practical Taurus Moon is visiting your 6th House of Daily Routine. You may need to set aside big plans so you can tie up loose ends on an unfinished job. Even if you must be practical and apply your common sense in the present moment, it's still not a good idea to completely ignore your fantasies. Ultimately, it's your dreams that motivate you to aim beyond today's list of things to do.

Your friends and coworkers seem needy today, but you won't likely lose your patience even if their dependency makes you feel uncomfortable. It may be wise to acknowledge that you're uneasy with expressing personal feelings in a formal work environment. You can be very effective at soothing tensions if you are courageous enough to bring your natural resistance out into the open and push beyond your comfort zone.

The presence of unresolved feelings clashes with your more detached intellectual style to increase your anxiety. Instead of approaching every interaction rationally, the evocative Moon in your 4th House of Foundations encourages you to set logic aside and let your intuition be your guide. Don't even bother to explain or justify your dreams; your current practice is to simply follow your vision for the future with an open mind and a trusting heart.

You're able to express yourself lovingly today without wasting a lot of words. Luckily, you can manage lots of activities at once now without necessarily appearing too stressed out. Nevertheless, caution is advised; don't try to sustain your current frenetic pace too long or it might begin to wear you down. Sustenance comes to you from the emotional realms, so don't forget to open your heart and sink into your feelings when you have the chance.

Saying what's on your mind with the voice of authority doesn't make it true, but you're tempted to try this ploy today. You might even believe that you can talk someone into seeing the world through your eyes. But insisting you're right only makes you sound foolish because your rationalizations are more transparent than you realize. There's no need to pretend that you're an expert now, because those who know you respect you simply for being yourself.

Your future looks bright today, but you may not be heading in the right direction to make your dreams come true. Even if your goals are realistic; you might still underestimate the resources required to reach your destination. Fortunately, if you're willing to let your imagination wander now, you can visualize possibilities that others miss. But remember to stay acutely aware of the differences between fact and fancy, or the outcome won't be what you expect.

You're thrilled that your most colorful dreams are now ready for harvest. However, don't let your confidence run away with the show just yet. You might actually think that you can be successful without working hard today, but this illusion fades as the game intensifies. If an idyllic fantasy disappears as you get closer to it, it's best to let it go and move on to something else. You may only need to wait another day or two for a new opportunity to knock at your door.

It feels as if you have all the words at the tip of your tongue to describe your hopeful emotions today. However, you still can't initiate a conversation about your dreams of the future. Don't waste your time trying to explain your vision until you have a good reason to share it. Revealing your plans prematurely might only create an awkward moment now, so be patient and continue to make quiet progress without creating a lot of fanfare or fuss.

It's great when so many people seem to be supporting your decisions. You might feel as if you're in a perfect social situation today where everything is just flowing naturally. Happily, you aren't even thinking about what you should do next. However, your desire for deeper connections doesn't exactly fit with your current scattered energy. Thankfully, you can maintain the status quo for a while longer by temporarily keeping your emotions to yourself and simply appreciating the moment.

It's challenging to go with the flow because you're afraid of what may happen if you don't resist the prevailing emotional currents. You prefer to be rational and in control one hundred percent of the time ... but in this case, you are not. Therefore, your most reliable strategy is to avoid being overly attached to your desires. Paradoxically, denying your needs only strengthens your fears. Escape your regular routine; lead with your imagination and not your analytical thoughts to end up somewhere amazing.

Starting work early in the day might sound like a smart idea, but nothing seems to go exactly as planned. Your positive attitude is the most important factor now in deciding whether or not you can find time to enjoy yourself later on. Don't be rigid if you run into an obstacle today; exercising flexibility enables you to keep a healthy perspective. Ultimately, if you believe in your dream, you can make it real; it just may take longer than you like.

You're tempted to take the easy way out today, even if you typically stick to your principles. Nevertheless, sometimes your idealistic approach complicates your life and stresses your relationships. But you have a long-term strategy in place now and you're not eager to jeopardize it over any one particular issue. Thankfully, choosing your battles wisely strengthens your position because people will come to your support when you ask for it. There's no need to compromise your values for the sake of expediency.

Your imagination is wildly vivid today, inspiring you to combine your daydreams with your reality. You may actually believe that you will accomplish more than is possible because everything happens so smoothly in your mind. But each task requires more effort than you expect. You could end up in trouble if you race through a chore, believing you can make up for lost time. Instead, promise less and deliver more.

You may feel a bit overwhelmed today because there are so many demands being made on your time, and you know you won't be able meet everyone's expectations. Fortunately, you can turn the day into a resounding success by setting priorities and focusing only on the most important goals. A wave of inner peace settles in once you eliminate the extraneous noise. It won't be easy at first to stand up for yourself, but it's certainly worth it in the long run.

You receive an extra blast of creativity today as energetic Mars in your 5th House of Self-Expression is agitated by imaginative Neptune. However, production can be delayed by your lack of a concrete plan. You may feel as if you're wasting time trying to manage the unexpected interruptions. Nevertheless, just handle the chaos with a sense of humor. Oddly enough, the distractions might inspire you to even greater heights.

A personal issue -- domestic or romantic -- rattles your nerves today, and you don't quite know what to do next. It's tempting to shut out your problems for a while by withdrawing into your imagination. But escaping into Fantasyland works for only brief moments of time now. Tangible solutions are closer than you think if you're willing to face the music and meet others halfway.

You want everyone to know what you're feeling today, but you don't like the idea of actually sharing your emotions. Thankfully, you can ease your concern about saying too much by actively listening to what others have to say. Remember, talking about your process works best when you realize that communication is a two-way street. Today's Gemini New Moon in your 3rd House of Information is a reminder to gather as much data as you dispense.

Today's information-rich Gemini New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Resources, urging you to review your fiscal strategies and, if necessary, change your course. But don't panic; although you may not achieve your goals overnight, clarifying your objectives helps you along your way. If your financial situation seems overwhelming, think about what you must do to get yourself back on track and then, at least, take the first step.

Today's New Moon in your sign can be an unexpected game changer. You might wish you had more stability today, but the uncertainty is also exhilarating. Attempts to keep everything as it is now may be a study in frustration.
