Fortunately, being adaptable to the changing circumstances is one of your greatest talents, so if you fall short of your goals, just reassess your plans and try again.

You may feel so scattered today that you aren't very productive; nevertheless, there are many types of success. Your most important accomplishments might not be visible to anyone else, since today's Gemini New Moon occupies your 12th House of Secrets. Thankfully, your stream of consciousness can reveal a new direction for you to follow. Don't resist any thoughts now, even if they seem unrealistic at first. You will have plenty of time later to weed out the distracting ideas and to nurture the good ones.

Everyone wants a piece of your day because the friendly Gemini New Moon highlights your 11th House of Networking. Even if you want to retreat, unexpected events can draw you out into the community today. However, your public life isn't a distraction from what you should be doing now, because social interactions could ultimately bring you the support you need. Changing your perspective allows you to see the advantages of having allies who believe in you.

Although today's whimsical Gemini New Moon may quickly disperse your energy, its presence in your 10th House of Responsibility makes this a perfect time to discuss your next major project. However, your concentration is being tested as you're tempted to begin a journey by heading out on several paths at once. You will be better off if you make an intuitive choice now and pick just one route, even if you need to change directions farther down the road.

You can't wait to share your education or travel plans with others now. Although you can easily fantasize about your next adventure, you have to get serious if you actually want to make something happen. Instead of just spinning wild stories, initiate a productive dialogue. Use today's Gemini New Moon in your 9th House of Future Vision to reevaluate your long-term goals and create your own bucket list. Then, commit to one of your dreams and do whatever it takes to make your wish come true.

Although you are intrinsically wired for intense situations, today's Gemini New Moon activates your 8th House of Intimacy, making your energy more difficult for your friends to handle. Even if you want to talk about subjects that others would rather avoid, there is plenty of room for compromise now. Moderating your approach prevents others from suddenly bolting in search of emotional safety, allowing you to have the deep and meaningful discussions that you crave.

The Gemini New Moon occurs in your 7th House of Partners today, continuing to shake up your significant relationships. The dynamics are changing and you're ready to ask for what you want now. Choose the right moment; how many words you speak is less important than the quality of what you say. Keep your speech short and sweet for the best results. But don't hesitate to start again from the top if you get off to a bad start. Expressing your heart is an act of courage.

You may think that changing your attitude is all that's required now, but there's nothing easy about breaking free from old habits. Your current responsibilities might pull you one way and then another, making it hard to stay on track. Today's New Moon in your 6th House of Self-Improvement means that you have to take action in the real world in order to establish new patterns. Have faith -- remember, the little gains you make now will grow into bigger ones over time.

You have a ton of chores to do today, but the Gemini New Moon brings its lighthearted energy to your 5th House of Play, fueling your desire to have as much fun as possible. Don't try to avoid responsibility now; just keep in mind that you'll accomplish more if you are enjoying yourself. The decision is yours; you can make yourself miserable by complaining while you work. Still, a lovely time awaits you once you change the game by simply altering your attitude.

Today's chatty Gemini New Moon in your 4th House of Emotional Security encourages you to talk about your personal needs. Even if it seems difficult at first, something valuable may be gained if you can demonstrate your vulnerability by explaining your inner process. It isn't useful to speak in vague generalities now; positive results are possible if you're specific about your feelings. Sharing your heart with a trusted companion is a leap of faith worth taking.

It's smart to withhold your anger now, rather than expressing everything that you feel. Remaining tight-lipped may seem safer because of your concern that you'll share too much once you get on a roll. Unfortunately, relationships can turn cool if your suppressed emotions cultivate resentment. Sinking into denial is not a viable option today; confront your fears, put your thoughts in order and then speak your truth. Clearing the air might be all you need to do to set things right.

Your dreams may pull you far off the beaten path today, making it difficult to find your way home. Your emotions seem overwhelming at first, but they gradually morph into your allies. Remain open to whatever happens now because your current goals will likely change as you become more pragmatic. Ultimately, your unwavering determination enables you to get back on track. Don't bother explaining anything to anyone until after you're moving in the right direction.

Your fast wit saves you from a very tricky situation today. However, you still must be cautious and watch every step you take so you don't make a social blunder. Your lighthearted sense of humor relieves some of the stress in the immediate moment, but it doesn't fix the underlying cause. Personal relationships are more complex than they appear now. Take your time and don't be so quick to tap dance around the edges of the unknown.

You don't want to own up to your feelings now, but friends may be pressuring you to tell them what's on your mind, anyhow. Although you have the good sense to resist, you don't like being placed in such an awkward position. Even if you prefer everything to be out in the open, the present circumstances could require you to remain silent for now. You might not find full resolution in the outer world today, but thankfully, you'll feel more rejuvenated if you simply seek your peace from within.

A close friend's intense emotional outburst might be exactly what you need to awaken you from your current complacency. Even if you believe that you have everything under control now, you're beginning to see the unfolding drama in a different light today. The first step is to acknowledge that your current plan won't see you through this power struggle. Thankfully, your courage motivates you to adapt to nearly anything that comes your way.

Dealing with the fallout from other people's reactions can be unsettling today, especially if someone who is usually your ally is now resisting you at every step you take. Although you don't want to retract your recent words, you might wish you hadn't gone so deep when sharing your current feelings. Working with your emotions may not be all fun and games, but it should prove to be quite rewarding if you're willing to stick with the process.

You might not be very certain about a few of your recent choices. Asking tough questions of yourself is helpful today, but harboring self-doubt is not. The next few days could be frustrating, especially if you can't see very far into the future, making it nearly impossible to finalize your plans. Instead of succumbing to the stress, engage the energy by doing chores around the house or working on an unfinished project. Rest assured that the dust will settle and you'll gain the clarity you need regarding your final answer.

You may feel as if you must give up personal control today and go along with external circumstances that seem to be outside of your authority. Although you worry that mild concerns could trigger more serious fears now, an emotional safety net will protect you from falling. An irrational outburst only stirs up more trouble than it solves. There's no need to overreact before you know what's going to happen. Take a deep breath and trust the process.

You're often quick to share what's on your mind, but your impulsive tendencies might have you backtracking today. Ironically, your analysis of the current situation is probably correct; it's just that everything is in flux now and you may jump to a conclusion prematurely. Thankfully, you should have ample opportunity to reevaluate your choices and change your mind based upon what you learn later in the day.

A close friend or partner might appear overly emotional today, prompting you to withdraw into your rational world. You aren't eager to be sidetracked by someone's issues when you have your own situation brewing. Stay present with your feelings to avoid drawing unnecessary battle lines. A serious conflict won't produce any winners now; resolve your problems through open dialogue, instead. Make sure that everyone involved is willing to compromise before you surrender more than you should.

You're pulled between delving into your feelings today and overruling them by initiating action. The illusion is that each approach appears to exclude the other. The solution isn't straightforward because a sensible strategy must incorporate both your internal process and your external behavior. There's no shame in admitting  that you don't have a clue as to what to do next. Engaging in a meaningful conversation with someone you trust is more constructive in the long run than running around in circles.

You may be challenged to stand up for your beliefs now, especially if someone in your immediate environment thinks they know how you should live your life. You might be reluctant to admit that your position is different because you're really not interested in defending your choices. Although the same issue could resurface at a later date, it's still best to wait it out and say as little as possible. Oddly enough, what seems critical today won't be as important next week.

Your family and friends are familiar with your impulsive behavior and they understand you mean no harm if you step on their toes. However, people who don't know you as well might question your motives if you inadvertently do something hurtful now. You're uncertain if it's best to talk about the issue or if you should just forget about it and move on. Even if you're tempted to run away, it's healthier to face the stress with a willingness to listen and an open heart.

Finding the right companions to join in your fun today can be quite a challenge now. You just want to enjoy yourself, but it's tricky when everyone else has their own ideas of what a good time means. Some of your friends want to do more than you're willing and others want to do less. Don't say yes to something that's not your cup of tea. Pursuing pleasure on your own terms may be the most gratifying thing you can do.

You may have your mind set on doing something completely out of the ordinary today, but financial limitations might put a damper on your plans. Luckily, you can salvage a part of your original agenda, but you must be creative to make it happen. Don't sulk if everything goes differently than you wish. Make the best of the current situation without comparing it to what could have been; sometimes, the best things in life are free.

Your dreams may be at odds with those of a partner or close friend. Or, perhaps, circumstances beyond your control seem to be working against you today. No matter what happens, don't take it personally; this isn't a cosmic conspiracy trying to do you in. Instead of giving up now, take responsibility for what you can change and temporarily let go of the rest. The external pressure helps you become more aware of a major issue you need to work through over the next few weeks.

You may feel singled out today, as if someone is going out of his way to bug you. Unfortunately, even if your fears are validated, it won't do much good to confront others because that will bring them the satisfaction they seek. Fortunately, you can change your mind even if everyone else's feelings are beyond your control. Resolve to move through your day with a positive attitude. Luckily, once you decide to take the high road, your opponents might choose to follow.

Although your workweek might not start the way you prefer, things should begin to smooth out this afternoon. Your day improves if you can energetically retreat, thereby reducing the drama around an emotional conflict. But you need to be careful or your self-imposed isolation could amplify your anger. Avoid taking the easy way out by blaming anyone else for your feelings. Examining your role in the current dynamics enables you to change your perspective for the better.

Your ability to see both sides of an issue is a blessing in disguise as responsibilities push you one way and desires pull you another. Although it may feel as if you have to make a choice today, it could just be an illusion whispering within your mind. It's not about sidestepping the issues; it's about keeping your options open now. Don't fall victim to someone else's agenda and decide your fate prematurely. There's no need to show your hand yet; hold onto your cards and let the circumstances continue to play out for a while longer.

You want to please everyone today, yet you secretly may not believe that satisfaction is likely. There might even be some casualties now as the pressures pile up and you are caught in the middle of a drama that has grown out of control. How you respond is crucial, since you could provoke intense emotions if you go to extremes. Acknowledge what's in your gut without fanning the flames of discontent. You can be honest without being unkind.

You might believe that you recently said too much and ruffled someone's feathers in the process. You may think that others should be able to let go of hurts from the past, but, unfortunately, this isn't the case today. There's no need to seek excuses to escape if a lighthearted discussion turns heavy. No one will hold a grudge if you take responsibility for your words and apologize for your insensitivity. Appreciating the present moment brings everyone together.

It's wise to downplay your emotions now because you might seem much more intense than you actually are. However, don't pretend that all is well if you are unhappy with someone else's behavior. Nevertheless, caution is advised because others can easily misinterpret your words by thinking that you're judging them too harshly. Express yourself succinctly without letting your feelings run the show. An honest dialogue opens the door to a closer relationship.

Your emotions are all over the map today because you're worried about your friends and family. Your stress increases if you also start thinking about how much work is ahead of you. Remember, it's up to you to choose where to focus your attention now. Although it's healthy to acknowledge someone's hurt feelings, it's a mistake to take responsibility for them. Don't try to fix anyone else; instead, concentrate on your behavior and let your actions speak for themselves.

You can't calm anyone else down today if you are frazzled yourself. You might wish you could escape, but your participation in an unfolding drama is very helpful to others. In fact, the experience can also be healing for you if you open your heart. There's no need to be in a hurry to force your solution onto a situation that is still in flux. You want to ease everyone's anxiety, but there's nothing you can do to accelerate the process. Thankfully, just being present with your feelings is enough to inspire others to do the same.

Although you may be quite sure of a recent decision, it still takes a lot of energy to remain steadfast as someone shows you a different point of view today. Others might claim that they're not trying to change your opinion, but you feel pressure being applied anyhow. Even if it's a challenge, you can open your mind and widen your perspective without surrendering your dreams.

Your ruling planet Venus entices you with her sweet beauty, but there might be a hidden price to pay for courting pleasure today. Although you may believe that you won't fall prey to deeper passions, they could surface anyway. But total avoidance of your feelings isn't a viable strategy, either. Instead, initiate a discussion about your fears in a manner that does not blame anyone else for your irrational emotions. The way out of your current dilemma is through the center of the storm.

It's difficult to avoid the heavy emotions in the air now no matter how much your clever wit dances around the issues. You are often a champion at skipping over tough spots, but it's not worth exhausting yourself in the process. If you are willing to let go of your rigid agenda today, you have an opportunity to increase the level of intimacy in a relationship. But conflict is likely if you cannot be flexible enough to compromise. Finding the right balance between give and take is the trick.

There are obstacles to overcome today and you may need to confront hurtful memories to reach your desired destination. You wish you could break down the emotional walls between you and a loved one, but you might be afraid that the current intensity of your needs will be frightening to someone else. Your passion is not the problem now; rather, hanging on to a past wound keeps getting in the way of your satisfaction. You'll feel a lot lighter once you finally let go.

You might act as if you're willing to go along with the group consensus, but you could harbor secret resentments if your wishes are overlooked. It's not that you need to have your way today; you just would like others to consider your point of view, too. Express your feelings as gently as possible. Taking responsibility for your own emotions can help to alleviate your anger without shifting the blame to anyone else. If you want to cultivate authentic relationships, you have to be honest.

If you're having a hard time choosing a direction in life now, making a decision may be complicated by your struggle with a spouse or romantic partner. But even if you're in it to win, there still could be deeper psychological issues that bring up your fears of scarcity. Of course, worrying about the right things is a sign of your practical nature. However, handling the current situation with a sense of humor helps everyone to be more at ease. Taking a moment to acknowledge your blessings can change the tone of the day.

You often find yourself in the middle of interpersonal tension, which ultimately allows you to play the role of an ambassador, going back and forth until you negotiate a fair solution. However, it may be you who could benefit from diplomatic intervention today to help you through an emotional battle with someone who is pushing your buttons. Don't look at this as a conflict between two people; instead, see what you can learn about the relationship issues that are now being raised.

Your feelings are intensified today as Venus opposes your key planet Pluto, turning a minor disagreement into a major conflict. You can probably see both sides of an argument, but it's still challenging to be objective when it feels like so much is at stake now. However, there may be more going on than meets the eye. Don't be distracted by the current drama; instead, delve beneath the surface to understand the deeper issues that are fueling the debate. Playing detective is safer than starting a fight.

You may become upset if you believe that others aren't being totally honest. In fact, you would prefer to have all feelings aired so you can decide your level of involvement based on full disclosure. Unfortunately, you might not be able to uncover everyone's unexpressed intentions now, so your best strategy is to respond cautiously and wait for the entire story to emerge on its own. In the meantime, don't let anyone else's behavior rain on your parade.

Your ability to remain neutral today in the midst of an emotional clash enables you to jump into the fray without even choosing sides. But your detachment is a very clever tactic because when you come out on top, it doesn't really matter how you got there. Be careful, for your calculated approach can also reveal your fear of following your heart. Take time to check in with your own needs even if it makes you feel uncomfortable at first. Your personal integrity matters most.

It isn't that you're completely immune to the melodrama being played out around you now, but you may be somewhat removed from center stage. Luckily, your intellectual approach empowers you to talk about what's happening without being swept up by everyone else's intense feelings. Avoid taking sides in a dispute; your objective outlook is the cool voice of reason that others need to hear at this time.

It's challenging to find your own voice if your feelings are drowned out by the magnitude of everyone else's. But it's not that you don't have an intense reaction to the current commotion; it's just that you're not interested in fighting to be heard. You're tempted to suppress your passions by giving up before you even try to express them. Nevertheless, it's best to say what's on your mind or a temporary annoyance could grow into an enduring resentment. Clear the air and move on.

You're likely to freak out those close to you if you tell them how you really feel today. You might claim that you want tranquility, but you also need to balance it with a bit of excitement. There may be a problem if you're not concerned with what others think of your choices. Unfortunately, you could inadvertently overstep someone's limits now. Acting with a little consideration can ultimately improve a relationship without getting in your way of achieving personal satisfaction.

Your key planet Venus brings pleasure into your life today in ways that are fresh and different. Unfortunately, the opportunity you have for enjoyment comes at a high price now. But don't bother trying to get a stamp of approval from a friend, unless you're specifically seeking to deepen that particular relationship. Communicating your feelings isn't all fun and games; it takes hard work and a vulnerable heart. Nevertheless, the potential rewards are well worth the effort.

You may think that being discreet is necessary today because you assume that your eccentric tastes will appear too weird for those around you. It's true that others could judge you harshly if your current preferences seem strange to them. However, they might also envy you and wonder how you get away with expressing yourself as you do. But don't slip too far away from social conventions; there are some rules you need to follow just like everyone else.

You may turn out to be your own nemesis today, especially if you're trying to calm your worries about your emotional security. You naturally crave the safety of a nurturing relationship, but you still might grow restless now. Even if you want to break out of your current routine, balance your desire for excitement in the moment with the long-term stability that you ultimately need.

You think you know what's best when it comes to your schedule, yet you're willing to suddenly discard your current plan if the right temptation comes along today. Unfortunately, your friends don't help your situation by encouraging you to join them on their amazing adventures. Nevertheless, you long for some excitement and might just say yes if an invitation arrives when you are ready to escape. Remember, your work will still be waiting when you return.

Your friends and associates could surprise you today if they resist going along with a previously agreed upon plan. Although you might feel as if there is a mutiny in progress, the plot is probably a cry for freedom rather than a play for power. Don't try to change their minds; if necessary, continue on your way without the support of others. You'll feel better in the long run if you stick to your agenda no matter what anyone else thinks.

Your goals pull you in two different directions now, but you know you can't take both paths. Although your sense of urgency is high as your key planet Venus squares Uranus, you're not quite ready to close one door in favor of another. Even if you wish you could postpone your decision, today's events catalyze your thinking because others are directly impacted by your actions. No matter how ambivalent you may feel, just make a choice and move forward without looking back.

Your feelings are shifting back and forth today, making them more complicated to share than ever. You can easily convince yourself to keep your emotions private because you're worried about other peoples' reactions to your electrically charged desires. Or, you might believe that your inner process isn't anyone else's business. Although your concerns are valid, you still would be smarter to take a risk and show your vulnerability. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

You're naturally optimistic and don't see anything wrong with asking for what you want today. However, feeling good may be easier than looking good and your friends might not be so quick to endorse your unorthodox desires. Nevertheless, expressing your emotions could be the catalyst you need to abruptly change an old behavior pattern. Obviously, you cannot predict how anyone will react, but revealing your true self is a step in the right direction.

It's unsettling if you're suddenly attracted to the very same instability that you typically try to avoid. Nevertheless, you may be totally fascinated by someone's radical style or eccentric idea today, even if you can't see any practical value in it. Your unusual reaction might worry you, but there's no reason to curb your enthusiasm. Shake things up while you can; you'll return to your more conservative approach to life in a couple of days with a fresh perspective.

Your ruling planet Uranus is often associated with emotional detachment, but today its square to magnetic Venus brings a sudden awakening of attraction and desire. However, you aren't drawn toward the same old things; instead, you want to explore uncharted territory. Don't try to rationalize what's in your heart. For now, the crazier your fantasy, the more satisfaction you can derive from acting on it. Follow your bliss, but don't lose your common sense along the way.

You have the right to be as different as you want today because nonconformist Uranus activates romantic Venus in your 5th House of Love and Creativity. You aren't interested in appearing just like everyone else now, so be courageous, show off the twinkle in your eyes and enjoy the extra bounce in your step. It doesn't matter if anyone else can hear the beautiful music that's stirring your soul. Dance with wild abandon as if no one is watching.

You're eager to start a creative project today since the expressive Leo Moon fires up inventive Uranus in your sign. Thankfully, you can see potential trouble ahead and may try to moderate your wild enthusiasm before things get out of hand. Nevertheless, you still might not be able to contain your excitement. You won't have to apologize for just being yourself with those you love as long as you are sensitive to their needs.

A close friend might expect you to put your personal priorities aside so you can play a more active role when guiding your family or friends. But you may grow irritated with this current arrangement because you don't want to be burdened with additional responsibilities. Keep in mind that it's just as important to take care of yourself today, but try not to let anyone else down more than is necessary. Take pride in the fact that people can depend on you when it matters.

A heartfelt gesture seems like an insignificant move on your part now, yet it still could be of major importance to someone else. Unfortunately, an acquaintance may misinterpret your actions because of unrealistic expectations. Or, maybe your behavior is purposefully confusing because you want to throw others off track. State your boundaries clearly today so you don't unintentionally deceive those who are already on your side.

You continue to improve your strategy today, preparing to make your big move. You have been waiting for just the right time, but there's still something that's beyond your reach. It's as if a piece from a jigsaw puzzle is purposefully being hidden to prevent you from being so confident about your solution. Don't waste time trying to explain yourself; your actions will tell the entire story better than any words could.

The Moon's current visit to your extroverted sign can turn this into a very social day. However, mental Mercury and beautiful Venus are still hanging out in your 12th House of Privacy, so you may not want to be the center of attention. But if you go out of your way to seek the spotlight, your plan could backfire and make you regret your actions. Luckily, it's more important now to love others than it is to be loved. Your generosity of spirit is greatly appreciated by those around you.

You may be quite effective in the execution of your chores as you work behind the scenes. However, you still might say something that causes others to stop and take notice of you today. Unfortunately, you could bring the wrong kind of attention to yourself if you accidentally reveal a well-kept secret. Relax and blend in with the crowd, for hiding only draws the spotlight toward you like a magnet. You can still be wildly productive without making big waves.

Nearly everything seems to be growing more confusing these days, especially with respect to love and relationships. Keep in mind that you may not know what is best now because it's tough figuring out what others expect. Try a more creative answer to the current problem. Instead of having to choose one solution over another, develop a scenario where both are possible. You might end up surprised because the least conventional plan could quickly turn into the most constructive one.

You are not meant to sit around the house today or take it easy at work. Kicking up your heels sounds good, but you'll be able to enjoy yourself more if you fulfill your job responsibilities first. Get outside later in the day and do something just for the fun of it. But don't think that you can be totally satisfied with a string of trivial distractions now. Find an activity that engages your mind with the deeper questions of life to feed your soul.

Exploring with a friend might sound like a lot of fun today, yet you can push beyond familiar territory pretty quickly. Discovering new places or digging into unanswered mysteries is quite enticing now, especially if you're able to share this adventure with someone just as fearless as you. Nevertheless, flying solo is okay, too; as long as you're traveling outside of your normal comfort zone, you can't help but have a memorable time.

Take a few steps back from all the distractions in your life now and concentrate on the details of just one project. You will be aptly rewarded if you can successfully change one small thing instead of trying to turn your whole life upside down to no avail. Your health regimen could be a good place to start; if you are considering an improvement to your diet, do it now. It's better to begin sooner than later, even if you ultimately need to make more adjustments over the next few weeks.

It's not enough to consider ways to increase your physical activity now; instead, you need to stop talking, get out there and do it. However, you're tempted to wait for your friend or partner to join you in your workout today. Nevertheless, it isn't healthy to shift the responsibility for your actions on to anyone else. Whether you accept it or not, the ball is in your court. Lead by example and others will follow your positive direction.

You are tempted to make a big deal about what you want to accomplish at work, but it's really not necessary to draw any further attention to yourself today. You don't want to misrepresent anything; it's just that you need some more wiggle room as you describe reality. Remember, there's nothing wrong with believing that your outlook is special as long as you don't claim that it's the only valid one. Let your actions do the talking now.

You often enjoy the anticipation of what's next, even when the results of your actions are unpredictable. However, your current dilemma could have you anxiously tied in knots because you know something significant is about to happen and you don't yet know what to do about it. It's not easy to be patient because you are ready for a change now. Although waiting is hard, keep your spirits up. You should know more by tomorrow.

You are dreaming of a less hectic lifestyle, but it doesn't appear that your daily pace is calming down in the near future. The difference between what you want and what you have could be enough to make you grow quiet today. It's nearly impossible to express your desires now when satisfaction seems so far away. But this is no time to let negativity creep into your thinking; you are entering a time of dramatic change and your attitude makes all the difference in the world.

You are wired with excitement because ingenious Uranus forms a magical quintile with the radiant Sun in your sign today, opening the floodgates of mental originality. Unfortunately, your mind may be moving so fast now that it's difficult to hold on to any one thought long enough to do something constructive with it. However, practicing concentration can drastically change the game, so act as if you are who you want to be rather than waiting for an opportunity to knock at your door.

Your need for pleasure is heightened these days as delicious Venus travels through your sign. However, pursuing your desires doesn't come without a price. You could set yourself up for disappointment now if you know what you want but fail to share your feelings with someone close to you. Don't assume that a loved one knows what you're thinking today. Take a risk and give voice to what's in your heart. You still might be pleasantly surprised, even if the outcome isn't exactly what you wished.

You have experienced so many turning points in the past few weeks that you may not have high expectations for the next one. But your life is truly evolving and you're finally moving into new territory now, instead of revisiting a variation on the same old familiar ground. Don't settle for less just because you recently encountered a setback. You have a larger role in creating your future than you might realize, so set high goals and then stretch to reach them.

You're entering a more social phase now, so get ready to have some fun. But there's a more serious side to this shift, too, since your career goals are in the spotlight during the weeks ahead. Meanwhile, the Moon's return to your sign today puts you in more immediate touch with your feelings and enables you to express them with greater ease. Even if you're not completely comfortable with the current circumstances, honesty is still the best policy. Sharing your heart clears the path for something wonderful to happen.

You may receive high praise at work for something you recently completed. Or, perhaps, you notice that others are being friendlier now, even if you haven't changed your behavior. Paradoxically, too much attention might prompt you to compensate by stepping out of the spotlight today. However, don't shy away too quickly because acknowledgment of your contribution ultimately gives your confidence a well-deserved boost.

Your strong sense of loyalty might have prevented you from breaking free until now, but you are right at the edge and eager to make some major changes. Fortunately, you may not be inclined to do anything radical today, since there are certain parts of your life that are working just fine. Still, you are antsy enough to overreact and, unfortunately, impulsive actions can lead to unnecessary complications. Take a few deep breaths and consider all of your options before you take a leap of faith.

You have work that needs to be finished, yet time is quickly running out. You may be tempted to take an unproven shortcut to the finish line or try a risky new strategy to save steps. Although it is possible to get lucky and win the race, it's not very likely today. Stick with the tried and true method now by making your progress in the old-fashioned way of combining sheer determination with hard work. A conservative approach ensures your success down the road.

You still may have some loose ends to tie up, but you're already feeling as if you are free from the heavy energy that was recently placed upon your shoulders. You might even experience such joy and exhilaration that you forget about your previous commitments. However tempting it is to escape from your responsibilities, you have accomplished too much to mess things up now. Keep your nose to the grindstone today and you'll be able to really relax tomorrow.

The Sun's brilliant quintile to your key planet Uranus today reminds you of your own natural intelligence. Although it's unrealistic to assume that you have all of the answers, it's probable that your innovative thinking can produce an important breakthrough now. However, you must step outside of the box, question authority and stretch the rules to achieve your greatest potential. Be courageous but not reckless.

Your feelings are flying high one minute and crashing down to earth the next as alternating currents of excitement and worry distract you from your obligations. You know you should be concentrating on the details at work today, but you may be too inspired by the big picture to pay attention to tiresome trivialities. Remember, you have the capability to control your thoughts; focusing on the fine points now can make the difference between a mediocre performance and true brilliance.

You may become more concerned about changing your habits to sustain your physical energy and improve your overall well-being now that the Virgo Moon is occupying your 6th House of Health. However, it's a smart strategy to avoid doing anything drastic if you are feeling under the weather. Instead of suddenly announcing that you are going on a week-long fast, make small but manageable improvements to your diet. Tiny steps can make a really big difference.

Explore new ways to enjoy your time off while the practical Virgo Moon is hanging out in your 5th House of Fun and Games. But don't ignore your chores, because you still need to have a sense of accomplishment. You may be interested in combining a playful distraction with a more useful activity, such as arts and crafts. Scheduling some downtime in advance for relaxation is the best way to make sure that it actually happens.

Although the Moon is in your 4th House of Home and Family, you are tempted to sneak out for some fun today instead of fulfilling all of your domestic obligations. You're not interested in working all day long, even if you're managing a lot of responsibilities now. On the other hand, it's not a very smart idea to postpone your current commitments. Keep your promises first ... then you will be free to join your friends at play with a clear conscience.

Although the perfectionist Virgo Moon is visiting your 3rd House of Communication, an argument with a friend doesn't have to ruin your whole day. You like to cling to your experiences, nostalgically replaying the wonderful times and even sometimes recreating the hurt attached to more difficult memories. But too much self-reflection may set you on a downward spiral today, leading to self-doubt. Thankfully, good times are waiting for you in the present moment if you can leave the past behind.

Someone may take you by surprise today, talking his or her way into your heart and then turning your entire world upside down. There is likely to be a clash of values now that the evocative Moon is traveling through your 2nd House of Core Beliefs. It's healthier in the long run if you aren't so critical of yourself and others. Don't try to control the emotional currents because you could exhaust yourself pursuing an impossible goal. Instead, go along for the ride to see where it takes you.

The Moon's current visit to your sign blesses you with the ability to say exactly what's on your mind. But having the right words at your disposal to describe your emotions may be dangerous, since you're more likely to share feelings now that you might otherwise keep to yourself. Nevertheless, it helps to follow through on a conversation once it's been started. Thankfully, your self-expression can have a positive impact if you don't push your opinions too far.

The timid Virgo Moon's trip through your 12th House of Spiritual Retreat may be problematic today if you overbook your schedule. Unfortunately, it might be difficult to find time to check in with your inner world. However, you can benefit by reserving a bit of your mindshare to acknowledge that there are bigger and more significant issues than what is happening in your own life right now. A realistic adjustment to your perspective enables you to re-frame a complicated situation in a simpler manner.

No matter how preoccupied you are today, it's crucial to set aside a block of time when you can imagine the possibilities ahead or freely talk about your hopes for the next phase of your life with a close friend. The Virgo Moon's current visit to your 11th House of Long-Term Goals takes your mind off the everyday logistics of your job. Give yourself a break from the intensity; instead of worrying about next week, extend your vision much further into the future where your dreams will come true.

You would like to play out your role as an effective leader at work or in the community now that the industrious Virgo Moon is shining in your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Unfortunately, it isn't useful to force your personal agenda onto others; your insistence only stirs up resistance. Instead, you can win the support of generous allies by maintaining a high level of integrity in all that you do.

If you are considering a vacation or even just a quick getaway, this is an excellent day to start making your plans. Fortunately, you're more practical than you realize, yet the Moon's presence in your 9th House of Big Ideas inspires you to honor your adventurous spirit now. But don't get too wrapped up in figuring out all the details. Set a date and a destination; the rest of the missing pieces will fall into place when the timing is right.

The Moon's visit to your 8th House of Shared Resources indicates a good time to make a financial investment. But it's tricky to decide how much time and money should be put into a project now. Your behavior may not be as clear as your thinking so you need to stick closely to the facts. You have enough information to make a choice today, even if you don't take action on your decision for a few more days. In the meantime, share your plans with a friend and listen with an open mind to the feedback you receive.

You may be involved in a tiresome disagreement, increasing the tension between you and your friends. Your frustration tempts you to throw in the towel and walk away from the whole mess. However, trying to escape isn't such a smart idea because you'll just have to deal with the same issue again if you avoid handling the situation now. A direct approach makes the most sense when resolving a current conflict. State your case and move on.

You might believe that you can rationalize the most outrageous ideas today, but no one is buying your version of the story. Even if you're telling the truth as best you can, others may be nervous because you're not following the established guidelines. Tone down your rhetoric and adjust your attitude, since you really don't need to make any enemies at this time. Luckily, changing the way you go about your business now puts those around you at ease.

There is no valid reason for anyone to question your integrity today because you're consumed with doing the right thing. Although, you might normally take time to hear someone's ideas before saying no, even the slightest hint of a problem will send you back to the safety of your more simplistic plan. Playing by the rules is the honorable thing to do, but don't get so comfortable with your position that you miss what's most important. Increase your chances for success by keeping your eyes and ears open.

You may be engaged in a battle with yourself today as the narrowly focused Virgo Moon squares the willful Sun in flighty Gemini. You're able to think like a laser beam which can certainly sharpen your analytical skills. Don't restrict your curiosity too much, or you could do yourself a disservice by overlooking a crucial piece of data. Just remember, one of your greatest strengths is your natural ability to connect a variety of experiences in ways that others cannot see.

You naturally feel more secure if you err on the side of being silent, rather than becoming overly emotional to make your point. Thankfully, you don't have anything to prove, so being right might not matter all that much. Nevertheless, it isn't wise to sacrifice integrity for the sake of political expediency. If you have a good idea, find a way to share it without offending others in the process. Your contributions are more valuable than you think.

It may be difficult to step out of the spotlight, but playing a supportive role is your smartest move today. Even if you realize that you could do more than you are currently contributing, a partial retreat demonstrates your confidence in others. Don't worry ... you will have your chance to shine soon enough, so let someone else take center stage for now.

People have a challenging time reading your energy today because you seem both cautious and exuberant. It's difficult to understand how you can act respectful one moment and rebellious the next. Nevertheless, your ability to hold opposing views is one of your strengths now, yet it may also appear confusing to everyone else. They might think you're being wishy-washy, but following multiple paths requires real courage. Trust your own instincts to ultimately steer you in the right direction.

Your mind is probably already made up, but you might not be ready to announce your decision today. It isn't that you're trying to hurt anyone's feelings; it's just that you want everyone to make their choices based on his or her own best interests. There is no need to get caught up in playing any misleading games by saying something that you don't even believe. Honesty is always the best policy, but how you deliver the message is critically important now, too.

Making the best use of your time today is crucial, for you won't be satisfied if you're unproductive while hanging out with your friends. But it doesn't really matter whether you are alone or in the company of others. Stay focused on your agenda now. No matter where you go or what you do, you'll feel good about your day if you make some sort of progress toward your original goals.

A bit of good old-fashioned common sense goes a long way today as you handle family politics. Instead of attempting to take responsibility for something that's out of your control, narrow your perspective and put your efforts toward transforming that which you can change. Spreading yourself too thin is a mistake you can't afford now. It's better to do one little task well than trying to fix everything all at once.

Even though you are normally capable of tackling a complicated job by breaking it down into smaller tasks, you seem to be at the very top of your game now. You can earn recognition from your peers today because your managerial skills compliment your goals. Just be very careful not to let other people's expectations get out of hand or you'll end up disappointing them no matter how much you actually accomplish.

Unspoken emotional concerns complicate your family relationships now. Although your intentions may be clear to you, it's still challenging to bring the complex web of feelings out into the open so everyone can deal with things as they are. Instead, you feel as if you're walking on eggshells, afraid that one wrong move could cause a catastrophe. Wait a day or two before doing anything you might regret; in the meantime, be smart and continue to gather and disperse information to keep the ball rolling.

You may feel as if someone is raining on your parade today by criticizing your efforts or micromanaging your work. You might grow frustrated enough to react before thinking about the consequences. Unfortunately, your unrestrained response could just make matters worse. Instead, observe your feelings without actually doing anything about them. Make your move tomorrow when you can take action without turning a minor disagreement into a major conflict.

You are excited about your goals now, and you're willing to do almost anything to reach them. Fortunately, your key planet Mars supports your impulsive behavior today with a cooperative sextile to unorthodox Uranus. Go ahead and push up against the restrictions; they just might give way and let you pass. But your journey may not go smoothly; there still could be a few difficult bumps along the way. Don't let anything deter you from pursuing success.

You are feeling restless and reckless as your sense of calm determination is challenged today by warrior Mars and wild Uranus. You typically prefer a straightforward route to your destination, but your current path to success might be a crooked one. Instead of attempting to hide your uncertainty with arrogant behavior now, wait until your best option becomes more apparent. Remember, you don't have to act on every passing whim, even if it's tempting.

You may feel as if you're at the top of your game today, empowering you to show off your charm and quick wit. However, you might be so clever at telling your tale that you get excited and step over the line that usually separates fact and fiction. Your ability to put a positive spin on everything now enables you to impress everyone, including yourself. Nevertheless, it's smarter to stick to the truth right from the start.

People might seem overly intense today and you don't have much luck at calming them down. Ironically, this drama probably isn't about anyone else; it's about managing your discomfort that arises when someone appears to be out of control. Your primary lesson now is to realize that you are only responsible for your own emotions. Pay attention to your feelings without putting up any unnecessary defenses in the process. Recognizing that everyone has their own perspective enables you to be more compassionate in the moment.

It feels as if you should be preparing for a showdown today, but you might not even know why. Someone may behave in a peculiar manner and something just doesn't make sense. You're tempted to express your frustration as anger now, even if you don't have a logical reason. Although you want to respond immediately, be smart and allow the situation to unfold on its own until you have a more complete picture. You can make better choices once you're fully informed.

Your innate analytical skills might not be of much help today if you need to react quickly to a situation at work. Although you can see a number of different routes that could further your career goals, you just want to take the path of least resistance now. Fortunately, the most creative solutions will come to you while you are in motion, so there's no need to waste time sitting on the sidelines, trying to logically decide your next move. Follow your intuition and you can't lose.

Your schedule may be thrown off course today by someone close to you who does something totally unexpected. Luckily, what seems like a setback at first could turn into an exciting journey of discovery. However, you might miss out on a magical little adventure if you try too hard to resist the changes. Let old plans fall to the wayside now and allow the unknown to pleasantly surprise you.

Frustration sets in today as irrepressible Mars in breezy Gemini scatters your energy in ways you can't control. Although you crave a deeper level of interaction, the current work pace may be too hectic to support the kind of in-depth communication you want. Don't push too hard or the intensity you seek will reappear in the form of resistance from others. Keep up with the rapidly changing circumstances as best you can. Fortunately, they will settle into more meaningful exchanges by tomorrow.

Fun and games are at the top of your list today, but the high level of excitement level could be a bit too much to contain. Your feelings are rather inconsistent now, and whatever you choose to do, it still might seem as if you should be doing something else. However, the lack of stability increases your desire to experience the thrill of the uncertainty. Enjoy the buzz while it lasts, for things will begin to settle back down in a couple of days.

You may not be comfortable with all the current emotional turmoil at work now. Unfortunately, nothing you do seems to calm the turbulence. You are better off to let go and ride the rough waves today, instead of trying to exert control over your direction. Thankfully, your anxiety begins to dissipate once you concentrate on maintaining balance, rather than trying to manage all the variables in your environment at once.

Your current strategy at work isn't very obvious to others, so they might not understand your true intentions. You don't see reality in the same light today as everyone else does because your plan isn't bogged down in office politics or sentimental attachments. However, you can be so objective that you might miss an important emotional component. Don't worry about ruffling someone's feathers to express yourself; your brilliance shines through as long as you maintain your integrity.

You are overly eager to try something outside your usual comfort zone today, and your risky actions can take others by surprise. Unfortunately, they may judge you unkindly because of your erratic behavior and accuse you of being immature and irresponsible. However, this is your big moment of truth, no matter what anyone else expects. Shine your inner light with confidence and proudly express who you are and what you want.

Although you're rarely interested in scheduling too far ahead, you can benefit from sharing your travel plans with a close friend now. It may be a bit disconcerting to go on the record about your dreams for an upcoming adventure, but an in-depth discussion might open doors that lead you in an exciting new direction. At least, consider taking a short trip to shake things up; make the most out of any time you have to escape from your regular responsibilities.

You may experience a financial windfall today or simply make more money than you expected. The propitious Sun-Jupiter conjunction in your 2nd House of Income also means that this could be a good day to ask for a raise. Or, if you play the lottery, it might make sense to buy an extra ticket now. Although this lucky transit can be a blessing, you won't get a free lunch unless you deserve it. Remember, the greatest fortune will still be the result of your tenacity and hard work.

The expansive Sun-Jupiter conjunction lights up your sign, widening your horizons and clearing a path to success. Luckily, the diplomatic Libra Moon dancing in your 5th House of Creativity can bring artistic people into your life who inspire you to express yourself. Show your intelligence now by listening to those who are more experienced than you. It's one thing to have an amazing idea; it's another thing entirely to have the wisdom to actually do something constructive with your vision.

It's no simple task to contain your enthusiasm today, even if you know that sharing your optimism might irritate someone else. Your intention is to be considerate, but you might not be able to stop yourself anyway. Normally, self-control comes to you easily, but you don't want to keep your good fortune hidden now. Nevertheless, going to extremes with your exuberance can prematurely dissipate your creative energy. Saying less and doing more is a smart strategy until things settle down.

Your social life is taking off now that your 11th House of Friends is blasted wide open by the opportunistic Sun-Jupiter conjunction. You might even be able to get away with saying yes to more than you can typically handle as you rise to the occasion. Although you don't have to overstep your limits in order to thoroughly enjoy yourself, take pleasure in dancing on the edge without being overly concerned about going too far.

You're looking sharp in the eyes of others at work now, and you might even think that you can do no wrong. But foolish behavior won't be rewarded, so don't push your luck. Focus on why people like you rather than taking their approval as permission to do whatever you want. It's easy to avoid negative consequences if you simply spend a little time considering the impact of your actions before going overboard.

Although you have your heart set on a lofty goal now, you could end up running around in circles with little to show for your efforts. Unfortunately, you are likely to turn mole hills into mountains today, and then wonder why the summits are out of reach. Thankfully, you might still reach your destination if you don't scatter your energy. Everything falls into place if you just concentrate your efforts on one thing at a time.

You may convince yourself that it's not smart to spend money on something that makes you feel good today, even if you can afford it. However, there's no reason to let your fears get in the way of your happiness. Even if your finances are a little tight, treating yourself well now is an investment that still might be worthwhile. You don't have a license to waste what you've earned. However, you probably deserve more pleasure than you're willing to admit.

A magical Sun-Jupiter conjunction shines in your 7th House of Others, indicating that a friend or partner could open a window of opportunity for you. An innovative person may enter your life, bringing several original ideas that merit follow-up. However, the real choice now is up to you. Although someone else can aim you in the right direction, it's still your job to set priorities and then take the first step.

You might feel lazy or even self-indulgent today, choosing to skip your exercise routine or head straight for the dessert table without eating your vegetables. There are so many enticing distractions on your plate now, you can't decide where to begin. Even if you can get away with a bit of extra pampering, it's not a good idea to stretch your limits too far. Think about the consequences of your actions before you try to bend reality in your favor.

Today is a day you can have your cake and eat it, too. Your friends think you're the life of the party, even if no one is celebrating anything. However, you actually could be working harder now than anyone realizes. You're able to do your chores without being noticed, as if you are wearing an invisibility cloak. Meanwhile, a flamboyant Sun-Jupiter conjunction in your 5th House of Fun and Games overshadows everything else, so you might as well relax and let the good times roll.

You're eager to set new priorities as the philosophical Sun-Jupiter conjunction falls in your 4th House of Foundations. However, it makes sense to look to your personal life now rather than your professional world for the meaning that you seek. Your vision of the primary importance of home and family outshines your career ambitions today. Don't worry about any long-term fallout from your newly developing perspective. Just keep things simple and enjoy your day.

You might feel so excited about life today that nearly everything sounds like a great idea. Although there could be a lot of new information flooding your brain now, you quickly realize that more data doesn't necessarily mean more wisdom. It's fun to interact with others, but you need to form meaningful connections, too, or you'll end up being disappointed in the end. Make the good times last by moving beyond the facts and acknowledging the reality of your emotions.

There is a powerful relationship between being confident about yourself and wanting to buy a memento to preserve the memory of a wonderful feeling. Nevertheless, keep your credit cards in your wallet now because you may be tempted to spend more than you have on something you don't really need. Even if you're thinking about purchasing a gift for someone you love, material possessions can't express what's really in your heart.

The energy is over the top today as exuberant Jupiter hooks up with the radiant Sun, giving you something special to celebrate. Although it's the middle of the workweek, you might find it difficult to concentrate on your job responsibilities. You would rather spend your time pursuing creative outlets now than meeting your current obligations. Your key to happiness depends on finding a middle ground between feeling free and acting responsibly.

It's challenging to feel satisfied with your current activities because your imagination is running wild now. You see unlimited possibilities nearly everywhere you turn. Your thoughts are harder to untangle today since you cannot necessarily distinguish between the way things are and how they could be. However, exploring your fantasies is still important as long as you don't let them get the upper hand. Dream about the future, but remember that you must live in the present.

It's healthy to think that your friends and associates are capable of doing great things as long as you're not unrealistic. You may expect too much from them today, possibly leading to disappointment later on. However, sharing your hopes and dreams gives others a sense of what's important to you these days. Just don't expect someone to share your same level of enthusiasm for your favorite project. If something excites you now, don't wait for anyone else to champion your cause; just go for it.

You may receive good news on the job today. Although it might not be totally unexpected, it can still be quite exciting, nonetheless. However, you will likely have hard work to do in order to follow up on your end of the deal. Thankfully, some of the most demanding tasks could already be completed. Trust your instincts; if you stop analyzing everything you'll know what's coming next. There's no time to waste, so make the most of the current opportunity while you can.

It's natural to grow excited today about an upcoming event or getaway. However, don't let your anticipation get the best of you if you're planning to travel. It's wonderful to build fantasies about going somewhere special, but grandiose thinking could transform a realistic vision into an imaginary journey. If you truly want to go on a meaningful adventure, avoid the temptations of bigger, better and more. Maintaining a healthy perspective could be the key to making your dreams come true.

Although you may be more secure when navigating solo in logical realms today, surprising thoughts could quickly pull you into deeper emotional waters. But instead of letting yourself feel vulnerable, your immediate reaction is to withdraw from the current situation. Don't try to oversimplify things too quickly because retreating might not be the best remedy now. There's much to learn while exploring the exquisite complexities of relationships if you're willing to keep your heart open.

Your interactions with others can lead you in an entirely new direction now. You might want to question the significance of this unexpected turn of events, but logical analysis won't necessarily tell you what you need to know. Stay open to your current experience without trying to classify it. Even if an amazing opportunity falls short of your expectations, the ride will be well worth the risk.

Forget about your old assumptions and bad habits that usually hold you back. There is no reason to process the very same things that you have already handled more than once. It's finally time to look straight ahead and set a new course based on what you want to do rather than what you want to change. But don't bite off more than you can chew. For now, it's all about big visions and baby steps.

It's thrilling when you can see amazing possibilities in almost any situation. Luckily, you're ready to take action now in order to realize the potential. But your heightened sense of urgency today may provoke you to jump in without considering the consequences. Be smart and keep your eyes on the distant horizon instead of being distracted by the anticipation of immediate gratification.

There are major rumblings rattling the depths of your inner world now. Fortunately, you're being offered magical glimpses of where your life could take you if you redirect some of your professional ambitions toward your personal life. It might even be time to start a project around the house or in the garden. Perhaps your visions are simply a reminder that emotional growth is just as important to your overall happiness as success in your chosen career.

Remaining present with your feelings is tricky if your emotions raise issues that you prefer to avoid. You're ready to swing into action so you can evade a troublesome subject before it even comes up. Admit your vulnerability, instead of pretending that your infinite powers will overcome any awkward circumstances. Facing your very human limitations solidifies a new friendship or deepens an existing relationship. Opening your heart inspires others to do the same.

You may realize that your participation in a discussion won't necessarily be of much help today. You're eager to assist someone through a sticky situation, but it's important to acknowledge that you don't have any quick answers. You might respond by keeping yourself so busy that you don't have time to engage in anyone else's melodrama. But rather than relying on evasive tactics, it's healthier to just be honest and establish comfortable boundaries right from the start.

You wish that you could jump around and enjoy one fun activity after another, but your fearful emotions might unexpectedly hijack the day. You may be feeling so overwhelmed today that you worry yourself into a state of panic before you ask for help from anyone else. Covering up your true feelings is counter-productive. Sincere communication with someone you trust can quickly turn your day around.

A recent emotional conflict or a disappointment in a relationship might be the cause of your current feeling of loss. Now, however, these distractions are starting to dissipate, leaving you with sufficient time to find your direction anew. But don't be afraid of the silence; listening to your own thoughts can bring the clarity you seek. Even if everything isn't exactly the way you want it, your inner wisdom will tell you what you need to hear.

Today is another turning point on your continuing journey of change. However, there could be a lot of internal movement that remains invisible to others now. Your current dreams hold significant keys to your future, even if they seem disconnected from the practicalities of everyday life. But there's no need to share your visions with anyone else yet. Keeping up outer appearances gives you plenty of room to pursue your meaningful inner work.

Your perspective on what's happening today is generally positive, but the secretive Scorpio Moon's presence in your 3rd House of Communication indicates that it's wise to keep your thoughts to yourself. Even if your ideas are amazing, they may still require more time to develop. Sharing what's on your mind now could disperse the energy that's better put toward fine-tuning your plans. Be patient; you can always tell your story tomorrow.

Managing your money should be top priority today, especially if you're insecure about your fiscal situation. The Moon's current visit to your 2nd House of Personal Resources brings your material world into focus, raising concerns about whether or not you can meet your financial obligations. Ultimately, your fears may be more intense than your circumstances warrant. Remember, your positive attitude could be all it takes to shift the energy in the right direction.

You might feel as if you're on the edge of an emotional cliff, yet you realize there is no one else to blame for your current predicament. Thankfully, you have a strong inner resolve and are able to navigate your way through the situation that you created. But this isn't just about your strength of character; it's also about your ability to transmute fear into love. Although you might feel isolated now, someone's support is waiting for you if you allow yourself to be vulnerable enough to receive it.

It's challenging to accept the reactions of others at face value, especially if they quietly retreat or just look at you with bemused puzzlement. Your confidence is tested because you might not receive all the positive feedback that you expected. Fortunately, you're able to find bright spots, even if you wish you had more support. Nevertheless, don't lose faith in yourself; let your imagination create the future that you want.

It's crucial to reconnect with your life purpose today, especially if you have been standing on unstable ground. You are more confident if you know exactly where you are and what you are doing, but you probably won't have that luxury now. Give yourself time to regain your footing. Don't just blindly continue on your old path; regroup and set fresh goals before calculating a new course.

Your emotions are all riled up today, but that doesn't mean you want others to know how you're feeling. You might wish that you had a plan to keep your turmoil to a minimum, but your worries may bubble up to the surface anyhow. Nothing will be gained by pretending everything is fine, but you don't have to share more than you want. A magical healing process is unfolding yet attempts to control it will only slow it down.

It's true that your goals are lofty, but you can make significant headway toward them if only you set your mind to it. Fortunately, you're confident about your ability to stay on track today, and are less likely to be distracted by your shifting moods. Focus on your dreams and follow your heart. Remember, you don't have to prove anything to others now; all you need to do is concentrate on your destination.

You may be caught off guard today as your key planet Mars forms complicated aspects with serious Saturn and suspicious Pluto. Even if you were planning on a relaxing day, you don't mind working hard if pleasure is your ultimate goal. But you may be like a moth lured to the flame; it looks enticing until you get so close you need to fly away to avoid being burned. Don't be in such a hurry to reach satisfaction; the truth is it's more about the journey than the destination.

It's tempting to sit back and soak in the good vibrations today as mischievous Mercury hooks up with your key planet Venus in receptive Cancer. Others see an easygoing side of your nature as you lazily move through the day, but they can't perceive your inner angst. Although you might enjoy yourself, you're also experiencing a bit of restlessness. For now, focus on the current activities instead of thinking about the future. The key to your happiness may be right in front of your nose.

In true Gemini fashion, you're being pulled in two distinct directions today. Feisty Mars fires up your enthusiasm about the exciting potential in your life. Yet you're also bored with your current obligations and regular routines. Instead of attempting to temper your extreme feelings and find a middle ground now, try holding on to the opposite desires until you're ready to resolve the energy creatively. Exploring all your options gives you the best chances for success.

The Sun's shift into your emotionally self-protective sign reminds you that you no one can force you to be social unless you are so inclined. Although you deserve time to rest, it may take extra effort to find your desired level of solitude now, especially if others pursue you and try to cheer you up. There's nothing wrong with asking for some peace and quiet. Be kind yet firm when establishing your boundaries; you simply need some time alone.

You may feel a bit stifled today as prior obligations restrict your activities and prevent you from doing exactly what you want. However, don't be too quick to judge the situation. Slow down and ask yourself how you can benefit from fulfilling your responsibilities now. Even if your mental restlessness has you jumping all over the place, you'll be happier if you stay in one place long enough to make it feel like your own.

For some reason it's tough to follow through on tasks that should be very simple today. The problem is that you are tempted by one distraction after another. Although you can draw from an inner reserve of willpower, making one tough decision is not enough. You'll need to be vigilant and continue to put yourself back on track again and again throughout the day. If you manage to stay focused now, you will be happy with your progress by the end of the day.

You appear easygoing, but you have an agenda and you won't let much stand in your way of getting things done now. Naturally, you would choose peace over conflict, but your key planet Venus forms an otherworldly septile with stern Saturn today. You're willing to take on a serious adversary if he or she tries to mess with your plans. Nevertheless, pick your battles carefully or you'll waste energy fighting for something that doesn't really matter.

Your stubbornness can be so intense today that you might win an argument even if you're wrong. In fact, you may choose to sidestep a conflict now because you have the ability to wait out your opponent; you might be successful even without direct confrontation. But this kind of victory is less than satisfying and could create an uncomfortable power dynamic. Facing the issues sooner than later prevents needless problems before they happen.

You may try blaming your current uneasiness on others, but it's not really about them. The problem is that your friends and family aren't necessarily in the same frame of mind as you are today. Even if you encourage them to be independent, they're not ready. Yet, their unwillingness to settle down pushes your buttons as you seek more stability now. Keep in mind that your security comes from within and is not as dependent on anyone else as you might believe.

Confronting someone who tries to control you is a strategy that won't likely pay off today. Other people are very subtle with manipulative behavior now and could probably justify any action while also defending their innocence. Instead of trying to change anyone else, a workable solution can be found by adjusting how you respond to the current circumstances. Luckily, your positive attitude is nearly impossible to resist.

You want to skate through the day, but you probably fall short of your own expectations as you get pulled into a melodrama that might not even involve you. It doesn't matter what your intentions are today, since engaging in a conversation is enough to make you a participant and not an observer. You can be most helpful now by actively listening, clearly stating your position and then not wandering too far from what you say. It's not about being right or wrong; it's just about offering others a different perspective.

Romantic interests may be piqued today, but you might not get exactly what you expect. In fact, you'll likely encounter disappointment if you set your goals too high. Fortunately, your eagerness to show up with an open heart can win you the love you seek. Allow the process enough room to develop at its own natural rate without being too pushy. Love will find a way.

You may feel like you're on top of the world now as the pieces of your life begin to fall into place. However, your recent planning isn't as useful as you hoped. Your overall strategy might still be the same, but an onslaught of information is changing things and you need to reconsider your options. Don't be afraid to make new decisions along the way. Do your best to manage your enthusiasm or you'll inadvertently take on more responsibilities than you can handle.

Just as you think your life is settling down, everything becomes hectic again. Fortunately, it isn't necessarily unpleasant; it's just that your day may overflow with a variety of activities that don't allow you to get your much-needed downtime. Nevertheless, there still are choices you can make throughout the day that have a calming effect if you stop long enough to think about the various alternatives. The trick is finding a balance between taking it easy and making the most of the moment.

Someone may have very high hopes for you, but pursuing your desires is more important now than fulfilling anyone else's expectations. Keep in mind that those who believe they know what's best for you could be working on incorrect assumptions. Listening to sage advice is often a smart strategy, but you don't have to follow it unless you actually think it's useful at this time. You're the only one that knows exactly what you want.

You may feel overly confident about what you can accomplish on the home front today, and your unrealistic expectations could set you up for unnecessary failure. Instead of making lists of the projects you want to finish, take the time to make a detailed plan for just one. Although this level of intense preparation doesn't guarantee success, it certainly does increase your chances of having something tangible to show for your day.

You may declare the game of waiting officially over today, but the Moon's current visit to your 5th House of Spontaneity doesn't tell the entire story. You would like to take a risk in order to avoid sitting on pins and needles any longer. However, you can still receive benefit from glimpses of the possibilities ahead without initiating action yet. Talking about your move with a good friend brings more clarity, helping you to make some last minute improvements to your plan.

A barrage of domestic distractions makes it challenging to stay focused today. If it's not friends unexpectedly stopping by to chat, then it may be family commitments that demand your attention. Luckily, the current situation can teach you the power of having faith in a larger process. Even if you aren't able to methodically push your way through your chores now, a more laid-back approach can ultimately get the job done, too. Thankfully, there are many paths to the same destination.

You might run around today trying to do a zillion things, which actually could prevent you from doing any of them effectively. However, balancing work and play is more difficult when you can't catch up on your obligations. Making one too many promises might prompt you to consider walking away from your commitments without even trying to fulfill any of them. But don't be foolish; it's best to pare back your responsibilities before you're in over your head. Setting boundaries allows you to find some much-needed time for yourself.

Building on what you recently started is a good idea in concept, but it will be challenging to actually do until you find your groove. Even if you are struggling today, you can see the pieces of a complicated puzzle starting to fit together in ways you never imagined. But don't be too assertive yet. It's much wiser to build momentum gradually at first and then turn on the steam in a few days once you have your goal in sight.
