The evocative Moon's visit to your optimistic sign can quickly work up your enthusiasm to a fevered pitch. But frenzied excitement isn't constructive because it's difficult to follow through on all your promises. The trick is to maintain your newfound confidence without taking on so much now that you disappoint others and lose faith in yourself. Others will enjoy your company more today if you keep your exuberance from going to an extreme. You can still be inspirational without being the loudest person in the room.

Even if you have good reasons to celebrate today, you might not want to tell anyone else just yet. Instead of announcing your exciting news, you may choose to keep it hidden for a while longer because you don't want to deal with someone's envy of your good fortune. Unfortunately, this kind of protective logic could backfire on you as your friends might feel cheated out of sharing in your success. Let others know what's going on without embellishing your story or gloating too much. There's nothing wrong with taking pride in your progress.

You're excited about the prospect of spending quality time with friends and dreaming out loud about your ideal fantasies for the future. Unfortunately, you cannot be bothered with the boring details of financial planning now. You just want to think about the big picture and not deal with money issues until absolutely necessary. Nevertheless, be smart and set aside some time to manage your fiscal affairs before committing to anything else.

You may be more concerned with making a public appearance now that the extroverted Sagittarius Moon is highlighting your 10th House of Status. It's okay if you don't really want to talk about anything of substance so you can take a break from sharing your feelings. For the present moment, keep your conversations limited to the broad strokes of your creative brush. You can always fill in the details in a day or two when you are ready.

Even if you're planning to stay home today, the Capricorn Full Moon's presence in your 10th House of Public Responsibility indicates that you still have your mind on work. You might have taken on one too many projects and now you have to show up and deliver the goods, whether or not you feel like it. Fortunately, a methodical approach and consistent effort increases your current progress toward reaching your goals.

You're more determined than ever about taking a major trip, even if your dream seems to be in jeopardy. But instead of just working harder, you also need to think smarter. The Capricorn Full Moon falls in your 9th House of Big Ideas, motivating you to step out and take a chance. However, the breakthrough you seek can only occur if you are willing to travel outside of your safety zone and try something new. A calculated risk may be required to make something big happen.

You don't want to reveal too much today because withholding information prior to negotiating might give you a secret advantage. Interactions with others are complicated by the Capricorn Full Moon shining in your 8th House of Transformation and Regeneration. Nevertheless, if you want a relationship to last, you need to follow your emotions without knowing where they will lead. Shared intimacy is a reward that you must be willing to work for on a continuing basis.

Today's calculating Capricorn Full Moon lands in your 7th House of Relationships, stirring up some trouble or excitement. A current partnership might run into obstacles, requiring you to concentrate on your emotions and communicate what you're feeling as honestly as you can. If there's someone new in your life, resolving a touchy conflict now could set the foundation for what comes next. Either way, you'll do better if you respond directly from your heart.

You must maintain consistency in your daily routine now, but it's challenging if your heart isn't completely connected to your actions. You can't pretend for long before your behavior starts to impact your day in a negative way. Nevertheless, the pragmatic Capricorn Full Moon illuminates your 6th House of Habits, telling you not to make any drastic changes to your regular schedule. Hold steady to your course; take faith in knowing that you'll gain traction again soon enough.

The Capricorn Full Moon emphasizes your 5th House of Self-Expression today, urging you to reveal your feelings rather than analyze them. However, it's tricky to find the right words in the moment. Instead of attempting to respond spontaneously as you're experiencing an emotion, simply let it pass. It's more productive to talk about your process once the intensity settles back down. In the meantime, exploring a creative outlet inspires your heart to shine.

You're eager to proudly shine your light now that the radiant Sun is illuminating your 10th House of Career. However, the Capricorn Full Moon floods your 4th House of Foundations, indicating that a situation at home needs your immediate attention, too. You might think that you can't do everything, but your logic doesn't need to stop you from trying today. Be innovative and look for solutions that are outside of the box. Ultimately, you're capable of a lot more than you currently believe.

Today's sobering Capricorn Full Moon intensifies your 3rd House of Communication, inundating it with data that might be overwhelming to integrate. Surprisingly, they'll respond more positively now than you expect. It may take a few days, but you'll be able to get the rest you need once the deluge is over.

You have one foot in your past and the other foot in your future today. The restrictive Capricorn Full Moon falls in your 2nd House of Values, binding you to old beliefs and traditions. However, you're tempted to leave everything behind and make a mad dash forward. Unfortunately, your tendency to aim high means that you could overextend your energy. Focus on reaching a conservative goal now, instead of falling short of an unrealistic one. Success is yours if you keep your feet on the ground.

Someone with power or authority may ask for your support today. Luckily, you're sympathetic to other people's pain now because the Full Moon in your earthy sign sensitizes you to your personal priorities. However, you might hold someone else's angst at bay to protect your feelings. Unfortunately, this defensive reaction can prevent you from being in touch with your own emotions. Consciously listen to what others say and then respond honestly from your heart.

Today's serious Capricorn Full Moon shines in your 12th House of Destiny, foreshadowing the consequences of your current choices. Instead of putting your energy into endless conversations, let others find out about your new direction from your actions. Talk less; do more.

You may think that others are trying to trick you into putting aside your agenda and following their plans as the practical Capricorn Full Moon reflects the needs of your 11th House of Teamwork. Even if you're an integral part of a work group, you might feel isolated for a while if your ideas differ from everyone else's. Nevertheless, it's crucial to honor your instincts and do what feels right. Don't succumb to peer pressure now just because you want to feel connected. Sometimes being a maverick can be lonely, but you are never truly alone.

You are determined to reach your goals today and might not slow down, even if someone stands in your path. Unfortunately, direct confrontation isn't always the best way to respond. You may be overly obsessive about whatever you desire now, even if you simply want to rest. Demonstrating your ability to adapt to the needs of others ultimately helps you along your own path. The truth is that it does make sense to relax now while you have the chance.

Your fixed nature can land you in big trouble now, or it can serve you very well if you are already on your desired course. However, you might need a little help from your friends to steer you in the right direction, even if you don't want to listen to their opinions. Remaining open to the sensible advice of a trustworthy workmate today is a good place to start.

You might feel uncomfortably restricted by circumstances since you don't have much leeway to express yourself now. You are being challenged to limit your thinking so your ideas will fit into the environmental constraints of the day. Luckily, focusing your attention on a limited spectrum of possibilities today may help you be more effective than you ever imagined.

Someone may get on your nerves today, especially if he or she is touting a plan that doesn't necessarily match up with your own. You are apt to lose patience when others assume that you'll set your agenda aside to take care of them. But keeping your true feelings quiet and just acquiescing won't work for you now because it's important that your opinion is heard. Ultimately, common sense rules, so stick with the most practical idea, regardless of who thought of it first.

Releasing unresolved feelings now isn't as easy as it sounds. You might not trust your intuition even if everything seems ready to shift. Nevertheless, others won't likely notice your frustration since they don't see your inner process. No matter what, you can't keep up appearances much longer. Instead of waiting until you reach your boiling point, express your emotions as gently as possible. Long-lasting positive change is possible if you start off on the right foot today.

You are at the beginning of a spiritual journey that's for your steps alone. You're exploring ways to reclaim your power, but the current dynamics might not fully support your growth. Don't try to manipulate circumstances in your favor. Realign with your core values now and exhibit the highest integrity possible in all that you do. Your strength will grow naturally as you rediscover your metaphysical center of gravity.

You could be annoyed with yourself today if you didn't tell someone exactly what you were feeling. Thankfully, you can gain clarity now in a way that previously eluded you even if you choose not to share anything at this time. Don't question your analytical skills just because you can't integrate all the data at your fingertips. Although worrying about your next move is a waste of your energy, living in the present moment positively impacts your future.

You might be more open to receiving emotional support today, even if you feel it's long overdue. Although extra demands may be placed on you now, your world is gradually becoming a friendlier place. Nevertheless, you still have to set aside an unresolved relationship issue, but there's no reason to continue worrying about it. Instead of waiting for someone to rush to your rescue, concentrate on staying afloat as the big waves of feelings wash through your life. Owning your power enables you to do things you never dreamed you could.

You may be relieved that your life isn't so hectic today even if there are still a few serious issues to handle. Unfortunately, it's not easy to relax now because there are so many different avenues that lead to your future, yet you cannot yet see what's around the next corner. Everyone needs a bit of downtime, so accept any peace and quiet as a gift from the cosmos while you're waiting for the next round of inspiration to strike.

You are most comfortable when your feet are planted firmly on the ground. You prefer knowing exactly where you're going and when to take your next step. Although you may be feeling uncharacteristically uncertain today, it won't last long. Meanwhile, you can still enjoy expressing yourself as the reflective Moon travels through your sign. But don't get lazy; do your planning now instead of waiting until you're in the middle of the next storm.

You usually trust your mind instead of relying on your heart when making important decisions. However, the tables are turning now. You like the idea of intimacy and may be willing to sacrifice hard-core data for the chance to intensify a relationship. You want to push past your resistance today, but powerful emotions can still make you uncomfortable. Fortunately, you aren't required to share everything all at once. Nevertheless, it's a good time to start manifesting your fantasies into reality before the opportunity fades.

It's wise to involve your friends and co-workers in your planning process today since group participation makes your day more enjoyable and efficient. People with important keys to your future may enter the picture now. Don't allow old fears of failure to sabotage your current fantasies by discouraging you before you even start. If you don't entertain your dreams, you'll never find out what is possible.

A problem at home that has been lurking around in the background could shift to the forefront today. You may feel as if you are being prompted to say something, even if you prefer to remain neutral now. Unfortunately, your words have more consequences than you realize and might even make things worse. Before you start talking, consider if your disclosure will actually improve the situation. If not, remain silent for a while longer until your emotions settle down.

Worrying about something you should have said to a close friend or associate stirs up unresolved feelings today. But your concerns may stem from your current sensitivity to the energy in your immediate environment. Don't intrude into someone's life unless you have been specifically invited. Although it is healthy to acknowledge your compassion for those closest to you, it's also necessary to remember that you're not responsible for anyone's emotions except your own. Show others you care without saying a word.

You may feel as if you're in over your head today, but you are also clever enough to outwit even the toughest opponent. However, there's no time to waste on hopes tied to blind optimism. Pay careful attention to everything that is said before making your case as succinctly as you can. Thinking quickly enables you to emerge victorious now, but only if you're realistic about your limitations and confident of your skills.

You can feel the pressure to say more than you want to now. However, you're still trying to resist the need to jump into the flow. The more others push, the more you resist their efforts. Nevertheless, you might be relieved to have a group discussion to bring everything out in the open, even if it's challenging to move the conversation along. Break through your own reticence, because nothing will change if you wait for anyone else to speak for you.

Even if your patience has reached its limit, you still may try to balance your needs with what others want now. You might feel resentful if someone is standing between you and your potential enjoyment. Paradoxically, keeping your anger to yourself only strengthens it. A smarter strategy is to get your annoyance out in the open as kindly and gently as possible. Thankfully, your negativity can be transformed once it is seen for what it is. Being honest right away starts your day off right.

Several planets visiting your 11th House of Friends connect you socially on a deeper emotional level now. Although you might feel good about playing an integral role on the team, you could easily be absorbed by the group process. Finding a healthy balance between your personal life and your professional one is often tricky. Even when working with others today, it's an excellent idea to make certain that everyone knows that your needs matter, too. Ultimately, setting boundaries is all up to you.

You're often inclined to keep your opinions to yourself to maintain the peace. However, someone may push your emotional buttons today and provoke you to say more than is necessary. Although it's wiser to listen to logic, you're motivated by your sense of fair play to set the record straight. Nevertheless, practicing diplomacy is still your best strategy; you can be honest without having to get everything out in the open in one single blast.

Although several planets comfort you while they are visiting emotional Cancer now, your words may seem more confrontational today than you intend. Your key planet, Pluto, is in a prolonged tug-of-war with your need for security, prompting harsh words to slip off your tongue before you can stop them. The consequences of your current honesty could stir up a hornet's nest of complex feelings. Unnecessary stress can be avoided if you stop to consider other people's reactions first.

Your window of opportunity is closing and you could lose your chance to say what's on your mind if you don't initiate an overdue conversation soon. You may be uncomfortable showing your vulnerability, but you are able to quickly adjust to the situation now. However, impulsive disclosures tend to be shallow and might not lead to true satisfaction, so make your plan and execute it while you still can. Although your natural confidence is a blessing, be smart and move slowly at first.

You may be obsessing about a friend or partner today, whether or not the relationship has a viable future. You might choose to withdraw now because retreating from non-essential interactions could be healthy in the long run. Letting go is often painful, yet making believe that everything is fine is even worse. You can always reconnect later once you feel more like yourself. Instead of giving away all your energy, take time to replenish your vitality now.

You might be holding out for a better deal today, but it's still wise to reconsider your demands and be open to negotiation. Your natural ability to see things from a rational point of view isn't working as well as it usually does, making it harder to disconnect from a complex web of feelings now. Acknowledging that you are human just like everyone else will make it easier to express what is in your heart. Cultivating trust is the first step to establishing common ground.

Although you might attempt to go quietly about your business today, frustration levels could build to a breaking point because you believe that someone isn't being totally honest with you. You would rather hear the truth than waste your energy trying to fill in the missing answers. Ironically, the more you question others, the more they withdraw. Instead of going on the offensive, process your own feelings now without pushing for resolution until more facts come to light.

Oddly enough, today's stress is your friend because it can motivate you to take care of business. You're eager to put in extra effort without messing up all that you have gained. Your current impatience may provoke you to rush into action before thinking about the consequences. However, a steady approach and a methodical follow-through are needed to reach your goals. There's no need to gamble with your future if you consider your options without expecting to change everything all at once.

Fascinating fantasies about new ways to make money fill your head with all kinds of schemes today. But instead of executing a sound business plan, you may be entranced with all your clever ideas. Nevertheless, you can exert more control over your future once you realize the importance of practicing self-discipline. Rather than letting your imagination run wild, make a sensible choice and concentrate on achieving one worthwhile goal.

You can't afford to behave irresponsibly today if you have already made prior commitments. But it's difficult to stay focused and deliver on your promises if you believe your fantasies are worth pursuing. Avoid the temptation to escape; it's wiser to keep bringing yourself back to reality so you don't have to pay too high of a price later on. Honoring your previous obligations now paves the way to your future success.

Big thinking means letting go of the details, so prepare to scale back your plan on a moment's notice. It isn't worth exhausting yourself now by waging a battle you cannot win. But don't surrender your dreams either. Instead, find a middle path that doesn't require you to sacrifice your ideals. Balance may be elusive today, but dogged persistence moves you in the right direction. It's possible to compromise without giving up what matters most.

Feeling emotionally lighter may be tough these days, but moving through your own resistance is your only sensible option. Luckily, a current situation gives you a chance to demonstrate a new and improved you. There are many paths to choose from at this time; but ultimately, it's up to you. Surround yourself with fun-loving people who can help you enjoy the healing properties of laughter and love.

Mercury's retrograde turn pulls you in too many directions today. Your anxiety increases because you may be overwhelmed by so many things to do that you must eliminate some of them. Perhaps your life has become more complex, but you must do something about it. Although change doesn't often come easily, you can alter your future and accomplish almost anything now if you set your mind to it.

Your sign is sometimes known for being indecisive because you're naturally able to temper extreme ideas and find common ground. However, today you may be ready to jump one way or the other, because you don't have much time in order to make up your mind. It's more important to be swift in judgment now than to be perfect. But even if you make your decision and move on, there's nothing wrong with shifting directions as your perspective changes.

You have a lot to say now but you'll probably keep your feelings to yourself until someone asks for your opinion. You might justify your silence by believing that others won't understand what you're going through, anyhow. Nevertheless, you might be happily surprised with the support you receive if you take a risk and share your unresolved feelings today. The current process of transformation will be gentler than you think.

Even if everyone thinks that you're open to feedback from your peers, your convictions are stronger than they seem now. You're focused on your long-term plans, even if someone is telling you to pay more attention to what's happening today. Nevertheless, you may think that your friends are just trying to make matters worse by distracting you with their opinions. Fortunately, you have the tools to keep yourself on track and it's up to you to use them.

You might feel a bit disorganized today, but you can still effectively push toward your goals nonetheless. You don't like being spread too thin. Prioritize your tasks before rolling up your sleeves and getting to work. You'll accomplish more and feel better about your day if you approach it in a more logical manner.

Your most serious concerns at work could become overwhelming today, prompting you to make an overdue decision. But every little problem is tied to a larger issue and there's no way of getting around it. Be prepared to dig your way to the bottom, if necessary. But don't be in too much of a hurry; the only urgency is your own psychological pressure. Ultimately, using your moral compass enables you to navigate through the alternatives and choose the best one for your long-term success.

You are emotionally stretched as far as you can go today, yet your current confidence might prevent you from compromising. You don't mind constructive criticism from a friend or partner, yet it may seem as if positive feedback is hard to find now. If you encounter resistance, set firm boundaries. Once you know that you're on the right track, stay with it. Your actions will speak louder than anything you can say.

There's little need for worry if you are overwhelmed by strong emotions today, because ultimately they will lead you along an inspirational path. However, it's tempting to linger in this irrational realm once you start to become comfortable. Nevertheless, you have work to do as an action hero, so why spend too much time now lost in your feelings? Beauty is all around you; learn your lessons and then move on to more creative endeavors.

The evocative Moon swims into your 11th House of Social Networking, bringing emotional support from friends and associates. Thankfully, you won't have to work very hard to get the assistance you need. Although being accepted by your peers is a blessing, you might be tempted to set your professional agenda aside in order to focus on your relationships. However, it's smarter in the long run to concentrate on your work today and let everything else just fall into place.

You're not looking for anyone to give you direction today since you intuitively know what you must do. Even if you experience some self-doubt, trust the guidance you receive from within. There's no need to have a specific goal in mind now as long as you acknowledge your feelings. Since talkative Mercury is retrograde, it's best to bypass language. Instead of falling back on logic, just go with the flow and see what happens.

Although you have a healthy understanding of the big picture today as you visualize your future, you ultimately want to know what's in it for you. There's nothing wrong with looking out for your own interests as long as you also remain open to a more global perspective. But even if you're tempted to do as you wish now, the price of independence may be more than you expect. Instead of acting impulsively, take a deep breath and remember that your long-term goals are more important than immediate satisfaction.

There is something that you want, but you haven't been able to acknowledge it publicly. However, magnetic Venus enters your dramatic sign today, inspiring you to express your heart's desire. Nevertheless, significant pieces of your truth still lurk in the shadows, requiring you to face an old fear. Thankfully, the outcome is good so don't fret. Muster up the courage that you need to erase any lingering negativity and get on with the show.

Your friends and associates may be so concerned about your emotional well-being now that they go out of their way to connect with you. However, you can sense that something isn't out in the open, making you uncertain about their motives. It's not that anyone is trying to mislead you, but it appears that you're not getting the whole truth. Don't go looking for a fight; you won't gain anything by forcing an issue today. Let the story unfold on its own and then you will know what to do next.

Take care of your responsibilities the best you can today, even if you don't know exactly what is expected of you. Unfortunately, your inquiries won't likely uncover the information you seek. Instead of filling your mind with useless details, just attend to the most immediate problems as they surface and don't worry about the rest. Taking things one step at a time requires faith in the abundance of the universe, but a conscientious attitude helps you achieve success.

It seems as if one phase of your life is falling away, and you aren't all that unhappy about its demise. If you have been floating along, waiting for something to inspire you, this could be your chance. It's as if you are expecting guests, yet you don't know who they are or when they will arrive. Nevertheless, there is a lot to do right now in preparation of your next adventure, so get busy without wasting a precious moment.

Too many responsibilities at work today may prevent you from spending time at home and connecting with your family. Ultimately, you would like to have long conversations with people you trust. But this level of relaxation will probably have to wait until you have fulfilled your more pressing obligations, which obviously must take precedence now. Ironically, just being grateful of life's blessings could be enough to improve your attitude so you can enjoy the day, no matter what it entails.

Relationship dynamics are about to change for the better. Even if you don't know what's going to happen yet, you can sense the potential. Perhaps you recently experienced a positive interaction with a workmate who truly understands your intentions and now this acquaintance is about to go through a powerful metamorphosis. Quit worrying about things beyond your control; taking your transitions in stride will lead you to a better place.

The Moon's presence in your 2nd House of Money indicates that you may receive some positive financial news today. However, you might fool yourself if you imagine everything to be perfect. Avoiding problems could cause them to snowball and become less manageable in the future. Luckily, your current ability to envision a positive outcome combined with your commitment to hard work enables you to make the most of an opportunity.

The Moon's return to your sign puts you in a hypersensitive state of awareness today as she merges with psychic Neptune. However, it can be difficult to separate your accurate hunches from a wishful fantasy. Unfortunately, too much analysis pulls you out of your intuitive state and replaces trust with fear. Meditation might help to clear your mind of anxiety. Even if you believe that you must do something right away, it's smarter now to wait a bit and allow your unconscious feelings to bubble up to the surface. Slow down and take the time to listen to your heart.

Dreams that are floating around at the edge of your awareness could actually take shape today. Although this process sounds lovely, fantasies complicate your life if they become real. All you need to do is show up with a pure heart and an open mind.

If a friend or coworker requests your help today, you probably won't be able to say no. Don't fret if you are overwhelmed with sympathy for an underdog because there's nothing wrong with assisting those in need. Just remember that accepting your own limitations can prevent frustration down the road. Even if you can't fix everything, lending a hand is better than doing nothing at all.

Things at work might not go according to your plans today. Your day could even be turned upside down because someone else's behavior negatively impacts your schedule. You can't maintain control over all unexpected events, but you can alter the outcome by consciously managing your reactions. Anger is easily misdirected now, so take the high road when you have a choice. Practicing forgiveness produces the most positive results.

You can easily misread someone's intentions today even if you want to believe the best in them. You may have suspicions that others aren't being very supportive of your efforts. You might even think they are working against you, but you could just be afraid of being rejected. However, processing your own emotional insecurities now is more crucial than worrying about anyone else. Paradoxically, changing your attitude positively impacts the attitude of everyone around you.

This is an intense day, especially if you have a disagreement with a close friend or partner. Rather than analyzing your current choices within the narrow confines of your personal beliefs, step past your old limitations. Reframe your experience in the spirit of gratitude and abundance. It's not about getting more ... it's simply about appreciating what you have right now.

It's too soon to make a detailed plan because you might not have a very solid grip on your future goals yet. Someone's unexpected actions at work may take the air out of your balloon and send your confidence into a temporary tailspin today. At first, you might think you made a mistake, but you were likely given incorrect information. You can say the right thing today without even trying, making it easier to get what you want while also feeling good about yourself. In the meantime, bask in the love that's all around you without feeling the need to choose one way or the other.

Powerful emotions draw you toward someone special today, but you may be unsure as to what comes next. Someone may express positive feelings toward you today, which can turn an easygoing moment into an awkward one. Although it's not easy to express what's in your heart today, the inspirational Pisces Moon gives you the courage to take a chance if you feel ready. Remember, you don't have to share every single thing. Watch your audience along the way before telling too many secrets. Other people's reactions will help to clarify your next move.

You aren't likely to take yourself too seriously today, even if you stop and think about what you are doing. There's no time like the present moment to be real.

You might not have as much to hide as you think you do today, because your story will probably come out into the open sooner than you expect. Today may be more fun than you expect, even if you have lots of work on your plate. Focusing on practical issues isn't easy, but it allows you to take more time off later when you can truly relax.

Although you might have the day off today, you still have inescapable responsibilities to fulfill. You can use your contagious enthusiasm to enlist others to assist you with your project or join you in an enjoyable activity. It can be annoying when your family and friends seem to be so optimistic, especially if you believe that they're avoiding the truth. Thankfully, no one needs to know what occurs in the privacy of your imagination; you're not required to tell anyone what you are thinking now. Giving yourself permission to engage your inner world also softens your judgments on those you love.

Relationships are highlighted by the reflective Moon's presence in your 7th House of Companions today. Taking a chance and doing something new and different for your health is a smart idea today. The enterprising Aries Moon is visiting your 6th House of Routine, encouraging you to reassess the daily habits that contribute to your current lifestyle. The fiery Aries Moon harmoniously trines sweet Venus in radiant Leo, heating your emotions and tempting you to burn your candle at both ends. Your integrity is your greatest strength now because others won't have a good reason to resist your efforts when they see that you are consistently walking your talk. Playful interactions with others are lovely today, but a simple misunderstanding could temporarily create tension in a friendship. Luckily, this may be more like a family squabble than anything else. The Aries Moon is hanging out in your 2nd House of Money, supplying you with new ideas about potential sources of income. You know what you want today since the enterprising Aries Moon reflects your current needs. But publicly declaring your desires isn't necessarily your smartest move now. You may believe that you don't have to say a word today because your closest friends and family members already know what you are feeling. Your unbridled enthusiasm has a strong impact on your partner or lover today. However, a long and drawn-out speech may be the wrong approach unless you quickly follow through with sincere actions. It really shouldn't be so complicated to just let someone know how you feel. It's difficult to know if you should call it quits now or get ready to launch a major initiative. Unfortunately, your words cannot tell the whole story. Practicing social diplomacy helps to grease the wheels of relationships today as you dig beneath the surface to get to the truth. Emotional dependency is a familiar trap, yet it's still tempting to base your responses on how you believe someone else will react. Approach your day from a new angle today because as you change your attitude, you also alter the roles that others have in your life. You might be concerned about revealing too much today because everything appears to be happening so quickly. It's no fun to tiptoe around on eggshells just because you don't want to stir up intense feelings now. Unfortunately, your caution might have the opposite effect of what you want. You may be quite excited about pushing into new emotional territory today. However, you tend to be less passionate with your words than how you actually feel in your heart. You might be feeling quite positive about what you have to offer a good friend or potential lover now. You may yearn for the good old days, a simpler time that seems to have slipped through your fingers. But don't worry because there are areas of your life that are still in major transition now. Someone close to you or a member of your immediate family may be the source of resistance today. Unfortunately, it's tricky to put your finger on the origin of any bad vibes. You would like to speak your mind, but you may prefer to withhold your thoughts for just a while longer. Reexamining your assumptions about romance could shed new light on an important relationship today. Everything seems more complicated today if someone places demands on you in such a way that it's hard to say no. Your key planet, Pluto, may be called the Lord of the Underworld, yet it isn't nearly as dark and scary as some people believe. A sentimental journey today puts you back in touch with some of the intense changes you encountered over the past several years. You realize that you can't escape the pressure of change now, even if you must face it indirectly through your relationship with someone else. You don't want to defend your illogical feelings against attack because it's stressful enough just to understand them yourself. Even on these longest summer days in the Northern Hemisphere, you still might have to go through a dark night of the soul and question the purpose of your life. You may feel so overwhelmed by your commitments that you're ready to walk away out of frustration. Unfortunately, this kind of impulsive behavior isn't helpful. The Moon's return to your pleasure-seeking sign has you on the hunt for some plain old rest and relaxation. If you have been frustrated at work due to a lack of recognition, a simple change of attitude can make a big difference in your day. You might think that you can hold your breath today and be so quiet that no one will even notice you. Your current nostalgia triggers familiar desires and you would be wise to act on them while there's still time. Although you might have expressed powerful emotions over the past few weeks, you probably haven't shared the full story of your process with anyone yet. Your schedule may be very hectic these days, but it's still smart to take time off to enjoy the company of friends. Although it's hard to ignore the political tension at work today, you have the sense to sidestep potentially difficult power struggles. It's easier to get comfortable with your feelings now that the Moon is moving through practical Taurus, a fellow earth sign. You have an important agenda today, and luckily, you can steer reality to your advantage. It's tricky to keep everything running smoothly today. Ironically, it's smarter to wonder what would happen if you let go of control for a change. A surprising series of disruptions makes it nearly impossible to stay on track now. You're reluctant to share your concerns with others today because you assume they'll be met with resistance. Ironically, your friends believe that you're the one who always enjoys change. Your nerves may be on edge today from an intense power struggle playing out at work. Inevitable changes increasingly infringe on your reality and you may secretly dream of a resting place to catch your breath. You may be particularly eager to help someone today because you have a special skill that could be of immediate assistance. Keep your heart and mind open to the chaotic changes that are unfolding now, even if they aren't following your previous expectations. Life is full of unexpected twists of fate when the self-protective Cancer Sun squares wild and crazy Uranus. It's tempting to ask for too much today because it seems like you will have no trouble getting your way. Your understanding of your place in your community of friends may be shifting now, even if you believe that everything is stable. Unpredictable Uranus may take you for a wild ride today, temporarily leading you out of your comfort zone. Your adventurous dreams are larger than life, but it's not that simple to turn your fantasies into reality now. Nevertheless, you're motivated to give it your best shot, anyhow. You may be under a lot of stress now, but you can turn a difficult day into a memorable one by doing the right thing. It's difficult to motivate yourself now because your professional goals are in the process of shifting. Ironically, you might feel unusually calm today, even if you're in the center of a storm. You're even tempted to take a leap of faith and break through long-standing self-imposed limitations. But rather than shocking others with your spontaneity, simply start by revealing your thoughts. It's easier to transform your brilliant ideas into positive action if you move slowly and steadily at first.

Your coworkers may find you difficult to deal with when you don't do what's expected of you. Unconventional Uranus squares the Sun in your 6th House of Daily Routines today, urging you to break the rules. However, you might attempt to suppress your radical behavior now because you don't want to be rejected by your peers. Nevertheless, go ahead and take a risk; others won't judge you as harshly as you think. Paradoxically, coloring outside of the lines is your safest bet.

You are on edge and even those routines that usually seem comforting can trigger anxiety today. Your emotions are being stretched and you are ready to snap at the slightest provocation. However, nothing will be gained by losing your temper. Discussing your concerns rationally is a much smarter strategy now than ignoring them because your worries won't simply disappear on their own. Thankfully, addressing the underlying issues can bring the answers you seek if you keep an open mind.

You thrive on the fast pace of life today, yet it's wise to stop long enough to reassess what is happening. If you avoid spending time in unhurried contemplation, you might be able to convince yourself that someone you recently met would make a perfect partner. However, a little reflection may reveal that you dreamed up a beautiful scenario to fulfill your fantasies, so don't be too quick to trust your feelings now. Give your brain a chance to catch up.

Heightened expectations at work may set you up for a major disappointment today. However, you can make the most of your vivid imagination by using your unfulfilled dreams to spur you on to greater accomplishments. Don't be concerned about actually reaching the goals that you create in your mind; simply moving in the general direction of success will be enough to keep you happy for now.

You're in the zone, enabling you to quickly focus your mind and shift your perspective now that the Moon is back in your sign. Practice taking control of your thoughts by reframing them into more favorable scenarios. If you really believe in the power of positive thinking, it makes sense to brighten the images that affect your attitude. Let your true colors shine through.

Although you're motivated to express yourself today, you're not eager to blow your own horn. You prefer to let others discover your extraordinary talent on their own. But you might overvalue someone else's work as you see it through the filter of your inspiration. It's important to encourage those around you to have pride in their skills, but don't overlook your own. Instead of just projecting your sense of beauty onto someone else, find a creative outlet for your unique vision, too.

It's tempting to get so carried away embellishing a story today that you believe it yourself. Unfortunately, your naive thinking sets the stage for you to be easily deceived now. Motivating those around you is easier when you have confidence in them, yet your gullibility can embolden someone to mislead you. Instead of blindly following others, check the facts so you don't escalate a cycle of miscommunication.

You might accidentally fall into a role of playing the victim today, yet you can also consciously choose to alter your fate. Prior to committing to any additional tasks, give serious thought to how much work it will take to deliver on your promises. Breaking down the various components of a complex assignment makes it more manageable. But it's smarter to wait a day or two for your clarity of mind to return before starting something new.

Beautiful Venus forms an otherworldly aspect with illusory Neptune, making it trickier to find your creative groove. Perhaps you are overeager to express your inner child and wish you could take the day off. But even if you have to work today, set aside a bit of time to experience the joy of simply being in the present moment. If there are young people in your life, engaging in a bit of silly fun with them could be enough to satisfy your need to play. A return to innocence might be all it takes to inspire you now.

If you trip down Memory Lane today, it's not healthy to focus on the difficulties you have experienced. Instead, think about the most pleasant times when all you could do was smile. You are usually pretty pragmatic about what's going on in your life, but a little nostalgia might actually be soothing now. Imagination and faith can take you on a sentimental journey that alters your attitude about the past and improves the present moment.

Your calendar seems quite elastic now and if you fall behind on your busy schedule today, it may be more bothersome to everyone around you than to you. You like the idea of living in subjective time, rather than being a slave to the clock. Fortunately, you can prevent unnecessary irritation by letting others know if you are running late for an appointment. Courtesy is the key to keeping your day from unraveling, so make sure that you respect your commitments and honor your promises.

Delay making any major changes in your schedule today since Venus and Mercury are confused by cloudy Neptune's presence in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Keep in mind that you might not have all the facts at your disposal yet. Your practical judgment may be compromised by your spirituality now, but believing that everything is perfect won't substitute for responsibly taking care of the current issues that demand your attention.

Even if you explain your intentions again and again, your most supportive friends still might not fully understand your behavior today. Rather than arguing, others will probably just nod their heads in agreement, thinking that they know exactly what you mean. Meanwhile, you can sense a widening gulf of confusion between you and everyone else. Nevertheless, there's no need to bridge the gap all at once; it will disappear naturally on its own. However, paying attention to the details of your work is the best strategy for now.

You could grow disoriented today if you have to concentrate all your thinking on mundane issues. Ironically, you're more grounded if you let your imagination wander. While there is nothing wrong with being a dreamer, it's still important to keep up your appearances on the job. Happily, you can continue exploring parallel dimensions of reality now, as long as you don't attract any undue attention.

You may be concerned that you're running out of time, but it's still smarter to wait a few days before taking any drastic measures. Instead of overreacting by rushing ahead, demonstrate your competence with a calm and cool demeanor. There is nothing to be gained now by attempting to inspire others with a flashy show of courage. Honestly revealing your vulnerability to someone you trust today will earn you more respect than roaring with false bravado.

You have quite a lot to do today, but your friends and family members may not realize how busy you are. You don't want to be in the spotlight now, so working quietly behind the scenes suits your mood. You aren't necessarily trying to avoid recognition; you just don't want to waste energy seeking attention. Nevertheless, there is nothing wrong with graciously accepting acknowledgement for your contributions when it comes your way. Take the time to count your blessings when others support your efforts.

Your moods are fluctuating so rapidly today that every time you make up your mind something happens and your feelings shift again. You may be overly concerned with how others interpret your instability now, but you can't change their perceptions. Wait for your emotions to settle down before sharing your opinions. Rather than trying to fix something that's not under your control, concentrate on being true to your values, instead. Be patient, it might take some time to figure out what your heart wants.

The Moon's return to your sign today can either fill you with pride or raise fears that you would prefer to avoid. Either way, get ready to leave the safety of logic and go on a wild emotional ride. Allow your feelings to flow without trying to rationalize them or they will just get in the way during the next cycle that begins on Monday after the New Moon in your sign. Maintain an open mind and have faith in the wisdom of your heart.

It's nearly impossible to hear your own inner guidance if you're busy listening to everyone else. You could benefit from some quiet time today, so keep to yourself if that's what feels right. It isn't your fault if people are asking you to jump through hoops. But rather than responding like a trained performer, do what's best for you now. Others will likely forgive your temporary need for privacy once you share your story with them.

Your scattered energy might confuse people today and inadvertently distract them from their chores. Although your intentions are good, you're not interested in setting everyone else's agendas. But before you retreat, claiming that you don't want the extra responsibility now, consider the practicalities involved in a trade-off. It may be smarter to negotiate for what you want than to just walk away from the situation. Finding a healthy compromise might be just what the doctor ordered.

You may set yourself up for failure if you think you have to be accessible twenty-fours of the day to everyone you love. However, don't spread yourself too thin, even if you care about others a whole lot. Imagine an invisible protective shell around you now so you don't get pulled too far off track. You'll do fine in the long run, but self-doubt can impede your progress. Even if it feels like a stretch to change your attitude today, you certainly have the power to do it.

Concentrate your attention on the present moment instead of trying to replay an old dream that only gets in the way of your happiness. But if someone questions your life strategy today, avoid falling into the trap of feeling like you must defend your goals. Keep in mind that clinging to your past while envisioning the future doesn't leave you with much time for what's happening now. Fortunately, your intuition will steer you right if you focus on whatever is currently on your plate and stop worrying about the rest.

It seems as if everyone wants to hang out with you because you know how to have fun. You might try to avoid a discussion about your feelings now by redirecting a conversation away from you and toward a friend. Your cleverness may get you through the day without incident, but it leaves your heart feeling unsatisfied. Slow down and acknowledge your emotions; others will enjoy you even more when you reveal your softer side.

You aren't happy if a friend or partner holds out on you. You prefer others to be forthright and speak their minds; otherwise your imagination makes up a story that's worse than the simple truth. Unfortunately, your need to know someone's feelings could drive your own emotions deeper into hiding now. Relax your intense pursuit; a more subtle approach may be a smoother segue to a necessary conversation. The most direct path isn't always the best way up the mountain.

Your desire to avoid confusion may be thwarted today as another person's irrational feelings keep cycling back into the conversation. You might try to steer the discussion toward facts and figures, but attempts to control the natural flow could anger others. Paradoxically, your rigid behavior elicits the very same emotional drama you wish to avoid. However, if you allow the dialogue to meander naturally, a relationship can grow by leaps and bounds.

Sometimes you are so forgiving that others think they can take advantage of you. However, you could react strongly today if you believe that a close friend or family member is pushing you too far. Don't be afraid of setting a power struggle into motion if you need to establish a boundary. You may be better off in the long run if you hold your ground now. Just remember at all times that compassion is your most effective weapon in waging peace.

You can earn someone's affection today with your honest and innovative approach to love. Unfortunately, you could also alienate a close friend if you don't know when to call it quits. But even if there isn't anyone to talk to now, you still hear a running dialogue within your own head. It's great if you are learning an important lesson about yourself by acknowledging your feelings. But if you're not, then it could be wiser to let go of your desires and move on.

It's nearly impossible to be rational about what you like today because your key planet Venus aligns with unpredictable Uranus. You might as well set aside your responsibilities for a while and do something new and exciting. Whether you go scuba diving, bungee jumping or ballroom dancing, don't be afraid to pursue a thrilling experience. If pursuing your desires doesn't hurt anyone else and could add to your happiness, then just do it.

Your fantasies create a buzz today that you find irresistible. You crave more action and yet you probably already have so much going on that you can't figure out how to add one more thing on to your plate. Thankfully, even a meager attempt to find satisfaction could work surprisingly well now. There's no need to bury your desires; just jump into the experience and see where the currents carry you. Let the force be with you.

Although the idea of adventure sounds enticing today, it's hard to imagine yourself out there on your own when you don't even want to leave the safety of your home. You might try to have the best of both worlds by losing yourself into the vast reaches of the Internet where you can explore your heart's desires while maintaining anonymity. However, if you begin to obsess over your digital distractions, it may be time to walk away from your computer and make connections in the real world, instead

You have big ideas about doing all kinds of amazing things today, but your goals might be so unrealistic that you don't have a chance of reaching them. You may feel trapped by a previous commitment, but your fear of stagnation feeds your recklessness. You are eager to make something exciting happen. Unfortunately, your sense of urgency isn't helpful. It's more productive to adopt a slow approach and maintain a steady pace while pushing beyond old limitations.

Your friends and associates may turn your day inside out if they do something that's not very sensible now. Others just want an opportunity to be free today and, unfortunately, this can lead to irresponsible behavior. But you might react too quickly and judge them before you even stop and think about your response. Instead of acting with authority do your best to take the unexpected in stride. Ultimately, your flexibility clears the way for an amazing experience.

Your key planet, Venus, is zapped awake by shocking Uranus today, attracting unusual people, places and things like a magnet collects iron. Your reluctance to doing everything the same old way enables you to test the waters by interacting with someone who is completely different from anyone else in your life. Listen to what everyone else has to say, but then go ahead and do what you want to do. Taking care of your own needs now frees you up to be more accepting of the needs of others.

Your world is alive with social possibilities and you're ready to shake things up and do something out of the ordinary. Still, you worry about participating in an activity where you don't have complete control over your schedule. You might prefer to stay on the periphery of a group now, but the attraction to a totally new experience stimulates your curiosity, making it difficult to say no. Pushing through your resistance opens the door to an unexpectedly wonderful day.

You may have relationship issues to handle that could get in the way of more adventurous plans today. Perhaps you assumed that it would be difficult to find encouragement for your current dreams. Thankfully, you might be pleasantly surprised when those closest to you are more supportive than you ever expected. Take a chance and express what's in your heart now because it's more than likely to work out for the best.

You can be unusually freewheeling in your approach to relationships today, but your temporary sense of detachment may conflict with your more serious nature. Ironically, other people like the new you even if you are struggling with your current sense of freedom. Fortunately, there's no reason to hide what's in your heart now as long as you remember that you can talk about your feelings without having to act them out.

You can make an exciting conceptual breakthrough today that turns your life around and forces you to come up with a whole new set of plans. The idea of a sudden shift may be quite exhilarating now, but keep in mind that you cannot just forget about the needs of other people in your life. Playtime is yours for the asking, but you will have a lot more fun if you keep the communication channels open between you and those you love.

A surprising solution to a long-standing money problem might catch you off guard today, but don't push it away before giving it a try. You may need to shift your core beliefs to put your new plan into action, but it's worth the effort. Additionally, someone close to you could shock you with an emotional disclosure. Thankfully, remaining open to change empowers you to make the most of the current instability. The strength of a willow tree stems from its ability to bend.

Today's Cancer New Moon highlights your 4th House of Home and Family, raising conflicts between your need to go back to work and your desire to focus on projects around the house. Being patient isn't your forte, but you might have to wait until you finish your obligations on the job before allowing yourself to indulge in domestic activities. Establishing a healthy balance between your professional and personal worlds now makes it easier to juggle your responsibilities during the next few weeks.

The emotional Cancer New Moon rattles your 3rd House of Information, encouraging you to take someone into your confidence. But caution is advised; although personal disclosure might be a good idea, it also increases your sense of vulnerability. Be certain that the other person is worthy of your trust before placing yourself in a precarious position. Nevertheless, sharing your most personal feelings with a friend today is the best way to show how special she or he is to you.

Today's Cancer New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, inspiring you to do something that will lift your spirits. But the New Moon is conjunct retrograde Mercury, challenging you to be extra clear when you share what's on your mind. Since it may be impossible to make others understand you by describing your feelings, say less about them now. The good news is that your positive actions should get your message across loud and clear.

You're highly attuned to the regular emotional tidal cycles because your watery sign of Cancer is naturally connected with the Moon. Today's New Moon in your sign is like your own personal lunar birthday, so start making your wishes now. Formalize your intentions by creating a list of what you want to bring to fruition at the next Full Moon in a couple of weeks. Be wise; plant the seeds of action in your imagination, then nurture them and watch them take root and grow.

You can't seem to verbalize all your emotions today, amplifying the spiritual aspects of the reflective Cancer New Moon. This is a day for inner journeying, rather than seeking fulfillment from activities in the outer world, now that the New Moon falls in your 12th House of Privacy. Keeping your feelings to yourself intensifies your dreams. Allow your imagination to illuminate your story, even if you don't yet know what it means. There's no need to rush the interpretation; it will make more sense as time goes by.

Today's Cancer New Moon emphasizes your 11th House of Networking, turning the days ahead into a flurry of social activity. Although you want to play a valuable role in a larger group, you worry about being distracted from your real work. Fortunately, the sense of belonging that you gain should help you feel more emotionally secure, so don't stress too much about being productive now. Just give yourself permission to temporarily engage in a cause that's bigger than you and enjoy the camaraderie along the way.

Your patience is required now, so don't react too fast even when you think you know the answer. Although others may see you as an authority figure with the Cancer New Moon's presence in your 10th House of Status, you might not want to take the lead. Regardless, your objective approach enables you to achieve optimum results now. Observe the circumstances as they change over the next few days before assuming that everything is as you see it. The passage of time casts a different light on the situation.

You may be more hopeful everything will turn out in your favor now that your plans for the summer are becoming more concrete. It feels as if your dreams are finally beginning to take shape. However, problems arise if you act too soon, since the hesitant Cancer New Moon falls in your 9th House of Adventure. Paradoxically, a short delay could work to your advantage; playing it cool today allows you to reach your goals sooner than you expect.

Today's Cancer New Moon occurs in your 8th House of Deep Feelings, prompting you to explore your emotional world. Although you are as eager as ever for a new experience, you don't necessarily want to share your thoughts with anyone else now. Your curiosity is unquenchable, but it's frustrating if you don't have words to explain what you discover. Fortunately, your current satisfaction is derived by increasing your self-awareness rather than involving others in your process.

Today's Cancer New Moon lands in your 7th House of Relationships, offering you new ways to handle emotional conflict. If a close friend or lover clams up now and refuses to answer your difficult questions, don't try to change his or her mind. Although you're tempted to support someone in order to get what you want, it's healthier to live by the Golden Rule and do unto others as you would have them do unto you. Accepting your partner's need for space now ultimately brings you closer together.

You really don't want anyone questioning your ability to do your job now that the Cancer New Moon highlights your 6th House of Skills. However, if someone does challenge your competence, you might just withdraw from the situation. But your retreat isn't because you're timid. Instead, you just don't want to waste time defending yourself when you could be finishing your work. Avoiding emotional dramas for a few days may be the smartest way to manage the current bumpy atmosphere.

Today's Cancer New Moon falls in your 5th House of Creativity, encouraging you to set aside a block of time for artistic self-expression. But its conjunction with retrograde Mercury requires you to spend more time planning for your project than actually doing it. It makes the most sense to balance your preparation with execution. Don't waste the whole day dreaming about what you're going to do. Put your ducks in order and then get to work.

You are so highly motivated to impress others with your competence today that you might miss your chance to be creative. You can improve relationship dynamics by simply accepting the fact that you are appreciated because you are good at what you do. But you may still feel unfulfilled even if praise comes your way. Nevertheless, looking beyond appearances allows you to discover what's really important to your heart.

Tell your closest friends and family exactly what you are feeling now, since your day will unfold with less stress if you simply share what's on your mind. The Moon's presence in your private 4th House of Roots enables you to feel safe and happy while you are at home, as long as you remember that home is where the heart is. There's no need to conquer the world today; just be aware of how your vulnerability can be a special invitation to love.

There's a lot happening at work and you may feel overwhelmed and unable to keep up with it all. You might want to ask your colleagues for help, but perhaps it's been politically incorrect to do so until now. Although you don't want to talk about your problems in depth, at least broaching the subject with a few friends will help you feel better today. You could be happily surprised when others enthusiastically jump in with their support.

You are unable to hold on to your recent moodiness as the lights of your awareness grow brighter and everything appears to be on the upswing. It's nearly impossible to be anything other than happy once the Moon dances into fun-loving Leo today. But don't waste your excess energy on frivolous play while you still have important work to do. Hurrying through your chores won't help; you'll only have to redo them tomorrow. However, focusing on each task allows you to enjoy the satisfaction of a job well done.

You may be the life of the party today because the Moon in your expressive sign inspires you to respond to everyone in an upbeat manner. You're eager to meet up with friends to have a good time. However, you could quickly grow impatient if they bring you down. Make sure that in your rush to play you don't say something harsh to someone who isn't in the same lighthearted mood. Stop and listen to what's being said so you don't have to apologize later for running roughshod over other people's feelings.

Managing your relationships can be a bit tricky today because everyone thinks you are being totally honest. However, you might actually be covering something up now that mischievous Mercury is retrograding over the Sun. It's not that you're telling an outright lie; it's just that keeping a secret isn't quite the same thing as telling the truth. Nevertheless, don't wait until it's too late. Take some time to prioritize what's most important and then share your thoughts with someone you love.

Even if work has to be your top priority today, make sure that you also schedule some downtime with your friends or family. But don't try to get together with others just to discuss your schedule or business strategy; instead, focus on kicking back and relaxing. Share your dreams with those who will accept them for what they are, without questioning your motives or criticizing you for being unrealistic. Sometimes recharging your batteries is more important than anything else.

Today's loyal Leo Moon lands in your 10th House of Public Responsibility, urging you to recognize your current obligations and to acknowledge that you can fulfill them. But don't just pretend to look busy because you want to impress someone. There's no time for game playing or idle dreaming now; you can return to your fantasies once your current work is done. Apply yourself diligently to achieve success instead of just wishing upon a star.

The proud Leo Moon moving through your 9th House of Travel vividly symbolizes the exciting times ahead. Unfortunately, you might not have as much free time today as you wish, since your life is getting busier and you cannot avoid your previous commitments. Do whatever helps you to get by on a day-to-day basis while you continue planning your big escape. Tackling your current schedule is an adventure all of its own.

An unusual set of circumstances places a weird spin on the day, making it difficult to predict exactly what will be stirred up. You are typically result oriented, but you might prefer to meander around now with no particular goals in mind. Don't worry about the reaction of anyone else; your current task is to keep your options open and, if possible, postpone major decisions until after Mercury turns direct on July 20. In the meantime, practice flexibility while continuing on your present course.

The showy Leo Moon in your 7th House of Relationships indicates that you could meet up with a dramatic person who expresses admiration toward you. Instead of just basking in the spotlight on center stage, turn it around by thanking him or her for bringing something special into your world. Although it may be difficult for you to accept the positive feedback, no criticism is necessary ... a simple acknowledgment is all that's needed at this time.

The extroverted Leo Moon is visiting your 6th House of Routine, encouraging you to put a few enjoyable activities on your daily schedule. The goal is not to overextend yourself, but to add some more fun into your life. You may be eager to demonstrate to others that you can hold up your part of the bargain by working hard, but there's more to life than just doing your job. Thankfully, you can have your cake and eat it too if you play your cards right.

Expressing your needs in an optimistic manner now sets you on the path to your desired destination as long as you relate your feelings to those around you. It's exciting when your creativity is in play, but this isn't a license to indulge in narcissism. Of course, you can still reveal what's most important to you; just remember that it's not necessary to be the center of everyone's attention all the time. Sharing the stage makes for a more enjoyable experience for all those involved.

You may be wondering how much of your past you should divulge now, especially if current circumstances stimulate a childhood memory. Connecting your present feelings with a previous situation can be healthy, but not if you are remembering an event in a way that never actually occurred. It's not necessary to embellish the truth or you could create problems rather than solving them. Keeping it real allows people to know the real you.

There's no reason to sidestep the unexpected events that distract you from your original goals today. However, it isn't necessary to turn the interference of the day into some kind of drama just to get a bit of attention. Instead, be clever and embrace the change of plans while including others in your choices. Remember, you'll be appreciated more if you play as an integral member of the team instead of just pushing ahead on your own.

Nothing is gained by overstating your case today; saying fewer words is more effective than endless rambling. Keep in mind that your insecurities may set up situations that block intimacy by tricking you into acting more confidently than you feel. However, any attempts to avoid the truth or to inflate your ego will likely backfire. Fortunately, others will admire your authenticity now if you just act naturally and show up as yourself.

Even if you can imagine yourself as royalty now with the Moon in regal Leo, it's healthier to understand that you have more in common with everyone else than you might think. Attempting to elevate your self-esteem by creating situations where others are dependent on you won't make you feel any better in the long run. Instead, cultivate objectivity by releasing your attachment to anything that separates you from the group. Cooperation breeds more success than competition today.

Delving into your fantasies might be quite fruitful today as brilliant Uranus harmonizes with the Moon in your 12th House of Dreams. Self-analysis reveals more than it does at other times, but it may be tricky putting your realizations to practical use. Instead of getting lost on your inner journey now, focus your attention on the world around you. A methodical and pragmatic approach is the most sensible way to take care of business.

Concrete plans unravel as the Moon aligns with unpredictable Uranus this morning, but thankfully everything can turn out okay, anyhow. Don't try to avoid an unpleasant discussion today just because you think doing something else could bring you more pleasure. There is an important reason that you have a chance to revisit an issue you assumed was in the past. Pay careful attention to all the details that surface now or you may have to repeat the lesson again sooner than you expect.

You may be placing too much importance on making sure that others know what you're doing on the job today. However, most of your coworkers won't question your commitment or your actual efforts, giving you time to step beyond your work. Don't be afraid to let your thoughts wander into the shadows of your subconscious, for it is there that you can discover the deeper meaning that you seek.

Vivid dreams of far-off lands capture your imagination today. But no matter how wonderful your fantasies are now, you must also pay attention to what's happening right in front of you. A lively conversation with a trusted friend is all you need to remind you that everything you really want could be right in your own backyard. You can find enjoyment without going anywhere at all.

Avoiding a really tough conversation about your feelings may not be such a wise idea today, especially if you allow your fears and negativity to stand in the way of the discussion. Nothing is gained by deluding yourself. Demonstrate your wisdom by being open to whatever someone else needs to talk about at this time. You might be pleasantly surprised at where this interaction leads.

You may feel misunderstood these days, but you can quickly turn things around by acknowledging your role in the situation. You might have inadvertently created a gulf between you and others that now gets in the way of meaningful dialogue. Don't fall into the old trap of believing that there's something to be gained by hiding your true feelings. Instead of overcompensating with dramatic acts of generosity, soften your stance and speak from your heart.

Although you can't solve all the on-the-job problems by simply working harder, there are things you can do to make the situation better. Overextending your reach is not a smart move and might even exhaust you in the process. Your real gift is how you exhibit love and compassion to your friends and associates. Offering a kind word or a shoulder to lean on requires very little effort and returns more dividends than you expect.

Establishing boundaries with your friends might elicit an unexpected response if they interpret your expressed desire for formality too seriously. However, you're only setting down the rules today because you believe that this strategy can help you accomplish more work now. But too much rigidity gets in your way; ironically, letting go of a little control begins to soothe the energies and calm your nerves.

It seems as if something's happening on the home front that you don't quite understand, and you can't be certain enough to do anything specific about it. Risky behavior is tempting at first, but the more you delay the less enticing it appears; it makes more sense to wait until you have more answers. However, there is still work to do and you need to get back to it so you can finish your old tasks before you start anything new.

You often like gathering lots of information even when it isn't helpful to your cause. However, today's sensible Virgo Moon gives you the analytical tools you need to sort through all the data and keep only what you can use. Although it's easy to forget what you're doing now and get distracted by all the untried possibilities, balancing your unquenchable curiosity with your current penchant for practicality combines the best of both worlds.

It's no fun if you're reminded of an emotional wound today, but you can't afford to dwell on it. Naturally, the most crucial issues are the ones that occur in the present moment. Your obsession with a past event can actually block the flow of feelings. Gently bring your thoughts and fantasies back to where you are now. Keep in mind that you don't want to miss the good stuff that is happening right in front of your nose.

It's nearly impossible to separate your current feelings from your fantasies today, especially when you try to express what's on your mind. Nevertheless, don't lean on others for support now, for they cannot tell you the whole truth even if they wish they could. If you are willing to be vulnerable and share your inner process, even without receiving feedback, you'll still feel like you made some progress in the right direction.

The evocative Moon's return to your sign today gives you the energetic boost you need. However, your emotions may be tricky to manage now, leaving you exhausted from sharing too much with a friend or lover. You might try to advance your cause by overstating your case. Nevertheless, the smartest thing you can do now is to recognize your limitations and save your best intentions for tomorrow.

It's so tempting to get lost in your own dreams and schemes now that the Moon is floating through your 12th House of Escapism. Ironically, one of your fantasies might actually turn into a practical idea. However, your sense of timing may be slightly off today, so don't mess up your chances by revealing your intentions too soon. Continue to develop your strategy without involving others until the Moon returns to your sign on Sunday and you can confidently share your plans.

You are buzzing with an overflow of energy now, yet you don't want to waste it on unimportant social interactions. Even if you have an enjoyable event on your calendar, it still might seem more like an unpleasant chore than a party. Nevertheless, it's a smart idea to attend because you could make an important connection with someone you meet today. You never can tell where a new friendship will lead.

You might not know what your next move at work should be because you may be aimed in one direction while really wanting to go another. However, this isn't about geography; it's about discovering happy places within your heart. Consider what your life would feel like if you were actually working toward a new and exciting set of goals. Don't let go of your dreams now because focusing on your vision of the future for the next week can be instrumental in making it come true.

Your hands-on approach to success could bring you rewards today, but you must stay focused on your original intentions. If you have an important decision to make, do it as early in the day as possible, because as the evening approaches, you may grow increasingly cautious. Be as objective as you can in order to balance your pessimism with optimism.

Your complex schemes seem to fall apart today for no apparent reason. You might even believe that you can't maintain a clear perspective on what's happening now. But you are capable of doing nearly anything, as long as you concentrate on working with the resistance instead of against it. The more you fight what's in your way, the more strength you give it. Your flexibility makes you stronger and more resilient, like a tree that bends in the wind.

Don't take someone's criticism of your work too personally today. You may be extra sensitive now or others might even be unreasonably harsh in their judgment. You could exhaust yourself trying to please a picky person who won't be satisfied by anything you do. There's no need to prove yourself to anyone else. Instead, aim to meet your own high standards for a real sense of fulfillment.
