Responsibilities pile up at work these days but you're not ready to get too serious yet. You're not very excited about doing your chores now or even considering strategies to get a job done. It's hard to be proactive if you are afraid that your actions won't be as effective as you wish. But even if you can't take the whole day off, at least give yourself permission to relax and fall a bit behind in your production schedule. As long as you keep your priorities straight, you'll be able to catch up next week.

Cool logic is your ally now as you fight your way back from confusion. Your elaborate fantasies may come unraveled today, but they soon will be replaced by a less complicated version of reality. Avoid the temptation to weave stories, even if you are able to express yourself skillfully and entertain others. Keep things simple and stick with only what you know to be absolutely true. Avoid extra stress by choosing facts over fiction.

Everyone seems to be relying on you for your stability these days, but this is not one of your typical strengths. Fortunately, you probably can anchor a loved one now and prevent him or her from drifting away in an emotional storm. It really doesn't matter why you have become the go-to person today. Instead of wasting your energy wondering how to help, just jump in and do what you can. Others will appreciate your support.

You have strong opinions today, but expressing them might lead you into more trouble than it's worth. Paradoxically, it may be easier for you to work with the facts and figures now than to handle an emotional issue. The exacting Virgo Moon prevents you from entering the illogical land of subjectivity. Acknowledge your feelings, but act on the cool rationality of raw data for the best results.

You bring an excess of energy to the table if you share your opinions, even when they aren't as clear as you wish. It can be quite difficult to separate what's good from what's not when it comes to relationships. Creating fantasies about what you want is easier than actually doing something about it. Nevertheless, it may be healthy to have a few secrets now because there are some things that are better off left unsaid until the time is right.

Your self-confidence may be slipping now as you recollect a time in your life when your best shot fell short of someone's expectations. However, nothing is to be gained by obsessing over the past or remembering disappointments. The Moon's return to your sign can make it difficult to focus your attention, but this is not the time to give up. If you cannot adjust your attitude, ask your friends for the help you need. You could be pleasantly surprised at how quickly they come through for you.

If you accidentally overstepped someone's boundaries recently, it may be time for a bit of emotional cleanup today. There's no reason to be hesitant or shy if you made an error in judgment; just admit to it and move on. Act maturely and take responsibility for your words and actions, since they aren't as problematic as you think. The sooner you can look forward, instead of worrying about the past, the better it will be for everyone involved.

You may be overly protective of your feelings today and might attempt to make it through the day without ever admitting what's actually bothering you. However, you won't be able to keep your secret forever because you are motivated to reveal the truth as you perceive it. You don't want to hurt anyone's feelings, but it's important to recognize that you can speak your piece in a kind and non-blaming manner and still be loved.

If you have set your sights too high today, you may become discouraged when you don't reach your goals. It's helpful to cut yourself a bit of slack and allow time for your plans to develop. But you might have a hard time learning the lesson of patience now. Remember, you cannot do everything all at once. Focus on your overall goals and try not to become obsessed with just one small part of your plan.

It's difficult to avoid creating an awkward situation where someone becomes angry with you today. It might seem as if you don't have as many options as you want or that others are attempting to get in your way. Consider what you may have done to help set a restraining backlash in motion. Fighting against an external enemy -- real or imagined -- is likely a waste of your time now when you should be working to improve your own act, instead.

You're searching for a significant piece of information today and might even conclude that someone is hiding something from you. Unfortunately, your attempts to bring out the truth won't likely lead to success now. However, you still could find what you're looking for, but it could require you to use reverse psychology. Relaxing your need to know will put others at ease and you may learn more than you expect.

You may be feeling somewhat let down today, just as you might on a morning after an exciting event. It's tempting to fill in the gaps with additional activities, but it's probably smarter to use this time to seek a bit of peace and quiet. Unfortunately, you won't likely get the tranquility that you want, so be flexible and do your best to accept whatever happens next. Embrace the unexpected and enjoy the ride.

You may be extra considerate of other people's feelings now that your key planet Mars is visiting nurturing Cancer. Nevertheless, Mars harmonizes with mystical Neptune and ambitious Saturn over the next week, empowering you to turn your dreams into reality. Remember, your current magic comes from speaking your truth and walking your talk. Don't be shy; say what's on your mind, but find the nicest way to do it before you open your mouth.

You're tired of friends and associates who continue to mislead you with witty words and big promises. But you're not in the mood to be messed with today and you might become angry if you think that someone is avoiding a commitment. You aren't any fun to be around if you believe that anyone has deceived you in any manner. Postponing an important discussion for a few days may be enough to alleviate the stress for now. Thankfully, changing your tactics enables you to enjoy your interactions with others.

Although things settle down a bit as Mars leaves your sign today, your mind is still quite busy. However, someone might not be playing fairly now and you're worried that this dynamic could grow more complicated over the days ahead. Don't waste valuable energy by slipping into a fearful state. Instead, concentrate your thoughts on spreading love in every moment of the day. Your positive attitude helps to minimize the negativity around you.

Red-hot Mars pushes into your sign today to fire up your emotions. Unfortunately, your reactions can be strong and swift now, making you afraid to share your desires with most people because you're worried that you might scare them away. Nevertheless, total inaction leads to even more problems, so don't go quiet and just pretend that everything is fine. Share your current concerns with a trusted friend, but be careful not to blame anyone in the process. Letting off a little steam lightens the load.

You may be quite attached to your desires today, yet still unable to bring them out into the open. Others expect you to be upfront with your personal disclosures and there could be trouble if they think you're hiding something. Be courageous and proudly admit your feelings. Even if you're uncertain at first, revealing suppressed emotions can clear the air better than any other strategy.

You can't decide what to do now if you feel that the energy is off balance. Fortunately, your intentions are honorable since you truly want to do the right thing. But even a simple plan grows entangled with other ones, making everything more complicated today. Your impromptu actions may even be misinterpreted by someone who should know better. Luckily, this uncertainty is a temporary condition, so cool your jets for a few days until the dust settles and your clarity returns.

You may consider a personal retreat today so you can focus on taking care of your own needs. You're distracted by your fantasies now because they actually seem quite plausible. You're tempted to push beyond the limits of logic by acting out an impossible dream sequence, only to discover that it works. Nevertheless, you're treading on unstable ground because the tiniest doubt could cause your entire dream world to collapse. Remember, your unwavering belief might be the essential ingredient to make something special happen.

Sharing your deep concerns is not a wise idea today, especially if there isn't anyone around that you sufficiently trust with your thoughts. However, you like the idea of being in safe harbor, even if you find yourself pulled toward someone else's perspective. Unfortunately, an impulsive decision made while you're excited will probably lead you away from your goals. Instead, take the necessary time to work through your uncertainty before revealing what's on your mind.

Someone may catch you off guard today as he or she tap dances around your probing questions. You want to trust your instincts, but others won't likely sit still long enough for you to get a read on their intentions. Wait a few days until the mysterious and unknowable circumstances play on through. In the meantime, be thorough in your analysis of the current situation. Surprisingly, you could be left with newfound clarity and purpose once the smoke clears.

A friend or acquaintance may become a total pain in the neck now that macho Mars shifts into your 7th House of Relationships. You might feel as if others are worrying about the wrong things, but you can't say a word about it because the issue is so sensitive. Naturally, you are not eager to walk around on eggshells because you realize that you're going to break a few sooner than later. Nevertheless, it's still sensible to avoid direct confrontation for just a little while longer.

You cannot tell if your current assessment of someone is valid or if you're basing it on assumptions that are built upon your desires. Thankfully, you can still jump-start yourself into motion. Your flexibility helps to alleviate the growing relationship tension, but don't diffuse the uncomfortable energy too quickly. Holding your position and sinking deeper into it should bring you more clarity and meaning than running off to start something new.

You want to work in the practical realms today, but you don't seem to be in complete control of your emotions. You might feel as if subtle forces are coercing you to act on your heart's inclinations, rather than doing what makes the most sense. You can understand the consequences of your actions, but logic doesn't alter your passions. Ironically, satisfying other people's expectations won't bring you happiness now. It's time to follow your bliss.

It doesn't matter what you want today, since you have to weigh your desires against the needs of someone else. However, you must be careful because you cannot just bury your emotions in the process. Avoidance as a strategy does not work in your favor now, but neither does overreacting. Thankfully, you can prevent a minor disagreement from turning into a significant problem if you simply consider other people's feelings, too.

The Moon pulls you through a complete spectrum of emotions today, tempting you to go so far that you find yourself out on a limb in search of a simple solution. But resolutions are elusive and don't come easily now because your desires are all over the place. You can ease the pressure by being grateful for what you have in life, instead of believing that you should have more. Ultimately, you need less than you think in order to find true satisfaction.

It's tempting to turn every molehill into a formidable mountain because your perspective might be a bit off. However, life may not be as complicated as it seems today. Nevertheless, it's challenging to scale back your needs without suppressing your desires. Go ahead and take a risk, even if gambling with your emotions now leads to temporary frustration. Open communication is helpful if you don't assume someone else should fix your problems. Just make sure to listen as much as you talk.

You can intuitively sense that you are on the edge of change, raising uneasy feelings of anxiety. You know that something big is about to happen, but you have no idea what it is yet. Your path is not clear today, even if you know what you want. Be patient; it may take a few more days for your emotional needs to be satisfied. Instead of just wanting more, put things into perspective now by appreciating what you already have. Counting your blessings reminds you of what's most important.

You want to balance work with play today, yet you have so much on your plate now that relaxation may have to be put on the back burner. Complaining about your super-busy schedule won't make things any easier. Even if you are feeling lazy, take care of your chores without any fuss. Instead of trying to escape your responsibilities, find ways to enjoy yourself in spite of them.

You may experience a hard time today because you cannot clearly state what you want. Part of the problem is that by the time you do speak up, your feelings have already shifted. Unfortunately, you can be so exacting that you set unrealistic goals. Keep in mind that you won't need to lower your standards to allow others additional flexibility in how they respond to you. Ultimately, a mutual exchange of ideas is required to establish common ground.

Friends and associates may request more than you can give now. Although you have been known to perform miracles, you might over-commit with the Moon moving through your sign. Your desire to put others at ease could be so strong that your actions seem exaggerated. You can save everyone from a serious headache by promising less. Remember, it's better to disappoint someone today than to face the complex consequences of idealistic expectations. Keeping things simple is your best approach.

Today's ambiguous Libra Moon moves through your 12th House of Secrets, reminding you that some things are private and should not be shared. Although you might agree with this idea in theory, in practice it's still best to keep everything out in the open now. Explaining your motives may be the most straightforward way to express what's significant to you. Even if others don't understand your perspective, at least they will respect your courage.

You may be unusually fair-minded as you approach others in your family or social group today. Although your plan of attack might be totally different from the one that everyone else agrees upon, you're smart enough to go along with the collective decision for now. Be careful not to give in too quickly or your resentment could get in the way of success. Give yourself enough time to process your feelings before explaining your position. Putting your needs into perspective makes it easier to be a part of the fun.

You are challenged to keep your mind on the serious side of your affairs today because so many distractions pull your thoughts in different directions. Even if you have a lot to do, your desire to enjoy yourself is stronger now than your need to succeed. The Libra Moon's presence in your 10th House of Responsibility encourages you to seek a middle path between work and play. Get your chores out of the way early in the day since you won't even want to think about them once you start to unwind.

You feel undue pressure to work out an unresolved relationship issue today. Unfortunately, tension arises from a complex mix of emotional dynamics and it won't likely dissipate, even if you try to get to the bottom of the situation. For now, it's probably wiser to set differences of perspectives aside and simply enjoy the positive aspects while you can. Sharing enjoyable experiences builds a foundation for finding future solutions.

Your ability to cut through superfluous circumstances to get to the things that are holding you back enables you to overcome the obstacles. However, spontaneously expressing yourself can inadvertently stir up a hornet's nest of practical issues and there isn't enough time in the day to sort through all the details. Although your patience is tested now, it's okay to leave a few loose ends untied so you have more flexibility later on when you need it.

You often make decisions that are based on your own needs, but the Libra Moon reminds you to consider what others want, too. Nevertheless, you might be a bit aggressive once you make your choice today. You could provoke some serious consequences to your current actions if you actually believe that you can ignore everyone else. There's no reason to try to outsmart anyone now when being pleasant and doing as you're asked produces such good results.

You might not agree with a coworker on how to tackle a project today, yet seeking common ground still has its distinct advantages. Don't push to get what you want because there just isn't room for stubbornness now with the Moon traveling through accommodating Libra. The most important thing is to stop resisting the inevitable. Save your energy for when you need it most. Cooperation leads to progress.

Don't make yourself crazy by being too serious today because all work and no play could leave you watching from the sidelines. The fastest way to get in step with your world now is to loosen up and have some fun. Although you can't avoid your responsibilities, it still feels good to let your hair down and kick up your heels. Once you deal with your restless energy, you'll be better able to focus on more important tasks.

Ironically, you are more comfortable if you're stressed by too much opportunity today, rather than none at all. Maybe it's just easier to face a minor disappointment when other things are clicking so well. Nevertheless, heightened expectations set you up for a potential letdown. Scale back your ambitions now so you can feel good about all that you accomplish without becoming discouraged by falling short of your goals.

Although your life seems to be improving in many ways, you sometimes still feel as if you're on a collision course with reality. Even if nothing appears out of the ordinary now, your energy may be stretched to the max. Set aside your long-term goals for a while and focus on finding peace and harmony in the present moment, instead. Cut back your activities just enough to free up a little time for relaxation and rest.

You might feel under pressure to make money or contribute your creativity to a project. However, the stress intensifies because your closest relationships are going through changes and figuring out where you fit in occupies a lot of your time. Knowing what to do can be tough since it's uncomfortable to set boundaries that may interfere with your career advancement. Remain open to the opportunities coming your way. Keeping your boss and coworkers appropriately informed about your shifting priorities makes life easier to manage.

You're well into the starting phase of a significant shift in your life that will eventually impact all types of relationships; nevertheless, you aren't quite ready for all the pieces to fall into place. You might even postpone an important personal event so you can buy yourself some much-needed time to get things done. There's no need to be overly concerned about what will happen in the future because current circumstances will ultimately lead you to your desired destination.

The Libra Moon buzzes your 12th House of Privacy and you're likely to have a few secrets that you're not going to tell anyone. However, you are tempted to reveal something very personal about yourself today and you could go overboard and share more than you should. Don't think that everything you say now will be well received. If you are considering a full confession, take a few minutes to remember your reasons for keeping quiet in the first place. You'll have a better sense of your personal boundaries after a bit of contemplation.

You feel the disconnect between your own needs and those of your friends and workmates. You may attempt to redefine your values and reassess your current situation, but the more you look at all your options, the better the status quo appears. If you aren't sure what your next move should be now, try checking in with your trusty allies; they can be the source of profound advice at this time.

It's tricky to balance your professional ambitions with your personal life now, for the two may seem less compatible with each other than ever. It's hard to restrain your confidence when others are setting you up on a pedestal. Nor do you want to hear about the dangers of inflated goals and how they will only lead to disappointment. Instead, consider this as a gentle reminder that a measured approach to your career is your smartest strategy. Remember to honor those you love by spending quality time with them while you can.

Even if you feel very close to a turning point today, the big change you're seeking might appear to be slipping away. Details are fuzzy and plans can sound like excerpts from an adventure novel now. But this isn't a smart time to become too creative with the truth because you won't be able to justify how you bend reality to your perspective. Get out of your own way and let the facts speak for you, instead.

You might feel as if someone is trying to prevent you from reaching your goals today. What begins as a passing thought can grow into an obsession as you attempt to untangle all the emotions and objectives that are involved. It won't be easy to push past the resistance now unless you are patient and persistent. Your best ideas will surface quickly once you quiet your mind to hear your own thoughts.

Respecting financial limits is always a smart idea, but you may be able to justify spending a little more than you planned to purchase something that you really need. Use some common sense by asking for advice from a trustworthy friend. You might have to share more personal information than you expect, which can leave you feeling vulnerable. But if you listen to what others say, the payoff could make the whole exercise worth your while.

Your steady pace works to your advantage now, but it's tempting to barge ahead when everything looks so perfect. Although your current enthusiasm might make you impatient, you'll only exhaust yourself if you push too hard. Watch carefully for signs; you'll do best when you let the cosmos tell you how fast to move. Do what you can and then get some sleep before you hit a wall. Even a superhero needs to rest once in a while.

If you recently left too many chores undone, you must focus your energy today and finish whatever you can. You might be annoyed if someone is placing unrealistic expectations on you because you don't want to apply yourself any harder than is necessary now. However, nothing is gained by avoiding your work; it's wiser to change your attitude and just do the best job possible. You'll feel so much better once everything is finished and so will everyone else.

You are eager to integrate your creativity into your regular routine. It's wonderful to be inspired and express yourself in ways that deeply touch others; however, it's an entirely different story if you have to perform on command every day. Turning your art, craft or talent into something productive requires the right mix of self-discipline and wild abandon. Fortunately, you're able to find the perfect balance between these extremes if you let your intuition be your guide.

Juggling family loyalty with your desire to pursue your own spiritual path is tricky business, and domestic obligations may limit what you can do now. Going on a vision quest or heading out on a hero's journey might require more careful planning than you think. Remember, there's no need to be in a hurry. You will be more successful on all fronts if you continue putting in a small amount of time toward reaching your goals each and every day.

Naturally, you want your friends and workmates to appreciate how your efficient work style contributes to the overall project. However, previous commitments may prohibit you from getting involved as much as you would like now. But instead of feeling discouraged because you don't have a lot of control, focus your attention on the possibilities ahead. Your positive attitude helps to make you happier today while also creating opportunities for tomorrow.

Financial restraints could send you into a tailspin today, but money isn't likely the only problem. Your discouragement may be tied to feelings of low self-esteem and the current lack of cash just exacerbates the issue. Thankfully, a friend might come to your aid just in the nick of time. Remember, there's a price to be paid for someone else's involvement, but accepting help can actually deepen a growing friendship.

You're resigned to behave in a mature manner now that the Moon joins responsible Saturn in your 1st House of Self. However, harmonious trines to assertive Mars, optimistic Jupiter and imaginative Neptune inspire you to use the power of positive thinking to make your world a better place. Don't mislead yourself into believing that success is yours overnight. Nevertheless, a mix of self-discipline, unflappable faith and hard work is an unbeatable combination.

It's relatively easy for you to imagine your way into the future because your fantasies overflow into reality today. Your intuition leads you down the most sensible path now, enabling you to read between the lines and see beneath the surface. Trust your hunches and let your dreams be roadmaps to your happiness. Make commitments that instinctively feel good and then do whatever's necessary to deliver on your promises.

You're inspired to show your friends and acquaintances how competent you are today. Thankfully, nearly everyone seems to be supportive of anything you do. However, plans may fall apart if others have different priorities than yours. The good times are a bit more elusive than you may realize now, so forget about trying to coordinate everyone else's schedule. Find something productive that you can do on your own.

You may need to spend time with your coworkers now. Although you wish you could kick back and share your ideas for the future, they may not be interested in hearing what you want to do. Rather than pushing your agenda on others, meet them halfway. The goals you set today will still be there tomorrow; in the meantime, flexibility is your key to happiness.

You don't want to fly by the seat of your pants now; you prefer having a concrete plan with a workable timeline so you know where you are going and when you will arrive. Unfortunately, your agenda may be so rigid that you don't leave enough time to adapt for last minute changes. Opening up your schedule by cutting back on your appointments or just increasing the time between them will build more stability into your day.

Your mental sharpness is strong today, but you may grow impatient if everything doesn't go your way. You might expect others to respond quickly to your requests, but you're probably moving too fast. Your overconfidence can land you in trouble if you don't give someone plenty of time to catch up to you. A more mature approach will pay off now, making it smarter to let the waves of anticipation settle down prior to initiating action. Another day or two of fine-tuning your plans can't hurt.

Naturally, you want to say yes rather than no with overindulgent Jupiter in the spotlight today. One scoop of ice cream isn't enough now; if something tastes good, you want more. Unfortunately, your responsibilities will come second if you're distracted by the pursuit of happiness. Remember, true joy comes from appreciating what you have and not from experiencing sensory overload. However, keeping things in perspective allows you to have your cake and eat it too.

You might talk yourself into the craziest things today because your vivid imagination is speeding around, running on overdrive. You could underestimate the complexity of a job while convincing yourself that it will be a piece of cake. However, it's better to be realistic than to commit to a deadline you won't be able to keep. Being a bit more cautious in your assessment enables you to reach your goals on schedule and keep your integrity intact.

You seem more outgoing to others today than you actually feel, but perhaps your friendliness distracts people from asking probing questions. Although you may be quite content these days, it's not easy to share the real reason for your enthusiasm because you're afraid of being misunderstood. Fortunately, it's not necessary to push yourself outside of your comfort zone now. Enjoy your daydreams and mental meandering without explaining yourself until you're good and ready.

You may be certain that pleasure is just around the corner, but you could have a slightly distorted perspective of the future now. On the upside, your innate self-confidence improves your life through the power of positive thinking. Having faith in the impact of your actions can be an important key to your current happiness, assuming that you don't lose touch with reality. Visualizing your ideal outcome is more effective if you apply some common sense along the way.

You're tempted to throw all caution to the wind today, risking your current security in the hopes of creating a memorable experience. Unfortunately, your eagerness can lead to an awkward moment when you realize that the immediate fulfillment of your desires probably won't bring you long-term satisfaction. Rather than taking a chance on a fleeting taste of pleasure, concentrate on doing something special that will last.

You might lose track of your responsibilities today if you get caught up in a social whirlwind. Although there are plenty of opportunities to enjoy your friends and partake in pleasurable activities, don't forget about your previous promises. If you avoid your obligations, it will certainly be more difficult to reach your goals. However, if you finish your work quickly, you can relax and enjoy floating off into a fantasy-land of fun and games.

It's complicated to know exactly what is acceptable and what isn't when asking for something that you want today. Although your requests aren't really off the wall, your friends may not share the same intensity for your passions. Nevertheless, staying connected with your feelings is empowering, even if you think you need to keep your desires hidden. Ultimately, toning down your style just a bit gives others enough emotional distance to support you without feeling overwhelmed.

You may think that indulgent behavior should bring you more joy, but following this strategy now only leads to frustration down the road. Unrestrained partying and other kinds of escapist activities can be a great deal of fun in moderation for a short amount of time. Meanwhile, getting serious about seeking your own personal vision requires a real commitment to hard work with the potential rewards to follow sometime in the future. Ultimately, the choice is yours.

You have been performing your job duties under pressure recently, so it shouldn't come as a surprise if you're anxious to escape your heavy work responsibilities. Luckily, taking a long lunch or socializing on the clock may not be a problem as long as you don't stretch the limits too far. A reasonable approach enables you to easily fit in some fun today without negatively impacting your reputation or your productivity. There's nothing wrong with enjoying yourself, even if it doesn't contribute to your progress.

You might be more interested in encouraging your coworkers today than you are in reaching your own goals. Thankfully, your magnanimity may prove to be lots of fun for you, even if you don't get much done. Instead of putting all your eggs in someone else's basket, reserve a few for yourself. Fortunately, balancing your dreams with other people's agendas creates a situation where everyone can be a winner.

You have the gift of being able to touch others profoundly today, healing past hurts and mending old wounds. Paradoxically, your current magic cannot be bottled or saved, however hard you try. Although acting with compassion is your specialty, you still may end up feeling like a victim if you go to extreme measures. Luckily, you don't need to make major sacrifices to do your best work. Instead of holding back, open your heart and let your love light shine.

You need to know that someone close to you supports you no matter what you do. Your current desires aren't your typical lighthearted attractions to a possible romance. Instead, you're on an intense search for meaning in your life. Don't sell yourself short by accepting less than what you deserve. Creating amazing relationships is possible, and it begins with self-acceptance. Leading by example encourages others to be true to themselves, too.

Set your long-term goals as high as possible today because the more you stretch, the farther you'll go. Even if you tend to over-inflate your dreams now, indulging your fantasies is a beneficial activity because it allows you to explore your desires without making a commitment in the real world yet. Nevertheless, there's no need to keep your feelings entirely to yourself. Sharing your inner process with an objective observer helps you clarify which visions are actually worth pursuing and which should be left behind.

Rewards at work may come from out of the blue today, as if the universe picked you out of the pack for special recognition. Don't worry about why the acknowledgment is happening at this time; just enjoy it. The only danger is your current inclination to rest on your laurels too long. You still need to do the work required of you so you don't let down your coworkers. In the meantime, graciously accept the support and use it to fuel your momentum until you finish the job.

Romance may be heading your direction, even if it seems to be running late like a rush-hour train. However, your current dilemma is about discerning the difference between reality and fantasy. You cannot easily tell where the hard edges of the world fuzz out to become the ideal created by your imagination. Positive vibrations are all around you now, but you might need to get clarification from others to know what is real.

Even if you are normally an expressive Lion, you might want to keep your feelings under wraps today so you don't have to justify them to others. You may have idealistic goals about relationships, but reality doesn't match up with your fantasies. Set aside any urges to force the issue. Rest assured that what you imagine now can manifest in your life if you keep your heart open to a wider spectrum of possibilities.

You may feel waterlogged now, as if you have been deluged by emotions that can keep you from your real work. Ironically, it might be a mistake to rush back to dry land quite yet. Although you won't likely produce any tangible results from today's irrational excursions, the benefits you receive are potentially long-lasting if your overall intentions are honorable. Soaking in all the good feelings revitalizes you for the work ahead.

Your self-esteem soars today as you begin to feel better about all the alternatives spread before you. However, it's time to loosen up your grip on your day-to-day activities. You don't have to worry about the little details as much as you normally do. Your current success is related to your ability to just let the days unfold without micromanaging every moment. Exploring the options now empowers you to choose the best path later on.

There might never be perfect conditions for creativity, but the energy these days feels pretty darned close. Your ability to visualize is heightened and your imagination is running strong. Use your sixth sense to feel your way through the landscape and then manifest the beauty you perceive. Even if you don't feel artistically inclined, sharing your vision with someone else can foster a special emotional bond.

You are standing at the edge of a dream, and have more cosmic magic working on your behalf than usual. Whether your imagination manifests positively or negatively is up to you, for your fantasies have the potential to become tomorrow's reality. If you believe in the power of the mind, make time to create a meditative space where you can envision your highest aspirations. Make yourself comfortable, listen to your favorite music and let your intuition be your guide.

There could be some confusion regarding your social life now, and it may grow into more stress than you want to handle. Maybe you're uncertain about an invitation or, perhaps, you haven't figured out how to juggle your calendar. However this temporary indecision affects you, don't get too worked up. The answers will come to you just in time, but possibly not until you throw your hands up in the air and surrender. Trusting the process eventually works in your favor if you can release your need to control the outcome.

Career issues are emphasized these days, but it's possible that you need to retreat and regroup before making one more push toward your goals. You might not realize how much you've overextended your resources. Nevertheless, it's important to stabilize your position now, for the current expansion is not going to let up for a while. Standing on a firm foundation enables you to reap the rewards of your work in due time.

Obsessive thoughts of exotic travel may consume your free time today, even if you cannot go anywhere yet. However, it's important to remember that you can journey in your mind via your imagination anytime you want. You are hearing the call of the wild and it's your time to answer. Don't hold back. Anything is possible, but you must first go through the process of visualizing your adventure before it can happen.

No matter what you face on the road ahead you don't need to do anything out of the ordinary today except believe in yourself. Naturally, your faith isn't a guarantee of success; it's merely your entry ticket. Your upcoming journey could teach you how to be more practical than ever. Exhibiting healthy self-confidence is a good start, but you'll still have to apply yourself to succeed.

You're ready to harness your creativity and make it work to your advantage. However, this is not just a one-day project; it could be your main focus for months to come. Even if you are waiting for a more opportune time to put your lofty plans into motion, at least solidify your dreams today. Any idea that receives your current approval is likely worth pursuing to see where it leads.

You are usually on the move, yet paradoxically, it seems as if you make more progress today by staying in one place. The irony is you must sink deeper into your emotions to gain the knowledge that you seek. Possibilities may open up later in the month if you are willing to fulfill your current obligations now. However, it's crucial to take time and explore the emotional origins of your restlessness so you don't needlessly waste your valuable energy.

Be ready for someone to enter your life promising you fame, fortune or simply an opportunity to get ahead. Thankfully, you have the mental acuity now to ascertain if this is the real deal or just a passing pipe dream. Listen carefully to what's being said and then give yourself plenty of time to roll the potential around in your mind. Don't second guess your intuition today; just do what feels right.

Although you may think that waiting is a smart idea now, don't turn down an offer just because it doesn't seem good enough. Even the most amazing opportunities won't shock and awe you with their potential today; nevertheless, they still could be very promising. Make no mistake; you will have to work harder than you think to get the results you want. Luckily, the outcome should be well worth your effort if your heart is in the right place.

Although you long for a more relaxing schedule today, your efforts may be rewarded beyond your expectations. You might not be able to recognize the upside of a current opportunity because Mercury Retrograde -- which ends tomorrow -- limits your ability to see what's around the corner. However, putting your shoulder to the wheel is still your smartest strategy. Thankfully, you can also have some fun in the process. Remember, the more you enjoy yourself along the way, the better your chances for success.

You may feel a distinct contrast between doing what you know needs to be done today and your desire to pass the time lost in pleasant daydreams. Being aware of this dilemma is the first step, but you must remind yourself more than once that this is no time for escapist behavior. You have important foundational work that's best started now and procrastinating could make for tougher going later on.

You are all about keeping to yourself today, unless you're required to interact with others to fulfill a previous commitment. It's not that you are a loner; it's just that you have important things to do now that can positively impact your future and you don't want to be distracted by unnecessary noise. Spend time prioritizing old goals or creating new ones. Following your dreams feeds your soul and rejuvenates your entire being.

Honoring your goals in life is a smart idea today, whether or not they are part of your practical career plan. It's best to widen your visions of the future because a singular focus on getting ahead can have a negative impact on your personal life. Public recognition is something that you want, but it's not enough to just fulfill your dreams. Make time to cherish the friendships and intimate relationships that enrich your journey along the road to success.

Opportunities may fall out of the sky today, yet you could easily miss them unless you are looking up. If you are absolutely certain about your current long-term goals, you might not recognize other possibilities that drop into your lap. However, this doesn't suggest you should be any less focused on the work at hand. It only means that widening your horizons can be an act of courage that pays off down the road.

It might appear as if you've lost interest in your goals today, but this is certainly not the case. It's just that you're in the process of redefining what's most important in your life and it may differ from other people's fixed assumptions. For example, instead of climbing the ladder at work, you might be more concerned with pursuing your personal or spiritual growth. Luckily, extracurricular explorations at this time can ultimately increase your earning power in the future to give you the best of both worlds.

You could be ready to surrender if you are in a standoff with someone at work. However, backing down is not advisable today; it's smarter to persistently express what's in your heart. While it's true that compromise usually works best, others will likely come around to your point of view if your intentions are sincere. Don't settle for receiving the short end of the stick. Hang on to your dreams; cultivating patience makes more sense now than giving up too soon.

No matter how many projects you're considering, it's now time to stop thinking and to start doing something about one of them. Your energy is at peak efficiency and it would be to your benefit if you make the most of your day. Just remember that you still can overdo it by taking on too much. Create a manageable plan and stick to it. Establishing a steady pace today is wiser than trying to do everything at once.

This is a great time to enjoy yourself, so let the good times roll. Just remember that if they are rolling downhill, circumstances will continue to gather speed and you may not be able to stop things as easily as you wish. The problem is that it's tricky to determine your limits now. Thankfully, you can rely on someone you trust to be your adviser since others could provide the objectivity that you currently lack.

You may become so enthused now that you are ready to say yes to nearly anything. Fortunately, Mercury's direct turn today increases your ability to deliver on a promise. However, you might inadvertently deceive yourself if you don't take enough time to consciously separate the facts from the fantasies. This doesn't mean that you should say no. Just leave yourself an escape route so you can bail if necessary. And whatever you do, don't wait until it's too late to call it quits.

Although your progress has been impeded by obstacles that get in your way, it's time to face the lingering issues and overcome the internal resistance. You're serious about reaching your goals, but you're also dreaming about the good times ahead. However, it's not your style to go off and enjoy yourself while you are still concerned about something else. Thankfully, handling your responsibilities in the present moment allows you to relax later on.

There are two conflicting voices in your head, giving very different advice today. One is telling you that all is well. Good times are yours and you should seize the opportunity to indulge your fantasies. However, the other voice is warning you that pursuing pleasure is not an intelligent option now. You have work to do and there's no time like the present. Your best strategy is to create a middle path; balancing your need to be responsible with your current desire to escape is your unique formula for success.

Opportunities are promising today as your ruling planet Mercury turns direct, but reaching a goal still requires a high level of concentration and follow-through. Even if you envision problems ahead, you'll probably take your chances and go for it anyhow. Just make sure you aren't missing any important details. You can inflate the potential if you don't keep your feet on the ground. A little practicality now contributes toward your future success.

Your expectations are inflated, but the day might not unfold according to your plan. Thankfully, your disappointment won't last for long if a close friend or partner lets you down today. Having a flexible attitude allows you to accommodate changes in your schedule by modifying your agenda accordingly. Although you are in an agreeable mood, it may be hard to get motivated now. Luckily, your easygoing approach can rub off on those around you, creating a supportive atmosphere for all involved.

You initially set out to apply your energy toward the big ideas you have for the day, but everything seems to move at a slower pace than you planned. If you can't accept a few delays with a sense of humor, your frustration could get in the way of your pleasure. Fortunately, simply acknowledging that you might not get everything finished today can be enough to ease the pressure and put a positive spin on all that you do.

It's difficult to constrain your excitement today, especially as the events of the day begin to unfold. You may have excellent intentions, but still grow restless until you finally allow yourself to partake in some indulgences you normally might avoid. Don't waste time with self-criticism if you cannot live up to your ideals. Navigate away from the shadows the best you can now, and stay on the sunny side of the street.

Hard work pays off today, especially if your common sense guides you along the most efficient path. Think about where you want to be and make a concrete plan to reach your destination. Just remember there's no hurry, so start off slowly to set a sustainable pace. You'll gain steam and speed as you move along, so you'll be well on your way by the end of the day.

Finding the physical energy that's necessary to complete your chores will be the least of your problems today, since chances are that you'll have more stamina in reserve to do whatever you set your mind on. Although you are about as sensible and stable as ever, your attention can still wander off into fantasy-land if you let it. Apply yourself in the real world and real rewards will follow.

You are building a bridge to your dreams step by step. Although the floor beneath your feet isn't as stable as you wish, the foundation is probably strong enough to support you. You are inflating your vision of today's potential like a child blows up a balloon. Unfortunately, it's nearly impossible to know where the limits are now. You might not be able to find satisfaction if you always believe the solution is right around the next corner. Sometimes happiness can be found in the present moment.

It's time to fulfill your domestic obligations or professional responsibilities and, if you do your job well, significant rewards are yours. The point is that you must earn them the good old-fashioned way with determination and hard work. It may be tempting to take a shortcut now, but this tactic will only delay your success. However, if you do what is required, good news could be waiting just around the next corner. In the meantime, honoring your commitments leaves you with a lasting feeling of personal satisfaction.

Even if you're deeply involved with family issues now, you might have to adopt a more cautious approach to what's going on at home. At first, it seems like you're choosing the easy way out but this strategy only buys you time, not answers. Eventually you have to take a stand for your beliefs. Nevertheless, it's still useful to remember that petty conflicts are not worth feeding with negativity. Rather than acting on your fears, visualize the best possible outcome for all involved and then strive to make it happen.

You may wake up on the wrong side of the bed today, thinking about all the responsibilities being piled upon you. There's no need to be silent; speak up if you don't think you should be doing what's being asked of you now. But don't do the work begrudgingly and then whine about it later. Instead, find a project that makes your heart sing. Doing something you love elevates your self-esteem and is ultimately good for those around you, too.

Feeling stress from a relationship has you questioning your own motives today, along with everything else. You don't know what to say in order to delay an emotionally disruptive interaction but nearly any action is likely better than doing nothing at all. Don't waste energy dancing with self-doubt; it's simply not productive. Instead, use your time to isolate what matters to you before stating your position and then doing what it takes to defend it.

You're slightly annoyed today because you feel as if you should be working on something even if you don't know exactly what it is. Thankfully, your dilemma might not even be noticeable to others, but it still can add frustration to your day. An obvious solution is to just jump in and get busy; start by crossing some of the lingering items off your to-do list one at a time. Once your adrenaline kicks in, you'll quickly develop a better idea of how you want to spend your time.

You are quite aware of your social obligations now and you are resigned to fulfill them, no matter what it takes. This determination may bring up familiar issues about your need to meet the expectations of others and how this can get in the way of your own personal satisfaction. But the good news is that you are on a sensible track to take care of unfinished business. Fortunately, staying focused early in the day leaves you time to pursue your own interests later on.

Applying your energy toward projects around the house is nurturing for your soul today. However, frustration might set in if the good times seem to be a step or two away. Nevertheless, a pragmatic approach makes the most sense now; there are things to be done and you're the one to do them. Acknowledging the feelings that surface while fulfilling your responsibilities is empowering. Ultimately, you can enjoy yourself if you remain conscious about the choices you make throughout the entire day.

You have places to go and people to see now that the ambitious Capricorn Moon is moving through your 3rd House of Distractions. Unfortunately, your calendar may be so full that you don't get to do what you want. Instead of keeping your desires to yourself, share them with those around you. It's difficult to go out on a limb and talk about you own needs when others are relying on you. However, being honest about your wishes is a healthier strategy now than denying your feelings to meet everyone else's expectations.

You are so smooth at justifying your decisions today that others might think your actions are based upon your strong personal values. You're adept at keeping your feelings hidden now, making it nearly impossible for anyone to see your real motives. However, your current choices are probably determined by your emotional needs rather than core beliefs or ethical judgments. There's no need to waste energy covering up what's in your heart. Fortunately, telling the truth can actually set you free.

It's a mixed blessing when the Moon activates your sign for a couple of days. Normally, the evocative Moon draws you toward your emotions. However, you may be keeping your feelings to yourself now. Try to hold steady in the practical world instead of letting your fluctuating moods get the upper hand. If you must express what's in your heart, take your time. A thoughtful disclosure can positively impact your most significant relationships.

Almost anything that isn't out in the open now can be the source of great stress. For example, someone may be creating trouble behind your back to block your forward movement. The smartest move is to expose whatever is hidden so everyone can see what's actually going on. However, it's not wise to force an issue yet because you might not have all the facts at your disposal. It's best to play the waiting game until others come to the same realization; in the meantime, prepare to swing into action on a moment's notice.

You may be quite creative today, but it's challenging to locate an outlet for your bursts of spontaneous expression. Fortunately, you can reveal your current enthusiasm by sharing what's in your heart. However, you might feel external resistance to what you're trying to express. Cool your heels if you must, but don't blame your inhibitions on anyone else. Taking full responsibility for your self-restraint places you in the driver's seat where you belong.

The energy may feel somewhat out of control for you today as your creative juices rise to the surface. Your excitement is irrepressible, and with the Aquarius Full Moon tugging on your 5th House of Love, you're right on the edge of falling into the passion pit. Now, if this good news was the only news, you would be all set. But it's not. There is more going on now than meets the heart. Watch your step -- exercising caution is more than just a good idea -- it's a necessity.

If you stubbornly believe that your strategy at work is set in stone, old concerns may come back today with a twist. Someone didn't tell you everything and now that the Aquarius Full Moon is in your 10th House of Public Life, it's time to spill the beans. Full disclosure might be upsetting at first, but everyone will feel better once it's all out in the open. Sharing your truth inspires others to do the same.

The Aquarius Full Moon falls in your 9th House of Big Ideas, breaking your communication channels wide open. Unfortunately, this expansive energy can be a mixed blessing, for you pick up all kinds of static along with the important data you need in order to make your decisions. There may be some confusing signals from others along the way, so use whatever navigation methods work best to keep tabs on reality. Exploring all your options gives you more choices down the road.

You Crabs are more connected to the lunar rhythms than others, and as such can really feel the power of today's Aquarius Full Moon as it floods your 8th House of Intimacy. Let the emotional tides surge with swells of unexpected intensity, but remember that you don't have to react to every passing mood. If you must express something, do it and then let go of it right away. Too much attachment to your desires now brings complexity to an otherwise beautifully simple relationship.

The Aquarius Full Moon is especially significant since it stimulates your 7th House of Relationships. This alignment pulls your sense of personal and romantic love right out of your heart and into the world around you. The radiant Sun shifts into your proud sign today, intensifying your reactions to the drama of someone close to you. As difficult as it may be now, stay close while allowing him or her enough room to grow. Although your first instinct might be to run, keep in mind that your feelings will quiet down in just a few days.

You are in touch with a deep urge to seek out new meaning to your life, but your outer world may seem shallow and uninspired when compared to what surges forth from your subconscious. Don't be afraid of what comes to the surface during routine conversations now that the Aquarius Full Moon lands in your 6th House of Work. You are not required to say out loud what you observe on the inside. But it's best to listen to your heart while sweet Venus is visiting your sign.

You may be able to make some real progress on accomplishing your career goals these days. In fact, recognition might be coming your way on both the professional and personal front now that the Aquarius Full Moon shines in your 5th House of Love and Creativity. You're attracting positive vibrations as even the most conventional experiences light up your emotional sky with fireworks. Bask in the limelight and enjoy these next few days without necessarily making any long-term plans.

It's essential to express your concerns now as this Aquarius Full Moon illuminates your 4th House of Emotional Security. You may be upset by something that just isn't very important in the long run. However, don't suppress your fears; it's crucial to pay attention to all your mood changes now. If you slip into denial, there might be negative fallout on your performance in the workplace. Don't take your anger out on someone nearby. Examine what is motivating your feelings and deal with the source rather than the symptoms.

The Aquarius Full Moon emphasizes your 3rd House of Communication, inspiring you to write that email or make the phone call you have been putting off. Your reaching out has a better chance of having the impact you desire today. You can shine now, but your intensity could overwhelm others -- and they might not be able to absorb all that you have to say. Take it slowly; allow everyone enough time to process your words and to respond to them before going on to what's next.

You're able to accomplish quite a bit once you set your mind to it. You continue riding high on the surges of energy and yet your feet are planted squarely on the ground. Be careful that you don't exhaust your resources now that the Aquarius Full Moon activates your 2nd House of Net Worth. Take the necessary time to attend to the basics of your health and be sure to get enough sleep. You can make the most of this time by conserving your available resources while using them as efficiently as possible.

Today's Full Moon lights up your sign, flooding into every aspect of your waking life. It's as if your subconscious mind is at high tide. The Moon works primarily in the dream realms, but now its influence overflows into the real world. Welcome the emotional storms that can clear the air. Let the waters wash the beaches as you ride upon larger-than-life waves while they last. Thankfully, you'll have time to assimilate your experience when the intensity begins to dissipate tomorrow.

You may believe that today is your last chance to finish an old project as the Aquarius Full Moon rattles your 12th House of Endings. However, you might just be experiencing another illusion; time is not coming to an end. Nevertheless, it feels overwhelming as you see how much there is for you to do with so little time to get it all completed. Close your eyes and take a few long and slow deep breaths. Then, open them and return to work. Do this frequently during the day and you'll be surprised at how much you can accomplish.

You might be quite distracted from the emotional issues that have been building over the last few weeks. There is much to say, but you can't bring yourself to say it. Lately, you are more concerned about what others think of you, so you often change the subject to something less threatening. Get together with trusted friends and share what's weighing on your heart. Receiving their support will be well worth the risk of revealing your feelings. Nothing ventured; nothing gained.

You want to be acknowledged for your unflappable behavior, but even if people say wonderful things about you now, you might not be open to what you are hearing. It's important to be actively engaged with those around you; if praise comes your way, smile and say thank you. Don't deflect the positive support because of your temporary insecurity or low self-esteem. On the other hand, don't go fishing for compliments; they mean a lot more when they're unsolicited. Be the friend you want to have and focus your attention on the happiness of others.

New opportunities create alternatives today as you think about all the future possibilities waiting for you. Even if you're still feeling stressed out, the potential for change is improving day by day. But don't expect circumstances to suddenly transform. Rather, the dreams you hold on to now will begin to take shape gradually. Think big, but try not to be too disappointed if everything takes some time yet to manifest. Remember, Rome wasn't built in a day.

You may go through a weird phase this week as you attempt to distance yourself from your feelings in order to cope with what's happening. Although this sounds difficult, gaining perspective can be quite helpful. Relationships might be easier than they have been for a while, since your current emotional detachment enables you to enjoy yourself without being overwhelmed. Be aware of your desires, but don't spread them out on the table for others to see. Give yourself time to sort things out before you share them with anyone else.

You roar with all the intent of the Lion or Lioness, but others may react to you now in ways you don't expect. The high tension between your will and the emotional response that you elicit today might anger you if you can't have your way. But don't follow your temptation to turn this into a full-blown argument. If you do, there won't be a winner. Call on your inner patience today because you'll most likely achieve your goals if you can wait long enough for others to come around to your point of view.

Your ideas may be worth more than anyone perceives, but it's difficult to get your concepts across at this time. If you are misinterpreted, your tendency now is to inflate your cleverness in an attempt to convince others of your intellectual merit. But the more you say, the less they understand. Loosening the reins of control prevents problems from developing later on. Your best tactic is to communicate as little as possible and let the day take its own course, without feeling the need to control where it leads.

You have lots of energy today to put toward creating enjoyment for you and those around you. You could choose to have a party since that would fulfill your need for spending time with your friends in a spontaneous manner. Also, your creative juices are flowing, so if there's a project you've been putting off, today is the day to get it off the ground. He who hesitates is lost.

Processing your emotions may be tricky if it seems that you have nowhere to go with your feelings. If you express them honestly, you won't improve your current situation. However, if you try to bury them, you'll only make matters even worse. Thankfully, there's an easy solution; simply steer clear of blame. Acknowledge what you're feeling, but don't attempt to describe the cause. If you stay in the present moment and remember to be kind, then a difficult situation can magically transform into a beautiful encounter.

Today has all the earmarks of a highly busy day, complete with unusual social encounters. Although you may be looking for meaning as much as you are seeking a good time, the emphasis is on turning your day into an adventure. Of course, you're nearly always up for a good adventure. However, problems arise if you make too much out of a minor event. If you're going to the beach for a swim, don't try to turn it into a Caribbean pleasure cruise.

Even if the emotional turmoil has started to calm down, you still might be embroiled in a bit of a power struggle that upsets you. Unfortunately, you can easily express your frustration at the wrong target, which doesn't necessarily help you to regain your sense of balance. Instead of focusing on a current situation, look ahead to next week and do whatever you need in order to carry out your long-term commitments. Keeping your eyes on the future gives you the confidence motivation to successfully handle the current situation.

A close family member or a good friend may be the source of temporary trouble for you now. You feel like you haven't done anything wrong, but someone still could get angry with you for no apparent reason. You might even see the black cloud coming and try to stop the oncoming storm, but to no avail. Don't take it all too seriously, for the drama seems so much more important than it really is. Let the emotional barrage roll off you like water off a duck's back. No worries; the sun will come out tomorrow.

You can drift off into your own fantasy-land these days, but escape might not be such a bad thing now. Others get on your case and try to make you see the folly of your ways but you know there's treasure to be discovered. Thankfully, there is no harm from taking your little mental holiday as long as you remember the difference between reality and your imagination. Embark on your journey, but make certain you're back in time to do your chores.

You want to keep your thoughts in order today, but it becomes more challenging to stick to the facts as the day proceeds. Ironically, you're quite capable of starting with unformed complex concepts and transforming them into concrete ideas. However, you must make an effort to write your thoughts down or they will vanish into the past. Thankfully, you can easily increase your chances of success now by focusing a little extra attention on the details.

You might believe that you know what's going on in a relationship now, but nothing is exactly as it seems. Perhaps you have gone out of your way to express deep feelings over the past few days. Although you may be upbeat about your disclosure, you could be purposely ignoring a significant piece of the puzzle. Make time today to regroup, check your facts and then start reconstructing from the ground up. Even if sorting everything out takes a little longer, getting it right is worth the effort.

When your phone rings today you might find a conundrum on the line. Even if it seems impossible, it's your future calling you for a little chat. Don't be afraid of having a serious conversation with an as yet unrealized version of yourself that may take months to manifest. Imagine what you could accomplish by checking in with an older and wiser you. Whatever you dream about now can become real over time with the proper commitment and hard work.

Your words today are more important than usual because they accurately reflect what's in your heart. Even your quietest voice brings an important perspective to the table that others will appreciate learning about now, even if they don't completely agree with you. Consider what kind of impact you want to have and then craft your message carefully. It's time to be heard and acknowledged for the amazing person you are.

Your mental clarity returns just in the nick of time for you to take decisive action today. Even if you are still slightly confused, you have sense enough to either accept what you are being told or to reject it outright. Trust your own gut while the planets are working on your behalf. But don't forget to nurture the seeds of your current thoughts over the days ahead as they mature into your unfolding future.

Your mind is busy with important work now as you integrate developing values with the fundamental structures of your life. You are in a phase of re-analyzing your emotions, yet you might not be able to find the right words to describe exactly what you are experiencing. Moving ahead in small realistic increments is better today than acting on unbridled enthusiasm. Take it step by step and others will get enough of the picture to matter.

Although you're on the edge of an expansive period in your life, today is best devoted to taking care of practical details in the present moment. Your mission is to figure out the best ways to communicate your creative ideas. You don't want anyone to bail just because they think you've gone too far, too fast. You'll have to be realistic enough in your thinking now to bring others along for the ride or else your efforts could go to waste. Demonstrate your competence by bringing your vision down to earth first before saying a word.

Your strength today comes from carefully thinking through all the details surrounding an important issue that may be affecting more people than just you. Although you're naturally intrigued by the complexity, you're only searching for the simplest solution now. A complicated situation draws out a premature answer to your current question. Nevertheless, speak your mind carefully and remain flexible in your attitude. Stick with the facts as you know them while remaining open to new information as it comes along.

Serious and meaningful conversations are on your agenda today, but even if you're ready to talk, your partner may not be so inclined. Or perhaps your friends don't agree with your opinions and you are reticent to express all that you feel. It's really not necessary to push any one specific issue, even if it seems urgent. Stay in logical realms and stick to practical applications. You can always come back and talk about what's on your mind in a day or two when people are more receptive and willing to listen.

You may feel as if the same set of issues returns again and again. But this time you're ready to share what you have been withholding for too long. However, you aren't interested in just rambling on and on to hear yourself talk. You believe it's your job to keep things on the straight and narrow. Remain focused on your internal process, no matter what you choose to reveal. Just remember to be kind as you tell it like it is. Your delivery is almost as important as your message.

You might be very excited about a project or a relationship now, but it's time to slow down the growth process so you can sustain the experience. Naturally, you want to share your enthusiasm, but it's important that you don't oversell anyone on your ideas. Others may not be as jazzed about your plans at first. If they are grounded in reality, people will come around in time. However, if the whole thing turns out to be less significant than you expected, you'll be glad that you didn't push too hard.

You want everyone to listen to your ideas and to accept what you say now as the truth. However, you might feel like the "Little Boy Who Cried Wolf." Nevertheless, this time you're quite certain that your point of view is valid enough to defend. Be brave and consider partnership issues from an enlightened perspective. Your radical approach could give your confidence an extra boost. Stay present with your feelings without dramatizing them today and you just may receive the respect and recognition you desire.

You're riding on a high horse today and you might not be willing to heed the advice of anyone else. Unfortunately, you could be your own worst enemy if you also forget to listen to your heart. If you are absolutely certain about your recent choices, it may be difficult to even consider someone's negative feelings simmering beneath the surface now. Slow down just enough to hear your inner voice since it's healthier to integrate emotions as they arise. Once you're in sync with yourself it's easier to be more mindful of others.

You have something important to get off your chest today. Fortunately, a little compassion will go a long way when it comes to sharing your thoughts. It's not that you are being particularly insensitive, but your feelings are inflated and you may be so emphatic in your expression that others can't understand what you are trying to say. Step back and take a few breaths before flying off the handle. The good news is that speaking your truth will work out for the best if you remember that everyone is ultimately on the same team.

Pay close attention to your pocketbook, for your inclination now is toward extravagance. The problem is that you may feel so confident that everything appears to be coming up roses. But be careful ... you can tend toward overspending what you have or over-committing what you do not have. If you remember to respect your limits and apply your enthusiasm to the details, you will end up in a much better financial position. A penny saved is a penny earned.

Turning up the volume on your own intuitive voice today prevents you from responding too quickly to the actions of others. It may feel like you've been treading water recently, without making much progress. You are drawing your personal power from a deep well today, and others can't help but stand up and take notice. Quite a lot of change is being packed into a short amount of time these days. Yesterday, you weren't sure about a relationship. Today, you are raring to go and there is no holding you back. It may seem as if all is well on the home front. However, there could be a problem now stemming from confusion over relationship dynamics. Although you might be sure of yourself much of the time, you're not feeling so confident now. It's challenging to remain clear about your intentions when the world seems enchanted. Your current optimism keeps slipping out of your grasp like a greased watermelon. One moment, you're absolutely sure your goals are within reach. You may think you know what you want and how you are going to get it, but this certainty isn't what you are projecting now. Others are currently experiencing a softer and gentler side of you. Your fears can stand in the way of your current success if you don't bring them out into the open. You may fly so high now that you annoy someone who feels the need to bring you down a notch. Be careful because there are deep psychological energies at work. Intensity is your friend today -- whether you want it in your life or not. You may wish that you could lighten up and take things less seriously, but your emotions are what they are. There may be unpleasant tension as your motives clash with someone else's plans today. Relationships take top priority today, and thankfully, they can bring emotional rewards beyond your wildest expectations. Even an interaction with a coworker may lead to surprising fulfillment. Think fast and act accordingly so you can have your cake and eat it safely.

It's time to let go of a desire that you're still holding close, and you'll feel an amazing rush of independence once you do. However, you might have to logically defend your plan against an unexpected attack today. This confrontation is exacerbated because you think symbolically yet must communicate rationally. Intellectual analysis won't get you through this dilemma. Aim with your heart, instead.

You may be so concerned with your shortcomings today that your self-doubt negatively impacts your ability to have fun. Surprisingly, you might not even be all that interested in joining the party now. Don't waste time worrying about anyone else's judgments. Just be as clear as possible about your boundaries when you tell your friends that you would rather stay home, catch up on your rest and recharge your batteries. Nurturing yourself first will enable you to feel more generous to others later on.

You have some important personal business to handle today, but you don't necessarily want everyone to know about it. Unfortunately, it's difficult to make enough time for yourself because you're probably busier than you prefer now, and you cannot change your schedule until you meet your obligations. Do the best to deliver what you promise, but don't be a casualty of your own blind optimism. Be realistic when discussing what you can and can't do, but remember to allocate resources for your needs, too.

It may feel like it's past time for things to settle down; nevertheless, it's too soon to breathe a sigh of relief because there are still rough waters to navigate today. Reshuffle your priorities to match your heart's wishes, and clearly communicate your needs to those around you now. If you don't at first succeed, make a few adjustments and try again. You might not receive the support you want right away, but your gentle persistence and consistent effort should pay off by next week.

It may seem that others know something about you that you thought was a secret, which might make you feel very vulnerable. Nevertheless, it's impossible to hide within your shell once you have already been seen. Come clean and share your truth with someone you trust. Thankfully, those who respect you won't be surprised by your story, even if you're a bit embarrassed. Ultimately, being honest will draw the ones you love even closer to you.

A personal relationship may require a bit of repair work now, but unfortunately, knowing what went wrong is not the same as being able to fix it. Thankfully, your good intentions can go a long way today toward healing a rift. But don't be hard on yourself if you can't live up to your own grandiose expectations. You are a human, not a god. Focus on radiating love, without needing to know where it will take you.

You may spend a lot of time today modifying your goals and trying to figure out a way to create the life of your dreams. Even if you're growing tired of mentally living in the future, nostalgia isn't a healthy practice, either. Stop worrying about yesterday and planning for tomorrow; bring your attention back to the here-and-now. Your current happiness is dependent on staying in the present moment and appreciating all the wonder around you.

Maintaining your objectivity can be challenging today while other people pull on your heartstrings and push your emotional buttons. Ironically, you think it's wise to avoid intimate interactions that could reveal your emotional vulnerability now. However, your feelings are not ruled by reason, so allow yourself to experience the pleasure and pain of irrational passion. Your extreme reactions will eventually moderate, leaving behind a memorable experience.

The distant horizons are calling you now that several planets are visiting your 9th House of Faraway Places. However, your view of the future is quite different from what you expected because everything is so much clearer today. Nevertheless, this can be tricky territory to navigate, since it's not ultimately about anything tangible in your external world. You are the sole creator of your fantasies, and it's still up to you to figure out how to make them come true.

You may not be very comfortable these days with several planets in Cancer lingering in your emotionally complex 8th House of Intimacy.
