You might choose to escape by engaging in competitive sports, participating in exciting outdoor activities or simply heading out on an adventure to parts unknown. Nevertheless, you have a different kind of excitement waiting for you now if you choose to share your feelings with someone special. Don't let your fears prevent you from discovering the treasures of love.

A friend may need your assistance today or, at least, that's how it appears on the surface. But you're hesitant to rescue an underdog unless you can clearly rationalize your actions. Although you are far from cold-hearted, your practicality might stand in the way of a kinder and gentler expression of love. Sometimes there are intangible rewards for helping others that are well worth your altruistic efforts. The person giving is often the one who ends up receiving the most.

It's challenging to feel at ease today because it seems as if someone with a big ego is blocking your desire to just be your authentic self. Your current wariness has nothing to do with paranoia; you simply prefer to avoid the unnecessary disappointment that you might experience if you lower your protective walls too fast. Don't do anything that increases your level of stress. Just follow wherever your heart leads you now without worrying about anyone else.

You might be able to temporarily set aside your responsibilities today, even if they continue to pile up in your absence. You know what others want without a word being said; your psychic powers are quite strong now and could get in the way of your attempts to fit in. Put your extraordinary abilities to work by helping someone who can benefit from your compassionate assistance. Paradoxically, you will get the best possible results if you're not overly attached to the outcome or the need to be correct.

Sparks are flying today as romantic Venus harmonizes with sexy Mars. However, you might not have much time for pleasure because you can become so distracted by one little thing after another that you run around all day without accomplishing a lot. Be vigilant of your boundaries now. And remember that there's no need to get involved in every situation you encounter unless it really does concern you. Narrowing your focus creates extra time for some lighthearted fun and games.

You may be mentally hyperactive today without any way to organize your thoughts. However, you could actually enjoy the buzz as excitable Mars supports your key planet Venus. Communicating and connecting are on the top of your agenda. If you have writing to do or telephone calls to make, get busy while the cosmic energy is working in your favor. You might not feel as rested as you wish, but all your interactions can leave you with a satisfying feeling of accomplishment.

It's challenging to know what you want to do today now that the reflective Moon is back in your sign. You are riding waves of feelings that keep shifting; just as you begin to relax into a new flow, your mood changes again. Resist any temptations to justify your fleeting emotions. Consciously moving beyond words enables you to find comfort in the irrational realms of your heart.

It may be impossible to know what's really happening in a relationship now. You might believe you have all the facts, but you're probably still missing a piece of critical information. Meanwhile, your unsettled feelings and fluctuating needs distract you from enjoying what you already have. Making time for meditation and contemplation could be your most sensible short-term strategy until you figure out what your heart truly wants.

There are important choices to be made today. You could make excellent progress in your personal life; however, you might blow it and get nowhere at all. How this current relationship dynamic plays out is dependent upon the amount of attention you give to the needs of others. You have the ability now to roll with the incoming emotional waves. Loosen control on those things that won't matter in the long run. Flexibility on your part is the key to maximizing your potential.

Your sharp thinking is now the source of recognition at work. Impetuous Mars enhances your current charm but you may lose efficiency today by acting before you think. Nevertheless, everyone wants to be on your side, even if you don't know which side you're actually on. Instead of depending on your analytical powers to set a course of action, just go with what's in your gut. Your current ability to be spontaneous is your secret ace in the hole.

You are lifted on the wings of thought today and can soar into the upper reaches of the sky in your imagination. You may feel freer than you have felt in a long time. Fortunately, action-hero Mars is supporting your key planet Venus, empowering you to reach for your goals. Nevertheless, it pays to be careful. You can fly so high you lose perspective and forget your destination. Relying on your strength to create balance increases your chances for success.

You have important things to do today, but too many social engagements can be so distracting that you don't get to sink into the juicier realms of hidden emotions. The emphasis is on the real world now, even though your preference is often for the inner realms. Although there is some dissatisfaction with this outer orientation, you're willing to put up with it in order to make connections that are advantageous to your long-term aspirations.

Relationship issues take center stage now that the flirty Gemini Moon occupies your 7th House of Companions. Luckily, interactions with others are running pretty smoothly, since you have an extra dose of charm working in your favor. Just don't overdo it or you'll pay the price later. It won't be the end of the world if you say too much or overstay your welcome, but you might embarrass yourself enough to make you think twice next time.

A number of little irritating events might happen at work today but thankfully, none of them is likely to be significant. It's like having mosquitos follow you around so you can't lower your defenses all the way. You must pay attention to the annoying hums or you'll have to deal with the larger irritation of itchy bites. Your best strategy now is to focus your attention on circumstances as they unfold without trying to solve the larger issues.

You're in a joyful mood today, even if you cannot explain why. However, your interactions are not without conflict, especially if you let irrational feelings interfere with a clearly defined relationship at work. Sparks can fly, but they may quickly shift the energy by relieving the tension. Even if you feel trapped, find a way to release your pent-up energy through some sort of physical activity. You'll feel even better if you let your inner child out to play.

You're a bit on edge today, but whatever discomfort you are experiencing isn't enough to push you into making a life-changing decision. You might get into an emotional tussle with a friend or lover who is overly critical of you. Or a memory of an old wound could provoke you to start an unnecessary conflict with someone else. Either way, it's helpful to blow off some steam prior to dealing with whatever is really bothering you. Being kind to others starts with being kind to yourself.

Your inner warrior rises to the occasion now if you believe you must step in and defend a close friend or family member. Ironically, you may restrain yourself until the right moment comes along for you to express your feelings. Still, your response is rather tentative at first, but a slow start is fine as long as you increase the intensity without doing anything overly dramatic. Although you might not relax much today, avoiding extremes conserves your energy and maximizes your power.

You are determined to say what's on your mind now, but you may still be hesitant to speak up. You don't want to rush into any conversation where you could end up being on the wrong side of the debate. Wasting words is not your style and in fact, you might not be very verbose at all today. Nevertheless, communication will make or break your day, so choose the right words to have the desired impact. Ultimately, others will appreciate you  caring enough to make the first overture.

Naturally, you don't like falling short of your dreams, but it's all too easy now to use that as an excuse to lower your expectations. Ironically, your biggest problem is your current tendency to judge your work too harshly. Give yourself a break by suspending self-criticism for a day or two. Thankfully, it will be easier to make progress toward your goals once your confidence begins to return. In the meantime, make a list of your assets rather than focusing on your liabilities.

You would like to be taken more seriously now that the Moon is back in your contemplative sign. You know exactly what you are feeling today and you want others to know, too. Naturally, this means that you will have to tell them, for contrary to your belief they are not able to read your mind. Go ahead and speak your piece while remaining true to your heart. Even if it's challenging to get the conversational ball rolling, once started it will naturally gain momentum on its own.

There's quite a lot you're not saying, but your silence may stem more from what you don't know now than anything you consciously withhold. This dynamic is unusual, for you are more often the type of person who makes it your business to know everything. But it's not your fault if something important is being hidden from you. Leave no stone un-turned as you search for the missing key to understanding the whole picture. But even if all the puzzle pieces don't fit yet, you can benefit from what you learn along the way.

Rest assured that current opportunities might lead you toward satisfaction if you're willing to take a chance. But nothing will happen overnight, even if your hopes are soaring. Instead of setting yourself up for potential disappointment by getting swept up in the excitement of the moment, make plans to reach your dreams at a more sensible pace. Slow and steady wins the race.

You take your social obligations quite seriously now; however, you also want to make certain that you are doing the right thing. A current project might not be going as smoothly as you wish, requiring more time than you originally planned. Nevertheless, don't overreact by canceling all your other activities today. Finding the proper balance between indulging in fun and concentrating on unfinished business is tricky. Just remember, there's no need to go to extreme measures; moderation is key to your success.

Trust your intuition, even if it runs counter to expectations today. The signals you are receiving from your body now can churn buried emotions until they float up into consciousness. It's important to acknowledge these feelings and treat them with the respect they deserve. Don't, however, make life-altering decisions based solely on them; instead, wait a few days until you have a better perspective on current events. Keep your mind open; time is on your side.

There may be no way to escape your deep and powerful feelings today. Intense passions seem to get in the way of the good times that you had imagined. Exploring the emotional issues can be fruitful, since you can't avoid them by entertaining yourself with temporary distractions. Thankfully, facing your fears could be the catalyst to help clear the deck of unnecessary negativity.

You could run into a stone wall today that stops you in your tracks. You might attempt to climb over the obstacle, relying on the Mountain Goat's firm footing. Fortunately, this setback is not a life-changing event. Don't exhaust yourself trying to make something happen right now. Temporarily accepting the current limitations doesn't mean defeat. You will overcome these challenges, but possibly not for another few days. Readjust your game plan and get ready to try again.

You're facing a dilemma that seems to be temporarily irresolvable, so don't judge yourself negatively if you can't find an answer yet. Beating yourself up is a waste of precious energy. For now, it may be wise to just walk away from the problem to give yourself a little more time to think. Wait until after Tuesday's New Moon before trying to come up with a viable solution.

Although the weekend is already in progress, you're still wondering when the fun will begin. Unfortunately, you may have responsibilities that still need your attention before you slip into a more relaxing groove. Of course, you must meet your obligations today, but remember that good times are not just about distractions. Reassess your priorities and set aside those chores that can wait. For now, a happier you is also a more productive you.

Controlling your feelings sounds like a sensible idea today, but it won't likely be a successful strategy. Naturally, it isn't wise to express everything because some of your emotions are better kept to yourself. You could land in a pile of trouble if you broadcast your wants and needs to everyone before considering the ramifications of your actions. However, you may be able to stretch the envelope a little further than usual as long as you don't go too far.

Although you may have an opportunity to do something exciting today, you're still likely to be responsible and show some self-restraint. Thankfully, you should have enough information to make your move as long as it doesn't upset family dynamics at home. You are smarter because of your recent experiences, but the window of opportunity is closing. If you don't put your newly gathered intelligence to work quickly, you could lose the chance forever.

An unexpected twist to today's events can add to your concerns about your future, but there isn't much to worry about if you are flexible about your current plans. Even if it feels like you are at an impasse, the changes you have been dreaming about could occur now without much resistance. Don't waste time analyzing all your options; just take a leap of faith. Your life is on the upswing, even it isn't unfolding exactly as you imagined. Embrace the unknown.

You are feeling your oats now and are more courageous than usual because you're fascinated by the idea of being different. You aren't all that worried about what everyone else says these days so unsolicited advice won't have as much impact on your current choices. This is the chance you've been waiting for; go ahead and be the non-conformist that you secretly want to be, even if it's just for a day.

Separating yourself from the pack is quite important today since the willful Sun in your sign harmonizes with eccentric Uranus. The same old routine is no longer appealing, prompting you to become more radical in your dreams. Be insistent about your new direction if you want to shake things up. Fortunately, if you share your plans with those you trust, you might be pleasantly surprised by their support. It's always good to have allies in your corner, even if you choose to travel this particular path alone.

You don't want to be overly reliant on anyone else because when things get serious, the other person might do a disappearing act. Ultimately, someone else's instability may be an acute reflection of your unwillingness to partake in an unhealthy relationship. Nevertheless, you really don't have to convince others to do your bidding now. Be the lightning instead of waiting to be struck by it.

It's tough to stick to your schedule now, for unexpected changes make it nearly impossible to carry through with your original plans. Nevertheless, avoid getting agitated by the things you cannot control. Let a few of your less important regular routines slip for a day or two. Once the cycle is broken, you should be able to put the pieces back together in a more constructive manner.

Change is in the air today, so stop trying to manage your life according to old rules and by following a preset agenda. It's possible that your plans may even fall apart because of your own whimsical moods. Nevertheless, putting together a playbook for the day is a wise strategy. Instead of only focusing on what you want, figure out a way to do what's best for all. Your innovative action now can improve the current circumstances more than you think.

Life is complicated now because there's a wide gulf between your need for emotional security and your desire for a new adventure. Your plans are being intensified by an anything-goes trine from irreverent Uranus to the Sun in your 9th House of Big Ideas. But don't be so overconfident that you take a foolish chance on something that's not important. Being creative is great, but not when you jeopardize the positive gains you recently made. Reach for the stars but keep your feet on the ground.

You may receive a cosmic wake-up call today that reminds you to include others in your latest scheme as shocking Uranus jolts the security-oriented Cancer Moon in your 7th House of Partners. Thankfully, swinging into action is easy because you don't have as many restraints operating in your life now. Go ahead and share your ideas, even if they aren't yet ready for prime time. Someone who respects you will see the potential in your plan and will likely jump in to support your endeavors.

You are adept at taking an innovative concept further than ever -- and, somehow you can get away with the craziest of ideas. Although friends and family might urge you to put your thoughts into action, they may want you to modify some of the details. However, accommodating someone else's concerns could actually weaken your plan. Ironically, the harder you work, the more distant your goals seem. But giving up would be a big mistake. Retreat just enough to alleviate the tension, take a few deep breaths and try again.

Today's energetic buzz may feel extremely exciting; your life is alive with surprises, yet you might not be so amused with all the uncertainty. You have had your share of unexpected twists and turns, and you're not looking for any more at this time. Fortunately, your natural resiliency should enable you to make the best of nearly any difficult situation. Be bold in your thinking and cautious in your execution.

You may feel panicky this morning if it seems like you missed your chance to express your feelings. You could even be singing the hesitation blues since you can't move forward now, yet you're not satisfied with any retreat scenario. However, your impulses might just be on a time delay today. Don't worry if you can't get enough traction to start something new; heading off in a different direction will likely have to wait until later when the Moon enters lively Leo. In the meantime, practice patience; your ultimate satisfaction will be worth the wait.

You have quite a bit to say about what's happening in your immediate environment, but you can't just blurt out your thoughts because of your hypersensitivity to those around you. However, you're not willing to compromise your ideas by sacrificing your position through negotiation. Although you prefer sticking to your plan and wearing down the opposition with your determination, a stubborn approach could backfire on you today. Ironically, you can come out ahead by adopting a flexible attitude.

Your key planet Mercury is in the spotlight today, creating mischief through a bait-and-switch trick. You think you're agreeing to one thing only to discover that you promised something else. Pay extra careful attention to all interactions now or you could end up in trouble. Rash decisions are certainly not a good idea. Contemplation helps you process your feelings so they don't get in the way of making healthy choices.

Your mind is abuzz with thoughtful Mercury traveling through your sign until August 8. Although your emotions are quite strong, you won't necessarily be very talkative. In fact, you may find it harder today to express yourself in words as you your feelings get lost in the translation. Don't worry about explaining your internal process. Instead, observe your reactions but keep them to yourself for now.

You're roaring with anticipation this morning, as if you were on the edge of something wonderful. However, you intuitively recognize that you can't just push your way into whatever is next. Instead, prepare yourself by putting your house in order. Fastidious mental housekeeping now helps to ensure your success over the days following tomorrow's Leo New Moon. Channel your enthusiasm into tying up as many loose ends as possible so you're ready to go.

Your imagination might get the best of you today, especially if you don't take the time to check out the validity of your feelings. Asking for feedback from your friends is a good place to start, but they may not be forthcoming with their responses. Be patient and give them the room to tell you what's on their minds. You can learn as much from what they don't say now as from what they do. Nevertheless, there's no need to worry about things that will never happen.

Your key planet Venus is entangled in a bit of strangeness today, drawing you close to the edges of reality. Fortunately, you have support from helpful colleagues and powerful business allies. You are appreciated by others now more than you may realize. Even if your friends rush to your rescue, they might forget to take the time to tell you how much they care about you. Don't fish for compliments or validation, or you could push away the very thing you are seeking.

Your mental antennae are fully extended now and you can pick up signals that originate from a parallel universe. A special evening allows you to see into your future, even if you aren't sure how you'll get there. Meticulous planning comes naturally to you these days. Singularly focus on what's important to you, for this can assure your success in most anything you initiate.

An uncharacteristic hesitancy may come over you today, preventing you from sharing what's in your heart. This is especially true if you are also feeling insecure about your most intimate relationships. You aren't as willing to risk rejection now, so you might quickly swallow your words before they leave your mouth. Don't judge yourself harshly for holding back. Trust your instincts; you'll know when it's time to say what needs to be said.

It feels as if someone in your life is holding out on you. There are significant things to be discussed, but you can't seem to get others to open up. Even if you can sense the frustration of your friends and associates, you might not have a lot of sympathy for them today. You want more facts; you need to know the truth and you don't want to guess any longer. There's no point in hitting your head against the wall. Allowing a few more days before you push for what you want improves your chances for success.

The Sun and the Moon activate your 7th House of Relationships now, but it's still challenging to clearly see what's going on. You might feel a bit disjointed emotionally, for it's tricky to know the best way to proceed when you cannot decide upon your destination. The truth is there's no reason to be in a hurry at all. Take your time and let the situation unfold before you commit yourself to any one direction. In the meantime, gather more information and listen to the constructive advice you receive from others.

You might feel a bit confused today from all the mixed planetary messages. On one hand, it seems as if your window of opportunity is rapidly closing. A domestic cycle is reaching its conclusion whether you are ready for this transformation or not. On the other hand, your anticipation of the potential creativity and love in your future tickles your imagination now. Stay with the paradox. Forcing a premature solution will only stop the magic in it tracks.

Your spontaneity is on the loose and your love life may be on the upswing with today's affectionate Leo New Moon falling in your 5th House of Romance. Things are cooking and all you have to do is stir the stew. But beware, for there are fears brewing in your own subconscious that can prevent you from enjoying the goodies that seem so close. Focus on the positive while rationally considering the alternatives.

It may be time to plan a party at home or head out on the town with close friends or family. Today's Leo New Moon lands in your 4th House of Domestic Conditions, but it isn't all about taking care of chores or responsibilities. This lunation is simply about experiencing pleasure with those you love the most. Although the fun and games don't have to happen today, at least start planning now so you can fully enjoy yourself during the days ahead.

It's a magical day when you believe that you can talk anyone into seeing things your way now that the demonstrative Leo New Moon activates your 3rd House of Communication. You're quite optimistic that you can get your message across, but your interactions may be clouded with confusion anyway. Don't be overly concerned with other people's reactions to your point of view. Decide what's most important for you, but there's no need to push too hard to bring an idea to fruition today. Go with the flow and trust the process.

Sometimes your peers don't appreciate your competence because you're so adept at supporting others. Thankfully, you can proudly strut your stuff without being too dramatic today. It feels natural to be in the spotlight now while the Leo New Moon resides in your 2nd House of Self-Worth. Don't shy away from the recognition you deserve when others appreciate the special magic you bring to the party.

Although you may be starting a new and exciting project now, building momentum still could take some time. This New Moon in your expressive sign inspires you to share your plans, which is the first step on your new journey. But don't pretend to have all the angles covered; there are still plenty of details to be ironed out. Maintaining your enthusiasm is the key to your success, so explore ways to sustain your energy without cooling down the heat of your passion.

Although many people take a break for the summer, this may be a very busy time of year for you. Today's Leo New Moon in your 12th House of Privacy suggests there's lots happening that's invisible to others -- so much that it makes you a bit anxious now. Avoid getting into conflicts with anyone for petty reasons. You can't afford to waste energy if you want to finish everything you start. Choose your battles carefully; save your fire for the things that really matter.

Your social calendar seems to be more important than anything else now that the outgoing Leo New Moon highlights your 11th House of Friends and Wishes, but your signals might be getting crossed. It's challenging to tell if your desires are grounded in reality or if they are just a product of your own fantasies. Nevertheless, it's not a good idea to isolate yourself. Even if you are unsure of your motives, let loose and have an enjoyable time.

You are receiving an energetic boost to your career today from the lively Leo New Moon in your 10th House of Public Life. Nevertheless, your job -- what you do to put bread on your table -- may remain unaltered. This New Moon impacts your place in the outer world. Although you might wish that you had more privacy, your responsibilities draw the spotlight toward you now. However, there's no need to make any immediate changes as long as you spend some time reassessing your long-term goals.

You are suddenly riding wild waves of optimism now as you look to your future. But even as you're feeling your Sagittarian oats with today's Leo New Moon in your 9th House of Big Ideas, you may also be hiding something that you don't want others to know. A seed of self-doubt could sour your plans, especially if others catch wind of it. Be discreet; keep your concerns to yourself for a while longer. Stay cool; it might take a couple of weeks to see how your ideas actually develop in the real world.

You like being in complete control of your life and the director of your destiny, but there are people who may hold some of the keys to your success. The Leo New Moon points to your 8th House of Shared Resources, indicating that you're better off working with someone else now. What makes the current situation tricky is that others might needlessly flaunt their power. Don't waste any energy fighting a display of insecurity. Instead, spend your time negotiating solid agreements to ensure success down the road.

The Leo New Moon in your 7th House of Companions suggests you might be feeling pressure to perform in a certain way today. A lover, spouse or partner is acting exceptionally nice, but you are certain that there is more going on than meets your eye. However, it's unlikely that anyone is scheming against you. It's just that you may be afraid to fully trust the good feelings that are floating around. There's no rush; respond only when your heart is ready.

You could feel like you're talking to the wall today when others don't seem interested in what you are doing. However, the Leo New Moon occupies your 6th House of Details, making it difficult for you to see the whole picture. Unconsciously blasting ahead with your grandiose plans can raise the ire of your coworkers. Taking smaller steps now allows you to make steady progress out of the spotlight. Ultimately, narrowing your vision and concentrating on one thing at a time is the simplest strategy to reach your goals.

There aren't many shades of gray in your life today. If there is someone or something that you want, your feelings may grow so intense that you act in a foolish manner. Fortunately, you can avoid causing problems now if you are able to recognize your compulsive ways. But suppressing your emotions won't help your cause; your best bet is to be aware of your own feelings before moderating them. Nothing is as black or white as it appears.

You may have to rethink your strategy today even if you initially knew what you wanted to say. Paradoxically, the stronger your desires become, the easier it is to rationalize inaction. Take whatever time you need to reach a conclusion. But once you decide, push forward to make something happen. Sharing what's in your heart paves the way to success. Fear of the unknown is not a valid reason to delay.

You may run into trouble today with someone who tries to exert control over your feelings. Fortunately, you're clever enough to transform a complicated situation into a memorable time for all involved. Be the hero of the melodrama now, and escape from other people's manipulative behavior. Remember, this is your show; you aren't responsible to play a supporting role in anyone else's movie.

You can bring an incredibly rich perspective to the table today, but it's difficult to open the channels of communication that are necessary to get your project off the ground. One sensible place to start is to weigh all your strengths and weaknesses, so you know exactly how much you have to offer. Unfortunately, if you're not appreciated at work, a current annoyance could turn into a growing resentment. Nevertheless, it's not wise to express negativity now, unless it leads you to creating positive change.

Nearly anyone you encounter today could be the catalyst that gets you back on track. It isn't likely that you're eager to show your vulnerability because you feel that this gives too much of your power away. Your self-esteem depends on being in control of your own boundaries now, so don't allow others to cross the line and talk you into saying more than you want. Nevertheless, being too defensive could close a window of opportunity before it even opens.

You could be feeling more judgmental now than you prefer, but you might attempt to maintain a positive attitude with everything that's happening, anyhow. You're riding large emotional waves and might not be able to suppress your intense feelings. At first, you aren't interested in retelling old stories from your past just so you can dramatize a current situation. Thankfully, there are simpler alternatives than creating a scene. Taking a slower and steadier approach is better than upsetting the proverbial apple cart.

You're not be in the mood to play host to someone you aren't emotionally connected to now. Nevertheless, it still may be your job to make others feel comfortable, no matter how you feel. If you just bury your needs, suppressed anger could rise to the surface before you know it. Unfortunately, no one benefits if you lose your temper. Acknowledge your desires, shake your current negativity and make a plan to enjoy yourself no matter what.

You must complete your current round of assignments before moving on to the next project, but you might believe that you're already finished. However, there's still a lot more to accomplish and your resistance only prolongs the stress. Swing into action even if you're not feeling very motivated. Instead of procrastinating now, use opportunistic Jupiter's connection to your key planet Pluto in order to get the ball rolling.

You might not find the rest and relaxation you seek now because you currently carry your workload with you wherever you go. Face your obligations rather than attempting to escape them. Look beyond the present moment; you don't have to do everything right now. Although you might blame others for your predicament, they are not the problem. Before starting an unnecessary conflict, remember that the tension will likely disperse on its own as you complete your job.

It feels as if your efforts are coming to fruition now, and there's no time to lose; you must pick the produce while it's still fresh. You might even consider your overall professional role as you weigh all your options. Thankfully, other people in your life can be surprisingly supportive of where your current path is leading. Just remember that there's no need to make anyone uncomfortable with an uncharacteristic emotional display. Keep your intentions clear and follow your bliss.

The emphasis on relationships continues today, but it's difficult to stay focused on the practical details right in front of you. A current conversation could quickly turn to more serious topics. Although a discussion about metaphysics or life-after-death might be fascinating, don't use these subjects just to avoid a challenging issue that needs resolution now. Managing the pressing affairs first will leave you time to explore the outer limits until your heart is content.

You are growing tired of fighting those who resist you at every turn. The pressure continues to build as your boss -- or someone else who claims to be in charge -- places stop signs in your path. Instead of just acting out in a rebellious manner today, handle each blockage separately without making the mistake of lumping them into one major obstacle. Remember to choose your battles carefully now, for your perceptions could be further bent out of shape than you realize.

You are ready to shout your story from the top of any mountain once mischievous Mercury fires into dramatic Leo, inspiring you to take center stage. A more playful side of your nature begins to emerge today, but your erratic behavior is part of the package. Others won't quite know what to make of your actions now, so it's best to explain yourself as clearly as possible while continuing to cultivate all facets of your personality.

It's difficult to make decisions now when your reactions are so extreme, and your alternating swings between emotion and logic can become exhausting. Mercury in expressive Leo is at odds with your stoic Taurus demeanor, so you may find yourself in situations that motivate you to stand up for your beliefs. However, first make certain that your ideas are valid enough to defend. If you're fighting for something that really matters, don't back down until you get your message across.

The pace of your daily life picks up speed and you can almost feel the excitement in your world as clever Mercury moves through your 3rd House of Communication for the next couple of weeks. You should expect the ambient noise of your daily routines to increase as additional information finds its way into your life in the form of telephone calls, emails and visits from friends. This is life as you like it, so enjoy the ride as long as it lasts.

Your thoughts turn to your finances now, which are of increasing concern over the next two weeks. This is your chance to get back on track if you have lost focus and need to regroup in the money department. Your life is temporarily shifting away from emotional overwhelm and into the practical realm of action. Stabilizing your fiscal situation proactively enables you to build a more solid foundation for the future.

Your proud lion-like roar is heard all across the land as the winged messenger Mercury flies into your sign today. Your convincing style packs a punch these days and you would be wise to keep turning your volume down as quickly as reality turns it up. Even if you think you are whispering, you may still be quite loud. Use this time to effectively communicate what's in your heart in a way that others can hear. But make sure you listen just as much as you talk if you really want to establish a solid connection.

You derive your logical and analytical powers from the discriminating faculties of interactive Mercury. As your key planet enters Leo today, you must make up for lost time if needed by finishing  business from the previous round so you can start the next cycle. Take charge of your dreams through the use of guided meditation or active daydreaming. Use this time to discover what inspires you and, if necessary, to change the way you think in order to create the future you imagine.

You're increasingly aware that you're standing at a crossroad, even if the stress around you continues to ease. You must choose what is next in your life and circumstances continue to pressure you to take a stand. However, you don't need to actively pick your path by trying one alternative after another. Instead, your current thought patterns will create your new reality over the next few months, so practice guiding your mental meanderings in the direction you desire the most.

Your emotional intensity is high as your rational mind charges into new territory today. You are striving to create a positive impact in your outer world, but may feel somewhat lost as to which way to turn. Thankfully, the confusion will pass in just a few days. Authentic communication takes on a greater role over the weeks ahead as you reevaluate the lessons you have learned and execute your plans with confidence. You are what you think.

Mercury prances into proud Leo today, encouraging you to talk about your most exciting dreams. You are very optimistic about your future now, even if there are obstacles that still need to be sorted out. Although you are impatient to reach your destination, you're on a journey that cannot be rushed. Nevertheless, you can see an opening at the end of the tunnel and it's wise to continue aiming at the light with all your might.

You can still feel the instability of your internal emotional weather and it affects your closest relationships today. However, you are considering more practical solutions now, rather than just idle philosophies. Your best bet is to adapt to the circumstances, even if they continue to change. If you are tempted to push for your way, save your energy for when it can have greater impact. Ironically, you will maintain more control over your destiny by being flexible in your approach.

You are highly observant of those you love and may often accurately guess the needs of your friends and acquaintances. Something unusual is happening today, since people around you are sharing the very same things that were being kept secret only a few days ago. Others may come to you with their stories now that Mercury is occupying your 7th House of Partnerships, giving you reason to leap into action. Happily, you are at your best when your passions are aroused and you engage others with heartfelt enthusiasm.

You may realize that you need additional focus to follow through with the daily routines of your job today. However, the best way to improve your concentration now might be through engaging in strenuous exercise rather than just working harder. Cerebral Mercury is traveling through your 6th House of Work and Health for the next couple of weeks, linking your physical and mental performance. Remember, it's the little things which will add up to create the desired positive impact on your overall health and happiness.

Your drive for independence often prompts you to take extreme action. However, you may be gathering more information now in order to balance other people's needs with your own. Fortunately, acknowledging everyone's boundaries will allow you to express yourself more freely. Respecting the wishes of your friends and acquaintances today is the wisest way to build a strong foundation in a new relationship.

A roller coaster romance doesn't sound so exciting today; neither does a get-rich-quick scheme that might turn out to be an expensive distraction. Although you like being entertained by your fantasies, you're more interested in creating stability now than having fun. Thankfully, keeping your dreams separate from reality allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds.

Decisions concerning your home and family won't come easily today, yet your choices are not as critical as they may seem. Part of the current problem stems from being caught in the middle of an unsolvable dilemma. However, once you accept the notion that resolution is not on the horizon now, you are freed from having to take any action at all. Wait and see what happens before you make your next move.

You can accomplish more than you expect today by micromanaging your calendar. The trick is you must execute your plan exactly as imagined. Unfortunately, if you stuff too many commitments into your tight schedule, it will only take one late appointment to mess up your whole day. It's best to give yourself some wiggle room in advance to allow for circumstances that are beyond your control. Exercising self-restraint works to your advantage now.

It's a perfect day to sit down and make a list of everything you do well. Consider this little exercise as a way of taking a personal inventory. But be completely honest and include those things about yourself you would like to improve as well. However, there is no reason to be extreme in your judgment about your shortcomings. You don't need to make major changes now; instead play up your strengths rather than focusing on your liabilities.

Your moods change dramatically throughout the day as you alternate between feeling positive about your goals and also struggling with your self-esteem. Since you're often self-critical, it may seem awkward to go easy on yourself now. Even if you believe you're doing fine, you still might bump into your inadequacies as if they belong to someone else. No matter who you are judging, continue to aspire toward greater acceptance. A compassionate heart creates the necessary space for positive change.

You may be captivated by your imagination today and there's little you can do to escape the spell. But don't worry if you get lost in your dreams since they can be a very powerful source of inspiration. However, the more you attempt to cling to reality, the more annoyed you become with yourself now. Watching your fantasies unfold as if you are an unattached observer empowers you to learn how to use them to your benefit.

It may feel as if your friends are being overly critical of you today, but your extreme reactions are probably connected to your current sensitivity. You might believe that growing thicker skin would help, but there is a dangerous price to pay for wearing a tough exterior. It's better to receive kind feedback from a supportive ally now than it is to get a much harsher assessment from someone else later on. Listen with an open mind and graciously accept the message as a gesture of genuine concern.

You might want to escape to a secluded tropical island now because there are too many details demanding your attention at work. You would rather leave this kind of micromanaging to someone else, but this is one of those times when you really need to knuckle down and do whatever is expected of you. Don't waste energy complaining about your fate; whistle while you work and see who joins in.

Steady reassurance from others lifts your spirits through a difficult time. Although you would love to offer your support in return, chances are that your involvement won't come without a cost. However, you must receive the bad news along with the good. Taking a bitter pill might be just the medicine you need to see things from a fresh perspective. A change in your attitude can greatly improve the relationship dynamics.

Sometimes you choose to avoid intense emotional interactions because you are not as comfortable navigating the illogical realms as the rational ones. However, you're intrigued now by digging into repressed feelings with someone you trust, for there is useful information just beneath the threshold of your perceptions. Go slowly as you explore the shadows of your life since there are crucial lessons to learn on this spiritual journey.

It's no laughing matter when someone criticizes you in a way that hurts your feelings. However, the current feedback may not be as intentionally mean as it seems. It isn't always easy to hear the truth, especially when it's stated so matter-of-factly. Instead of focusing only on the negative, reframe it in a way that gives you somewhere positive to go. There are almost always silver linings in the dark clouds if you look hard enough to find them.

Cinderella was able to transform challenging circumstances to her advantage, and so can you. It's not that your life is full of drudgery, but if you are running into trouble in a relationship, you're likely to turn everything into a fairy tale in your fantasies. It's wonderful to inspire others with your dreams, but just make sure you differentiate between fact and fancy.

A nurturing person in your life may now be the source of unexpected confusion. However, the current uncertainty might stem from a simple misunderstanding rather than a real difference of opinion. Trying to clarify an issue could lead to frustration, for the more that is said, the more complicated it becomes. It feels as if the truth is elusive no matter what you do, so let it sit for a day or two. In the meantime, focusing on practical matters still brings a sense of accomplishment.

You have plenty to say about everything and others enjoy listening to you now because you are speaking in such a poetic manner. Your stories fly off your tongue with ease today; however, your colorful words can convince someone that you are telling the absolute truth. Don't stretch reality too far in your favor. It may not feel great when it snaps back.

It's tricky to be clear about your desires now, but your confusion won't likely stop you from voicing them anyway. Your sense of what's important is changing along with your values. Try not to make too big of a deal about your current needs because they're still in flux. Give your thoughts more time to develop before you share them as if they are your final answer.

You could talk your way out of a high-security prison today -- or, at least you think you can. However, as charming and convincing as you may be now, you might also be deluding yourself. But don't rely on anyone else for your reality check, since they will only feed into your fantasies. Instead, take your current ideas with a couple of grains of salt. If your notions are worthwhile, they'll be even more valid in a few days.

A real intellectual connection with a spiritual truth can reveal a fascinating new path now. You have an open channel to your own subconscious today which sends you powerful images of the way your life could be if nothing stood in your way. Nevertheless, don't confuse the fantasy with your reality. Just take your dreams as they are and work toward making them come true.

Your moods come and go like the breeze today as the Libra Moon fuels you with her changing whims. Your optimism can overcome most obstacles, but you must remember to honor the limits of reality instead of just affirming your way to success. Your dreams are meaningful, but not necessarily able to fix everything in your path. Reinforce the power of positive thought with meticulous work habits for the best results.

There's not much beyond your grasp now, as long as you keep in contact with the source of your power. You cannot simply work your way to success unless you also integrate your metaphysical beliefs into everything you do. Rewards will come and go, but ultimately you will be left with your recollections of these times. Making your choices from a spiritual rather than a material perspective creates the best enduring memories.

It may be extremely difficult to focus on your current work today because your thoughts are traversing the far reaches of the cosmos. You don't even need a rocket ship to visit other galaxies; you have all the tools you require within your mind. Open up some time on your busy schedule to do some traveling now -- in your imagination or outside in the real world -- but don't forget to meet your obligations before you slip away on your amazing journey.

A disagreement about money today may create a temporary rift between you and a close friend. However, it's crucial to address issues that go beyond the apparent problem. Financial miscommunications can be a symptom of a deeper power struggle now. Go directly to the heart of the matter, even if it's uncomfortable. The potential for healing is great if you act with a sense of urgency.

It's no fun to be the source of discomfort for someone else today. If something you say upsets a close friend or partner, carefully examine your own inconsistencies because you may have inadvertently sent mixed messages without even knowing it. Go out of your way to make certain that others understand your intentions. Clear communication now prevents messy problems later on.

You may be quite certain that your approach to a particular problem is the smartest one, and you're eager to proceed accordingly. Nevertheless, it's not helpful to get defensive if someone shows you a better way to accomplish your goals. There are many paths to the same destination, and your openness to alternatives will make your life easier now. Taking the time to listen could make all the difference.

Your current optimistic attitude may have you believing that you can accomplish anything you want. However, frustration arises as your best ideas collide with the stone cold reality of unchangeable circumstances. Instead of trying to stick to your original plan, keep an open mind. But being flexible in your attitude is only half the solution. The other half is being willing to modify your goals and maybe even alter your destination if necessary.

You have your own set idea of how you want to spend your day today. But someone close to you might have very different plans in mind for you. Difficulties quickly arise from a minor power struggle now, especially if it escalates into a disagreement about how you should express your feelings in a delicate situation. Stubbornness, however, brings additional problems; you may not find a quick resolution, but gentle persistence pays off.

Your life takes a turn for the better today, but not until you solve a pesky problem that temporarily brings you down. You prefer being upbeat even in response to a challenging situation. Nevertheless, it may be difficult to be happy now until you work through the resistance that you have placed in your own path. Stick to the facts without assuming the worst. Ultimately, your current determination is your strongest ally.

It's tempting to go along with the wishes of close friends or family members today, but denying your own goals will likely backfire on you. You might be able to convince yourself that your needs aren't as important as everyone else's. Or you may want to nurture others out of the kindness of your own heart. However, burying your desires has a cost and could leave you feeling blue. Let others know what you want before everything becomes too complicated. The sooner you speak your piece, the easier it will be to find happiness.

You may feel as if your message is critical today and everyone should stop and listen to what you have to say. Unfortunately, you might seem more overbearing than you realize, prompting others to close down to your words before they even hear them. Lighten up and let your imagination speak for you; taking yourself less seriously now softens your approach and enables you to communicate more effectively.

Voices within your own head are judging everything you think today as taskmaster Saturn squares your ruling planet Mercury. Solutions to current dilemmas are just beyond the self-imposed limitations of your logic, but it's difficult to just let your mind roam freely now. You may feel stuck, even when you try to head off the beaten bath. However, you'll go further when you finally stop fighting with yourself. Accepting your own contradictions releases you to follow your dreams.

Steer clear of friends who tell you what to do today because they may end up costing you more money than you expect. Even without receiving a reality check from anyone else, you still might have to reconsider your spending habits. Think twice before overextending yourself financially. Watch your purse strings and you should be able to resist the temptation to splurge.

Although your words may be somewhat restrained today, you can still weigh in without saying much at all. Others embellish their tales with flowery sentences and poetic verbs; you are too direct now for any unnecessary flourishes. Save your dreams of being creative for another day. In the meantime, stick to the facts. Being practical is your current ticket to success.

You might not have much choice about how your day begins, so don't waste energy trying to control it. Instead of worrying about how to make everything fit into your agenda, just flow with the circumstances as they unfold. You may still end up in a conflict, especially if it feels like someone is blocking your direct route to pleasure. Fortunately, there are many roads to happiness, so just pick a different one and continue on your way.

You won't need to spend the day playing catch-up if you have kept current with your responsibilities. Instead, you are able to move through today's chores pretty quickly and then get on to something new and exciting. But you still might not be allowed to do exactly what you want. If an emotional issue with a close friend or family member surfaces now, take the time to resolve it before moving on to something else. Sometimes being compassionate is just as important as being successful.

You don't always take kindly to other people's demands. In fact, an act of rebellion may be your first response if you think you're being pushed too far. After all, you prefer to do things in your own unique way. However, you may not have much choice today. Naturally, you can choose to fight against your current obligations when it's easier to just do what you must and then be free later to do as you wish.

Be courageous and take whatever you have been doing for fun to the next level now. However, you cannot just push your way ahead; you must prove your worthiness at each step along the way. Encountering a challenging problem is not a viable reason to give up; it's merely a sign that you must make fundamental changes to your current approach before proceeding onward to follow your bliss.

Your emotions sink into the deep waters of your subconscious, making the next few days a bit uncomfortable. Nevertheless, a wise inner voice reminds you that your fiery nature gains strength when it is supported by your dreams. Don't be overly concerned if you're feeling a bit disconnected from your current circumstances. Have faith in your inner journey and trust the process of expressing what is in your heart.

Although you may not yet understand what is happening in a partnership, you must continue to flow with the energy to make the most of the process. The relationship axis is activated in your chart now as the evocative Moon moves through your 7th House of Partnerships. Even if you would prefer to be more grounded, you might have to be satisfied today with temporary instability. Listening to what others say helps you gain a fresh perspective on the situation until your clarity returns.

You might feel as if you are smoothly gliding along and skating right over a rather bumpy situation. However, you must stay in motion because problems don't seem to affect your pace as long as you have enough momentum. It's like your feet are just skimming over the surface, but as soon as you slow down, you fall into the intensity of an emotional drama. Listen to your common sense and keep moving as fast as you can.

Emotional desires wash over your life in waves once the Moon shifts back into sister water sign Scorpio this afternoon. A relationship that may have started as a practical arrangement now begins to heat up. You don't mind the intensity, for it puts you in touch with feelings that make you think you're young all over again, no matter how old you actually are. Don't try to intellectualize what's going on. Just enjoy your reactions to the current circumstances while they last.

A little drama on the home front may require your attention today, and you won't be allowed to simply watch from a distance. You must jump right in with all your heart. Your first instinct might be to try to fix everything, but being a superhero isn't necessary. It's not about your competence; it's about the power of change that manifests when you are connected with your emotions and have the courage to honestly reveal them to those you love.

Your detached approach won't be enough to get you through the day. You need to experience the uncertainty that goes with expressing the raw emotions that evade logic and rational thought. Any attempts to sidestep your truth will only cause more trouble down the road. Your mind is active, but you must avoid the temptation of reducing complex emotional networks into overly simplistic statements of fact. Feel your way today, instead.

The decisions you are trying to finalize today may have taken a lot out of you emotionally over these past weeks. Thankfully, it's time to make your choices now so you can begin to reap the rewards. Don't focus on your lack of certainty because you will feel better as soon as you move past this blockage, no matter what you choose. A little progress is better than none at all.

You are sometimes quite guarded about your life, but you might be inclined to reveal more than you intend now. Discussing philosophies and teachings that are important to you enables you to talk about your feelings more freely. You can easily open up in order to make your point if your disclosure helps you clarify your perspective. There's no need to panic; showing vulnerability fosters closer relationships if you're willing to share your heart.

Truth isn't something that you normally like to obscure, but there may be secrets that create a subtle tension in your interactions with others today. Someone might even be covertly working behind your back in an effort to undermine what you're doing. He or she isn't necessarily an enemy, but could simply disagree with your perspective or strategy. The more information you can bring out into the open, the better it will ultimately be for everyone involved.

You're dissatisfied with your responsibilities today because you would rather put your efforts toward something more useful than what you are now required to do. You might have duties that scatter your energy all over the place. Even if you do what others expect, you still may feel as if you haven't finished what's really on your plate. Ironically, simple communication, coupled with taking small steps, is what will pay off in the long run.

Your thoughts are spinning in circles today because you can't quite grasp the issues at hand. You know enough to see how deep a subject goes, which means that a quickly applied bandage will not solve the problem. Save your unexpressed anger for another day; it won't help anyone now. Instead, cool logic mixed with non-judgmental compassion can bring you closer to the truth -- and the truth sets you free.

You may claim that you don't understand the full ramifications of what's happening now, but your feelings are probably clearer than you profess. You might just be avoiding an unpleasant argument, for as soon as you open your mouth the discussion can get heated. As long as you don't become overly self-righteous, you'll do fine in convincing others that you have something significant to say. Speak from your heart; the rest will follow.

You prefer to be in total control of your life; however, you need others to participate now, because they bring additional resources to your plans. Thankfully, you still can manifest your own destiny; you just have to use a bit of teamwork to reach your destination. Although it may be necessary to make changes to your original agenda, compromise works in your favor in the long run.

It feels as if you are moving in and out of a dream today as you attempt to establish a connection point in the reality of your life. You are in an intense mode of operation and lost in your own thoughts. However, people in your immediate environment cannot be ignored, yet it also seems as if they don't want to make your life any easier. Push past your discomfort and communicate; it's better to know what you're up against than to have your head in the clouds.

There is a tricky situation developing and you need to separate out the big ideas floating around so you can dig into the specific problems. Unfortunately, you're not going to be able to skate your way through this predicament. Ironically, if you set your feelings aside in order to deal with the volatility of the situation, things will work out better than you could imagine.

Your passions need a creative outlet now as the tumultuous Scorpio Moon moves through your 5th House of Romance. You want to have fun without necessarily sacrificing depth of feeling on an energetic level. This means that your personal expressions have intensity, yet they won't be overwhelming to others today. Your ability to gently uncover the motives of a close friend or partner allows you to share your emotions without risking too much vulnerability.

Today's annoyances may blossom into tomorrow's full-blown frustration unless you take care of managing your feelings in the present moment. But staying in tune with your emotions requires more attention than you want to give. Nevertheless, you can ease the pressure by facing whatever is sitting just beneath the surface and bringing it out into the open. It might not seem like a good idea at first, but your disclosure will relieve some of the tension and allow you to enjoy your day.

It's all about your unexpressed thoughts today as your key planet Mercury forms a tense aspect to controlling Pluto. Your biggest concern isn't deciding what to share; instead, you must choose what you won't mention. You might believe that it's smarter to say nothing at all and just bury your whole story. Unfortunately, keeping quiet won't work now because the truth will just slip out anyhow. Open the door to communication before it is too late.

The waters are growing choppier and the winds are picking up now. The keel on your boat has kept you fairly level, but you may end up on the rocks unless you're extra vigilant. It's challenging to tell if your ship is riding deeper in the water or if the water has become shallow. Either way, you must get to the bottom of the issue in order to reestablish your equilibrium. As you realize the value of what you bring to the situation, your vessel will surprisingly regain its proper attitude.

You are normally ready to dive headfirst into the emotional underworld and into your hidden dreams to visit your fears and insecurities when the Moon returns to your sign. But now, even your own inner guides may give you the silent treatment. It's difficult for you to know what is real and what is illusion. It feels as if everyone around you is in a conspiracy to hide something -- and they are all in on the secret except for you. However, don't dig too deeply today. What you need to know will be revealed in due time.

You may want to withdraw into your own little world by running away from your responsibilities; unfortunately, this is not a viable option at this time in your life. There are simply too many demands being made on you now. You're responsible to think things through clearly -- not only for your own benefit, but also for everyone else. Ultimately, you can do whatever is required in record time, but in your mind, you're already enjoying your personal retreat.

You may be expected to do something for the group that you feel isn't in your own best interest; understandably, this creates an awkward dilemma. You know what your long-term goals are, but have to set them aside for a bit as you fulfill previous commitments. Nevertheless, others continue to distract you with intense emotional needs and you cannot ignore them completely. The more you're able to keep your mind on the practical side of things, the easier it is to perform your duties.

You don't mind complexity; in fact, you're often drawn to tricky mental puzzles and complicated concepts. However, you don't like unresolved emotional issues as much. Unfortunately, there are weird power struggles now arising in your life, but you cannot yet tell where the tension is coming from. Secrecy only heightens the problem. The best thing you can do is keep as much as possible out in the open. The truth is the best defense against confusion. Initiating a friendly dialogue disarms even the toughest enemies.

Your acute hypersensitivity might put you on edge today. You feel every wave in the sea of consciousness, and it may be a difficult task to know what to do with all these perceptions. Ironically, the emotional intensity can be so overwhelming that you choose to do nothing at all. Your key to making it through the day smiling is to concentrate on the small things and do them well. Leave the big picture for another day when you're feeling more like yourself.

You may have trouble focusing on work today as ingenious Uranus trines mental Mercury in your 5th House of Fun and Games. Thankfully, you are a bit of a magician now, appearing busy and productive even if you're goofing off. But it's smarter to be straightforward instead of placing so much emphasis on outsmarting the system. Work first and then play later for maximum respect.

You tend to shy away from the spotlight today, yet you still want others to acknowledge your special contribution. You feel more secure flying beneath the radar with communicator Mercury's current influence on your 4th House of Home and Family. Being invisible does have its advantages now because you can accomplish a lot when you aren't concerned about everyone else watching you. The only one you truly need to impress is you.

You are in an upbeat mood today and want everyone to know how good you feel now that independent Uranus is harmonizing with your key planet Mercury in your 3rd House of Communication. Even if you feel great, it's possible to surprise someone by taking a conversation too far. You might not even try to hide your erratic thinking as unpredictable Uranus enters the scene. Think before you speak so you don't shock others with what you say. Find an audience that will truly appreciate your off-the-wall ideas in the spirit they are meant.

Measured progress usually makes sense to you because it encourages slow and steady gains. However, you're more interested in making a noticeable splash today than in achieving your goals. Luckily, you have an excellent chance of succeeding at both now, so taking a risk is an excellent idea as long as you are honest about your intentions. Others will admire your courage as you stretch to reach for the stars.

Ingenious ideas pop into awareness so fast today that you can't help but share them with those around you. But others may grow tired if all you do is talk about yourself. Instead of trying to convince everyone that your plan is the best, find the good in someone else's approach. You'll be surprised at how much respect you gain when you set your thoughts aside long enough to open your heart and engage in real give and take.

Your mind is moving so fast today that it's hard for you to keep up with your own thoughts. But don't worry if you make a brilliant breakthrough that isn't noticed right away by anyone else. Remember, you are running ahead of the curve now and it will take time for others to catch up. In the meantime, it won't hurt to rein in your thinking a tiny bit, for jumping to premature conclusions could ultimately cause more problems than it's worth.

You may be overwhelmed with an abundance of social activity now that interactive Mercury is buzzing around in your 11th House of Friends. Fortunately, you should be able to make it appear as if you are working even when your mind is preoccupied with your personal life. Remember, you don't need to tell everyone everything; some things are better kept to yourself. Lighten up and have fun making memories that will last for a long time to come.

While some people are off enjoying their summer vacations now, you may be busy putting your life and your career back on track. You might be feeling as if it's time to live up to your obligations, but don't concentrate all your efforts today on getting ahead. Even if you have a full plate of promises to fulfill, you can still benefit from a quick escape to do something irresponsible and fun. A short recess replenishes your energy for the next round of work.

You're able to get in touch with your feelings because you approach them logically today, instead of having to sink into the deep waters of irrationality. This means having the best of both worlds now. Ironically, you can demonstrate your openness to powerful emotions by maintaining enough detachment to talk about them in a philosophical way. A conceptual discussion gives you the freedom to explore your passions without being overwhelmed by them.

You can build a lasting alliance that defies common sense while avoiding the established rules today and pushing yourself outside of the box. Your strength of purpose to create something totally new and different motivates you to discuss difficult relationship issues with your partner, even if resolution seems unlikely. The more you get your thoughts out into the open, the greater the possibilities for all involved.

Your wonderful quirky self shows up in spades today. You need your independence while simultaneously wanting to be in a relationship when mischievous Mercury trines rebellious Uranus from your 7th House of Significant Others. But you may think that it's necessary to sacrifice important freedoms in trade for the closeness you crave. Don't try to solve this dilemma now; instead, just keep your options open and be ready to make your move as soon as the energy changes.

You don't feel particularly easygoing today because cerebral Mercury aligns with electric Uranus, shocking your sensitive nervous system with outlandish ideas. Some of your current thoughts may be absolutely brilliant but they can't take form until you have a chance to nurture them. Get your required tasks out of the way so you have plenty of time to further develop your most unconventional inspirations. There are no limits to what you can do now in your imagination if you give yourself permission to try.

Although you may entertain big dreams of amazing adventures, the routine drudgery of work calls today and you must answer. However, planning your getaway is not a very smart strategy. Forget about all your lofty ideas and focus on exactly what is expected of you now, leaving the great escape for some other day. You will have something tangible to celebrate once your work is done.

An ambitious plan won't necessarily lead to success because you may not have the patience required to pull it off today. Of course, you want to be seen as reliable, yet you're still willing to attempt something new, even if it means putting your reputation at risk. Taking a calculated chance is probably a good idea now as long as you don't gamble with more than you're willing to lose.

People may tell you tall tales and you might actually believe them, so make sure to verify everything you hear today. Take the time to discover how reality differs from what others are saying now. Listen in between the spoken words so you don't miss what's being left out. It's best to know the shortcomings of a plan before you endorse it. Remember, even when something sounds really good, there is still more to the story than meets the ear.

Doing your job the same way you do it every other day is not a viable option today. You're eager to try something radically different, but it's hard to know the best method unless you test a few of them out. Ask your co-workers for their input since someone else can evaluate your work from a different perspective. Even a small procedural change could be enough to increase your efficiency and bring you more satisfaction.

Emotional obstacles may appear in your immediate surroundings today, even when you're doing everything just right. However, don't admit defeat too soon, for your current problems can be easily overcome if you face them with confidence. There's no need to bury unresolved issues from your past; embrace your shortcomings by accepting who you and where you came from. You cannot change the current situation by reinventing your history. Instead, create your future by cultivating your dreams.

Your life seems to be moving too fast these days, yet you really do have the power to slow it down. However, modifying your calendar is tougher than you think. Canceling activities that are already on your schedule enables you to decrease the noise in your life by reducing the internal stress. A firm commitment to meditate or practice yoga for a few minutes every day might be all that's needed to see for yourself what is possible.

You may mislead yourself today by acting on your hopes instead of paying attention to the current situation. You can further mix up fantasy with reality by trying to convince others to believe in everything that seems real to you. A relationship that is based on blind optimism or unproven assumptions might lead you astray. However, initiating conversations with your friends helps you ascertain the truth. Set your dreams aside now and stick strictly to the facts.

You know what's expected of you today, but you may have other things that you would rather do. Meeting your obligations can be draining because you don't want to waste your time on anything that's not important to you. Conserve your energy to connect with a special someone or just to enjoy some downtime by yourself. Paradoxically, maintaining sensible boundaries now widens your horizons in the long run.

Sharing your feelings today may be rather exhausting, but it also can create moments of intimacy as you expand your social sphere of influence. You might prefer being less emotional, talking philosophically about ideas and events instead of discussing your changing moods. Remember, it's healthier to express what's in your heart now, even if you aren't exactly sure yet why you're doing it. A spontaneous connection could end up being the highlight of your day.

Keeping your emotions to yourself can seem like a sensible thing to do, especially if they are standing in your way of being effective. However, you are happier and even more productive at work today if you don't suppress your feelings. Although it isn't wise to overwhelm your associates with your inner process, don't be afraid to share the truth. There won't be any regrets later if your disclosures are on a need-to-know basis. Others will appreciate the opportunity to open up about their feelings, too.

Inviting a few friends over for a social gathering sounds like a great idea today. However, it might not be prudent to call everyone you know, for they all could show up all at once, transforming your idea for a casual little get-together into a major event. If you choose to go forward with your party, remember to give yourself enough time before for planning and after for recovery.

You're eager to take care of nearly everyone at work now that the Moon is visiting your 10th House of Public Responsibility. You have a high level of dedication and are willing to be an integral part of a team. Unfortunately, there's also so much going on in your private life today that relationships may be quite demanding. Luckily, you don't need to choose between the personal and business dimensions of your life. You can sustain both worlds if you simply devote your mind and heart to it.

You feel as if you can make progress on projects that are stalled now, but there's still a complicated cocktail of cosmic disturbance to manage. You might not be able to actually put your plans into action yet, but you're in a forward-thinking mode, nonetheless. Watch the signs carefully today; paying attention to your relationship dynamics ultimately helps you get to where you want to go.

It may seem out of character if you overreact, but everything feels extremely important today. You want to be sure that you aren't missing anything that could negatively impact your progress. But it's possible to overcompensate in your attempt to achieve perfection. If you find your emotions growing intense, taking a few steps back enables you to maintain a healthy perspective on your life.

Relationships are emphasized now, but the energy between you and others probably won't be all that warm and fuzzy today. The connections can, however, be exciting and even adventurous, but the emotional aspects of your interactions might be temporarily relegated to the back burner. What's more important now are the activities that you undertake together. Being a good companion allows you to have your fair share of fun at work or at play.

You might bring a rather unrealistic idea into your workplace today and your solutions could be more grandiose than the problems they seek to remedy. The good news is that, although you may be stressing over finding the right amount of passion to bring to the job, you still have a solid chance to strike the balance you need. Don't give up; small steps in the right direction are better than none at all.

You're feeling as if you're on the top of the world today and it seems as if accomplishing anything should be as easy as just visualizing it and making a wish. Unfortunately, all your problems are not magically solved by simply thinking about them. Nevertheless, you can make progress on many fronts as long as you take a creative approach and apply your energy in a balanced manner.

It's nearly impossible for you to gauge how much is enough today. You are pretty sure that your best strategy is to narrow your focus of vision, yet a loud inner voice tells you to widen your scope to get the largest possible view. It's as if you are experiencing reality simultaneously through two different camera lenses. Instead of attempting to favor one perspective over the other, keep your options open for a while longer.
