You may stress about what to say and what to keep secret now. Although your fantasies are more vivid than usual, it's been easier to keep them to yourself. However, your key planet Venus makes her yearly return to your sign today, encouraging you to relax and share more of your inner world with those you trust. There are still some things that should be left unsaid, but don't waste too much energy worrying about it. If it feels right, smile and say what's in your heart.

Unfortunately, others might not understand the depth of your feelings now, so it's better to keep them private. You may be cleansing the wounds of an emotional battle scar, whether it is quite recent or from your childhood. Thankfully, establishing boundaries and creating safe space gives you the room you need to honor your process. Heal quietly on your own or in the company of a trusted friend.

Your words pack more of an emotional punch now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign. But you might also notice that your feelings are in a state of flux. It's as if your heart is attached to a kite, getting tossed around by the changing breezes. Controlling the sky is out of the question; you cannot harness the wind. Thankfully, going with the flow allows you to gain power and take charge when the turbulence settles down.

Although you're unlikely to show all your cards today, you're more motivated than anyone realizes. It's not that you are specifically attempting to be secretive; it's just that you know more than others think you do. Your knowledge is your secret weapon and you'll be better off if you hold onto this advantage for a little while longer. The future will arrive sooner than you think.

The call of far-away places and great adventures beckons, but you may need more time to make your great escape happen. On one hand, this is a magical and dreamy phase when you can put your creative nature to good use. On the other hand, you need to monitor your daydreams or they could lure you down the wrong track. Ultimately, acknowledging your long-term desires is healthy as long as you remember to also be appreciative of your current set of circumstances.

You're expected to do something at work that draws your energy away from what you prefer to be doing for yourself. Although it might be frustrating if you cannot find the time to attend to your personal needs, don't panic. It's all a matter of perspective. A change of attitude is all that's required to make your present moment more enjoyable. Instead of putting your energy into unrealized dreams, find the magic in the here and now.

If you feel blocked in your creative expression now, it's time to check in with your feelings. Fortunately, there is much potential for movement as long as you're willing to step into the unknown. Instead of attempting to protect your heart from the vagaries of change, embrace the uncertainties of the future. Even if you don't yet have a plan, give voice to your intentions. And don't write off the potential for positive results before you even give it a fair chance.

Your strength of purpose empowers you to overcome minor setbacks today, but establishing goals is only a start. You must light a fire under yourself to create momentum; if you don't take action now, you'll regret it down the road. Be careful not to get involved in an emotional power struggle as you try to advance your own position. Be resolute but kind in your drive for success.

Your feelings play a more important role in your life now, but they may be difficult to express. You tend to emphasize mind over heart, yet today your emotions are stirred up from the subconscious, like the stuff that gets scraped up from the bottom of a pot of soup. Don't resist the movement. You can learn valuable lessons from your suppressed fears and desires, even if they make you uncomfortable at first.

Your feelings are weighing heavy on your mind today. However, you may have created emotional distance between you and your loved ones in order to prevent disappointment or even possible heartbreak. Luckily, there is a solid opportunity for you to do something brilliant now if you're willing to move through your own self-created restrictions. Serious reevaluation is fine but be ready to take that chance to make a splash and show someone that you care.

Reality throws a few obstacles in your path today in the form of additional chores or someone trying to hijack your weekend routine. Look within to learn how these external blockages may actually be symbolic of your own feelings. Awareness is the key; if you take the time to understand your role in what's happening, you can break on through to the other side.

It appears as if the spotlight is on someone else and that you can get away with a bit of anonymity today. Paradoxically, your current invisibility doesn't prevent people from making more demands of your time. Even if responsibilities are heaped upon you, you somehow rise to the challenge and beyond. But if you have control issues and try to do it all by yourself, the best-made plans may collapse. Involve others equally and you will appear to be brilliant.

Others appreciate you as the consummate host, but it's tricky because they might not be able to see you for who you really are. Instead, you are perceived as a public figure without much regards to your personal needs. Emotions are difficult to control, but you may think that it's important not to show all your feelings, especially the negative ones. Don't try to bury them or your life will just get crazier. Living cautiously is one thing, but everything is easier if you don't hide your head in the sand.

Your emotions are complicated by friends and family today, and there may not be an easy way to navigate through the complexities. One inner voice tells you to hold your breath and remain motionless until the current stress passes. The other voice tells you to run away as fast as possible. However, neither of these strategies makes real sense. You are better off listening to the music and dancing to it the best you can, instead of sitting on the sidelines waiting for destiny to strike.

Learning new ways to increase your financial stability is usually a smart move, but it can now be a source of difficulty as the intensity of your desire to know more increases. You're less likely to take someone else's feelings into consideration if you stumble onto a brilliant idea. You must expand your knowledge base in order to fulfill your commitments. Pick a course of action and follow it instead of jumping around from one plan to another. For now, bite off less than you can chew.

The challenges in front of you should be taken very seriously now. It may be best to give yourself the luxury of more time, so lighten your load by finishing up old business and putting away completed projects. You might feel as if you're taking your whole life through an eye of a needle today. There is too much to fit through such a small space so you need to let something go before you can create the future of your dreams.

Place all systems on high alert today so you can minimize any tension that has cropped up in your life. Part of the problem is that you may have already taken on too much responsibility. You have plenty of work to do now, yet you might not feel like working very hard. Even if you finish everything you promised, others might judge you harshly anyhow. The best bet is to satisfy yourself first before anyone else at this time.

You're able to manage an extremely unusual mixture of energies today. On one hand, a high-strung emotional buzz sets you right at the edge. On the other hand, you feel grounded in reality and you know exactly what is going on. If you can control your emotions, you'll be a force to be reckoned with no matter what cause you choose to defend. Knowing when to share your passion makes the difference between frustration and success.

Finding your comfort zone is tricky today because the more you adapt to meet the needs of others, the more you want to break free from the demands being placed upon you now. However, withdrawing emotionally tends to make you resentful. Your smartest strategy is to prevent your energy from stagnating. If you consciously breathe deeply throughout the day, you won't be as likely to suppress your feelings. Expressing your desires without being tied to the outcome relieves the pressure for everyone around you.

You might have a difficult time acknowledging the wishes of your friends and family today. Although the Moon is still in earthy Capricorn, your stubborn streak may surface in little ways that prevent you from just walking away from a volatile situation. Explore strategies that include someone who was previously the subject of your criticism or ire. Instead of being a perfectionist now, make the most of your heightened senses by responding in a more practical and enlightened manner.

You may be feeling a bit out of sorts today, especially if someone is counting on you for something you don't want to do. You might have other plans, but chances are that not much is going to change yet. Your values are brought into sharp focus as you compare your desires to your current opportunities. But satisfaction is elusive; although having patience can be tough, you need it now more than ever. Waiting may be the hardest part, but it also brings the greatest rewards.

You are at the beginning of a three-week phase where your needs may be in stark contrast with what is offered to you in the real world. The key is to seek balance between experiencing new pleasures and getting your most basic needs met so you can feel secure. This is not a time to go overboard with indulgences. Nevertheless, you will be surprised how happy you can be if you just take care of the bare minimums and leave the rest up to the universe.

You are eager to discuss your attractions and desires in an objective manner now. Thankfully, you have an even-handed approach to relationships and the more you talk about them, the better your chances are to find the love you're seeking. However, chores or previous commitments could get in the way of your pursuit of happiness if you put too much emphasis on them. Meet your obligations, but leave time to explore your personal needs, too.

Reevaluating your priorities inspires you to set new relationship goals. Thankfully, it's easier to express your needs in a more spontaneous manner now that the earthy Capricorn Moon is visiting your 5th House of Love and Play. But you might also feel a bit wistful if you think you missed your chance to have fun today. Don't worry if sharing your desires with a good friend is currently easier than actually fulfilling them. You'll have another opportunity to act like a kid in just a few days.

You may be preoccupied with relationship issues as the love planet Venus travels through your sign for the next three weeks. Luckily, you're more likely to experience sensual pleasure now since your charm factor is soaring. However, you also can get lazy as you soak in the good times that await you. Instead of concentrating all your energy on fleeting moments of physical enjoyment, explore ways to let your creativity take root and flower. Remain open to being surprised because romance is in the air and magic is afoot.

Someone may ask you to play the role of a compassionate caretaker now, and the more love you have for this person, the easier the job will be. You can feel a high level of altruism in relationships these days, but your tendency toward self-denial could become a problem if you are being pressured or coerced. If you're not feeling it then inaction is better than faking good intentions; do what's in your heart and you can't go wrong.

Your mind is working overtime envisioning reliable ways to make money, but your follow-through might not support your big ideas now. Your social needs lure you away from your more practical responsibilities; you may prefer to have a memorable time with friends than to put extra hours in on a project. Fortunately, love can be combined with friendship in a way that makes adventures more possible today, especially when you are participating in group activities. Get out and have some fun while the getting is good.

It may seem easier to make more money these days, but don't get sidetracked by any kind of get-rich-quick schemes. Love isn't full of surprises now; instead, you get what you deserve. This is a great time to reach for your goals because people in power are more inclined to support your ambitions now that attractive Venus is visiting your 10th House of Public Status. Happily, you can count on what you receive as being the real thing in matters of the heart or concerns about the bottom line.

Companionship arrives in unusual forms today and broadens your horizons in ways that you never imagined. These next three weeks may offer you intriguing opportunities to take a trip with someone special, but even if this doesn't happen, keep in mind that you can still travel within the realms of your imagination. Lighten your approach to love; it's too important of a journey to take seriously.

You might attempt to maintain your balance in the realm of relationships now, but your sexual appetite could pull you into deeper emotional waters. Nearly any intimate encounter takes on unexpected intensity since you're more likely to express your passions without restraint today. Your current challenge is to create an emotionally safe space where feelings can flow naturally.

You might feel as if you're a character in a science fiction story today since it's tough to tell what is real and what is illusion. You might make a grand gesture now, even if you would be better off staying low key. Nevertheless, you aren't interested in safety; you prefer to deal with the unknown as it appears. After all, you are in your element when you are exploring new territory, often by rushing into it without a concrete plan. Dream big; the future is yours to create.

Your instincts suggest that you should try something different today, but you may not be able to explain why. You are resistant because you typically don't like change unless there's a darn good reason. Something isn't making sense now; the facts just don't add up. Try not to make any major decisions at this time while you remain open to the possibilities. See how you feel in a few days and then make up your mind. In the meantime, exploring the alternatives brings its own form of satisfaction.

Your current existential dilemma isn't going away. One voice is telling you to be realistic and keep your feet on the ground. However, another voice is advising you to follow your instincts, even if you don't understand where they are taking you. These two diverging paths lead to such different destinations that you don't even know where to begin as you sort out your options. Keep it simple; start from the most practical perspective and slowly work your way through the list of possibilities.

It may seem as if someone is thwarting your efforts today, but there's no reason to let this negative energy impact your day. Although you might want to take other people's actions into consideration, it's healthier now to just concentrate on the exciting opportunities that are ahead. Even if you aren't making as much progress as you wish, remain attentive to your goals and tighten your plans accordingly. Your positive attitude can be powerful enough to quickly overcome any temporary disappointment.

You enjoy connecting with others who open your mind to new ideas now that the progressive Aquarius Moon is visiting your 7th House of Relationships. But don't let anyone distract you from your feelings. Instead, invite them to join you in a mutually agreeable activity, so you can benefit from the richness of a collaborative experience. The universe is offering you a spiritual elixir, but whether or not you choose to share the journey is your choice.

It's challenging to know where to draw the line between reality and fantasy today. Your daydreams may feel as though your flights of fancy are quite real. Your best strategy is to continue carrying out your regular routines as if everything is perfectly normal. If you can stay grounded now, you could have something very special to show for your efforts by the end of the day.

You might think that you're perfectly clear in your communication today, since you know what you are feeling and you're sure about what you want to say. Unfortunately, there may be a metaphysical black hole lurking between your mind and your tongue, warping the words that make it to the surface. If you're writing poetry or telling a story, this can add colorful imagery to your work. But otherwise, you need to remain on point with your message so that you don't needlessly confuse others.

The cosmic mysteries seem close enough to touch today as you explore your imagination and bring back treasures from other dimensions. Your dreams are so vivid that you're able to pluck a magical flower from a heavenly garden and when you wake, you still have that impossible flower in your hand. Don't try to rationalize anything that happens now. Maximize the current potential by remaining open to unusual experiences and surprising synchronicities.

Fate is working on your behalf today and lady luck is on your side. Imagine a helpful angel sitting on your shoulder, whispering guidance in your ear all day. You don't even need to believe in angels for this magic to work. Don't get in the way of what they do, even if they are in another dimension of space and time. No matter how you need to frame it, you have invisible helpers at your service.

Although you may have a core of strong spiritual beliefs, you don't take kindly to being pushed into non-physical realms. You are more comfortable when you can perceive exactly what is happening, which is one of the reasons why you accomplish so much. Today, however, a strange wind blows up weird debris from your own imagination. Pay close attention to your premonitions, whether or not they make any sense. Spending time in the dream world now is more productive than you think.

You are receiving signals from outer space today, but they may be indecipherable. Don't struggle trying to translate anything into English, for you can get the gist of the message by just using your imagination. In your heart, you understand what's being communicated even if you can't grasp it intellectually. But that is the point; it isn't about the words. For now, it's all about suspending belief and trusting your intuition.

Your frustration increases if you think you have it all together within your own mind because your assessment just doesn't jive with what's happening. Instead of trying to rationally work your way through this dilemma, make time to delve beneath the surface noise. Fortunately, once you sink into your own imagination, you will be able to create a bit of magic. But don't try to force anything; just ride the waves of spiritual inspiration and see where they take you.

You reserve the right to retreat today as you manage the unexpected consequences of your overly ambitious commitments. But it's not useful to worry about where you have fallen short now that the Aquarius Full Moon highlights your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. Instead, replenish your creative juices by doing something that enriches your soul. The big issues aren't going away; you'll still need to deal with them when you return -- hopefully, with a renewed sense of vitality and purpose.

You may want to consider a professional move or somehow change your role in the community now that the Aquarius Full Moon activates your 10th House of Career. No matter what you do today, it will have a strong impact on your family dynamics. The good news is you don't have to make decisions by yourself; it's smarter to involve others in the process. You can make a more informed choice once you know how everyone else feels.

You could learn something important today that has a long-term effect on your spiritual beliefs or political opinions. Your recent research may have already opened the door to more possibilities, which, in turn, attracts you to new ideas now that the Aquarius Full Moon lights up your 9th House of Higher Education. Curiosity lures you further into your own explorations while more altruistic interests can add a deeper meaning to your life.

You're feeling particularly connected to those close to you as today's Aquarius Full Moon illuminates your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Emotional rumblings arise from within your psyche. Waves of self-doubt enter the picture, which might, in turn, negatively impact your financial condition. Ultimately, if you are willing to be bold and dig beneath the surface, the current metamorphosis could be a very positive one. Your attitude makes all the difference in the world.

You are ready to break out of an entrenched pattern in a current relationship as the futuristic Aquarius Full Moon shines its awareness into your 7th House of Partners. Keep in mind that a change to the dynamics of a partnership might lead to an improvement in your overall attitude. Others can't help but notice your sparkle and come forward to support you.

You might not be very clear about your role in relationships today, especially if others aren't being precise about what they want. However, the effects of the Full Moon in unusual Aquarius may not be immediately apparent as it falls in your 6th House of Daily Routine. Stop going through endless mental loops and simply settle in to enjoy the day. Paradoxically, the benefits of pampering yourself are greater now than any specific work you might do.

Love is in the air as today's Aquarius Full Moon illuminates your 5th House of Romance and Creativity. Unfortunately, your anticipation can also bring a few surprises along with it. Although it's a gift to see the highest potential in anyone you meet, you may not assess others realistically now. Be careful not to judge things by their appearance alone, for the truth might not be as pretty as the attractive veneer. Don't judge a book by its cover or you could end up getting the wrong idea.

Revisiting an old fantasy can be cathartic today if you are then willing to let it go and move on. The Aquarius Full Moon energizes your 4th House of Roots, stirring up old memories and leaving you feeling a bit lost. Fortunately, you can have the resilience to process an emotional wound quickly, along with any residual negativity. Concentrating on a magical moment in the present allows you to detach from the past to enjoy the love that's around you now.

It might seem as if you don't have a moment to yourself today because the brilliant Aquarius Full Moon is buzzing in your 3rd House of Communication. However, it's wise to focus on your own projects for a while, even if everyone else wants to talk to you about their crazy ideas. Make time for more pleasurable activities that add something special to your life, such as redecorating your home or working in your garden. Choose something that will make you feel good and just relax.

Your overconfidence can lead to trouble today unless you pay close attention to the details. You may be feeling pretty good about your prospects, but the Aquarius Full Moon brightens your 2nd House of Money, tempting you to spend more than you should on something you don't really need. Be smart and wait a few more days before reevaluating your options. A penny saved is a penny earned.

You may think that you know what you need, yet your moods fluctuate and your desires change throughout the day. Today's Full Moon in your intelligent sign stretches your emotions to the extreme. Your inconsistency can be particularly confusing to a partner or close friend who isn't accustomed to you expressing your whims. Nevertheless, it's better to deal with someone else's uncertainty about you than it is to deny your feelings. Speak from your heart and the rest will fall into place.

You are less likely to let others in on your emotional process now that today's Aquarius Full Moon shines in your 12th House of Secrets. However, avoidance isn't a practical long-term strategy on which to build a relationship. Don't put off an important discussion just because the thought of it makes you uncomfortable. It's not necessary to fill in all the details, but the sooner you share your concerns, the more you will feel connected to those you love.

You are often the one who races ahead to achieve an early advantage. Now, however, it's wise to practice patience on every level. Don't let your imagination run away with a practical idea. Impulsive action can lessen your chances for success, even if everything looks good at first. Slowing down to a pace that you can sustain ultimately improves your odds of cashing in on the current opportunities.

There may be such a high level of uncertainty in your life now that you overcompensate by clinging to the status quo. Paradoxically, it's not that you want to hold onto the past; you really do crave change, but might be apprehensive about losing control of the process. Fortunately, you can remain open to the potential growth without jumping off a cliff. Don't let fear stand in the way of the amazing possibilities that could be waiting just around the next corner if you have the courage to go there.

You like to keep your options open, especially when the choices look so promising. Happily, your future is not set in stone; there are a variety of alternatives to explore now. However, dreaming about each one could get in the way of actually choosing your path. Don't be overly concerned that you might pick the wrong way; anything that allows you to continue your journey is better than staying in one place.

Your career may take an unexpected turn now, leading you in an exciting new direction. But the changes could be significant enough that they take several months to play on through. Nevertheless, your upbeat attitude can motivate others at work today. Ironically, it's your current optimism that might inspire someone to offer you an exciting opportunity that ultimately gives you more freedom while bringing the recognition you deserve.

Lately you can't stop dreaming about an amazing vacation to an exotic destination. Unfortunately, you might not be able to drop everything in your life and hop a plane for your great escape. But happiness is not as far away as you think. Seek satisfaction where you are, rather than where you wish you were heading. Luckily, you are fully capable of enjoying the present moment even with the unrealized wonders of the future still in front of you.

Although you prefer relationships to be clearly defined, sometimes it's best to leave things more open-ended. However, someone's behavior may be exceptionally difficult to decipher today, even if you ask for clarification. But there's no need to push too hard; ultimately, you have a better chance of getting what you want if you remain attentive to the signals that others are giving you. If you can't figure out what's going on, avoid the temptation to withdraw. An honest dialogue enables you to create something that works for both of you.

You are envisioning your rise to success now, but may be rather impractical about what to do next. Although you might have moments of doubt throughout the day, you can't help but see the brighter side of every situation now. A positive outlook is healthy, but not if you ignore the facts. Aim high when setting your goals, but be realistic when making choices.

You're not interested in becoming entangled in other people's emotional dramas these days because you are more intrigued with the idea of exploring your own imagination. The complexities of interpersonal relationships may distract you from your current creative efforts. Even if you love someone enough to offer the help they need, you still must face the limitations of your time. Take care of yourself first or you won't have much to give to anyone else.

You may not be in complete control of your feelings, yet you're willing to let go and follow the emotional flow wherever it leads. You want to take things seriously, but it might be more important now to pursue the fun things in life. Even if you attempt to adopt a more somber attitude, you could end up frustrated if you try too hard. Fortunately, going along with your imagination today is the best way to realize your creative potential.

Your world is full of surprises today, but you might be resistant to them. You want to feel as if you can control the circumstances, but other people's optimism pulls you out of your safety zone and encourages you to think about possibilities beyond your normal scope. However, there are treasures waiting to be discovered if you have the courage to take a step into the unknown.

Entertaining daydreams about material wealth might motivate you to apply yourself diligently on the job. But unrealistic fantasies about get-rich schemes could distract you from more important work today. Giving yourself permission to think about the potential is healthy if you follow through with concrete actions. Don't bite off more than you can chew. Taking small steps toward a lofty goal is better than taking giant steps toward a more modest one.

You may feel affectionate today and willing to express what's in your heart, even if it means being vulnerable. However, it's not a good idea to pretend that everything is okay if it really isn't or you'll end up wasting energy making up for lost time. Explore all your options but don't slip into denial. You can manifest your dreams if you focus on the right ones.

Your fantasy world is expanding now as you run each possibility through your imagination. However, no one realizes what you are experiencing because your appearance may remain calm and collected. These little daydreams are yours and yours alone. Stay aware of your feelings while you continue to communicate in a restrained and logical manner. Keep up your normal routine, and you should be able to get away with your inner journeying without anyone getting on your case.

Although important people may enter your life now and energize you, they might also bring a bit of disruption. Stay present when responding to others, for your common sense could actually save the day. Don't be afraid to say no; trust your instincts even if you have to stir up some muddy waters in the process. Going against the flow today can prevent a relationship from becoming stagnant.

It's challenging to get your head and your heart working in sync toward the same goals today. Somehow, it seemed simpler in the past to align with your higher self. However, you can benefit by going back and reassessing your priorities because your careful analysis falls apart in light of strong emotions now coming to the surface. Don't be so afraid of letting others see who you really are -- even with your current eccentricities. Following your dreams allows others to do the same.

You might be overwhelmed by an odd situation today when brainy Mercury aligns with crazy Uranus. You're tempted to sink into your feelings and nurture someone with all your heart while another voice in your head just wants to break free from all emotional attachments. Although making your escape sounds enticing now, your practical sense of loyalty will likely win out. Find ways to express your wild side without turning your relationships upside down.

You have something on your mind and need to get it out into the open; however, you may not be ready to deal with the consequences of your message today. Nevertheless, it could feel as if you're running out of time to speak your peace. Starting the conversation isn't easy, but it will only grow more difficult as the day progresses. Don't wait for a better moment to initiate the discussion. Believe it or not, the time is now.

Your key planet Mercury is being rattled by unstable Uranus and opinionated Jupiter now, aggravating a difficult situation in a relationship. Your partner or friend may grow a bit irritable today, which in turn makes your life more complicated. Your best strategy is to allow the people in your life enough room so they can find out what works best for them without worrying about your expectations. Supporting the dreams of others ultimately works in your favor.

A little extra concentration prevents your week from deviating too far off track. Fortunately, you can see how over-committed you are as long as you logically think about your activities. But as soon as you step away from your detached approach, you could fall into the deep well of feelings. Stand back a little bit to get a fresh perspective while reconsidering a new direction.

It seems as if everything at work is about to change and you aren't sure how to prioritize your goals today. It may feel as if you're on a roller coaster ride; you're exhilarated one moment and craving stability the next. But attempts to end the uncertainty will only lead to higher anxiety. Stop resisting that which you cannot control. Thankfully, your path straightens out over the next few days, bringing more structure to your life and paving the way to your future.

Your current emotional dilemma is pulling you between home and career. On one hand, you really want to put in the required time to sustain a loving relationship. But, on the other hand, there's a part of you that only wants to focus on getting ahead at work. Although you might think that you must choose one direction now, an extreme reaction won't serve you well. There's no need to panic; thankfully, balancing your personal and professional goals is possible if you budget your time wisely.

It's time for you Mountain Goats to take a calculated risk. Normally, you exhibit conservative behavior as your sure-footedness prevents you from making too many mistakes. Paradoxically, a small misjudgment today may actually help you reach your goal. You're unlikely to request assistance if you think that you have all the answers. However, you're more likely to ask for what you need if you run into a problem. Listen to the advice you receive; it could make the difference between failure and success.

Last week may have been filled with sudden unplanned changes. Fortunately, you secretly enjoy it when the lightning strikes and things get turned upside down. As if you haven't been through enough recently, today is a crash course in your learning process. Engage others in intelligent discussions, even if your opinions differ. Encountering new ideas can validate what's most important to you.

Your life seems to be more hectic today because your moods are changing so quickly. The biggest challenges now may come from your personal relationships. Even if your partner seems to be sensible and rational, you might be ready to toss the whole thing out and start over. Don't move so fast; there's good stuff to be found beneath the surface. It will just take a while to sort through the noise that is the loudest so you can tune into the sweet music that's singing your song.

You might be too nervous to feel the emotions behind your own words today, even though the Moon's return to Aries usually put you more in touch with your moods. Your current uneasiness arises from your inability to express yourself as clearly as you wish. Every time you say something, it seems that you are misunderstood. Don't struggle to explain your motives now; wait a few days and try again. In the meantime, let your actions tell your story for the most positive impact.

Knowing that you may be reading the signals wrong today tempts you to fill in the missing information with what you think to be true. Unfortunately, your uncertainty can raise fear, prompting you to doubt yourself even more. Instead of trying to categorize everything as either black or white, remember how much of your world is actually various shades of gray. Allowing for many possible interpretations increases your chances of finding happiness.

You might be more interested in your connections with coworkers and acquaintances today than you are in accomplishing much on your own. It isn't that you are lazy; it's just that you prefer to put your energy toward enjoying your interactions with others and creating new relationships instead of doing what's expected of you. Although you may have a lot of fun with your friends now, don't forget to round out your day by leaving some time for quiet self-reflection, too.

Dreaming up new ways to approach your work can help you alleviate any boredom that has crept into your life. Although you could distract yourself for a while, following your curiosity doesn't necessarily resolve your basic questions about life. Today, however, it's more important to meet your obligations as they arise. Thankfully, you will have ample opportunity throughout the year to explore new territory and redefine your long-term goals.

A relentless string of responsibilities continues to remind you of the seriousness of life, and you can already tell that there's significant change in the air. It may take a while for the current transformation to occur, so don't panic if you feel like there is still too much work to do now and not enough time. Focus all your attention on tying up loose ends today. Clearing the energy allows you to take advantage of the upcoming opportunities.

Although you may try to maintain clarity in communication, you might as well acknowledge that the muse has come to visit you today. Even if you don't normally write poetry, your thoughts are more in sync with your imagination now than they are with reality. However, blurting things out creates problems because your symbol-rich language paints pictures instead of telling stories. Don't force your communications into overly formal presentations. Just describe what you see in your mind's eye and let the magic unfold.

Today's assertive Aries Moon encourages you to express your desires, instead of trying to accommodate the needs of another person. Of course, a successful relationship benefits from your willingness to balance your partner's energies with your own. Naturally, you err by leaning toward what others want. Now it's time to go out on a limb and share your thoughts with someone you trust. Nevertheless, it's wise to remain detached from the outcome as much as possible. Honest communication is the key to satisfaction.

Although you want to plow ahead with an ambitious plan, you may have to stop to make an adjustment or two so you can get others to help you along the way. Even if you're tempted to undertake the project by yourself, you can accomplish much more by working as part of a team. Your current dependency is not a weakness; it's only temporary, so make the most of the support you receive while it's available. The energy of the whole is greater than the sum of its parts.

It seems as if your life is all about your career now, but surface appearances only tell part of the story. You're yearning for some good old-fashioned fun while the Moon is hanging out in your 5th House of Spontaneity. Luckily, you're able to have a fine time, but there could be a high price to pay unless you meet your obligations first. Although it may be hard to restrain your adventurous nature, wait a few more days before unilaterally freeing yourself from the shackles of responsibility. Work hard; play harder later.

You probably have a great deal of social responsibilities this weekend, and a supportive anchor on the home front can give you the ability to deepen your roots without necessarily feeling trapped by them. Creating a fertile ground in your personal life adds to your emotional security. This, in turn, affords you the stability you need to accomplish great things at work or out in the community.

The more you try to get things under control today, the crazier they become, turning this day inside out. You might be running around in circles trying to keep up, but paradoxically, your anxiety diminishes once you loosen your grip on the reins. You won't be able to complete everything you start in a timely fashion, yet your need to do so may be less urgent than it seems. Maintaining your sense of humor allows you to adapt to the changing circumstances with admirable grace.

Your emotions may be directly linked to your material possessions today. If you are doubting your own abilities, you could be tempted to engage in retail therapy to make yourself feel better. Unfortunately, this self-indulgence is not a viable solution; it's merely a distraction from the real issues. Instead of spending any money, search for the underlying cause of your dissatisfaction. Once you get to the bottom of your angst, you can do something positive about it.

Be clear about why you want to do battle before allowing your temper to get the best of you. It's too easy now to start an argument because you thought you heard something that wasn't even said. If you need to vent some steam, you would be better off putting your energy into something practical like physical labor or exercise. Stepping away from a conflict gives you time to check your sources before jumping to any conclusions.

There's something special about the buzz you feel this morning. Perhaps you wake with the anticipation that a fantastic dream will actually overflow into your day. But your hopes fade along with the remnants of your nocturnal visions. Maintaining a positive attitude throughout the day may not be easy. Don't just dig in your heels and resist the pressure to adapt to the changing situation. However, if you must make a stand, be sure that it's for a good reason and not out of habit.

Your friends can keep you extremely busy now that the excitable Moon is moving through your 11th House of Social Networking. You might not have a lot of time for yourself if there are lots of people coming and going today. Fortunately, you like the ideas and energy that others bring to the table. Let the conversation flow and rely on your clever sense of humor to help resolve a tense situation if one develops. Your quick wit can save the day.

A recent promise could lead to disappointment unless you are conscientious about what you say. A new project at work may require your care and cultivation, but don't fret if you miss an intriguing opportunity. You can learn from your mistakes now, ensuring that you will get what you desire in the future. Don't become rigid in your thinking; if you keep your mind moving toward the future, rather than clinging to the past, all things become possible.

Your competitive juices start to flow today if an aggressive person questions your skills. If you choose to accept the challenge, it's smarter to just do the best you can rather than concentrating on winning at all costs. Your best shot at achieving success is by continuing to respond to the current circumstances with an open mind. Focusing only on the end result could distract you from the beauty of the present moment.

Although you might attempt to gloss over a few details today, it's the littlest things that make or break a relationship. Discussing even the smallest differences of opinion can have a positive impact. This means stating your position without blame. Most things are possible if both parties are willing to equally give and take. You may be surprised with the results now if you approach a partnership with an open heart.

Fast reactions help you to find brilliant solutions now, while inspiration motivates you to try a new strategy. If others seem like they are out to get you, your instincts can quickly take you to a place of safety. Knowing what you want motivates you to focus and achieve your goals. Stick to your position even if you meet opposition. Be bold; it's your day to take a chance and reach for the stars.

Your unwavering commitment on the job might not bring the results you currently desire. Still, it's great that you have the drive and intensity to push so hard. But you could rub someone the wrong way today if you're not careful, so consciously acknowledge the opinions of others in all your interactions. Trying a new approach may be a great idea as long as everyone is on the same page. Happily, your positive attitude and honorable intentions can inspire your allies to follow your lead.

Gambling with your own feelings might be exhilarating today, but your current penchant for risk-taking may also create trouble. You don't have to push the envelope too far to enjoy yourself. However, if there's romance in the air, share your heart with someone who is ready for love. Being honest about your desires breaks down barriers and could lead to a lasting connection.

You have a tremendous amount of energy today and the best way to channel it is to catch up on work at home. Begin a major cleaning project or redecorate a room that needs an overdue upgrade. Letting go of old belongings can make way for something wonderful and new. Be courageous, even if you feel like you're climbing out on a limb. But don't do anything halfway; jumping in with both feet enables you to accomplish more than you expect.

Various streams of information flow together and make perfect sense to you as the reflective Moon visits your 3rd House of Communication. Interesting ideas that have been floating around in your imagination now begin to form coherent patterns. Your astute comprehension allows you to convert facts into an executable plan. But choose your words carefully, since they can effectively light a fuse of inspiration under someone close to you. It would be really nice to have a partner in success.

Sometimes you can drift off into your imagination and forget about your physical self. Now, however, your energy is drawn into your body and you are ready to make your move. But it's not just about improving your health; you also have an opportunity to look better and increase your self-confidence. Establishing realistic priorities allows you to feel good about the tangible results you achieve.

You are eager to finish up old business today, even if only in preparation for the coming week. You may be confident that you can accomplish all the tasks that are on your current list. Nevertheless, concentrating on your work is a struggle now; you want to spend your time daydreaming about more creative pursuits. Don't get sidetracked; stick to your agenda and you will be rewarded for what you do rather than for what you think.

Even if you choose your words carefully today, there's still plenty of room for your friends to misinterpret what you say. You may believe you are being specific, but others still miss your point. Perhaps you require additional time to fully develop your ideas, even though you might not realize it yet. There's no need to judge yourself harshly; it's okay to unfold your perspective slowly. You really don't need to be in such a hurry to share your story.

You may be unclear as to what you should be doing today, even if your responsibilities have been spelled out in great detail. Nevertheless, you want to know how your part integrates with the big picture before you carry out your job. Although it isn't easy to stop asking questions, it's smarter now to simply do exactly as instructed without attempting to understand how all the pieces of the puzzle fit together. Let go and watch everything magically fall into place.

Although you're in a contemplative mood today, your thoughts are slightly out of focus. It's as if you are under a spell that intensifies the magic while preventing you from seeing things as they truly are now. Luckily, you have the ability to conjure up an ideal situation in your mind and then step into it by using your powers of active imagination. This meditative trick may not be useful for making a practical decision, but it's quite helpful for exploring creative pursuits.

Something unusual is unfolding today yet you can't seem to put your finger on it. Nevertheless, you are lured toward investigating beyond the obvious in the hope of finding magic hiding in the shadows. Unfortunately, too much searching might actually distract you from the amazing beauty that is right under your nose. For now, the devil may really be in the details.

It's quite a feat to cleverly embellish your story so much today that others actually believe you're telling the truth. Uncharacteristically, you aren't as worried about the facts now as you are in keeping people interested in your message. There's nothing wrong with letting your imagination run wild as long as you practice full disclosure, so everyone knows that you're just sharing a dream.

It's easier to be a follower today rather than a leader, even if you have a very specific goal in mind. You can certainly turn on the charm in order to attract someone's attention, but it may be harder to demonstrate the authority that it takes to be in charge. There's no shame in letting someone else be the boss now while you relinquish control and recharge your batteries. Being a team player improves your chances for success.

You may express your feelings and present your ideas in a very seductive way today. Although others might not be interested at first, you are adept at drawing them into your story by conjuring up mythical images and fantastic characters. Once you have a captive audience, you can cleverly pull them in even further. However, subtle manipulation of the facts leads to trouble, especially if you're motivated by fear or greed. There's nothing wrong with painting a beautiful picture but it's still safer to simply stick with the facts.

You inspire others today with your grand visions and your carefully orchestrated words. Your gift of gab allows you to string together one idea after another as if each is a pearl on a necklace. However, weaving too many threads of thought into an enchanting tapestry of concepts grows overly complicated, leaving your friends confused, rather than motivated. You may be tempted to play the role of a muse, but it's wise to balance your creative side by also being practical. Leading by example is your most effective approach.

If furthering your education is on your mind, start nailing down some of the details right away. Thankfully, you have the patience to focus on the specifics, without losing sight of the big picture now. However, you must be careful not to concentrate too much effort in the wrong direction. Making preliminary decisions today is an excellent idea as long as you leave some options on the table for another few weeks. No matter what your current plans are, expand your vision of the future.

Unrealistic expectations about a recent investment or a large purchase involving others could get you into trouble now. Although you might be able to make money or acquire something of value, you need to take plenty of extra time to separate your hopes from reality. Avoid getting swept up in someone's idealism today; it's not wise to believe everything you are told. Diligently check the facts if you want to ensure success.

You're exceptionally receptive to other people's ideas today, making you also susceptible to deception. Thankfully, this magical aspect can also awaken your spirituality, inspire your creativity and increase your fascination with music and art. It's challenging to distinguish between your fantasies and reality now; mischievous Mercury's opposition to seductive Neptune suggests that you should ask a few questions before you wander down a garden path. Follow your bliss, not someone else's.

Although you have responsibilities to fulfill today, it's difficult to resist creating a bit of mischief, instead. You want to take a risk and break out of your normal routine, even if you realize self-indulgence isn't the smartest course of action now. You may attempt to justify your behavior, yet your current judgment might not be very clear. Ask a trusted friend for a different perspective before doing something you will later regret. Following your whims is fine as long as no harm comes to others.

You feel as if you're wired for pleasure today since your ruling planet Venus opposes electric Uranus. Nevertheless, your intense desires might create an emotional short circuit if you think that satisfaction is out of reach. Your fantasies may be quite unrealistic, but it really doesn't matter if you believe in your daydreams or not. You don't need to follow through with every wish. What's important now is to give yourself permission to imagine what would bring you happiness if anything was possible.

You may hope to float through the day on a cloud of romantic illusions, but an unexpected event can shock you out of your reverie. Even if you quickly adapt to a change of plans, you still might overlook the significance of what is happening. Although you could be surprised by what you learn, it's still wise to contemplate what the cosmos is attempting to tell you. Taking time to interpret your dreams reveals secrets you could otherwise miss.

Someone's reaction to your request at work today might not be what you expect; however, you can take nearly anything in stride with the right attitude. At first, you may be anxious because you don't want to confront the unknown, but you're relieved to learn the truth now, even if it catches you off guard. Don't let your subconscious motivations mislead you into pushing the information away; integrate the new data and alter your plans as needed before moving on.

You are super excited about someone or something new in your life now, but you're afraid that your current enthusiasm won't last. You may be overly cautious about letting completely go and enjoying yourself because you believe that your sense of freedom will quickly be restrained by limiting circumstances. Change is inevitable, but worrying about the future doesn't have to interfere with today's pleasures. Enjoy the present moment while it lasts.

You might be surprised by someone's selfish behavior today and you could even be offended by people's lack of compassion. Rational analysis won't help you to understand their actions because logic is not the motivating factor now. Unexplainable changes are to be expected if tension is stressing a relationship. But don't over-analyze anyone's motives; simply respond with kindness and honesty. The storm will pass quickly if you keep your heart open and remain flexible in your thinking.

Previously hidden desires may float to the surface today. Your key planet Venus is visiting your 1st House of Self and her opposition to unorthodox Uranus in your 7th House of Relationships can uncover something about your partner that you didn't previously know. But rather than waiting for anyone to surprise you with an unexpected revelation, take the initiative and be an agent of change, yourself. Embrace the shift proactively instead of resisting it.

You would like to let go of old expectations once and for all and express your current feelings spontaneously today as creative Venus opposes progressive Uranus in your 5th House of Romance. Unfortunately, you might not know exactly what you want. Your emotions are slippery now, making it difficult to choose any one course of action. Nevertheless, you have an amazing opportunity to learn something important about love if you're willing to relinquish control and go with the flow.

You wish a friend or partner would make a straightforward decision today, but the clarity you seek may continue to be elusive. Instead of receiving a yes or no answer now, you're required to live with someone's uncertainty. However, it's likely that other people's ambivalence might simply be a reflection of your own, even if you believe that you already made your choice. Don't push for resolution since it will take time for all the facts to fully emerge. A little patience gives inspiration a chance to strike.

You want to gather as much useful information as you can today, since you might mistakenly believe that the solution to your current dilemma is in having all the facts. Unfortunately, you may be in a hurry now, allowing you to make a wrong assumption and jump to an incorrect conclusion that's based on your desires. Acknowledge what you want, but be smart and postpone any major decision until your energy settles down. Your path should begin to clear in just a few days, bringing success within your reach.

Your craving for connection pushes you one way today, while your need for independence pulls you another. You may long for more intimacy in your everyday life, yet still keep others at an arm's length if you're afraid of losing your autonomy. Thankfully, a sudden breakthrough in your awareness can zap your heart open and instantaneously intensify the dynamics of a relationship. If lightning strikes, set aside practicalities and be flexible enough to fully engage the magic of the moment.

Your perspective on a close relationship could be challenged today, making you weary of the familiar tensions you feel. You don't want to argue with your partner over another misunderstanding; nor do you want to waste energy justifying your desires. Your needs are simple now; you just want your heartfelt disclosure to be heard and acknowledged. Avoid ultimatums; just share what you need in a gentle manner and then be patient. The dynamics are shifting quickly and you just may receive what you want.

It's tempting to look only at the positive aspects of a relationship today. Although it may be satisfying to pursue pleasure, avoiding the facts for the sake of convenience won't serve you in the long run. You might even need to overcompensate and act quickly to set the energy right again. It's better to have an experience that you know is real, rather than one that's based on illusions. You'll be happier in the long run if you don't go to extremes.

Your energy is irrepressible today, especially if you sweet talk your way into someone's heart. Your charm is undeniable but be careful; if you lay it on too thickly, your plan could backfire. Luckily, you can enjoy yourself now by taking a more moderate approach. Improving your daily routine by concentrating on sustaining small pleasures is your key to true satisfaction.

Even if you fully intend to respect authority today, you may inadvertently slip into a disagreement with your boss or someone in control. The funny thing is that you can get away with nearly anything now, so there might not be a price to pay for your feisty attitude. However, it's no fun to discover there are limits the hard way by taking things too far. Changing your attitude allows you to use your positive energy to save the day.

Your protective shell breaks open today as you express ideas that you've been keeping secret. There's no reason to worry about what others think; your message will be well received if you are sincere. But if you start out in a defensive posture, they might respond with the attack you were fearing. Be gentle and don't overstate your cause. Ultimately, balancing your confidence with humility puts everyone at ease.

Your moods swing wildly today in the shifting breezes of conversations. Although you might believe you're sure of your position, you can change your mind now as fast as a swallow turns in a circle. In fact, others may think you're less stable because you are flying all over the map, but don't worry too much about anyone else's expectations. As long as you refrain from acting like you know it all, people will be highly tolerant of your meanderings. Let your creativity soar and see where it takes you.

You may be feeling a bit anxious because you don't know how others will react to your desires today. Your thoughts keep running into resistance and instead of performing your methodical analysis, you're ready to cause a scene. Your response might be to grow more extreme in your thinking now, as if that will overcome the opposition. Don't waste your time, you won't likely power your way through this one. Keep your eyes open for an opportunity to turn your day around.

You are unusually optimistic about love now, and might believe that you can flip nearly any situation into a positive one. Embrace the positive energy; just keep in mind that Jupiter's influence can convince you that everything is wonderful and that all will end well. Thankfully, a current relationship dynamic is likely to improve, but your optimism may have little or nothing to do with reality at this time. Don't deceive yourself into believing that all is okay if it's not. A realistic attitude today prevents disappointment and heartache tomorrow.

Your need to be honest is being challenged today by your desire to be nice -- not that these feelings are completely mutually exclusive. But there is a gradient and it may be nearly impossible to be truthful without upsetting someone you like. Nevertheless, you must make a choice and live with it. Saying what's on your mind now could stir up trouble in the present moment, but it will improve the emotional flow over the days ahead. Starting from a place of compassion sets a good example for everyone involved.

Your desires might be so exaggerated that you can't find satisfaction now that sweet Venus is activating your key planet, Jupiter. The result of this dilemma is a tendency to overeat, over-drink or overindulge your senses. It may feel good for a while, but be forewarned that you're sliding down a slippery slope. Maintaining a high level of awareness today can prevent the morning-after syndrome tomorrow. You can still have fun without reaching a saturation point.

It may seem as if other people's feelings are at odds with yours today. Or, perhaps the data you receive just doesn't support your previous point of view. Nevertheless, your friends or coworkers might try to gloss over the differences. You, on the other hand, want to keep things real. However, expressing your anger won't bring you any closer to success or happiness. Take a deep breath and gratefully accept the lessons that life is handing you now.

There's someone out there who has a very special message for you, but you need to open your heart in order to hear it. The blind optimism of Jupiter is pushing sensual Venus, motivating you to take care of your needs, but your energy is poised right at the edge of a cliff. Take a few steps back rather than jumping into the abyss. Your attraction is only going to get stronger over the days ahead. There's no reason to leap before you are ready. Trust your instincts and follow your feelings.

If you don't express your needs now, the chance may not come again for a long time. This moment may soon be lost because a situation in your life has just about reached the end of its road. Take action today, but only if you have the support of others. This isn't the best time to start something on your own. However, working as part of a group can amplify the potential rewards beyond your expectations.

You want to say what's on your mind but you need to pick your topics of discussion carefully now because your words might stir up more controversy than you wish. You won't be satisfied following the party line today, yet you still appear to have ideas that are intelligent and sensible. Be clear and stick to the point; others will listen to you even if they don't agree with your opinion. Keeping communication channels open cultivates positive growth.

Although you may be accused of avoiding the tough questions sometimes, no such possibility exists today. You're the one who is pushing for more meaning now and you want others to follow your lead. But even if they can see what brings you closer to your truth, it could lure them further away from theirs. Don't expect people to endorse your thinking by joining your cause; just make certain that it's valid for you before you act on your beliefs. Seek the answers from within.

You don't want to make a decision today and yet you know what your preference would be if you were forced to share it with others. Don't let anyone coerce you into talking before you are fully ready or you might end up resenting whoever tries to control you. How much to reveal and when to reveal it is solely your choice alone. A kind word and a smile are enough to keep the peace for now.

You might not feel as lighthearted as you appear today, but others won't realize it unless they overstep their bounds and try to get you to say something you don't actually believe. Fortunately, your endorsement is not up for grabs to the highest bidder. In fact, you might not be driven to engage with someone else's drama right now; you just want to continue doing the best job you can without making any further promises about the future.

An apparently casual conversation may lead you into the shadows today, where you can see previously hidden areas of your consciousness. As new ideas continue to rise into awareness, you want to do something about them -- yet it still might be wiser to simply observe while waiting to act on your plans at a later time. Keep in mind that your decision to remain silent adds to your current air of mystery, which is not a bad thing at all. Exploring your dreams now is more productive on your own.

Although you sound quite passionate about many subjects today, you might not be all that interested in sharing your feelings. It's not that you are detached from what you are saying; it's just that this is more of an intellectual exercise now than something of integral importance to you. But you still could get caught up in wanting to be right since Mercury is occupying your logical sign. Backing down from an indefensible position now is a true sign of wisdom.

You have a sharper-than-normal edge to your tongue today as clever Mercury forms a smooth connection with incisive Pluto. Your words can cut to the bone and your message could inadvertently do damage before you even realize what has happened. It's one thing to take a swipe at an opponent intentionally; however, it doesn't feel good if you accidentally hurt a friend. Thankfully, taking a compassionate approach right from the start enables you to spread love and light rather than fear.

You long for some quality downtime today because you've been running at a sustained level of heightened intensity for a while now. Although the pace has begun to wear on your nerves, you are able to rejuvenate your energy by keeping your emotions private. There's no need to tell all your secrets, even if you are feeling more open than usual. Don't give away too much of your time; you gain more power now by taking care of yourself. Clear your schedule to recharge your batteries and regenerate your vitality.

It's time to undertake a project at work that requires a serious amount of mental fortitude now since you have the skills to concentrate until the job is done. Luckily, your ability to muster support from friends makes everything run smoother. Although the potential to have fun is always looming near the horizon, don't be distracted until you accomplish something tangible. Dig in your heels today and complete the business at hand.

You feel as if you have been on an emotional roller coaster and it may finally be time to end the ride today. But you must be creative in your approach when you stand up to those who have made your life more complicated. Don't blame anyone else for your extreme emotions now; if you do, you'll just go around again and again in the same conversation. Instead, accept responsibility for your part in the recent drama and be ready to move on once and for all.

You may be surprised by the intensity of your own feelings now that relentless Pluto trines Mercury in your 8th House of Intimacy. You assume that you understand the current situation only to discover that everything is not as you perceived. Fortunately, you can think on your feet and are quite capable of quickly regaining your balance. But don't dwell on the past; once things are stable again, let go of any residual negativity you might be holding onto for no reason. Creativity abounds when you stay in the present moment.

There's a part of you that won't be satisfied until you've turned your support network inside out today. Rather than looking for comfort from your friends, you're more interested in having them infuse more meaning into your life. But they might not be proactive enough for you now until you do something radical that catches them off balance. Fortunately, once you shine your light, others will be more likely to follow.

Your spontaneous nature is irrepressible now because your thoughts are moving quickly, inspiring you to show off your intelligence and wit. Unfortunately, someone could resent your success if you draw too much attention. There isn't anything wrong with wanting to be noticed, but there's no need to hog the spotlight. Don't waste time trying to impress others; redirect your mental energy to concentrate on doing the best job you can. Let your brilliance shine through your work.

You might become so caught up in wanting to be creative today that you lose track of your real priorities. Fortunately, you don't have to be quite as productive as you think now. Replenish your energy by doing what feels good to your spirit. In fact, temporarily letting your efficiency slip could give you a chance to recharge your batteries, fueling your next great adventure.

Relationship dynamics are tricky because you don't have the patience now to follow through with an intense discussion, even if that's what your partner wants. Although your current avoidance mechanisms are working well with the Moon in your clever sign, sidestepping a difficult conversation only charges the issue with more passion. Thankfully, showing up with a willingness to dig into a tough topic can ultimately lead to the increased intimacy you really crave.

Someone close to you may be blocking your progress, but direct confrontation only increases the resistance today. You are tempted to withdraw and proceed in secret on your own, but there are distinct advantages to working out in the open. Whatever you do now, don't delay your decision. Make up your mind and live with whatever path you choose. Be kind when you let others know your plans, but don't waste time giving endless justifications for your choice. You command admiration simply by remaining true to your beliefs.

Making a sensible financial decision today ultimately solidifies your position. You may believe that purchasing beautiful things for those you love is a simple expression of your affection, but others might not care as much as you think they should. Putting on a show with a gift can be a source of temporary enjoyment, but it's more personal to demonstrate your abundant generosity in non-materialistic ways. A sincere gesture from the heart means more than anything you can buy.

Your changing needs add complexity to a current emotional situation, especially if recent experiences get jumbled up with what's happening now. You may be so entangled in your own thoughts that it's challenging to be receptive to someone else's feelings. But letting go of your fear of losing control gives you a chance to share a magical moment with a close friend. Shifting your focus outward increases your compassion and improves your interactions with others.

Although you seem quite talkative today, your chattiness might be part of your strategy to keep something hidden from others. However, your secrets could suddenly be brought out in the open. Rather than protecting yourself or someone else by remaining silent, examine the choices that brought you to the current situation and reassess your motives for being so careful about what you say. In the meantime, relying on your instincts allows you to land gracefully on your feet.

Your anger may explode if you think that someone is trying to take something that's yours. Your hostility might be directed toward a friend who doesn't appear to have your best interests at heart. Unfortunately, the Moon is traveling through some bumpy territory today, increasing the volatility of your emotions. Before you just blurt out your reactions, take a deep breath and think carefully about what you're going to say. Overreacting feels cathartic in the moment but could create a situation that's complicated to untangle. Your message will have more impact if you remain calm, cool and collected.

Other people may seem slightly scattered now that the fickle Gemini Moon is visiting your 7th House of Companions. An inconsistent partner can inadvertently motivate you to concentrate your energy even more. You don't want to be perceived as a lightweight, so you might overcompensate and act annoyed in order to get your way. Be careful not to fabricate a problem where there is none, for once you stir up trouble, it won't be so easy to make it go away. Nevertheless, success is more likely if you stay focused on your goals.

You have a feeling now that something significant in your life is about to change, prompting you to plot further ahead in order to hold on to what you have. Keep in mind that you will need your physical energy as the shift gets underway, so don't fritter away your resources on unimportant activities. Ultimately, exercising self-discipline goes a long way toward establishing healthier routines that prepare you for the amazing future ahead.

You might be inclined to set off on your own, but you still can benefit from the assistance of a partner now. There may be crucial skills that you lack or, perhaps, you require financial support. Start looking for someone who can provide you with exactly what you need to get your project off the ground. However, caution is advised; don't let others add more input than is necessary or you could be less than happy with the end results. Setting clear boundaries allows you to collaborate without a loss of independence.

One of your friends may be trying to hand you responsibilities that shouldn't really be yours. Unfortunately, there isn't much you can do about it today without creating more problems. Even if you think you are being treated unfairly, you're better off to let it go for now. Move through the day with minimum resistance; you'll have plenty of time later on to settle the score. Taking the high road demonstrates your best self.

You may try to emotionally withdraw today, but your friends or co-workers won't let you retreat without good reason. They might seem overly aggressive today, which is an interesting turn since you are often the assertive one. Instead of retreating all the way, find a comfortable halfway point where you still can interact with others so everyone feels satisfied.

Refusing to adapt to someone else's schedule today may be your way of exerting control over an inequality that's actually outside your sphere of influence. Others might think you are being childish, yet you are very serious about leaving yourself a little room now to exercise your flexibility. Normally, it's your desire for stability that people honor, but now it currently works the other way around. Being adaptable allows you to have the most fun.

If you're unsure about your feelings today, you might attempt to overcompensate in order to prevent others from sensing your doubts. You may state your case clearly and then defend it eloquently, convincing everyone that you are passionate about your cause. Meanwhile, your angst could become a problem if your ambivalence remains stronger than your need to choose. Assume the best possible outcome and then take appropriate action; the power of positive thinking can't be overemphasized.

You don't have to say a word for others to understand how you are feeling today. It's as if you're wearing your heart on your sleeve now that the moody Cancer Moon is moving through your 1st House of Personality. Nevertheless, you're likely to talk up a storm once you overcome your inertia and initiate a conversation about a controversial subject. Luckily, you may receive more support than you expect if you're willing to take a risk and share what's on your mind.

You can accumulate power today by keeping your deepest needs to yourself. The reflective Moon shifts into your 12th House of Secrets early this morning to remind you of the momentum you can build by not telling anyone about your deepest needs. But even your temporary fear of rejection may not be enough to keep you completely isolated. Consider all the valid reasons to hide your agenda. Then stretch beyond your comfort level and lay your cards on the table for all to see. Revealing your vulnerabilities is hard work that will be rewarded sooner than you think.

Your tendency to approach your friends and colleagues with unnecessary caution now is supported by your methodical assessment. Fortunately, your precise perceptions and incisive logic sharpen your intuitive instincts, building your confidence level high enough, prompting you to explain your thought process to others. Don't be afraid to share your gifts -- especially now when your message is so vital.

You need to balance your ambitious nature with a softer and more sensitive side of your personality today. On one hand, you're enthusiastic to get ahead now that the Moon shifts into your 10th House of Public Status. On the other hand, your commitment to your family may be even more important than your desire for success. Don't waste time wondering which way to go. Fortunately, your inner voice offers the best advice if you just take time to tune into your imagination and listen.

You might not be telling anyone about your new plans for the next stage of your life. Maybe it's because you aren't ready for any realistic feedback; however, a fresh perspective can help you fine-tune your ideas. But you aren't so interested in the little details since the wistful Cancer Moon in your 9th House of Big Ideas encourages you to dream about your connection to the universe. Thankfully, you don't have to take an all-or-nothing position. Sharing a few thoughts is a good start and can get the ball rolling in the right direction.

You don't have as much time as you think now, so it's unwise to promise the sky unless you're sure you can deliver the goods. Mischievous Mercury supports auspicious Jupiter in your 8th House of Shared Resources, enabling you to profit from a joint enterprise if you are realistic in your assessment. Unfortunately, you could be quick to gloss over an important detail if it stands in your way. Exhibiting confidence is healthy, but only if your optimism is supported by the facts.

You have your own agenda today and may grow irritable if people make emotional demands on your time. Naturally, you're eager to help a friend, but it may be difficult to let go of your attachment to your previous schedule. Forget about your own agenda for a while and take your cues from others now. Changing your attitude by temporarily shifting your attention away from your personal goals is easier once you realize that it's also for your own good.

You may be a bit anxious today because the moody Cancer Moon highlights your discomfort with your emotions. Fortunately, your feelings can be a source of strength if you don't attempt to avoid or deny them. Instead of closing down your sensitive perceptions, consciously widen your perspective by concentrating on your long-term goals. Opening your heart deepens your connection with the entire universe.

You can be quite playful now that the Moon is dancing through your 5th House of Fun and Games. However, you still must exercise a bit of discipline because others can make an activity seem so good that you're tempted to drop everything and head off to follow them.
