Don't wait for your boss to get on your case about something you didn't complete. Finishing your work before you escape will only sweeten your search for pleasure.

Thoughts may weigh heavily on your mind now. You have an intuitive sense about what is real and you're motivated to talk your walk, even if you're traveling on a rocky path. You might not know how to proceed, but your uncertainty isn't a valid justification for inaction. Speak the truth that previously existed only within your imagination. Others are more likely to connect with you honestly and lovingly if you can push through your fears and express what's in your heart.

You are tempted to do too much today, but finishing everything you start is nearly impossible. You're familiar with the rules of the road and you're prepared to follow them, even if you want to step out of line and say what's on your mind anyway. Ultimately, you might as well share what you're thinking since others probably already know -- and it's better if they hear it directly from you. Nevertheless, don't transfer blame to anyone else; deliver your messages with compassion and brevity so you can do whatever is next on your list.

You are very contemplative today, but it may be challenging to keep your thoughts on the positive side of the spectrum. Your key planet Mercury aspects karmic Saturn, making you a force with which to be reckoned. Use your formidable communication skills to your advantage, but don't try to be too clever. Keep your message sincere and be your authentic self.

Perhaps you have slipped into a bit of an emotional funk recently and see no quick and easy way out of your dilemma. Thankfully, you don't have to pretend that everything is peachy keen if it's not. Rather than hiding what's important from those who want to love you, take a risk and share what's on your mind. The simple act of confiding in a friend could be enough to shift the energy and lighten your heart.

A firestorm of self-awareness is burning through your gray matter, but the results may be uncharacteristically serious. It's not that you have lost confidence; it's just that your optimism comes and goes now. Your tendency is to suppress any negativity, but avoiding the truth just makes things worse. A more radical solution might be in order today. Sharing your feelings without censoring them allows others to get to know the real you.

Your friends come through for you in unexpected ways today. However, making a big deal of their actions might be the wrong strategy because it draws unnecessary attention to issues best left out of the spotlight. Avoiding emotional extremes improves nearly any interaction now. Express your appreciation without going over the top. A simple gesture can be more heart touching than a parade down Main Street.

Make a decision and stick with it today, even if you doubt yourself later on. After all, you know what the truth is and you know what should be done about it. Don't be afraid to speak your mind, for you have the authority now to tell it exactly like it is. Granted, you may upset someone with your uncharacteristic obstinacy, but don't let this be your primary concern. You need to voice your opinion and then deal with the consequences as they play out.

You know that you have the power to manifest the changes that are currently needed. Although somber Saturn is leaning on you, your self-criticism and self-judgment is not productive or necessary. Remember that you are only restrained by the limitations of your own thought processes -- and this comes from within, not from external circumstances or anyone else. Have the courage to envision your wishes coming true and then strive to make it happen.

You may be struggling against the lessons that Saturn is attempting to teach you, but the hardest work is probably already completed. The time to put your strategy into action is near and whatever you do today sets the stage for what follows. You might think that you have to demonstrate your progress toward a specific goal, but this isn't part of the current curriculum. Hold true to what's most important to you, but don't be overbearing. Practice compassion while accepting the current restrictions being placed on your plans.

You're ready to tear down any walls that may be in your way today. However, you are tired of being the one who bears the ultimate responsibility for everything that happens, and you might even consider walking away from your goals. Thankfully, you can rest assured that common sense will come to your rescue now. Move with determination instead of aggression for the best results.

Try not to take others by surprise with your unusual behavior today, for acting rashly won't bring you what you want. You might not get away with being too eccentric now, so you're better off adapting to the current situation than attempting to change it. Nevertheless, don't dim your light more than necessary or you will lose your edge of brilliance. Find that magical balance between being true to yourself and fulfilling other people's expectations.

Even if you feel like you're carrying an emotional burden today, you have an opportunity to carefully process and release what's been bothering you. There's no reason to hold on to your fears. Doubting yourself is not productive and only prevents you from embracing the love that may be waiting on your doorstep. All you have to do is open the door and let it in.

You are driven to get a lot done today, but you're not likely to scatter your energy by running off in too many directions. Make something dramatic happen by setting a goal and concentrating on your intentions, especially in the areas of romance and recreation. Don't obsess about producing too many tangible results or you could miss out on a chance to have fun in the present moment.

You might be feeling as if you have something to say that isn't easily expressed verbally, yet you must use language to communicate. Unfortunately, actions won't necessarily speak louder than words today, because you may not be able to demonstrate what's in your heart. Your behavior can grow quite intense but circumstances could require you to move slower than you wish. Rely on your persistence and not your speed to make sure you deliver your message clearly.

The power of your mind might be your secret weapon today, enabling you to make money from a visionary idea. It's best to act while your confidence is high; overcoming self-doubt isn't easy when the tentative Cancer Moon visits your 2nd House of Self-Esteem. Take advantage of your current fixed purpose -- a trait you sometimes lack. Don't resist your new-found determination; instead, use it to accomplish great things while you are feeling so highly motivated.

Emotional waves wash over you with memories today, bringing up long-forgotten details from your past. There are nuggets of wisdom in what you can remember, but you have to bring these feelings into the present moment. Try connecting your recollections to something that is happening now with the goal of changing your reactions. You don't have to repeat an old mistake; letting go of unrealistic expectations frees you to move into new territory with a clean slate.

Hidden currents can quickly pull you into deep waters today, but you may exhaust yourself trying to fight against the relentlessness of these tides. Your best strategy is to flow along with the powerful circumstances unfolding in your life. Don't try to control what is beyond your capability. Instead, make an alternative plan and then wait for the right time to act. Your progress will meet little resistance once the timing is right.

You are stretching your wings today because you believe that pretty much anything is possible. The previous limitations you placed on yourself enabled you to keep your feet on the ground, but now you are ready to fly. Whatever you want to do begins in your mind. Dream about it first, and then do whatever it takes to make your vision real.

Although your logic tells you one thing and your feelings say something else, there is a viable solution to your dilemma within reach. Unfortunately, your infamous Libra indecisiveness won't buy you much time today. You have to make up your mind and stick with your decision. You might be pleasantly surprised as others show up now to support you and help you make the changes that you most desire.

Spending time with your friends today sounds like a great idea, but your personal needs could get lost in all the noise. Instead of just going along with the crowd, honor your heart's desires first. Unfortunately, you may have to wander off on your own to find peace and quiet. Once you have reconnected with your center, partaking in social activities will be much more pleasurable for everyone involved.

You have the strength of purpose to finish whatever you start today. You might even be so driven now that you're planning everything you want to accomplish next week. However, there's still a part of you that might not want to do anything at all. You wish you could just kick back and have a good time, but you cannot ignore your responsibilities. Take the high road and save the fun for another time. It's more important to make progress toward your goals than to rest on your laurels. Carpe diem!

You're not interested in playing the role of the peacemaker today because you have your own agenda to follow. Nevertheless, someone may continue to bug you to act as a go-between until you acquiesce. Unfortunately, you're uncomfortable if you're pushed into an emotionally charged situation since you know that you don't have a practical solution in mind. However, there's no reason to avoid all entanglements; you stand to win more than anyone else from honestly engaging with others.

Everything might feel a little out of whack today, especially if you get sucked into someone's emotional drama that's not directly related to you. Establish clear boundaries and don't be afraid to go back over ground that you've already covered, if necessary. You have a much better chance of getting what you want if you come right out and state your needs now. The squeaky wheel gets the grease.

Relationship dynamics grow quite intense today, but you gain strength from emotional interactions with others. At first, expanding your perspective sounds like a great idea, but you might not be ready to give up your point of view. Too much resistance to change could force you to repeat an old cycle one more time. Learning a karmic lesson now frees you from the past so you can fully connect with others in the present moment.

You are enthusiastic about your future prospects, yet as soon as you make your move, the energy begins to disperse. The problem is that you must figure out where you want to go before your new path is revealed. Nevertheless, this doesn't lessen the likelihood of a significant shift. Something's going to change; you just need to decide what. Adopting a proactive approach enables you to be in charge of the direction you take.

You may have to respond to an unexpected twist of fate, testing your confidence. But this unscheduled hiccup isn't necessarily negative, for you can turn an upsetting situation into one that is quite enjoyable. Still, you probably won't know where the day will take you, even if you have a well-developed plan in place. Don't worry if things fall apart; they will reorganize into something better in the next few days. Embrace the chaos as a vehicle for creating positive change.

Your concern over losing independence is triggered now that new responsibilities are weighing heavily on you. Unfortunately, you are probably more scattered than usual, so find somewhere to sit alone in a quiet place to reclaim your center. This little exercise to eliminate some of the extraneous noise in your life can turn your day around. Thankfully, you may be pleasantly surprised how easy it is once you remove the unnecessary distractions.

Facing an unusual set of circumstances is not your idea of a fun-filled day. Others, it seems, are not playing the current game according to your rules. Although confusion might not seem like a source of happiness, an unplanned detour could bring additional freedom that enables you to respond in new ways. Trusting your intuition can help you stabilize the imbalanced situation and save the day.

A bit of confusion now isn't as worrisome as it seems at first. You are on a creative roll, so keep your eyes wide open so you can recognize the truth when you see it. It doesn't matter whether or not information is coming from totally unexpected quarters. You are being shown an extreme solution to a problem that doesn't have a normal way out. Take a leap of faith and fly.

Your dilemma is that logic and practicality won't fix anything now, which doesn't make you happy one bit. After all, you are itching for a dramatic transformation. Tread carefully because there is irrepressible movement stimulating tension within a relationship. If you attempt to withhold your energy, it could be awkwardly expressed by someone else. It's better, of course, when change originates from your heart.

You are considered to be a champion of harmony and grace, but you might not feel so accommodating today. Expect sudden shifts of energy, even if you have trouble putting your finger on the source. If someone suggests an idea that you can't immediately wrap your mind around, don't judge it too quickly. Let the thought unfold completely before you dismiss it as crazy. It's crucial to remain open to radical change and a new perspective offers you a chance to build something real and lasting.

Your friends might seem rather rigid in their thinking today, possibly pushing you to lose your temper and yell loudly as you try to wake them up to the truth. Even if you are thinking about the sacrifices you made and the freedom you gave up, don't try to force others to see things your way. Concentrate on the dynamics of what's happening and don't focus on any one particular outcome. Keeping your options open helps others to do the same.

You may be chasing a rainbow today, only to see it reappear over the next hill again and again. You have grown weary of the disappointments and frustrations and are reaching another fork in the road. You want to make something happen right away and you're eager to go where you've never gone. Change is in the air; initiating bold action greatly improves your chances of finding the pot of gold.

Escaping the stress is nearly impossible if you insist on your world being neat and tidy with everything under control. However, seeking the safety of stable structures isn't an option today. Whatever you have relied on in the past is now shifting. Fortunately, once you move beyond your fear of the unknown, you may find your journey quite exhilarating. Free your mind and enjoy the ride.

Your life feels unsettled today, yet something may happen that helps to facilitate the changes you want. A close friend or partner might demand your assistance, even if you can't deliver what's needed. Instead of stressing about an impossible situation, explain your limited availability as objectively as you can. Although you could have to manage someone else's disappointment, a compassionate approach should smooth over any ruffled feathers along the way.

You are usually willing to go along with the changing tides, even if permanent shifts don't always come easily to you. However, you have a wonderful opportunity now to alter your direction if you can remain adaptable to the current situation. You inspire others with your faith, especially if you aren't afraid of taking radical action at the right time. Remember, it's the dramatic gestures that will have the most impact today.

Watch your step today, instead of behaving recklessly. Your good intentions could backfire if you respond so quickly that you do something that offends a coworker or acquaintance. Save your sarcastic repartee and practical jokes for another day when the tensions aren't so tightly wired. Your rapid-fire reactions have the potential of acting like a lit match on a pile of dried hay. Avoid a difficult situation by taking a deep breath and thinking about the possible consequences before doing anything drastic.

Your friends might be worried that you will lose your temper today, but you have more than enough self-control to maintain your cool. It's not a good idea to become unhinged because reacting spontaneously isn't as effective now as sticking to your original plan. Nevertheless, there's no need to slip into denial about your feelings. Simply add a little time between the flash of awareness and when you actually jump in and do something about it. Look before you leap.

Share your ideas with your colleagues today, but don't take your disclosures too far. You might be tempted to put everything out on the table and then push for a positive response, but it's smarter to unveil your new plan slowly. Revealing too much information too fast overwhelms others and may cause them to withhold support. It's to your advantage to build up interest gradually, even if you must delay the big show until after Thursday's New Moon. In the meantime, fine tune your presentation for the greatest impact.

You must be very careful on the job today because you might inadvertently stir up resistance to your plans. You're traveling through some tricky territory and could feel the pressure to relieve your anxiety by setting everything right in one clean swoop. However, overreacting won't solve anything now. Adopting a positive attitude will ultimately help you accomplish more work than a panicky one; keep calm by breathing through the stress.

It's challenging to get anything done today because you might enjoy the attention you receive too much. It's hard to step out of the spotlight now that irrepressible Mars and the responsive Moon are moving through your dramatic sign. Others can't help but notice when you swing into motion. Remember, it really doesn't matter if you are seen or not, so don't purposefully seek recognition if you really want to finish all your work. Make the most of your current influence to shine your light on something that really matters.

Your analytical approach works well for you these days with the Sun and Mercury visiting your intelligent sign. However, a stressful aspect to unpredictable Uranus generates mental static now, making it impossible to think clearly. Unfortunately, you might not be able to delay an important decision today; just make sure that you separate your personal preferences from the facts so you can remain as objective as possible. Trust your innate ability to cut through the noise and solve the problem at hand.

You don't always enjoy being the one that everyone relies on to arbitrate a dispute. In fact, you might want to relinquish some of your relationship responsibilities today if you don't feel up to the job. However, it may take a while for your wish to be granted. Even if you are frustrated and tempted to walk away from something important now, don't do it yet. Let the dynamics unfold naturally because a surprising change of circumstances later in the day could dramatically shift your thinking in an exciting new direction.

Talking about your feelings today might not bring the exact results you seek. People may be open to hearing your story, but that doesn't mean they will agree with your conclusions or join in your cause. It's probably not the most opportune time to gather support for your plan because you don't know how others will react. Let go of your personal agenda for now and return to it after Thursday's New Moon when your chances of success improve. In the meantime, continue developing your best ideas because one of them could lead to a significant breakthrough.

Anticipation about a new project may drive you to the edge of a cliff today, but there's little chance of slipping and falling as long as you watch the ground directly in front of you. However, your excitement might be sufficient to distract you, and danger could sneak in if the adrenaline rush is too strong. Don't become so enamored with the potential adventure that your judgment becomes sloppy. You won't likely make any tactical errors if you pay careful attention to every step you take.

Your relationships may seem quite intense today, requiring you to become more emotionally involved than you prefer. You don't want someone else's needs to get in the way of your plans now, yet it's complicated to extricate yourself from the melodrama that appears at your doorstep. Consider if your intended retreat is based on practical matters or if you simply want to avoid your own discomfort with the situation. Don't withdraw from intimacy because you are scared; show your courage by facing your fears instead.

If you're feeling a bit off center today, you might respond inappropriately to a friend or partner unless you take the time to think first. The Sun zaps your key planet Uranus, overloading you with so many ingenious ideas that they may not be of any use in the real world. Nevertheless, brilliant thoughts can open your mind to new horizons. Your smartest strategy is to sit with your altered perspective for a bit instead of reacting so quickly that you turn your world upside down. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

You're acutely tuned into your psychic powers now and may even believe that you know exactly what to do at every unexpected twist in the road. Overall, your instincts should serve you well today. However, you could miss an important fact if you become overconfident, only to discover later that you're heading down a dead-end street. Fortunately, it's simple to restore balance by adding a bit of common sense to your intuitive approach. However, it never hurts to bring a map along just in case.

You could blow your top if you are uncertain how to handle today's intense energy, but it's crucial to move past your personal needs and think about everyone involved. Your key planet Mars connects with subtle yet powerful forces as it pushes you to take a risk by stepping outside of your usual modes of expression. Fortunately, you have the power to impact others in a positive way now if you choose to take the high road and lead by example.

You may not be in the mood to socialize today because you would rather finish your work. Luckily, you can enjoy expressing your creativity while also being practical in your approach. In fact, nearly anything you do now could be turned into a good time. Just don't become so preoccupied that you miss a chance to partake in a bit of fun with your friends. All work and no play isn't the healthiest way to live your life.

Sometimes you give the impression you are scattered, but you probably know what you are doing now and why you are doing it. Others observe you starting so many projects today that they assume you could not possibly finish them all. Nevertheless, you might ultimately have the last laugh when all your separate tasks magically fall into place. However, this won't happen on its own, so persistently work toward your goals throughout the entire day to get the results you want.

You have a lot on your mind now, but might find it more efficient to keep all the loose ends to yourself because they are easier to manage if you don't tell others what's going on. Don't be surprised if something slips out or if people catch wind of the drama you're trying to hide in the closet. Regardless of your fears, it will probably feel better for all involved once the truth is out.

You might be feeling financial pressures that are challenging to ignore today. Nevertheless, you can relieve the tension by addressing the issues head on instead of pretending they don't exist. Fortunately, there may be a magical solution to your problem, even if you aren't exactly sure what it is yet. A mystery friend could come to the rescue with exactly the right advice, or a bluebird could fly into your life with just what you need. Remain approachable -- and keep your windows open.

Although prioritizing your feelings makes sense, denying the inconvenient ones eventually causes trouble. The Moon's return to your sign today reawakens your need to discriminate which of your desires are most important. But you can take this analytical process to an extreme. Repressed emotions have a way of resurfacing with increased power. Let your mind wander as your moods change, but don't express every single thought as if it is your final answer. Remain open to change as your perspective continues to shift.

You might feel as if someone is sneaking around  behind your back today, but your desire to uncover a secret conspirator could create more problems than it solves. Rather than seeking the source of the current tension in your environment, it may be wiser to simply change your attitude about your reality. You are capable of performing social wizardry now. Demonstrate your competence through positive action and watch the external resistance fade away.

Your natural attraction to intensity is muted by the emotionally cool Virgo Moon today, but even an unpleasant situation won't necessarily stop you from talking. Ardent Mars is pushing you to express your heart's desire now, even if your delivery is constrained by the limitations of the current circumstances. At first, you might not be satisfied with the direction of a conversation, but a passionate exchange with someone you respect can open a door to deeper intimacy.

You should be able to retain your composure today even if someone's unexpected outburst seems out of place. If you don't know what to make of the surprising disclosure, there's a good chance you won't say anything at all. Unfortunately, your silence could cause you to miss a significant opportunity to further develop a friendship. Take a risk now and share your heartfelt reaction. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

It's tempting to go through the entire day without revealing your emotions. However, keeping cool isn't a license to be dishonest; just consider what's important to share and what should be kept to yourself for now. Still, you may approach others in a manner that seems aggressive to them. Fortunately, putting extra effort into vigorous exercise or a long walk today can bring relief by taking the edge off your feelings. You don't have to be the Rock of Gibraltar all the time.

You might not be ready to engage the passion that someone else seems to want from you today. But withdrawing emotionally just increases the drama. Instead of closing down, tell others exactly how you feel, even if you know it's not what they want to hear. Your carefully worded disclosure can establish safe boundaries while also setting the stage for a deeper connection, leaving everyone feeling better in the long run.

It seems like someone is raining on your parade today, but others could just be trying to help in their own way. Rather than over-personalizing constructive criticism, remain open to the advice you receive. Even if the tone of the message isn't as loving as you wish, push past your insecurities and figure out how you can improve yourself. There's an important lesson waiting to be discovered, but it will take courage for you to learn it.

Be careful about taking on too many new projects at work as today's New Moon in your 6th House of Employment highlights your daily routine. Consider the pros and cons in great depth before making a final decision. But it's not just about reassessing choices on the job. Relationships need attention too now, and intimacy doesn't come easily if you have fallen into a rut. Thankfully, you can still reach satisfaction if you are willing to go out on a limb and say what's on your mind.

You're drawn toward creative endeavors that have some kind of practical application today. The Virgo New Moon rattles your 5th House of Romance, adding the possibility of sweet love into the mix. Nevertheless, you must be serious and meet all your obligations before you go off to have fun. Luckily, once you establish a sustainable rhythm, you might become so involved with your work that it seems like play, anyway.

You aren't all that eager to share your feelings with others today. In fact, you could be quite reclusive as the shy Virgo New Moon hides in your 4th House of Family. You are more likely to stick close to home because you may not want to be around crowds. Don't fall into the trap of believing there is anything wrong just because you aren't particularly sociable now. Even the most interactive Gemini still needs an occasional break to recharge his or her batteries. Enjoy the peace and quiet while you can.

Eliminating extraneous tasks helps you cope with your busy schedule today, because otherwise you won't be able to finish everything on your plate. You could work yourself up into an anxious state by trying to carry out an overly ambitious plan. Save yourself from a headache and take time to indulge in a bit of rest and relaxation. With the New Moon's emphasis on your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, it's smarter to concentrate your energy than to scatter it.

You can't spend as much money as you might wish today, for the Virgo New Moon's presence in your 2nd House of Material Resources requires you to avoid unnecessary purchases. Although you may not have as much funds in your bank account as you thought, the real reason to postpone buying something is because you don't need it. Make your life more efficient by streamlining your finances and practicing self-restraint.

You're more likely to share your emotions now that the New Moon is in your earthy sign. Unfortunately, no matter what you plan, everything seems to take more work than you expect. It's true that life isn't always easy, but don't slip into negativity or you could end up wasting the insightful wisdom that is at your disposal. Just make sure the decisions you make today are fiscally sound; a practical approach makes your heart happy in the long run.

You don't want everyone to know how picky you are feeling today. You might choose to hide your fussiness by presenting a more acceptable side of your personality. The New Moon falls in your 12th House of Secrets so don't be afraid of keeping some thoughts private. Although the New Moon forms a supportive aspect with confident Jupiter, it won't likely be enough to offset your solitary mood. Don't allow others to assume the worst; it's smarter to explain your concerns instead of pretending that everything is okay.

You take your friendships quite seriously and the New Moon's presence in your 11th House of Social Networking reaffirms your need for meaningful relationships. Unfortunately, you can become overly anxious today about something that isn't very significant. Don't let your high standards turn into unrealistic demands since your drive for perfection could push others away. Instead, be more accepting now; your flexibility will ultimately strengthen the connections that matter the most.

You are highly motivated to get ahead at work as today's hardworking Virgo New Moon lands in your 10th House of Public Responsibility. Make plans for the not-too-distant future, but remember that Mercury's lingering contact with resistant Saturn may slow you down until next week. Set your plan in motion now and continue to build momentum until you reach optimum speed. There's no reason to wait for a better time to start.

You are the designated answer-person because you just seem to know what comes next with today's Virgo New Moon falling in your 9th House Big Ideas. Your calm demeanor and common sense appear to do the trick in nearly any situation now. Luckily, your organizational skills are also in great shape, so you should be able to execute your plan smoothly. Don't hesitate; get busy and use your current planetary advantage wisely.

Exploring relationship dynamics may be awkward because talking about your emotions isn't always your highest priority. However, there are treasures hidden beneath the surface and you stand to learn an important lesson now if you don't go racing off to solve the next intellectual problem. Fortunately, today's Virgo New Moon occurs in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, inspiring you to ask tough questions about delicate issues. Be courageous; expressing your vulnerability can bring you closer to someone you love.

The beginning of a relationship cycle holds many promises for the future because the dedicated Virgo New Moon activates your 7th House of Partners. But inflated hopes might have to be brought back down to Earth because your confidence is magnified by buoyant Jupiter today. Fortunately, you can avoid later disappointment if you scale back your expectations sooner than later. Establishing realistic goals now allows you to bask in the light of recognition once you manifest your dreams.

You're tempted to take job-related stress home today, but if you do others could become annoyed with your bad mood. You might feel as if you're on a collision course with reality, yet you can avoid an unpleasant scene by being more compassionate and listening to those you love. Remember, your attitude has more impact than you realize, so don't spread negativity by focusing on your problems. Stop talking about what could go wrong and concentrate on the highest potential instead.

You prefer to have an easygoing attitude about your current obligations, but there doesn't seem to be enough hours in the day to find time to relax. You want to finish your work today, but you cannot get away with performing as you have in the past. Don't fall into a rut; step outside of the box and make something exciting happen. Trying a new approach could lead to the breakthrough you need to increase your productivity.

There's no reason to bring up a subject today that has already been discussed one too many times. Nagging won't help you get what you want. Even though you might be uncharacteristically clinging to a past memory, others are eager to move on. Thankfully, if you pause and think about how your words could cause hurt feelings now, you may prevent an uncomfortable situation from occurring. Switching your focus to a creative activity enables you to focus on the present moment.

Although you want to be fair-minded today, it's easy to go overboard and ignore the action behind the scenes. You might perceive others as more optimistic now than they actually are, tricking you into thinking that everything is all right. But the real meaning of your current interactions may be connected to an intent that's so subtle you miss the point. Do your best to listen to what's being said in the silence between the spoken words to tune into the underlying truth.

An old issue may resurface today if a close friend or coworker says something hurtful that on any other day would have been harmless. But insensitive words could stimulate a difficult memory. One strategy to regain your composure is to distinguish between what happened in the past and what's occurring in the present. Keep in mind that you are not in the same place as you were before. Simply acknowledge the feeling and move on.

Sticking to the truth is absolutely crucial today because your current tendency to turn an event into something bigger than it actually is can be problematic. Be clear and direct when communicating your dissatisfaction if you're not happy, but stop once you've stated the facts or your message may be diluted. Above all, aim to keep all interactions grounded in reality. There will be plenty of time to dream later on.

You may be feeling very vulnerable after the evocative Moon returns to your sign today. You might even overcompensate by keeping your interactions as detached and rational as possible. However, withdrawing isn't a wise strategy now because the Moon tends to amplify your mood swings. Fortunately, focusing on your goals at work, rather than more personal issues, can temporarily alleviate your angst. It will be more productive to address your emotions once the storm has passed.

Burying your most intense emotions isn't new to you, yet you can rationalize your secrecy today once the Moon sneaks into your 12th House of Privacy. You might even put up a smokescreen by encouraging others to share their vulnerabilities so you don't have to disclose your own. It's easier to listen than to talk now, unless you're in the company of a trusted friend. However, even if you feel safe and are willing to open up, be careful about revealing too much. It may be more appropriate to process your strongest reactions on your own.

Your restlessness grows today, prompting you to take on more than you can handle. Although you might be able to talk your way through a tricky situation of your own creation, the conversation still could leave you feeling dissatisfied and on edge. Doing more won't solve your dilemma now; instead, graciously accept what's on your plate without looking for something else to distract you. Count your blessings; happiness is a frame of mind and is not solely based upon your accomplishments.

You might feel anxious if your current responsibilities seem overwhelming, but you can't just walk away from them. Although promising to do even more tomorrow can buy you some time today, this strategy isn't wise since you won't likely be able to fulfill your obligations then, either. Instead, start early and work hard to get as much as possible out of the way before any additional tasks are placed on your shoulders. Put your ambition to work and let your competence shine.

You're determined to reach your goals but a series of distractions may pull you off course now. Unfortunately, your desire to be different makes it trickier to cooperate with others. You could get so caught up with demonstrating your unorthodox approach today that you lose touch with what can be gained through compromise. Worry less about rebelling against the status quo and more about reaching your desired destination.

You might want to escape to fantasyland today, but you won't likely be able to afford this luxury. Your penchant for daydreaming could be overwhelmed by a series of twists and turns that put you on a new course. It isn't easy to avoid your real world responsibilities now, but it also may be tough to maintain a consistent level of productivity. Your smartest strategy is to temporarily set aside your personal agenda and do whatever you must to meet your current obligations.

You can easily see both sides of nearly any issue today, making it challenging to know exactly what to do. You might even wonder if you're up for the conversation because you're unclear as to where it could lead. Although you're trying to keep your feet on the ground, the real world may seem more distant than your dreams. Remember, you have the ability to tap in to a deeper sense of power if you can just cut through the fog and get out of your own way.

You may find yourself more interested in how things feel now than the truth of what's behind the mask. You need to be careful today, for you can make incorrect assumptions about something or someone based upon their presentation without even considering what's beneath the surface. A little makeup goes a long way, so if you have an important choice in front of you, remember not to judge the book by its cover. Taking the time to dig deeper improves your chances of making the best decision.

There are unintelligible mysteries lurking within your dreams today and you must fight them head on or embrace them; otherwise, they may get the best of you. If you choose combat, utilize your mental agility and your clever repartee; brute force won't conquer any dragons now. Your safest course of action is to engage any adversaries as equals. Working with them as allies, instead of treating them as enemies, is much more beneficial for everyone in the long run.

You are eager to share the magic of bold fantasies in the midst of difficult times, and today can be uplifting as long as you don't completely buy into your own illusions or the illusions of others. You are wrestling these days with complex circumstances and you may feel the need to make major decisions. Keep your mind on the big picture so you don't get confused about which thoughts are your own and which are coming from someone else.

You're quite confident that you know what the best course of action is -- not only for yourself, but also for those you love. However, you could become too sure of yourself today. Your pride can get in the way of allowing others the chance to figure it out for themselves. Acting more flexible than you feel now helps you enjoy the day and keeps your friends happier, too.

You actually feel more centered than might be expected of you today, but it's still somewhat difficult to interpret all the mixed signals. If situations seem to be larger than life, remind yourself that there is a bit of illusory magnification going on now. However, it's time to be realistic by letting go of your inflated dreams and simplifying your life. Putting things in perspective enables you to accomplish more than you imagine.

Your fantasy world temporarily takes over the real world today, so pay particular attention to how you are reacting to the changing circumstances. Keep reminding yourself how you would respond on a typical day, but remember that these aren't typical times. It might prove too noisy to collect your thoughts now. Nevertheless, if you can find a place to meditate or relax, your perspective will improve, allowing you to be practical while still honoring your imagination.

There's something about the craziness of your life now that is mildly amusing to you, even though you may long for the return to the days of less scattered energy. It's tough to focus today because you're being pulled all over the map by other people's needs. Give serious thought to reshuffling your priorities. Seeking inspiration from someone you admire inspires you to create positive change.

You're traveling through impractical realms today, and you might even feel a pleasant buzz in spite of the chaos around you. Be careful of what you wish for because you may want something or someone that is totally out of reach. Knowing your limitations may not stop you from trying, but reality could step in and wake you from your daydream. Practicing self-restraint makes more sense than going too far and running into trouble.

There is a delicate balance between your optimism and pessimism now, but for some reason you can't hold on to the positive energy for long. Enthusiastic Mars is moving toward an alignment with your key planet, somber Saturn, and your big ideas must face a real test in just a few days. Try to uncover all the facts behind the zealous sales pitch. Even if you don't have certainty about your current direction, you will gain clarity soon enough if you believe in yourself.

Resolving your feelings in personal relationships is complicated business, even though you have a rather practical perspective now. However, your desires may actually work against your fantasies today. Nevertheless, you still yearn to do something totally outrageous. Reach into your future with a little more gusto than usual. Your chances for success look better these days than ever before.

For every confusing feeling you have of self-doubt today, there is a corresponding one of unbridled optimism. The vitality of the Sun is supporting Jupiter now, giving rise to thoughts that push you beyond the boundaries of your current circumstances. Live with the paradox of knowing that everything is okay and not okay at the very same time. Have faith and focus on the positive potential.

Breaking free from the restraints that hold you back is complicated if you keep running into more obstacles. It could feel like a losing battle, because each problem you solve today quickly turns into two more. The harder you push to tie up the loose ends, the more things seem to tangle up. Fortunately, it's not nearly as hopeless as it might appear at first. Back off a bit and don't try so hard; some of the resistance may be of your own creation.

There is a strong emphasis on your work today, but an unaddressed emotional issue might prevent you from accomplishing your goals. You are bumping up against an awkward energy that isn't easy to engage because it's not aimed directly at you. Nevertheless, don't participate in petty disagreements, because they won't improve your current situation. Fly under the radar now and do what you must, without attracting too much attention to yourself. Your low-key approach won't go unappreciated by those who matter.

Your life may be noisy today as tensions become obvious and there seems to be no way around an unpleasant situation. But, of course there is a viable path, especially because circumstances continue to change throughout the day. You still might be sorting out your feelings by the evening, but the problem itself could very well be in the past. Your discomfort will pass if you let your emotions run their course without interference from your analytical mind.

You might feel like a real life Crab that has been left high and dry by unpredictable changes in the tide. Then, just in the nick of time, the emotional waters unexpectedly wash back into your life. Don't push your feelings away -- even if you're afraid that they are overwhelming. Avoid labels, since good and bad are just intellectual judgments. Acknowledging your shifting moods is all that's necessary at this time.

You may be on a slow-motion collision course today with a lover, partner or friend. Although you might attempt to avoid a confrontation, it's healthier to face the music and just get it over with. There could be very real disagreements over fundamental issues, and the more you talk about them, the more complicated they become. Nevertheless, stick with it. It's always darkest right before the dawn; a breakthrough can happen when you least expect it.

You want to share your crazy plans now that trickster Mercury is playing a major role in the picture. However, the mental agitation is annoying, preventing you from enjoying an exchange that might normally be quite pleasant. Although you're yearning to break free from your routine, the pressure of responsibility will likely restrain you for a while. You must follow through on your previous commitments. Don't worry; you will get your chance for change soon enough.

A fantastic idea may become problematic as you bog down in the execution, especially if it involves home or family issues. If you don't think through the consequences of an off-the-cuff remark, you might need to deal with the aftermath sooner than you think. Although this is not ultimately a difficult day, you still probably have to work harder than usual just to keep things moving in a healthy direction. Remember, your positive attitude makes all the difference in the world.

You're in your power now and you might even be surprised by the current intensity, but you are equipped to handle nearly any brewing storm. The next few days may seem like the kind of exam that you can't study for; nevertheless, paying attention to the signs can tilt the scales in your favor. Don't try to hold on to the status quo. Let the uncertainties lead you through the transformation ahead without dwelling on any irrational fears. Follow your intuition with confidence and everything will be alright.

Sometimes you sound like you know everything because you often do understand more than others. However, it's most helpful to admit what you don't know before you find yourself in over your head. There may be many loose ends to tie up, so it could be useful to have assistance. Don't pretend that you have it all together now unless you actually do. You have less to prove than you might think and more to gain if you're willing to ask for help.

It seems as if you already did all the steps  possible to further your career; unfortunately, something still isn't quite right. Perhaps you overlooked a tiny detail that grows bigger as the day progresses. Maybe someone throws a wrench into the gears of time and you're not prepared for what happens next. You're able to take it all in stride if you have done your homework. But, if you haven't prepared wisely, your plan can fall apart and you will need to make it right before moving on.

You might be judged for what you say or what you write, even if your ideas are sound. Your concepts could even be brilliant now, but as you act on your thoughts, something may not work as imagined. Revise your thinking based upon your experience. If you assume you know it all, you don't. However, you have what it takes if you are open to change -- and others can't help but notice your positive attitude.

Someone at work may give you a hard time today, but having an external reason to practice self-discipline is exactly what you need at this time. However, the resistance you face could be troublesome if you are the methodical type; a disturbed routine might make you less efficient for a while. But once you adapt to your new pace, you will feel re-energized and more enthusiastic about your future.

Although you usually have enough stamina to concentrate on whatever needs your attention, your energy may not last throughout the day. Your key planet Mars is encouraging you to speed up, yet you must restrain your impulses now because authoritative Saturn is saying slow down. Frustration can turn into depression if you don't find something exciting to motivate you into action. Tackling even the smallest endeavor today will give you the confidence boost you need.

Others may encourage you to start a project today, but you might not be interested in doing much at all. Your resistance to work now isn't about laziness; it's strictly business. You wonder whether or not your extra effort will really make a difference. External coercion only makes you more stubborn. Trust your judgment, for you probably won't accomplish anything unless you are willing to exert yourself beyond the call of duty.

Your apprehension about how much you have on your plate today may feel overwhelming, but you can't avoid your duties. Even if you prefer to take the day off, something happens that shifts your energy into high gear. Face your chores with a generous sense of humor. You are being tested for a reason, yet it might take a few days to realize what it's all about.

Take a risk by acting spontaneously, but don't do anything unless you know that your behavior is helpful. However tempted you may be to express yourself, initiating action might seem like an uphill battle unless you have a concrete plan. If you're not sure about your goals, you could respond to the overwhelming choices of the day by withdrawing from reality. However, waiting until the noise subsides doesn't make the underlying issues go away. Be brave and step up to the plate. Living authentically will get easier once you are in motion.

A variety of circumstances may stir up anxiety, pushing you close to the boiling point now. But just before the meltdown temperature is reached, your feelings cool down just enough to prevent a scene from happening. Although you don't want your emotions to spill over, withholding them will just make matters worse. Keeping your eyes on the big picture can circumvent any unneeded frustration.

Managing your current problems can be tricky business now. However, going through the motions may offer you some relief from the discomfort. Be realistic about your expectations because it's quite likely that nothing will be solved right away. Fortunately, you have an excellent chance for success in the future as long as you remain practical today.

You are being pushed and pulled all over the map now; you might even be close to snapping like an over-stretched rubber band. Expressing your anger toward a loved one won't help matters. No matter how much a situation is bothering you, today's solution requires you to change your attitude first. And while you're doing your inner work, indulge in some healthy outer distractions, too, like a spectator sport, a movie or a good book.

It may seem like everyone is being stubborn today, yet you wish they could be more flexible. Unfortunately, someone else's adaptability won't solve your problems since you might have become too rigid in your thinking. Your issues are reflected by the circumstances in your life, yet it's easier to project the blame onto another person else. Thankfully, your frustrations will begin to diminish over the next few days. In the meantime, a little self-examination could reveal an important truth.

You may feel stuck today because your idealistic plans don't seem to be working out. You would rather be outside taking a long hike or embarking on some other kind of fun adventure, but duty calls and you must delay your favorite activities until another day. Show the world and yourself that you really do have a responsible side. Oddly enough, happiness comes from the satisfaction of a job well done.

Although you have many responsibilities on your plate, it temporarily becomes difficult for you to initiate action. You are torn between doing what's expected of you and doing nothing at all. You really don't want to let anyone down, but there's a stubborn streak that is fueling your resistance now. However, don't avoid your obligations. If you just walk away, you will face the music pretty quickly. Instead, find a course of action that takes both sides into consideration.

You are determined to reach your goals now, yet you may still broadcast mixed messages because you are conflicted about your next career move. You think that you know where you are going, but can't get rid of a nagging feeling that won't be quieted until you reach your destination. Although you might try to relieve the pressure mentally today, it could require some physical exertion to touch the real source of your frustration. Attacking the stress at all levels has the most profound positive impact.

Your enthusiasm cools off a bit today if a workmate criticizes you for something you did wrong. You might not see the problem and believe that you are being misunderstood. This dynamic can also impact your personal relationships. If you are involved with someone special, it still may feel as if you're being blocked from reaching satisfaction. Try to go with the flow while demonstrating just a touch of self-restraint. You could be happily surprised by how quickly things turn around with a simple apology on your part.

Finding a perfect balance between being your own person and being what others want can be a real challenge. Although your diplomatic skills may be well honed, turning on the charm today isn't quite as effective as you wish. Your romantic inclinations are also running on the hot side and if you don't cool yourself down, you might stir up some uneasy feelings on the way to obtaining what your heart desires. Channel your passion into a creative pursuit, instead.

Although you might take a cautious approach to relationships now, your concerns won't be sufficient to prevent your inner radiance from shining. You often warm to others slowly, but after you befriend someone your loyalty is legendary. However, you're ready to jump into the fray and make a new friend today without going through your regular song and dance. Just express yourself naturally and you'll surely find a groove that works.

You're feeling extra lucky today, but others don't seem to take notice -- even if you bend the rules a bit to tilt the odds in your favor. If anyone looks closely enough, they might better appreciate that your success stems from your extra effort, not just happenstance. Don't get too cocky, for circumstances can change quickly when you become overly pleased with your own cleverness. Remember that humility is more appealing than hubris.

You might be very pleased with the richness of your life today, yet you may feel vulnerable because of strong emotional undercurrents which are out of your control. Others won't likely notice what you are hiding because you're very skilled at playing the shell game. However, clamming up is not your best strategy now. Sharing your fears with a loved one can keep your thoughts from stagnating as the waters continue to swirl around you.

It may appear to others that you are dissatisfied with your current situation. It's true; you could be a bit irritable today, but it's probably not because of anything specific that's occurring in your life. In fact, you might actually like what's happening now, even if you're having a hard time keeping your feelings in line. You get edgy when your emotions and your actions are not in harmony with each other. Don't make any sudden changes; simply being more aware of your internal conflict will help it resolve over time.

Even if you're in touch with both your positive and negative feelings today, others may see you as mostly personable and easygoing. Your charm is flowing easily now, rather than the contracted fear you might experience when you're confused. Your natural tendency is to move into the practical realms to gain control, but you are better off just mentally wandering for a while until your mind plays through all the possibilities.

You are so busy these days that you're motivated to seek ways to bring your life into a healthier balance. However, the current danger is that you can gloss over awkward details in your rush to get everything done. There are mixed signals coming your way, yet you still may strive to be sweet, even if your feelings are more intense. Don't spend too much time attempting to hide the darker feelings. Others will appreciate your honesty more than you think.

There is a wonderful potential to indulge your senses today, even if fantasy plays a strong part in a pleasurable experience. You may feel like you're on top of the world, getting a chance to express your passionate side without experiencing the negativity that sometimes follows. The only price you might pay for feeling safe is the regret over a desire not expressed. Don't miss this opportunity to open your heart and widen your horizons.

Your dreams have an excellent chance to manifest now if you incorporate the widest spectrum of life into your overall perspective. Although you are often ready to consider new possibilities when planning your future, you might be pleasantly surprised with the amazing experiences you can have now if you keep your options open. Take a risk and expand your mind to include what you previously excluded. You'll be richer in spirit for your efforts.

You are feeling somewhat constrained today, but working within a solid framework gives you a comforting sense of security. Rules are welcome news from the cosmos, since you like it when your structures are strong enough that you can build upon them. Don't hold back; you have powerful tools at your disposal now. Fortunately, using your energy for the good of all is also beneficial to you in the long run.

The pace of your life is settling down enough for you to temporarily take charge of your career. You have been riding the tides of change, but now the stress created by the incoming waves is clearing the way for new and better goals. Keep your eyes on the future, even if your nerves are rattling with uncertainty. Ironically, practicing patience helps you reach your desired destination in record time.

It's easy to grow discouraged today if everything doesn't go your way. You might even blame your frustration on something that happened yesterday. Fortunately, you could receive an energetic boost out of the blue that sets you off in a new direction. However, resisting change leads to stagnation. Don't hold on to previous expectations. Your chances for success are enhanced if you gracefully roll with the incoming waves and adapt to the shifting currents.

You're eager to apply what you recently learned to a complex situation at work, but you might not realize the consequences of your current actions. There are dynamic changes on your horizon now that sweet Venus has taken up residence in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. It's time to ask yourself what you want from others while you can still see the potential of what's ahead. Keep in mind that everything feels very intense today, so move forward slowly with kindness and compassion.

Collaborating with others continues to be your main focus when your key planet Venus enters your 7th House of Partners today. Thankfully, now you can see beyond the doubts that have previously limited your actions. But instead of wondering how you will complete everything on your plate, think about what motivates the people in your life. Ask questions and actively listen to what is said because you could learn something valuable about yourself as you discover more about someone else's experiences.

Strangely enough, you may not be able to tell if your life is growing simpler or more complex. Your goal was to create a schedule that allows you enough time for yourself, but now everything seems to be changing again. Go ahead and grab an opportunity to play while you still can, for your work might not afford you so much free time during the next few weeks. If it appears like others are having more fun than you, don't complain; temporarily set aside your current concerns and join the party.

You want to be enthusiastic about your job today, although you may have to work on recapturing your earlier vision. You might start your day feeling resentful toward someone who won't cooperate with you. But there's no reason to hold onto negative feelings. As others grow more supportive in return, make a choice to graciously accept what they offer while still pushing your agenda forward.

Resolving an interpersonal conflict in the morning gives you the maximum amount of time to make the most of the rest of your day. Someone at work might bring you an opportunity that looks promising, but you would be wise to do your due diligence before just saying yes. Ultimately, your new direction may turn out great, but you could easily mislead yourself if you don't check out the facts thoroughly. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

Your current sense of nostalgia might lure you back into your past, but, paradoxically, this sentimentality can put you in touch with someone who shares your search for meaning. Fortunately, your memories also activate feelings in the present moment. However, don't fall into the trap of believing that a current situation is the same as a past one. Ultimately, your future success comes from looking forward, not backward.

Today may seem busier than recent days, partly because you are enthusiastic about getting a lot done. The cheery Sagittarius Moon wires your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, but you could end up spinning your wheels throughout the day and still not have anything tangible to show for your efforts. Avoid the temptation to scatter your energy. Slowing down and checking one thing off your list at a time leads to higher productivity and more satisfying results.

You're on the threshold of an exciting opportunity and may be entranced by sweet Venus' entry into your powerful sign, provoking both desire and fear. You're aware of the changes in the air and understand that you can't rely on your old ways of doing things. It's time to let unfulfilled dreams fade away so you can create new ones that are more relevant and realistic. Ultimately, you'll feel better once you step away from the past and move into the future.

You may have recently experienced a challenging emotional situation when you had to relinquish control for a while. Now, with the evocative Moon back in your sign, you are reawakening to your own desires. You're motivated to go out and get whatever you want. However, your enthusiasm could be too much if you ride roughshod over someone's feelings. Remember to balance your goals with the needs of others. You are not alone; your happiness is intertwined with the well-being of the people you love.

If you are reconsidering your long-term trajectory, it may be time to think about setting new goals and aiming your life in an entirely different direction. Whether or not you actually make any changes now, put away your fantasies and consider only what's real. However, this is not about giving up on your dreams; it's more about putting them in proper perspective. Letting go of old expectations frees you to create a more relevant strategy. Once you have a plan in place, you might be pleasantly surprised with the speed of change.

It may feel like a split-personality day, yet holding both perspectives can test your metal. You have a lot to gain by stepping into your power and entertaining visions of the future now that the expansive Sagittarius Moon is visiting your 11th House of Future Dreams. However, you must also be practical when considering what to do because valuable Venus enters your career-minded 10th House today. Personal satisfaction comes from balancing possibilities with practicalities.

Wake up and snap out of your dreams, especially if you've been lost in fantasies about exotic adventures and far-off lands. There's nothing wrong with letting your thoughts wander, but the Moon's shift into your 10th House of Public Responsibility reflects the work you have to do now. You can't afford the luxury of drifting in the impractical realms of your imagination today. However, don't lose touch with your hopes; just express them in the real world, for this is where your vision must ultimately manifest.

It's surprising how quickly and easily a complex situation can resolve into a much simpler one. You might think that you're out of the woods, but don't fool yourself into believing you're home free. Your current relief may largely result from the improving circumstances, but some denial could also contribute to your positive state of mind. Remember, avoiding an awkward issue feels good for a while, but it's not the same thing as really fixing a problem.

Normally, you assume that you understand what's going on because you instinctively trust your senses. But it's difficult to settle down today because somehow you know more than you actually perceive. Logically, you can convince yourself not to take a leap of faith, but in your heart you still believe your intuition. Ultimately, you will feel more empowered once you open your mind and give yourself permission to dream.

You may be uncomfortable with your feelings and might attempt to hide them from someone close to you, but this doesn't mean that you are antisocial today. Paradoxically, your easygoing banter could encourage others to believe that you are being more revealing now than you actually are. Even if you are clever enough to fool everyone else, be careful about going so far that you also fool yourself. What you share is up to you; just make sure you know where to draw the line.

Your sweeping vision is easily communicated to others today. Your associates at work are eager to place their trust in you because it seems as if your feet are placed solidly on the ground. But you may not be as sensible now as you appear. It's best to be honest and let others know that there are still a lot of details missing from your plan. It's more important to be real than to sound as if you have all the answers. Collaborating with others enhances your chances for success.

Although you're likely to take the high road today, you're still itching to make a statement about something that bothers you. Fortunately, you can ward off negativity by concentrating on your spiritual beliefs instead of being sabotaged by your own emotions. But the power of positive thinking alone isn't enough to permanently put things back in order. You will have to follow up with decisive actions or your good intentions will be for naught.

Even if you're stressing over significant issues, ultimately they won't matter all that much in the long run. You want to resolve a conflict, but the specifics of the situation are not as important as you may be led to believe. Too much information could make you anxious because you want to focus on the bigger picture. Unfortunately, it's always a challenge for you to let go of the details. Taking the time to relax or meditate allows you to put your worries into proper perspective.

You have high hopes about accomplishing many things today, but you may be unrealistic in your expectations. Your current ability to complete your list of ambitious chores is complicated by a louder-than-usual creative buzz that you don't want to waste. Naturally, you would rather be artsy and crafty, but now you might just have to fulfill your responsibilities before you follow your muse.

Maintaining a high level of integrity is essential to you, yet it's challenging to convince everyone else to go along with your priorities today. Each person that is involved with you and your work has a different idea about what is necessary. Unfortunately, others may be unwilling to listen to what you have to say now, complicating your efforts. Nevertheless, staying focused on your final goal allows them to join in with their support when they are ready.

Your flexible attitude is an asset today, yet your ability to adapt doesn't mean that you're wishy-washy. In fact, if someone at work pushes you too hard, you may become quite stubborn in your defense of your job performance. But don't allow your ego to convince you that it's okay to tell others what to do. Instead, encourage each person to find his or her own unique way. Give everyone else the same freedom that you want in return.

Getting over your fears is hard work, but reality is offering you a special opportunity to learn how to deepen your trust now in all things that are beyond your five senses. The veil between worlds has grown thinner and you may see visions now, even when your eyes are closed. Usually you do well when you rely strictly on the facts; today, you'll perform even better if you put your imagination to work, too.

Messages may pop into awareness in symbolic form today and you might have to step out of your comfort zone to receive them. Pay careful attention to your friends and associates for clues. They will be guiding you now, even if they seem to have nothing to say. However, you have to listen with your heart to hear what's going on beneath the surface. Recognizing the limitations of language empowers you to see the potential everywhere you look.

You are traveling on automatic pilot today as you express your desire to take care of others. But this isn't about any sort of verbal disclosure on your part; rather it's more about what you actually do. You're not interested in discussing your life intentions now. Stop thinking and initiate direct action before you talk yourself out of a perfectly fine strategy. He who hesitates is lost.

Pay close attention to interpersonal dynamics today, since you can be so entranced by someone that your powers of discrimination are weakened. Everything you perceive might not be quite as wonderful as it seems. Beauty is in the eyes of the beholder and you are highly susceptible now because you are in touch with the magic of your own inner world. Just remember that you are being seduced by your desire for pleasure, and not by whatever is on the outside.

An interaction with a friend or lover might not be what you think, for you can easily gloss over an annoying problem now. You don't want to see things in their true light, and although this could be a dangerous tactic in theory, it works for you today. Your temporary denial allows you to get through the day without serious confrontation -- and conflict won't produce the results you desire, anyway. Seek ways to maximize your own pleasure. You'll have plenty of opportunities tomorrow to dig deeper into any unresolved issues.

You may be unwittingly lured into discussions about your idea of perfect love. Your eloquence can entrance others, even if what you say today isn't grounded in reality. Normally, you might try to hide your real feelings by displaying your quick thinking and clever wit. Instead, slow down and let your dreams come to the forefront. The key to your future fulfillment may be hiding within your imagination.

Your heightened emotional sensitivity doesn't get in your way at all today. Everything seems to come together now, but you might not be able to explain the process to anyone else. Not only do you have the ability to magically juggle many balls at once, keeping them in the air seems to require very little effort on your part. Enjoy the illusion of reality moving in slow motion, for it gives you plenty of time to respond to each situation without having to panic. Make the most of the cosmic luck coming your way.

You might feel as if you have tapped into a primal energy source today. Aside from your current physical stamina, you also have a strong desire to communicate in a direct manner. But don't leave your imagination out of the loop; shine your heart's desire through a creative endeavor. You are being visited by your muse. Open the door and let her in.

It doesn't matter how perfect something looks today; don't be misled by outward appearances. Nothing is quite as it seems. Struggle as you might, it's still challenging to see what's behind the curtains. Part of the problem is that you may uncharacteristically overlook the details now. Don't put your reputation on the line unless you are certain about what you are doing. Any good decision made today will be even better tomorrow.

Visions of perfect beauty and absolute truth color your imagination now while fantasies sweep you off your feet. Your ruling planet Venus is harmonizing with visionary Neptune today, creating a fountain of love's magical illusions. As wonderful as this may sound, your unbridled dreams could also set you up for disappointment once reality kicks back in the days ahead. Use your creative energy to make something special happen while you have the chance.

You stand to make real gains in your life now if you keep your spiritual world alive and vital. Allow yourself to wander off the path to explore your dreams today because your fantasies are temporarily the main event. A simple interaction with someone special deepens your self-understanding and brings you pleasure, but you must leave the world of rational thought behind and trust your imagination. If you can visualize it, you can make it come true.

You're surfing emotional waves today, but your ability to contain the energy removes any sense of danger you might otherwise feel. Thankfully, you are open to sensory pleasures that you would normally avoid because you believe you're in control of the situation. Although this could be an illusion, it really doesn't matter who is in charge. You may be pleasantly surprised by what happens if you're willing to share what's in your heart.

Setting reality aside and taking a trip into your own private land of fantasy may seem counterproductive. Nevertheless, this is what the cosmos has in store for you now as you are instinctively more in touch with your spiritual dimensions. The most surprising part of this whole experience is that as you let go of the outer structures, you will find that you gain additional authority -- even if this is quite the opposite of what you expect. Sometimes you need to take a risk to get in touch with the magic of the moment.

You can charm your way out of a tricky situation with the help of the cosmic support you are now receiving. At least, this is what you believe, but your difficulty in separating facts from fiction could turn into a sticky problem later on. At best, your desires lead to great fun, for the real world doesn't necessarily hold you back. However, you might work yourself into a corner if you misinterpret the signals. Rethinking your actions from an objective perspective enables you to have your cake and eat it, too.

In a perfect world, there wouldn't be so many tasks to finish today, leaving you enough time to explore your dreams. However, acknowledging both reality and fantasy allows you to come out a winner in this clash between the outer and the inner worlds. Bite the bullet and get to work on time. Keep your thoughts away from all forms of escape until you've earned it by completing your chores. The faster you finish the sooner you can play.

You may have trouble containing yourself because you're so eager for action. Macho Mars combines forces with shocking Uranus today, zapping you with lightning bolts of awareness and jolting your system awake. Thankfully, you're also connected to your inner spirituality in a profound way now, so your passionate nature can be very inspiring to others. Concentrate on projecting the positive potential without trying to prove that your way is the only path to success.

Everything seems to make sense in your fantasies today as long as you don't try to explain them to someone else. The earthy Capricorn Moon soothes your emotions and prompts you to pick a conservative path to achieving your goals. However, a friend may encourage you to break a rule or a family member might inspire you to take an even greater risk. Obviously you respect the opinions of those you love, but it's wiser to accept the challenge of being independent in your thoughts and actions now. Only your heart knows what's best for you.

Your current interests may be part of a grand scheme today; nevertheless, you could run into a tough opponent if you are overly controlling in your approach to working with others. Don't waste your limited time and energy trying to convince someone to support your plan. Instead, channel all your mind's power into your most immediate goal and don't stop until you've made real progress. Knowing what to do is easier when you have your priorities in order.

You may be dreaming about doing something outrageous that scares you as much as it excites you. Although risk-taking could provoke anxiety, you should be able to get away with unorthodox behavior since you're receiving cosmic assistance from the radically expressive Mars-Uranus trine. However, you still must come out and tell others what you want. You're more likely to get what you need if you initiate bold action rather than just waiting for lightning to strike.

You want to be acknowledged at work today and you're ready to take additional risks to be noticed. Paradoxically, you may feel more secure in your position now, even if you're already living close to the edge. Although you may be confident about your current direction, pressuring others with your ideas could cause your plan to backfire. Explain your strategy, but then wait to see how everyone reacts before taking your next step. The feedback you receive could make all the difference in the world.

You don't want to keep your fears quiet now, even if you're worried that giving them voice will just make you more vulnerable. Thankfully, there is nothing wrong with admitting to feeling scared. After a while, your apprehension may begin to disperse without encountering the problem that you previously thought was inevitable. Sharing your concerns with a trustworthy friend should calm your nerves. Sometimes a supportive shoulder is all you need.

You prefer to be busy today, yet you also might grow weary of jumping through one hoop after another. If you don't burn up all of your energy in the morning, you will still have some creative juice left over for later in the day. Instead of panicking because you think that time is running out, slow down, engage reality and take control of your day. You are the master of your own destiny.
