You feel a thrill when flirting with the edge today, whether bungee jumping, ending a relationship or moving to a new location. It's impossible to ignore your impulses as your ruling planet Mars urges you to try something you've never done before. Unfortunately, once you step beyond the proverbial point of no return, you may not be able to change your mind. Find ways to shake things up without necessarily turning your entire life upside down.

It's easy to rationalize what you are doing now, as long as it's part of a familiar pattern. The Moon is visiting your 6th House of Daily Routine today, reflecting light on all of your habits. Nevertheless, you have important choices to make that can be based totally on intuition and inner guidance. Don't engage in endless analysis and conversations that go nowhere. Pay attention to the sensations in your gut and do what feels best.

Your friends may encourage you to step back from your responsibilities today and do something that is quite out of character. But the point is not to avoid your current obligations; a happy medium can be found by being adaptable enough to pursue unscheduled fun along the way. You can always finish your chores later in the evening or even first thing tomorrow morning if necessary. Taking time for a bit of enjoyment might be exactly what you need to recharge your batteries.

You have a number of projects you want to complete this weekend before you return to work. But your day isn't likely to play out the same way as the one you envisioned. There are just too many unknown variables still up in the air and you must go along with the uncertainty or you'll have a rough time getting along with others. Remaining open to any last minute changes can turn a frustrating day into one filled with excitement and love.

You might believe you already know what others want before they even ask for it. Nevertheless, it's wise to wait until someone articulates his or her needs today, instead of jumping to a faulty conclusion. It's disheartening if an ally says no to your great ideas, even if it's apparent to you that he or she lacks vision. Nevertheless, fretting about the situation is simply a waste of your time. Let the energy sit and see how everyone feels next week. You know your heart is in the right place.

Managing your day-to-day affairs can be tricky now, especially when your life contains so much uncertainty. You're typically confident about what you are doing, but questions arise today that increase your doubt over the general direction of your life. You may be tempted to focus on your long-term goals in order to escape from your more immediate obligations. However, your smartest strategy is doing what you Aries do best and live fully in the present moment.

You may be involved in an ongoing conflict between your professional responsibilities and personal activities that more accurately reflect what's in your heart. But it's challenging to follow a path that's closer to your passion when you're monetarily rewarded for the work you do. Instead of choosing one or the other, find ways to breathe new life into your creative endeavors through self-discipline. Utilizing your time wisely enables you to juggle your calendar and do everything you want.

Thinking about going back to school or beginning a new course of study is on your mind now that the Moon occupies in your 9th House of Higher Education. However, you might have to delay your decision for a little while since pressing obligations can't be ignored and must be handled before returning to your long-term plans. Instead of worrying about what you can't do today, take your life one day at a time until you're free enough to imagine what's ahead.

If someone presents you with a sensible plan today, remain open to it instead of just assuming that your idea is better. It's presumptuous to believe that you can make an accurate assessment unless you actually take time to consider what's being said. Don't let your fear of being wrong stand in the way of choosing your best course of action. It's more important to reach your goals than to be right.

Focusing on productive projects at home helps to take your mind off a recent conflict on the job. However, it's critical to temporarily shift your thinking away from your career objectives today and onto your personal life. Backing away from a complex set of circumstances won't solve any of the underlying issues at work, but it gives you a chance to settle down so you can approach the unresolved predicament anew next week. Spending time with those you love puts everything in proper perspective.

You are tempted to overcompensate for your current uncertainty by acting as if you know exactly what's going on today and what should be done next. You want to be appreciated as someone who is competent, but an authoritative manner may not help your cause. Don't dwell on previous failures now, since your memories could stand between you and future success. Remember, the past is over and isn't as relevant in the present moment as you might believe.

You may not feel like doing the responsible thing today, and are more willing to take a risk and try something just for the fun of it. Unfortunately, simply declaring yourself free from prior obligations isn't as satisfying as living up to your promises. Take the time early in the day to work hard. If you make progress on your chores now you'll feel justified when cutting loose later on.

Keeping a secret may have been appropriate for a while, but your desire to bury your feelings could become an issue in a relationship now. You might suddenly realize that you would have been better off being fully honest and sharing whatever doubts you were hiding. Unfortunately, you cannot turn back the hands of time and redo what's been done. Your most effective strategy is to start fresh by clearing the air before moving on.

Of course you don't like it when your peers pressure you to do something you're not willing to do. In fact, you like it even less when people attempt to take advantage of you, asking you to help them with chores they should have already completed. Remember, in both cases the decision is entirely yours. Either jump in fully without complaining, or say exactly what you're thinking and prepare to deal with the consequences. Those who matter most will appreciate your authenticity.

You may underestimate the amount of time and energy it will take to finish a project today. Unfortunately, this miscalculation can have a negative impact on your schedule. Simply working harder might be the best strategy to avoid looking like a fool on the job; however, putting in additional hours won't necessarily solve the problem. Don't exhaust yourself in a hopeless attempt to impress others. Instead, rethink your tactics and adopt a smarter strategy.

You are driven to understand your personal world today, but the Moon's return to your sign can make you so emotional that your normal rational approach doesn't work. Your answers might appear straightforward, but your moods are running all over the place now, making it nearly impossible to follow through on any one idea. Instead of trying to sort it out on your own, ask for assistance to minimize the noise. You can get by -- and even excel -- with a little help from your friends.

You may be weary of isolating yourself from someone you love and are finally ready to do something about it today. However, you might not know where to start to heal a rift between you and a friend. Rather than pretending like you have all the answers, simply admit that you have no clue as to how to proceed. Revealing your vulnerability could be the fastest way to bridge the gap. Making the first move is the hardest part.

Although your world is buzzing with activity today, you could still find time for a quick escape as clever Mercury in your 7th House of Others helps you balance your serious work with a bit of fun. Thankfully, you can accomplish a lot in short bursts of energy throughout the day. Nevertheless, your key to success stems from your ability to concentrate and extend each little creative moment. The longer you focus on each individual task, the more productive you will be in the long run.

A series of unexpected twists of fate at work today could lead you to reconnect with an old friend or make the acquaintance of a new one. You can try to remain cool and detached, yet you will probably be quite surprised anyhow if intense feelings suddenly catch you off guard. Don't resist the energetic flow now; enjoy the excitement while it lasts.

You don't need another cup of coffee or tea today because you're already soaring -- even without the extra caffeine. Although your intentions may be good, you're still somewhat scattered in your actions. A tug-of-war between electric Uranus and quicksilver Mercury is enough to give you a case of the jitters. Fortunately, you can work off some of the nervous energy with a bit of strenuous physical activity, enabling you to regain some semblance of control over your day.

Life is full of little emergencies today that keep you hopping from one minor crisis to the next. Even if you're not courting mischief, you're quick to feed into it now. However, your lightning-like response can be a mixed blessing if you keep coming up with solutions before you have all the facts. Act wisely and make sure that you have sufficient information prior to taking charge.

Someone could throw you a curve ball today when his or her plans suddenly change. Your reaction might be to step back while you determine how this unexpected shift will impact your life. Although the interaction may be intellectual rather than emotional, it still gives you a chance to improve an important relationship. Instead of withdrawing, acknowledge your feelings. Fortunately, you could end up growing closer to each other now if you take the time to sit down and connect.

You're emotionally on edge today, yet you can still project enough confidence so no one realizes what you're experiencing. Ironically, your anxiety could leak out through your behavior anyhow, even if you are trying your best to play it cool. However, it's really not worth the extra effort to hide your feelings, for others will be more understanding if they see that you're being real and authentic.

You might feel like you stepped onto a wild ride and you're no longer in control as trickster Mercury in your sign opposes outrageous Uranus in your 7th House of Others. Even if no one is adhering to your agenda today, everything can be more exciting than frustrating as you figure out what will happen next. Don't try to exert your authority; it will only confirm that you're not in charge now. Instead, enjoy the uncertainty and the thrills while you can.

Your attempt to go about your regular daily routine wouldn't normally run into trouble, but things run amok today even if you do your best to keep them on track. You may believe that you can put your schedule back together if you just try hard enough, but your day grows more unmanageable the more you try to rein it in. It seems counterintuitive, but relinquishing control magically helps you regain authority and move forward with confidence.

Your willingness to act in a shocking manner today could lead to a wonderful experience. You might even be so excited that you do something totally outrageous without giving it much forethought. Luckily, you're happily surprised by the approval you receive from your friends or co-workers. Just don't push your luck by going too far out on a limb or you'll be paying for your irresponsibility sooner than you think. It's still wise to know your limits before you cross the line.

You have responsibilities at work to manage, yet a personal situation might add an unexpected turn to your day. You can't just walk away from your previous obligations, but don't try to use this as an excuse to avoid your feelings. Instead of overcompensating and playing the role of a superhero, see where your emotions lead you before taking any drastic action. Take time to listen to your heart and you will know what to do next.

You may already be thinking ahead toward the holiday season, even if it still seems far away. In the meantime, you could have an opportunity to squeeze in a quick weekend getaway. Or, maybe you're considering a new course of study with mental Mercury traveling through your 9th House of Education. Don't let anyone else tell you that your advanced planning is a waste of energy. The truth is that dreaming about the future makes you happy and causes no harm to anyone else. Just don't miss the joy available in the present moment in the process.

If a financial issue unexpectedly surfaces today, it's wise to jump in and take care of it immediately. Handling a problem right away prevents it from developing into a more serious one. Even if it's just an insignificant mistake, ignoring it is like asking for a major headache later on. Save the pain and frustration by being responsible with your money now while it's still a simple matter.

It feels as if someone is keeping a secret from you today, yet the more you try to figure it out, the farther away the truth seems to get. Instead of worrying about what you might be missing, concentrate your attention on what you do know and act accordingly. Save your detective work for another day when others are more willing to communicate. Take the high road and see who follows.

Your current dilemma requires balancing your personal desires with the needs of others at work. Fortunately, you can rely on your ability to logically analyze the differences and then make decisions based upon what will work best for a larger group. Being selfish now will only create additional problems. There's no need to panic since you'll probably get what you want soon enough. In the meantime, show others that you can be a valuable team player by jumping in to help.

You may not have the freedom to express your feelings at work today. There could be unexpected consequences if you go ahead and say what's on your mind, but you might choose to speak your peace anyhow. Although you aren't responsible for the reactions of anyone else, you still need to get your job done on time. If you want other people's cooperation, take a deep breath and consider their feelings first.

Making travel plans for the future is tricky business today since you are likely to aspire toward more extravagance than you can actually afford. Unrealistic dreams could come crashing down to earth if you try to cover too much ground or spend too much money. Instead of running into an insurmountable obstacle, it's smarter now to rein in your vision of an idealistic getaway. Keep it real in order to make it possible.

Your need for intimacy might create situations that ultimately make you feel uncomfortable today. It's not that you want to avoid getting closer to someone you truly admire; it's just that you don't like limiting your options. Focus your attention on what you are experiencing in the present moment instead of dreaming about indefinite possibilities that may or may not happen sometime in the future. Be here now.

Although you logically know what's best for you, you're still confused when people tell you what they want today. But listening to someone else doesn't have to change what you already know about yourself, even if you are more sensitive to the needs of your partner now than to your own desires. Remember, you can be available to others while still taking care of yourself.

It's complicated to figure out what is expected of you at work today, but that might not prevent you from trying to do what's right. Don't worry about the reactions of your associates, since they probably won't tell you what they're really thinking anyhow. Accept the fact that others may hide their true feelings because they don't want to stir up the waters any more than necessary. You can't go wrong if you act for the greater good of everyone involved.

A romantic attraction might make you feel a bit unstable today as the Moon slips into your 5th House of Love and Play. It's natural for your feelings to swing one way and then the other as you play out the possibilities in your mind. It's okay to acknowledge that you really don't know what's best, even if you want to arrive at a final conclusion now. Ease up on the controls for a while and just observe your changing moods. You're better off postponing a relationship decision for a couple of days and enjoying the ride.

Unresolved feelings about a family member may instigate a minor crisis at home today. You might try to ignore the issue by focusing on your work responsibilities, but this will probably just make matters worse. There's no need to add to the tension with your denial when you can simply discuss your concerns without taking control of the situation. Remember, you don't need to have all the answers at this time; just showing up is enough to make others happy.

Your desire to micromanage your schedule today creates more problems than it solves. Unfortunately, others may not be willing to blindly go along with your plans and there isn't a lot that you can say or do to change their minds. Ironically, loosening your grip on the reins could actually help you to get what you want faster than you might expect.

A financial decision that has been weighing heavily on your mind might be resolved today in a single instant. You may have a sudden flash of inspiration that enables you to clearly see the solution that you were missing. When you realize that the issue is less about money and more about what you value, the logical choice will become crystal clear. It's not the bottom line that counts now; it's the feeling you have at the bottom of your heart.

Your emotional inconsistency could be driving someone crazy today, even if you aren't aware of your erratic behavior. Others might currently see you as irresponsible; however, you think that you know what you want and are willing to follow through with your plan to accomplish your goals. Nevertheless, your feelings are unsettled now that the Moon is back in your sign, and it would be wise to wait until after the Full Moon on Thursday before you make a major commitment. In the meantime, cultivate your dreams and see what develops.

Withholding support from someone isn't a good idea today even if you're trying to send a message of disapproval. Or maybe you want to separate yourself from a project that has gone astray. In either case, your actions aren't helpful if your responses are based on fear of the unknown. It's more useful to honestly talk about the cause of your concerns without blaming anyone else. But don't expect the tension to dissipate right away. Stay on your current path by working with others until you gain more clarity after tomorrow's Full Moon.

You might feel a little left out of the fun as if there's an emotional chill in the air now that your key planet Venus is restrained by the dominance of karmic Saturn. Although you may fight against the resistance at first, letting go of control is the smartest way today to quickly turn an uncomfortable situation into a very sweet one. Give up a little independence voluntarily; it's a small price to pay in the big scheme of things and can improve your chances of receiving the love that you desire.

You may be offered a tough choice today, especially if you aren't one to make a commitment easily. You could be very convincing as you explain your desire for intimacy, but you'll likely retreat if someone gets too near to your heart. However, mustering up enough courage to overcome your fears is the key to happiness. Luckily, you don't have to repeat the same old patterns just because you are scared of getting hurt. Take a leap of faith and trust the process.

It appears that you could get the support you need from a close friend or a family member if you ask for it, so you don't really have a logical reason to keep quiet now. Even if you can't easily imagine that someone will actually be there for you, taking a calculated risk should turn out fine. Instead of seeing your current situation as requiring an all-or-nothing approach, try to establish enough common ground for the basis of a solid partnership. Let others nurture you the way you would nurture them.

It may be awkward to engage in a casual conversation now because your feelings might be exposed and you're afraid that you won't get what you want. Your unspoken fears could actually turn into a self-fulfilling prophesy today, especially if you withdraw from social interaction. Fortunately, you have the power to overcome the negativity of your own self-limiting thoughts. You can turn things around by changing your attitude and opening your heart.

It's time to make a crucial decision about how best to spend or save your money. But this goes much deeper than being a simple cash flow problem because the underlying issue is more likely about your self-esteem. When you realize all the skills that you have to offer, your earning power could grow quickly, so don't fall into the trap of thinking that you're worth any less than you actually are.

You are not inclined to waste your energy while sharing your feelings today. You are very practical when it comes to allocating your time now that your key planet Venus runs into austere Saturn in your 2nd House of Resources. You may be very rational about cutting back on frivolous pleasures to assure that you will have what you need on a rainy day. Although caution makes sense, remember that there is an unlimited supply of love, so you can always splurge where it matters most.

You don't need to suffer in silence today if you're willing to face an old fear with a new attitude. Your current isolation is probably more voluntary than you care to admit now that the sobering Venus-Saturn conjunction occurs in your sign. The current situation has very little to do with what happened to you in the past. It's your choice; you can respond emotionally based on old worn-out habits or you can live fully in the present. Ultimately, being realistic is a much more empowering strategy than being pessimistic.

Don't be so quick to assume that your friends are putting you down today when your warped perceptions may be contributing to the dynamics. You might be so sensitive now that you're imagining trouble, even where there isn't any. However, it may be too late to avoid the discomfort if negativity has already been generated by your feelings of uncertainty. Instead of projecting previous failures onto others, talk about your concerns without pointing fingers at anyone else. Honest dialogue clears the air by getting everything out into the open.

It may be disheartening if you don't receive the professional respect you deserve now as vulnerable Venus bumps up against your key planet Saturn. You've done the hard work, yet unfortunately, your ego can get in the way by tricking you to think that you should be more highly appreciated than you are. Don't waste your time dreaming about recognition and fame. The real reward is the deep satisfaction that comes from knowing you've done your very best.

Unfortunately, there's no room on your schedule to surrender to your desires now. Instead, you must maintain an emotionally cool and competent presence at work while sweet Venus runs into austere Saturn in your 10th House of Profession. Don't waste energy complaining about what you're missing; instead, get busy working on your long-term goals. Seeking personal satisfaction has to wait; being patient today is your best strategy to realizing your dreams tomorrow.

Too much resistance from a partner doesn't give you an excuse to go off brooding today. Don't isolate yourself from someone you love deeply just because you think that everything isn't perfect between you. It's tempting to hide your head in the sand like an ostrich, but this avoidance technique is certainly not a sensible long-term solution. Facing the shortcomings of a relationship might actually put you back in touch with your heart, which in turn, could lead to an emotional healing.

You may promise a co-worker that you can keep a secret, but your intentions are better than your follow-through. Today's spiritual Pisces Full Moon occurs in your 12th House of Privacy, sending mixed messages and bringing awareness as it shines light into your subconscious mind. But you want others to hear your opinions once the Moon moves into your sign. Waiting for the right moment is wise as long as you realize that sharing what you know is smarter than anyone currently realizes.

Although you are often happy to remain exactly where you are, today you're just as eager to see where things could lead. The Full Moon's presence in your 11th House of Social Networking lures you away from your tunnel vision to assimilate a wider glimpse of the outside world. Take a chance and reach farther than you have in the past. The future is waiting for you just around the corner if you are ready to embrace it.

Problems may arise now because there are too many choices, prompting you to narrow the field of contenders. You have many options you hadn't previously noticed and today's psychic Pisces Full Moon illuminates your 10th House of Professional Life, opening exciting doors of opportunity. Several possibilities look so good that you can already see positive things happening in your imagination. Continue exploring the variety of paths before you, but don't count your chickens before they hatch.

All the flowery language in the world won't pull you too far off track today if an idea doesn't make practical sense, too. The emotional Pisces Moon, shining in your 9th House of Philosophy, reflects your eagerness to talk about your high ideals. As much as you love dreaming about the future and rationalizing your feelings now, you'll be more successful if you remember to bring your conceptual ideas back down to earth. Let your kite soar into the clouds of illusion but keep your feet on the ground.

Working with others can complicate things now because there are fundamental differences between your needs and those of a partner. The slippery Pisces Full Moon floods your 8th House of Deep Sharing, tempting you to avoid an emotionally awkward discussion that touches your core beliefs. However, evasive action won't sustain you for very long; you might end up feeling like a fish out of water. Instead of running from the truth, stop for a moment and embrace it.

You know better than to immediately choose one side in an argument just because you have the facts in front of you. You may prefer to do a bit of personal research before sharing your response. Today's whimsical Pisces Full Moon opposes your Sun in no-nonsense Virgo. You must be careful now because there's more to the current dynamics than simply playing by the rules. Lighten up; making a few allowances for what isn't yet apparent pays off in the long run.

It's not easy to set aside your natural role as a mediator and simply participate in the current situation. However, time for analysis and logic is over; you're better off to trust your intuition today with the mystical Pisces Full Moon lighting up your 6th House of Routine. Your imagination will take you farther now than executing your plan according to the book, since the rules may need to be bent for you to succeed. Stop asking so many questions and just follow your instincts.

If you can't justify taking a substantial amount of time away from work today, at least try to apply your creativity when you're on the job. But it's pointless to follow a previously created recipe for success. Instead, utilize the energy of the magical Pisces Full Moon as it brightens your 5th House of Play and add a bit of spontaneity back into your life. Honor the child within.

You could fool yourself into assuming that everyone is happy today when, in fact, someone close to you may be working diligently to cover up his or her insecurities. But the confusing Pisces Full Moon lands in your 4th House of Domestic Conditions, suggesting that you don't know as much as you think about what's happening on the home front. Although you might believe that it's best to focus on your job, you won't get away with ignoring the truth for long. Don't wait; set some time aside to check in with those you love.

You may feel a bit unsettled now because you prefer to know exactly where you are standing and be in total command of where you are going. But today's foggy Pisces Full Moon falls in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, challenging you to discern navigational markers in the current landscape. There's no need to struggle; give up the reins of control today. Take a deep breath and trust the forces of the universe to lead you to the right destination.

Getting a handle on your fiscal situation is a challenging task today with the surreal Pisces Full Moon spotlighting your 2nd House of Finances. However, you can make progress if you have the right people on your team. If you can't find any answers now, don't be afraid to lean on a trustworthy friend or consult a professional adviser to set you straight. Involving someone you respect gives you the fresh perspective you need.

Today's Full Moon occupies your sign, turning up the volume on your fantasies and amplifying your strong feelings. Meanwhile, mischievous Mercury's connection to excessive Jupiter makes it difficult  to maintain a healthy perspective on your relationships. Rather than stressing about making any decisions now, just put them off for a day or two until you regain clarity. Enjoy exploring your dreams, without the pressure to do anything about them yet.

Initiating action is not as simple as it sounds today. You may wisely delay your recent plans, only to exhaust yourself by running around and telling everyone what you're going to do. At some point you realize that talking requires nearly as much energy as just doing it. But changing your strategy too soon might lead to a false start. Paradoxically, the longer you can control your impulses, the more you will be able to accomplish once you decide to begin.

You might assume the role as the strong and silent one of the group because everyone else is behaving in an irresponsible manner now. However, keeping your critical feelings quiet is not wise today because your suppressed thoughts will only fester if you don't get them out into the open. Remember, you don't have to blame anyone else for the lack of progress. A more productive tactic is to express your concerns in a kind and loving manner that invites improvement rather than resistance.

Your progressive thinking is an inspiration to your peers today as long as you don't push the limits too far. You might not realize that you are being aggressive as your excitement overtakes your logic. Remember that others may take a while to warm up to your unconventional ideas. They could even become enthusiastic if you let them do it at their own pace. Keep in mind Rome wasn't built in a day.

You're asked to put out a lot of energy today even if you're not sure that it's really worth it. Unfortunately, you may not have the freedom to say no because others are expecting you to come through for them. Ultimately; it's probably easier to just go ahead and hold up your end of a job by giving it your best. You could even finish early enough to still find some time to take care of yourself.

You want to slow down today but there's so much on your schedule that relaxation seems out of the question. Nevertheless, you're jazzed about a variety of opportunities; however, your current enthusiasm may not last when a fun project turns into hard work. Adopting a methodical approach brings more success than spontaneously making it up as you go along. Setting goals gives you a reachable target, but you're still better off to make a plan and follow it as closely as you can.

Interacting with the right people now opens doors that were previously closed. But there's often a price to pay when you're dealing with powerful folks because they might expect something from you in return for their assistance. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to work with someone who pushes you farther than usual, even if it means facing your own insecurities at the same time. You'll never know what is possible unless you try.

You may be caught between the serious work that you have to do to honor your soul today and other people's expectations of you. Naturally, there's little question about which is more important to you, but your obligations to others sufficiently complicate your life now. Honor your commitments even if your heart is somewhere else; a payoff for your sacrifice could come as early as next week.

Staying focused on your chores is nearly impossible today because you are easily distracted by everything that sounds interesting. But it's not a sensible strategy to consciously run out on your responsibilities, even if love -- or something that looks like it -- is calling. Be smart and find a way to deliver on your promises while still leaving time for your personal explorations. Creating balance in your life brings you more happiness in the long run.

Reestablishing your priorities help you gain a healthy perspective today. Set your work obligations aside and do something that makes you feel wonderful. Thankfully, you won't likely face any negative repercussions from your apparently irresponsible actions. In fact, you may receive more support than you expect as others experience vicarious thrills watching your antics. Go on and add some adventure into your life; you'll regret it if you don't.

You can see the proverbial handwriting on the wall today and might suddenly realize how incredibly busy you will be over the next couple of weeks. Instead of stressing about your calendar, take some time for yourself while you still have the chance. It's as if you've reached a breaking point and simply need to relax so you can prepare for challenges in the future. Don't waste energy doubting the wisdom of this strategy now if it feels right to rest up for tomorrow.

You're thrilled about what you're doing today because you are actually learning a new skill as you go along. Although your current actions may fit into your master plan to move you closer to your goals, there might be an undercurrent of intensity coming from someone who is jealous of your accomplishments. Don't buy into anyone's negativity, especially if they are bringing their fears or insecurities into your life. No one can rain on your parade if you cultivate a positive attitude.

Feeling good about yourself today is more important than it is for others to acknowledge your competence. There's nothing wrong with avoiding the spotlight for a while. Thankfully, there's no need to worry about public acceptance now. Your job is to find ways to live in harmony with your core beliefs. If you can move your actions closer to your life purpose, you'll be pushed back out onto center stage soon enough.

You are good to go and there isn't much that will get in your way as you reach for your goals now. However, if your confidence is overinflated, it's time to bring your ego back down to a sensible size. Although having a healthy self-esteem is admirable, it's not a great idea to burn too hot today or you won't have enough energy left to enjoy tomorrow. Savoring the journey is just as important as crossing the finish line.

Unfulfilled responsibilities may necessitate talking about a serious issue on the home front. However, you might prefer to escape by putting your efforts toward redecorating a room or simply hosting a long-overdue gathering with friends. On the other hand, activities with children could take up more of your time now. It's all too easy to fill up your day with chores that keep you busy. However, your smartest strategy is to prioritize your obligations and take care of the most important ones first.

You thrive on today's fast pace, even if your life seems so noisy that you can't relax. You may not want it any quieter; however, there are so many exciting things to do, you don't even know where to start. The good news is you're at the beginning of a major cycle of manifestation. Speak or write your intentions as clearly as you can -- and then get busy on being the change you want to happen.

Shifting gears today can stabilize whatever you established over the past few weeks. You may feel like moving slowly at first; after all, you are a tentative Crab. But you also see the wisdom in pushing your desires out into the open so others could join in your effort. There's no time now for shyness. Make a direct beeline toward your destination whether anyone else is on board or not.

Your star is on the rise and you are either ready for what is about to happen next or you will miss your chance entirely. Although the butterflies in your stomach are fluttering, once you get started, the tension magically transforms into heightened clarity and concentrated energy. Let go of any residual resistance. There's no room for insecurity; get out on stage and let the show begin.

Trusting your intuition isn't always the simplest task since the most irrational thoughts tend to make you quite nervous. However, it's now time to put away your analytical thoughts and cool logic. Rely on your greatest strength: your ability to focus your mind on the issue at hand by tuning out everything else. But don't waste energy since today is the last day of the Sun in your efficient sign. Become one with your dreams and watch them bloom.

Someone may confront you with a complicated fiscal issue today, but it might not seem all that important to you. Even if your lack of interest leads you to sidestep a confrontation, your stubbornness could still land you in an unpleasant argument. If you really want to avoid direct conflict, use your diplomatic skills to charm your way through the day. Engaging in a real discussion without becoming defensive can open a door to a lasting solution.

You are in the spotlight these days and you might as well enjoy the love and appreciation that is coming your way. Instead of minimizing your accomplishments, be proud and stand tall; bask in the glow of recognition for the work that you do so well -- even if you don't think it's such a big deal. Although opening your heart to receive can be challenging, give yourself permission to feel the warmth of admiration and respect.

Although the summer sun is waning, you may still be waiting to escape. Fortunately, there's still time to pack up and take that special trip you have been dreaming about now that action-planet Mars is traveling through your 9th House of Journeys. Even if you can't get out of town, at least plan some fun activities over the days ahead that have nothing to do with work. A spontaneous adventure could improve your perspective more than you can imagine.

If you feel overextended from working extra hard  over the past few days, take a break to recover. It's time to focus your energy on doing less of everything. Obviously, you still need to be productive, but it's crucial to slow down now and recharge your batteries. You really don't have to be lazy about it, for you can relax your mind while riding a bike, hiking in the woods or even playing a team sport.

You may feel as if everyone is ganging up on you today, but their intentions are more supportive than their actions seem to you. Although you might receive an entire spectrum of messages now, it's up to you to tune out the extraneous noise so you can hear only the most relevant ones. If you are thwarted by circumstances, try taking a more serious and determined approach to reach your goals. You have more power than you think, so use it wisely.

You don't like being pushed into a new situation until you are fully prepared for what happens next. Often this is as much about mental readiness as it is about practicing a specific skill set. It doesn't really matter if you resist the changes; you're being drawn into a powerful river of momentum. The time is now; focus on each task and give it your best shot. Be flexible; you may be surprised at how much fun you can have -- even while you're taking care of business.

Trying to maintain your daily routine might sound like the responsible course of action, but it's no longer working the way you thought it should. Your focus shifts away from doing everything the same old way now as the Sun leaves your 6th House of Habits. You are more concerned with how others feel with the Sun stepping into your 7th House of Partners today. Listen to what your friends and co-workers have to say before assuming that you already know what they want. Cultivating mutual respect is the key to a successful relationship.

You are taking your job quite seriously these days since you know that accomplishing your goals depends on how well you perform. You may actually feel the change of seasons today as the Sun enters airy Libra, illuminating your 6th House of Employment. Someone might be judging you rather harshly now in spite of all your extra efforts. Don't argue with anyone over the quality of your work; just keep doing your very best because that's what will pay off in the long run.

Although you may still have weighty decisions on your mind, you could become a bit more lighthearted today as the Sun moves into your 5th House of Spontaneous Fun. But even your playful antics can be driven by very serious issues as you explore the extreme possibilities that stretch out before you. Continue to consider all your options, even if you believe that you have already made your choice. A fresh and creative approach might just surprise you with where it leads.

Your opinion about an important family matter may be in flux now that the Sun is settling into your 4th House of Security. You aren't as determined to stick to your previous point of view, for you want to take everyone's perspective into account. But others shouldn't mistake your ambivalence for detachment. It's healthy to remain fully engaged today, even if you aren't sure of what to do next.

You might still be dealing with money issues, but you sense the winds of change blowing in a positive direction. As the cosmic weather pattern begins to shift today, you could feel as if you are a kite being buffeted around by the unsettled gusts. There's no use trying to fight it; instead use the movement to power your flight as you gain altitude. But don't assume that you can quickly reach your goals now; it's better to wait until the current squall passes and your life calms down before making your big push.

This is the beginning of a transitional phase when you must sustain the changes that have already started to unfold. But you might feel as if you are caught in the middle, for you still have old business to complete before you can move on to whatever is next. Don't let the frustration get to you; instead take the extra time you are being given to improve your strategy for the future. Today's methodical preparation will pay off tomorrow.

You want to shine the light of your awareness on the mysteries of the universe now that the evocative Moon is visiting your 8th House of Regeneration. But today's Autumnal Equinox heralds the radiance of the Sun entering your 1st House of Personality, prompting you to seek ways to extend the energy of the summer. Although your attempts to prevent the onset of fall will be fruitless, your current lesson is to stay in the present moment and to cultivate peace within the larger cycles you cannot control.

You can't decide whether to luxuriate in the intensity of your passions or to replace your unfulfilled desires with an acceptance of your present circumstances. The Moon's opposition to resistant Saturn and magnetic Venus reminds you that clinging to any emotion too tightly changes it into something else. The choice remains yours; alleviate your frustration by focusing on the creative and spiritual aspects of your life.

Hiring a social secretary may not be necessary, but everyone wants to include you in their plans now that the Sun is entering relationship-oriented Libra and your 11th House of Friends. And if your calendar is not full enough, you might be inclined  to escape from your regular responsibilities now by joining a club or a political organization. And although you could take yourself rather seriously today, rest assured there are plenty of good times right around the corner.

Your natural proclivity to work for the success you desire is reinforced today by the conscious Sun's shift into your 10th House of Career. But your current ambitions may not fit in easily with the rest of your life now and it might even feel as if you are somehow at cross-purposes with yourself. Cherishing your dreams is fine as long as you are willing to reconsider how you can best make them come true.

Although you are quite preoccupied with your professional development these days, you can also step back and reassess your goals as the Sun moves into your 9th House of Future Vision. However, balancing the fantasies of your ideal situation with your current responsibilities may not be as simple as it sounds. Pushing your agenda too far today will only make life more complicated. Find satisfaction with what you already have rather than what's in your dreams.

You're happy to play the role of host or hostess today as the Sun slips into gracious Libra. But oddly enough, your eager-to-please personality can stand between you and your own happiness because minimizing your desires isn't the same thing as satisfying them. Patience is a virtue as you try to decide whether to be easygoing now or to demand what you want. Taking the middle path by acknowledging the needs of others cultivates good feelings all the way around.

Handling unfinished financial business makes sense with the Moon's presence in your 2nd House of Money today, but you could mistakenly put effort into an unnecessary task if you don't set clear priorities first. Establishing what is most important can turn a frustrating day into one of accomplishment. Concentrate on finishing one meaningful project instead of wasting your time on several things that won't really matter in the long run.

You are wearing your heart on your sleeve for everyone to see today, even if you don't want to share your emotions. Your reactions are more transparent to others now that the Moon is back in your 1st House of Appearances. However, your friends and associates might not fully understand your inner process, especially if things are more complicated than you wish. Although tempting, it's not wise to leave out significant details just because it's convenient in the moment.

You seem to be as steady as a rock today, but your stability may be a result of withholding something that you aren't ready to reveal. Normally, you're eager to blurt out your thoughts but you're likely to remain quiet now. Wait until you're clear about your feelings; develop your ideas for another couple of days before divulging your plans. Fine tuning your strategy improves your chances for success.

It's likely that your ideas will continue to take shape over the next couple of days until a concrete plan materializes from the clouds of your imagination. Ironically, the Moon's current visit to your 11th House of Dreams and Wishes can solidify your plans as you put the pieces of your life together in a practical way, rather than just entertaining idle fantasies. Don't be overly concerned if you can't yet figure out how to reach your goals; somehow, all the pieces will fall into place just in time.

You aren't interested in carefully tip-toeing around the truth today. If you see a direct path to your desired destination, you will likely do nearly anything to get there in a speedy manner. Unfortunately, other people may not be so quick to jump on board, requiring you to slow down to explain your plan point by point. Don't automatically trust a new partnership now because it might be smarter to work by yourself for a while longer. Sometimes the only person you can really count on is yourself.

You're quite comfortable sharing your thoughts now that the Moon is in your 9th House of Big Ideas because it's easier to talk about the future possibilities rather than the present moment. Stay focused on the horizon; discussing your plans in vague generalities is more productive today than trying to guess what's missing. You can always fill in the details later when you have more of the specifics at your disposal.

Untangling all the mixed signals may be challenging today, especially if you want to take the course of least resistance. Although you have common sense working in your favor now, you still could be overly serious about the current situation. Your need to be practical conflicts with an irrepressible yet irrational optimism, prompting you to quickly move past your concerns so you can truly enjoy the good times ahead. Concentrate on the present moment and take one step at a time.

You want to sink deeper into your subconscious as you explore the current possibilities in your life. But you might run into resistance if you expect a close friend to participate with you on your metaphysical journey. Others may express their willingness to join you, only to withdraw before the energy becomes too intense. Don't worry; you're better off traveling in these imaginative realms by yourself, anyway. Your friends will just have to wait to hear about your amazing adventures when you return.

The Moon's visit to your 6th House of Routine brings opportunities to think about your physical well-being and encourages you to do something proactive to improve your health. Making small improvements to your diet or exercise program can have positive consequences now as long as you don't alter too much too fast. Small steps that lead to enduring change are more useful than grandiose gestures that only last a day or two. Taking care of your body ensures that you'll have the energy later on when you want it.

You are riding a highly creative wave as the emotional Moon washes through your 5th House of Self-Expression. Fortunately, the dependable Taurus Moon enables you to set a sustainable pace in the morning and then stick with it until you finish your chores. Thankfully, you should have time for play, too, making this a relatively pleasant day. Nevertheless, expansive Jupiter tempts you to take on more than you can complete, so don't say yes unless you really mean it.

You are likely to receive much-needed support from family members and close friends now that the Moon is hanging out in your 4th House of Roots. Although you appreciate their warm generosity, the assistance might not be what you need -- even if others mean well. If you feel smothered by someone meddling in your affairs, express your concerns as kindly as possible. Count your blessings; there's no reason to make your life more complicated by offending your allies. You're lucky to have people in your life who care.

You may be swept right off your feet by other people's agendas today because you think they need your help. Unfortunately, you could end up feeling like your assistance wasn't very useful at all. Additionally, your own work could remain neglected. However, if you establish clear boundaries so you can fulfill your responsibilities early in the day, you'll feel eager about jumping in to support someone else.

You might not be able to recall all the details about what recently went awry, but that won't prevent you from becoming discouraged over a current relationship, anyway. Some of your disappointment may be entangled with your personal history that you could be trying to forget. However, filling in the missing gaps in your story frees you from endlessly repeating a pattern that no longer works. Facing your past liberates you to joyfully experience the future.

Avoiding the pressure of work sounds like a good idea today but, unfortunately, you cannot just slip away on a whim. Even if you try to escape into your memories, reminiscing about your childhood won't likely offer you the solace you seek. Your awareness keeps returning to the present moment and what you are currently lacking. There's no need to force a change; just let your thoughts wander back and forth between the past and present until they settle down.

Your moods shift often today with the Moon back in your changeable sign, yet the pressure may still feel like it's too much to handle. It helps to consider which feelings are worth sharing and which ones might better be kept to yourself. Ultimately, it's easier to listen compassionately to someone else's problems than to open yourself up to scrutiny by talking about your own. Choosing the safest route is not the best choice if it means closing down your heart. Let down your guard and confide in a trustworthy friend.

Your relationship to material possessions can strongly impact the decisions you make today. If you have childhood recollections of not getting what you want, you could be motivated to accumulate more than you need now. If you link the idea of happiness to possessing money or things, you might wonder what you're missing. Thankfully, you can free yourself from your past if you focus on the intangible blessings of the present moment.

Although you are known for your playful nature, it's still a challenge to be true to yourself today. Of course, denying who you are or avoiding the truth about someone else is not an intelligent option. Dwelling on a previous disappointment in your life could close the door on a lovely time before it even has a chance to manifest. Sharing your story can be healing if you don't carry it like a shield to protect you. Simply letting go of your fears allows you to realize your potential.

It's frustrating when others at work don't understand your motives. You could actually believe that you told them what is most important to you, yet they still don't get it. Instead of adding to the stress by further attempting to explain yourself, try an entirely new approach today. Stop reaching for a connection that isn't there; just interact without any expectations. Your emotional detachment alleviates tension and makes room for better communication later on.

Obviously, relationships are important to you, but now they seem even more significant than ever as you work through deeply rooted issues. Your expectations could come from lessons you learned in your childhood or even from memories of early family dynamics. Rediscovering your origins can clear the idealism from your current perspective that would otherwise set you up for disappointment. The best strategy is to indulge in social activities without turning them into anything other than the simple pleasures that they are.

Your over-analytical mind might provoke you to engage in an uncomfortable exchange with an old friend now. Although your intentions may be honorable, other people's reactions could leave you frustrated, making you believe that you weren't truly heard. You bring more baggage to your conversations than you realize which can cause confusion. Being aware of your assumptions saves you from a bothersome headache later on. Think less; feel more.

You may believe that a lot is at stake because nearly everything appears to be a big deal today. Fortunately, you can overcome your fears and step into the current situation with a healthy attitude. Keep in mind that someone may choose to resist your enthusiasm, but don't take it too personally. The fewer expectations you have now, the better it will be for everyone involved. Be brave and take a leap of faith.

You ethical Goats usually want to do what is right, but another person's wounded feelings might tempt you to say something you don't actually mean. Nevertheless, be up front with what you want even if your needs are different from someone else's. It's healthier to acknowledge your desires without putting any expectations on others in the process. It's not really about your message; it's more to do with how you deliver it.

You have an opportunity now to alter your current patterns and positively impact your future destiny. You may choose to walk down the path of love in order to pursue an unsatisfied fantasy, but this doesn't necessarily mean a new relationship. It can be the beginning of a deeper kind of intimacy based upon complete honesty with yourself and others. Romance grows even sweeter when illusions no longer muddy the water.

Turning a special dream into reality isn't a simple task, yet the outcome of your efforts may be quite satisfying now. Nevertheless, forcing results is not a smart strategy today, even if you think you're clever enough to pull it off. Instead, let go of your personal needs; open your heart to more fulfilling relationships that are based on spiritual principles rather than irrational emotional desires.

Although the dynamics between you and a close friend may be out of kilter, you can still talk yourself into thinking that everything's just fine. Don't lose track of your priorities if social pressures begin to unravel your plans. Focusing on what you need to do for your job is smarter than having to clean up a mess because you were distracted by personal relationship issues. Establishing clear priorities early in the day helps you avoid a crisis later on. Simply acknowledging another person's feelings may be enough alleviate the tension.

You might believe that you're simply pursuing love today, but you could still get more than you bargain for if you're too eager in your approach. Your key planet Venus is visiting your 7th House of Partners and her connection with rebellious Uranus pulls you into a complicated entanglement. You can't trust your intuition now because you're overly attached to your dreams. Thankfully, you can make a good decision by sticking to the facts when deciding your next move.

Satisfaction is elusive now because the Moon's current visit to your sign might tempt you to find other pastures that look greener than yours. Nevertheless, you are committed to meeting your obligations today so you won't likely escape on a whim. Appreciate the present moment and try to be grateful for whatever you have. Taking a mature approach to relationships could be enough to put your day back on track and calm your restless heart.

If a friend or associate pushes back against your ideas today, you may be tempted to retreat emotionally. Even if you are secure in the relationship, your fear of rejection could motivate you to avoid the discussion entirely. You believe it's easier to ignore your gut than to express whatever is in your heart -- but it's not. To the contrary, it's healthier to share your concerns openly and allow the other person a chance to respond. You might be pleasantly surprised if you're willing to take a risk.

Feeling a bit insecure today can lead to tricky relationship dynamics, especially if you believe that one of your friends or associates hasn't been honest with you. In fact, people could be trying to make something appear better than it really is. Normally, you would be too clever for anyone to get away with misleading you, but now it's also possible for your fears -- rather than someone else's actions -- to amplify your anxiety. Double check the facts before jumping to any false conclusions.

You might not know how to make sense out of your feelings today because you are temporarily losing your ability to remain logical while analyzing your options. Even if you try to separate fact from fiction, you're more likely to accept whatever you are told now, setting you up for later disappointment. Keep in mind that choices colored by your subjective preferences will probably lead you astray. Paring back your options simplifies the decision-making process.

Your vivid imagination is working overtime today and you're preoccupied by a fantasy instead of what's actually going on. You are being pulled in two different directions now, so you must be careful about choosing dreams over reality. Confusion about your own needs can lead to an unwise choice, so put off important decisions for a day or two until your clarity returns. In the meantime, practicing meditation helps you get in touch with your higher self.

Trying to recall a childhood experience is perplexing today because you might not be able to remember enough of the facts to know if it truly occurred or not. Either way, you realize now that there probably is another side to the story that you haven't thought about. Take plenty of time and fill in the details. However, your desire for the truth may turn into an obsession, so it's wise to know when to bring your thoughts back to the present and stop trying to rewrite your past.

Taking charge at home or in your community is where you shine today, but your assumption of authority could also create an awkward situation. Although you think you know what's best for everyone else, people might disagree with your current strategy. Unfortunately, your sound logic won't help to convince anyone that you are right. You may have to just let your friends and associates go off on their own to discover what's true by themselves. Don't let others rain on your parade.

You may be distracted now even if you're usually quite astute when dealing with financial matters. If you see something that you immediately want to buy, it's best to wait a few days before actually finalizing the purchase. Although you might believe that you deserve a reward for all of your hard work, impulsive spending isn't a smart idea. Giving yourself the gift of personal time could make the payoff even better than you expect.

You're confident that you're being absolutely clear about your romantic intentions today, yet someone can totally misunderstand what you're saying. Complications may arise if your repressed feelings are strong enough to color how you deliver your message. Keep asking for feedback along the way to ensure that your words convey exactly what you mean. Let your heart speak for itself.

Your eagerness leads you to anticipate what someone wants from you now, but too much analysis can get in the way. Unfortunately, you're likely to jump to the wrong conclusions without checking out your assumptions. Don't stress if you have trouble meeting other people's expectations today, since they probably have unrealistic hopes, anyway. Instead of worrying about anyone else, just do the best work you can and then move on. Believe in yourself; there's no need to compromise when it comes to your integrity.

Standing at the edge of a new experience is a reassuring feeling for you Rams. You might even begin an extremely exciting venture now, for you have an optimistic sense about life and you are eager to play out your part. Be as adventurous as you wish. Live outside the constraints of negativity and reach for the stars.

There is something magical about pleasure that makes you feel like all is well in the world. You may perceive loveliness wherever you go today as your key planet Venus receives an encouraging nudge from lucky Jupiter, giving you a sense of contentment. But beware; the shadow of laziness lurks nearby when times are sweet. Do whatever you can to overcome the inertia of inaction because opportunities are knocking loudly at your door.

You can't get enough of interacting with other people today because there's an easy flow of energy between you and your coworkers. If there's any social activity cooking, you want to be a part of it. If there's nothing exciting on your calendar, then invite a few friends to lunch. Start your celebration early before your mood shifts again. By nightfall, you may feel like being alone so you can lose yourself in your dreams. Honoring your changeability is essential to your happiness.

You may be rewarded for being extra sweet at work today, but your magic is meant for more than just taking care of everyone else. Be responsible to your own needs by spending time with a loved one. Going out with a close friend or sharing a romantic meal with a partner might be exactly what is needed to rekindle the intimacy in a current relationship. If nothing else, at least treat yourself to something special. Remember, others will be nicer to you if you start by being good to yourself.

A lovely day is in store for you Lions as you get the opportunity to perform on center stage. Happily, your enthusiastic actions are acknowledged and even applauded by your friends and fans; chances are that you will be asked to do an encore. However, it's crucial to know when to stop. It's better if you leave your audience always wanting more.

Taking care of business sounds like a good idea today, but you may grow restless while trying to follow through with your plans. Your intentions are honorable, but distractions abound and it's tempting now to pick a path that leads to fleeting pleasure instead of a sense of accomplishment. Sharing your heart with a friend can spark a sweet encounter, but you might regret your decision if you don't also meet your obligations at work.

Your star is shining brightly now that charming Venus trines propitious Jupiter in your 10th House of Career. It's time to receive acknowledgement from your peers -- and maybe even a raise. No matter what happens, keep your heart open to jovial Jupiter and let the good times roll. But don't forget about your duties and obligations as you pursue the next wonderful experience. If you handle practical matters first, you can continue to work and play with great success.

You might not have to apply yourself very hard today for recognition, money and even romance to find their way to your door. Naturally, it helps if you are enjoying your work, for your ongoing attachment to your daily routine is what pays the bills and feeds your heart. If you don't like your current regimen, figure out a way to bring the missing pleasure back into your life. Do what you love and the rewards will follow.

Your charisma attracts opportunities that bring pleasure today as beautiful Venus harmonizes with buoyant Jupiter. Romance may find you now, even if you're not looking; give yourself permission to act spontaneously without worrying about the future. If your love interest doesn't play out successfully, then seek other ways to express your creativity. Just be careful not to overdo it, for excessive behavior can land you into a heap of trouble. Moderation is the secret to your success.

Although it's a workday, your life may be more about enjoyment now than anything else. You might discover ideas that motivate you, even if they're not job related. You are genuinely more affectionate as you express your appreciation to others. It's okay to break the rules and indulge in something outrageous simply for the pleasure it brings you. You can put yourself back on the straight and narrow path tomorrow.

During these past few weeks you might have reconsidered what's most important for your personal fulfillment at work. After thinking things over, you are ready to blast ahead again now that you are back on top of your game. Don't fake confidence if you aren't positive about where you are going; it only makes more problems for you later on. Expressing your vulnerability makes you more lovable while increasing your chances to reach your destination.

Blue skies and open horizons tempt you to believe that everything is perfect today, but your assumptions might drag you down a dangerous path. Honor your concerns instead of just glossing over them in search of the next wonderful experience. Even if something or someone appears very alluring, consider the pitfalls of pursuing pleasure over responsibility. Fortunately, an amazing experience is yours for the asking as long as you maintain your balance.

Everyone seems to be concerned about you today because you aren't as outgoing as others expect. But how people react isn't really your problem. It's more important to show your vulnerability now in a way that lets others move past your usual displays of confidence and into your heart. You may feel a bit uncomfortable knowing that someone truly sees you, but ultimately this is part of your healing process. It's amazing how close you can feel to another person if you simply lower your defenses.

You might feel as if others are rubbing you the wrong way today. You can choose to remain irritated or you can turn your discomfort into a learning experience. Fortunately, you don't have to remain quiet and allow someone else to continue annoying you. Stand up for yourself and state your limits. Your relationships have the potential to grow if you are honest and keep your anger to a minimum. Setting clear boundaries makes it easier on everyone involved.

Old memories may return to haunt you today, making it difficult to finalize an important decision. If you feel pushed, unwarranted fears could make a difference now, tilting you toward caution instead of action. But even if you turn down an opportunity, you still might grow restless with your current routine and wish that you said yes. Thankfully, once you acknowledge that there's no single path, it will be easier to accept the one you have chosen. Remember, the journey is the reward.

Although your good intentions may be sincere, your current behavior doesn't necessarily demonstrate your true feelings. You might feel moodier than you let on since the hypersensitive Cancer Moon can give you a lot to worry about. However, others seem to tire quickly when you express all your concerns, so you may attempt to keep your fears to yourself. Remember, even suppressed feelings can negatively impact your day, so find a way to share your uncertainties without burdening anyone else.

You may have to demonstrate your leadership skills today or have interactions with others where you must set an optimistic tone. However, it's not necessarily appropriate to share your most personal issues, even if you have a lot on your mind. For now, put your best foot forward and show your most professional side. You can handle your private matters later on when you have the time.

You might need to withdraw emotionally today because your friends and associates seem a bit too moody for your taste -- and you just don't want to deal with them. But pulling away from the group may reinforce your isolation, provoking more emotional drama. Instead, consider the possibility that it's really your own feelings that are being stirred and not those of everyone else. Taking responsibility for your projections enables you to behave in a manner that's more consistent to your needs.

Although your actions can positively impact others on the job today, they might not realize the value of your contribution. However, there's no need to make a big deal out of your current behavior. You may not have a strong desire to be in charge now, yet you are still able to exert subtle control in order to steer events your way. Nevertheless, the pieces will fall into place if you work for the benefit of all.

You are usually able to demonstrate your power by making up your mind and sticking to your decision. However, you may be more open to change now, especially if someone's new idea adds enjoyment to your day. Although you might not be willing to sacrifice efficiency for fun, you don't want to lose out on the opportunity to make a good plan even better. Listening to your heart and living your passion ultimately brings stability to your world.

You're more inclined today to get to the bottom of an emotional issue that has been brewing for a while. However, once a conversation is in the works, you're likely to grow restless, preferring to change the subject to a lighter topic of conversation. Nevertheless, you'll feel more satisfied in the long run if you stick with it until some sort of resolution is reached. Your persistence pays off even if it's difficult at first.

You don't like it when others aren't open to your method of accomplishing your objectives today. You feel as if everyone else is stuck in his or her old patterns or, perhaps, just afraid to try something new. Either way, it's helpful to be patient with a friend or partner because your insistence could stir up more resistance. Ultimately, your plan will be accepted on its merits if you give your critics time to readjust their thinking.

You're usually captivated by concepts more than being interested in any one specific method. However, you could become bogged down with seemingly unimportant minutiae today and you can't see an easy way to avoid the red tape. Fortunately, your detour into a world of laser-like focus can bring its own kind of freedom, so limit your concentration on being efficient in the present moment.

Your eagerness to take an emotional risk might not be readily apparent, but what reaches the surface isn't the most important thing today. You're in the process of making big changes in your attitude yet it may take a while before your inner work becomes obvious on the outside. For now, be content with acknowledging the plethora of possibilities you see, even if you're not ready to share your optimism with anyone else. There's no need to rush into anything; you'll intuitively know when it's time to involve others.

Sweet love is on your mind as you weave your romantic fantasies today. Exploring your attractions to friends and associates is harmless, but it's wise not to act on every feeling that pops into awareness. Keep in mind that what goes on inside your head belongs to you alone. Give yourself permission to dream; just remember to come back down to earth once you open your eyes. Some things are better kept to yourself.

There is a bit of confusion in the air now as you sort out the differences between your role in the outer world with your friends and your desire to be hanging out at home. This dilemma can take a variety of different forms. Even if you have more chores on your plate today, remember that your next wave of growth -- emotional and spiritual -- will come from the close connections you have with your past and your family. Taking care of your business early in the day allows you to spend your time doing what matters most.

Your tendency is to say it out loud today, write it in an email or even blast it out on the Internet so that everyone knows your feelings. However, acting on this insistent urge to communicate is not the most appropriate thing to do now. Just sit back and let go of your expectations. You're going to need to sort out individual differences in order to make your plans work. Keep in mind this kind of negotiation may progress easier if you don't lay all your cards on the table at once. Listen first; speak later.

You might grow uneasy today when you realize that you need to take a stand. Since you tend to be more flexible in your approach, your inclination is to wait and see how things go before making your wishes known. Now, however, you are being pushed into going on the record about what you want. Ironically, if you overstate your needs, you could be left high and dry. If you don't take responsibility for your own feelings, others may never know how you felt. The choice is yours.

You might find yourself in the middle of a squabble today, even if it's not your fight. Mysterious misunderstandings continue to create tension and you believe that you have a role in sorting it all out. Be careful, for your point of view isn't necessarily representative of anyone else's. Offer your perspective, but don't try to persuade others to agree with you. Keeping your tone gentle allows others to hear your message. Sometimes a quiet meow is more effective than a loud roar.

An ongoing dilemma in your love life might be based on a basic conflict of values. What are you willing to give up now to receive what you need from a relationship? What constitutes an ideal relationship? And how perfectly do your expectations need to align? Take a deep breath and relax; there aren't any quick answers now, but these are some good questions to ponder before jumping in with your solution. Initiating an open dialogue is a good place to start.

If you can let yourself off the hook for a while, you may have a chance to convert your current stress into creative action. Take whatever struggles you're facing and use the energy to express yourself in ways that are uniquely and eclectically you. This emotional journey has nothing to do with pleasing a partner. It's about accessing your own heart and manifesting more meaning in your life. Be brave and follow your bliss.

Recognition by your peers is an important factor in your life today, yet you have mixed feelings about being in the spotlight. If your career is not fulfilling your dreams, you may experience some angst as you try to create an alternative path for yourself. Of course, you want to be appreciated for what you do but you're not necessarily interested in performing just for the benefit of others. Your special brand of magic doesn't need a stage to shine.

A recurring theme in your life might involve the question of whether to focus on the big issues or to catch up on the little details. You're drawn toward recreating an adventure you recently set aside. Don't get sidetracked, you can narrow your field of vision by concentrating on specific chores first. Once you're certain that you're on the right path, you should be able to balance the very big and the very small with great success.

You can tell that a large wave of change is coming and you begrudgingly accept the fact that you won't be able to outrun it. No matter how stable your life feels these days, some things will have to shift under the pressure of fluctuating circumstances. Even if you believe that you should hold onto the status quo, begin thinking now about what you will someday leave behind. Evolution will happen with or without your cooperation, but it will be a lot more enjoyable if you remain flexible and are an active participant in the process.

You might be caught up in a larger pattern that you can't control. Remember, however, that nothing is permanent -- even those things that seem not to change. It appears futile to resist the strong currents now, but it still may be beneficial to establish your limits and make a stand against the outside pressures. Nevertheless, your flexibility is your ultimate weapon. Bending to the tides when the time is right prevents exhaustion and improves your chances of reaching your destination in one piece.

It's nearly impossible to separate your dreams and illusions from reality. Today, as the Moon activates Jupiter and Neptune --  your key planets -- your fantasy life assumes heightened proportions. But if the real world isn't matching up to your idyllic visions, pick your escape route very carefully. Ongoing battles may temporarily pull you off course. Remember, it's all about awareness and not denial. Your imagination holds the keys to your future.

Your words gain power today because nearly everything you express is connected to unspoken feelings. However, your mental prowess requires you to be careful so you don't misuse your ability to influence what someone else is thinking. Selfish intentions may generate unnecessary problems which can be avoided if you consider others in your process. Speak your truth without harboring any hidden agendas.

You are ready to pursue a difficult discussion about old relationship issues now that Mercury is visiting your 7th House of Partners. The dynamics for this conversation have been brewing over the past few weeks, and you finally realize how important it is to talk about the situation.
