Although the energy is already moving into a new phase, don't say more than is required just yet. Taking the discussion to the next level makes sense only after you give your feelings time to settle before putting them out in the open.

Your powers of concentration continue to improve, but you need to set necessary boundaries with close friends and partners to keep on track. However, you are more open now to following others if it looks like they are having fun, but this isn't the best use of your time today. Instead of taking the course of least resistance, narrow your mental focus to establish a deeper connection. Defining your limits requires courage but can also sustain the growth of an important relationship.

You may be eager to demonstrate what you have to offer now, especially within the context of romantic or creative endeavors. However, this isn't about casual flirtation. You are playing for keeps, whether you are working on a project, producing an artistic masterpiece or looking for love. You can increase your chances for success by holding back just enough to feel safe and secure. Once you are ready to take a risk, apply your sense of purpose and go for it.

It feels as if things are about to go your way now that the Moon is back in your playful sign. Although unprocessed feelings may be bugging you, you're still eager to go out and have a good time. Perhaps you are secretly concerned about a power struggle that is unfolding with a family member. Remember, it's crucial to get the issues out in the open so there will be fewer surprises in the days ahead.

Use your renowned analytical abilities to discern what are the most essential things to do today. If you don't make concrete plans, you are likely to waste a lot of energy following the wrong path, even if you have an enjoyable time doing it. Don't spread yourself too thin or you will regret it later on. Your greatest challenge now is to separate your grandiose visions from what you can actually pull off.

Familiar territory gives way to unfamiliar ground as Mercury, the Winged Messenger, leaves your sign. You might have been developing an idea over these past few weeks, and although it still seems valuable, your attitude is starting to shift. Traveling this path is tricky because you become less objective as you grow more passionate about your life. However, there's no need to justify your current decisions; trust your intuition and move on.

You're plugged in and can listen more carefully now as you separate out the most significant ideas from the fluff. Cerebral Mercury is hanging out in your sign for an extended stay due to its upcoming retrograde turn on October 21, deeply affecting all aspects of communication and making you less interested than ever in meaningless chatter. Ask nicely for the intimacy you seek and you might actually receive it.

The atmosphere is buzzing with waves of energy and you feel the optimistic balloons lifting you into the boundless sky of potential. Simultaneously, however, you are also aware of another layer of feelings that is more complicated. Although acknowledging these emotions could quickly bring you back to the ground, don't let your fears prevent you from taking a little risk. Just make sure to bring along a parachute to ease your fall just in case.

Your social world is growing more complex now that Mercury is visiting your 11th House of Friends. You might even be feeling an emotional undercurrent at work and it's difficult to know exactly what's going on. However, your concerns aren't just coming from within; even your most ardent supporters are reminding you to be careful today. Pay attention; their advice may help you successfully navigate the changes ahead.

Dynamics are shifting at work today, and it may take a while to sort out the mixed cosmic messages and choose a path that makes the most sense in the long run. Use the remainder of this weekend to consider all your options. Talk to others about the potential problems you see in the near future. A little extra planning now -- even if it makes you uncomfortable to wait -- can better prepare you for the intensity that's just around the corner.

It's tempting to lose yourself in your fantasies, yet you're quite capable of bringing yourself back down to earth when required. Your dreams are extremely powerful now and you could use them to map out your next moves. Instead of relying on your imagination as an escape, create an inner landscape that matches your goals. Your colorful visualizations can pave the road for your ambitious journey ahead.

Although these are challenging times, you're empowered by the persistence of the Leo Moon as it reinforces your feelings. You are very creative in your thoughts and actions today, yet you might miss a significant fact that's being kept from you by a partner or coworker. Hiding the truth from yourself only makes matters worse. As long as your intentions are honorable, honest communication will improve the situation even if your message isn't appreciated at first.

Your own uncertainty may catch you off guard today as the gulf between your irrepressible optimism and undeniable reality widens. But this isn't to say that your enthusiasm is unfounded. It's just that if you stay balanced and rely on logic while tending to the details, you have an even better chance of achieving success. Sheer determination is admirable but it's not a replacement for good judgment.

You may feel overwhelmed today as your world is abuzz with all kinds of distractions. Although this excess noise isn't necessarily negative; it's just a lot of energy to manage. No matter what happens now, keep an upbeat tone when sharing your hopes and concerns with friends. If you can overcome your fear of dreaming out loud, you might be quite wonderfully surprised with the response that you receive.

Although your emotions won't likely be quiet today, you can still maintain a high level of detachment with respect to your feelings. Fortunately, you might be quite rational now, even if you're in the midst of unexpected turmoil. Rely on your intuition as you continue to develop a more practical life strategy. Don't toss out your dreams; instead, turn them into reality.

You're being pulled in so many directions now that your ability to maintain your cool is being tested. It's very challenging to keep your day from falling apart, since your schedule could be so full that you think about sleeping less just to fit everything in. Managing your time wisely is essential. The pace of life may speed up throughout the week, so make sure you get your much-needed rest while you can. Your best performance is yet to come.

You're so idealistic about your future that your fantasies can get in the way of what you must accomplish today. Still, dreaming about all the possibilities is healthy now, as long as your feet remain firmly on the ground. Remember, making a wish or creating a vision board is not enough; you must also follow through with positive action. State your goals and then apply your energy with all the determination you can muster. Intention plus hard work equals magic.

You can fall in love with love too easily today, even if there is no hot romance brewing in your life at this time. However, for now, it's not about anyone else. You are being drawn into your dreams because they are so vividly captivating. Be careful; don't confuse your illusions with reality. If you do blur the edges, you'll set yourself up for serious disappointment as the truth dawns on you. Instead of fixating on your expectations, plant the seeds of potential and cultivate them the best you can.

You want to nurture everybody today -- family members, friends, coworkers and stray animals. It doesn't matter if you are already overcommitted; you still can figure out a way to accomplish whatever needs to be done. Thankfully, you are receiving assistance from the hidden realms of your own subconscious mind. Your previous spiritual growth and psychological work will now be very useful in the present. Happily, the possibilities are only limited by your imagination.

It feels as if you can see forever, yet you might gloss over data that you don't have time to integrate today. Nevertheless, ignoring the facts is rather dangerous and may cause you to miss something very important. Take heed of any  practical advice offered by friends, whether it was originally solicited or not, because it helps you gain clarity in your thinking. If no one readily offers assistance, ask for what you need. Receiving a quick reality check now from someone who can see things more objectively could make all the difference.

You can set your intentions, make a plan and work until you achieve success today. In order to reach your goals, you may need to arrange a meeting with someone powerful who has your best interests at heart. But before you tell him or her your plans, make sure that you have all your facts in place. However, don't waste time getting lost in the details; just let your inner philosopher wander out into the open as you share your dreams. Your passion for the project is what matters most.

Your fantasies are luring you off into the distant future or out into a galaxy far, far away. However, dreaming about foreign places and exploring different cultures may have a wonderfully practical side now. If you simply slow down your train of thought a tiny bit, you can make your best ideas real. Give others a chance to share in your amazing adventures; surprisingly, you might enjoy having some company along the way.

You can go nearly anywhere the winds of your imagination carry you now as you surf a powerful spiritual wave. Mercury disperses any resistance to your thoughts as it moves toward trining your key planet Neptune. Messengers may take the high road, but their messages might grow muddied, nonetheless. Pay close attention to every interpersonal interaction or your best ideas will only get confused and diffused. It's easy to ride the currents if you keep things simple.

Your workweek may be disrupted by a sudden change of plans. You might feel put upon since you would rather stick with your regular responsibilities today. Unfortunately, the more you try to return to your typical routine, the more reality pressures you to deal with the distractions before they turn into a crisis. Maintaining a healthy perspective is your best strategy now, however difficult it is to find. Ultimately, your sense of humor can save the day.

You must answer to a higher power today -- but not an invisible one. It doesn't even matter how practical you are now as you try to stay on your predetermined path. You may feel like others are leaning on you to take action. It appears like someone in authority won't let you have your fun, even if you think your plans are completely within reason. Choose your battles carefully for you could win the war, but be too exhausted to enjoy your victory.

You witness a clash of wills today as someone close to you attempts to drag you away from a quiet day at the office and into an intense drama. You could, however, cheat yourself out of quite an experience if you don't go along with the flow, even if it pulls you into uncomfortable waters. The unfolding situation may unleash deep feelings, but you and everyone else will feel better after the emotional meltdown clears the air of buried tensions.

Expect the unexpected today no matter what's on your calendar. Even if you have a light schedule at work, the rest and relaxation you planned on might not happen. There are just too many unforeseen events that sneak their way into your day. There aren't any quick solutions to the dilemmas that prevent you from taking it easy. Nevertheless, your attitude improves if you focus on your long-term goals. Keep the destination in mind and hope in your heart.

If others appear to be undermining your efforts now, it may be challenging to stay optimistic about your present circumstances. You might meet resistance from authority figures as they try to persuade you to change your mind about something very important to you. The problem is that your will is set and you are in no mood to negotiate. Stop and take a deep breath; rather than issuing ultimatums today, you are better off finding a compromise that satisfies everyone. Start at a point of mutual agreement and work from there.

You are precariously balanced on the edge between light and dark today. You may actually believe you are being up front about your agenda with everyone involved. You're probably not intentionally hiding the truth, but trouble is brewing in the hidden realms, nonetheless. It's hard to fix the problem because the source of the resistance isn't clear. If it feels like you are shadowboxing, dance with the unknown instead of trying to beat it into submission.

You might not want to talk about what's bothering you today. You would rather walk the tightrope and hope everyone has sufficient grace to act kindly and enough common sense to stay out of the way. However, people may be eager to take advantage of your need to keep your cool. Unfortunately, no one wins if no one speaks the truth. Be bold and take a risk; start the conversation by sharing what's on your mind and encourage others to follow. You will never know what magic could happen if you don't give it a try.

This intense day is filled with one emotional interaction after another now that the Sun squares your key planet Pluto. The good news is that you know what you need to do and you can make it happen today, whatever the cost. The bad news is that circumstances may change throughout the day and put you at odds with someone close to you. Even if your fears tell you differently, your friends are on your side and not against you. Put your energy toward finding common goals that bring you together rather than focusing on different approaches that could pull you apart.

Circumstances in your life are not as rosy now as you might believe. Don't be fooled just because the music you are creating in your mind relaxes you into a cosmic trance. It's wise to face your problems right away or you'll just have bigger ones on your plate later on. Thankfully, shining the light of your awareness into the shadows helps to make your current challenges less scary and the solutions more apparent.

It often pays to be a stable-footed Mountain Goat, especially when the entire mountain is shaking. You can easily see how changing structures are testing people around you. If you have taken the time to build your life on solid principles, the current pressures will help you grow even stronger. However, if you are standing on unstable ground, back up and reconsider your direction before charging ahead. Remember, people may let you down, but your foundations will not.

Storms are growing in intensity today, but the lightning hasn't brought any rain just yet. Brilliant ideas run across the silver screen of your mind, but it's too complicated to pull them together into the critical mass that creates a true brainstorm. Resign yourself to riding the mental currents without letting the stress bother you. Don't worry if you have nothing to show for all your ingenious thoughts. There will be lots of time later on for manifesting your magic.

Others may expect you to fix situations that are simply beyond your control today. The underlying issue is about how you cling to patterns of behavior based upon your primal fear of change. Your overall situation is growing brighter day by day, but there are still a few loose ends that must be tied up before you can move on to the next chapter of your life. You intuitively know that something special is brewing today, but you have no idea what it is. Understanding where your life is leading these days is a real challenge, but you believe that you would be happier if you knew for sure. It's nearly impossible to think about having fun when things at work are so serious these days. You may even walk away from previous plans for an upcoming vacation or a weekend getaway because you simply don't have time. It's smarter to focus your energy now on something more practical that contributes to your stability, rather than escaping on a getaway. Sticking close to home makes sense; don't push out beyond safe limits until you feel as if you're back on more stable ground. Taking care of unfinished business is your first step to regaining more control of your life.

Someone may deliver a harsh message to you today, but you really don't have to blindly accept anyone else's interpretation of reality. Nevertheless, you're likely to be vulnerable to what you hear if you trust the source. Listen carefully to what others say now, but don't take anything too personally. You can put what you learn into motion to improve your game if you assimilate the facts without an emotional charge. Remember that those close to you might truly have your best interests at heart.

Although you're feeling confident about a recent decision, your newly rediscovered optimism could make your energy a little too much to handle. Others may quickly grow tired of hearing your exaggerated tales about your amazing life. Temper your excitement with a strong dose of compassion for others. Scaling back your enthusiasm just a little bit creates a harmonious environment that inspires healthier relationships.

You're not very shy about your desire to deepen the level of emotional commitment with a very close friend or intimate partner today. Although your straightforward approach may be startling at first, others might be receptive to your ideas once they adjust to your style of direct communication. Being aware of someone's boundaries doesn't come easily to you now, but demonstrating respect builds stronger trust in the relationship. Be brave and authentic: take a chance and express what's in your heart.

You might not be so quick to head off on your own today, since the idea of working with a buddy sounds quite appealing. The Moon's presence in your 7th House of Relationships shifts the energy away from your personal needs, making you more conscious of what others are thinking. Keep in mind that your discrimination skills may be lacking, so exercise extra caution when choosing who you connect with now, professionally or romantically. You don't have to follow every whim to be happy.

It's exhilarating to think you can power your way through your chores today and still have enough time left over to unwind with some friends. Unfortunately, you could underestimate how long it takes to accomplish your work. Make certain that you allow plenty of extra time, for if you leave a task unfinished, you may not be able to relax fully, just knowing there is more to do. Managing your calendar wisely improves your efficiency and increases your chances for fun.

You're ready to kick up your heels and have a great time today, even if you haven't fully met your obligations. Unfulfilled responsibilities don't have to prevent you from having a memorable experience. You might be so excited in the moment that you're ready to do whatever is necessary to enjoy yourself. If you must leave some chores undone, at least let others know that you are cutting out early and remember to come back and finish up tomorrow. Play now, work later.

If you are working too hard, it's time to start claiming your slice of the fun. But the Moon is in your 4th House of Roots, suggesting it might be nice to hide out at home instead of going out to play. You may even end up undertaking a simple domestic project or, perhaps, inviting a friend over to share some quality conversation. Home is where the heart is.

Controlling your restlessness is complicated today as the exuberant Sagittarius Moon visits your 3rd House of Short Trips. You might even make an extra run to the store or head out to the park during lunchtime just to get out of the house or escape from work. Don't be too self-critical if you haven't made much progress by the end of the day. If you're having trouble concentrating now, it's probably smart to just call it quits and pick up the pieces tomorrow.

You might be riding high on positive emotions today and feeling confident enough to spend a bit of money on something special. You may have suddenly grown more optimistic about your income potential, allowing you to justify a luxury purchase now. However, it's still smarter to wait and see how you're feeling in a few days before making a large expenditure that you could later regret. Sometimes the best things in life really are free.

You are more in touch with your own vulnerability now, since the receptive Moon is hanging out in your sign all day. However, you're still likely to take an emotional gamble today and reveal your feelings to someone special. But just telling people about your needs or fears is only one part of the equation. Real intimacy has two sides, so make sure to leave room for the other person to share his or her heart, too.

Normally, it doesn't make sense to keep your optimism to yourself, and yet it may be the most socially astute thing you can do now. You might think your overconfidence could offend someone and you want to avoid any trouble today as you rally support for an idea of yours. Thankfully, your diplomatic skills are currently polished enough to take you far if you trust your instincts and do whatever you believe is best.

Your vivid imagination is running on overdrive now and it's exciting to share your dreams with like-minded people. The Moon is traveling through your 11th House of Groups, prodding you to surround yourself with supportive friends and associates. With just a little extra effort today, you can create exactly the kind of congenial atmosphere you crave. A party might be the perfect venue to find the camaraderie you now want, but a smaller and more intimate gathering could work just as well. It's the connections you make and not the places that matter.

Passionately defending your social values or political beliefs can be quite empowering today, whether it's at work, home or in your community. Keep in mind that fulfilling your responsibilities in the present moment is more important than daydreaming about unrealistic possibilities. Nevertheless, your unique perspective inspires others, so there's no need to hold back now when sharing your visions about the future. Seize the day by being the creative leader that everyone wants to follow.

Your words are as smooth as silk today and you can use them to spin fantastic stories to support your goals. Your visions sound real to others as you describe your plan or try to persuade someone to join your cause. However, treading carefully is wise because you could convince yourself that you are right, even if you're missing the point. Telling everyone what to do might just work out okay if you consider the needs of the whole community and not just yours alone.

You can't turn off the flow of fantasies that are springing forth from your imagination today but, thankfully, you're still aware of what you can do with your visions. Your idealism enriches your day by bringing an endless supply of creative material, but this stream of thoughts or pictures could also distract you from the real work at hand. Escaping into dreams might not seem productive, but using them for motivation is a wise move now.

You're not interested in beating around the bush now; you want to say whatever's necessary to justify your position. Nevertheless, you are afraid of hurting someone's feelings, so you might approach the situation tentatively. Fortunately, you're pleasantly surprised by the feedback you receive that clears the way for constructive conversations. Keep all your facts straight today, because a faulty assumption can turn a spirited discussion into a comedy of misunderstandings.

Sharing your emotions with someone you trust at work might not be on your agenda today, but something may stimulate a strong reaction, prompting you to share your perspective. Unfortunately, once you start talking, you could inadvertently say too much. Thankfully, it's easy to prevent an awkward situation by simply considering the consequences of your words before you open your mouth. Be smart and tailor your message to your audience.

Your creative spirit is flowing strongly today, whether you are working hard or simply enjoying yourself. You might not want to plan too many details of your day, since each activity slips dreamily into the next one. But you have to stay on your toes because your emotions allow you to be easily misled now. Verbal communication could be the source of confusion, so carefully observe what others do before trusting what they say. Actions speak louder than words.

Your inflated hopes about a gathering of family or friends can run into trouble if you harbor unrealistic expectations about those closest to you. Unfortunately, your current penchant for dreaming could turn a perfectly sensible idea into a major fiasco. As tempted as you are to expand on a sentimental theme, it's smarter to keep your plans simple and the drama to a minimum. All you need is love.

You are the master of illusion today as your key planet Venus squares surreal Neptune. Listening to your intuition usually works to your advantage when you're dealing with someone's unresolved feelings. Your diplomatic skills naturally assist you in influencing others with your fair-minded perspective. But keep in mind that your imagination can lead you down the wrong path now if you lose sight of reality. Thankfully, paying attention to the facts enables you to create a lasting positive impact.

Relationship dynamics may be confusing today if someone is quick to hide his or her true feelings. It's challenging to know what others want unless you are willing to climb out on a limb and ask them. This tactic sounds straightforward enough, yet you might end up hearing a lot more than you ever wanted to know. Nevertheless, you'll feel better once you learn the truth and then honestly share what's on your mind as well. An open dialogue cultivates trust.

The power of your convictions should be enough to carry someone else through an episode of low self-esteem. The smartest reaction to today's uncertainty is to figure out exactly what you know as quickly as possible and then talk about what can be done to clarify the issues. Don't be afraid of looking ahead; the bold actions you take now set the pace for your friends and family. Blaze your own path and others will happily follow.

Your schedule may keep you busier than you ever imagined today, even if you were planning on less activity rather than more. However, the current noise in your life might seem worse than it actually is because you cannot turn off the stream of creative thoughts and unconventional feelings. Remembering that you don't always need to be in control of everything allows you to enjoy every moment for exactly what it is. Go with the flow and see where it takes you.

You might think you're fully aware of what's best for everyone else today, and would like to be acknowledged for your altruistic behavior. However, your spiritual ideals may be incongruent with other people's expectations. Fortunately, you won't have to choose one over the other. If you muster up enough courage to talk about how your inner desires conflict with your responsibilities, you can achieve satisfaction on both fronts.

You have a long list of chores that could be left over from earlier in the week, but you may feel unsure of your ability to accomplish much today, anyhow. The best strategy to deal with your current concerns is to concentrate on fulfilling your social and professional obligations as soon as possible. Your doubts will ease once you start crossing items off your to-do list. Fortunately, you can indulge in the pursuit of pleasure once you have made tangible progress.

Although you're tempted to take a risk at work, it's probably not the smartest idea. It's a better strategy to stick with the conventional plan now, instead of following a whim. Socializing may be more fun, but your productivity suffers when you wander away from your chores. Set a steady pace early in the day and be as methodical as possible. If you accomplish a lot today, you can always be spontaneous tomorrow.

You're quite serious when you tell others today that you're going to take an extended vacation to a secluded tropical island or some other exotic location. Even if your ideas seem ridiculous, your fierce determination might just find a way to make it work. If anyone calls you to task because of your imagination, be selective enough to keep the rest of your plans to yourself. Save the details for a trusted friend or the person you wish to be your travel companion. Making your dreams come true isn't as hard as you think.

Your restlessness could turn the most pleasing person in your life into an ornery antagonist today. Just when you believe you have everything figured out, the emotional dynamics may shift, proving your assumptions wrong. Unfortunately, you can't hang on to the status quo any longer. Your relationships are in flux now, as are your feelings. Prevent regret by giving yourself some time for reflection before making any big decisions that can't be changed. When you calm down so will everyone else.

You might not be willing to make so many changes so quickly today, but you have to do whatever it takes to hold it together. Your feelings of insecurity could rise to the surface, only to be buried again as you are happily distracted by external events. If you have previously chosen to suppress your emotions, you now have an opportunity to shift gears and do things differently. Sharing what's on your mind allows others to lend a helping hand.

Anything can happen today if you're willing to make a plan and then execute it accurately. Today's opulent Venus-Jupiter connection reminds you that pleasure is closer than you realize. But you might still run into trouble since there could be some instability in your relationships. Instead of claiming that you will accept the outcome whatever it may be, give yourself permission to state what you want, so at least you know that you tried.

You're quite serious about relationships today, but, thankfully, your cautious attitude doesn't have to get in the way of romance. Your calm demeanor might make you very appealing to someone you admire. The more responsibly you act now, the easier it is for others to find reasons to love you. As always, just being yourself is your best strategy.

It's not easy to keep quiet today because you might have more to say about your feelings than those around you. You don't have any perfect answers, but you can see where the lines of tension have been drawn. Don't shy away from the stressful points. Go through them one by one and iron out any disagreements for the good of everyone involved. A lively discussion will clear the air; find a tactful way to get the ball rolling.

You're eager to try something new if you believe that it can bring happiness today. You don't want to sit around and idly wait for life to happen; instead use these days to push through your resistance to change. Don't worry; any forward movement is better than returning to the past, even if you're unclear about your destination. It's not time to be too cautious. Take a few deep breaths before boldly following your intuition into the great unknown.

You could make everything appear to be effortless today, but you're probably stressing a lot more than anyone realizes. You want to finish what you started but you can see divergent paths everywhere you turn. Unfortunately, no option is perfect. Eventually, you must stop the analysis process and just make a choice. Remember, when making a decision it's always best to choose love over fear.

You might not be completely ready to move to the next level yet. The Moon is visiting your conservative sign today, but a series of rough aspects probably won't slow you down. However, you may inadvertently cling to an old and worn out habit that becomes more trouble than it's worth. Don't focus on your immediate happiness now. Instead, concentrate on your future goals because they can hold your attention for a much longer period of time. Pursuing your ambitions brings you joy and success.

You think you have an ace up your sleeve today, but you could be missing a few cards, instead. Although you believe you're at the top of your game when it comes to negotiation, it's wise to settle for a little less than you expect. Nevertheless, stop sweeping the intensity under the rug and don't be afraid to say what you want. Bringing feelings out into the open now is the only logical way to go.

Holding too tightly to your long-term goals doesn't leave room for any new possibilities to enter your life now. You're aware of the opportunities for fun and games, but you can feel the stress between a potential payoff for taking a chance and the loss of security that comes from leaving stability behind. Trust your hunches and your good intentions will shine through, which in turn encourages others to support you.

You might think that everyone wants to do something with you today, making it difficult to focus on your previous commitments. Your popularity is running high and you want to grab every opportunity you can to have fun. But it's not a great idea to say yes just because you're afraid of being left out of the action. Balancing your approach to work and play allows you to get the most out of your day.

You may be extremely excited about all the wonderful things that are happening now because you believe that the current opportunities will lead to greater success. Although you are hopeful about what you can manage today, your expectations are probably out of proportion with reality. Rather than setting yourself up for a fall, avoid the temptation of taking on too much. Surely it's better to do an admirable job at fewer tasks than to tackle everything haphazardly and fail.

Your current charm can be quite persuasive now. However, an inflationary square between the Sun and pompous Jupiter warns that you may not remember how to set boundaries and honor limitations. You could inadvertently detract from your accomplishments if you talk too much, so be extra careful about rambling on after you have already made your point. The adage "less is more" is sensible advice to follow today.

You could find yourself wrapped up in a controversy today because you aren't very concerned about the changes ahead. Your friends or coworkers might try to tell you why you should be acting more maturely, but you just want to have a little fun. Enjoying yourself is wonderful as long as you don't forget about your previous obligations, especially if others are depending on you now. There's no substitute for how good you feel when you do something helpful for someone special.

You are quite opinionated today and might create situations where you can let everyone know exactly what you think. But others aren't necessarily interested in listening to your rant for very long, so deliver your message as quickly as possible. Wasting time with too many details only weakens your story and makes you less believable, so demonstrate your ability to be concise and considerate. Use the art of persuasion to your advantage by leaving your audience wanting more.

You might have a brilliant idea today about an activity that involves your friends. But you can become so excited that your expectations grow by leaps and bounds, making the logistics of your plan unmanageable. Even if you want to do things differently, don't be so stuck on having your way now that everyone else loses interest. Share your thoughts with others and then listen carefully so you can integrate the best of their feedback.

You have a clear sense of what you stand for today, but communicating your beliefs could be challenging if you lose your objectivity. Your optimism can go so far that it inspires you to participate in a project or cause that might be better left alone. But don't push the issue now if others are resistant and don't want to go along for the ride. Your chances for success improve when you just allow the events to unfold as naturally as possible.

These are intense times, making it even more important to find healthy ways to express your feelings. Thankfully, you are in a spiritually uplifting phase, yet someone may still read your energy all wrong. If something you say or do elicits a negative response from others, rest assured that it's still smarter to share your emotions rather than to bury them. Those that truly know you will understand and appreciate your honesty.

You could soar right into an amazing experience today since you're picking up on an upbeat wave of energy from the Sun's square to lucky Jupiter. But remember, your key planet Jupiter is the magnifying lens of the cosmos, so it makes everything look bigger and better than it actually is in reality. Nevertheless, do what you do best and focus on the big picture because the general concepts are even more important now than the myriad of details. Don't sweat the small stuff until next week.

You need to be careful because you could go overboard with the power of your positive thinking today. Ironically, anxiety might arise from too much of a good thing as the illuminating Sun's square to jolly Jupiter lifts your spirits. Practicing a combination of flexibility and moderation brings you closer to your goals. Thankfully, you can make a lot of progress now if you channel your energy constructively and schedule your time wisely.

Your friends may appear to be more serious about a particular situation than you are today. Fortunately, you're likely aware of your current Pollyanna tendencies; nevertheless, you still have a lot of good things to say. There's no need to abandon your optimistic attitude, even if others are overly cautious. Remain positive as long as you can, but don't embellish the facts just to make your position more convincing. The truth is good enough on its own.

You might not want to harbor any secrets today, yet keeping quiet may be necessary to earn someone's trust. It would certainly be in bad taste if you reveal something private that was told to you in confidence. Fortunately, you have more options because there are so many other interesting topics to discuss. You'll feel good about your discretion once you fully accept the reasons for your current boundaries. There are some things that are just better left unsaid.

You are willing to take on new responsibilities today, even if you might be happier doing something else. Fortunately, you can manage a few days of hard work by holding on to a memory of a recent experience that made you feel good. Although you aren't likely to live in the past, replaying recollections of previous pleasures eases your current frustrations and allows you to be more productive in the process.

It's one thing to raise issues from the past when they pertain to a current situation, but it's quite different to obsess about something that just doesn't resonate in the present moment. If you can't get a painful memory out of your head, avoidance and suppression will only strengthen it. However, it's not wise to arbitrarily share your story with just anyone. Choose someone you trust before you open your heart and release your fears.

You might feel as if someone is attempting to sell you a piece of imaginary blue sky today as he or she puts an optimistic spin on a complex situation. Accept what you are told at face value without necessarily committing to further involvement on your part. Recognizing your limitations is important, but acting on what's in your heart is crucial for your growth. Trusting your instincts will lead you in the right direction.

You may have a breakthrough idea about a project at work now, but self-doubt prevents you from telling anyone what you are thinking. Perhaps you recall a different time when you took on more than you could handle. Nevertheless, your current anxiety might be unfounded. Sharing your thoughts is easier if you are honest about your strengths and weaknesses. Ask for help up front instead of promising more than you can possibly deliver. Sometimes an objective opinion is all you need to set your plans back on track.

Someone you trust may inadvertently hurt your feelings today by bringing up a relationship issue that you thought was ancient history. Don't take it personally even if it involves you because this is probably more about the other person's residual feelings than your reaction. Choosing to travel the emotional high road is essential or you might become mired in the past instead of happily moving into the future.

Since you are usually very conscientious when making commitments, it's surprising to others if you agree to something today and then turn around and rescind your promise. Your cooperation initially stems from your eagerness to please those you respect. But once you know the entire situation, you might want to repair your error in judgment. Remember, we all make mistakes; the quicker you can set it right, the better it will be for all involved.

You are often the one who graciously hides your emotions to make everyone else feel better about an unchangeable set of circumstances. However, your patience may run thin as you react impulsively now, without giving yourself enough time to monitor the tone of your words or consider the impact of your behavior. Don't be too hard on yourself if you upset someone in the process. Taking care of your own needs is more critical today than keeping the peace.

You are tempted to sidestep a financial issue today, but it's much wiser to deal with the situation before it gets any worse. It may be as simple as paying a bill that is overdue or untangling an accounting problem. Whatever it is, don't allow your resistance to an unpleasant money matter stand in the way of handling business while it's still easily manageable. A stitch in time saves nine.

Your perceptions are quite accurate today and your vision is strong enough to believe that what you see is the truth. Uncharacteristically, you can easily pick up on the emotions of others and this heightened empathy encourages you to share your revelations with them. Your openness is admirable, but don't assume that you know what is best for another person. Your way of handling adversity may work well for you, but it's not necessarily the path to happiness for everyone else. Be a supportive friend without telling anyone what to do.

Your creative genius can take over today by showing you multiple solutions to a current problem. Unfortunately, you might not be able to discern which one is the best course of action. Although you may want to go with the very first idea that comes to mind, this isn't necessarily your most effective move. Take your time and methodically follow each option through to its logical conclusion before making your final decision.

Your chances for success are strengthened by today's intelligent Aquarius Moon. But even if you know how to fix a difficult situation, moving slowly and deliberately still works to your advantage now. A hurried plan reveals your weaknesses while a cool and calm approach helps you gain the power you need to make your plans happen. Additionally, this thoughtful strategy allows others to connect with you in more meaningful ways.

Acting in a self-assured manner today throws others off course so your insecurities aren't apparent. Ironically, a veneer of confidence might get in your way because expressing your self-doubt now shows your strength of character. Don't shy away from speaking the truth. Ultimately, your position is stronger if you are completely honest about your feelings. Being your authentic self earns you the respect and admiration you deserve.

You're wary of trusting your feelings now, since a rational approach to life makes the most sense. You might even try to rebel against what you already know in your heart. It's not that you don't want a more emotionally charged life, it's just that you aren't interested in giving up on your dream of stability. Nevertheless, you won't be able to deny your desires, so stop trying to justify your inaction because you're afraid of losing control. Indulge your heart without going too far.

You might be quite confident now as you gain momentum on a project that was recently set aside. Perhaps each moment has you dreaming about making your life more pleasant. However, caution is advised, since you could push hard only to find that you're reaching for the wrong star. But if you take a deep breath and pay careful attention to what you're feeling in your gut, you could actually catch a glimpse of your new direction.

Something shifts energetically today and suddenly you just know what you need to do. Unfortunately, your moment of awareness doesn't necessarily translate into sustainable action. Although you may be back at work or school now, you might not feel very motivated. Try to avoid becoming too indifferent about what you want, for it is your passion that will ultimately bring you closer to your dreams.

Anticipating a change of direction means that you must also shift the focus of your thoughts. You might think that you're ready for new adventures, but you could also inadvertently push them away out of fear. It feels as if your entire life is moving too fast now, and that the pace is just beyond your control. You won't be able to keep up with everything if you continue to hold onto the past. Fortunately, it's much easier to handle the current intensity once you let go and embrace the future.

Your emotions grow more extreme throughout the day and there appears to be no way to escape the looming storm. Thankfully, you won't be scared off by a little relationship drama if it helps you to recall something very important from your forgotten past. Remembering an old story can boost your current motivation and inspire you to make an overdue change. There's no time like the present to take charge of your life.

You are rejuvenated by a fresh surge of energy that washes through your life today. Unfortunately, it can be quite a challenge to figure out which way to turn. Seeking counsel from your friends or associates may not help you make a decision because your agenda is so different from theirs. Nevertheless, someone else's perspective still gives you a different way to look at the same old thing. At least, another point of view provides an objective frame of reference.

You don't want everyone to notice you today, yet, paradoxically, you may be thinking about what you want to share with others. Unexpressed fear isn't the only thing holding you back now. You also need to establish a daily routine so that doing your chores or homework won't stand between you and your greater aspirations. Even if you are unsure of your destination, practice trusting your intuition. Your inner voice won't let you down.

Being your same-old reliable self today is challenging if your daydreams distract you from what you must do. It's not that you're incapable of hard work; it's just that you might have lost your edge as your motivation dwindled. It's wise to push yourself now by getting others involved in your cause. Setting up a few appointments or meetings makes it harder for you to procrastinate. Once you're finished with your tasks, give yourself permission to spend some time with your dreams.

You might not be ready to return to work today. If you're feeling restless, you may even want to hightail it out of the office and take some time off. Although you have a lot on your plate now, you could talk yourself into believing that your co-workers can, somehow, get the job done without you. Unfortunately, nothing much is accomplished without your effort and expertise, so find a healthy balance between productivity and relaxation to make everyone happy.

You don't want to sit still today because you're jumping up and down with an excitement that just won't settle down. You might be tempted to hide your enthusiasm because you're not interested in destabilizing your life. But your aversion to risky behavior that shows your vulnerability can actually block your intent to get closer to someone you admire now. Take advantage of your energetic buzz and let your guard down.

Settling back into an old relationship dynamic might seem like a great idea today. However, it's still wiser to try to push through the resistance and make the necessary changes in your plans for the future. You could try to justify your overall safe approach to life right now, but tense aspects won't likely let you get away with taking the easy way out. Make up your mind to move forward and then get busy creating the future you want.

You want everyone to know how you are feeling today because you think that being transparent will make you less lonely. Ironically, you may be scared to reveal too much about yourself. However, the Moon's visit to your sign draws your emotions up toward the surface where you can't help but wear them on your sleeve. The choice is yours; you could make someone else unhappy with your sad song or you could make it better by changing your tune.

No matter how scattered you feel today, it's time to ground yourself in your daily routine. Your key planet Mars, now in earthy Virgo, encourages you to pay attention to the details of your own life; however, this tricky transit can also be rather annoying. Although you are more apt to initiate action first and work out a plan as you go along, it's helpful to move in a methodical manner in order to lessen your frustration and increase your productivity.

Over the next several weeks you have an opportunity to express yourself in more creative ways, but there is a catch. You must treat your playful expressions as if they were part of your daily routine. This doesn't mean you can drop your responsibilities to go off and make music or write poetry. Instead, just set aside a little time every day to focus on more artistic endeavors. What begins as a distraction gradually gains in importance over the days ahead.

You're usually open to receiving input wherever it comes from. However, you must be selective now that Mars in Virgo tells you to utilize only the most reliable data. Be careful about what you say and be sure to reference your sources if you are quoting someone else. And, most importantly, consider the overall usefulness of whatever you intend to do -- before doing it.

Surround yourself with your best friends and don't be afraid to lose yourself into the spontaneous activities of the day. And although you must still be discreet about what you say, it's probably better to share what you're feeling today than keeping it bottled up any longer. It will actually feel good to be a part of any communication process when you are in the company of people you can trust.

This is a time for you Lions to do things in a very basic and practical manner. It's essential to focus on building your own self-worth, both financially and psychologically. However, your fires of inspiration may be dying down today as Mars leaves lively Leo to enter efficient Virgo. It's not the end of the road, but rather a transition into a time when considered actions have more impact than the obvious and noisy ones.

Your energy level skyrockets now, giving you more oomph, zest and pizzazz in everything you do. Your adrenaline shoots through your system as Mars rushes into your sign for a seven-week visit. But because you are burning somewhat hotter than usual, you could come across as more aggressive than others expect. If you aren't watchful, this can lead to petty ego disputes or conflicts. Focus on putting the power of Mars to work toward accomplishing your goals.

Your energy may be hidden from others, but it runs deep over these next few weeks and this can present some problems. You might not be able to express your anger directly, so others can't tell what's really going on for you. You tend to avoid direct confrontations more than usual now; you could even feel like going on a retreat. Don't let your ego run the show, for your happiness doesn't depend upon recognition. Do the hard work behind the scenes and get ready for what comes next.

You receive much-needed support from your friends now, allowing you to focus your attention on what is important rather than being distracted by the noise of circumstances. Don't take your eyes off your goals, for your long-term success depends upon consistent concentration at this time. Keep moving in the same direction, for even if it seems as if you're not gaining ground, you really are.

You might feel like your ambitious plans are being thwarted as aggressive Mars begins his seven-week tour of duty in detail-oriented Virgo. However, don't take any setback too personally. This transit is less about you than it is about the conflict between expansive Sagittarius and concentrated Virgo -- the classic "big" versus "little" dilemma. Your frustration may rise, but if you can hold back your horses while attending to the details, success will be yours.

You're entering into a highly focused phase when your ability to diligently apply yourself at work is at its peak. Even if you don't have one specific task you must finish, you're now able to get more things done. The danger is that you can become so enamored with your work that you lose track of the lighter side of your life. Set aside time for plain old fun; you'll actually accomplish more if you do.

This is an intense period as you delve into the mysteries of your emotions. These might not be familiar energies to you and you may resist the journey if other people's agendas conflict with yours. There really isn't much you can do about these annoyances except to keep them in your awareness. Your discomfort will likely pass without ill effect, unless you make it into something bigger than necessary. Don't push these experiences away, the treasures you encounter now make your life richer.

You have more reason than ever to sort out your relationship tangles. It's easier to cooperate with others now, especially if you are working toward a common goal. But don't try to do it alone, even if there is an interpersonal conflict brewing. If you do find yourself in a disagreement today, make sure it isn't just a silly misunderstanding. Working out the surface differences enables you to meet on common ground.

You're quite determined to fulfill your heart's desire, but you may be thwarted each time you make a move toward your goal. Fortunately, you are not so quick to give in to negativity now. Pick yourself up as often as necessary and start all over again. Your persistence will play out in your favor today if you have everyone's best interests in mind.

Your friends and coworkers might witness your stubborn side today, even if you aren't expressing the real power of your desires. Perhaps you believe that what you really want is so far outside the range of acceptability that you refrain from telling them anything at all. Unfortunately, your discretion can make you feel disconnected from others. It's not an all-or-nothing matter. Taking small risks will be rewarded if you're willing to be patient.

You are feeling a bit scattered as you jump into your chores with a whole new way of looking at them today. You're not satisfied by just doing the same old thing in the same old way. Innovation is your game, but too much originality now might send you back to the drawing board. Try transforming your unconventional approach into a slightly more conservative one for the best results.

Although you may be drawn out of your self-protective shell today, you still could have mixed feelings about it. You are eager to engage with others as you share your deepest feelings, yet simultaneously wish you had more privacy. Even if you find it difficult to let go of your fear of being judged, this is a great opportunity to stretch outside of your comfort zone. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

You might be feeling even more reclusive than others realize today. Everyone else thinks you are fully engaged, but you are actually keeping your most passionate emotions hidden. There is no need to satisfy anyone else's expectations of you now. Be true to yourself and take whatever personal time you need. Sometimes you just have to work things out on your own.

It's tricky to keep your emotions in check today. Logically, you know what to do, but something motivates you to take a different course of action that brings you dangerously close to the edge of rebellion. Don't waste too much energy doubting yourself now. Instead, speak up and surprise someone by asking for something you really want, even if it's out of character for you. Be brave and let the words fall out.

A simple relationship issue is intensified today when someone lays his or her values on the line and then impatiently waits for your response. However, you are of mixed emotions now; although your key planet Venus is activating non-conformist Uranus, you're still feeling some self-restraint. Your indecision may be insurmountable, so it might be wise to let the other person decide for you both. Choosing compromise over conflict is often your best instinct.

Someone might be pushing you into a situation against your will and you don't like it one tiny bit. Events are unfolding too quickly and you resent being coerced. Although you seem willing to go along with the plan today, you may be cooking up your own resistance so you can plant your feet when the time is right. Don't react too quickly, for your position will only increase in strength if you delay your response a little while longer.

It may feel like a playday today, but behind the excitement lurks a more serious tone. Nevertheless, delicious Venus in your fun-loving sign is zapped by electrical Uranus, drawing your attention away from work and toward social pleasures. But you're also quite aware that you have obligations that need to be taken care of before you go out and enjoy yourself. Normally, you are the one who tells others to lighten up and have fun, but now you should remind yourself.

You might be caught between two opposing ways of responding to your current circumstances. On one hand, you want to reward yourself for your hard work. There are treats already waiting for you and it would be very easy to take advantage of what's being offered. On the other hand, you may not be able to forget about your responsibilities, even if you have completed your chores. Indulge yourself for a change; you can always tie up any loose ends tomorrow.

Nearly everyone will find you more sociable and charming today, and you can use this secret weapon to move closer to your goals. Your key planet Uranus electrifies sweet Venus, putting a high-frequency buzz into the atmosphere. Unfortunately, someone might try to prevent you from having the fun you know you deserve. Acknowledge the resistance you perceive from others and take their feelings into consideration before charging ahead with your unconventional activities. The pleasure may still be well worth the consequences.

Take a leap of faith today and risk exposing your dreams to the outer world; your timing couldn't be better. But don't give up if you also receive a strong reality check in the process. Keep in mind that some of your fantasies may be better left unrealized. Nevertheless, others are unusually receptive to your ideas now, so move forward with your plans while you can. Step out of your imagination and into your future.

It could feel as if your whole life is renewing itself and you are quite eager to embrace the future. Your enthusiasm may get you started on your path but, unfortunately, it won't be enough to ensure that you reach your destination. But dreaming about it is just the first step; you need to walk your talk to make things happen. Add a dose of determination, though, and you just might accomplish the goals you are now setting.

Someone may ask more of you than you can give today, which tempts you to go into hiding to avoid confrontation. It's crucial, though, to meet the current challenges head on without ignoring the role your consistency plays in keeping everyone else on track. The good news is that you don't have to carry the whole burden upon your shoulders. Others are more than happy to pitch in and help when you need it.

You're more productive today if you can be part of a group, rather than having to work by yourself. Paradoxically, you may also feel relief when you are finally alone. Acknowledge the conflict between your need to connect with others and the more subtle benefits you receive from solitude. Don't choose one over the other; allocate time for both.

Your tendency to care for others may stand in the way of your own personal ambitions today. Paying close attention to what each person requires at work could clear a path for you to become a star, even if you merely play a supporting role. Don't be concerned about temporarily losing sight of your own goals; they will still be there when you finish with your current obligations. Your willingness to nurture others casts you in a favorable light.

Keeping your mind focused on your immediate tasks is a challenge today, especially if you are very busy. Your confidence continues to grow and your daydreams might even be work-related. Unfortunately, they won't likely make you any more efficient on the job. Still, as you contemplate how to escape current responsibilities, remember that your increased effort now should provide you with greater freedom later on.

You like the idea of doing something different at work today or even enrolling in a whole new course of study. You might want to consider a field that allows you to discover hidden mysteries or explore uncharted relationship dynamics. Don't worry about applying your current interest to your career. This is more about personal growth and the immediate connection to your job may not be apparent at this time. Follow your bliss and see where it leads.

Everyone seems to stir up too much unneeded excitement in your life now by offering you one too many points of view. Although this information may not support your old perspective, you are eager to see where it takes you. A bit of common sense goes a long way today. Don't change your mind too quickly; instead allow the transition to unfold at its own pace.

You bring a renewed vigor to your job and are anticipating what you can tackle at work today. You feel refreshed, as if your emotional batteries have been recharged. But don't let your enthusiasm run off with all your good intentions. Be careful, for apologies might not be enough to undo a broken promise if you overcommit your time. Make the most of your momentum while you have the chance to gain real progress.

Although it's a work day for many, you are already dreaming about the weekend. Unfortunately, you probably have too much to do, even before adding recreational activities to your hectic calendar. In this same situation others might decline a social engagement, but not you. Somehow you think you'll find the time and energy to fit it all in. Stop and get some much-needed rest; remember it's not healthy to burn the candle at both ends.

Consider your ideas twice before you just blurt out what you're thinking since impulsive expressions complicate nearly any situation today. You may not actually mean what you say; it's just your way of blowing off pent-up feelings. But someone could interpret your words more seriously than you intend. If it's really important, you might be better off waiting a few days until you've taken time to solidify your position and develop your plan.

A heightened pace of activities, along with the many distractions and disruptions that come your way, doesn't make your life any easier to manage today. You needn't be afraid of taking a stand and establishing territorial limits. Normally, you might prefer to go along with the changes throughout the day, but now you gain more by remaining grounded and focused. Establish clear priorities and keep calm no matter what happens.

Your life could settle down enough now to get your personal responsibilities under control. Perhaps you've been remiss in meeting your obligations, but today you are driven by more practical concerns. Forget the idle fantasies and sentimental journeys. Taking direct action -- not dreaming about it -- will bring you face to face with the happiness you seek.

You're looking forward to the weekend, even if you have to handle complicated relationship dynamics. The Aries Full Moon eclipse stirs emotional change, but it also instills you with a sense of quiet power. Find peace by setting a sustainable pace that gives you time to improvise. Thankfully, you don't need to stand on your desk and shout; others can tell that you are on to something big. Just remember to keep the energy moving forward no matter what happens.

Hidden feelings are brought to the surface today and can trigger an uneasy response when they are released. You may actually breathe a sigh of relief that others hear as the energy of the excitable Aries Full Moon eclipse shakes up your 12th House of Privacy. If they ask you what's going on, go ahead and tell them. But don't waste too many words, as you have more important things to do now than justifying your emotions.

Rather weird events involving your friends seem to be veering out of control today. Actually, your calendar may be the furthest thing from your mind with the spontaneous Aries Full Moon eclipse occurring in your 11th House of Social Networking. It's not that you're in denial; it's just that you're missing the clues that indicate there's more going on than meets the eye. You could be having too much fun playing the role of a diplomat. Ultimately, it's better to attend to your own business now than attempting to make things easier for someone else.

A temporary crisis at work may alter your plans for the weekend. But don't let big changes stop you from scheduling some fun with your friends or associates. However, circumstances might require you to set firm boundaries. Take care of your own needs for fellowship and make time to hang out with like-minded people. Don't be overly concerned about whether you can afford the time or the expense to treat yourself nicely. You are certainly worth it.

Normally, you act out your feelings, but it may be better to talk things out now before swinging into action. But don't get lost in the details; the Aries Full Moon eclipse activates your 9th House of Big Ideas. Be bold in your thinking; leave no stone unturned when considering your current options. There's no reason to hold back; stretch your mind and reach for new horizons. Today's dreams can become tomorrow's reality.

You may be high on life today, but your current confidence about your future is tempered by concerns about the past. You are being drawn into deeper emotional realms, which often makes you uncomfortable. However, you might actually be enthusiastic about exploring the shadows of your own subconscious now since the Aries Full Moon eclipse energizes your 8th House of Intimacy. The passions that rise to the surface will settle back down once you understand how they fit into the larger picture.

Relationship issues that you are avoiding come crashing out of the closet now. And although everything doesn't necessarily go your way, you can sense that you've made it through the thick of it by the end of the day. Today's Aries Full Moon eclipse falls in your 7th House of Companions, so stay with your emotional process even if you run into resistance from someone else. Don't retreat if communication is challenging; establishing common ground is possible if you are patient and persistent.

You refuse to be bored today as you navigate your way through your demanding schedule. Although today's Aries Full Moon eclipse rattles your 6th House of Routine, try to get in some rest and relaxation since next week may even be busier than last week. Don't be afraid to redefine your boundaries and set new expectations based upon the unfolding events and how they impact your work.

Your enthusiastic intentions are magnified by the Aries Full Moon eclipse that shines in your 5th House of Spontaneity today. Although you are looking toward the future with great anticipation, you're also grateful to be living in the moment. However, you might be feeling more emotional than usual and may want to address these issues with a close friend or lover. Charm is on your side; just remember to use it wisely.

You may be experiencing unsettling flashes of uncertainty now, but this intense emotional weather might be exactly what you need in this moment. Your reactions are swift and self-protective as the impulsive Aries Full Moon eclipse lands in your 4th House of Inner Security. Meanwhile, others are depending on you in the workplace, and this motivates you to take on even more responsibility. Surprisingly, you become more determined throughout the day to stir up issues that can create positive change.

Tension develops on the home front as you feel real pressure to come through with your end of the deal. Perhaps you promised too much, but you'll probably be able to get away with pulling back a little at work while you take care of personal matters. Today's Aries Full Moon eclipse creates static in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, but don't make the mistake of withdrawing from communication with others now; staying present is more than half the battle.

Your current priority is to plant your feet more firmly on the ground and claim your authenticity. Take advantage of today's powerful Aries Full Moon eclipse in your 2nd House of Values by letting others know what really matters most to you these days. Concentrate on clarifying your core beliefs instead of compromising to keep the peace. Say exactly what's on your mind now and everyone will respect your position and appreciate your honesty.

Your key planet Mars tempts you to turn on the lights, crank up the volume on your music and make noise as if to scare off your enemies. However, making unreasonable demands isn't helpful because you would rather avoid confrontation at all costs today. Unfortunately, whatever action you take won't likely end up as successful as you think. You may have better luck just chilling out and spending the day indulging your romantic fantasies, instead.

You have an abundance of emotional energy to express now, but your approach is softened and confused by your interactions with others. This ambiguity isn't necessarily a problem, for it could take the hard edges off your day. Be careful about over-indulging in anything today, including alcohol, which can alter your perception of what's real. It may be a great way to relax for some, but don't use it as an excuse to avoid reality. Taking time to process your feelings gives you the chance to listen to your heart.

If you can harness the powerful planetary energy available today, you could tap into creative levels that are normally out of reach. Your vision inspires you to soar to great heights. However, the cloud layer might be so thick that even as you fly through your dreams, you may not be able to see very far. But it's not a good idea to clear away the clouds of illusion now just to make your way through the fog. Instead, just use your colorful imagination to create your world as you wish it to be.

You may be reassessing issues regarding your own self-worth today and might wonder what you actually have to bring to the table. Do you believe your life is as fulfilling as it could be? Are you clear about your core values? These questions linger on your mind now, especially if you think your coworkers or friends don't know the real you. In any case, start the ball rolling by sharing your concerns; your current openness helps others to better appreciate your valuable contributions.

Attempting to create the same magic that often comes to you on its own may be a tricky proposition today. You like being the center of attention and there is enough energy cooking in your life now that you can put on quite a show. But something isn't clear, and it makes you wonder if you are playing the right character or if you are even on an appropriate stage. Be patient, for this phase of self-doubt only lasts a day or two. Ultimately, the rest of the script writes itself, enabling you to be the hero in the end.

Mastering the gift of compassion isn't always easy, but now it's what the cosmic doctor is prescribing. However, it's odd because you uncharacteristically want to make a really big deal about everything today. You just want everyone to hear your side of the story. At the same time, remain open to that part of you that doesn't want anyone to know anything. Forgiveness, after all, is a private matter just between the parties involved.

Sweet romance is out there somewhere and you can feel it in the air. You might even want to believe that it's just around the next corner. Whether or not you are currently in a relationship, romance may seem a bit elusive these days -- especially if you are attempting to capture it and put it in a jar. Rather than trying to make something real, just enjoy the fantasy of love for a couple of days and see where the journey takes you.

Your mind is currently on your work, even if you're not at the office. You are likely thinking of what you need to do to better your position in the outer world. And although you would rather be with your family or friends today, don't miss an opportunity to foster community spirit by participating with a group of like-minded individuals. Nothing specific needs to happen now as long as you use creative visualization to conjure up more possibilities for your future.

Your long-awaited adventure may be about to begin, but something is lurking beneath the surface. You are aware of the complications that your vivid imagination brings. Nothing is quite as simple as it seems. Nevertheless, dream large dreams in brilliant colors. Share your fantasies with someone you trust, for they can set the stage for your next journey.

Sometimes it's difficult for you ambitious Mountain Goats to completely let go of your responsibilities. But now you benefit most by getting involved in an activity for the sake of learning without worrying about being practical. Rather than checking off tasks on your list, try doing something just for the fun of it. Watch a movie or go play at the beach. Engage in discussions about the hidden meaning of the universe and explore any topic that resonates with you. There will be plenty of time for more productive efforts again tomorrow.

You might believe that you are being quite clear in your communications now, but people just don't perceive you the same way that you are seeing yourself. It's likely that there is a slight disconnect between you and everyone else today. However, it works both ways, for you can also misunderstand others. This may not be a great day to work on a concrete plan of action, but it could be an amazing day to share your dreams. Let go of the details and fantasize about the possibilities. Clarity will return soon enough.

Keeping your fantasies separate from the facts is nearly impossible today. Actually, it may be rather discouraging if you try to break out of your illusions now. You might even feel as if your dreams are more important than the dreary world around you. Communing with nature and connecting with your spiritual side brings out the best in you. In just a few days, you'll receive landing clearance to arrive safely back on planet Earth.

You may resist any form of constraint today, but practicing self-discipline is a very effective strategy, even in small doses. It's not that you are out of control; it's just that you might agree to deliver more than you can handle now. Unfortunately, you could ruin a good thing if you accept too much responsibility without setting clearly defined boundaries. At least, think twice before saying yes.

Trying to simultaneously juggle too many chores might impress someone at first, but everything changes if you can't complete what you start. Effectively breaking down a large task into manageable components enables you to concentrate on each one separately. Although a major project may be overwhelming, you can accomplish more than you expect if you just take it one piece at a time. Inch by inch it's a cinch; yard by yard it's hard.

Your playful approach to serious issues can be too much for someone else to handle today. A friend or partner might even complain that you aren't working hard enough to hold up your end of the bargain. Nevertheless, you believe that you're actually doing more than your fair share. If anyone comments on your lack of productivity, shrug it off. Don't let a battle of dueling egos take over your day. Put forth your very best effort and your actions will speak for themselves.

You could be so blunt with your opinions today that you accidentally hurt someone's feelings. You're a bundle of extremes now as you push out beyond the old limits. You imagine a variety of possibilities where others only see obstacles. You can explain exactly where they have gone off track, but being critical of everyone else won't help anything at all. Sharpening your skills and improving your productivity enable you to lead by example, instead.

You might take the idea of being busy to a whole new level today, but secretly you would rather be relaxing. You want to have fun but you intuitively realize that the current temptations are acting as one big test of your willpower. It's not wise to just give in to your irresponsible inner child now; you will feel better about yourself when you behave like a grown-up, instead. Whistling while you work inspires everyone around you to do the same.

Regaining control of your finances and getting a handle on your spending might be tricky business today. There's no need for impulsive behavior, especially if you are considering the purchase of a luxury item in order to add more beauty to your life. Unfortunately, buying something special may still leave you feeling emotionally empty now. Look beyond the material world to discover the fulfillment you seek. The most precious things in life are free.

Taking pride in your appearance comes as second nature to you and you like to look your best, no matter what you are doing. However, you could push vanity too far now as the radiant Sun in your 1st House of Personality aligns with unrelenting Pluto. You can inadvertently set up a power struggle if you don't rein in your ambitions early on. It's better to show support for your team today than to run out ahead of the pack.

It doesn't matter much if your dreams are unrealistic; you're not ready to give up on them just yet. Paradoxically, you're quite optimistic about your future even if your progress has been delayed. You believe that your logic is clear, but it's challenging to be productive now if your perspective is warped. If you ask your closest supporters for advice, make sure that you actually listen to what they say. A simple reality check may be all that you need to get back on track.

Speculating about money and power is likely to be high on your agenda today. You might have an opportunity in front of you that's hard to resist. Someone may offer to give you something for nothing, but rest assured that same person will return to collect on a debt or promise.
