If you don't inflate your expectations now, you won't have to deal with any disappointments later. Follow your intuition but keep your common sense close at hand.

You can feel your emotional intensity building up again, but today you are unsure whether to trust your instincts or your logic. Unfortunately, you may still be smarting from a recent run-in with an authority figure, yet you have enough new ideas now to turn a previous setback to your advantage. Don't worry about winning or losing; honoring your intentions and doing your absolute best is good enough.

You want to examine both sides of a complicated issue now, but this mental exercise won't bring you any closer to a solution. Fortunately, finding a lasting compromise isn't nearly as important today as you believe. Just drawing everyone's hidden agendas out into the open is enough mischief for one day since it clears the air of any residual tension. Turn on the light of awareness and let nature take its course.

Believing in yourself brings untold benefits because you realize you can't always count on others to support you and your work. It might surprise you today if an associate takes the time  to help you without expecting anything in return. Let down your guard; this isn't the moment to prove how independent you are. Instead of feigning self-sufficiency and pushing others away, accept their generosity with an open heart and a smile.

You're eager to blast off today, but the launch may be postponed due to circumstances beyond your control. Communication issues are emphasized when messenger Mercury begins its three-week retrograde phase. Conversations wander off track if you don't have all the details in place. Although you might be inclined to take a direct approach, it's helpful to allow time to assimilate your experiences before doing anything about them.

Problems may arise through a misunderstanding with a close friend or intimate partner today. Instead of just brushing conflict aside, it's best to uncover the source of the disagreement and talk about it while it's still fresh. Once you see where you went wrong, it will be easier to let it go and move on to something more positive. Extending an olive branch demonstrates your willingness to take the high road.

It makes sense today to stop running around from one distraction to another. You won't get much done if you keep going at this breakneck speed. Unfortunately, you may be required to go back and redo what you didn't do right the first time around. Paying attention to details now can prevent delays later on. Cultivate patience as a coping skill to help you adjust your pace. Slow and steady wins the race.

You're through with struggling to keep your feet on the ground today. Fantasy is overtaking reality, which, ultimately, might turn out surprisingly well. The key is to enjoy your mental meanderings without necessarily acting on your feelings. You could run into trouble if you treat a dream as if it were real. There's nothing wrong with using your imagination to entertain yourself as long as you remember your way back home.

You're motivated to get things out in the open, but you may be fighting an uphill battle as a family member or someone at home seems to be keeping secrets. Your lack of clarity could send you into a state of confusion, but you might not want others to know about your uncertainty. Thankfully, a vicious cycle of non-disclosure can be broken once you decide to openly share what's on your mind. Don't let pride get in the way of progress.

Be extra careful as you schedule your time today, since you can't afford to miss an appointment or get behind in your work. Still, your best intentions can fall short due to an uncharacteristic disregard to the details. Compensate for your current spacey behavior by writing everything down so you don't forget what you need to remember.

Although you might want to focus all your mental energy on a very practical issue now, it's rather unlikely that you can prevent your mind from wandering all over the map. You may be distracted by your creative desires or by a less productive romantic interest. Don't worry so much about what you accomplish today. Give yourself a gift; go ahead and entertain a playful diversion just for the fun of it.

You might feel as if you're enveloped in a self-protective bubble today that insulates you from other people's problems. But you're not as safe as you think now that trickster Mercury turns retrograde while visiting your sign, creating the illusion of suspended time. You may be unsure of choices as your moods swing wide and fast, making it difficult to take definitive action. Be gentle with yourself until things settle down and you know which way to go.

You are a study in cosmic contradiction today as you soar into the highest spiritual realms of your imagination. At the same time, however, you are pulled into the emotional shadows where you aren't as confident. Don't try to choose one path over the other. If you do, your reverie might suddenly come to an end and you'll be plunged back into the mundane world again. Oddly enough, you can be in both places at once if you keep both your mind and your heart open.

Your impatience with overly emotional friends and coworkers can stir up more trouble than it's worth today. You don't want to interact with those who might get in the way of your productivity, but avoidance may not be possible. Others are merely reflecting your own subconscious tendencies now. Let go of your goals for a while and let yourself drift. Funny enough, sinking into your dreams will help you accomplish more in the long run.

Instead of pushing forward on your career path, it might make more sense today to take a breather while you integrate your recent experiences. Taking time to regroup and consolidate during the next three weeks may be the best use of this Mercury retrograde phase. You will ultimately gain more ground if you have the wisdom now to relax and reassess your priorities.

Dreamlike images flood your consciousness today, challenging you to untangle your desires from the real world. But your key planet, surreal Neptune, can easily inspire a spiritual breakthrough now or confuse you with its lack of focus. Don't worry if the intuitive flashes are impossible to interpret; it may take a while to understand them. You'll receive great insight about where to go next in your life if you recognize that your colorful visions are direct messages from your subconscious mind.

You have obligations to meet, yet the faster you spin your wheels, the less you actually get done. However, self-awareness is now the key to change. Methodically slowing down your response to any emotional news is a good idea, even if you have an immediate visceral reaction. Don't put too much on your calendar today; keep some time squirreled away so you can contemplate your role in the web of life.

Anxiety rears its ugly head today as worrisome waves wash through your mind, especially if you are trying to untangle financial issues. Fortunately, your fears could be unwarranted if you schedule time to plan ahead. Seeking a practical solution should alleviate pressures about love or money before your little problem turns into something much worse. A stitch in time saves nine.

Being conscious of the Moon traveling through your sign enables you to stay in touch with your feelings. However, peace of mind is not dependent on expressing every whim and changing emotion. Exercising caution helps counteract the likelihood of reacting too quickly to a situation as it unfolds. Setting your mind on one specific goal enables you to accomplish more than you expect.

Your friends and associates may see you as cool and calm today, but unbeknownst to them your fantasies are running wild. In fact, your inner world could feel so intense now that you withdraw a bit from your interactions with others. Ironically, this is exactly why everyone thinks you are more serene than you really feel. Practice cultivating your interpersonal relationships while simultaneously enjoying your rich world of dreams.

You can land yourself in a heap of trouble today because your coworkers might not be as reliable as you think. It's not that they are purposefully misleading you; it's just that they may overextend their optimism and promise more than they can possibly deliver. If someone comes to your rescue now, gracefully accept the offer of support. However, it's not a good idea to put all your eggs in one basket or you might end up being sorely disappointed. Your secret back-up plan could be just the thing that saves the day.

There are so many intriguing possibilities pulling you in different directions that you could worry yourself silly trying to explore all of them. You might be tempted to throw in the towel and just acquiesce to everyone else's demands. Nevertheless, it's wiser to rethink what you can do as you respond to the changing circumstances. Laughter is the best medicine, so maintain your sense of humor throughout all the twists and turns of the day.

Making rigid plans can end up being a problem today because everything will likely change more than once. Don't bother setting your schedule in stone by trying to follow your agenda to the minute. Instead, be ready to respond to each and every situation as it develops. Thankfully, this spontaneous approach helps to stabilize your day and increase your overall productivity.

Weird weather is blowing into your life from hidden quarters, but everything could shift when the Sun enters your transformational sign tomorrow. Meanwhile, your day is a magnet for odd occurrences that elude logic. Nevertheless, a little trust at the right time can go a long way now, and you may be pleasantly surprised when you relax some of your boundaries. Don't be too concerned about the current instability; you don't have to do anything except practice flexibility and follow your instincts.

Everyone around you seems to be running in circles faster and faster, and all the chaos just makes you feel like going back to bed. The truth is that you are moving slower now, which makes other people impatient. Working on a team is fine -- if you can keep up with your associates. Unfortunately, the speed of your external world could be a reflection of your boredom. Instead of avoiding the noise of the day, embrace it as a shadow aspect of yourself.

You're feeling a lot of pressure as you reach an important deadline or the end of a project. It's time to establish more stability as a buffer against your desire for change. Unfortunately, you shouldn't attempt to force a resolution to a conflict or you'll only end up creating more frustration. Although you might want to experience something new today, step back and take a deep breath so you can appreciate the many blessings you already have in your life.

You are ready for fun and games now that the Moon is lighting up your 5th House of Play. Unfortunately, you still have work to finish first. Naturally, you can't force the week to end any sooner than it will; however, you don't need to postpone your enjoyment. Instead of reasoning that someone else will bring you more pleasure, focus on your current activities with a renewed sense of acceptance. Being present in the here and now is a conscious choice towards happiness.

You may feel as if you're being drawn in conflicting directions today, yet you still might believe that it's possible to simultaneously follow more than one path. But the weird truth is that all roads eventually lead you to the same destination now. Entertain as many possibilities as you can and then choose the course of least resistance. There are many ways to make your dreams come true.

You can't work in a vacuum all the time, independent of everyone in your life. You are tied to other people's activities and schedules more than you wish. There's a part of you that enjoys working alone, and, preferably, answering to no one. However, this solitude is not what the universe has in store for you today. Try to avoid others now and you won't be able to get your ideas off the ground. Engage in the dance willingly and you can touch the heavens.

Your attention is shifting toward the distant horizon, yet you may have something important to say about your current relationships. However, your message isn't likely light and easy. You have given your predicament significant thought and now you want to present your solution in a rational and balanced manner. Nevertheless, it helps to acknowledge your specific point of view so you can better understand how your desires color your logic. Seeing your own personal bias makes it possible to change your perspective.

An ongoing conversation with a close friend or coworker may grow so intense today that you want to just walk away from it. However, continuing an honest dialogue could lead to resolution as long as you don't get hung up in unimportant details. Instead of defending your position, assume a less aggressive posture that encourages the other person to speak. Taking the time to listen changes the dynamics of the discussion, making it easier to find common ground.

When issues get emotionally complicated, you are tempted to withdraw into your private world until you figure out how best to act. Sometimes you don't know how to reach your destination, so you wait until the tide of external events carries you along to the next place. Now is one of these times when it may be easier for you to slink quietly back to your cave and hope that no one sees you. But this self-imposed isolation isn't in your best interest. Pick out the most important feelings and share them with someone close to you to find your answers.

In order to make the best of the circumstances around you, you must respond to your current situation with rational sensibility. Avoiding unrealistic schemes now helps you remain on track. Keep it simple; and then be like the Rock of Gibraltar. Don't waver from your chosen path. Be open to modifications as suggested by others, but demonstrate your determination and stay focused on your goal.

You have more accessibility to your own emotions today, and this can help you in ways that may not be obvious to anyone else. What comes to the surface now isn't necessarily pretty, but you're not a contestant in a beauty contest. Thankfully, you begin to feel better once you reveal your feelings and reestablish a sense of balance. Surprisingly, expressing your darkest fears can open the door to a meaningful dialogue that benefits both parties.

You may be quite loquacious today, but you're not necessarily talking about the same things that interest others. Typically, you like to keep the chit-chat light, even when you're being serious. You seem less afraid to shake up the status quo now and confront others with issues that concern you. Just remember to approach the most difficult subjects with your typical grace and a compassionate heart. Staying present emotionally helps the conversation go somewhere special.

The potential for transformation is high and you stand to gain plenty from decisions you make at this time. You begin to look back over your previous year and think about the next one now that the Sun enters your sign, marking the beginning of your astrological birthday month. Don't let personal development fall to the wayside; the positive impact of therapy, yoga or other spiritual pursuits is greater now than ever. Living well is the best revenge.

Take a deep breath before diving into a potentially intense conversation. Even if you're riding a powerful wave of passion, it may be time to go with the flow instead of trying to control your feelings. Let go of your old assumptions; you don't need them anymore. There's no need to panic; you have plenty of time to soak up the magical wonders that can only be experienced when you swim in the sea of emotions.

Exploring your feelings in the context of a professional relationship requires your special brand of diplomacy. It's rapidly becoming apparent that more is going on than you previously imagined. Accordingly, it's crucial to make an extra effort to explain your preferences to your friends and associates. You stand to gain respect at work now, but you may have to go out of your way to prove that you are a valuable member of the team, rather than sitting on the sidelines watching the action.

You can sense a shift of the energy today into a deeper and more complex emotional space. You are beginning to understand that there may be another level to what you see and you are fascinated -- and also frightened -- by all the possibilities. Nevertheless, don't ignore a new piece of information that takes you by surprise just because you weren't prepared for it. Fate is finding a way to get your attention. You may be pleasantly surprised by what you learn once you stop resisting the unknown.

There is something magical and mysterious about this time of year for you Fish. You don't really mind the descent into the shadowy realms of consciousness as the Sun begins its month-long journey through the deep waters of Scorpio. You are searching for answers to some pretty serious questions about the meaning of life. Be patient; solutions to spiritual dilemmas take time to manifest.

There may be a lot of positive movement in your life and you're probably quite enthusiastic about what's happening. You appear to be forthcoming with your feelings, yet you're so smooth now that you might even fool yourself. Step back from the fun and games long enough to look beyond all the distractions. Once you get past the noise, you can reconnect with your emotions and speak directly from your heart.

Responsibility is calling your name, even if you're visiting an amusement park. You want to jump off the ride before it ends in order to get back to your obligations. Unfortunately, you may have to wait since the controls are out of reach -- so you might as well relax and just enjoy yourself. Being open to pleasure today is a challenge surely worth pursuing.

You can't help but be thrilled if someone tempts you with a wonderful invitation. However, you aren't sure if you can say yes now. Normally, you would have to pass on the fun if your previous commitments were not yet fulfilled. Luckily, the cosmos has given you the gift of gab, enabling you to talk your way around most obstacles and to pursue the adventure you seek. Proceed with caution because you may feel the stress later on if you don't deliver what you promised today.

Your ever-changing moods might make others impatient with you now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign. But you are in charge of your own destiny, and you can choose to keep your more serious feelings to yourself. This behavior is not dishonest; it simply creates a temporary boundary that allows you to work on your self-esteem. You don't have to share every thought with everyone. Wait until your emotions settle down and then disclose whatever seems right.

You aren't operating under any false illusions now, yet you may be even more optimistic than before. Part of your exuberance comes from the fact that you know what you are worth and can see the light at the end of the tunnel. Don't lose faith, even if it's been a long, hard haul. Your destination really could be within reach if you just keep believing in yourself.

A family member or close friend may come through for you now in a way that touches you deeply. You're more aware of what others say today, especially if they inspire you with their words. But even if it feels like you've taken a step backward, there's no need for major concern at this time. Although you still might need to practice patience for a while longer, your momentum is building and the rewards will follow.

It feels good to be needed at work and you are more than eager to go out of your way today to help others. This sense of camaraderie can be a wonderful opportunity to give even more than is expected, but be careful about committing to so much now that you can't deliver on your promises. Good intentions are not enough if you spread yourself too thin; true success comes from knowing your limits.

You want to maintain a positive attitude, but it's challenging to trust logic today if you're not in touch with your feelings. Speaking from your heart can be a tricky maneuver, but you are better off acknowledging your emotions at work, even if they are not directly connected with your performance. Don't try to make anyone else responsible for your reactions; just respond authentically and then move on.

Everything appears to be coming up roses today. Nevertheless, you can't seem to shake off a bad feeling about something that's just below your radar. You think you're missing an important piece of the puzzle but you don't know where to search for it yet. For now, consciously let go of your attachment to the mystery and simply enjoy yourself in the present moment.

Someone may ask for your help today, but there really is nothing you have to do other than listen. The greatest gift you can give another person is to accept him or her as is, without any further demands. Ultimately, your unconditional support could turn into a spiritual gift that returns to you as you learn something special about yourself. Although your altruistic intention is to be of assistance, surprisingly, you stand to benefit the most from the process.

Although relationship dynamics may be a bit confusing these days, a new wave of clarity is on the horizon. Instead of putting a relationship into a box by defining it with your specific goals, try being more open-minded in your approach. You can bring out the best in others now if you engage them without too many expectations. True love is an unchained melody.

You may be ready to put extra time into a romance during the days ahead. However, your creativity might also be channeled toward playing with children. Either way, your current tenderness leads you to be extra-protective of those closest to you. Remember, however, that fostering freedom can also be an empowering way to demonstrate your love. Balancing supervision with independence enables  you to nurture all of your relationships now.

Speaking with authority doesn't make your message true, but you might still try this ploy as a defensive strategy today. You may actually think you can talk someone into seeing the world through your eyes. But overpowering others by insisting you are right only makes you sound foolish, since your rationalizations are probably more transparent than you realize. Don't pretend to be in control when you're not. Those who know you love you simply for being yourself.

Your future looks bright today, but you may not be heading in exactly the right direction to realize your dreams. It's not your goals are unrealistic; rather, it's that you might underestimate the resources needed to reach your destination. Thankfully, you can see possibilities that others miss if you let your imagination wander. Just remember to separate fact from fancy or you could be rudely surprised by the outcome.

Your most vivid dreams are ripe for harvesting now, but don't let your confidence run away with the show. Although you may think that you can be successful without working harder, this false illusion will dissipate as circumstances continue to change. If an unrealistic fantasy fades as you approach it, it's probably best to let it go and move on to another idea. But don't give up; your imagination holds the keys to your success.

It may seem as if you can describe your hopeful feelings today, but it's still challenging to start a conversation about your future dreams. Instead of wasting energy by being self-critical now, keep your visions to yourself until you have a good reason to share them. It isn't useful to reveal your plans prematurely or you could create an awkward impasse. Be patient and remain quiet just a little bit longer. Trust your intuition to tell you when it's time to open up.

You may feel as if you're in an ideal social environment today because everyone seems to enthusiastically support your decisions. You don't even have to think about what to do next; you're part of the flow and everything seems to happen naturally. Unfortunately, your current spontaneity doesn't play well with your desire to establish deeper connections. Thankfully, you can have the best of both worlds by letting others participate in your success.

Relaxing is a challenge today because you're afraid of what may occur if you don't resist the prevailing emotional currents. You prefer rational behavior and like to be in control all of the time -- but unfortunately you're not. Therefore, your most logical strategy now is to avoid getting hooked by your own desires. Nevertheless, attempting to ignore your needs just gives power to whatever you fear most. Escape your regular routine by leading with your creative imagination rather than your analytical thoughts.

Beginning your daily tasks at work early in the day might sound like a smart idea, but nothing seems to go quite as planned. Your unflappable positive attitude is the most significant factor today in deciding whether or not you can put your schedule back on track. Don't be overly rigid in your thinking if you run into an obstacle; being flexible now actually enables you to regain control later on.

You might be willing to take the easy way out of a problem today. Typically, your determination inspires you to achieve your goals, even if your non-negotiable approach complicates your life. But keeping your dreams alive may be more important now than accomplishing anything specific. Although your current productivity could suffer, you're likely to be happier in the long run by following your heart's desire.

Your imagination is extremely vivid today, encouraging you to mix up your daydreams with reality. You might even believe that you can accomplish more than is possible because everything flows effortlessly in your mind. Unfortunately, each task you begin takes more time to complete than you expect. You may create trouble for yourself if you race through a chore, assuming you will make up for lost time. Instead, promise less and deliver more.

You can fool your workmates today by appearing to be busier than you actually are. However, if you want to be fully recognized for your contribution to a project, don't try so hard to steal the spotlight. If you take your little song and dance too far, you might inadvertently overstep your bounds. You are better off if you just work hard and then let the chips fall where they may. Ultimately, your efforts won't go unnoticed or unappreciated.

Your current lack of a concrete plan won't necessarily get in your way today. Ironically, making it up as you go might just be your key to success now. Expressing your creativity brings recognition, and can even lead to some extra income. However, you could feel as if you're wasting time managing unexpected interruptions, but it's wise to simply handle them as they occur. Paradoxically, the current distractions may even inspire you to reach greater heights.

It's tempting to shut out your problems by withdrawing into your imagination today. But escaping into your own personal fantasyland works best only for brief moments of time. Sooner or later you must return to the real world issues you tried to leave behind. Working on tangible solutions preemptively, rather than after the fact, is the most productive strategy now, even if you would prefer to take a less ambitious path.

You're all set to join in social activities today but it's wiser to think about your involvement in the wider context of your life. Curbing your enthusiasm helps you minimize complicated emotional entanglements, but you might not be able to avoid getting hooked if you see positive potential, even in a challenging situation. Although you may end up having more fun if you stay low key this weekend, don't judge yourself too harshly if you slip and act on your unrealistic optimism. Simply make the best of whatever happens.

Although you prefer sailing on smooth waters, you still might stir up a few waves today if your emotions clash with someone else's. You could be drawn into an irresolvable disagreement if you believe that your needs are more important than the desires of others. There is a very fine line now between maintaining your integrity and just being plain stubborn. It is fine to know what you want as long as you remember that you're not the only one with an agenda.

You might feel as if your family and friends are trying to make something look better than it is today. Although you don't want to be negative, you're afraid of glossing over the truth in your haste to join in the fun. However, others may grow annoyed with you if you decide to dig for more details. If you turn over every stone looking for trouble, you're sure to find it. There are no quick and easy answers to your questions. Just be as authentic as possible when making choices and allow others to do the same.

Some of the more obvious tensions in your emotional life have abated, but you still may be uncertain about the direction you have chosen. You're attempting to stay between the limits of too little and too much, but avoiding extremes is not as easy as you think. Don't be too hard on yourself if you can't yet find the peace of mind you seek. Clarity will be within reach once you stop trying so hard.

Acknowledging your emotions enables you to add your perspective to the ongoing discussion today. But you Lions can be as bullheaded as your Taurus cousins, and your stubbornness could make everyone's life nearly unbearable now if you let it. It's not important that you actually change your mind; what's crucial is that you remain open to new information. Don't be the one who is responsible for all the trouble just because you wouldn't take the time to listen.

An unresolved relationship issue is on your mind now that you're trying to put your life into perspective. You have earned the right to feel good about your personal connections, but now you may be facing another annoyance as you try to find a balance between what you want and what you are willing to pay for it. Thankfully, no decision is required just yet. If you can live with this dilemma now, the uneasiness should dissipate over the next few days.

It seems as if everything you do now is either totally amazing or simply not good enough. It's like someone has placed a distortion filter on the volume control of your senses. Even if you know what you want, others may tell you that you shouldn't be asking for so much. Meanwhile, you don't think your expectations are out of line. Hang in there; there's nothing that needs to be resolved today. Things will begin to settle down as early as tomorrow if you let them.

You may feel stuck as you struggle to separate your personal emotional life from the frustration and pain of the world. The important lesson buried here is simple: it doesn't always have to be an all-or-nothing proposition. You have the power to create moveable boundaries. Even if you stay current with the news and discuss the events with those close to you, you still can receive great pleasure from your personal interactions. Think globally; enjoy locally.

Even if you describe a general concept today with great passion, it's not as easy to drill down to the key details. Opinionated Jupiter tricks you into believing that you can separate useful ideas from unrealistic fantasies. Your ability to justify your desires now makes it challenging to know your limits. Of course, there is no harm in having a fund as long as you don't set responsibilities aside in search of sensory fulfillment. Remember to employ moderation as you establish priorities for the rest of the weekend.

You are in touch with the most practical issues in your life, even though circumstances seem to be pushing you toward blatant overexpansion. You're easily captivated by someone today, but other people's irresistible charm leads to trouble if you're not careful. Listen to what your emotions are telling you, but for now, follow your logic instead of your heart. Trust your sensible inner voice, for you really do know what's best.

You're weary of struggling to transform your most ingenious ideas into concrete form. Nevertheless, it's difficult to ignore your thoughts even if they seem to be over the top. Setting your goals too high ensures frustration and could prompt you to give up prematurely. However, you might not push yourself to accomplish something extraordinary if you don't aim high enough. Finding that sweet spot in the middle is worth your persistence because your efforts won't go unrewarded.

You may feel as though a thick fog is obscuring your goals today and you're drifting without a map to guide you. Additionally, the emotional landscape continues to change as you explore your need for pleasure. Unfortunately, you don't seem to be able to get exactly what you want yet. Although you are growing more aware of your desires, it's apparent that there's no quick route to satisfaction. Fortunately, living in the present moment, at least, allows you to appreciate what you have now.

It's easier to just say what's on your mind than to keep your feelings to yourself today. You might even claim that you have considered the impact of your words before you open your mouth. But the truth is that you really have no idea what will come out until you actually hear it along with everyone else. It's great to make your point, but putting on a show to get attention now won't likely bring the results you want.

Although you hope to take full advantage of the weekend, you don't want to expend too much energy just to have some fun. You realize how much work is in front of you next week and, fortunately, have the common sense now to reserve some of your strength for when you need it later. Enjoying some time in the company of others can still be rejuvenating if you keep your activities low key and close to home.

Don't worry about making plans today; just enjoy yourself moment to moment now that the lively Leo Moon is spicing up your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. But don't get too wild and crazy or you could regret your actions pretty quickly. Keep in mind that cleaning up an emotional mess won't be nearly as much fun as making it. Thankfully, you can still have a superb time while acting in a more mature manner by simply toning your energy down a notch.

You are tempted to spend more money today than you budgeted, especially if you're responsible for entertaining others. Naturally, you want to make a good impression on everyone with delicious food and drink, but your friends may be less concerned with the details than you are now. Your extravagance can bring its own punishment if it makes you short on cash or causes you too much stress. Remember that it's the company that matters most.

You might attempt to create a strategy for success around your current notion of only stating the absolute truth when it is necessary to give it voice. However, the Moon's presence in your expressive sign encourages you to share more of your feelings today even if they don't move you closer to any of your goals. It's great that you feel upbeat and want to inspire others to be happy, but keep in mind that your plan to reach nirvana is not ideal for everyone else. Saying fewer words about the future is smarter now than rambling on unrestrained.

Your advanced organizational skills are needed to bail someone out of trouble today, and you are happy to ride to the rescue. You don't mind working behind the scenes, and you're even less interested in receiving personal recognition as the reflective Moon moves through your 12th House of Secrets. First and foremost, you want the satisfaction of knowing that your hard work helped to save the day for your friend or colleague. The universe is reminding you that you can accomplish nearly anything you set your mind to now.

You're ready to show off your stuff to the entire world today, and a social gathering can act as your temporary stage. Although you want to be seen and acknowledged, it's wise to hold some energy in reserve. Others may not know your entire story and you might prefer keeping it that way for a while longer. Avoid the temptation to bring everything out into the open now, for those who matter will still see what you bring to the party.

It's easier to buckle down to do whatever is expected of you when the rules and the limits are well defined. Unfortunately, there are so many fuzzy boundaries today that things could get sloppy pretty quickly. Don't wait until you have fallen over the edge before creating a strategy. Pay attention to social protocols, for they can prevent you from getting yourself into trouble. Embark on your spiritual quest, but do yourself a favor and wait to make any major moves until your clarity returns.

You can't even hear your own voice of reason today, or, maybe you are just choosing to ignore it. It's a rather straightforward choice: have yourself a good time or work hard while delaying the fun for another day. Naturally, no one is surprised if you are the first one at a party and the last one to leave. Self-indulgence most likely wins out, so you might as well enjoy yourself while you can. Your unfinished chores will still be there when you return.

It's often difficult to set your responsibilities aside unfinished, because you typically prefer to do the work first and then relax later. But today, you might impulsively decide to leave your commitments behind and take time off for the pursuit of fun. Just make sure that you don't forget to return in time to finish your chores so that you also have the satisfaction of a job well done.

You may feel lucky to have a loyal partner or playmate, but it's tricky to hold up your end of the deal today. Rather than being overly attached to someone else at the hip, you need more freedom now so you can move creatively on your own. However, if you show a little self-restraint, you might be able to find a way to balance your opposing desires and make everyone happy, including yourself.

Your travel plans might be shaken up today as interactive Mercury aligns with unpredictable Uranus. You may attempt to be serious at first, but you quickly realize that your ability to display your creative side also includes having fun. Don't be afraid to brush someone off who tries to hold you back as you seek ways to stir up a bit of excitement. Make the most of the planetary buzz; thankfully, there will be plenty of time tomorrow to fulfill your commitments.

Your most creative efforts may be blocked because you take yourself so seriously today. Worrying about someone else's reaction to your work can be enough to stop the flow of your self-expression. Dig deeply into your shadows without judgment as to what surfaces. It could take some time to figure out what to do with the material that appears now. A more casual approach to your current process removes some of the pressure and allows the energy to flow unimpeded once again.

No matter how motivated you are to share your feelings today, it may be tricky, considering the current circumstances. This is one of those times when you could be better off leaving your personal issues at home. Focusing on what needs to happen at work is best done now without unpacking any extra emotional baggage that you might be carrying. Discretion is the better part of valor and also your key to success.

Sorting out your schedule makes sense today since it's likely that you have bitten off more than you can chew. Fortunately, your key planet Mercury is available to assist you in rearranging your calendar. Work with the retrograde energy by postponing non-critical appointments to free up enough time for you to get your chores finished. Time management could be your secret weapon.

A social situation might make you feel awkward today because you're not willing to set aside your internal process in order to have a good time. It's not that you are negative about anything in particular; it's just that you don't want to miss an opportunity to experience an emotion that's crucial to your growth. Although it may not be a great idea to push your agenda too hard now, saying what's on your mind goes a long way to alleviate any hidden tension.

You have an uncharacteristic tendency to be self-critical today, since it may be impossible to live up to your own standards. You might feel like you are playing for keeps now, but it's likely that the stakes aren't as high as they seem. Change an intense situation into a more relaxing one by removing the competitive aspect. Once the pressure to win has been eliminated then everyone will be able to lighten up and play nicely together.

Keeping your agenda private today may seem like a good idea, but it might not actually work out according to your plan. Your strategy could backfire as others realize you have something up your sleeve, making them less likely to trust you. Be as forthcoming as possible and you will likely receive the assistance you need. Transparency paves the road to success.

It may feel as if your friends are not as supportive as usual, which can throw you into an emotional tailspin. The reality is, however, that others are no different today; it's you that has changed. You might expect so much now that no one could possibly fulfill all your needs. Your real work is to transform your attitude without depending on others. It all starts with believing in yourself.

Responsibilities weigh heavily on you today, for others expect you to carry more than your fair share. Of course, you take your work seriously and want to perform in an exemplary fashion. However, just because you have things to do doesn't mean you can't also have a little fun as long as you don't flake out on anyone. Taking time to think about your plan in advance enables you to gracefully balance work with play.

Your unrealistic ideas about a thrilling adventure may crash into reality today, requiring you to consider a scaled-down alternative. Don't let discouragement get the best of you because all is not lost. Your positive attitude allows you to make the necessary changes in your thinking more easily than you expect. A mature approach to integrating a new perspective can ultimately boost your confidence and increase your chances of living out your dream.

You might think that a close friend doesn't understand what you're going through now no matter how hard you try to share your true feelings. It may seem as if there is a protective wall around your heart that prevents you from expressing your ideas with the same passion you feel for them. Don't struggle; patience works better than anything else today since you'll likely feel more emotionally connected in a couple of days. In the meantime, look for your answers within.

Your partner or a coworker may come down on you harshly today, forcing you to examine your own shortcomings. Avoid responding with an overly defensive posture, for that kind of behavior only magnifies your insecurities. Instead, take the feedback to heart and think about what you can do to change for the better. A lesson learned now could have long-lasting positive ramifications.

If you are feeling under the weather or grappling with ongoing health concerns, making small changes in your daily routine can be just the catalyst you need to improve your well-being. However, it's not about turning your life upside down now; there's nothing to be gained by overwhelming your system. Instead, show respect for yourself by taking that first healthy step which allows more to follow.

Untangling complex relationship dynamics may be the focus of your world today as you pull away from other social obligations. Although your intention is to keep centered, the Moon's midday conjunction with your key planet Mars makes you even more impatient than usual. Nevertheless, it's more important than ever to practice self-restraint so you can get to the source of the current tension before riding the next big wave into the future.

You don't like being pushed into anything too quickly, especially if you feel like you have nowhere you must go. Your natural tendency is to dig in your heels and hold onto your current position no matter how hard others insist you do something else. Lighten up; being overly stubborn now is not a strategy that will bring you happiness. Instead, pay close attention to what people are telling you. Learning a significant life lesson is more beneficial in the long run than having your own way.

Some days you can talk your way around nearly any obstacle. Today, however, reality has tightened the screws and slammed on the verbal emergency brake, making it tough for you to shift into gear. But don't give up; whatever may be holding you back will gradually ease over the next few weeks if you remain focused on your goal and continue to put in the effort. Although taking a shortcut is out of the question, consistent hard work leads to success.

Personal relationship issues can eat up your time and attention today, and a particular situation may require direct intervention on your part. Even if you must play a heavy-handed role now, the good news is that you know what you're talking about and your words carry a sense of authority. Thankfully, your current ability to concentrate on the present moment is working in your favor. Set your feelings aside for a while and do what you know is right.

It could feel as if you are stepping up to the plate and everyone on the other team is pitching to you simultaneously. Others might crumble under such pressure, but you have the mind of a Jedi warrior today. Fortunately, you can remain unflappable as long as your intentions are pure. You're up for the challenge; pick the incoming toss that you like best and hit it out of the park.

You're tempted to hide out today, but reality may not be so forgiving. You have pressing responsibilities that need your attention and there's little room for changing your schedule now. However, you can gain a better perspective that ultimately leads to new options if you take time to listen to your inner thoughts. This self-reflection enables you to come out of your shell later in the day. Remember, contemplation might not appear to be productive, but it's exactly what you need to clear your mind.

Don't even consider admitting defeat today just because a big idea seems out of reach or because someone has taken the wind right out of your sails. You still have an excellent chance of reaching your primary goal, even if it won't likely happen overnight. Take whatever resistance you encounter now as a vital clue from the cosmos. Return to the drawing board and rework the weakest parts of your plans. Your faith gives you the confidence you need to overcome a frustrating setback.

You know exactly what is true today, even if the signals you're receiving from those around you say something else. If you're willing to hold on to your integrity and follow your plan all the way through to the end, it will likely work out as it should. Shallow thinking, however, collapses upon itself like a house of cards, leaving you uncertain as to where to go next. Don't waste time skimming over the top; instead demonstrate what you can do by expressing a bit of your infamous Scorpio passion.

A close friend or associate who often supports your ideas may come down hard on you today, but it's probably not as bad as it seems at first. Thankfully, there could even be a silver lining in the dark cloud -- and it's to your advantage to locate it as soon as you can. Whatever you do, don't spew negativity on the messenger, or you might miss an opportunity to improve your thinking process. A change of attitude will do you good.

Don't second guess your intuitive hunches today, for your psychic faculties are more effective than usual. However, your thinking is also grounded in reality now so you could grow frustrated with your own mental resistance. It might even seem as if your thoughts are just leading you around in circles. Reality may be standing in your way, but you can be exactly where you need to be by the end of the day if you have faith in the process.

An effective relationship at work may cool off a bit or one of your most exciting ideas could turn into something rather ordinary today. Perhaps you are engaged in serious thinking and have finally realized that friendly chatter alone won't produce the results you want. Take this change in dynamics in stride now, for you can use the time to continue developing your plan. Thankfully, your enthusiasm may return as soon as tomorrow.

Your emotions are a bit tangled today and your current confusion can be a bit disorienting. However, there's nothing wrong with your analytical abilities. And although you would prefer just being part of the crowd, you might begrudgingly take the lead so you can make sure that everyone has as good a day as possible. You are quite deliberate in your overall approach now, even if you appear to be footloose and fancy-free. Pay attention to how you are being perceived because your strategy could backfire if it looks like you aren't being serious enough.

The idea of being a member of a larger group is quite appealing to you now that resourceful Venus is entering your 11th House of Friends. You seek stability and meaning from your interactions with others, but your need to express your own beliefs could create problems with those who disagree with you. Minimize conflict by temporarily downplaying your personal proclivities. Make today about team spirit and not your individual needs.

Your natural inclination is to race through a task so you can hurry on to the next one. But today you can appreciate the benefits of slowing down and sticking with a job all the way through to completion. Accept any delays as a part of the process and stay focused on the project at hand, even if you wish you were doing something else. Your persistence will be rewarded sooner than you think.

If you're not willing to take responsibility for your behavior today, someone else could do it for you -- but at a price. If others do come down heavily on you now, your first impulse may be to blame them for complicating your life. Even if they just want to help, it's difficult to respond positively to their criticism. Nevertheless, you still might not be able to avoid the fact that you need to change your ways. Your willingness to learn a necessary lesson alleviates the pressure and improves the dynamics.

Although you have obligations that demand your attention today, it's not necessary (or even wise) to forego all pleasure. In fact, making a bit of time for structured play -- like going outside for recess when you were a child at school -- might be exactly what you need to be more productive. But don't just take off when you feel like it; instead, create a schedule and stick to it for the best results. Balancing work and play is key.

It's relatively easy to keep your thoughts to yourself today. Even if you have a very definite opinion, it may be nearly impossible to talk casually about your current plans. If you end up sharing what's on your mind with someone else, you still might feel misunderstood. There's no reason to question your own point of view just because others don't understand your perspective. Trust your common sense; it won't steer you wrong now.

You might find yourself drifting down Memory Lane today, thinking about how a previous failure could negatively impact your current life. Your nostalgia can remind you of how you fall short of your own lofty expectations, turning a minor setback into a more serious one. Thankfully, you are not a slave to your past. Rather than letting old fears limit your choices, move beyond your personal history and do something brilliant. There is no one to stop you but yourself.

Don't be satisfied with maintaining a comfortable distance between you and an acquaintance today. Bringing up a sensitive topic can transform a casual friendship into something more meaningful. Today's Sun-Saturn conjunction occurs in your 3rd House of Communication, making this an ideal time to tackle a difficult issue. Remember, following frivolous desires only distracts you with trivial information, so pick a subject that is practical enough to improve your relationship in a positive and lasting manner.

Sometimes you find it challenging to make a final decision because you naturally see the pros and cons to each and every possibility. However, you can narrow your field of vision today, enabling you to focus your intentions on whatever you decide is most important. Concentrate your energy on accomplishing a task that makes you feel good about your work. If you start to think about something you did wrong in the past, consciously switch your attention to what you can do right in the present.

Reality may have an obstacle or two to place in your way now, as the Sun joins Saturn in your magnetic sign. Consider the extraordinary pressures you have encountered since Saturn entered Scorpio last year to determine what lessons you can learn from this hard-nosed planet. Awareness is crucial; fortunately, understanding your role in what's currently happening empowers you to push through to the other side and plant the seed to create something significant.

You could exhaust yourself as you vacillate between overly optimistic thinking and an accurate analysis of the facts -- especially if you can't tell which is which. You might overcompensate by acting as if you know more than you actually do. Instead of pretending you have all the answers, just ask for help. Usually, you are the one cheering others on, but now it's your turn to lean on someone else for a change.

You are more realistic than ever as you make plans for your future because the Sun is forming its annual conjunction with your key planet Saturn. However, as the energy crystallizes in your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, Saturn can also bend your thoughts toward negative thinking. Don't give up; fortunately, your critical analysis enables you to make improvements to a current project if you're willing to act on your conclusions with a positive attitude.

If you experience trouble at work today, don't simply assume that you did something wrong. Instead, look at the resistance you face as a lesson from the universe. Even if your original attempt was not met with much enthusiasm, you have an opportunity now to improve on what you did and then try again. Don't give up on your goal; instead, work even harder to prove that you deserve it.

Setting a goal can mean serious business today, because you won't be able to easily change your mind once you make a decision. Whether you are considering a new residence, job or school, it's crucial to take your time and think through all your options before choosing what to do next. But merely knowing that you're capable isn't enough. You must resolutely overcome your own inertia and take action, however small it may seem.

Take your time before expressing your feelings today or you may have to clean up a mess of your own creation. It's not that you shouldn't speak the truth; it's actually required. But be smart and choose your words carefully. There's no need to stir a hornets' nest now, unless you want to spend time soothing your stings later on. It's less about what you say than how you say it. Delivering your message with kindness is your best move.

Tread carefully because your emotions are a bit slippery today and you might not fully understand what you are feeling. You could inadvertently lead someone down the wrong path now because of your own lack of clarity. But don't get upset if this actually happens, since your anger will only blow things further out of proportion. Instead, imagine a comfortable future and respond accordingly. A rational approach will keep you on track.

Although you stand to gain a lot through meditation or prayer today, it may be difficult to learn how to find peace within if you haven't already developed a spiritual practice. You might feel way too restless to hold still for long, making it tough to receive much benefit from any sort of contemplation. In any event, remind yourself to slow down. Life is not as confusing or as complex as it seems.

Your feelings will come out into the open sooner or later, so you might as well bring up your hidden issues now. Maybe you shut down because you weren't sure how someone else would react. However, today it may not matter. Find a way to let some of your pent-up emotions flow past your protective shell. You could be pleasantly surprised at the response you receive, and by how much relief you feel about pushing through your own resistance to the truth.

Letting off a bit of excess steam is a sensible strategy today, but find a way to do it gently. Hold the biggest issues in check for a while longer so you don't lose your cool. Staying in touch with your own dreams enables you to maintain a clearer perspective on those things that seem bent out of shape. Even if you allow your imagination to run wild, say as little as possible. It's more important to get the ball rolling and to establish a sustainable pace than it is to tell your whole story now.

Your ideas could be beyond brilliant today, but there's also a bit of room now for self-deception. It's tricky to ride your thoughts to their conclusions, because new ones float into awareness before the old ones are completed. Cutting back on caffeine is helpful as long as you also focus your mind on the practical issues that are right in front of you. It's tempting to drift off into your dreams, but it's more important now to keep your feet planted firmly on the ground.

Integrating your fantasy life with the real world today adds stress to your day. It's challenging enough to keep up with your dreams by yourself now, and trying to bring others along on your ride seems nearly impossible. Instead of complicating your inner process by involving anyone else, concentrate on expressing yourself creatively. Thankfully, you can burn off some of your excess mental energy by having fun, especially if you make life more beautiful in the process.

You might feel as if you're on an emotional seesaw today, but if you think of it as a joyride you should be able to find pleasure in your ever-changing moods. Don't try to force your experience up into your brain for logical analysis; you're better off by staying in touch with your world intuitively now. Remember the images that pop into your awareness and spend time reflecting on their possible meanings, for they hold important keys to your future.

You're on the edge of something big, but you might not be able to figure out exactly what it is yet. Your past and future are colliding and it feels as if the present moment should be more definable than it is. You naturally seek excitement and adventure, but today may leave you unsatisfied with a series of unreachable fantasies bouncing around in your head. Accept your current limitations for what they are and move on when you are ready. Ultimately, the real world is much more interesting than your dreams.

The solid ground that you believed was beneath your feet has apparently gone soft, making it harder to accomplish as much as you want. Things that should be stable are disintegrating right before your eyes. Fortunately, this can be a magical and creative time if you have faith in yourself and in the universe. Access your superpowers and use your imagination to sail right past the very same obstacles that were recently in your way.

Your nervous system may be gently rebelling as visions come and go too quickly to fully grasp. Although you thought that you were grounded, you're not completely in control, so don't try to stop your brilliant ideas from cycling in and out of consciousness. It's not necessary to understand everything that crosses your mind now. Just enjoy the images and let them distract you for a while. They will begin to settle down later in the day and your restlessness will subside.

Following through with all your commitments today can be tricky as dreamy Neptune in your sign is captivated by romantic Venus' magical charms. However, you might feel jumpy as the littlest things set off uncontrollable cascading reactions within your mind. Even if you aren't sure where your thoughts are taking you, don't let the uncertainty slow you down too much. Keep the energy moving and have faith; you'll know more about your destination soon enough.

You are poised to catch the wind to points unknown today, but at least you can tell which way the breezes are blowing. Nevertheless, once you're soaring, you might discover that the currents aren't quite as stable as you first assumed. But coming down isn't as straightforward as getting airborne. Relax and enjoy the ride, even if you no longer have a clue as to where you are going.

Although your well-known determination may not be enough to guarantee your success, you still have high hopes for reaching your goals today. Rather than relentlessly pushing toward a singular destination, pay attention to what's being revealed by the changing circumstances. Remember, it's more important to remain light on your feet and willing to switch direction on a moment's notice than to doggedly drive toward an objective that no longer makes sense.

Another person's idealistic approach could open your mind to a whole new way of looking at things today. Fortunately, you are very receptive to what is being said and something you discover now can have a lasting impact on your life. It's like you are being supplied with a missing piece of data that enables everything to fit into place. Although you are learning about the truth, spending a few more days gaining perspective might just prevent you from jumping into a situation you don't yet fully understand.

The hold that someone has over you is reinforced today by the authoritative Capricorn Moon's visit to your 7th House of Partners. But events can take interesting twists and turns, shifting the center of power from others to you. Nevertheless, tread carefully; being in control isn't as great as it appears to be. If possible, find a supportive copilot so you don't have to do all the work on your own. Sharing responsibilities lightens the load and increases the joy for everyone involved.

You may have many wonderful ideas today, but they aren't necessarily very practical ones. Your irrepressible idealism is the driving force behind your current creativity now, but it could also lead you astray. This isn't the time for idle daydreaming. You must take action, even if you're not yet sure of your goals. Trust your instincts and have faith that you're heading in the right direction.

Establishing objectives in your personal life now is as important as creating them within your career. If you don't have any specific goals, you'll just flounder around aimlessly without direction. Don't be a casualty of your potential professional success; your life will be more meaningful if you can find a healthy balance between your job and your family. One cannot live on bread alone.

The overall spiritual buzz today is kind of cool, but it can be tiring to keep your mind on the more ethereal side of life. The Moon's evening entry into conceptual Aquarius feels like a breath of fresh air, but you can't help but think that something strange is going on. Don't succumb to self-doubt when wondering if your perceptions of the dream world are actually valid. Just live your life knowing that your visions are as real as you allow them to be. Believe in something with all your heart and it might just come true.

You could have big plans involving your friends today. Maybe you are considering a trip or making final arrangements for a social gathering. But there are subtle influences now that can make your choices more complicated, especially if you don't fully understand how all the pieces fit together. Take your time and get everyone's opinion first; the need to hurry is more arbitrary than you realize.

You appear to be straightforward in your actions and true to your words yet there's still more going on today than reaches the surface. Your friends may jump to erroneous conclusions, but their false assumptions are easy to fix once they are out in the open. However, problems might arise if something is left unsaid. A bit of honest feedback on your part can help, but don't belabor your point. Share your advice and move on.

If you are keeping a secret you may make a big fuss about something unimportant now just to distract everyone's attention from lingering on the real deal. But you can only play the shell game for so long because it drains too much of your psychic energy. Consider what emotions might be stirred by sharing your vulnerability. Don't just blurt out your truth without having a sensible strategy that leads to healthy closure. Finding the right person to trust is your key to success.

You are probably quite social today, yet your interactions with others could take you in a totally unexpected direction. However, you don't want to let go of your personal goals. Ironically, the more it appears that you are in control, the greater the gap between your expectations and reality. Trusting in the process is always a smart idea, but it will require focus and follow-through to make your dreams come true.

Your actions at work have been pretty transparent recently because your objectives are clear and you're determined to get what you want. But the Moon's shift into your 12th House of Invisibility today increases the level of complexity to what you're doing. Be careful; sending mixed signals can become a hazard if there's something that you're trying to hide. It's safer to be honest and let others know what's on your mind.

You are in the driver's seat now because you know the full consequences of what you are doing. You recently had the opportunity to consider all your options before choosing your present course of action. The potential rewards may be quite satisfying, although it could take more time than you think for your labors to bear fruit. Setting a sustainable pace today is more important than your actual production, so keep your eyes on the future and your shoulder to the wheel.

You're not interested in anything superficial now because you want to see tangible results from your extra effort. Unfortunately, confusion can catch you off guard today if the distance between your optimism and reality is too much. Adopt a logical and balanced approach and pay attention to the details. There is great potential for success if you maintain a positive attitude and keep your common sense close at hand.

Whatever you say today could be less important than your actions. Your behavior not only speaks louder than your words, it also has longer lasting consequences. Nevertheless, you have a significant opportunity now, but it might not be obvious at first. No matter what happens, be creative as you tell your story. Dream out loud and share what's on your mind. You may be pleasantly surprised with the wonderful response you receive.

You have an interesting choice to make today as your plans come up for reconsideration. It would be easier if you were the only person involved, but someone else's needs must also be included. Opening your mind to reexamine your goals from a wider perspective can be very enlightening as you see possibilities that you previously overlooked. Don't say no too quickly to anything that comes your way or you could miss a wonderful opportunity to further develop your evolving life strategy.

There is so much happening that it tests your ability to remain calm and it might be somewhat disconcerting now as you try to keep it all together. Harmonious aspects conspire to clear the path toward your destination, but doing the work is still, ultimately, your responsibility. Your schedule is so full that you may consider sleeping less just to squeeze everything in. Things will slow down in a few days, but in the meantime, make sure you get some much-needed rest.

Someone at work may be acting overly sweet toward you today and you might not know what to do about it. Your uncertainty could stem from an overall lack of clarity about what you want. Or maybe the other person's intentions are questionable. Either way, your smartest strategy is to explore all avenues before deciding your course of action. Luckily, your reasoning is sound now, even if the options are confusing at first. Once you've considered the pros and cons, make your choice and stick to it.

It's hard to feel satisfied with just having a nice experience today; you crave something that goes beyond the ordinary. Even if you finish your work early, you still won't be able to fully enjoy yourself. However, you are currently blessed with the patience to wait for the right moment and the drive to follow through on your plan. Once you know that the timing is right, don't hesitate to make your move. If your intentions are clear, your mind can turn your fantasies into reality.

Your creative juices are flowing and it's wise to find ways to concentrate on your self-expression. But this kind of sharing isn't just about personal issues; it's time to set new goals and then pursue them. Yet, even if you are overcommitted, you can still do what needs to be done. There is major assistance coming your way from the hidden realms of your own subconscious world. The spiritual growth and psychological work you have done in the recent past may be put to good use in the present.

Unfortunately, you may be doing more armchair traveling today than real trekking around the globe. However, as your vision expands, you might miss important details or gloss over data that you don't have time to integrate. Luckily, you could make a lot of progress now by saving money for a future trip. Remember that sometimes the planning stage of a getaway can be nearly as much fun as the real thing; take your time and enjoy the anticipation while it lasts.

Although you might be uncharacteristically laid-back at work today, you still need to juggle your personal and business worlds while keeping the two of them apart. But don't miss the powerful opportunity to make something special happen, since you have the right balance between intention and follow-through now, enabling you to accomplish whatever you initially set out to do. Make sure that you have your facts straight, but don't get too hung up in the details. Share your vision as you let your inner poet or philosopher out of the closet.

You may be inclined to spend money on something you don't really need today. Buying a gift for yourself is a lovely thing to do, but you might be drawn toward purchasing an item that is more extravagant than you can afford. Ask yourself whether or not your potential purchase is really such a good idea before you face possible regrets in a few days. Ironically, exercising a bit of self-restraint works to your advantage in the long run.

Although it's wonderful to fuel your life with your dreams, don't let it be an excuse to be completely unrealistic. It's as if you must maintain a double existence now. You have your head up in the clouds, but need to keep your feet firmly planted on the ground since it's tempting to escape to another world. However, you still must pay careful attention to the process or your best ideas will only get lost. Thankfully, you can go anywhere your imagination carries you while riding this powerful spiritual wave.

You have been engaged recently in some pretty serious thinking about your life whether or not anyone else realizes it. It's not that your search for deeper meaning is over today, but it is now time to shift gears and turn your philosophical search into something more practical. Knowing the truth is a great start, but can lose its value quickly unless you apply your wisdom in ways that matter.

Relationships might exhibit a fated quality these days as circumstances take on a life of their own. However, maintaining control over others is not a viable strategy, since you won't be able to stop the inevitable anyway. Instead of struggling to cling to your agenda, embrace the coming changes; they can bring you more exciting opportunities than you currently realize. Trust the process and let go.

There really isn't a graceful way to escape the work that needs to be done now, so save your sweet talking and tap dancing for another day. Your clever charm is not going to serve you well today, even if you're feeling extra witty. Actions speak louder than words. The sooner you start your chores, the more time you'll have later to kick back and enjoy yourself.

Responsibilities may prevent you from having too much fun today, even if your idea of relaxation is to just hang out at home with a loved one. You know what you want, but could run into unexpected obstacles. If your satisfaction is delayed, don't waste precious energy fretting. Channel your energy wisely for the best results. Rest assured that you'll get your just rewards soon enough.

You might not say everything you feel today because you're exploring recent private moments that could have unresolved issues attached to them. Allow yourself the luxury of dredging up old memories without having to rewrite history just so you can fix what went wrong. You will soon be involved with new and pleasurable experiences, so just let your mind meander down Memory Lane while you can. A sentimental journey could do you a world of good.

Separating the useful information from all the superfluous data is uncharacteristically difficult now. Every little item seems important, but there's just too much of it to make sense. Nevertheless, sift through what you know, even if it's a struggle, and set aside everything but the most essential facts. Rely on the basics and you'll be able to make the best choices for your future.

If you have been procrastinating about any financial matters, today might be your last chance for a while to take care of unfinished business. You are being drawn into other pressing issues that are developing now as Mercury moves direct in your 2nd House of Possessions. Don't wait; you may not have a lot of time to go back and redo what should have already been done. The sooner you finish, the better you'll feel.

Your intense communication style might be more than others prefer now, but they may just have to take you just as you are. You're not in a negotiating mood because you realize that your perceptions are even more acute than usual. Don't back down if you believe that your conclusions are sound. Nevertheless, remember that applying gentle persuasion will still work better than issuing ultimatums. A spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down.

Although things are looking up, you still may have serious business to take care of today. Stay focused on your long-term goals now and don't let your frustration get the best of you. The next few days mark a turning point as your subconscious mind sends you powerful messages about your future. Steady persistence is more important now than unbridled enthusiasm. Dig deep and give it all you got.

Your contemplative attitude feels more comfortable today to you than it might to anyone else. Your cautiously reserved behavior brings up issues for someone who wants you to act in a more happy-go-lucky manner. But it won't help if you wear a smile just to please other people. You can't go wrong if you stick with what your instincts tell you now. Your authenticity is your greatest asset.

Your passionate words may have more impact today than you expect. However, you're not even sure that you fully believe what you said just a few minutes ago. You aren't purposefully misleading anyone; it's just that your logical conclusions are not supported by what you feel in your heart now. Nevertheless, you know you must speak the truth as you experience it in the moment, for maintaining your integrity is what matters most.

Your x-ray vision allows you to see right through any sort of cover-up today, but the question is what do you do with the information you possess? The answer can be found in your attitude. It won't work if you try to show someone what you think they need to know. If, on the other hand, you offer a different perspective without declaring that it is the only path to follow, then you can help people by expanding their options. Sharing your knowledge freely inspires others to do the same.

It doesn't take much to persuade you that all is well in the realm of relationships today; you could even convince yourself without trying at all. Unfortunately, you might attempt to avoid the facts if you realize how complex the issues are that need resolution now. There's nothing wrong with recognizing the unrealized potential in people, but don't substitute it for the truth that's right in front of you. Better to be safe than sorry when it comes to your heart.

Your emotions rise into awareness today, but you can't seem to put your feelings into words. You wish your life was simpler, yet your personal desires can still turn everything upside down. Even if you think you're being clear, someone still might misinterpret your intentions. Don't assume that anyone understands what you mean. Take time to confirm that your message is received in the manner you meant.

Today is perfect for daydreaming your time away, but it's probably not so great for delivering a comprehensible message. Your imagination is working overtime now, which can be delightful if you don't try to apply your current thoughts to practical reality. Wait a few days until the transits to ethereal Neptune pass if you have something really important to say. Enjoy the view while your creative muse takes you on a magic carpet ride.

You might want to take the day off because you are remembering everything you want to do that's not connected with work. Although you are able to envision your ideal day, one thing or another prevents you from actually having it. Instead of worrying about what you are unable to do, be grateful for what you can accomplish. Improving your attitude inspires you to make the most of what you have.

You may believe you're in a dream where everything is just about as perfect as you can imagine. Unfortunately, once you open your eyes you might see that your life is far from ideal. Naturally, you're tempted to indulge your pleasant fantasies, but avoiding reality isn't a luxury you can afford now. Instead of mind-tripping to a faraway place, concentrate on your home base where you could actually make a positive difference.

You can't easily let go of your preconceived notions of what's in store for you next. Reality is a bit more elusive now as your key planet Mercury continues its communication dance with psychic Neptune. Nevertheless, you don't have any way to validate your current choices. It's better to let a few minor decisions slide, knowing you can return to them and clean things up later in the week. Relax and give yourself permission to wander in your dreams.

You desperately want to complete old business today so you can establish a new routine. On the other hand, this could be a great play day, making it hard to accomplish much at all. This internal conflict may be emotionally discomforting, so do whatever makes sense to gain a calmer frame of mind. Nevertheless, the Moon's visit to your 6th House of Self-Improvement indicates that you would be wise to focus on fine-tuning your efforts instead of frivolously wasting a potentially productive day.
