You might feel stuck and you're ready to take a calculated risk today, even if only to stir things up a bit. But attempting to make changes without a concrete plan could be more confusing than exciting. Imagine the best possible outcome and then create a strategy to manifest it. If you can fill in the details in your mind, then you are more likely to make your dreams come true.

You may have so many obligations today that you don't feel like doing much of anything. You're more likely to rebel against the entire system of current responsibilities if you feel overwhelmed. Unfortunately, your strategic skills might not be functioning at their best now, which means it won't be as easy to change the rules as you think. Don't become discouraged if your plans don't work as expected; give it a rest and then try again.

It's quite unnerving if you feel disoriented today because you Goats naturally like to have your feet planted solidly on the ground. You could waste a lot of time and energy trying to regain your footing, but a little uncertainty can also lead to a healthy experience. You have much to gain by questioning your assumptions about your life and your path ahead. Don't worry about making any final decisions now; rest assured that it's not yet necessary to know your next step. Take a deep breath and trust in the process.

Your dreams appear to be so close today that you mistakenly believe you could reach out and touch them as if they are real. Naturally, it's helpful if you can trust your intuition because currently you're more in tune with the symbolic realm that informs your thoughts than you are with the basic facts. Don't bother seeking rational explanations now, just act on your hunches. Make additional adjustments in a few days when your thinking is more aligned with reality.

Although you might try to act in a rational manner today, your common sense continues to grow more and more elusive. Thankfully, this confusion can be used to your advantage, as long as you don't make any significant life-changing decisions now. Declare this day to be your own personal spiritual holiday and give yourself permission to stay connected with the mysteries within.

The results of your recent efforts may bring rewards today, but probably not in the obvious ways you expect. You're able to enjoy life more now, basking in the awareness of a job well done. But don't allow your unrestrained optimism lead to laziness, for you could falsely believe that you deserve time to relax. However, this assumption could end up encouraging counterproductive behavior; don't let your regular responsibilities slip just because you're feeling good.

Your mind can conceptualize new ideas quite easily now because you're eager to broaden your horizons. Sometimes you're satisfied with maintaining the status quo, but today you're so confident that you want to step beyond your regular routine and experience life to the fullest. However, this isn't about setting aside your basic philosophical approach to living; rather, it's a wonderful opportunity to build on the foundation of what you already know.

Sometimes steady growth feels restraining because you want to move at your own pace, which can be faster than everyone else's. However, the Sun's trine to jovial Jupiter in your 2nd House of Income allows you to obtain much-needed support from your boss and your workmates as you bolt ahead of the pack. There isn't any reason to slow down now; explore new territory without worrying about the usual resistance.

New ideas are flowing into your imagination now, but you must be ready to receive them. You may already be in touch with a variety of alternative plans, but the Sun's trine to philosophical Jupiter in your sign today can blast the doors of awareness open. Thankfully, the current growth spurt shouldn't feel like hard work or cause you any stress. Opportunities to expand your thinking and widen your horizons are more fun than you might expect.

An emotional breakthrough is possible today if you're willing to examine your feelings from a broader perspective before the coming changes impact your relationships. Letting go of fixed ideas isn't easy, but today's Sun-Jupiter trine may seem like a free ticket to the destination of your choice. Nevertheless, it is up to you to use it. Take a risk or you might stay stuck in your current situation, wishing that you didn't let the opportunity pass you by. Think big and then follow through with confidence and persistence.

Your relationships feed your creativity now, especially if you listen closely to others as they share their ideas. However, inspiration doesn't just happen on its own. You have to put on your thinking cap and be diligent about maximizing your current cleverness potential. Once you start something, stick with it, even if your certainty lags. You are closer to success than you realize.

You may be surprised by all the wonderful support you receive at work today. Assistance arrives in funny ways, yet you could miss it if you are looking too hard in a different direction. Nevertheless, you have a great opportunity now to improve the quality of your everyday life if you can get past your own resistance to change. The choice is yours; be courageous and let your friends and associates nurture your current growth.

The importance of having fun cannot be overstated because you're highly creative today if you are enjoying yourself. There's no reason to impose arbitrary limits on what you can do. Even if you don't reach an idealistic goal now, you will still progress further along your path. Extending yourself as much as possible improves your chances of making the most of the current opportunities. Just be sure to find pleasure in whatever you do.

Your dreams are a major source of inspiration, yet you need to exercise a bit of caution today. It's easy to get lost in your inner worlds, but your key planet Jupiter is so radiant now that you might not even realize if something is amiss. Fortunately, you have the power to direct your thoughts away from unrealistic fantasies and turn them into profound creative visualizations that can change your life for the better.

Lean on your friends and associates today by discussing your hopes and dreams with them. But don't be overly concerned about reaching your goals just yet, for optimistic Jupiter's trine to the Sun in your 11th House of Future suggests that immediate success is not what's most important. Instead, use this time to explore your aspirations without necessarily having to justify every thought you share. Ultimately, you will receive the support you need if you trust the process.

Your hard work may be rewarded by a bigger paycheck or, at least, the promise of a raise. Your 2nd House of Money and your 6th House of Work are being drawn into a cooperative relationship, creating a perfect storm. Luckily, you can benefit from this cosmic blast if you don't push your luck too far; instead, just show up with your best possible attitude and see what happens. You might be pleasantly surprised with the outcome.

Reach a little farther today while the Moon in your sign is harmoniously aligned. The planets are surely working in your favor now; the Sun's harmonious trine to auspicious Jupiter enables you to balance optimism and realism. This cosmic magic encourages you to choose what you want to do next. Nevertheless, you still must be willing to push past whatever stands in the way of achieving your goals. Believe in yourself and the sky is your limit.

Your enthusiasm may spell trouble today because the Moon returns to your active sign, inspiring you to take on the world. But it's tricky to find the right amount of intensity because you might push so hard that your plan backfires. On the other hand, you could set yourself up for failure if you don't try at all. Ultimately, you can increase your chances of being happy by scaling back your goals just a little bit and then taking a giant leap of faith.

You might not be able to discover the source of your irritation today as the Moon's presence in your 12th House of Invisibility hides something from view. It feels critical to find out what you're missing, but the most significant information could be elusive to your watchful eye. Instead of pushing for the truth, try accepting what you already know while you wait for the rest to surface. Time spent alone can give you a chance to find the answers within.

You may be offered a professional opportunity today that's too good to turn down. But it's difficult to stay focused at work now with the Moon visiting your 11th House of Friends. There could be an element of surprise when erratic Uranus flips things upside down, making it tricky to know how best to respond. Don't abandon your responsibilities just because a social event sounds so exciting. Instead of planning your escape, show everyone you're up for a challenge by turning a new project into a game and playing for keeps.

There's no reason to wait for marching orders from your boss today. Take a chance and trust your intuition; you probably already know what he or she wants from you. Nevertheless, you must exercise some caution or you might jump to an erroneous conclusion. Don't make your move too quickly because an incorrect assumption could cause you to waste precious time. A more contemplative approach is likely to earn the respect of others and increase your chances for success.

Moderating your enthusiasm is no easy task today. Even if you're able to envision exciting adventures ahead, it's possible to take a plan so far that others tire of your outrageous ideas. Talking less and doing more is the smartest way to demonstrate that you are not all hype. Delivering the goods is just as important now as having a positive attitude. Actions speak louder than words.

Your uncharacteristic desire to be different from everyone else today might make your interactions with others more intense than usual. You may become frustrated because you're attracted to someone who seems as if he or she would make a close friend or intimate partner. However, you don't necessarily like the idea of changing just to make the interpersonal dynamics work. Be willing to walk away from a relationship if you cannot be yourself in it. Your integrity matters more than anything else.

A friend or coworker might shock you by doing something totally outrageous today. You may be caught off guard by the intensity of the emotions being expressed, but it's wise not to show your surprise or offer any negative judgment now. Instead of being overly reactive, stick to your current position and maintain your balance in spite of the chaos around you. Find your inner center and hold on tight.

You may be secretly attracted to someone at work today, yet this won't be your typical romance because you want your freedom now as much as you want love and affection. You might not be clear about what you're willing to give up in order to obtain what you desire. Don't struggle too hard as you try to find a comfortable middle ground. It's possible to remain curiously excited without actually acting on your feelings. Wait and see how things develop before making your move.

You are tempted to write yourself a permission slip today and then sneak off to play. Although this might sound like a great idea, you need to fulfill your obligations first. Thankfully, you have the ability now to approach your job with an entirely different mindset that enables you to have fun while doing your chores. There's no reason to be frustrated by your desire to escape; instead, express your creativity by exhibiting a high level of enthusiasm all day long.

You feel like you have too much to do now, especially if you are needed by a close friend or family member. You might think you can postpone your domestic responsibilities because you're so busy at work, but this isn't a wise strategy to pursue. Instead, make your personal commitments top priority while you let your professional obligations slip a little. It will be much easier to fully concentrate on your job tomorrow once you have taken care of those you love today.

You might want to shake everything up today, but change isn't always the best idea -- especially if your life seems to be working well. It's one thing to try doing a task in a new way because you're searching for more efficient methods. But doing it differently now just because you're bored may not be the smartest strategy. There's no need to fix what's not broken; channel your excess energy toward more productive endeavors and watch what happens.

Lots of new ideas about making money are popping into your head now, but they may not be practical enough to turn them into reality. Nevertheless, you're sure that you can accomplish more if you just work faster. However, your new approach to your job could be unsettling to your coworkers who would rather maintain the status quo. Don't be afraid to rattle some cages by trying something different. You can always go back to your old ways in a few days if it doesn't work out.

Your desires may lead you astray today because you want more than you can have. Magnetic Venus tensely squares irrepressible Uranus in your spontaneous sign, making it difficult for you to show self-restraint. You like the excitement of living on the edge, but it's easy to go overboard now. Instead of thinking about personal satisfaction, consider what you could do to stabilize the progress you already made at work. Even a small amount of concentrated effort goes a long way. However, a lot of steady work carries you forward in ways you cannot yet imagine.

The instability of your changing moods might be a lot to manage now. Normally, you're not so erratic; you usually like to contain the energy of a situation by moving at a steady pace. However, now you get to combine an unrelenting desire for excitement with your preference for stability -- a powerful combination to say the least. You have little to lose by succumbing to your emotions. In fact, this can be a break-through moment because those close to you are able to see a vulnerable side that you don't usually show. Open your heart and let love in.

You are known to be light-footed and quick-witted, so it may be out of character to slow down and take life more seriously. Thankfully, you can gain recognition and respect now for your ability to do just that. Don't panic and make your move too soon, even if you're tempted. The freedom of mobility you seek will return in a few days and you'll be able to make the necessary changes more easily. In the meantime, surprise others with your willingness to focus on the present moment.

Too much information is a trap now, and no sensible Crab wants to end up in a steel cage. Find the routines that work for you and stick with them; when they become automatic you can focus on the whole game and not on each separate play. If you're having a difficult time with any one piece, let it be for a while and move on to other things you need to do. Accomplish as much as possible today; your actions will have greater impact after they stack up into a few days of work.

You may become your own worst enemy when your need for attention gets the best of you. If things are going your way now, you can become so attuned to the present moment that you're unconscious about how everyone perceives you. A little humility goes a long way; your friends and family will love you even more if you don't try so hard to hoard the spotlight. Shining the light on others makes you the hero in the long run.

You are motivated by repressed emotions that may come close enough to the surface now to impact your outer world. You can usually differentiate between objective truths and subjective desires, but today it's not so easy. Accept the rumblings of your feelings as messages from your intuitive side. The irrational information you receive in this manner might be more valuable than all the facts put together.

It might seem as if you're being led astray by one thing after another that comes into your environment today. However, the truth is that these so-called distractions may actually be the main event. You are in a positive cycle and can handle nearly anything that happens now. Breathe deeply and remain calm, even if your emotions are pulling you all over the place. Take everything in stride, for your reactions mold your future in powerful ways you don't yet understand.

Your intense desires could be wasted today on such trivial things such as the pursuit of personal pleasure. But you have more important things to do because your current actions can impact your success at work. You are creating building blocks for the future, so don't expend your energy on reaching the wrong goals. You have more tools at your disposal now; make intelligent use of the resources while you have the chance.

Your unflappable confidence can backfire if you think everything is going so well you don't need to do anything now. Even if it seems like you're at the peak of your energy cycle, it's not wise to wait until something goes badly before making changes. It's smarter to improve things before they break. Although the world might feel like your oyster now, complacency isn't your friend. You know what would make your life even better -- so get busy and do it.

You're strangely attracted to playing outside the rules today, which can make you feel uneasy. You normally like to follow a traditional course, but current circumstances are requiring you to step into uncharted territory. It isn't worth fussing too much over someone who chooses not to join you on your journey. Letting go of old habits and worn-out expectations widens your horizons and increases the variety of new experiences ahead. Take a risk now; you won't be disappointed.

It's nearly impossible for you to conform to the status quo. You can be so unique in your approach that you don't always have the patience to stick with the same old routine. But you might try to hide your originality now because you want to avoid criticism from your friends. Unfortunately, you're not meant to color inside the lines. Don't worry about what anyone else thinks; just go ahead and be your authentic self.

You may be ready to sacrifice your hard-earned security for the possibility of a memorable experience today. You are yearning to do something out of the ordinary with your friends, especially if they are encouraging you to express a part of your personality that you usually hold back. Be daring and experiment to discover what you really want. Letting your inner wild child out to play can be quite therapeutic.

You won't likely take no for an answer today, no matter what your question is. You're driven by your desire for success and are ready to do anything that's necessary to achieve your goals. Others who stand in your way are fair game to receive the brunt of your annoyance or anger, but it's still not a good idea to ride roughshod over someone who would be better as a friend than as an enemy. Don't act foolishly; it's wiser to be inclusive than exclusive.

There's nothing wrong with being in touch with your physical needs, but the Moon's return to your sign today encourages you to be more aware of your feelings. Fortunately, your judgment is probably on point now, as long as you remember to take other people's perspectives into consideration. Even if you're certain that your assumptions are correct, you'll do better by remaining flexible and meeting others halfway.

Your fantasies may be running amok today and it's tempting to draw an intimate partner closer by sharing your private thoughts and feelings. However, it might not be all that easy to bring your secrets out into the open now. Luckily, encountering your own resistance could be a saving grace because your inability to tell everything can turn out in your favor. There are some things that are better left unsaid.

You're usually very sensitive to other people's feelings, but you may need to retreat today because someone is just too intense for you to handle. Unfortunately, attempts on your part to establish reasonable boundaries could just further enflame the drama. Act in a caring and supportive manner without taking responsibility for a difficult situation that isn't yours. Remain sympathetic while also maintaining whatever distance you require for your own emotional wellbeing.

You have little patience for anyone who isn't willing to stand up for his or her beliefs today. Normally, you would be more concerned with making sure that your ideas were getting all the attention they deserve. Now, however, you are content with just quietly honoring the opinions of others as long as they are being true to themselves. You're not interested in arguing with someone who is looking for a fight; you would rather explore how your own passions can enrich your life, instead.

Your uncharacteristic desire to express your desires today could ultimately surprise others. At first, you might seem as if you're able to maintain a cool and emotionally detached attitude, but as you talk it becomes apparent that you want to say more. You might even find yourself hooked on a feeling and are unwilling to let it go. Don't be afraid of your intensity now; just be certain that your passions are worth the extra effort.

You are criticized on occasion for not being able to make up your mind, but today you'll probably fall at the other end of the spectrum. You are quick to state what you want now and are unwavering in your approach to get it. In fact, you might be so firm in your convictions that you're ready to confront anyone who gets in your way. Your current commitment to living life to the fullest is admirable as long as you don't take yourself so seriously that you start a needless fight over something that's just not that important.

You aren't interested in simply experiencing the power of emotions; you want to communicate your fears and discuss your attractions, even if they make someone uncomfortable. Magnetic Venus joins your key planet Pluto today, accentuating your passions and bringing hidden desires to the surface. Don't back away from your feelings; it's not your job now to manage how anyone else might react to your truth. Real intimacy can only occur when you share what's in your heart.

It's necessary to find a steady rhythm at work because your consistent efforts could bring increased income as the Venus-Pluto conjunction activates your 2nd House of Money. Making a cash investment might be a smart move now if your involvement also gives you an active role to play. But don't expect something for nothing; you need to put in the extra labor today before reaping the rewards.

You are determined to express yourself today at any cost. Emotional pressures have been building beneath the surface and now could be pushed to an eruption point. Even if your extreme reactions feel out of control, you can moderate your outward response by concentrating on your long-term goals rather than the chaos of the present moment. A little bit of objectivity might be enough to give you the perspective you need.

Expending a lot of physical energy today makes it easier to manage your intense emotions if someone is resisting your efforts or trying to control you. Fortunately, you're strong enough now to stand up to a powerful person who fears your success. Nevertheless, it's not a good idea to draw battle lines and take on an adversary. It's much smarter to win the fight against your own insecurities. If you don't have a need to demonstrate your superiority, then the stress will dissipate without a showdown.

The relationship dynamics with your coworkers might turn into a time-consuming power struggle if you think they are excluding you from the team. You don't want to be an outsider now, but you're not interested in sacrificing your values for the sake of being accepted by the group. Although communication is difficult when emotions run so high, it's still worth the effort to initiate a meaningful dialogue and establish common ground where everyone can feel comfortable enough to work together.

You've had your share of excitement recently, so you might pass on an unexpected invitation. You have important issues to handle now and it feels as if your window of opportunity is beginning to close. Thankfully, you are able to do whatever is necessary, even if you have been procrastinating up to this point. Don't worry if you must miss an exciting social gathering today because you'll still have plenty of time to get together with your friends in the weeks ahead. Work now, play later.

If you have been keeping busy by doing favors for everyone else, it's your turn to take care of yourself now. Thankfully, the sensitive Moon's visit to pragmatic Taurus helps to focus your feelings and stabilize your world within the context of larger emotional currents. Don't waste your energy today pursuing grandiose ideas; instead, concentrate on practical business. Connecting with your heart actually enables you keep your feet on the ground.

You may want to withdraw from social interactions and to spend more time by yourself now that the Moon is moving through your 12th House of Privacy. But don't worry if people get on your case because you're missing out on the fun. There's no reason to waste energy defending your current behavior. Even with a sensible explanation, they won't likely understand why you need to recharge your emotional batteries before engaging in another round of activity. Simply do what's best for you.

You're willing to face any fears that get in your way of finding the pleasure you seek today. Fortunately, the nurturing Moon's visit to sensual Taurus probably feels quite reassuring to you emotional Crabs, enabling you to take a social risk and reveal your desires. However, you don't want others to assume that your current vulnerability is a sign of weakness. Nevertheless, the possible rewards are great if you have courage to lower your boundaries and open your heart.

You intuitively know exactly what you need to do today, and you can be quite determined in the execution of your duties. You are extremely busy with the Moon traveling through your 10th House of Social Responsibility now. However, caution is advised because you could be so stubborn that your agenda actually stands in the way of your progress. Modify your strategy as you go along; being more flexible enables you to keep moving in the direction of success.

Your head may be filled with fantastic ideas today, but many of them might not relevant. At least it's possible to filter out the most superfluous thoughts and concentrate on those that can have real impact. Meanwhile, the Moon's passage through earthy Taurus is a pleasant reminder of your own attachments to the practical side of life. Nevertheless, don't get lazy today or you could miss a significant opportunity. Pick one and take your best shot.

You want to make deep and lasting personal connections now that the Moon is occupying your 8th House of Intimacy. But magic typically doesn't happen overnight; you need to aim high and do the psychological and spiritual work that is required first. Avoid being distracted by superficial interactions. You can benefit the most by holding out for something real. Just remember that true love begins with loving yourself.

Others are likely to make you feel a bit out of sorts now, especially if they aren't moving as fast as you want. Unfortunately, nothing you try seems to speed them along. Meanwhile, you aren't interested in wasting time and dislike the idea of having to wait for anyone else. Take a deep breath and practice being patient. What seems like a good idea today should be much easier to manifest tomorrow.

Your current strategy to avoid a deep discussion about your feelings might actually help you make it through the day. You realize that if you say what's on your mind today, your disclosures could stir up powerful emotions that only lead to an unsolvable disagreement. For now, it's wiser to steer clear of abstract philosophical debates. Focus on the most practical subjects possible to keep the peace.

Getting back to basics makes sense because you are building a foundation over the next several weeks. The Moon is moving through dependable Taurus, a fellow earth sign, and her current visit to your 5th House of Spontaneity could bring you the creative boost that you need. The more you simplify your life now, the easier it will be when the pressure for change returns over the days ahead.

Your inner resolve is strong today and the Moon's sweep through your 4th House of Roots enables you to get in touch with the source of your inflexible feelings. However, this transit might also provoke a bit of anxiety, since you're not necessarily comfortable with such intense emotional encounters. Luckily, you don't need to initiate any particular action-plan yet. The key is to continue digging into your past to recover memories that can teach you something useful about the present.

Although the pace of life might seem to be slowing down a bit, a complicated situation may be intensifying, causing you to worry about it growing out of control today. However, nearly everything becomes more manageable as the steadfast Taurus Moon wends her way through your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Hold on to your most core values and use them to set your course. If you find yourself engaged in a petty conflict now, remember that this, too, will soon pass.

Your desire to do something different may be so strong sometimes that you don't think about the financial aspects of your dreams. Today's Taurus Full Moon highlights your 2nd House of Money, encouraging you to consider the costs of your plan before you decide to go ahead with it. It's smarter to stop and figure out whether or not you can afford your journey prior to packing your bags. Pursuing a goal is quite different from just imagining it.

Your current intensity today could overpower others, but luckily you have the sense to realize that your unrestrained communication might be a bit intimidating. The Full Moon in your sign challenges you to stay connected to your feelings, even if they complicate your life. Although your emotions are uncharacteristically strong, don't try to suppress them just because it's more comfortable. Nevertheless, it's still wise to soften your approach when you ask for what you want.

Your current discomfort might be unavoidable today while the Taurus Full Moon is illuminating your 12th House of Secrets, making it difficult to understand your feelings. However, you may not be able to escape the irrational dimensions of your heart. Even if you are more secure in the logical realm of words, you should still try to overcome your uneasiness. Sharing your emotions with a good friend won't be as hard as you think, and could quickly help transform your resistance into acceptance.

Normally, you worry about what might go wrong before you start a new project, but today you may be ready to jump right in. Fortunately, the Full Moon lights up your 11th House of Social Networking, bringing you much-needed support from your friends and coworkers, even if everyone doesn't share your point of view. Keep in mind that being receptive to other people's perspectives increases your chances for success.

You may believe you can reach your goals if you are persistent today because the determined Taurus Full Moon brightens your 10th House of Status. Unfortunately, others aren't likely to agree with you just because you're passionate about your plans. Nevertheless, you might not be able to escape being in the public eye now. Even if you feel awkward, just be yourself and don't make such a big deal about getting your way. Success could be yours if you just let things unfold at their own pace.

Your confidence receives a much-needed boost today from the determined Taurus Full Moon traveling through your 9th House of Big Ideas. You are very certain that your solution is a viable one, yet your feelings can still distract you from what you need to do. Allowing your mind to wander could turn your accurate observations and excess energy into irrationality and laziness. It's not wise to take on too much now; instead, be smart and work small changes into your daily routine to make the most of the moment.

You can't easily express what you're feeling today because the Taurus Full Moon stimulates your 8th House of Intimacy, possibly activating emotions too strong to put into words. Your fear of being unable to control the direction of a conversation might stop you from saying anything at all. Nevertheless, it still may be more sensible to take a risk and share what's in your heart. Even if you don't get everything you want, you can rest assured that others know exactly where you stand.

Today's dependable Taurus Full Moon lights up your 7th House of Partners, tempting you to rely on someone's support more than you should. Instead of compulsively expressing all your thoughts and feelings because you want his or her approval, consider keeping some things to yourself. Ironically, others find it easier to give you what you need when you are acting more emotionally secure. Ultimately, your most important ally is yourself.

Even if you resist the changes that are unfolding at work, you still might not get your way today. Luckily, the Taurus Full Moon shining in your 6th House of Self-Improvement suggests that you can be happy as long as you aren't too attached to outrageous fantasies. Instead of trying to reach for the stars now, moderate your expectations and seek joy closer to home.

Don't waste your energy worrying about whether or not your current actions will have lasting value. Although today's Taurus Full Moon offers you solid ground on which to stand, the stability seems to be short-lived. Even if the situation changes quickly, what you do now sets the tone for what follows in the days to come. A positive attitude and a constructive plan will serve you well.

Emotional satisfaction can be yours now if you don't get too distracted by your long-term goals. Having lofty ambitions is admirable, but not if they stand in the way of the time spent with your family and friends. Today's Taurus Full Moon emphasizes your 4th House of Roots; instead of worrying about the next big project at work, focus your energy on cultivating the joy in your personal life. There is no better moment than the present to share your love.

Your attention is shifting from what is happening now to thinking more about your future. Nevertheless, you cannot change gears until you've met your current responsibilities. The down-to-earth Taurus Full Moon energizes your 3rd House of Communication, requiring you to be practical, even if you want to fantasize about the distant horizon. Don't avoid your obligations. Demonstrate your dependability first so you can then confidently focus on nurturing your dreams.

You could have a tough time concentrating today, especially if you're doing the same old thing that you've done in the past. But even if you're involved in something new and different, you still may want to shake things up a bit instead of just being productive. Pay careful attention to what you're doing throughout the day or you might end up scattering your energy before you even realize it. Nevertheless, focusing on one project at a time is still your fastest route to satisfaction.

You may be feeling the effects of a financial crunch today, but it's not likely problematic enough to prevent you from buying something you really want. However, a little caution is advised because spending your money impulsively now isn't the smartest strategy. Consider what else you could do with your current resources. Keep in mind that happiness isn't only attainable by the acquisition of things. Money can't buy you love.

Your friends might perceive you as being a bit unfocused today, even if you're able to justify your behavior. You may need to do several things at once and it's not very likely that anyone but you can see how they are all connected. Nevertheless, you are in danger of working too hard and accomplishing less than expected. Thankfully, focusing your intentions and eliminating extraneous activities turns the odds in your favor.

You are usually able to keep secrets without a second thought, but it may be challenging to honor your promises today. However, you're wise to remain quiet and only talk when necessary. There's so much you want to say yet once you open the door, it will be hard to shut it prior to spilling the beans. Remember, you can take the high road now by practicing discretion. Set clear limits and stick to them no matter what.

You are intrigued by the activities of people in your life now, yet your outgoing style and unquenchable curiosity can be a smokescreen to hide emotions that you would prefer to keep to yourself. Fortunately, there's no need to pretend. You don't have to share anything about yourself that makes you feel uncomfortable. Nevertheless, your interactions with others grow more meaningful once you face your fears and authentically communicate what's in your heart.

You are interested in helping others today, but you might not be prepared for the amount of personal interaction that's actually required. You may reach a point where everything seems like a lot of noise and you wish you were able to escape. But once you make yourself available, it's not so easy to retreat. Go on and hold up your end of the deal; it won't last as long as you think and you'll feel really pleased with yourself afterward.

You may be anticipating an exciting getaway for a few days, but making it happen is actually more complicated than you expect. You might end up disappointed with yourself because you can't seem to make a decision today. Wait and see how your commitments play out for a few more days before returning to your idea of scheduling some time off. Even if you end up delaying your trip, your current choices will prove to be sound ones, nonetheless.

It's perfectly natural to want to share your feelings today, even if you previously decided to keep them to yourself. Unfortunately, your current enthusiasm may not last long, especially if you inadvertently raise an issue that's unpleasant for someone else. Although the ensuing discussion isn't necessarily easy, any attempt to gain clarity about a relationship is healthy as long as it's part of an ongoing process. Sometimes a bit of discomfort must be experienced on the way to establishing common ground.

You may feel anxious today if a close friend or partner refuses to be pinned down on an issue that is very important to you now. The dynamics are even more complicated than they first seem, for you might also be secretly relieved that he or she is somewhat elusive. Paradoxically, it's easier to commit when the other person isn't as willing. Luckily, you can avoid a confrontation if you see both sides of this dilemma as dual aspects of yourself.

You have a lot of tasks on your plate at work today, and you may not know exactly where to start. Nearly anything you rush through too quickly could become problematic now, even if there is something else that you should also be doing. There's no reason to feel guilty; you really can't accomplish any more than you promised. Haste makes waste; relaxing your expectations can make a world of difference in your attitude.

Although you could get quite excited by the prospect of enjoying yourself today, it might be challenging to find a willing playmate who meets your approval. You may be able to locate someone available to go along with your idea of a good time, but this doesn't mean he or she will be open to developing a meaningful friendship with you. Don't spend your time on anyone who isn't interested in getting to know the real you. Sometimes the best company is yourself.

You are weary of dreaming about a vacation that never happens and you don't even want to talk about it anymore. Anyway, you have family obligations to fulfill and you realize they need to take precedence over any notions of travel. Forget about escaping from the familiar nest; instead, stay focused on the present moment and see where it leads you next.

You're feeling your oats today and are ready to express your newfound confidence through direct action. Your key planet Mars is supported by the larger-than-life visions of Jupiter, encouraging you to put your very best foot forward. But don't just fall into the more-is-better trap, especially when taking on a new project. It's easier to start off small and expand later than it is to overextend and then have to cut back when you've gone too far.

Normally, you can set a pace and sustain it until you reach your goal. But now you may be so caught up in the excitement of the present moment that you forget about your limits; you might even believe that you are invincible. Fortunately, your actions still could bring good fortune, even if you rush in today before considering the consequences. However, it's tempting to be distracted by the next captivating idea or shiny object. Consciously focusing on a single destination is your best assurance that you'll arrive on time.

You might become involved in stressful relationship dynamics at work today even if you approach the situation with a sense of detachment. Although you can't prevent other people's feelings from impacting your life, you can choose where to put your attention. Thankfully, you're able to distance yourself from someone else's drama if you establish clear boundaries and stick to them. Ironically, you may be most helpful now by retreating enough to maintain your emotional balance so you lead by example instead.

You have enough stamina today to finish whatever you start, so push yourself to accomplish as much as you can. However, your exuberance could pull you in too many directions, mostly as a result of your need for amusement. Remember, the more dedicated you are to your work, the sooner you'll be able to freely apply your excess energy to fun activities. Seize this opportunity to strut your stuff and prove your strength.

Not everyone understands your methods today, but you still may receive the recognition you want anyhow. Meanwhile, you are content to play a role behind the scenes in support of a larger goal now, and naturally, this makes you a better team player. Whether at work or at home, be sure to include others in what you are doing to help your cause. Shining your spirit of generosity won't lead you astray.

Approaching your career goals in a new way might make all the difference in the world. Perhaps you are growing tired of doing something with such regularity that it is beginning to get on your nerves. However, you could find the courage to try an alternate method today. Fortunately, if it doesn't work, you can go back to the drawing board to create another plan. But if it does succeed, this little breakthrough brings you joy during the days ahead.

An uncharacteristic longing for an exotic adventure can impact your daily routine today. Your imagination is more vivid than usual, making it necessary to keep your fantasies to yourself now. There's nothing wrong with escaping into your dream world for a while, but sharing your inner process at work is quite challenging. Unless you want to complicate things at work, wait until you are safely at home before you let your guard down. Reveal your desires only to someone you trust.

It feels as if you know what you need but someone close to you has become a fly in your ointment today, oblivious to your desires. Nevertheless, you're optimistic about your potential; you know that success is yours if you maintain a positive attitude and continue to do the work. If you recently suffered from low self-esteem, it's time to reconnect with a more positive view of you. Leave your doubts behind; set new goals and move boldly toward them.

There's not much that can bring you down today because your key planet Jupiter is receiving an energetic blast from red-hot Mars. Someone might think that you have gone over the top, but you probably believe there is still room for more. For everyone's sake, don't expect anyone to match your level of enthusiasm. Although you may be soaring high above the clouds, remember that other people are still on the ground.

Your behavior gives away your heart's desires today, and there is little you can do to hide what you want. The good news is that satisfaction is within reach, but not if you just assume you should have whatever you wish because you deserve it. Feeling self-confident is a great start, but a positive attitude is not enough on its own; you must earn your rewards now through hard work. Thankfully, you'll be smiling soon enough if you keep the distractions to a minimum.

Expressing your enthusiasm at work is normally a smart strategy, yet it might get you into major trouble now. Unfortunately, knowing you should keep your big ideas to yourself probably won't be much of a deterrent. Luckily, you can minimize conflict if you simply stay aware of everything that's happening around you. However, problems arise when you forget about using your common sense. Others are watching your every move; if they tell you that you're overstepping your bounds, listen to them before it's too late.

You have an enormous reserve of positive energy today, yet you might burn through it without even realizing what you've done. Thankfully, a little caution goes a long way and you can easily remember to conserve your resources now before it's too late. Most everyone is willing to appreciate what you do, but you have such a complex agenda that you could get tripped up by your own desires. The clearer you are about your motives, the better the outcome.

Unfortunately, an uncontrolled slip of the tongue today might create more negativity than you wish. Speaking impulsively today may cause regret, but you cannot take back what you say. Thankfully, paying careful attention to the potential impact of your words prior to opening your mouth could prevent an unnecessary headache later on. Stopping to consider other people's feelings first should be enough to save the day.

There's no reason to be in a hurry today even if you're trying to resolve the tension between you and a loved one. Although you might be feeling a sense of urgency, taking your time may be the most intelligent tactic you can employ now. Thankfully, stressful emotions should settle down on their own, enabling you to process the previously frazzled energy. Don't bother looking for quick solutions. Your inner guide will reveal the best path, but only if you have the wisdom to slow down and wait for the inspiration.

Accomplish as much as possible today, especially since you may grow less ambitious over the days ahead. By working harder you can burn off some excess energy which increases your ability to concentrate on one thing at a time. But don't think that you'll miss something important just because you choose to narrow your focus. Instead of obsessively competing with others for a more dominant role now, perform your job to the best of your ability and then move on to what's next.

If you're worried about the final outcome of a situation, remember that everything unfolds at its own rate and resolution may remain out of reach for now. Luckily, something unusual could happen today that snaps you out of your anxiety, even if no one else wants to acknowledge how much has changed in just a few short hours. You should explain your newfound optimism, especially if others are working hard to hide the truth. Just remember that blame doesn't help your cause. Lead by example to make your point.

You dream about escaping now, instead of facing how much work there is for you to do. Happily, you may be able to sneak away from a few unpleasant chores today by simply going into hiding. However, denial isn't a viable option because it doesn't offer a lasting solution. It's okay to withdraw a bit, but stay grounded and ready to interact if needed. A surprising turn of events might just change things for the better.

Relaxing your focus on work may seem like a good idea but could leave you feeling a bit lost. The Moon sidles into your egalitarian 11th House of Friends this morning, enabling you to maintain a cool demeanor in most social situations. Broadening your horizons and expanding your network gives you and others much-needed hope. But don't allow the present situation to dictate what's real. Open your eyes to all of the possibilities and take a leap of faith.

You might be stressed out by your current need to feel your own power today, especially if someone important seems to be blocking your personal expression. Thankfully, time is on your side now, so don't make up reasons to speed up the pace or you may just have to work harder than necessary. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to add your two cents while you still have something to say that could dissipate the resistance.

A wave of uncertainty grows stronger and may dissuade you from attempting to manifest your dreams. However, this is not a great day to sit back and talk about unrealized potential. Wake up and get going as early as possible because you have a lot of work to do and the sooner you start, the sooner you will finish. You can make solid progress now if you put away your doubts and believe in yourself.

You aren't in the mood to do a whole lot of relationship processing today, but a complex array of circumstances appears to push you in the direction of self-analysis anyhow. Thankfully, you stand to gain crucial insight now, even if you were already sure that you knew the score. Remember, you can't just walk away from your obligations. Thankfully, once you accept the inevitable and consciously face your fears, you could be amazed by how fast things can improve.

Your natural inclination may be to prevent others from seeing your vulnerability by hiding the true you from sight. Nevertheless, you have a deep reservoir of courage; it's time now to dig it up and use it accordingly to stand up to your ghosts of relationships past. Messenger Mercury's supportive sextile to transformational Pluto motivates you to sink to the bottom of the well so you can reinvent yourself out of sight. Just remember that once your inner work is done, the key to growth is in honest communication with those you love.

You might know exactly how to improve your health now, yet you don't want to tell anyone about your current realizations. Worse, you may be tempted to take no action at all, even if change is desperately needed. Luckily, you're smart enough to understand the importance of taking care of yourself. Resist the waves of complacency and break free from the status quo by enlisting the support of someone you trust. Make the most of the power of now.

You may attempt to hide your vulnerabilities from others today and go to great lengths in order to protect your feelings. However, there's no need to be overly dramatic now as you demonstrate your fondness for someone special. Nevertheless, expressing your desires isn't only about clearing the air; it also improves your chances of getting what you want. The squeaky wheel gets the grease.

Even if intense concentration is required at work today, you still may be distracted by a lingering personal issue. Thankfully, you can be so skilled at hiding what's really happening that your associates believe you're doing an amazing job. Accept whatever praise you receive; you don't have to blow your cover -- and you probably deserve the accolades anyway.

You enjoy working out of sight today, as long as you can readjust your action plan a few times during the day. Usually, you're not a great fan of change, but shifting gears is easy now as you respond to what's happening. It's not useful to act as if you have all the answers. Listen to what others are saying and take their wisdom to heart.

Bringing your accounts current might require more time than you have now as the Moon visits your 2nd House of Money. Fiscal change appears to be in the air, but the results of your actions may not come quickly enough for you. However, impatience won't lead to success today. Do what's right and wait for the consequences of your extra efforts to work their magic.

You can be so psychic now that you know what's happening even if no one tells you. Today's Moon in receptive Cancer extends your emotional antennae even deeper into other people's lives. Watch your moods swing back and forth throughout the day, and try not to make any significant decisions that could alter the course of your life. Nevertheless, considering all possibilities might pay off as soon as tomorrow when your optimism returns.

Your day is mixed with paradox because you know that you're on the edge of something big. And although it's exciting to think that there are no limits to your far-reaching ideas now, you might have to face an unexpected obstacle that could feel like a setback. Fortunately, a seemingly insignificant social event can send you in a direction that is very advantageous to your career. Combining business with pleasure isn't always a wise idea, but today it may be just what the doctor ordered for your success.

You might choose to leave your personal worries behind by attending a social gathering today or participating in a team project. Either way, the Moon's current visit to your 11th House of Community allows you to grow beyond your individual needs and to share your expertise with others. Don't miss this opportunity to give something back to your peers. Fortunately, your positive attitude will be reflected back to you sooner than you think.

Although your friends might accuse you of playing the role of a mother hen at work today, your motives are purely altruistic. You want to share your love by taking care of others in the best way possible and the current Cancer Moon encourages you to express your emotions and nurture those around you. Pay close attention to subtle clues so you know when to back off or someone may get the idea that you're just trying to control things, when you're only trying to help.

Instead of letting personal issues overwhelm you now, blow off some excess energy by volunteering for a social cause. You can easily understand complex interpersonal dynamics so don't be afraid to tell others exactly how you feel. Your perceptions are clear and your perspective is balanced while the Moon is moving through fellow water sign Cancer, so there's no need to back down. Even if you make someone uncomfortable, honesty is almost always the best policy.

You are often drawn to philosophical discussions and can usually talk about ideas and concepts with a deep passion. However, you are likely to be more interested in personal issues today as the Moon moves through your 8th House of Intimacy. There's no need to shy away from your emotions, even if they make you uncomfortable at first. Go right to the very edge of the abyss, since your feelings could teach you plenty about life now.

If someone tells you his or her sad story today, you don't have to take immediate action and fix what's wrong. Instead, just be receptive and listen with a sympathetic ear. Your mistaken belief that you have to be in charge and demonstrate your competence only brings dissatisfaction and frustration. Sometimes it's not easy to sit quietly and hold a space in your heart for other people's issues; nevertheless, it's a good idea now to incorporate this compassionate practice into your life.

You're done trying to please everyone else. Instead of playing the role of superhero, be smart, work quietly behind the scenes and stay out of trouble. You can emerge victorious if you are secure enough to allow others to take center stage and receive recognition for their accomplishments. Even if you played a supportive role in someone's success, it may be time to let that go. Learning to love yourself is likely to bring opportunities from somewhere you do not expect.

You might not be very concerned about what others think of you today because you are acutely aware of what makes you happy now. Your clear perspective brings a new sense of emotional power. Nevertheless, you might not be overly eager to express your feelings out in the open. Go ahead and trust in the process; there is a direct correlation between showing your vulnerability and the amount of pleasure you experience later on.

The current shift in your awareness is noticeable today as the Sun begins its visit to your 9th House of Adventure. The thought of doing something exciting makes you smile, although you may not be able to turn your most exotic ideas into a concrete plan. Ultimately, you need to find new ways to express your freedom, so don't be too eager now to surrender it without gaining something in return.

Relationships grow more complicated as the Sun makes its way through your 8th House of Deep Sharing. You want real intimacy now, and may not be as willing to remain with someone just because it's safe. Even if security is important to you, don't take the easy way out. It's not worth sacrificing your needs just so you can be with someone. Being true to yourself now will make you a better partner in the long run.

You may be more willing to open up your heart and share your feelings with a special friend now that the warming rays of the Sun are shining in your 7th House of Partners. Thankfully, others will be quite receptive to your overtures these days. You could be pleasantly surprised that you can find happiness once you remember to express yourself freely without worry or fear of what anyone else might think.

You might have withdrawn a bit over the past couple of days, yet your interactions with others may become much more interesting now. Although your feelings could trigger childhood memories, it's still important to distinguish what happened in your past from the current situation. Allow yourself the chance to connect emotionally with someone you trust to help you through the process. Experiencing give and take in the present moment can greatly enrich your journey.

You are stepping into a fun-filled phase when your life lightens up and you want to express yourself in a more playful manner. Even if it's challenging to find the satisfaction you're seeking, you still might be willing to move forward with anticipation now, rather than close down in fear. It's certainly more pleasurable to be with those you love than spending your time alone wishing for company. Take a chance and invite someone to join you for a memorable experience.

You are not all that interested in overdoing anything, for self-discipline typically comes easily to you. However, today you may need to manage a new set of issues around your current responsibilities and your desire to spend time with your family. Even if you wish you could let your work slide, you still must follow through on what you started prior to partaking in any relaxation or recreation. Meeting your obligations first allows you to have guilt-free playtime later on.

You don't mind being so busy now, but it isn't a smart idea to equate too much activity with happiness. It's challenging to know what is enough or when to stop, and you could exhaust yourself before realizing that you can't keep up with all that you started. Even if your weekend calendar is already set, don't be afraid to cut back on your schedule. It's better to have more free time than not have enough time to do what you want. There's a healthy balance between pleasing others and pleasing yourself.

You have had some intense experiences recently and  thankfully are at the threshold of a more relaxing phase now. Instead of continuing to dig deeper into your feelings, today is a good day to stabilize a current situation. Fortunately, this change of attitude can also be a relief to the people closest to you. Your newfound confidence could have you spending too much money these days, so keep an eye on your resources to make sure you're using them wisely.

It's a smart idea to consciously make use of your birthday month by taking the time to do those things you have set aside because responsibilities called you elsewhere. The bright beams of the Sun shifted into your sign last night, bringing you good luck, new opportunities and exciting adventures. Do what you do best; inspire others by living your life to the fullest.

Concentrating on your work is nearly impossible today because your thoughts are already focusing on the weekend once the Sun shifts into your 12th House of Imagination, encouraging your fantasies to take flight. Your mind is bouncing around all over the place and there doesn't seem to be much you can do to stop it. Instead of resisting the temptation or denying your intuition, give yourself permission to follow your daydreams and see where they lead.

You may receive much-needed support now that the Sun is pushing through your 11th House of Friends. Nevertheless, the dramatic Leo Moon reminds you of just how bored you become if you can't break free from your everyday routine. You are more interested in pursuing creative activities now than showing up for your regular tasks. Be thankful that others are there for you, but don't expect them to help you escape from whatever responsibilities that could be holding you back. If you must show your rebellious nature, be prepared to pursue your dreams on your own.

You could stir up all kinds of trouble today, especially if you start more projects than you can possibly finish. Your smartest approach is to avoid overload and pare back your commitments as much as possible. Don't wait until others have become fully dependent upon you, for it will be more difficult to make changes once they do. However, there's no reason to eliminate all  pleasurable activities or you will likely have regrets later on. Find a way to have some fun without turning your life upside down.

You may receive conflicting signals from your friends today, but upon closer analysis it's probably your interpretation that has gone astray. The bottom line is you must be careful now if you are making plans that have to take other people's needs into consideration. Remember, exercising a bit of compassion helps you move through these tricky times without leaving a trail of hurt feelings. Practice listening with your heart to hear what's actually being said.

Your imagination is taking off as if it has a life of its own. Even though you are usually well-grounded, today you may have some air between the bottoms of your feet and the earth, itself. Be daring and let your vision lead you, but don't lose sight of the practical issues that need your attention. You might not be able to reach escape velocity now, but you can get a clear sense of where you are heading.

Be careful how you use your ability to bend reality today, for you can easily overdo it. Your words inspire others to take action for a good cause, but you may try so hard to motivate them that you stretch the truth a bit too far. Needless to say, this could have the opposite effect that you are seeking. Even if it isn't as glamorous, it's better to stick to the facts to keep your integrity intact.

You have a chance to touch a deep spiritual truth now if you surrender to your intuition, but you might resist because you have too many commitments to fulfill. Nevertheless, your feelings are swirling around and adding a layer of confusion to the situation; but don't get distracted by the apparent inconsistencies in your vision. Just do the best you can meeting your obligations and let the day unfold organically. Happily, you can find meaning wherever you go.

The dynamics of the day may unfold in one of two ways: you might mislead someone or they could mislead you. The confusion could be intentional or simply the result of a misinterpretation. Unfortunately, if you try to steer someone in a wrong direction now on purpose, you will deal with the karmic fallout sooner than you expect. No matter what happens, take the time to clarify anything you don't understand. Asking questions and being open to the answers you receive is your best strategy.

The cause of your symptoms may be elusive if something is bothering you physically today. But even if you're feeling fine, there is still plenty of potential for fuzzy thinking. Normally, you are good at connecting a cause to an effect; however, everything seems to be more nebulous now. Don't let yourself become too frustrated by forcing a solution; it's best to let the uncertainties ride for another day or two before making your move.

Ah, the thrill of love -- or the frustration of realizing that a current attraction is based more on illusion than reality. You can use the magic of infatuation and romance to spark deeper fires of passion, but impulsive attempts to create an enduring relationship from your current feelings may be futile. Enjoy this wonderful experience while it lasts rather than trying to capture it forever.

You may experience a struggle between attachment and separation today. On one hand, you love the idea of having your personal life in order, but you don't want to get too stuck on a particular goal that has the possibility of failure attached to it. You might even sabotage what you have because of your fears. Alternatively, you can work hard toward achieving your goals without becoming obsessive and learn to be satisfied with what you have earned along the way. The choice is yours.

The words flow off your tongue or through your keyboard now in a way that makes you seem more poetic than usual. This can be good news if you are a storyteller, a songwriter or courting a new love. But if your current communications are strictly practical or technical in nature, you might want to reread what you write, for you may not be as clear and straightforward as you think. Creativity is a wonderful thing as long as it doesn't get in the way of the truth.

You don't feel especially comfortable when things get fuzzy -- especially around financial issues. You like to know where you are and where you are going, but this may not be as easy as it sounds. There might be factors now that prevent you from placing a clear value on your current assets. Blind optimism, which isn't normally your style, can get you into serious trouble. Paradoxically, concentrating on your long-term goals today enables you to gain more clarity in the moment.

You've stepped into the fun house at the carnival and now find yourself in the hall of mirrors, where everything is distorted. Nothing is as it appears -- especially you. Your current self-image is far from the truth. If you are using extra makeup today or are spending too much time picking out what clothes to wear, ask yourself what you are trying to cover up. In the meantime, relax and enjoy the show; you will soon be returned to the real world from which you came.

The easy way out works for many people some of the time, but it might not work so well for you today. You're not going to be able to simply dream your escape from an impossible situation. The best way to handle the current conflict between your obligations and your goals is to keep your perspective wide open while simultaneously doing what is expected of you. There will be time later to make the changes you want. Right now, honor your commitments and speak the truth as simply as you can.

You may think your imagination will conjure up a wonderful future on its own, but you could be fooling yourself today. It's true that your fantasies might actually guide you along your way, but your intentions must be grounded in reality or they will remain as castles in the air. Although disappointment occurs if you set unrealistic goals, practical seeds can grow into the nourishing fruits of your labor.

Someone could easily mislead you today, yet it might be your own eagerness to reach your goals that steers you wrong. Perhaps you misunderstand a message based upon what you want to believe rather than what is actually said. Don't waste time being discouraged if the facts comes out differently than you expect. Instead, give thanks that you figured out what's really going on and make whatever adjustments are necessary to put yourself back on track. The truth will set you free.

Stress arises today from trying to balance your playful nature with a more serious side of life. For example, your need to discuss your feelings in a one-on-one partnership might conflict with your fear of being too vulnerable. Or, perhaps, your parenting skills are challenged by changing dynamics at home. In any case, just acknowledge the truth and take the high road whenever possible.

Family matters are still highlighted now, even if your role at home has already undergone a dramatic change. You might be taking yourself very seriously these days, but it appears as if your load is beginning to lightening up. Unexplored alternatives are being put in your path, but these exciting opportunities do not free you from previous obligations. Instead of worrying about what to do today, express what's in your heart -- even if you don't know where it will lead. No one can fault you for being yourself.

You may need to face an unsettling situation today that has you wondering about your role at home or within your community. Don't lose touch with your emotions, even if you are highly analytical when it comes to forming your conclusions now. Although your head and your heart could have wildly different agendas, it's still a wise idea to keep them in balance without favoring one over the other. Even if you follow your bliss, make sure to bring some common sense along on the trip.

You might think that your life is moving right along with progressive Mars traveling through your sign. But you're also aware that your real foundations are built on your beliefs and, perhaps, they are not as firm as you would like. Don't let fear persuade you to hold onto old assumptions just because what you know is more comforting than what you don't yet understand. Embracing the unknown may be scary at first, but it enables you to be open to the amazing potential ahead.

Someone's story could move you so deeply today that you wish you could avoid further conversation to prevent yourself from becoming overly emotional. Thankfully, your imagination isn't restrained now by the facts alone; you're actually able to envision a happier scenario, allowing you to paint a positive picture instead of just responding passively. Be courageous and inspire others with your passionate dreams of change.

Although you long for meaningful social interaction, other people may prefer to keep things more lighthearted today. However, it isn't just business as usual these days and you're not interested in pretending that everything is fine just to satisfy someone else's needs. Nevertheless, don't hesitate to say yes to an intriguing invitation if you think getting together with like-minded individuals might provide a safe container for spiritual exploration.

Embracing reality may be difficult today because your fantasies are flooding your imagination. Ironically, others might not even realize you're on a mental holiday, since they see a more practical side of you that shows up to take care of business. Fortunately, it doesn't require much effort to meet your obligations now. You can continue to gain inspiration from your inner world while simultaneously making progress in the outer world.

A minor run-in with self-doubt could quickly grow out of hand today if you think that you're not traveling on the right path. However, you should be able to refocus your energy by drawing from your deep reserve of willpower. Be bold and imagine your future just as you want it to unfold. But don't expect your dreams to become real unless you're willing to believe in yourself, work hard and focus your attention on one simple task at a time.

It's wonderful when you enhance reality with all your favorite colors, but your cosmetic treatment most likely won't last, possibly leaving you disillusioned at the end of the day. However, since you may drift in and out of your fantasies today, make a concerted effort to discern your dreams from what's actually happening. Be grateful that you get to escape from the mundane world for a while, but don't forget to return to earth so you can gain the satisfaction of meeting your obligations as well.

Your idea of the future might be so warped by your feelings today that you cannot see what's actually around the bend. The Sun's square to elusive Neptune in your sign blurs the facts and challenges you to gather enough accurate data to make a smart decision about your goals. Set aside a specific time when you can lose yourself in your fantasies without feeling guilty. Paradoxically, daydreaming is the key to unlocking the possibilities of the present moment.

On one hand, it might seem as if you're on top of the world. On the other hand, your enthusiasm comes at a price, since it forces you to move away from the deeper understanding that comes from being still. Your natural tendency is to do something that makes you feel as if you're embarking on an amazing adventure. Nevertheless, it may be better now to let the opportunity for fun pass you by, and instead find joy in the quiet emotions you experience alone or in the company of someone you love.

A friend may offer assistance today, but you need to be open to the help. You could be somewhat confused about what's most important now. Make sure you don't let your financial obligations slide or you will be digging yourself out of a mess in a few days. This irresponsible behavior isn't normally your style, but you are distracted by social opportunities that might not turn out as enjoyable as they sound. Demonstrate your determination by following through on whatever you start.

Be wary of people painting pretty pictures and selling you a bill of goods now. If someone brags to you about how great everything will be in the future, take a deep breath and then ask a lot of specific questions. Others may not even realize the extent of their inflationary thinking, but that doesn't mean you need to be their next unsuspecting victim. Retreating from a group interaction for a while enables you to develop the perspective you need to keep yourself on track.

Helping those less fortunate than you may be the most amazing medicine for your heart now. It doesn't matter if you are nurturing your own kids or assisting at your local animal shelter, put your caring nature to good use in a creative way. Don't worry about all the things you're not doing; just do what you can with your limited resources. All sincere actions are positive ones; they will gather momentum throughout the day. Let your heart guide the way.

Your family may be the center of your world now as you start to pull back from other social activities. However, there is a catch, for you could be feeling so restless that you want to shake things up a bit. You're ready for nearly anything, but are restrained by emotional connections on the home front. Make sure that you know what you're getting into before you say yes. All the excitement you need might be right in front of your nose.

You must be extra cautious today when you tell others why you cannot join in their activities. Your own internal resistance makes you more vulnerable if someone pushes you to go beyond your comfort zone. Don't give in too easily. You know what you feel now and no one can change your mind for you. To thine own self be true.

Your energy is buzzing today, even if you didn't drink that second cup of coffee. The down side is that getting enough sleep may be difficult now, as your system is flooded with adrenaline and you are primed for action. Meanwhile, you recognize that you cannot run helter-skelter all over the map. Take the time to check in with your inner GPS and make sure that you're heading in the right direction before you apply the gas.

Your current optimism continues to draw you outside of your protective shell, and if you move strategically, you'll actually feel safer once you've broken through the resistance. You are being supported by the actions of others now, and you have allies working on your behalf. Be aware, however, that all is not as it seems. Act with caution until you know that everything is securely in place. In the meantime, trust your instincts above all else.

Keeping up with all your responsibilities today is challenging. However, worrying isn't very helpful either; everything will be alright if you are careful not to get sidetracked by someone who lures you away from your chosen path. Bring your focus back to the real world or you may sail into the foggy mists of your own fantasies and crash on the rocks. Fortunately, honoring your commitments increases your chances for success.

Although you're feeling a bit pessimistic, today's Mercury-Saturn conjunction can help you to methodically break through an obstacle that's standing in your way. You have enough stamina to accomplish quite a lot now, yet it's hard to know where to apply your energy. Chances are you've already overcommitted your resources, so don't waste time dwelling on your fears. The sooner you get the ball rolling, the more time you'll have later for your own personal pursuits.

You may be tempted to forget about your job-related responsibilities so you can just relax and enjoy the day. However, the problem is you can't let others down when they are relying on you to keep everything on track. Put your best foot forward, go out and do what is being asked of you. It will probably be more fun than you expect once you are in the flow. A positive attitude makes all the difference in the world.

The stresses between the inner worlds and the outer circumstances are very apparent now as you imagine all the possibilities before you. But you cannot move toward your dreams yet, since you have ongoing commitments that just don't seem to let up. Be responsible and do the right thing today, but then allow yourself enough time to pursue whatever brings your heart lasting pleasure.

There is an undeniable gulf between your thoughts and your feelings today. You prefer to rely on relevant information and clear thinking instead of letting your desires dictate a more subjective agenda. Although sticking to the facts sounds good on paper, the truth is that you're better off now if you also listen to your intuition. Balancing your head with your heart helps you to fulfill your highest potential.

It is wise to speak up once you know where your thoughts are taking you. But blurting out a partially formed idea only complicates your life today. Usually, you can slow down and think things through, but your impatience may get the best of you now. Your attempts to sidestep authority or bend the rules won't work. However, you might be pleasantly surprised if you just acknowledge the limitations imposed on you by others. Simply relax and trust the process.

You might not be clear about everything that's happening now, yet you can get to the bottom of a complex situation if you focus on what's important. Although others may think that you're just putting on a show, you don't need to let their assumptions distract you from your real work. Remember, it's not sensible to set aside your strategy if you believe that your plan will succeed. Just don't push too hard; taking small steps is smarter than overreaching and then having to admit you were wrong.
