You wish that everything would happen on time today, but you may be so obsessive about your schedule that you accidentally miss a potentially memorable experience. Letting go of control isn't easy now, but it can be a very powerful antidote to your current inflexibility. Quit trying so hard. When you allow your energy to flow with the currents, magic follows you everywhere you go.

You may want additional recovery time, but you might not be able to find it today. You are being pulled in multiple directions now, yet the real message is to reconnect with the most practical routines. Even if you feel slightly out of step with what's going on around you, this probably isn't a smart time to shift your course. Concentrate on your immediate needs while surfing the waves of change.

The Moon's return to your straightforward earth sign is a reminder to be as simplistic as possible in your approach to life today. Making some changes on the home front may be helpful, but your time is at a premium now. Nevertheless, frustration arises if you let your own needs go unfulfilled for too long. Divide your day so you can take care of your chores first and then move on to more enjoyable activities later.

You can feel the weight of your responsibilities continuing to grow today, tempting you to retreat from non-critical social activities. Still, you are likely to participate in pointed discussions about the very real issues now facing you and your friends. Ultimately, you must decide your level of involvement. Don't blindly accept the rules that someone else makes for you; follow your own intuition, instead.

Your survival instincts kick in today, prompting you to concentrate on an all-too-familiar unresolved issue. But simultaneously, waves of hope wash onto your shore, making your goals appear closer than before. Don't give up; extra hard work will be rewarded. Reaching for satisfaction in your dreams can make a huge difference in the days ahead. What you now imagine has the potential to become your future if you want it bad enough.

You have a natural inclination to aim for the stars, even if an unexpected change in circumstances throws you a surprising curve ball today. Your reaction may be immediate, but don't assume that making a quick decision is better than carefully thinking through all of the alternatives. Others are eager to listen to you and will respect your thought process as long as you consider a variety of possibilities prior to committing to just one.

You are in your own earthy element today because the practical Virgo Moon harmonizes with profound Pluto in your sign as it continues to slowly deconstruct and reconstruct your life. Thankfully, there's no reason to develop several different contingencies; one concrete strategy is enough. Remember, you don't need multiple options now; you only need the chance to follow through with a plan that makes sense.

Circumstances might force you to think about an old emotional issue that's still bothering you. Even if you attempt to evade the problem today, you will just be lured back into the melodrama tomorrow. Since you may not feel very comfortable in this situation, play through the possible conversations in your imagination prior to facing them in real time. A bit of advanced mental preparation now makes it easier to speak from your heart.

You may be feeling a bit more independent these days, but you still must stand up to someone who tries to be authoritative in order to put you in your place. Thankfully, you aren't willing to do as you are told if you can envision more appealing alternatives. Don't take the easy way out; the course of least resistance might not lead you to your goals. Once you know what you want, do whatever is necessary to fulfill your dreams.

You don't like being asked to choose between your professional and personal life. However, your role is changing and your job duties may infringe on your private world more than you prefer. Unfortunately, your resistance to the new arrangement can lead to frustration. Even if you're stressed out today, try to be optimistic about the future without slipping into denial. Facing the current dilemma and dealing with work issues now enables you to maintain a positive attitude about your future.

You aren't one to ignore the facts, but today you may be tempted to avoid the truth to get through a complicated predicament. Thankfully, you can see the positive side of a difficult issue even if it seems irresolvable in the moment. Although the ultimate answer might be just beyond your reach now, going through the motions of seeking a sensible solution helps to boost your confidence along the way to achieving your goals.

You may be struggling to get to the bottom of a complicated situation involving your family, but it's not clear which stories are the true ones. Usually, you're pretty good at discerning fact from fiction, but today you are holding everyone to a higher standard. Don't waste time demanding an unattainable level of accuracy; instead, just do your best with the information you're given. When in doubt, trust your intuition.

Someone may claim you're so gullible that you believe nearly anything -- so think twice before you blindly accept what you are being told today. However, it's not about you being naive; instead, you're capable of seeing the potential where others might just pass it by. Remember, there's nothing wrong with having a positive attitude as long as you check your facts before making assumptions that could get you into trouble. Don't let others rain on your parade.

You can't decide if it's a smart idea to accept additional responsibilities today. A new project could lead to the recognition you want and even to a promotion. But you could underestimate the amount of effort that's required to meet your deadline. Even if the whole deal sounds promising, it's still not wise to make your life more complicated now by taking on more than you can deliver. Take your time to analyze all the facts before making a final decision.

Relying on your common sense can be tricky now because you keep changing your mind as new information comes to your attention. It may be challenging to remain optimistic, yet it's important to consider if you are actually fooling yourself. You can see the world through two different lenses today. One makes everything appear better and the other one makes things look worse. Keep in mind that the truth is found somewhere in the middle.

Laying your feelings on the line is never easy, but if you don't share what's on your mind today, your frustration could push you right to the edge. Fortunately, everything will become easier for a while once you choose to share whatever you were hiding. You still have a lot of work to do, but you can accomplish anything if you truly believe in yourself. Trusting the process isn't as great a risk as it seems.

Although the overall prognosis may be quite excellent today, you still have to face your own shadow before you can fully realize the potential that's all around you. This isn't about any one specific interaction or a single decision you're required to make. Your attitude is directly impacted by your thoughts; if you believe that you are successful, then you are. Put your amazing intensity to work and make something magical happen now.

Your extra efforts will likely pay off with a bonus check, the possibility of a promotion or at least words of praise. But it isn't very smart to think that the world owes you something, for you aren't entitled to rewards you haven't earned. Ultimately, you won't do as well if you believe personal satisfaction is guaranteed. Stop worrying about what you want in the present moment and set your sights on a more significant long-term goal. Once you have a plan, get to work.

You may not understand why no one has acknowledged you today for your positive contribution. You feel as if you're doing well responding to all the stressful circumstances, and you know that you deserve more credit now than you're currently receiving. Nevertheless, your lesson is that accomplishing your goals requires more time than you initially expected. Thankfully, once you accept that success take time to achieve, you might not be so frustrated in the moment. Find comfort in a job well done.

You want to be known as a considerate friend who puts the wishes of others first. But taking care of everyone's needs except your own isn't a path to happiness. Unfortunately, you could be so involved with doing what's right that you inadvertently overlook the much-needed support of an ally. Show your vulnerability by acknowledging that you have needs, too, and you don't always know the best way to get what you want.

You might appear quite enthusiastic about something you are doing today, but you could just be hiding your fears for the sake of simplicity. You may feel as if there are no correct answers anyway, but don't let this concern stop you. Instead, respond to the current stresses by showing up with an open heart, even if you don't have a long-term plan in place. It turns out that living in the present moment is the best possible strategy you could have now.

You might hit a few emotional speed bumps if you move too fast today. Even if your life is running smoothly, you would be wise to pay attention to a potential problem before it creates trouble. If you're not careful, your enthusiasm may get the best of you and you could even go too far. Remind yourself throughout the day that your high energy can make others uncomfortable. Tempering your exuberance with a little common sense enables you to lead with your heart while still acknowledging the needs of everyone else.

Enjoying the finer things in life now without overdoing it isn't as easy as it sounds. You may be tempted to eat or drink more than you should or to spend more money than you have. Thankfully, you don't need to let these warnings prevent you from having a wonderful time. Go ahead and joyfully indulge in a bit of sensory pleasure, but make sure that you don't push your limits too far.

You may feel like a million bucks today; you're at the top of your game when it comes to dishing out your clever repartee. You can easily put your best foot forward and then do your famous verbal tap dance to impress others. However, you might be too smart for your own good now. The power of positive thinking only works if you don't push the envelope beyond what's socially acceptable. Taking a calculated risk is a good idea as long as you're ready to abandon your plans if they go awry.

You can communicate quite effectively today, even if you would rather withhold your emotions. You should be able to manifest your dreams if you just let your intuition take over. However, there's a delicate balance between your ideals and what you actually achieve. Your romantic fantasies may now be realized, but you must give voice to your feelings or you won't get what you need. Be brave and speak from your heart.

Letting your errant feelings out into the open can be stressful today, for your current needs might appear out of character for you. Nevertheless, it's nearly impossible to adjust your desires to what others are willing to give. Meeting someone halfway begins with listening rather than just stating  what you want. Finding a way to be emotionally flexible now will better your chances of having a memorable day spent with those you love.

You might prosper in love today, but circumstances could stress you out, nonetheless. Normally, you are careful about what you say and what you eat, but now you are tempted to overindulge. As long as you aren't concerned with making these pleasures last, this can be quite an amazing day. But tomorrow may not be as pleasant when you realize what you've done in the name of immediate gratification. Paying attention to your limits makes more sense and won't detract from your fun.

Going out of your way to consciously perform random acts of kindness can make your day much more pleasurable. Even if you're just chatting with your friends today, your optimism encourages those around you. Your spirit of generosity is reflected back to you in the form of greater freedom, more expansive thinking and heightened creativity. Something special will happen if you continue to express love and beauty in an altruistic way.

Say whatever's on your mind today because the planets can maximize the positive impact of your words. Even if you have felt unforgiving in the past, it may be the right time now to reassess the situation. Relationship issues are best tackled with a loving and supportive approach, but behind the serious talk is your desire to bask in the glory of love. Be extra sweet to someone you cherish and the positive repercussions will ripple back to you quickly.

You like to dream big and your fantasies are over the top today, enticing you away from a more practical approach. Your key planet Jupiter is overstimulated by sensual Venus and mischievous Mercury, encouraging you to partake in one too many social activities. There's nothing wrong with indulging in the fun, but don't go overboard. Steer clear from jumping to conclusions before you logically think your vision all the way through.

Your organizational skills are operating at peak efficiency, but you could become distracted today and gloss over a few important details. Although you can clearly see the whole picture, it's difficult to stay on track as temptation tests your self-discipline. It might be too easy to let your responsibilities fall to the wayside now as you seek the pleasure in your life that may be long overdue. Balancing work and play is your best approach -- as long as you lean toward having fun.

You want to be appreciated for your actions today and your current routine may send you off in an entirely different direction than you imagined. However, this isn't a great time to trust your intuition, for you might be attracted to the easiest path instead of the smartest one; your sense of proportion is slightly bent out of shape. Remember, it's less important to be recognized now than it is to feel good about what you've done. True self-esteem comes from within.

It's all too easy to become obsessed with the ideas, myths and religions of another culture as expansive Jupiter harmonizes with mental Mercury in your 9th House of Distant Places. Falling in love with someone or something is quite possible now. Opportunities for pleasure are knocking at your door, but they won't wait around forever. Enjoy each experience for what it offers, but don't ruin it by trying to make it permanent.

You may go out of your way to communicate your desires today, but you could take things to an extreme. People might even grow annoyed if you aren't willing to meet them halfway. Fortunately, your good intentions should be enough to smooth over any ruffled feathers. But others won't be able to hold a grudge if you simply tell the truth with kindness. You really don't have to negotiate away your need for independence. Just remember you can still be considerate while honoring your integrity.

Being able to trust your friends means the world to you. Even if you disagree about something important today, it's better if everyone openly shares what's on their minds. However, your tendency to gloss over difficult emotions now can create problems down the road. Take extra time to check in with your heart to make sure that you know what you  want, even if it's inconvenient. Being completely honest paves the way to true intimacy.

Giving up on a good idea today sounds easier than it is, even if you know you cannot add one more item to your list of tasks. The lingering positive energy from yesterday's easygoing Mercury-Jupiter trine continues to remove obstacles from your path and increases your optimism. However, your resources are limited and you could exhaust yourself trying to deliver on all your promises. Paring back your activities optimizes your efficiency and improves your chances for success.

It's easier to talk about what you're capable of doing today than it is to actually follow through with decisive actions and get concrete results. Accordingly, it may be smarter to spend your day engaging in meetings, making phone calls and writing emails, rather than executing your plans. Networking with potential supporters now can help you develop an effective strategy. Figure out the best way to reach your goals and prepare to make your move.

You're feeling on edge today because you know that something big is brewing but you can't yet tell what's around the next bend. Although your positive attitude works in your favor, you're also worried that you aren't in complete control of your destiny. Fortunately, you have more stability now than you realize, so just let the current events flow without trying to direct every single outcome. Trust the universe and let the Force be with you.

You may believe that anything you can imagine is possible. Although clever Mercury is beginning to settle down today, your thoughts are still flying all over the place. Just remember that you're not invincible, so don't fill up your life with plans based on unrealistic dreams. Reach for the stars, but don't lose sight of your valuable common sense. There's nothing wrong with setting ambitious goals now as long as you also keep your feet firmly planted on the ground.

You would love to get by with less hard work now that the reflective Moon is back in your sign. However, you could end up wasting precious time and energy today if you believe that an ingenious shortcut will get you to where you're going faster than taking the tried and true path. But these days your most reliable approach comes from setting a manageable pace early in the day and then sticking with it as best as you can. Slow and steady wins the race.

You're feeling your oats today because mischievous Mercury in your sign harmonizes with joyful Jupiter in your 5th House of Fun and Games. You might not be able to forget about all the serious issues in your life, but at least you can put them into a healthy perspective that allows you to have a good time no matter what else is going on. Ultimately, the choice is yours; either focus on all the uncertainty or make a temporary escape and enjoy the power of now.

You still have secrets to keep, yet it may be a struggle to remain quiet for much longer. Nevertheless, it's more important to honor your commitments, even if you feel comfortable enough to spill the beans. You might be able to see the positive side of sharing everything you know, but it's not your decision to make now. Take the high road and don't stir up any unnecessary trouble yet; wait a few days until the Moon is back in your sign before reconsidering your options.

Engaging in small talk is just a waste of time today; you're eager to dig into the core of the matter. You aren't interested in acting diplomatically now, even if you realize that it can help you obtain what you want. Thankfully, your friends and associates appreciate your direct and honest approach, so follow your instincts and get down to business without beating around the bush. The early bird gets the worm.

The most boring tasks can morph into lots of fun if you only adjust your perspective. Luckily, the potential for sudden change is still growing. Unpredictable Uranus is in the spotlight today, shocking you with new and exciting experiences -- even if you have routine responsibilities to handle before you move on to the more pleasurable stuff. Stay focused and get your work out of the way quickly so you have time to expand your horizons by pursuing other interests that bring you personal satisfaction.

You appear very positive today, even if you're holding some doubt in reserve while you vacillate between optimism and worry. However, others won't likely sense your uncertainty, especially if you think it's to your advantage to hide your lack of confidence. Ultimately, it's in your best interest if you can find enough courage to share your fears with someone you trust, for they will most likely dissipate once you've given them voice.

There are so many options available now that it could be difficult to decide what to do first. In fact, you may be dreaming about things that you don't normally let yourself imagine. It's as if your nerves are standing at attention, waiting for the next thrill to come their way. Don't try too hard to hold this energy back or you might explode. Find a healthy way to make use of this adrenaline rush through physical exercise or conscious meditation.

You normally trust your senses over your feelings, but now your emotions might stand in the way of rational behavior. Your energy is tightly wired today and your jumpiness may be making you ill at ease, especially if you try to hold still. Sometimes your cage needs to be rattled -- especially when your relationships become too rigid. But don't wait for lightning to strike. Instead, preemptively stretch your boundaries and practice being more flexible in both mind and body. Take a walk on the wild side.

It's quite a rush to stand at the edge of an emotional cliff. You want action now and may be drawn toward adventure and freedom. You feel as if you're up for nearly anything, but your current enthusiasm doesn't necessarily mean that you should follow every whim. Your flirtatious behavior could attract someone who is different from your usual preference. The danger of the day is only in how quickly and unconsciously you respond to your own desires; slow down and make your feelings last.

It's one of those rare days when you're not interested in remaining safe and secure within your protective shell. It's not that you're in emotional denial; it's just that you feel grounded enough now to step outside your own cave for a breath of fresh air. If you've been holding back on expressing your needs, this might be an opportune time to bring them out into the open. Although others may be quite surprised at first with your current disclosure, ultimately they'll appreciate you stretching out of your comfort zone.

You can operate in unorthodox ways today without creating too much of a stir. It's as if you've been given permission to be weird and unpredictable. However, you might take your rebellious attitude too far, especially if you think that you're being misunderstood. Instead of slowing down to explain your intentions, you could work yourself up into a tizzy because you don't want to accept the status quo. Fortunately, you can shine your light brilliantly now as long as you take a moment to consider the consequences of your actions.

You might develop nervous anxiety from the unusual thoughts and feelings you are experiencing today, especially if you don't have the benefit of immediate feedback from a trusted friend. Normally, your common sense prevails when it comes to issues of the heart, but you may be feeling a bit hot under the collar now. You could try to ignore your emotions, but paradoxically, they won't go away until you pay them some attention. Writing in a journal is a great way to engage the process without creating additional drama.

This is your chance to be radically different; even if you are a bit conservative in your taste, you are tempted to flirt with the edge now. It's as if you need to make a bold statement to prevent others from putting you into a nicely wrapped box. Your actions may surprise those close to you, but don't let their reactions stop you. You've done enough according to the book, so throw those manuals away. It's time to embrace the unknown and make it up as you go along.

You might believe you need an emotional meltdown to clear the air today, but just as everything starts to rumble, the skies open up and you are released from your mundane troubles. However, your desires are still a bit erratic as you are simultaneously attracted toward attachment and independence. A relationship that allows you the full freedom to acknowledge whatever you feel is ideal, but you may create more trouble than is necessary if you act on every whim that crosses your mind.

You have to sink down into the depths in order to release a negative charge that has turned into an unhealthy anchor in your life. You may think you can simply cut the emotional ties that bind you and be free, but it's never that simple. This radical strategy isn't about making a quick escape; it's about finding a way to put passion back into your life and doing something that makes you feel fully alive. Fortunately, you receive some cosmic help today from irrepressible Uranus. Spontaneity is your friend; be here now.

You're on the edge of something big, and as a sure-footed Goat, your first inclination is to step back so you won't fall. You're not normally the one to jump off the cliff, unless you are properly trained for climbing and fully tethered. Now, however, there is something inside you that wants to shed all the restraining ropes and fly. If you really believe in yourself, take a leap of faith and don't look back.

Lightning may strike suddenly and change your social standing today as your key planet Uranus is activated by the radiant Sun. New relationships can create a whole different set of circumstances that revitalize your network of friendships. Although your intuition is working overtime now, don't ignore your common sense because it's easy to get swept up in a wave of excitement and find yourself in over your head. All will turn out well if you remember to keep a healthy balance between calculated risk and potential reward.

The planets are encouraging you to use your rich imagination while developing new career objectives. However, making money could become an annoying source of confusion now. Just because you are captivated by a particular goal doesn't mean that it's your most sensible destination. Keep in mind that you always feel more alive when following your heart. Integrating your dreams into your real life may not happen overnight, but today is as good a time as any to get the ball rolling.

A current bout of anxiety may be the most recent recurrence of a very familiar story as you struggle to be happy without giving up whatever you already gained. Your frustration triggers your natural tendency to act without thinking; however, impulsive reactions won't bring you any closer to your goals today. Don't assume that everything will change immediately; risk-taking only pays off if you consider all your options first.

What appeared to be a sound idea yesterday might not be so appealing today, especially if someone is pressuring you to make a commitment. Nevertheless, you are tempted to step beyond your usual limits because you're bored of doing the same old thing. Make a rational choice instead of setting aside your common sense and then regretting it later. Just remember that a little self-discipline works in your favor.

Don't lose sight of your responsibilities even if you're itching to do something crazy today just to get your adrenaline pumping. Although you don't want to turn your life upside down you could make a hasty decision that is overly disruptive. The temptations are all around you and you are capable of talking yourself into nearly anything now. Instead, listen to your inner voice of reason; be certain to fulfill your obligations first before heading out to look for excitement.

Sharing your thoughts about a household project can put you in the spotlight today, but be ready to pare back your big plans if you meet too much resistance. It's not worth exhausting your energy just to fight a battle that can't be won. Nevertheless, this doesn't mean you should give up on your dreams. Your current task is to create a path based on compromise without negotiating away your vision. A solid solution may seem elusive now, but persistence will move you in the right direction.

You don't want to be the serious one now, especially if you have already been playing an authoritative role for a while. Thankfully, you could have a chance to demonstrate a different approach today -- a new and improved version of you is ready for action. However, if you're having trouble letting go of control, try increasing the quantity of fun-loving people in your immediate environment. A little laughter goes a long way toward healing what ails you.

You've made some important choices recently, but now you may see new options that weren't available before. You could grow frustrated if you think you made a bad decision. However, you have an opportunity to make additional changes today, even if that means temporarily complicating your life even more. Remember, your situation might suddenly change again. Don't fall into the trap of thinking that you're stuck since your attitude can actually create the positive results you seek.

You often live up to your reputation of being indecisive, but today you're overly eager to make a choice. Instead of moderating the extreme options by bringing them toward the center, you can't wait to jump one way or the other. You may be worried that you don't have enough time to weigh all the alternatives before making up your mind. An objective approach is usually the best strategy, but now it's more important to make your judgment quickly and then move on.

Measuring your personal success against someone else is not a productive use of your time, yet it still may be difficult to avoid such comparisons today as you try to figure out what to do next. But assessing your current position isn't all that simple because you can overvalue or underestimate whatever you bring to the situation. Changing your mind quickly takes its toll on others, but don't stop your decision-making process even if they aren't comfortable with your volatility. To thine own self be true.

Your opinions are emotionally charged today and your thoughts singularly focused, but your actions may not be aligned with your words. You might run wild without knowing where to begin; regaining control seems nearly impossible. Unfortunately, your usual supporters can make things worse now by distracting you from your agenda. Nevertheless, you have the skills to stay on track, and it's your choice to use them. Take a few deep breaths and step back from the chaos to clear your mind before starting again.

Concentrating on one thing at a time may be a real struggle now as trickster Mercury dukes it out with ruthless Pluto in your sign. But even if circumstances seem to be out of control, you don't have to be pulled into dramas that aren't yours. Instead of scattering your energy today, make a list of the unfinished business you want to complete. Once you have prioritized your tasks, you have your work cut out for you. Put your blinders on and get busy.

You are aware of trivial problems that are tied to deeper issues today and you're prepared to delve into a sticky situation in order to reach the bottom. But your strategy might not go so smoothly, especially if someone has a different idea of what you should be doing. You're not likely to walk away from your search without a fight, but your sense of urgency isn't necessarily based on reality now. Slow down; you can always return to your investigation later if you still feel the need.

Something needs to give as your professional and personal goals clash today. You want to take care of relationship issues but thinking about your week ahead could stress you out. Try not to push for an ultimate solution now. But, remember that avoidance isn't a viable strategy, either. Even if you don't know the answers to your current questions, radical honesty might be the key that brings you peace of mind.

You can go so far today fueled only on your boundless optimism that you could stir up some unexpected resistance, especially if you're behaving outrageously. Although you may overlook a critical fact with the cavalier Sagittarius New Moon activating your 9th House of Big Ideas, your current intentions are strong enough to overcome challenging odds. Acting on a strong conviction is healthy, but it's not necessary to spend energy defending your position with hollow words. Let your work speak for itself.

Including another person in your plans could be quite advantageous now that the fun-loving  Sagittarius New Moon lands in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. However, you must be open to what your partner wants, too. A positive attitude is always an asset, but it won't be enough today unless you pay close attention to the facts. Don't minimize what you're told because slipping into a dreamy space of denial won't help you reach your goals. Keeping your feet firmly on the ground is just as important as knowing your destination.

A personal relationship may be infused with exciting energy today because the fiery Sagittarius New Moon falls in your 7th House of Others. Or, perhaps, someone might enter your life now and inspire you with possibilities of creating something very special. Either way, it is your responsibility to transform your dreams into reality by releasing previous expectations and allowing the power of the moment to work its magic.

You want to accomplish a lot of work today, but you could underestimate the amount of effort required to meet your obligations. You're up for the challenge because the optimistic Sagittarius New Moon occurs in your 6th House of Employment, but you also might discover that you're in over your head. If you suddenly realize that you overcommitted your resources, taking out your bad judgment on others isn't a useful strategy. Instead, be up front about your predicament and ask for assistance. You may be surprised at how quickly your real friends rush to your rescue.

You may feel like letting loose and kicking up your heels today with the playful Sagittarius New Moon charging up your 5th House of Fun and Games. You might be so eager to enjoy yourself that you temporarily forget about your previous commitments. But don't be overly concerned now; you will finish everything even if you have to work harder later. Give yourself permission to truly enjoy the present moment while expressing your gratitude as often as possible.

Your philosophical perspective and realistic attitude can have a very positive influence on those around you. But you would prefer to focus on the good news today rather than the bad. Even if your actions portray the purest of intentions, your self-criticism might be harsh and you may fall short of your own expectations. Today's Sagittarius New Moon energizes your 4th House of Emotional Security, so don't be too rough on yourself. Simply do your best while leaving enough time to enjoy the company of those you love.

You're quite appreciative of your closest friends and family now because their presence adds so much joy to your life. Thankfully, the Sagittarius New Moon lands in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, so anyone can inspire you just by initiating an interesting discussion. Although you might prefer to narrow your focus, everyone around you will be happier if you are flexible and allow the day to carry you along on a wonderful ride without worrying about your destination.

You find it challenging now to separate your philosophical views about personal wealth from any judgments that you might have of yourself. You may appear certain of your current financial choices, but it's still wise to exercise a little caution with the zealous Sagittarius New Moon falling in your 2nd House of Money. All the details haven't surfaced yet, so don't draw any premature conclusions. In the meantime, don't underestimate the value of the connections you have with those who care about you the most.

You might believe you're on a roll, especially if you have a lot to be thankful for today. But the happy-go-lucky Sagittarius New Moon could inspire you to feel so enthusiastic about what may come next in your life that you are a bit sloppy with the execution of your plans. Instead of building your entire future on a dream, make certain that your strategy is grounded in reality. Success requires equal parts of creative imagination and hard work.

It's not that you want to rain on anyone's parade; it's just that you value your integrity more than your desire to project hope. Nevertheless, you could set aside your high standards today while you encourage everyone to create his or her own vision. The Sagittarius New Moon occupies your 12th House of Fantasy, so don't take the easy way out by glossing over the truth just to go along with the crowd. Hold on to your level-headed approach, even if others don't always appreciate what motivates you. Only you can decide which path you should follow.

You have a cheerful attitude and it seems as if everyone's taking notice now that the exuberant Sagittarius New Moon activates your 11th House of Social Networking. You're very easygoing today and don't require a lot of maintenance. You might even prefer to have a memorable time with your friends without being the center of attention, instead of putting yourself through performance anxiety. Even if you shirk the spotlight, you will still be recognized for the joy you bring to others.

You have a strong desire to know where you are heading in your chosen profession now that the Sagittarius New Moon emphasizes your 10th House of Public Recognition. Your general career path may be the topic of a hot discussion today, but don't try to reach any final decisions or make a detailed action plan for what comes next. The greatest limitations at this time can arise from within your own mind. Instead, just go ahead and  dream big because nearly anything is possible if you simply believe in yourself.

The seas are calm today, you have a gentle wind in your sails and the world is your oyster. Even if you require assistance, others will come to your rescue with exactly the skills and resources you need. If someone offers help, don't exhibit false pride; acknowledge your predicament and say yes. Ultimately, being thankful for whatever generosity you receive now allows everyone to feel good about participating in your success.

If you were a dancer, you would tell exquisite stories with your movements today, but you currently prefer to rely on words to get your message across. However, rather than being passionate about sharing your ideas, you secretly wish you could be chilling out. Unfortunately, pleasure may seem far away and you probably won't be able to avoid meeting your obligations. Thankfully, the sooner you start your chores, the quicker you will finish.

You may wonder if a certain partnership is worth the trouble today, but unresolved issues seem to come together just in the nick of time. It's easier to discuss your concerns openly now since people won't likely take your accurate perceptions in a negative manner. Pick a subject and get the conversation rolling. Stick to the chosen topic because you cannot afford to waste energy being scattered by other people's ideas. Tell the truth; even if your honesty temporarily raises the stress level, everything will settle back down soon enough.

Your positive attitude has a motivating effect on your coworkers today, but your optimism could be slightly misleading. Although you might have concerns about the quality of the job you're doing, you may still appear so sure of yourself that others don't offer their assistance because they believe you're on track. Be specific and clearly ask for help if required. Fortunately, the support you want will be forthcoming, but not unless you're completely honest about what you need.

You have big ideas about relationships now, and you believe that your good intentions can overcome any obstacles. The evocative Moon's presence in your 5th House of Creativity emphasizes your innate need for spontaneity and drama, even if it means that your actual productivity suffers today. However, obtaining tangible results may not be as important to you as sharing what's in your heart with those you love.

You're pulled in two different directions today as the exuberant Sagittarius Moon encourages you to think big, while your natural instincts tell you to maintain a methodical approach when making plans. This internal conflict might make you hesitant to get too caught up in the excitement of the day, even if you want to jump in and join the fun. Keep in mind you can actually accomplish more than you realize by consciously limiting your overall expenditure of time and money. Moderation is key.

It appears that you have a busy day ahead of you, so you might not be able to truly relax until the evening when you are finally caught up with everything. People seem to infringe upon your personal space now, even if they mean well. Oddly enough, you don't mind all the distractions today; they could even inspire you to explore new avenues of self-expression as you interact with others. Enjoy the social noise while it lasts, since tomorrow will likely be much quieter.

You may have ambitious plans to revamp your finances and if your goals survive today's reality check, then you can be assured they are in the ballpark of plausibility. But if current events shake your security or stress your cash flow, set aside your big ideas and refocus your attention on the present moment. Ultimately, here and now is more important than then and there.

Nothing -- not even the facts -- is likely to prevent you from seeing amazing possibilities in every situation today. Your opinions might be so strong now that you disbelieve what's in front of your eyes in order to preserve the big picture. Although you can easily soar through the day, being motivated by unrealistic visions isn't necessarily healthy. Adjust your plans willingly, based upon what you learn, instead of waiting until it's too late.

Your vivid imagination spurs you on today with full-spectrum bursts of inspiration, but you can quickly see where you are overextended. Paring back your dance card is a smart strategy, since it's better now to have one or two excellent partners rather than many mediocre ones. Your discernment is a powerful secret weapon, so use it carefully. Seek quality over quantity for the best outcome.

Staying on target is tricky now, because your mind naturally drifts off into the distant future. Although you feel highly creative today, following a single project through to completion is tougher than starting a new one. Don't let others tempt you off course. Even if their activities sound like a lot of fun, abstaining from them allows you to take care of your business in a timely manner. Work now, play later.

Displaying a more compassionate side at work may be scary today, yet it's healthier to face your fears so you can overcome them. Others see you as the source of a much-needed solution, but you might be hesitant to share what you know. There's no need to talk until you feel it's totally safe to express your opinions, especially if they are still in the process of development. Your intuition will tell you when the time is right.

You're willing to work harder now because you think that your current ambitions have a better chance of being realized. But it's not just because you are eager to put in the extra effort to accomplish more. It's as if you're tapping into something mysterious that adds power to everything you do. Keep in mind that fulfillment of your dreams may take longer than you wish, but believing in yourself today is certainly the first step to success.

You have an extra amount of patience that you can call on today, but it's not because you are so saintly. Actually, you know what you want now and are ready to do whatever is necessary to reach your goals. If it is advantageous for you to push extra hard, you will. But if playing the waiting game is what's required to bring satisfaction in the long run, then that's exactly what you'll do. Just be sure that your dreams are worth your time and effort.

You take your own plans very seriously today and you expect everyone else to do the same. However, you may not be so quick with your snappy comebacks now because you realize that you have a chance to experience something you might normally miss. Instead of relying on your clever repartee, sink into a meaningful emotional dialogue as you would a luxurious fantasy. But remember to play for keeps because this opportunity for connection is real.

Although you might think about ways to minimize your heavy workload today, someone else may successfully convince you to reconsider your plans. Taking time to reevaluate your current motives is a good idea, but don't get duped into doubting your ability to make the right decision. Remember, people are counting on you. Nevertheless, listening to your instincts now is smarter than solely relying on others for guidance.

You may feel a little awkward as your lighthearted spirit and playful attitude begin to fade. You aren't necessarily looking for additional responsibilities today, yet others might be putting too many expectations on you, anyhow. However, there's no need to waste energy worrying now since you still have some very pleasant times ahead, even if you have to tackle some less enjoyable tasks first. Take your mind off your current situation by concentrating on the rewards that are just around the next corner.

If you are overly anxious because something seems out of whack, rest assured that a shift toward stability is now in the works. But don't expect all your problems to just disappear since your newly discovered center of gravity brings its own intensity. Nevertheless, you should be able to enjoy yourself today, no matter what stressful situations you might face. Instead of seeking your answers in the outer world, find a peaceful place within where you can reconnect with your higher self.

You might try a stoic approach to a complex situation that involves a family member or very close friend. Even if you believe that the most intelligent strategy is to keep your emotions in check now, it may prove impossible to prevent them from showing. Ironically, it could be that expressing your feelings without editing them is exactly the catalyst that's needed to resolve the current emotional drama. Don't hold back; respond directly from your heart.

You are in a better position now with respect to harvesting the fruits of your labors. But your current success isn't only about your career; it has just as much to do with the overall satisfaction you feel about your personal life, even if it is still far from your vision of perfection. Instead of wasting energy focusing on what is lacking, express your gratitude for every single thing that brings you happiness in the present moment.

Obviously you want the good times to roll on forever, but, of course, they cannot. Thankfully, this doesn't mean that you're headed for troubled waters; it's just that your over-exuberant energy needs to mellow out for a while. When you consider your recent experiences, you can't help but realize how many wonderful blessings are present in your life, even if there are no fireworks currently lighting up the sky. Fortunately, you don't have to wait for something major to happen; share your love with those in your life who deserve it right now.

An emotional interaction can wake you up today and remind you of something that you have been trying to avoid. Luckily, you don't have to fix everything that needs changing all at once. It's better to be a silent observer now than to push your agenda forward in a way that might not bring you any closer to happiness, anyway. Simply being more aware is sufficient to start. Letting your feelings play through as naturally as possible allows the transformation to happen on its own.

You might decide to go into hiding now as the reflective Moon visits your reclusive 12th House, although your need for seclusion won't likely last long. Nevertheless, treat this urge for solitude with respect, especially if you have been a social butterfly recently. But don't confuse your current desire for privacy with moodiness. Although creating healthy boundaries is a great way to replenish your spirit, there's no reason to feel alone in the universe.

You aren't overly concerned with what you're supposed to do in the real world today because your dreams have grown too special to set aside. It's crucial to understand that your happiness is not dependent on acquiring more material wealth. Instead of focusing on your professional ambitions now, surround yourself with friends who encourage your spiritual growth and are willing to stand by you no matter what. Spread your wings and fly.

Even if your feet are planted firmly on the ground today, your mind is beginning to drift out toward the distant edges of the universe. You have relentlessly paid attention to your thoughts in order to get to the source of your current feelings. Now it's time to simplify your thinking and free yourself from previous emotional burdens. Fortunately, making the shift might actually be  easier than it sounds once you truly let go.

Your obstinate behavior could overpower your good intentions now that the evocative Moon is in traditional Capricorn. Practicing mental flexibility is a smart strategy today, but it may be easier said than done. Nevertheless, keep reminding yourself that a stagnant mind can dam up the waters of creativity. Thankfully, an open mind allows your fertile imagination to flow with lush motivational ideas.

You are taking a more philosophical approach to relationships now that your key planet Mercury is visiting your 7th House of Partners. But you won't likely be satisfied with emotionally detached discussions unless they have a direct impact on your life. You want to see real progress, so move your conversations out of the theoretical realm and into the present moment. Choosing your words carefully improves the chances of deepening a connection between you and someone special.

Colleagues at work may be a source of tension now as they pressure you to modify your plans and take a different course of action than you initially intended. You probably can rationalize your strategy to yourself, but it's more challenging to convince others that they should cooperate with you. It might be better to bite the bullet and do what is expected today, even if only to buy some temporary peace and quiet. Return to your original ideas later when there's less resistance all around.

You're on the edge of something amazing and you can feel it right to the bottom of your feet -- even if you don't yet know what it is. You may be a bit frightened at the magnitude of the changes ahead, but holding on to your past never seems to make you happy for long. Keep wiggling your toes in anticipation of what's next because your agility will suddenly become very handy when it's time to make your move. But don't rush the start; you will know when to act if you trust your instincts.

You're turning into quite the philosopher these days, which may be somewhat out of character for you. Normally, you like to focus on the most practical applications of your analytical thinking, but now you don't have to be so concerned with the mechanics of the real world. This strategy isn't an excuse for sloppy thinking. Stay sharp and let your thoughts roam free without taking any action yet.

Your emotions are intensifying and it's crucial to stick with the inner process, even if it makes you feel vulnerable with those closest to you. Sometimes you take the easy way out of an emotional dilemma, for you often see both sides of an issue. However, your basic values could be at stake now, so don't be afraid to speak with integrity. You can learn something special about yourself if you stand up for what's important.

Even if you experienced an emotional crisis with a friend or lover recently, it's time to move past the drama today and consider what's next. You still might be attached to your unresolved feelings, but these just may have to heal on their own. There's really no reason to involve others in this process. Instead, visualize a path toward a happier and healthier future. What you create in your imagination now can become reality later on.

You may be experiencing a refreshing wave of joyful energy. Your mind carries you to great heights now as you explore new areas of interest when cerebral Mercury is visiting your sign until December 24. Although it could feel like a breath of fresh air, be careful that your enthusiasm doesn't distract you from the real work in front of you. Adventures can be fun, but don't use them to escape your commitments.

Your heart is softening, yet it's still challenging to risk telling others how you feel today. Paradoxically, your caution can actually make life more difficult because someone may notice that you're keeping something secret. Even with the best of intentions, hidden agendas have more impact than you realize. If you have something to say, get it out into the open where it won't do as much harm. Speak your mind and then focus on reclaiming the joy of the present moment.

Your social life is on the upswing now because you are more drawn to the energy of group dynamics with interactive Mercury visiting your 11th House of Friends. Be bold and pencil in activities for the rest of the month even if you don't have any concrete plans yet. There's no need to wait until the holidays are here to put things on your calendar. But don't just talk about it; get busy and start making the magic happen.

A shift in your workplace is underway and you may have to collaborate with your coworkers more than ever before. You might even have to step up to the plate to assume a managerial role. In any case, the hierarchy of your office or community is becoming more apparent. Find your place within the social structures and play out your part the best you can. Keep in mind that a positive attitude will take you even further on your path to success.

You feel so clever today that you might grow enamored with your own wild and crazy ideas. Ironically, reality appears to encourage your thinking until you have turned up the noise too high. In order to teach you a lesson, someone may have to pull the plug on your fantasy world. It's nearly impossible to tell exactly what's happening, but if you're willing to sit still long enough to tune into your feelings, you can turn your confusion into clarity. Wait a day or two before deciding what to do next.

You might receive mixed signals from friends and associates today as you try to reestablish your lost authority. You just don't feel clear about what others are expecting of you, which may prompt you to run off and hide. But unfortunately, you can't. Talk about your predicament with someone you trust but don't make any sudden moves. Apply your common sense to the situation and keep plodding forward -- even if you aren't sure of your destination yet.

It may appear that you are indecisive, but this label doesn't even begin to touch the depth of your current uncertainty. Others might not see how distracted you are with the conflicting messages you're hearing from your own subconscious mind. Acting as if you're dazed and confused is understandable when you've already given yourself permission to go on a mental holiday. Remember, there's no need to pretend to have all the answers when you don't. Accept the fact that people love you for just being yourself.

You can feel a flood of powerful emotions as it washes over you and takes you for a ride today. However, it doesn't really matter whether or not you are a willing passenger. There is no point in fighting the currents or trying to control your feelings. Go with the flow and let the circumstances take you where they will. Ironically, relinquishing control for a while ensures that you end up where you need to be just in time.

There is something powerful brewing beneath your friendly exterior. Your insecurities could play a significant role as they gnaw away at your confidence, preventing you from living life to the fullest. Still, you cannot quite put your finger on where your uncertainty originates. There is no need to run from your feelings. The elusive solution will become apparent once you are truly ready to be honest with yourself.

You might not be able to trust your own logic today, even though you Virgos are normally the champions of precision thinking. You are a study in conflict now as you swing back and forth without finding resolution. Your perceptions are like an out-of-focus camera and no matter how you change the lighting the picture is still blurry. Free your imagination from the rules for just one day and embrace the unknown.

Experiencing stress doesn't motivate you to resolve a conflict between your idealistic plans and your current reality. You may want to be a superhero and save the whales or ride to the rescue to help someone special in your life. However, you might not have the resources to put your altruistic strategy into action today. Keep the faith; you will somehow find a way to be of service, even if it's not in the manner you originally imagined.

Do your best to avoid defending your beliefs today because you probably won't be able to explain yourself succinctly, anyway. On one hand, you might exaggerate a statistic or misquote a source. On the other hand, you could present all your information correctly, only to have someone completely misunderstand what you said. Save the debate for another day and use your time in a more creative fashion now. Live your dreams instead of trying to justify them to others.

Your thoughts are tugging at you today like a petulant child who doesn't take well to being ignored. Mischievous Mercury is in your sign, inspiring you to tell stories before you have figured out the plot. But being practical is not your forte at this time because Mercury's alignment to spiritual Neptune draws your mind up into the clouds of illusion. Enjoy the ride on the Ferris wheel of your imagination without trying to understand what it all means. Don't worry; there will be plenty of time to work things out once you're back on the ground.

Someone might present you with an emotional problem that doesn't seem to have an easy fix. However, it still could be necessary to drop what you're doing and place another person's agenda above yours. Don't seek rational answers now; instead, engage your intuitive powers, even if it doesn't seem very practical. It may not make complete sense yet, but you can be more helpful than you realize today by just staying in the present moment.

New ideas are jumping into awareness now like corn popping in hot oil. You have a high level of originality and your approach to problem-solving is unconventional to say the least. However, not every brilliant idea hits the nail right on the head. Listen to the feedback you receive today and be ready to drop those thoughts that are rightfully criticized by others. As Einstein said, "ninety-nine percent of genius is knowing what's important."

It appears as if you're viewing the world through rose-colored glasses as communicator Mercury stresses your key planet Neptune today. In fact, everything you experience now is tinted by your own subjectivity. Although you may be looking through a filter that drops out unwanted perceptions, this doesn't mean that they aren't there. Ask someone for a reality check if things seem to be too good to be true. Remember, what you see is not always what you get.

Trouble seems to find you today even if you attempt to keep your nose clean. You might try to make it through the day by focusing on your chores, but other people can still lead you astray. You may need to set your previously constructed plans aside and just figure things out as you go along. Thankfully, your enthusiastic nature could turn a temporary setback into an opportunity to bring more excitement into your life.

Your creative abilities impress others today, but you could also get so carried away with an unrealistic idea that you reveal the inner workings of an incoherent mind instead. Both extremes can be shocking, but the paradox now is that there might not be a lot of difference between appearing competent and sounding crazy. Make sure that your radical approach is justifiable before you say too much about your plans. Worry less about what anyone else thinks and more about what you need to do.

Your friends and family might not support your radical ideas today, even if you thought they would. Perhaps your allies are not available, or maybe someone is actually opposing your current plan. Either way, you must work extra hard now just to prevent losing precious ground. Although you may not make as much progress as you wish, clear communication can ultimately mean the difference between success and failure. Choose your words carefully to ensure they have maximum impact.

You thrive on being busy today, but over-scheduling yourself is not wise because one mistake could create a domino effect that messes with your entire day. Luckily, you can stack the cards in your favor by saying no to more activities before it's too late. Once you have opened up some free time on your calendar, you will be more prepared to positively respond to changes as required. Giving yourself a bit of breathing room allows you to choose the most successful path.

You might not expect a money issue to hijack your day today, but don't wait for someone else to fix the problem if a financial concern arises. Fortunately, your analytical powers are sharp now, but you may be so rational in seeking a solution that you forget about the emotional consequences of your actions. You could even react so abruptly that you inadvertently hurt a partner or coworker. Be compassionate in your interactions, but don't get sidetracked by anyone else's drama. Ultimately, you only need to be responsible for yourself.

Working extra hard could backfire today as the Moon travels through your 6th House of Daily Routine. You might feel compelled to demonstrate your competence by completing all your chores, but others may find your approach intolerable because you seem so overbearing now. However, you aren't likely aware of how persistent you sound. Although your goal is simply to finish your tasks, it's smarter to temper your desire for efficiency by being less judgmental of those who have different priorities. To each his own.

If someone pushes you to express something you weren't ready to reveal, your reaction might be uncharacteristically volatile today. However, it's not easy to be cool-headed if your feelings are agitated. Although losing your temper can turn your life upside down while warrior Mars is visiting your sign, anything that comes out into the open now could help to clear the air of lingering tensions.

Declaring your desire for more independence isn't the same as actually getting it. Defining interpersonal boundaries isn't easy because you aren't all that clear about them yourself, but expressing your uncertainty can be a first step to establishing new limits. Acknowledging the changes that are on the horizon is a good place to start, but you don't have to fix everything all at once. Be patient; your perspective is gradually shifting and it may take a while for your new view to come into sharp focus.

Someone you look up to may be flexing his or her muscles of freedom, reminding you of your own restlessness. You might feel agitated today, like an insect before a storm. Thankfully, it's not necessary to figure out how to respond to the current situation all on your own. Instead, ask for advice from someone you trust. The wise counsel you receive now -- especially from a friend or a sibling -- can help you solve your current dilemma.

Even if you are fairly sure about your current goals, you can still discover something today that causes you to question if you're actually on the right track. Upon closer analysis, you may realize that you're more wrapped up in existential self-doubt than needing to redirect your life's path. Being flexible is usually a smart strategy, but don't change your course now just because your self-esteem is in a temporary slump. It's wise to wait a few more days before making any major decisions.

Taming your rebellious instincts can be challenging now, so it's best to do something to release your building frustration before it grows unmanageable. Nevertheless, the evocative Moon's current visit to your sign reinforces your need to be different. Instead of creating conflict with someone you love, find a way to express your restless energy and reduce the pressure within an intimate relationship. A little change will do you more good than you think.

You aren't likely to act very cautiously today, especially if someone confronts you about how you express your creativity. Although you might instinctively recoil from any criticism, try not to resist the good advice you receive. Responding impulsively isn't a wise strategy; exercising a bit of self-restraint, however, will ultimately enable you to increase your sense of freedom in the near future.

Although you're naturally the outgoing type, problems may surface that are exacerbated today by your desire to hurry up and move on. If an acquaintance spontaneously shares a tender moment, you might try to keep your reactions hidden by acting tougher than you feel. You can even shut down emotionally if you think you are protecting someone you love. Dig deeply into your motives and examine whether you're more concerned with safeguarding yourself than anyone else. Being honest is more important now than feeding your irrational fears.

Your subconscious mind may be afraid of intimacy now, even if you exude confidence in all your personal interactions. However, this nagging fear can prevent others from getting close to you. Paradoxically, your need to cling to a difficult memory could be the very obstacle that seems to be in your way. It's confusing because you're facing the limits of your own imagination. Fortunately, the dynamics will change if you simply change your mind.

It may look like familiar territory if something in your daily routine isn't living up to your expectations. Time is running out and you might feel as if you are being given one last chance to get it right. Instead of worrying that you won't reach your goals, share your concerns with someone you trust. Putting your feelings out in the open without any negative assumptions today can shift the energy in a more positive direction. You'll never know what will happen unless you try.

You Crabs are amongst the most sensitive creatures in the entire cosmic zoo. However, if something reminds you of a past disappointment, your inclination is to shy away from interactions that restimulate the pain. Unfortunately, the very act of shielding yourself from rejection can also fulfill your worst fears by restricting the flow of love and acceptance. Don't make a decision based upon an event from long ago. Instead, open your heart and allow yourself to feel what's really happening in the present moment.

You want to do what comes naturally today, but the Moon's visit to your 8th House of Intimacy reactivates a hidden struggle with your past. On one hand, practicing patience is a healthy way to avoid childish behavior. But on the other hand, your fear of failure might just seal the deal before you even try. Don't invite defeat by accepting it prematurely. You could be pleasantly surprised if you take a leap of faith and assume the best possible outcome.

An emotional dilemma seems unsolvable today as someone holds you back from experiencing the potential joy. However, upon closer examination, the real obstacle appears to be you. If your thoughts are standing in your way of happiness, you must figure out how to change your attitude. But don't waste energy blaming anyone else. It's time to face the music that you are playing -- or, even better yet, dance to it.

Keeping everything light and easy today requires extra effort, even if life is looking pretty sweet. An unexpressed resentment or unfulfilled expectation can negatively influence a close relationship now, yet you also have a chance to clean up old karma by putting your feelings out on the table. Revealing your heart may be quite scary at first, but it's your ultimate ticket to love.

Jealousy might rear its ugly head today if you let your memory of a painful event from the past spill out over into the present moment. If you are unsure of your position in a significant relationship, explore your feelings through honest dialogue, instead of unconsciously pushing a situation toward critical mass. An emotional meltdown won't stabilize the love in your life, so avoid acting on your fears. A little compassion and forgiveness are all you need to heal your heart.

It's not that everything is perfect today, but you may intuitively feel that it's just a matter of time until all the pieces fall into place. There might not be any apparent signs yet of your looming success, but don't let negativity bloom or it could hinder the good things already in progress. However, overconfidence isn't helpful either. Just keep the faith and stay on the same track now; the payoff will be well worth the wait.

Applying your practical skills behind the scenes can be an effective strategy today, even if you think you should be more upfront in your actions. Don't worry needlessly about a disappointment that may or may not come to the surface later. The good news is that if you take a setback in stride, it will quickly recede into the background. Pursuing the course of least resistance now ensures the fastest route to success.

An emotional issue that prevents you from having fun can be rather disconcerting today. Your tendency now may be to sulk instead of just handling whatever comes up in a rational manner. You might have a difficult time aligning your feelings with your actions. Ultimately, you're the one that must change; no one else can make the gray clouds go away. You can't control all the events in your life but you certainly can control your response.

Just a few days ago you could see your future clearly, but your goals are getting fuzzier and fuzzier the closer they get. It's as if you are farsighted, yet putting on reading glasses cannot help you now that the reflective Moon is back in your imaginative sign. Keep your feelings out in the open, even if you are unsure about where they are leading today. You could receive additional clarity from others if you include them in your process. But it is your faith in your dreams that will carry you to success.

You may be more concerned about everyone else today than you are about yourself. Obviously, wanting to help those you love is wonderful, but trying to fix everything is not healthy. Learning to respect other people's boundaries is a huge lesson for you now because you might unconsciously ride roughshod over someone's feelings, without even realizing it. Remember, you can be of assistance by actively listening and kindly sharing your emotions; just don't try to run the show.

Thinking about cosmic questions that don't have easy answers might occupy a lot of your spare time today. Searching for the meaning of life isn't on your everyday agenda, but now it can deepen your spiritual connection. Even if you are oftentimes satisfied with simple explanations, take this opportunity to explore a more complex set of issues that go beyond finding emotional security and personal pleasure. Look within to find the solutions you seek.

An unusual turn of events might shake up your schedule, but there's no reason not to go along for the ride. Fortunately, you are able to make good use of your toolkit of clever ideas and smooth moves, which can ease the complexity. Remember, if anything goes awry now, it's most likely a sign of a deeper problem. Do whatever you must to extinguish any brush fires that smolder while continuing to work on cleaning up the underlying issues. The more effort you put in, the more you will receive in return.

Knowing exactly what's appropriate today is tricky, since your emotional boundaries may still be a bit fuzzy. You could even waste time and energy lost in feelings that actually belong to someone else. Visualizing a barrier of impenetrable white light around you can be enough to reestablish a strong perimeter that keeps out the negativity and allows you to reconnect with your center.

You may be quite hopeful now about the possibilities of a new romance, yet caution is advised so you don't overlook an important piece of the puzzle. Although no one is purposefully trying to mislead you, everything is not exactly as it seems. It's your willingness to give others the benefit of the doubt that can create problems. A healthy dose of realism today saves you from disappointment tomorrow.

A challenging relationship issue may give you a headache today, but if you face the situation with a realistic attitude, you'll be thankful in the long run. You could learn something crucial that helps you to see things more clearly in the days ahead. However, burying your head in the sand is not a viable strategy. Dealing with the truth that is right in front of you creates a foundation strong enough to endure the current circumstances without having to retreat. Handle the situation the best you can and don't look back.

Maintaining a steady work pace while taking care of business is difficult today, but pushing yourself harder won't necessarily be an efficient strategy. Try cutting yourself some slack and let your energy ebb and flow throughout the day without attempting to control it. In between short bursts of concentrated effort, make time to revel in your creative side, even if you aren't productive for a while. Think of yourself as a metaphysical surfer; ride the waves while the surf's up and regroup when it's calm.

Making enough time to commune with nature or with your inner guides can turn today into a sweet memory. Even if you have responsibilities to fulfill, don't cheat yourself out of the magic you might find by creating a bit of solitude. Thankfully, your imagination reveals unconventional solutions to mundane problems if you successfully quiet your thoughts. Giving yourself permission to be spontaneous now empowers you to move through a current roadblock. Listening to your intuition is a good place to start.

Your sound judgment pours from you so smoothly today, you may not realize how much you help someone else. You have a great deal of philosophical and spiritual wisdom to share, and this is your chance to return the generosity that others have shown you in the past. There's no need to seek recognition or approval now; giving back to those who require assistance is its own sweet reward.

Making intelligent decisions could be tricky business today because your mind isn't on your regular mundane concerns. You may be drifting around in your own private fantasy, instead of carefully calculating how to reach your next set of goals. Don't try to suppress your dreams even if they seem unreachable; there are treasures waiting for your discovery within the realms of your imagination. Open the door and let them in.

You may have to deal with complicated money issues today, yet you can avert a messy problem if you face them head on as soon as they surface. Although the current situation might not seem like a significant concern in the big picture, it's still a smart idea to consider what you could learn from exploring all your options before making an important decision. However, if your intuition tells you one thing and logic points elsewhere, go with the facts for now.

You are happily splashing around in your own watery element today and are able to dive deeper into your dreams if you so choose. This can be a most luxurious time if you are in a positive state of mind. But if you are even mildly depressed, you could find yourself drowning in your own tears. Don't be afraid to talk about your fears with a trusted friend. The first step to getting help is asking for it. Remember, Fish are most content when they are swimming in a school of like-minded souls.

You are not a stranger to overextending your energy and you could fall into this all-too-familiar trap today unless you take necessary precautions. Fortunately, avoiding problems is easy now if you're willing to scale back on your promises and your plans before you're in over your head. However, it's much trickier to find your way back to a manageable place if you wait until you're already exhausted. Incorporate realistic thinking into your day while you're still ahead of the curve.

You can talk a big game today, but playing it according to your plan won't be as simple as you wish. It's easy to minimize important details, but they might come back to haunt you before you're able to fulfill your commitments. Recognizing that everything appears better than it actually is now may be enough to prevent an uncomfortable situation from developing later in the day. Taking time to reassess the situation before jumping in enables you to put everything into a healthier perspective.

It's never wise to shoot the messenger, especially if he's bearing good news. But your key planet Mercury is the Trickster, possibly stirring up trouble if you automatically believe what you hear. Don't take everything at face value today or you will encourage the delivery of more exaggerated information. The truth is being stretched now, but you can save yourself from a headache by verifying all the facts as you go along. Nevertheless, keeping an open mind allows your friends to surprise you with a bit of unexpected fun.

Although you probably still have your share of problems, they appear to be more manageable today. Your current willingness to take a risk increases your options now, but more alternatives don't necessarily mean that any of them will be the right one. Standing up and defending your point of view sooner than later enables you to avoid potential conflict before it grows out of hand. Ultimately, others will appreciate you even more if you honor your integrity from the start.

Be sure that you're motivated by good intentions if you involve others in your drama today, rather than just wanting to garner extra attention. Your current crisis really does need to be handled and, thankfully, someone may ask the right questions that can help you focus your thoughts. Your intuition won't steer you in the wrong direction now, but you still need to bring your brilliant ideas down to earth. A pragmatic approach helps you capture the magic of this inspiring moment.

Your current business savvy is admirable, but your analytical superpowers could turn you into someone who can find justification for anything you want to do. Your ruling planet Mercury is on fire today, and may lure you down a slippery slope of inflated confidence. Instead of wasting time trying to rationalize your choices, pay attention to the feedback you receive and adjust your course of action as necessary. Acting on the advice of others paves the road to your success.

You don't enjoy arguing with anyone, but you might need to speak up and give someone a piece of your mind today, anyhow. Just be careful because you're likely to get caught in a whirlwind of fast-moving energies that can spin you up into the jet streams and quickly carry you far from home. Luckily, you should be able to talk your way into or out of nearly anything now. Relying on your charm and cleverness works in your favor when you need it most.

Overspending to impress someone you love may not be as appreciated as you wish. In fact, you can't accurately express your feelings by buying anything material.
