Instead of putting yourself in a precarious position by going over budget on something that's unnecessary, try stating what you're feeling as directly as possible. Your message is much more powerful today if you simply speak from your heart.

You may feel like a bee that's drunk on pollen in a field of blooming wildflowers. Every brilliant thought you have is the best one ever and leads to yet another one. The supply seems endless as the radiant Sun aligns with bountiful Jupiter to inflate your confidence. But others might not agree with your positive assessments; they could even think that your optimism is foolish. Waiting a day or two before making any final decisions helps you pick the best idea and develop a successful plan of action.

You're quite confident today, but an unexpected event might require you to put your perspective back in balance. You can maintain a spiritual point of view based on the idea that everything is exactly as it should be at this time. But don't use this line of reasoning to justify your inaction. Ultimately, working toward a significant goal will make you feel better, even if you don't see any real progress for a few more days.

You might lose focus today because it seems more fun to imagine your future than to live in the present moment. Unfortunately, putting all your eggs in the basket of hope shifts your concentration away from what you currently need to be doing. Imagining the possibilities of what may come to pass is often a useful endeavor; however, it can also get in the way of the work that's right in front of you. The real challenge is not to achieve your long-term goals; it's to remain present in the here and now.

It may feel as if you have another chance to grab the brass ring, yet your time is quickly running out. However, the sense of urgency that you're experiencing now is based on a faulty assumption. Although your current actions seem to wield more power than usual, pushing too hard can stir up more resistance than you need. Ironically, backing off just a bit might actually enable you to reach your goals sooner than you expect.

Your refusal to take no for an answer now motivates you to find an original solution to an ongoing problem. Thankfully, you're able to sustain a high level of energy today, turning you into a hero at work. However, you must stay fully focused on your goals or you could be tempted to set aside meeting responsibilities in favor of having fun. Don't give up; the satisfaction you gain by creating something lasting is much more fulfilling than the memory of fleeting pleasure.

Conforming to your regular routine can be a real challenge today because your emotions seem to have a life of their own. Your reactions aren't necessarily rational, especially if friends or coworkers expect you to join them on a social outing. You may think that you don't have the time for such frivolity, but it might be wise to go ahead and participate anyway. Thankfully, you won't need to run away from your obligations; they will still be waiting for you when you return. A little joy in your heart serves you well.

Talking yourself into going along with the group sounds like a good idea, but you still may modify your plans during the day and end up doing something on your own. Although you could blame your change of mind on the current situation, it's better to take full responsibility for your decision instead. It's okay to acknowledge that you're feeling stifled now and need some immediate action. Fortunately, you don't have to hold yourself back today, since your spontaneous behavior will likely lead you in the right direction.

You may be provoked to initiate action at work today by someone who goads you into stepping beyond your normal limits. Even if an outrageous plan sounds enticing, the very idea of doing anything so unconventional might make you feel anxious. Thankfully, you could receive support from the most unlikely sources now. Go ahead and spread your wings and fly; you'll never know how far you can get if you don't at least try.

Your optimistic attitude might tempt you to express previously hidden feelings, but saying too much could turn into something you later regret. Take your time and carefully consider your words and actions today before following an impulsive whim. Thankfully, there are many shades of gray, so you won't have to make an all-or-nothing decision. Don't go overboard with your disclosure; exercising a bit of caution now is your best strategy to keep the energy moving in a positive direction.

You're more restless today than anyone realizes, but you're doing a good job of hiding your excitement. You may appear to be much more serious than you actually feel. Be careful; if someone close to you is ready for action, you might just cut loose and join in. However, as long as you stay conscious of your obligations, you should be able to slip away for some fun and get back before anyone even notices that you're gone. A little change can shake things up just enough to be interesting.

You could work yourself up into a state of anxiety today as you compare your ideal fantasies with the realities of the day. You really don't want to repeat an old routine in the exact same way you did it before. You're intrigued by doing things differently now, and anything or anyone unconventional is appealing to you. However, just because you can imagine it, doesn't mean that you should make it real. Using your common sense enables you to enjoy your daydreams without having to experience disappointment later on.

Although your day flows pretty smoothly, you may still want more freedom than you have today. Thankfully, your workday could allow you more opportunity for independence, so trying something new makes a lot of sense. Don't close yourself off to unrealized possibilities before you even explore your options. Muster up an extra bit of courage, take a risk and let others know what you need; you might be happily surprised with the support you receive.

You enjoy having fun and playing games, but the excitement level could end up being a bit too much today, even for you adventurous Archers. Your feelings are inconsistent now, and it might seem as if your attention should be elsewhere no matter what you do. Nevertheless, the lack of stability increases your attraction to the thrill of the uncertainty. Enjoy the buzz while it lasts, for things will begin to settle back down in a couple of days.

You might be uncomfortable with the current emotional turmoil, yet nothing you do seems to calm your inner turbulence. You're better off now to let go and ride the rough waves instead of attempting to resist them and change your direction. Thankfully, your anxiety begins to dissipate once you concentrate on maintaining balance, rather than trying to manage all the variables in your environment at once. Paradoxically, loosening your grip on the future ultimately puts you back in control where you belong.

Nothing is as simple as it could be if only you were willing to share your feelings today. Although you may know exactly what you want and where you are going, you might not wish to involve others in your process yet. Your impatience tempts you to jump the gun and impulsively do something foolish now before you have the support of your allies. Move carefully and think twice prior to doing anything rash. Rest assured you have more time than you realize.

You're so eager to try something that's outside your comfort zone today that your sudden actions can take others by surprise. Unfortunately, they may judge you unkindly because of your erratic behavior; they might even accuse you of being immature or irresponsible. Nevertheless, act with confidence and express who you are and what you want. This is your moment of truth, regardless of anyone else's expectations. The only person you need to please is yourself.

You don't have to take charge by acting in a dictatorial manner, even if you believe you know what needs to be done. Although you are a champion of choosing the fastest route to your destination, there are other ways to reach your goals today. Yours may be the best method for you, but it might not work as well for someone else. It's better to give up control around the outer edges of your life now and let some things run their own course.

You should be able to accomplish your objectives today, but you might start out distracted by an inner conflict as you contemplate the best way to assert yourself in the current situation. You may struggle reining in your emotions this morning, but steadfast support from a close friend has a calming influence. Relationship dynamics improve as the day wears on, freeing you to find a sustainable pace at work. In the meantime, any movement is better than inaction even if you don't see tangible results until later on.

It's probably not a trivial issue if you're concerned about your current obligations to coworkers. However, your mental gyrations might actually push you to a critical point as you turn your thoughts into effective action. You know that you shouldn't let a crucial opportunity slip away now without making your move. Go forward with determination; your efforts will pay off in ways you can't yet imagine.

Your resolve deepens today and may turn into an obsession unless you're able to put your goals into a healthier perspective. Fortunately, you seem to have a natural ability to know when to let go because your intuition is right on target now. Don't waste energy second guessing your decisions. Overcome your insecurities and trust your judgment. If you keep your eyes on the prize, you'll be amazed by the progress you make over time.

You must wield your power carefully because your actions have greater consequences now than you realize. However, it's crucial to lead by example and not by intimidation. Use of force isn't effective and only encourages others to resist getting in line with your goals. You have a deep pool of physical and mental energy today, so make these days as productive and positive as you can.

Although you may be unsure of your goals now, you can lean on your close friends and associates for a reality check. However, once you let others help you reach a decision about your course of action, you must rely solely on your own practical and efficient manner to achieve the results you want. The good news is your high level of integrity has come through for you in the past and it will do so again today.

Your long-term career goals are on your mind today but you might not choose to share your plans with anyone else yet. You can achieve the greatest satisfaction by considering various scenarios and imagining your future success. Luckily, these thoughts are not just idle fantasies now because you also have the ability to work hard and improve your life. Don't expect immediate results; some things are worth waiting for more than others.

Your tendency toward concentrating on a single task might make you seem a bit ruthless now, but it's a small price to pay for achieving your goals. Others may feel as if they are in your way unless they agree to do everything you suggest. But you don't have to be so quick to push your agenda. Even if it doesn't seem apparent at first, there's always room for compromise. Success is within reach if you can establish a productive routine to follow during the next several weeks.

You have a high level of concentration today, especially if you establish clear objectives because karmic Saturn is harmonizing with your key planet Jupiter. Instead of inflating your confidence to cover your uncertainty, you're able to keep your optimism on a long slow burn, sustaining a steady level of production. Remember, practicing patience can buy you the time you presently need, but there's no substitute for solid preparation and hard work. Don't jump yet; leap only when you feel ready.

You are very conscious of interpersonal boundaries now and could go out of your way to clarify the dynamics in your relationships. Thankfully, others can bring you a sense of well-being as your key planet Saturn harmonizes with generous Jupiter in your 7th House of Companions. You may feel disarmed by someone's encouragement, prompting you to let down your guard. However, you're acutely aware of your goals and how to achieve them, so there's no danger in being subsumed by someone else's agenda. Open your heart and let the force be with you.

You aren't in a mood to be messed with today, especially if your work has piled up and you feel pressure to meet your obligations. You won't let anything prevent you from accomplishing your goals. Thankfully, your coworkers may turn out to be a source of much-needed support. It's a blessing to have good people around you who can jump in and offer useful assistance at exactly the right moment. There's no need to shoulder the burden alone; gratefully accept the help in the manner it is intended.

Expressing yourself creatively might be more important to you than to anyone else in your environment. Other people may question your motives or even ask you to do additional tasks for them. Luckily, you're not easily sidetracked now, even if you don't have much to show for your efforts at first. But don't slip into the tempting waters of irrational self-doubt. No one can pull the rug out from underneath you if you remember that your instincts are trustworthy and rarely steer you wrong.

Money issues may be on your mind today, raising concerns with a coworker or partner as you figure out the best way to handle the problem. Even if you have a viable solution, the path might not be easy now. Your unrealistic optimism could be upsetting to someone else who is familiar with the situation. You're tempted to slip into denial and just let the whole thing slide. Unfortunately, this is not your best choice. Facing a predicament head on takes courage, but can bring the resolution you desire.

Digging in your heels and maintaining your current emotional perspective might be your first choice, but you'll be better off in the long run if you can adopt a more flexible attitude. It might feel as if you're being tested to see what is most important to you. Prioritize your needs and compromise on those issues that are not crucial. It's better to lose a few battles along the way so you can win the war in the long run.

Keeping a secret is not the easiest thing for you chatty Twins, yet today this is exactly what you must do. Don't let anyone talk you into disclosing anything that you aren't ready to share. Be careful if your high expectations lead you to place too much trust in someone else. For now, it's more important to process your feelings out of sight. Listening to your own wise counsel might require solitude, but it's the best thing you can do for your heart.

Relying on your friends today sounds like a good idea, but they might offer to help you in ways that are different from what you prefer. Unfortunately, your rigidity can get in the way of useful assistance. Instead of putting up walls because you don't want anyone to sense your insecurities, just tell the truth exactly as you perceive it. You may be surprised how gentle others will be with you now if you are willing to let down your guard.

You may judge yourself harshly if you don't live up to your own high standards now, but you still tend to keep your shortcomings under wraps. Acting as if you have it all together at work is a mixed blessing because you could inadvertently isolate yourself through your lack of honest communication. In order to overcome any self-esteem issues, it can be helpful to look at your current situation as one that will ultimately teach you a deep spiritual truth. Forgiving yourself is the first step to creating positive change.

Just because you know where you're going doesn't mean that you know the best way to get there. You want to be practical because you instinctively understand how much having your feet on the ground will help. However, it's challenging to focus your attention on the details now, no matter how important they may be to your strategy. Allow yourself to meander through your imagination for a couple more days before deciding which path to take.

You might feel as if you're caught in the middle of a conflict today and your involvement may be unavoidable. It's imperative not to take sides if you are going to be of any value in this situation, for in doing so you lose the title of diplomat and become immersed in the battle. Remaining neutral allows you to be effective without becoming swept up in the emotional turmoil. Assuming the role of a mediator makes the best use of your talents.

Someone might enter your life today with a burst of energy, apparently quite certain about what you should do. Impulsively, you want to trust his or her perspective, but the more you listen, the less sure you are about your next move. Remaining open to another person's point of view is one thing; doing what they tell you is something else. Accept good advice for what it's worth, but trust your own intuition for the best results.

Your fantasies may turn to romance, but just because you can go there in your mind doesn't mean that it would be a good idea to follow through in reality. In fact, you might already have previous responsibilities that leave little time for the enjoyment that dangles in front of you like a carrot. Be sensible and take care of your obligations today before pursuing the bright lights of potential pleasure.

Although you often have a pragmatic way of looking at the world, it may be challenging to maintain a realistic course of action today. Fascinating distractions pull you first one way and then another, even as you attempt to do the right thing. Instead of forcing yourself to work, it's better to cut yourself some slack and enjoy the diversions coming your way. You might learn something vital about your personal growth and you'll be able to return to your chores with a refreshingly different outlook.

You may be torn between what your senses tell you today and where your dreams are pulling you. This internal conflict might not be a new dilemma, yet it could seem increasingly important now. Unfortunately, your options become less clear the more you struggle. Instead of believing that you must choose between your head and your heart, forge a new path between the extremes to include both.

Your day may be much busier than you wish, yet there seems little you can do to lighten your load. Fortunately, you might have a great time interacting with your colleagues while accomplishing your work along the way. Instead of hiding your feelings for the sake of efficiency, integrate them into your discussions. Oddly enough, you are more productive if you continue to let people know how you feel. Others appreciate getting to know the real you.

It seems as if everything that is being told to you is in line with what you perceive, but upon more careful analysis something appears to be out of sync. Unfortunately, you may not be able to put your concerns into words. But if you do give voice to your feelings, you could inadvertently strengthen them. It's better to hold steady and let the awkwardness pass before you say anything you regret. Timing is everything.

People are acting strange today and if you try to determine the reasons by asking questions, you may be unpleasantly surprised with their answers. Even if you mean no offense, someone might feel as if you are being overly critical or even on the attack. Don't stir up unnecessary conflict now; one of your greatest strengths is being able to stoically maintain the status quo while chaos ensues around you. Quit worrying about other people's reactions and just focus on what you can do to make the world a better place.

You might unintentionally agitate someone's fears today if you overstep your bounds. A close friend may be more worried about loss of control than you realize, and your actions could tread on his or her territory. Since you're not trying to take over, you probably won't even realize the impact of your actions until it's too late. If a conflict erupts, quickly retreat since nothing is gained by turning a disagreement into a major argument. Your best strategy is to take the high road, apologize and move on.

You can't help but fear the worst about a storm that you see brewing on the home front. However, your current concerns could actually add to the tension, unless you intentionally try to defuse the stress by bringing the topic up in a conversation. Worrying will only make matters worse, but actively doing something can clear the air and turn things around. Be brave and make the first move; others will appreciate it more than you think.

Someone in your family might not be fully honest today, but they believe that their failure to tell you the complete truth is for your own good. You, on the other hand, know better. You understand that there are deep differences of opinion on a matter that won't come to an easy resolution from one quick conversation. Although the lack of disclosure bothers you, it's not your place to bring up the subject now. Take a deep breath and walk away.

It feels like one of those strange days when extraterrestrials could land in your front yard and that would just be one more situation to handle. Events that might otherwise be extraordinary seem as if they are as plain and ordinary as could be now. Of course, this is because unusual is the new normal today. Taking it all in stride is a wise idea, but don't minimize something special when it happens. Magic is everywhere you look.

You are more singularly focused these days as if you have a final exam coming up soon and you need to be fully prepared. But taking your regular responsibilities too seriously today may lead you to miss an important experience. A subtle feeling washes over you to remind you of how wonderful life can be in the present moment. Doing your best is admirable, but performance isn't everything.

You could pick up on messages from other dimensions today if you are psychically sensitive enough. However, even if you don't hear anything, you'll still know that something special is happening now. Either way, rest assured that you are in tune with a transformational cosmic song that's being played for you, whether or not you can make out the words. Giving yourself time and space to listen increases the positive impact of this magical experience.

You may try to do whatever is necessary to remain focused on your chores today. However, it becomes increasingly more difficult as unexpressed feelings color your attitude and distract your attention. Keep in mind that you don't have to be on task every minute of the day. Taking a time out can lift your spirits and ultimately make you more productive in the long run.

Although you're quite capable of keeping your feet on the ground, you're visiting a parallel universe now that several supernatural septiles sweep you onto a magical mystery tour. Just because you are able to justify your current goals, though, doesn't make them sensible. Acknowledging that you aren't a good judge of practicality today gives you a perfect reason to put off a major decision until your thoughts return to earth.

You may think that family commitments are holding you back, but being held accountable for your obligations now can actually help you stay on track. Although you're attracted to some rather eccentric ideas, today's Taurus Moon is a tangible reminder that there is beauty in simplicity. Fulfilling your promises isn't all there is to life, but at least it's a good start to feeling a sense of personal satisfaction. Sometimes the greatest mystery is right in front of your nose. All you need to do is believe.

Today's events have a surreal overtone to them as several otherworldly septiles lure you down the magical rabbit hole. You might incorrectly think you can explain your motives right away, but they are too complicated for anyone to understand. Thankfully, you should be able to convey how you're inspired by your visions if you are patient. But don't lean exclusively on words; you'll get the most benefit out of your current interactions if you use your sixth sense to connect, instead. Relax and let your intuition be your guide.

You might feel more optimistic about your future today, even if you can't shake all of your lingering problems. Your growing confidence is supported by coworkers and friends who are enthusiastic about your ideas. Although something still seems missing, try not to make any major changes to your previous plans. Holding your current course now is your best strategy in the long run.

Paying attention to what's most significant is growing more complicated today even if you try to concentrate on just one issue. However, someone or something may come along now, distracting you into scattering your energy before you realize what happened. You might not be able to stop your mind from wandering, but your conscious intervention can pull you back to reality before you falter. Controlling your thoughts subsequently improves your chances for success.

You have been anticipating a change in direction for a while, and now is the time to make your big move. It might seem as if a minor adjustment is all that's needed, but a twist on the road of life can turn out to be a significant one. Don't make choices based on a whim of the moment; consider your options carefully and then run with the one that will carry you the farthest.

Your friends might get on your nerves today, especially if they seem to be unreasonably determined to have their own way. You can't comprehend how anyone could remain so completely blind while facing contradictory facts. Don't show others the errors of their ways now; everyone needs to learn their lessons on their own. Meanwhile, clean up your own yard before worrying about anything else. Lead by example instead of telling people what to do.

It's fun to connect with your friends in a social situation today, enabling you to express your more playful side. However, you might be tempted to overdo the celebrating now. Rather than unconsciously wasting your physical energy on passing pleasures, pay attention to where your interactions with others take you. Make intelligent decisions based only on how you want your day to unfold. You will be happier with the results if you take charge of your destiny with a sense of purpose.

Your thoughts are focused on decisions you must make at work next week, but you still can clearly see two opposing solutions to your problem. It's tough to pick one path over another, for they both have distinct advantages and disadvantages. However, you will have to make a choice soon, so jot down the pros and cons of each option and then choose wisely. Fortunately, there are no wrong answers as long as you take the time to step through your analytical process.

You have plenty of interesting ideas today, but it's difficult to focus on any particular scenario at a time. You want to explore a variety of options to determine your future and don't want to be limited by just one choice. Fortunately, there's no reason to narrow your thinking at this time. Just enjoy playing with all the possibilities and leave the big questions for another day.

You are often ready to dig down to the center of complex circumstances to discover the buried truth. But now you might try to avoid any extra emotional intensity by tap dancing around the edges of a significant issue. Even if you feel isolated, you don't have to solve every single mystery today just to gain acceptance. Give yourself permission to go along with the currents long enough to see where they take you.

Everyone might appear to be moving too fast for your liking today. You could even try to slow others down by engaging them in philosophical conversations, but your workmates are nearly as distracted as you are now. It may be easier to withdraw, instead of attempting to control what's happening around you. There's nothing wrong with taking some time to be alone for a while. Reconnecting with your own center revitalizes your energy so you can keep up with the busy pace of the season.

You might grow increasingly anxious today as you temporarily lose control of your schedule. Prioritizing your responsibilities is helpful because you need to acknowledge that you can't do everything that is being asked of you now. Leaving a job unfinished for a bit longer may be frustrating at first, but it's the best way to manage the current complexity. Be gentle with yourself; you are only human after all.

You're like the Energizer bunny today and your spirits lift as things begin to improve all around you. You're able to fully enjoy yourself while meeting your obligations now, but you're certainly busier than normal. It's tempting to bite off more than you can chew, but it's a wiser idea to practice a bit of self-control. If you don't go running around all over the place, you might just accomplish more than you expect.

You may be surprised or even shocked by how much there is to do today, even when you're securely situated inside of your castle. The reflective Moon's current visit to your 4th House of Home and Family highlights your need to retreat from the fast pace of modern life. Practice enjoying the distractions instead of trying to shut them out. There will be more time to relax next week once your chores are done.

You may be feeling extremely enthusiastic today as effervescent Jupiter pumps up your optimism. Even if you are facing tough circumstances, you can still find something positive to focus on. But don't paint such a worry-free picture that you overlook an important truth right before your eyes. Instead, map out a realistic strategy for the upcoming months ahead and concentrate on accomplishing your goals. Sheer determination and hard work could be all you need to make your dreams come true.

New perspectives continue to expand your understanding of the big world outside your door. You are going on a journey within your mind, so take every opportunity you can to learn more about yourself as you travel. Explore your interests in religion, philosophy, or metaphysics, even if you are normally concerned with more mundane things. Put your current inspiration to work by doing your best to discover the secrets of the universe.

Your moods may be a bit uncontrollable today, prompting you to react without thinking. Usually, you're the one who cleverly motivates others, but the tables are turned for the next few weeks as your associates push you into action. You won't be able to get away without cooperating, so use this time to act in a forward-thinking manner instead of waiting until it's too late. It's okay to take a risk, but allowing others to lead may be more productive for now.

Your big ideas might not solve any work-related issues, but they do help you think more globally. You could try to bury your feelings so you can kick yourself into action today, but you could move so fast that you overdo it. Don't let your impulsive excitement lead you into any agreements that limit your range of action or you may feel stuck until the end of the year. Relying on your natural cautious instincts now works in your favor.

You receive an encouraging boost of energy today from witty Mercury as it stirs up colorful ideas in your 5th House of Creativity; however, it's your decision on how best to use your current inspiration. You may be highly productive or choose to have a whole lot of fun instead. The good news is that you can get the best of both worlds, applying your playful spirit in a spontaneous way whether you are at work or at home. Whatever you do, don't waste this magical moment.

Your primary concern over the following weeks may involve finding the right mixture of enthusiasm and restraint as you vacillate between moving forward with your career aspirations and retreating into the safety of your nest. Your best strategy might be to avoid making a final decision for a while. Let the internal conflict inspire you to imagine new possibilities even while circumstances continue to slow you down.

You may feel another surge of mental energy as you search for long-term solutions to current problems. But don't squander a wonderful opportunity by staying within your head. Now that you are buzzing, do something about it and initiate a bold move. Don't get hung up wondering if you are making the right decision or not; any movement now is better than waiting for the perfect moment. Strike while the iron is hot.

Your financial security might seem so important to you now that you're tempted to set aside matters of the heart so you can focus on managing your business. Of course you realize your silence will not last forever, so you're probably just delaying the inevitable. Although your self-esteem may be shaky today, you could boost your confidence by pushing past your fears and guiding your actions from a place of love.

The party vibes kick up another notch as jovial Jupiter spreads his good cheer all over the place. You may feel charged up with an energetic buzz, allowing you to enjoy just about anything that attracts your attention. Unfortunately, your short-term enthusiasm can temporarily overwhelm your long-term strategic goals. Beware of saying yes too quickly, even if you are more than ready for whatever happens next. A little bit of caution improves your chances of success.

Preventing your feelings from bottling up within you is critical today because your intentions will probably slip out even if you don't express what's on your mind. Taking full responsibility for your needs is much more admirable than playing the role of a victim. Your ambitions may be honorable, but circumstances can quickly get muddled unless you are prepared to walk your emotional talk. Thankfully, your sense of integrity will see you through.

You might be very surprised with all the changes occurring in your life. Your social calendar continues to get even busier as friendly Mercury is activated in your 11th House of Friends. Enjoy the energetic shift outward as you think about filling up your calendar with exciting activities. Just remember that it's okay to turn down an invitation if you don't feel up to it, for there will be plenty more opportunities for fun throughout the holiday season.

Although you may be a fairly private person, you now have a chance to show the world how well you can play with others. Perhaps you feel more ambitious today, yet you're not certain how best to apply your efforts. Don't worry about finalizing a new plan, for your greatest strength today is your ability to make it up as you go along. Have faith in the process of collaboration and be ready to create positive change.

Self-indulgence isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as it's in moderation. But self-restraint may be elusive today as the Gemini Full Moon lights up your 3rd House of Information, unless you stay on your toes. You are compelled to share what you feel and your moods are intense and immediate now. Before going to extremes, examine the negative consequences of expressing your moods too soon. This proactive approach will help you gain a healthier perspective.

You may be lured out past your regular boundaries of safety as the restless Gemini Full Moon rattles your 2nd House of Core Beliefs. Resistance is futile, but going along with the flow doesn't necessarily mean slipping into denial if your values are tested. You might even feel as if you're being overloaded with too much information. Thankfully, relief arrives when the evocative Moon sinks into care-giving Cancer later in the day, shifting the focus to your heart.

You're experiencing the pull of your own feelings quite strongly now, but it may be difficult to act as today's Gemini Full Moon floods your sign with a variety of emotions. The biggest danger you currently face is a loss of perspective, making it easier to blow something out of proportion. Even if you feel strongly about your opinion, let the energies settle for a day or two before sharing what's on your mind.

It's all about how you process feelings and then talk about them as the clever Gemini Full Moon brightens your 12th House of Destiny. The seas of your emotions are normally contained securely within your boundaries. However, you're riding the emotional high tides and there may be little you can do now to keep your dreams, desires and fears from flooding right out into the open where everyone can see them. Fortunately, your vulnerability could ultimately deepen the bonds between you and those you love.

No matter how hard you try to meet someone's expectations now that the Full Moon emphasizes your 11th House of Social Networking, you can't really be everything to everyone in your life. Even if you are gloriously multitalented and multifaceted, you can still be pulled into something too deeply. If you find you are in over your head today, begin a gentle self-extraction from the situation. Expressing what's in your heart doesn't necessarily require the approval of anyone else.

Today's energy may bring a bit of emotional anguish as you wish the complexity of life's circumstances would settle down. Your feelings are in the spotlight now that the reflective Full Moon is highlighting your 10th House of Ambitions. You might be nostalgic, but you must focus on the present and not the past. Make the mental adjustments necessary to balance your future objectives with the current circumstances. But don't settle for less; just acknowledge that it could take more time to reach your goals.

You could easily spend your day talking with friends and sharing your ideas about what you want to do with your life now that the chatty Gemini Full Moon is agitating your 9th House of Big Ideas. Your emotions are all over the map today, but you are intently fixated on the potential of your own future. Although this may not be the best time to make firm plans, it's a great time to imagine the plethora of possibilities that are in front of you.

You understand the big picture in theory, but in practice it's difficult to apply what you know today. Your mind is on overdrive now as it runs through every possible scenario. The flexible Gemini Full Moon falls in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, intensifying your resolve to make the most of your current relationship situation -- even if it's not ideal. Let logic be your guide until the Moon shifts into emotional Cancer and you are back in your element.

You are influenced by the inconstant feelings of people around you as the changeable Gemini Full Moon shines in your 7th House of Relationships. A close partner may be the source of a minor conflict now, distracting you from what you prefer to be doing. But don't ignore the messages you are receiving today because you have something special to learn from the differences of opinion between you and others. Open your heart and listen to those you love.

You might not know how you got yourself into such an awkward predicament today. Unfortunately, you won't escape from your dilemma by just walking away now that the Gemini Full Moon stimulates your 6th House of Employment. This is a very busy time and there are many things that need your attention. You feel tugged in too many ways and it's difficult to know exactly where to begin. Take a deep breath and a small step. And then take another one. You're already on the road to success -- even if your destination still feels far away.

Don't attempt to make everything fit into place now that the flighty Gemini Full Moon occurs in your 5th House of Self-Expression. Although you want full resolution, you need to let go before you have all the answers. It might even be fun if you take a risk and share your feelings with those involved. But you could have some apprehension, for you sense that things are not going to unfold the way you envisioned them. You may want to run out on your responsibilities today, but some issues are just too important to ignore.

You feel as if you must do something immediately to exercise your control in the outer world, but the Gemini Full Moon emphasizes your 4th House of Home and Family, drawing your energy inward. You can think of each and every possible option, as if you were playing a game of chess. But it's just too much today to keep it all in order. You may have to throw in the towel and just ride the uncertain waves of emotional change to see where the currents will take you.

You're ready to make something happen, but acting in an aggressive manner isn't such a wise idea today. Rather than rushing into a new project or activity, allow some time to assimilate what has already transpired over the past few days. Even if you want to demonstrate how responsible you are, charging ahead won't deliver the message of maturity you wish to send. Paradoxically, you can make your point and accomplish more now by slowing down and doing less.

You may be so sensitive now to what others say that a good friend could rub you the wrong way with a casual remark. Although the comments might actually be directed toward someone else, it still feels as if you're the one that's actually being criticized. Over-personalizing what you hear leads to a misinterpretation of the facts. Taking a more laid-back approach to personal interactions allows you to avoid unnecessary problems.

You begin to feel relief as your extreme mood swings settle down. Although yesterday's Full Moon was in your sign, today's nurturing Cancer Moon could soothe your heightened emotions. Thankfully, you can choose to concentrate your energy instead of scattering it. If someone needs a bit of special tender loving care, step up to the plate and demonstrate your willingness to be there for those you love.

Today's events may stir up memories from your childhood that evoke strong feelings, since the emotional Cancer Moon is at her height of power. You could be nostalgic at first, but your longing transforms into much-needed clarity about a pressing issue. Nevertheless, it's dangerous to assume that your processing is over, for your moods may continue shifting through tomorrow. Be gentle with yourself while traveling on your sentimental journey.

Hiding your emotions gives you enough space and time to consider your reactions without also feeling like you must share them with everyone else. However, the self-contained Cancer Moon's presence in your 12th House of Secrets indicates that your imagination is more active today than is apparent to others. It's not necessary to express everything you're thinking until you are ready to deal with the consequences of what you say. Exploring your dreams is a wonderful way to get in touch with your heart.

You tend to over-analyze everything you want to say today because you're concerned about what everyone might think. You believe it's safer to be discreet than to agitate others with something they don't really need to know. Nevertheless, a conversation could lead you to disclose more than you intend. If so, remember that it's better to be honest than to cover your tracks with half-truths and innuendos. Speaking with integrity is your best course of action because your real friends expect you to be sincere no matter what.

You may have mixed feelings about helping someone less fortunate today. You might resist at first, relying on logic to give reasons why you cannot jump in as requested. Maintaining a sense of humor can be crucial to offering what is needed now, for a good laugh enables you to dissipate the tension while also doing the right thing. Thankfully, you're able to follow through with useful assistance in the nick of time; be the friend you want to have.

You're experiencing uncertainty about an upcoming business trip or vacation as the tentative Cancer Moon visits your 9th House of Travel. You might try to gloss over important details today because you don't want to cancel a fun adventure. It's challenging now to keep everything clear so you don't end up somewhere lost and far from home. Go ahead and continue making your plans, but scale back your expectations to be on the safe side. Trust your instincts to be your guide.

You might not have an outlet to express the emotional intensity you are feeling today. The needy Cancer Moon can be unsettling as she moves through your 8th House of Deep Sharing, stirring your passions. The problem is that patience doesn't come naturally for you Archers, making it tough to slow down enough now to see where your feelings take you. However, if you ignore your emotions, they'll just resurface stronger and be even more difficult to handle the next time around. Confiding in someone you trust may be all you need at this time.

You might not be able to avoid a friend or acquaintance who asks for help in solving an emotional problem today, even if you would prefer to sidestep this potentially complex situation. But your natural assumption that you need to fix anything is not true. Instead of taking over, encourage others to talk and then show your support just by listening. You don't have to do anything except receive what's being said with an open mind and a compassionate heart.

Although you might wish you could take the day off and even lose yourself in a movie or a book, there's just too much to do now. Unfortunately, your responsibilities may restrict your freedom and stand in the way of your happiness. Don't fight the inevitable today; show up and do what's required. Thankfully, you should be able to find some time later in the day for a well-earned escape -- and it will be more enjoyable if your work is already done.

You may be willing to wait patiently today for something you want because you believe there's a better chance of finding satisfaction once you can see the whole picture. But the current dynamics aren't about denying your desire for pleasure; it's more to do with realizing your dreams. Impulsively taking action could create more problems than good times. Being cautious is wise as long as you don't let any significant opportunities slip through your fingers in the process.

You actually think that you're being sensitive to the needs of everyone else now, but you're probably not looking much further than your own ambitions. Instead of just assuming that others have goals that are identical to yours, ask them what they want. Remember, you must listen to how they respond without trying to convince them to change their minds. Be wise and keep an open mind in all your interactions today. You might be pleasantly surprised by how much you have in common.

It may be flattering if others attempt to persuade you to participate in their far-out schemes today. However, you need to be firm about your limits so you don't end up wasting your valuable time and resources on someone else's idea that distracts you from your own work. Be exceptionally cautious now if an opportunity seems too good to be true -- because it probably is. Be smart and wait a few more days before actually saying yes.

Hold on to your wallet today since you could quickly get into trouble by purchasing something that's beyond your means. If an investment opportunity comes your way, it may not be as lucrative as it appears. You might think that you are in control, but that's because you cannot tell if any of the facts are being distorted. Double check everything you are told now before taking an unnecessary risk; it's better to be safe than sorry.

Play it cool today because you may be feeling vulnerable and managing your emotions can be challenging, especially with the Moon moving through moody Cancer. To complicate matters even more, someone could be exaggerating the story they are telling you, which makes it harder to know if something is awry. Nevertheless, constant suspicion on your part creates its own set of problems and you might miss a real opportunity. Your best strategy is to verify your facts before making any long-term commitments.

Things are looking up today, but don't put all your eggs in one basket because your current view may be a little too optimistic. Be careful, for your positive thinking can stoke your confidence so much that you get in over your head. Cut back your expectations just a bit so you won't have to face unnecessary disappointment in the near future. Adopting a realistic approach enables you to achieve the creative expression you seek.

Your hopes for a relationship might be so high now that you can't possibly make your unrealistic dreams come true. You may become frustrated, leading you to try overly hard to please your friends. It's tempting to expect so much from others that they cannot possibly satisfy all your needs. Instead of fixating on the outcome today, keep bringing your attention back to the present so you can fully engage in the process as it unfolds.

Although you might be hesitant to share your true feelings today, your tone might convey more than you actually intend, anyhow. It's hard for others to tell whether you are exaggerating or if they are just reading more into your words because of their own expectations. Ultimately, it makes no difference where the problem begins. Avoid misunderstandings by softening your message. Less intensity works wonders now when it comes to matters of the heart.

There are a limited number of productive hours in each day because some of them need to be reserved for sleeping and eating. Although you can pack a lot of activity into a short amount of time, your tendency is to take on more than you should today. You might even tell yourself that you're being practical, but you could convince yourself of nearly anything now. Make your life easier by reducing your commitments before things get out of hand.

Your interest in discovering new ideas might open up an unexpected avenue of exploration today as you seek to understand the mysteries of the universe. You could be drawn toward a spiritual tradition or unusual philosophy if you attempt to delve beneath the surface. But don't just accept the truth in everything that comes your way. A bit of healthy skepticism now can save you a big headache down the road. Nevertheless, traveling with an open mind is still your ticket to the next adventure.

You are the one that everyone comes to for advice because you see opportunities through a very wise and practical lens. Additionally, you are able to communicate your ideas with great clarity now. While others may miss the potential problems with your plan, you can quickly spot the flaws, too. But this isn't about being negative; it's more about keeping it real. Relying on your pragmatic nature improves your chances for success.

You may think you have to share every little detail in order to clearly explain your position, but spending too much time on the minutiae actually gets in the way of your message. After a certain point, the more you talk today, the less anyone will listen. Give your audience the basics in as few words as possible. They can always ask questions if they need to know anything else. Less is more.

Sharing your feelings may be just what you need today, but you can alienate others if you say too much too fast. It's misleading if your friends encourage you to keep talking, since they might be supportive only because they think it's their duty to listen. Luckily, there's no need to shut out those who truly care about you, but rambling on about the details of your life won't make anyone feel any better now. Thinking about your message in advance allows for the best possible reception.

Your self-esteem is on the upswing today, yet your enthusiasm could create problems if you don't take the time to listen to what others are saying. It's tempting now to just ignore an important piece of information that can come back to haunt you later, costing you time and money. Someone may unintentionally give you incorrect data, or you might misunderstand what you've been told. Either way, it's wise to check everything you hear twice. Sticking close to the facts is your smartest strategy, even if it's not the most enjoyable path to take.

Oddly enough, although the pace of your life may be speeding up, it feels as if your progress is slowing down. It's difficult to keep up with all that you should be doing now, and you might exhaust yourself by trying to finish everything that you start. Even if you want others to appreciate your reliability, it's still important to take your time and produce high-quality work. Focusing on excellence will impress your colleagues more than hurrying through your tasks just to get them done.

Your life seems quite complicated today, as the evocative Moon visits your 3rd House of Communication, turning up the volume on your conversations with others. But if your day becomes too noisy, a possible misinterpretation can add chaos and confusion. Nevertheless, don't worry if you need to untangle a delicate issue; it's worth clearing up a misunderstanding now before it causes any trouble later on. Carving out a bit of peace and quiet may be the first step toward finding clarity.

You may become quite stubborn if a coworker suggests you change your plans today. You might dig your heels in even further if you have already taken the time to carefully consider your options. You want to do what makes the most sense, but you don't think you should revise your agenda just to make others happy. Compromising is a necessary part of negotiation, but there's no need to sacrifice your values to reach a successful agreement.

Escaping your daily routine to have some fun might be tempting, but you have more important things to do because others are depending on you now. You have been itching to make something exciting happen, and it's time to push ahead with your plans. Just don't become impatient; positive change must be grounded by a strong foundation, so impulsive action is unwise. Build on what you already have today instead of betting your future success on the unknown.

You feel torn between presenting your ideas to others and withdrawing to keep your point of view to yourself. Your creative juices are flowing, but you're not sure if it's appropriate to express your crazy ideas. Fortunately, your imagination won't steer you wrong today, so trust your instincts no matter what. Taking a chance by putting yourself out there for everyone to see isn't as risky as you think.

Chilling out with your friends sounds like a great idea, but you could end up far from your goals if you don't take things more seriously today. It's tempting to assume that everything is on track and will turn out as you wish, but you need to deliver on your promises to keep the day from spinning out of control. Thankfully, if you take the time to put your recent commitments into proper perspective, you should be able to negotiate a course of action that won't require as much hard work on your part.

You intuitively know what others want today, which may help you get a head start on the job. There's no reason to wait patiently for your boss to assign you a new task if you already know what needs to be done. Starting on your chores earlier and being more methodical in your approach can turn a hectic day into a pleasant one, enabling you to accomplish more than you originally thought possible.

Your feet are planted firmly on the ground today, yet the Moon's visit to your 9th House of Adventure also inspires you with a touch of wanderlust. You have a pretty good idea of what you should be doing now, but your restlessness won't go away on its own. You're eager to embark on a big trip, but this might not be the most convenient time to travel. There's no hurry; thankfully, solid preparation will pave the way to your success. The future may be even more exciting than you can imagine.

Although the emotional intensity seems to be mellowing out today, there's still a lot happening in your personal life. Fortunately, you have a specific destination in mind, making it easier to follow the path toward your goals. Visualize your success, make a plan to reach it and then set out toward your target. Keep in mind that shortcuts won't help you get there any faster now, so prepare to take the more traditional route that consists of hard work and sheer determination.

You may strive to take a centrist position today because you really don't want to stir up any extra trouble. You prefer sharing a point of view that's easily defendable, but it seems as if everything you say now provokes conflict, even if you're just trying to make your opinions known. Remember that your plan is merely one way to approach a dilemma;  grace others with respect, even if their conclusions are different from yours. Thankfully, there's more than one route to reach your goals.

Although you can competently analyze a project by breaking it down into manageable components, it's not necessary to make such a big deal of what you are doing today. Fulfilling your commitments is important, but don't waste energy explaining how you developed your strategy. Others don't need to know your inner process now, as long as you focus on getting the job done in a timely manner.

You are apt to receive more support from your friends now than you ever thought possible. In fact, it might even seem like too much, making you feel uncomfortable about not being able to repay the debt. However, you could let others love you and choose to accept it at face value. Set your fears aside so your friendships can deepen and bring more joy into your life. But your biggest problem today may be your impatience to make something happen. Forget about immediate change and bask in the love while you have the chance.

You are one to appreciate the sensible logic of reality, even when it isn't telling you what you want to hear. However, you're on a roll and you may not be so practical now. Perhaps you are riding the frenetic energy of the holiday season. Or, maybe it's just your nerves getting the best of you. Either way, pay attention to the signs and slow down before you run out of gas. Racing around isn't going to bring you the peace and happiness that you seek. Instead, take a more moderate approach based upon your most important values, rather than trying to impress anyone else.

Your enthusiasm may not overcome the obstacles appearing in your life now. You might as well understand that you're not going to get everything done that you set out to do. Frustration can build, because you're being much harder on yourself today than is necessary. It's healthy to be motivated by serious intentions, but don't go to extremes. Give yourself permission to slack off just a bit. Lighten up and enjoy the spirit of the season.

Your finances may need some extra attention now or they could get in the way of your holiday fun. If you have put off your fiscal responsibilities, you must refocus your efforts and do whatever it takes to get your money situation back on track. Don't wait for the new year; consider cutting unnecessary expenses as soon as possible. The good news is the best things in life are free.

Relationship dynamics play a pivotal role now, especially those with your friends and colleagues. Although it may seem as if others want to help you, you might not be able to find the exact words to motivate them to take action. Instead of frustrating yourself by trying to change someone else's behavior, focus on your own routine by establishing new habits to increase your efficiency. If you take care of your responsibilities without waiting for assistance, you'll have more time to enjoy the holidays.

You may be fascinated by the tiniest details of your life, but as a picky Virgo this seems like just another day. However, you might be driving your friends crazy with your slightly obsessive behavior. However, that's their problem now and not yours. It's time for them to adjust to your approach rather than you changing what comes naturally. Being true to yourself feels good, and it allows you to maintain your sense of individuality. Nevertheless, there's no limit to what you can do for others once you have learned to take proper care of yourself.

Although you like to do nice things for those you love, you may grow resentful of your domestic responsibilities today unless you also take some time for yourself. Your key planet Venus turns retrograde in your 4th House of Home and Family, requiring you to reevaluate what you're willing to give up in return for emotional security. But don't bury your desires for the sake of convenience or they will just resurface. Sharing your needs is easier now, and it dissipates the tension before it reaches a critical point.

You may not feel as playful as those around you these days, but you are still ready to nurture a potential relationship. However, you first need to know that the other person is taking you seriously before you reveal much of anything. After all, you're not interested in pursuing unrequited love. Unfortunately, your fear of abandonment can prompt you to close your heart even before you take a risk and share your feelings. Thankfully, the choice is yours. Shine your love light irrespective of the consequences.

You don't have time to waste energy now, so steer clear of any unnecessary disputes. They are probably just distractions and won't amount to anything important anyway. You are alternately full of energy and then totally exhausted. Keep in mind that your stamina is intrinsically tied to your emotions, so find ways to manage your anger before it becomes problematic. Vent any unresolved feelings through physical exercise or hard work to manage the mental stress. Taking a moment to remember what matters most puts you back in touch with your heart.

It's not too soon to start formulating your wishes now for the new year, because the Winter Solstice marks a turning point as the Sun returns to your calculating sign. Although mental clarity is working in your favor, Venus Retrograde in Capricorn indicates you might have to wait a while longer to get what you want. Don't try to force anything into place. Loosening your grip on the controls helps you reach your goals in the long run.

Feelings of paranoia may surface today, but the truth is that someone could actually be trying to undermine your efforts. Any hidden agendas have a tendency to complicate matters, so your current goal should be to bring secrets out into the open. Shine the light of your consciousness into the darkness. The more you know now, the better for all involved.

The pace of your social life is already picking up -- and the activity is more than just a holiday buzz. You have a practical need to be around people who have supported you in the past and who will be there when you need them in the future. Additionally, you are eager to be a real friend to others. Push your feelings outward; being part of a group can add security and stability to your life. Not surprisingly, it's even more rewarding to give than it is to receive.

It's annoying if others are critical of your behavior today, especially if you're not doing anything differently. Their pickiness might seem unnecessary, but consider addressing everyone's concerns before you quickly write them off as inconsequential. Look at this as an opportunity to improve your game rather than wasting energy by complaining about anyone else. Fortunately, a simple adjustment in your attitude can turn an unpleasant situation into a joyful one.

You should be able to keep your focus now no matter how many distractions tempt you. But the same friends and family members who often lead you astray from your own plans currently have enough happening to keep them busy. Put relaxation on your schedule, but don't be lazy all day. You can accomplish a lot at home when you concentrate on specific tasks that are simple to complete. Tomorrow's workload will be easier to handle if some chores are crossed off your list today.

You want to make smart use of your time today, but too many things seem to conspire against your personal agenda. Luckily, unexpected social situations may brighten your day, but you must be willing to drop your previous plans in favor of something new. You don't have to completely abandon your original ideas; it's about carefully analyzing all your options so you can make the best possible choices. A little spontaneity goes a long way.

You are usually quite happy when your ideas resonate with your emotions. Even if you're feeling more serious than everyone around you, your confidence is amplified by the down-to-earth Virgo Moon moving through your 3rd House of Communication. But there's no need to hurry now; your current vision might still take a few days to solidify, so don't rush to make anything happen. Relax and fully enjoy the magic of the holiday season.

You are motivated to take stock of what you have acquired as the Moon enters your 2nd House of Material Possessions this afternoon. It's also an opportune moment to step back and reevaluate your core beliefs. Instead of getting caught up in the material world now, shift your attention to the metaphysical and spiritual realms to round out your spectrum of experiences. There's magic to be found everywhere you look.

It's time to consider everything you have to gain by maintaining integrity in your relationships and continuing on your path of self-improvement. But the Moon's return to your sign today also emphasizes your subjective feelings, raising self-doubts as you second-guess a recent decision. It's imperative to pay attention to both your heart and your head. Fortunately, arming yourself with enough facts, combined with conscious self-awareness, enables you to think clearly enough to make wise choices.

You can feel the growing intensity and it's smart to tie up as many loose ends as possible today. However, don't begin any new projects around the house, even if you think you have sufficient time. It's a much better idea to focus on completing an unfinished task, instead. Unfortunately, you won't be satisfied with simply meeting your obligations now so seek ways to add a bit of creativity to the mix. Although there are a variety of paths to success, you will be happiest if yours also embraces elements of beauty and grace.

You are inexplicably drawn toward the future as the evocative Moon visits your 11th House of Hopes, Dreams and Wishes. However, you can't afford to forget where you are today and the responsibilities right in front of your nose. Find a way to balance your colorful visions with mundane reality. Remember, you are at your best if you can hold on to your fantasies, even when you are being practical in the real world.

You are usually quite comfortable with big ideas and grandiose plans, but today's detail-oriented Virgo Moon reminds you to narrow your world view, rather than to expand it. No one can make this shift of perspective for you; this new focus must originate from within. Every time you notice that you're longing for a distant horizon, bring your attention back to the immediate task at hand. Staying in the present moment allows you to fully experience the power of now.

You might try to shake yourself loose from the extra responsibilities that seem to gravitate toward you today. Although a pragmatic approach leads you to make better decisions, you don't want to be in charge now. Forget about all the calculations and analysis; just open your heart and follow the most joyful path. Seeking spiritual answers, rather than chasing material distractions, infuses your life with new-found meaning.

You may grow uncomfortable if someone raises a sensitive issue that you cannot gracefully avoid today. Your repeated attempts to resist an emotional journey to an unfamiliar place can create more problems than just closing your eyes and diving in. Even if layers of complex feelings are challenging, take a deep breath and push forward. You could emerge from a difficult encounter recharged with renewed vigor and an appreciation for the infinite possibilities ahead.

Your friends and family might not be so fast to encourage your dreams today and this can be rather upsetting. However, the Moon's shift into cool Virgo and your 7th House of Partnerships turns the focus away from you and toward those who are an important part of your world. Just remember that you cannot get away with blaming someone else for your discomfort. Spend a bit of time by yourself to nurture your inner process, even if it remains unacknowledged by everyone else. Ultimately, following your bliss inspires others to do the same.

There is a lot weighing on your mind now, yet you're already feeling impulsive Mars pushing up against irrepressible Uranus, indicating that you might leap before you look. Of course, you know better; you've been in this position countless times before. Take a chance by trying a different approach to your dilemma. Change an old pattern by doing the responsible thing rather than following the whim of the moment.

Although you attempt to be conscientious in everything you do today, a shortcut might be so tempting that you cannot resist it. However, taking the easy way out may only lead to additional work rather than saving you time and effort. Be cautious in your approach now; once you create a plan that is based on common sense instead of appearances, don't take any detours until you have reached your goals.

Getting to the bottom of an important issue is challenging today, but recognizing the source of your drive can prevent unnecessary headaches down the road. Instead of distracting yourself with one thing after another, set aside some quiet time to think about your life and what you could improve in the months ahead. But don't just visualize your future; reflect on your past choices to better understand how you got yourself into the current situation in the first place. A little self-awareness might do you a lot of good.

Establishing a concrete schedule is a smart idea today because you feel more comfortable when you know in advance what you will be doing. But even if you use your common sense when planning your day, you still should remain flexible to allow for unexpected changes. A lot can happen that's outside your sphere of control and it's better to roll with the waves now than to exhaust yourself struggling against them. Knowing when to hold on or let go is the key to your success.

Reconciling your current feelings with your goals for the year ahead is tricky. You may be ready to cash in your chips and start anew, but that's not necessarily a viable option. Instead, consider what can be done to revitalize your life without suddenly turning it upside down. Bold thinking makes sense but there's no need to be in too much of a hurry to put your ideas into motion. Time is on your side when you slow down and do things right.

Understanding your feelings is a complex matter now because they might not conform to your expectations. The Moon's visit to your sign heightens the intensity of your emotions, so don't bother trying to rationalize your reactions; instead, observe them without judgment. The universe is granting you permission to change your mind as often as needed until your new perspective begins to solidify. Your values are in the midst of a complete metamorphosis and there's no use in rushing the process.

Your fantasies may be overactive today, but you can't afford a whole day of escaping into your imagination. You have important decisions to make that could alter the direction of your life. But don't be concerned if you're unable to put your new plan into motion right away because you could come up with such an original strategy that it changes the rules of the game. Sudden shifts in your thinking are quite likely now; just don't do anything radical until you've had enough time to develop your ideas. Slow and steady wins the race.

Reality is catching up with you these days now that your key planet Pluto is aligning with karmic Saturn in your sign. You intuitively know that change is possible or even necessary, but it might seem too overwhelming today to do anything about it at all. If you feel like you have bitten off more than you can chew, announce a temporary moratorium to give yourself a bit of downtime. You have a better chance of meeting your deadlines if you simply take a break to replenish your energy and adjust your attitude.

Seeing the potential in the current set of circumstances can be a real challenge today, but a sudden breakthrough in your thinking makes anything possible. You might even have flashes of extreme optimism now that elevate you above your serious mood. But don't worry if you can't solve all your problems with one brilliant idea. Remember, you're in an extended period of change and it will take time to create your new plans for the future.

You feel most secure when you know that the foundations of your life are stable. Unfortunately, those very same things that you normally rely on are now undergoing a very controlled yet dramatic transformation, making it harder to plan your next career move. You might be at your wit's end because you don't feel in control today, and intense concentration doesn't seem to help matters much. Fortunately, a breakthrough is possible if you aren't afraid of stepping outside of the box and seeing things from a whole new perspective.

Your desire to make long-term plans can be quite frustrating since you know that they are logistically out of the question today. Part of the problem is that you want more stability, yet the current circumstances stir up old issues. You're reminded that everything changes, including those things you believed would last forever. Although it may not be easy to separate your past from the future now, critical thinking is still your best tool in your struggle to see the present moment in a clear light.

Ironically, if someone appears to be overly critical today, it may be a direct result of your unfounded optimism. But it's not that you actually believe everything is awesome. It's just that you're aware of the difficulties ahead and you understand the importance of maintaining a positive attitude. Nevertheless, others may think you are lost in a fantasy world and could judge you harshly. Be open to receiving a reality check and make sure you aren't avoiding the truth. As long as you're not in denial, there's no reason to let anyone rain on your parade.

Your adrenaline kicks up another notch higher today as your key planet Mars provokes you to take initiative, even if you don't have a real plan in place. You may feel a bit out of control and could do something that you soon regret. Thankfully, you also have the ability to take a more measured approach to your relationships now. Don't be in such a hurry; just a touch of self-control at the right moment goes a long way to help you gain a healthy perspective.

Concentrating on your chores can be challenging today, but you probably have things to do that can't be postponed any longer. Although it's not your style to just walk away from a commitment, you're intrigued by this option now. If you find yourself getting all worked up by the exciting possibilities, remember that you'll be happier in the long run if you stick to your original agenda. Taking one step at a time is the most reliable way to reach your destination.

You don't know what to think as you are bounced around by the changing cosmic tides today. It's rather tricky to maintain a balanced approach to your social life now; you could go overboard by accepting one too many invitations. On the other hand, you might overreact to the emotional overload and decide to become a recluse for a few days. You may be totally psyched up about life one minute yet quite subdued the next. However, inaction isn't a smart strategy; choose the path that brings you the most joy and follow it the best you can.

You can receive great benefits by carefully watching your energy output today because you could easily exhaust yourself by attempting to be in too many places at once. It's helpful to also monitor your feelings so that unexpressed anger doesn't drive you to do something foolish. Consider your motives before behaving recklessly. Taking time to contemplate your actions might very well save you from making a scene. Starting from a place of gratitude may be all you need to turn things in a positive direction.

Although you know the importance of thinking before you act, it's still a challenge today to consider the ramifications of your risky behavior. Others may caution you to refrain from spending so much money or warn you about taking a trip you can't afford. But their advice might not be useful now because it doesn't lead you in a positive direction. Thankfully, the situation isn't as complicated as it appears, but it's still wise to have your contingency plan in order and ready to go.

You may feel a sense of discomfort today, going from a quiet mood to being a social butterfly. But even if you flirt with the idea of spontaneously heading out to have fun, it still makes more sense to work before you play. Naturally, you shouldn't run out on your responsibilities. Nevertheless, time spent with those you love can be rejuvenating so make sure to schedule it into your day. Man does not live by bread alone.

You don't have the foggiest notion what to do today because someone might be trying to convince you to start something new. Fortunately, you won't likely be talked into any activity that's not already in your plans; but you still can get thrown off course by your own weird ideas. In fact, your thoughts may be quite unsettling now, instead of inspiring your creativity. There's no need to take everything so seriously. Luckily, you're comfortable with ambiguity, so don't force a decision before its time.

Your extreme emotions might provoke you to express yourself in a dramatic outpouring of opinions today, especially if you are angry with someone and haven't yet shared your feelings. Telling a friend what you're thinking may be a sensible first step, but ranting won't likely make a problem disappear. Nevertheless, don't accept things as they are; a compassionate strategy that aims for a long-term solution instead of a quick fix is your best bet.

You must be patient today because others may be inadvertently distracting you from finishing a project. You could feel as if you're getting nowhere fast and your growing frustration motivates you to take an unnecessary risk. Acknowledge that your current point of view is warped by your dreams and remember that you'll be better off if you wait a few more days before doing anything rash. In the meantime, enjoy the holiday celebrations with a grateful heart and a positive attitude.

You have way too many options in front of you and it's nearly impossible to pick a single course of action. Nevertheless, you may feel the pressure to make a choice today, prompting unnecessary panic and rash decisions. Normally, you are willing to wait for clarity prior to making your move. However, your enthusiasm could get in the way now. Take a deep breath, listen to your heart and figure out what you really want to do.

Doing what you are told could end up taking more time today than you expect. It's not likely that anyone is trying to create more stress, yet you might jump to a conclusion now and misunderstand what was said. Your desire to respond immediately may cause you to twist what you hear to support your assumptions. If you are uncertain about someone's message, ask for clarification before you land yourself in trouble. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
